quotes.quote: Celebrate the new day with shouts of praise, love and grace and with a beautiful smile upon your face.
quotes.author: Caroline Naoroji

quotes.quote: imagine if we treated each new dawn of each new day with the same reverence and joy as we do each new year.
quotes.author: Angie Lynn

quotes.quote: Each morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Today's a new day. It's your day. You shape it. Don't let it be shaped by someone else's ignorance or fear.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Yesterday ended last night, today is a brand new day. And it's yours.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Each new day is a blank page in the diary of your life. The secret of success is in turning that diary into the best story you possibly can.
quotes.author: Douglas Pagels

quotes.quote: Here on the pulse of this new day, You may have the grace to look up and out And into your sister's eyes, into Your brother's face, your country And say simply, Very simply, With hope, Good Morning.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The light of a new day always chases the shadows of the night away, and shows us that the shape of our fears is only the ghost of our own minds.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: A new day: Be open enough to see opportunities. Be wise enough to be grateful. Be courageous enough to be happy.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Every morning starts a new page in your story. Make it a great one today.
quotes.author: Doe Zantamata

quotes.quote: When a new day begins, dare to smile gratefully.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.quote: The next morning dawned bright and sweet, like ribbon candy.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.quote: Today is a new day. Even if you were wrong yesterday, you can get it right today.
quotes.author: Dwight Howard

quotes.quote: Today is a BRAND NEW day a perfectly good reason to get up and start over. Never give up.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: Each new day brings new opportunities. You have to search to be able to find these opportunities.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Each new day offers the chance to start afresh, to achieve those things you most desire.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Today is a brand new day. Forget about yesterday. It does not matter. Forget about tomorrow it will take care of itself. Concentrate on this day. Make it the best ever.
quotes.author: Mary-Frances Winters

quotes.quote: I'm glad tomorrow's a new day 'cause I really messed this one up...
quotes.author: Susan Gale

quotes.quote: On the other side of this darkness, a new day will slowly dawn.
quotes.author: Corban Addison

quotes.quote: If the sun comes up, I have a chance.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: Work to realize the possibility of this new day and to make it a truly great one.
quotes.author: Kirk Weisler

quotes.quote: Tomorrow, is the first blank page of a 365 page book. Write a good one.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.quote: This is a new day. Begin anew to claim and create all that is good.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: A new day will come and when the sun shines it will shine out the clearer.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: When you take the U out of mourning, it's a brand new day!
quotes.author: John Edward

quotes.quote: Every day is new. It's just a new day. I look at six hours at a time.
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.quote: I have always been delighted at the prospect of a new day, a fresh try, one more start, with perhaps a bit of magic waiting somewhere behind the morning.
quotes.author: J. B. Priestley

quotes.quote: At every sunrise I renounce the doubts of night and greet the new day of a most precious delusion.
quotes.author: Czeslaw Milosz

quotes.quote: Approach each new day as a new opportunity to be the person you aspire to be.
quotes.author: Bill Courtney

quotes.quote: Every new day begins with possibilities. It's up to us to fill it with the things that move us toward progress and peace.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: There is a deep, peaceful calm in the dawning of a new day.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Never look back reminiscing on yesterday , smile for the future tomorrow's a new day.
quotes.author: Zayn Malik

quotes.quote: Light is sweet; how pleasant to see a new day dawning.
quotes.author: Ecclesiastes

quotes.quote: The new day has greeted us with no rules except for the rules we placed with it, greet it with open arms and endless possibility.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: When you start each day with a grateful heart, light illuminates from within.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The best way to start a new day is to ask God to refresh and clean our heart and mind.
quotes.author: Sandra Day Oconnor

quotes.quote: When I wake up every morning, I thank God for the new day.
quotes.author: F. Sionil Jose

quotes.quote: Every new day is another chance to change your life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every morning is a chance at a new day.
quotes.author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

quotes.quote: Every day is a new day. It is better to be lucky. But I would rather be exact. Then when luck comes you are ready.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Today is a new day.You will get out of it just what you put into it.
quotes.author: Mary Pickford

quotes.quote: Everyone has highs and lows that they have to learn from, but every morning I start off with a good head on my shoulders, saying to myself, It's going to be a good day!
quotes.author: Lindsay Lohan

quotes.quote: You just can't live that negative way. You know what I mean? Make way for the positive day cause it's a new day.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: I would like this to be a new day. I would hope now that we can focus on doing the people's business.
quotes.author: Ernie Fletcher

quotes.quote:
Finish every day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities, no doubt crept in. Forget them as soon as you can, tomorrow is a new day; begin it well and serenely, with too high a spirit to be cumbered with your old nonsense.
This new day is too dear, with its hopes and invitations, to waste a moment on the yesterdays.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: All great beginnings start in the dark, when the moon greets you to a new day at midnight.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: It's a new dawn. It's a new day. It's a new life for me and I'm feeling good.
quotes.author: Leslie Bricusse

quotes.quote: Participate in your dreams today. There are unlimited opportunities available with this new day. Take action on those wonderful dreams you've had in your mind for so long.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: New day, new hopes, new life!
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Never mind those failures till yesterday. Each new day is a sequel of a wonderful life; gifted with hopes to succeed.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Every new day is an opportunity to grow your love.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Each day is always breaking out anew. Aspirations swirling round what you do
quotes.author: Richard L. Ratliff

quotes.quote: Accept the past as the past and realize that each new day you are a new person who doesn’t need to carry old baggage into the new day with you.
quotes.author: Alaric Hutchinson

quotes.quote: Embrace every new day with gratitude, hope and love.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Each sunrise brings a new day filled with new hopes for a new beginning.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Every new day is a sacred gift with new sacred grace.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Let your past be a reason for growth and greatness not blame and shame. Today is a new day!
quotes.author: Carol 'CC' Miller

quotes.quote: No matter how gloomy the morning, it is a new day where anything is possible.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Fry

quotes.quote: Learn from everyone but be your own guidance, and you will find a red-hot feeling in your chest each night, eager for the possibilities of a new day. No one knows your heart as well as you do.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: Every sunset is an opportunity to reset. Every sunrise begins with new eyes.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: New day, new month, new visions.
quotes.author: Charmaine J Forde

quotes.quote: Each new day is an invitation to an adventure of your own making.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Whoever has the courage to walk in the dark, share experience the dawn of light in a new day.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Every new morning gives fresh hope, for great is the mercy of the new day
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Hit the reset button. Whatever happened yesterday, forget about it. Get a new perspective. Today is a new day. Fresh start, begins now.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Be grateful for the grace of a new day.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Every new day is the dawn of a new grace.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Every new day is a dawn of a new divine order.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The beauty of a bright new day!
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: A new day always comes with new hopes, new opportunities, and new lives.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Starting out a new day gives hope for new adventures, villains and hero's to cross your path. Make the most of it.
quotes.author: Anastasia Bolinder

quotes.quote: Embrace each new day with great expectations.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Every new day brings new adoration and new adventure.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Every new day, I reach out to the best of myself by grace.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Embrace the sacredness of a new day.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Every new day gives me ceaseless hope to reach out for my dreams
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Tommorow is a new day; begin it well and serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Upon the birth of a new day as we see our forefathers pave the way. We see the tyranny of evil men.
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.quote: Every day is a new day; bringing along with it overwhelming loads of happiness, and an unparalleled rhapsody to blissfully lead life.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Look, the dawn is dancing breaking through the night, joyfully commanding light-- into day's new start.
quotes.author: Donka Kristeva

quotes.quote: Dreamer awakes, thought still in maze, consciousness stirred, alertness in place, new day embraced.
quotes.author: Donka Kristeva

quotes.quote: One response to feeling abandoned is to abandon yourself.
quotes.author: Theodore Millon

quotes.quote: Our stars are not where we last admired them. Our homes crumble and we don't know which place to long for.
quotes.author: Ann Druyan

quotes.quote: When loneliness is a constant state of being, it harkens back to a childhood wherein neglect and abandonment were the landscape of life.
quotes.author: Alexandra Katehakis

quotes.quote: A humankind abandoned in its earlier formative stage becomes its own greatest threat to survival.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: You have not been abandoned. You are never alone, except by your own choice.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: There is no greater punishment than that of being abandoned to one's self.
quotes.author: Pasquier Quesnel

quotes.quote: Being alone is scary, but not as scary as feeling alone in a relationship.
quotes.author: Megan Marie

quotes.quote: Being abandoned or given up is the most devastating emotion we can cause in another human being.
quotes.author: Gary Daivd Currie

quotes.quote: Many times, though, when people feel as if The Uni-verse has abandoned them, the truth is that they have abandoned their dreams, and as a result they have abandoned The Uni-verse. What we think is being done TO US, we are actually doing TO ourselves. It's a totally crazy reversal that is true most of the time.
quotes.author: Mastin Kipp

quotes.quote: It was always himself that the coward abandoned first. After this all other betrayals came easily.
quotes.author: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.quote: There is nothing lonelier than a cat who has been loved, at least for a while, and then abandoned on the side of the road.
quotes.author: Kathi Appelt

quotes.quote: Not belonging is a terrible feeling. It feels awkward and it hurts, as if you were wearing someone else's shoes.
quotes.author: Phoebe Stone

quotes.quote: If love is universal, no one can be left out.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The feeling of abandonment overwhelmed me as I realised that no one had waited, or cared where I was.
quotes.author: Emily Williams

quotes.quote: They say that abandonment is a wound that never heals. I say only that an abandoned child never forgets.
quotes.author: Mario Balotelli

quotes.quote: It is the soul's duty to be loyal to its own desires. It must abandon itself to its master passion.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: Absence is a house so vast that inside you will pass through its walls and hang pictures on the air.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: The man abandoned by his friends, one after another, without just cause, will acquire, the reputation of being hard to please, changeable, ungrateful, unsociable.
quotes.author: Joseph Roux

quotes.quote: Being abandoned doesn't make for little angels.
quotes.author: Margaret Way

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than being abandoned is knowing that you're not even worth an explanation.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Loss eventually arrives when something departs. Grief is working through both.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: To die is as if one's eyes had been put out and one cannot see anything any more. Perhaps it is like being shut in a cellar. One is abandoned by all. They have slammed the door and are gone. One does not see anything and notices only the damp smell of putrefaction.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.quote: We shall never be abandoned by Heaven while we act worthy of its aid and protection.
quotes.author: Samuel Adams

quotes.quote: To feel abandoned is to deny the intimacy of your surroundings.
quotes.author: David Whyte

quotes.quote: Abandonment doesn't have the sharp but dissipating sting of a slap. It's like a punch to the gut, bruising your skin and driving the precious air from your body.
quotes.author: Tayari Jones

quotes.quote: Abandoning civil society will leave the enemy in control, not by victory but by default.
quotes.author: Mike Klepper

quotes.quote: Reality seems valueless by comparison with the dreams of fevered imaginations; reality is therefore abandoned.
quotes.author: Emile Durkheim

quotes.quote: Fantasy abandoned by reason produces impossible monsters.
quotes.author: Francisco Goya

quotes.quote: The paralyzing fear of being lost is fed solely by the irrational fear that we will never be found.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: If we abandon the marriage, we abandon the family.
quotes.author: Michael Enzi

quotes.quote: Basic human contact - the meeting of eyes, the exchanging of words - is to the psyche what oxygen is to the brain. If you're feeling abandoned by the world, interact with anyone you can.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: Race hate isn't human nature; race hate is the abandonment of human nature.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: Do not abandon yourselves to despair. We are the Easter people and hallelujah is our song.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: The world is full of abandoned meanings. In the commonplace I find unexpected themes and intensities.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: A family ship will never sink until it is abandoned by its crew.
quotes.author: Wes Fesler

quotes.quote: Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Men are perfectly willing to abandon a woman but they refuse to be abandoned by her.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: TheÂ worst feeling is not being alone, it's being forgotten by someone you could not forget.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: No one has ever abandoned a belief because he was forced to do so.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Hope never abandons you, you abandon it.
quotes.author: George Weinberg

quotes.quote: When you abandon making choices, you enter the vast world of excuses.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: The sun does not abandon the moon to darkness.
quotes.author: Brian A. McBride

quotes.quote: The condition of being forgiven is self-abandonment. The proud man prefers self-reproach, however painful -because the reproached self isn't abandoned; it remains intact.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: It sucks when you're being ignored by the only person you want attention from. It hurts getting absolutely no love from the only person you're in love with. It's sad when you get no conversation from the only one you want to talk to.
quotes.author: Francine Chiar

quotes.quote: He who is controlled by objects loses possession of his inner self: if he no longer values himself, how can he value others? If he no longer values others, he is abandoned. He has nothing left!
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: To abandon oneself to principles is really to die â€“ and to die for an impossible love which is the contrary of love.Â
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Ability to find the answers is more important than ability to know the answers.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Discipline is the refining fire by which talent becomes ability.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: Positive thinking will let you use the ability which you have, and that is awesome.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Power is the ability to get things done.
quotes.author: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

quotes.quote: Ability means all of us finding our strengths and putting them to full use.
quotes.author: Kathleen Wynne

quotes.quote: You have this ability to find beauty in weird places.
quotes.author: Kamila Shamsie

quotes.quote: Ability is a light bulb. If you don't turn it on, it will never shine.
quotes.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, your abilities and your own potential. Never let self-doubt hold you captive. You are worthy of all that you dream of and hope for.
quotes.author: Roy Bennett

quotes.quote: To realize your potential you must look beyond the end of yourself, realizing that where you end is most likely where you actually begin.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Focus on your strength and maximum its potential.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You have great talent for great contribution to humanity.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You are amazing person with unique talents. Have faith in your abilities.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Focusing on who you are, and pursuing opportunities to improve your abilities, allows you to be in acceptance of yourself. This makes you a beautiful person who could care less about what others think of you.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: Acting is the ability to live truthfully under the given imaginary circumstances.
quotes.author: Sanford Meisner

quotes.quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Natural abilities are like natural plants; they need pruning by study.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: A man with ability and the desire to accomplish something can do anything.
quotes.author: Donald Kircher

quotes.quote: Ability may get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: The ability to speak exactly is intimately related to the ability to know exactly.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Ability is the art of getting credit for all the home runs somebody else hits.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: The ability to be in the present moment is a major component of mental wellness.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: Great ability develops and reveals itself increasingly with every new assignment.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Ability is commonly found to consist mainly in a high degree of solemnity.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The ability to relax and be mindfully present in the moment comes naturally when we are grateful.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: The ability to forgive is one of man's greatest achievements.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: A special skill, like speaking several languages, or keeping your mouth shut in one.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: If you believe you can do something, then you can acquire the ability to do it even if you didn't have it in the beginning.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Our natural gifts and abilities are limited, but when augmented by inspiration and guidance of the Holy Ghost, our potential increases many fold.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: Strength of character means the ability to overcome resentment against others, to hide hurt feelings, and to forgive quickly.
quotes.author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quotes.quote: Perseverance is the ability to hold our course over time in the face of opposition.
quotes.author: Kris Vallotton

quotes.quote: Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The ability to convert ideas to things is the secret of outward success.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A man of ability and the desire to accomplish something can do anything.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The greatest destroyer of peace is abortion because if a mother can kill her own child, what is left for me to kill you and you to kill me? There is nothing between.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Abortion is inherently different from other medical procedures because no other procedure involves the purposeful termination of a potential life.
quotes.author: Potter Stewart

quotes.quote: In abortion, the person who is massacred, physically and morally, is the woman.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: Abortion is an attack on the family and the humanity that unites us all.
quotes.author: Alveda King

quotes.quote: Abortion is defended today as a means of ensuring the equality and independence of women, and as a solution to the problems of single parenting, child abuse, and the feminization of poverty.
quotes.author: Robert Casey

quotes.quote: I hate abortions, but just could not make that choice for someone else.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Abortion is an issue of conscience for the Labour party.
quotes.author: Diane Abbott

quotes.quote: In the case of abortion, one pits the life of the fetus against the interests of the pregnant woman.
quotes.author: Leon Kass

quotes.quote: I've noticed that everybody that is for abortion has already been born.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Abortion on demand has, in my judgment, contributed significantly to an environment in our country in which life has become very cheap.
quotes.author: Robert Casey

quotes.quote: Abortion ... interferes with God's plan--a plan He willed before He created the universe. Abortion is in violation of God-given life.
quotes.author: Richard C. Halverson

quotes.quote: Abortion should not only be safe and legal, it should be rare.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: Abortion is not a favor for the medical profession to bestow but an obligation for them to perform.
quotes.author: Leslie Cannold

quotes.quote: Abortion is the easy way out. It's hardly surprising that people should choose the most convenient exit from awkward situations.
quotes.author: Tony Abbott

quotes.quote: Let's not pretend that abortion isn't about the mass slaughter of innocents.
quotes.author: Michael Aston

quotes.quote: In short, I'm not sure that the abortion problem can be solved by legislation. I think it can only be solved through moral persuasion.
quotes.author: Tony Campolo

quotes.quote: Abortion is a question of choice.
quotes.author: Robert Casey

quotes.quote: I don't think there is a good reason for an abortion, but Dr. Jasper made me really realize it was just a racket. He was just doing it for the money. He didn't care about the women.
quotes.author: Norma Mccorvey

quotes.quote: The product, abortion, is skillfully marketed and sold to the woman at the crisis time in her life. She buys the product, finds it defective and wants to return it for a refund. But, it's too late.
quotes.author: Carol Everett

quotes.quote: No woman has an abortion for fun.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Joan Smith

quotes.quote: Abortion is an act of desperation. It's an awful solution to a situation that God can work out for good through adoption.
quotes.author: Bob Carlisle

quotes.quote: Abortion is the ultimate violence.
quotes.author: Robert Casey

quotes.quote: Abortion should be listed as a weapon of mass destruction against the voiceless.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Abortion may bury our children, but it can never bury their memory.
quotes.author: Shadia Hrichi

quotes.quote: Abortion is an atrocity. Those who practice or praise it are either damn idiots, misguided fools, or treacherous devils.
quotes.author: Christopher Titus

quotes.quote: Abortion is a right I feel must not go away, and I feel like people aren't mobilizing so much because it's so complicated and it's difficult to understand.
quotes.author: Cynthia Nixon

quotes.quote: I do not believe in abortion at will. I do not believe that if a woman just wants to have an abortion she should... I do believe if you have an abortion you are committing murder.
quotes.author: Nancy Reagan

quotes.quote: I believe every abortion is a tragedy.
quotes.author: Diane Abbott

quotes.quote: If they are opposed to abortion, they should be for preventing unintended pregnancies.
quotes.author: Louise Slaughter

quotes.quote: Abortions will not let you forget. You remember the children you got that you did not get.
quotes.author: Gwendolyn Brooks

quotes.quote: The absent are never without fault. Nor the present without excuse.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The absence of happiness doesn't mean unhappiness.
quotes.author: Praveen Sighal

quotes.quote: Absence makes the heart grow fonder.
quotes.author: Thomas Haynes Bayly

quotes.quote: Absence of proof is not proof of absence.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Absence and death are the same â€“ only that in death there is no suffering.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Absence blots people out. We really have no absent friends.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Absence - that common cure of love.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: But the absence of tears wasn't the same as an absence of feeling.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: The absent are never without fault, nor the present without excuse.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Absence is a house so vast that inside you will pass through its walls and hang pictures on the air.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: The longest absence is less perilous to love than the terrible trials of incessant proximity.
quotes.author: Ouida

quotes.quote: When a man is out of sight, it is not too long before he is out of mind.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: Most of what matters in your life takes place in your absence.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: The absence of alternatives clears the mind marvelously.
quotes.author: Henry A. Kissinger

quotes.quote: Absence from whom we love is worse than death.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Absence diminishes small loves and increases great ones, as the wind blows out the candle and blows up the bonfire.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rouchefoucauld

quotes.quote: Absence is to love what wind is to fire; it extinguishes the small, it enkindles the great.
quotes.author: Roger de Rabutin

quotes.quote: Absence diminishes little passions and increases great ones, as wind extinguishes candles and fans a fire.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: It's so much darker when a light goes out than it would have been if it had never shone.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Absence is to love what wind is to fire; it extinguishes the small, it inflames the great.
quotes.author: Roger de Rabutin de Bussy

quotes.quote: Don't struggle to make your presence noticed. Just make your absence felt.
quotes.author: Tinku Razoria

quotes.quote: The absence of old friends one can endure with equanimity. But even a momentary separation from anyone to whom one has just been introduced is almost unbearable.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There is a time in life when you expect the world to be always full of new things. And then comes a day when you realise that is not how it will be at all. You see that life will become a thing made of holes. Absences. Losses. Things that were there and are no longer. And you realise, too, that you have to grow around and between the gaps, [...]
quotes.author: Helen Macdonald

quotes.quote: In the absence of any other proof, the thumb alone would convince me of God's existence.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: In the absence of willpower the most complete collection of virtues and talents is wholly worthless.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: You can decorate absence however you want- but your still gonna feel what's missing.
quotes.author: Siobhan Vivian

quotes.quote: Absence doth sharpen love, presence strengthens it; the one brings fuel, the other blows it till it burns clear.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Absence and death are the same - only that in death there is no suffering.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A short absence is the safest.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Like a missing tooth, sometimes an absence is more noticeable than a presence.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: If someone doesn't appreciate your presence, make them appreciate your absence.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Greater things are believed of those who are absent.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: Nothing reopens the springs of love so fully as absence, and no absence so thoroughly as that which must needs be endless.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: Absence of evidence is not evidence of absence.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Never find fault with the absent.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: We think we have discovered a grotto that is stored with bewildering treasure; we come to the light of day, and the gems we have brought are false--mere pieces of glass--and yet does the treasure shine on, unceasingly, in the darkness.
quotes.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quotes.quote: Give the gift of your absence to those who don't appreciate your presence.
quotes.author: Richard Shivers

quotes.quote: If your absence doesn't affect them, your presence never mattered.
quotes.author: Chele Iam

quotes.quote: One of the best feelings in the world is knowing your presence and absence both mean something to someone.
quotes.author: Marc Chernoff

quotes.quote: The strongest presence is so often an absence. Life here underscores this point almost daily.
quotes.author: Steve Rasnic Tem

quotes.quote: The absence of words is the absence of intimacy. There are experiences that are starved for language.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: When your absence is felt, your presence is the essence and it makes a difference.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Absence and death are the same - only that in death there is no suffering.
quotes.author: Walter S Landor

quotes.quote: The truth is that every sheet of blank paper by its very emptiness affirms that nothing is as beautiful as what does not exist.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: Sometimes the experience of emptiness is linked no to negative negative things about the person but to the absence of positive things.
quotes.author: Peter Cooper

quotes.quote: A day away from some people is like a month in the country.
quotes.author: Howard Dietz

quotes.quote: This is neither nor there nor elsewhere.
quotes.author: Damon Runyon

quotes.quote: Absence makes the hear grow fonder, but presents brings better results.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: When a man doesn't go straight home, his wife's remarks do.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Habits are hard to change; many a man whose wife is away hates to go home just the same.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: To some people freedom of religion merely means a choice of churches to stay away from.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: There are some people who are always in the conversation when they are not there.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The word young refers not just to age but also to the absence of awareness.
quotes.author: Malidone Some

quotes.quote: The beginning of love is a horror of emptiness.
quotes.author: Robert Bly

quotes.quote: Illusion is needed to disguise the emptiness within.
quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

quotes.quote: Our greatest pretenses are built up not to hide evil and the ugly in us, but our emptiness.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Bravery has never been about the absence of fear, it is going forward and facing your fear even though you are scared half to death and every fiber of your being is screaming at you to run away and hide.
quotes.author: Joe Nickaloff

quotes.quote: The absence of bad news has replaced it and we have all lowered our standards to accept no bad news as the new good news.
quotes.author: Joe Nickaloff

quotes.quote: There would be fewer absent fathers, if straight men were turned on only by women with whom they would not mind having children.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Fathers, your are the head and strength of the family unit. If you are not in place, there is a weakness in the link.
quotes.author: Anita R. Sneed-Carter

quotes.quote: To be in your children’s memories tomorrow, you have to be in their lives today.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: The absent are never without fault, nor the present without excuse.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: More than 72 percent of children in the African-American community are born out of wedlock. That means absent fathers.
quotes.author: Don Lemon

quotes.quote: A great attitude does much more than turn on the lights in our worlds, it seems to magically connect us to all sorts of serendipitous opportunities that were somehow absent before the change.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: The heart may think it knows better, the senses know that absence blots people out. We really have no absent friends.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: Boys want to grow up to be like their male role models. And boys who grow up in homes with absent fathers search the hardest to figure out what it means to be male.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Canada

quotes.quote: Fathers have a unique and irreplaceable role in the lives of children.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: We know that children who grow up with absent fathers can suffer lasting damage. They are more likely to end up in poverty or drop out of school, become addicted to drugs, have a child out of wedlock, or end up in prison. Fatherlessness is not the only cause of these things, but our nation must recognize it is an important factor.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: A committee should consist of three men, two of whom are absent.
quotes.author: Herbert Beerbohm

quotes.quote: My father being mostly absent on duty, my mother suffered me to do as much as I pleased.
quotes.author: John James Audubon

quotes.quote: I come from the school of thought where a dad’s absence is something to be counted on. Now I see all the men with camouflage diaper bags and babies hanging from their chests like little ship figureheads.
quotes.author: Kaui Hart Hemmings

quotes.quote: It is much easier to become a father than to be one.
quotes.author: Kent Nerburn

quotes.quote: A bad father has never a good son.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: He didn't want to be an absentee father. He didn't want to be like his own father, who thought being a provider was his only obligation to his family.
quotes.author: Maya Banks

quotes.quote: Frequently, I go to conferences and listen to speakers decry the absent father as somehow a new phenomenon. Though their recriminations against absent or emotionally distant fathers are generally meant to help society, at the same time they are built on a lie that evolution disproves generation after generation. Fathers have often gone to war, or the long hunt on the Savannah, or to work in another village or city. But only in the last decade or so have manhood and fathering been trashed completely.
quotes.author: Michael Gurian

quotes.quote: Fathers should be neither seen nor heard. That is the only proper basis for family life.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: When a father, absent during the day, returns home at six, his children receive only his temperament, not his teaching.
quotes.author: Robert Bly

quotes.quote: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father’s protection.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: A higher rate of urgency does not imply ever present panic, anxiety, or fear. It means a state in which complacency is virtually absent.
quotes.author: Silvio De Bono

quotes.quote: Anyone can be a father but it takes someone special to be a dad.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: As old as she was. She still missed her daddy sometimes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: His eyes on all those company, he is tender toward the bashful, gentle toward the distant, and merciful toward the absent.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The psychological absence of fathers can be nearly as devastating as physical absence. When fathers are alive but not a predictable presence actively participating in their daughter's lives the relationship becomes a permanent maybe.
quotes.author: Victoria Secunda

quotes.quote: A father may turn his back on his child, but a mother’s love endures through all.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: It is a wise father that knows his own child.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Daddy's in the army, there's a war in Vietnam / Mama kept us going with her sewing and a prayer / It's hard to be a family when your daddy's missing.
quotes.author: Crowell Church

quotes.quote: One can no longer distinguish between history and reality after the absinthe goes in the punch.
quotes.author: Beatriz Williams

quotes.quote: For me, my glory is but a humble ephemeral absinthe drunk on the sly, with fear of treason and if I drink no longer, it is for good reason!
quotes.author: Paul Verlaine

quotes.quote: After the first glass you see things as you wish they were. After the second, you see things as they are not. Finally you see things as they really are, and that is the most horrible thing in the world.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A glass of absinthe is as poetical as anything in the world. What difference is there between a glass of absinthe and a sunset?
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Anti-alcoholics are unfortunates in the grip of water, that terrible poison, so corrosive that out of all substances it has been chosen for washing and scouring, and a drop of water added to a clear liquid like Absinthe, muddles it.
quotes.author: Alfred Jarry

quotes.quote: What a writer's message is is totally unimportant. Either he is agreeing with life by affirming, or he is saying life is just a bowl of wormwood.
quotes.author: Stanley Elkin

quotes.quote: Absinthe is the aphrodisiac of the self. The green fairy who lives in the absinthe wants your soul. But you are safe with me.
quotes.author: Dracula

quotes.quote: What is it in absinthe that makes it a separate cult? The effects of its abuse are totally distinct from those of other stimulants. Even in ruin and in degradation it remains a thing apart: its victims wear a ghastly aureole all their own, and in their peculiar hell yet gloat with a sinister perversion of pride that they are not as other men.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: The most powerful ingredient in pastis is not aniseed or alcohol but ambiance, and that dictates how and where it should be drunk. I cannot imagine drinking it in a hurry.
quotes.author: Peter Mayle

quotes.quote: Absinthe makes the heart grow fonder.
quotes.author: Ethel Mumford

quotes.quote: Absinthe is the only decent drink that suits an artist.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: Love is just a synonym for absinthe. Absinthe is a synonym for 'i don't know what i'm doing anymore.
quotes.author: Salma Deera

quotes.quote: None of which equals the poison welling up in your eyes that show me my poor soul reversed, my dreams throng to drink at those green distorting pools.
quotes.author: Rimbaud

quotes.quote: If absinthe isn't banned, our country will rapidly become an immense padded cell where half the Frenchmen will be occupied putting straightjackets on the other half.
quotes.author: Georges Ohnet

quotes.quote: Good stuff, absinthe. Not the first mouthful, perhaps. But after that. Good stuff.
quotes.author: Aphonse Allais

quotes.quote: People are rediscovering their chronic craving for ritual and magic in life. Absinthe has it all.
quotes.author: Paul Nathan

quotes.quote: I understand that absinthe makes the tart grow fonder.
quotes.author: Ernest Dowson

quotes.quote: Let me be mad... mad with madness of absinthe, the wildest most luxurious madness in the world.
quotes.author: Marie Corelli

quotes.quote: Absinthe, on a winter evening/Lights up in green the sooty soul.
quotes.author: Charles Cros

quotes.quote: It is as if the first diviner of absinthe had been indeed a magician intent upon a combination of sacred drugs which should cleanse, fortify and perfume the human soul.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: Complete abstinence is easier than perfect moderation.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Abstinence is many times very helpful to the end of religion.
quotes.author: John Tillotson

quotes.quote: The only way for a rich man to be healthy is, by exercise and abstinence, to live as if he was poor.
quotes.author: William Temple

quotes.quote: Abstinence is the worst form of perversion.
quotes.author: Guy De Maupassant

quotes.quote: Plato feels that ethical abstinences and austerities are essential preconditions for the cleansing and opening of the eye of the soul.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: To set the mind above the appetites is the end of abstinence, which if not a virtue, is the groundwork of a virtue.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Total abstinence is so excellent a thing that it cannot be carried to too great an extent. In my passion for it I even carry it so far as to totally abstain from total abstinence itself.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A virtuous abstinence from the joys of pederasty comes most easily to those who have no taste for it.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Abstinence sows sand all over The ruddy limbs and flaming hair, But desire gratified Plants fruits of life and beauty there.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Abstinence is the great strengthener and clearer of reason.
quotes.author: Robert South

quotes.quote: Abstinence and fasting cure many a complaint.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: It is not abstinence from pleasures that is best, but mastery over them without being worsted.
quotes.author: Aristippus

quotes.quote: Abstinence is the surety of temperance
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Abstaining so as really to enjoy, is the epicurism, the very perfection, of reason.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: the reward for total abstinence from alcohol seems, illogically enough, to be the capacity for becoming intoxicated without it.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: Abstinence from sins is better than seeking help afterwards.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: Temperance is moderation in the things that are good and total abstinence from the things that are foul.
quotes.author: Frances E. Willard

quotes.quote: While one may lose much because of avarice, nothing was ever accomplished by abstinence.
quotes.author: Isuna Hasekura

quotes.quote: Abstinence is easier than temperance.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Abstinence makes the heart grow fonder for someone else.
quotes.author: Dennis Wolfberg

quotes.quote: My experience through life has convinced me that, while moderation and temperance in all things are commendable and beneficial, abstinence from spirituous liquors is the best safeguard of morals and health.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: Against diseases here the strongest fence is the defensive vertue, Abstinence.
quotes.author: Robert Herrick

quotes.quote: No doubt solitude is wholesome, but so is abstinence after a surfeit. The true life of man is in society.
quotes.author: William Gilmore Simms

quotes.quote: Abstinence from all injustice to other first-rate powers is a greater tower of strength than anything that can be gained by the sacrifice of permanent tranquillity for an apparent temporary advantage.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.quote: Abstaining is favorable both to the head and the pocket.
quotes.author: Horace Greeley

quotes.quote: Abstinence is whereby a man refraineth from any thyng which he may lawfully take.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Elyot

quotes.quote: Abstinence is as easy to me as temperance would be difficult.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: On Alcohol: Total abstinence is an impossibility and it will not do to insist on it as a general practice.
quotes.author: Queen Victoria

quotes.quote: Recommending or insisting on abstinence has been completely ineffective.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: Abstinence is a window of clarity through which one can better find one's work and one's mate.
quotes.author: Lance Morrow

quotes.quote: Love is the only thing that changes abstinence from a prison into pleasure.
quotes.author: Jihad Eltabey

quotes.quote: Abstinence is approved of God.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.quote: Lean abstinence, pale grief, and haggard care, The dire attendants of forlorn despair.
quotes.author: Mark Pattison

quotes.quote: Use, do not abuse; neither abstinence nor excess ever renders man happy.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Abstinence until marriage is the best thing for young people physically, emotionally, psychologically and spiritually. It's the best thing for society as a whole, and it's the message that schools absolutely ought to be sending.
quotes.author: Kathy Martin

quotes.quote: The abstract, unreal freedom of the liberal intellect was really nothing more than childish disobedience, amplified into anarchy.
quotes.author: Roger Scruton

quotes.quote: Just as pure abstract art is not dogmatic, neither is it decorative.
quotes.author: Piet Mondrian

quotes.quote: Writing is an abstract art of drawing pictures of the conscious and subconscious mind with words.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Abstract ideas are the patterns two or more memories have in common.
quotes.author: Rudolf Flesch

quotes.quote: All abstract sciences are nothing but the study of relations between signs.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: Abstract knowledge is always useful, sooner or later.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: It abstract art should be enjoyed just as music is enjoyed after a while you may like it or you may not.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: Abstract truth has no value unless it incarnates in human beings who represent it, by proving their readiness to die for it.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: None of the abstract concepts comes closer to fulfilled utopia than that of eternal peace.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: Even abstract shapes must have a likeness.
quotes.author: Willem de Kooning

quotes.quote: Abstract pictures are fictive models, because they make visible a reality that we can neither see nor describe, but whose existence we can postulate.
quotes.author: Gerhard Richter

quotes.quote: The abstract has no emotional content the abstract is more powerful the more abstract it is
quotes.author: Cecil Balmond

quotes.quote: The longer you look at an object, the more abstract it becomes, and, ironically, the more real.
quotes.author: Lucian Freud

quotes.quote: Abstract literally means to draw from or separate. In this sense every artist is abstract a realistic or nonobjective approach makes no difference. The result is what counts.
quotes.author: Richard Diebenkorn

quotes.quote: Abstract art is uniquely modern. It is a fundamentally romantic response to modern life - rebellious, individualistic, unconventional, sensitive, irritable.
quotes.author: Robert Motherwell

quotes.quote: There is no abstract art. You must always start with something. Afterward you can remove all traces of reality.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: In conceptual art the idea or concept is the most important aspect of the work.
quotes.author: Sol Lewitt

quotes.quote: All paintings are abstract ideas, not representations of a true reality.
quotes.author: Mike Svob

quotes.quote: Abstract words are ancient coins whose concrete images in the give and take of talk have worn away with use.
quotes.author: Julian Jaynes

quotes.quote: It takes abstract thinking to see how greed can lead to prosperity, but it takes wishful thinking to claim that violence can lead to charity.
quotes.author: Jakub Bozydar Wisniewski

quotes.quote: You can't look at abstract art without thinking.
quotes.author: Patricia Cole

quotes.quote: Abstract art has helped us to experience the emotional power inherent in pure form.
quotes.author: Anton Ehrenzweig

quotes.quote: The abstract way we think is really grounded in the concrete, bodily world much more than we thought.
quotes.author: John Bargh

quotes.quote: In the abstract conception of universal wrong, all concrete responsibility vanishes.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: The only object of theoretical physics is to calculate results that can be compared with experiment... it is quite unnecessary that any satisfactory description of the whole course of the phenomena should be given.
quotes.author: Paul Dirac

quotes.quote: Color is for me the purest form of expression, the purest abstract reality.
quotes.author: Jim Hodges

quotes.quote: An abstract title suggests another value to the subject, perhaps an artistic quality that sets the viewers' sensitivities into action.
quotes.author: Robert Genn

quotes.quote: To abstract is to draw out the essence of a matter. To abstract in art is to separate certain fundamentals from irrelevant material which surrounds them.
quotes.author: Ben Shahn

quotes.quote: The inconceivable idea of the sun. / You must become an ignorant man again / And see the sun again with an ignorant eye / And see it clearly in the idea of it.
quotes.author: Vachel Lindsay

quotes.quote: I believe that nothing can be more abstract, more unreal than we actually see.
quotes.author: Giorgio Morandi

quotes.quote: The nature of what we call democracy is sadly no longer an abstract discussion beloved of political science professors.
quotes.author: Richard Wolfe

quotes.quote: Objective painting is not a good painting unless it is good in the abstract sense.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.quote: What a funny thing painting is. The abstract painters always insist on their connection with the visible reality, while the so-called figurative artists insist that what they really care about is the abstract qualities of life.
quotes.author: Marlene Dumas

quotes.quote: I've been doing a lot of abstract painting lately, extremely abstract. No brush, no paint, no canvas, I just think about it.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: To bring my own prejudice into the open, abstract expressionism is a genre I have always distrusted, mainly because so much of it seems to me to express violent reactionary anarchism, a repudiating not so much of the traditions as of the community of painting.
quotes.author: Northyrop Frye

quotes.quote: The difference between non-objective and abstract painting may be suggested by the difference between mathematics and music.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Abstract liberty, like other mere abstractions, is not to be found.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: A product of the untalented, sold by the unprincipled to the utterly bewildered.
quotes.author: Al Capp

quotes.quote: The more horrifying this world becomes, the more art becomes abstract.
quotes.author: Paul Klee

quotes.quote: I think the greatest feature of a lot of the images is that they're not completely explainable and that they can have different meanings for different people.
quotes.author: Keith Haring

quotes.quote: The kind of images I'm drawing has changed a lot. I've become much more conscious of who's seeing them and thinking about them: realizing that the drawings are a great vehicle for getting ideas across, not just abstract ideas, but actual ideas or philosophies.
quotes.author: Keith Haring

quotes.quote: I'd gone from the abstract drawings to the word pieces, but I decided that I was going to draw again. But if I was going to draw again, I couldn't go back to the abstract drawings; they had to have some connection to the real world.
quotes.author: Keith Haring

quotes.quote: I have found another kind of enjoyment through illness that is more important and unmeasurable. I have found that I am closer to abstract things in my sickness than in health.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Black and white are abstract; color is not. Looking at a black and white photograph, you are already looking at a strange world.
quotes.author: Joel Sternfeld

quotes.quote: I am searching for abstract ways of expressing reality, abstract forms that will enlighten my own mystery.
quotes.author: Eric Cantona

quotes.quote: It is often my nature to be abstract, hidden in plain sight, or nowhere at all.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: One of the things I like about music is its abstract art, totally abstract, where you can convey an emotion, which I find amazing.
quotes.author: Bernard Sumner

quotes.quote: How many people make themselves abstract to appear profound. The most useful part of abstract terms is the shadows they create to hide a vacuum.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: We are all hungry and thirsty for concrete images. Abstract art will have been good for one thing: to restore its exact virginity to figurative art.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: I hardly need to abstract things, for each object is unreal enough already, so unreal that I can only make it real by means of painting.
quotes.author: Max Beckmann

quotes.quote: Life is abstract art, and it’s up to you to make sense of it.
quotes.author: Talismanist Giebra

quotes.quote: The form itself, even if completely abstract ... has its own inner sound.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: Abstraction allows man to see with his mind what he cannot see physically with his eyes.
quotes.author: Arshile Gorky

quotes.quote: Abstract art is not the creation of another reality but the true vision of reality.
quotes.author: Piet Mondrian

quotes.quote: Abstraction generally involves implication, suggestion, and mystery, rather than obvious description.
quotes.author: Robert Genn

quotes.quote: Abstract painting is abstract. It confronts you.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: Abstract art is a creative interplay between the conscious and the unconscious, with the conscious mind making all the final decisions and in control throughout.
quotes.author: Lawren Harris

quotes.quote: I understand abstract art as an attempt to feed the imagination with a world built through the basic sensations of the eyes.
quotes.author: Jean Helion

quotes.quote: The most absurd and reckless aspirations have sometimes led to extraordinary success.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: It is as absurd to argue men, as to torture them, into believing.
quotes.author: John Henry Newman

quotes.quote: It is as absurd to say that a man can't love one woman all the time as it is to say that a violinist needs several violins to play the same piece of music.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Most of the basic truths of life sound absurd at first hearing.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Goudge

quotes.quote: The fact that an opinion has been widely held is no evidence whatever that it is not utterly absurd.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: In order to attain the impossible, one must attempt the absurd.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Secretly we're all a little more absurd than we make ourselves out to be.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Those who can make you believe absurdities can make you commit atrocities.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: It is absurd to divide people into good and bad. People are either charming or tedious.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The absurd depends as much on man as on the world. For the moment, it is all that links them together.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Maturity is often more absurd than youth and very frequently is most unjust to youth.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Only man can be absurd: for only man can be dignified.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: It is absurd to say that the age of miracles is past. It has not yet begun.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: How absurd human beings are and how magnificent.
quotes.author: Benjamin Zander

quotes.quote: The world in which we were called to exist was an absurd world, and there was no other in which we could take refuge.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The absurd is a shadow cast over everything we do and even if we try to live life as if it has meaning as if there are reasons for doing things the absurd will linger in the back of our minds as a nagging doubt that perhaps there is no point.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Life is tragic and absurd, and none of it has any purpose at all.
quotes.author: T. C. Boyle

quotes.quote: It is absurd to look for perfection.
quotes.author: Camille Pissarro

quotes.quote: The idea that motherhood is inherently somehow a threat to creativity is just absurd.
quotes.author: Zadie Smith

quotes.quote: It is human nature to think wisely and act in an absurd fashion.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: There is nothing so absurd that it cannot be believed as truth if repeated often enough.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Doubt is not a pleasant condition, but certainty is absurd.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The origin of the absurd idea of immortal life is easy to discover; it is kept alive by hope and fear, by childish faith, and by cowardice.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: The logic of the heart is absurd.
quotes.author: Jeanne Julie Eleonore de Lespinasse

quotes.quote: The realization that life is absurd cannot be an end, but only a beginning.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: There's nothing so absurd that if you repeat it often enough, people will believe it.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: The abundance of life is unlimited, it expands with the generosity, compassion, inventiveness, and service that you contribute.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Abundance is an expansion of energy. Abundance is a form of gratitude, a generosity, a modesty, a bow toward others what we can give, what we can share, rather than what we can take.
quotes.author: Terry Tempest Williams

quotes.quote: Abundance is rooted in community, not individualism. Abundance is what is before our eyes, but we cannot see when we are blinded by greed.
quotes.author: Terry Tempest Williams

quotes.quote: Abundance is, in large part, an attitude.
quotes.author: Sue Thoele

quotes.quote: Abundance is not something we acquire, it is something we tune into.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: A secret of abundance is to stop focussing on what you do not have and shift your consciousness to an appreciation for all that you do have No limit people are so in charge that theycan trust their instincts, be childlike, be creative and do anything that makes sense to them.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Abundance flows into my life in surprising and miraculous ways every day.
quotes.author: Cheryl Richardson

quotes.quote: Abundance is not a number or acquisition. It is the simple recognition of enoughness.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Abundance is a state of mind, more than a reflection of wealth.
quotes.author: Judith Orloff

quotes.quote: Choose joyful abundance in your heart and be unbounded, free, and relaxed. Be relentless with your choice and you'll make your mark.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: The abundance of our lives is not determined by how long we live, but how well we live. Christ makes abundant life possible if we choose to live it now.
quotes.author: Barbara Brown Taylor

quotes.quote: The abundant life does not come to those who have had a lot of obstacles removed from their path by others. It develops from within and is rooted in strong mental and moral fiber.
quotes.author: William Mather Lewis

quotes.quote: Abundance is in crucial ways a state of mind.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: Abundance is not defined by possessions, but it is defined by inner perceptions.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Abundance is a dance with reciprocity, what we can give, what we can share, and what we receive in the process.
quotes.author: Terry Tempest Williams

quotes.quote: Abundance comes from within it comes from thought, intention, attention and expectation.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Abundance consists not only in material possession, but in an un-covetous spirit.
quotes.author: John Selden

quotes.quote: Abundance is about looking at life and knowing that you have everything you need for complete happiness, and then being able to celebrate each and every moment on earth.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Abundance is a process of letting go; that which is empty can receive.
quotes.author: Bryant H McGill

quotes.quote: Abundance comes in many forms, do not limit your abundance by trying to control how it will flow, just know that it will come.
quotes.author: Shelly Sullivan

quotes.quote: Abundance is not the absence of scarcity; it is the presence of abundant mentality.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: The key to abundance is to stop needing more, and to start appreciating what you already have.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Abundance flourishes in a grateful heart; gratutude is the secret of love.
quotes.author: Harold Klemp

quotes.quote: Abundance is a blessing to the wise; the use of riches in discretion lies; learn this, ye men of wealth a heavy purse in a fool's pocket is a heavy curse.
quotes.author: Richard Cumberland

quotes.quote: The abundance you desire to experience must first be an experience in your mind.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: There is an abundance of power to be found in simplicity.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Abundance in life is achieved only when we tear down walls and fill our lives with light.
quotes.author: Seth Adam Smith

quotes.quote: True abundance isn't based on our net worth, it's based on our self-worth.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Bernstein

quotes.quote: Abundance is knowing that everything you need has already been supplied.
quotes.author: Shantidasa

quotes.quote: Abundance is the ability to do what you need to do, when you need to do it.
quotes.author: Darryl Anka

quotes.quote: Abundance means different things to different people. Our attitude towards abundance often times determines its meaning. For some people, they can have abundance with few material possessions. For others, however, abundance means material things and riches.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Abundance is the quality of life you live and quality of life you give to others.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Abundance is grasped by infusing our souls with the intoxicatingly liberating fact that life is a privilege, not a right.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Abundance comes from giving not from receiving.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: An abundance mentality springs from internal security, not from external rankings, comparisons, opinions, possessions, or associations.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Abundance can be had simply by consciously receiving what already has been given.
quotes.author: Sufi Saying

quotes.quote: Abundance doesn't follow giving until giving becomes its own reward.
quotes.author: Jan Denise

quotes.quote: In the abundance of water, the fool is thirsty.
quotes.author: Jamaican Saying

quotes.quote: Abundance, like want, ruins many.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Three keys to more abundant living: caring about others, daring for others, sharing with others.
quotes.author: William A. Ward

quotes.quote: An abundance mentality springs from internal security, not from external rankings, comparisons, opinions, possessions, or associations.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Abundance means a sense of fullness, which cannot be measured by the yardstick of the material goods we possess or the amount of money in a bank account. Abundance in that sense of fullness has a power that takes us away from worry.
quotes.author: Malidoma Somé

quotes.quote: True abundance is a consciousness of wholeness, oneness, and quality, not of separateness, multiplicity, and quantity.
quotes.author: David Spangler

quotes.quote: Riches are not from an abundance of worldly goods but from a contented mind.
quotes.author: Muhammad

quotes.quote: Anything over and above your basic needs is sheer abundance, which is always close at hand. Abundance breeds gratitude, which in turn feeds abundance. It's a win-win situation all around.
quotes.author: Mina Parker

quotes.quote: The abundance of our lives is not determined by how long we live, but by how well we live.
quotes.author: Barbara Brown

quotes.quote: Do not expect to find abundance and a higher level of truth by following the poor mindset of the majority. You will always find it in words like a bestseller, famous, or most popular. The poor love the ideas and concepts that keep them poor.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: Wealth is conscience about truth in abundance.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: When you are grateful, fear disappears and abundance appears.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: If there is abundance in your heart, then abundance will be created in the place you are.
quotes.author: 2 Corinthians 8:14

quotes.quote: Abundance in the world becomes great with good faith.
quotes.author: Morocco

quotes.quote: Abundance without moderation leads to over-indulgence and decay. Power without humility breeds arrogance and tyranny.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Acknowledging the good that you already have in your life is the foundation for all abundance.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: If you approach the ocean with a cup, you can only take away a cupful; if you approach it with a bucket, you can take away a bucketful.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: Giving is the secret of abundance.
quotes.author: Sivananda

quotes.quote: Everything you're currently against blocks you from abundance.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Life in abundance comes only through great love.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The test of our progress is not whether we add more to the abundance of those who have much it is whether we provide enough for those who have little.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Gratitude builds a bridge to abundance.
quotes.author: Roy Bennett

quotes.quote: Not what we have But what we enjoy, constitutes our abundance.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: The key to abundance is meeting limited circumstances with unlimited thoughts.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Many a man curses the rain that falls upon his head and knows not that it brings abundance to drive away from the hunger.
quotes.author: Saint Basil

quotes.quote: The river route is certainly preferable, as it affords good grazing and an abundance of water.
quotes.author: William Whipple

quotes.quote: To live a pure unselfish life, one must count nothing as one's own in the midst of abundance.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: No Persian meal is complete without an abundance of herbs.
quotes.author: Samin Nosrat

quotes.quote: I don't need fame and I don't need power and I don't need wealth. I'm in need of friends, which I have found in abundance.
quotes.author: Utah Phillips

quotes.quote: Youth is a quality not unlike health: it's found in greater abundance among the young, but we all need access to it.
quotes.author: Nick Hornby

quotes.quote: Abuse changes your life...Fight Back and change the life of your abusers by Breaking Your Silence on Abuse!
quotes.author: Patty Rase Hopson

quotes.quote: Nobody abuses us more than we abuse ourselves.
quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.quote: Use, do not abuse; neither abstinence nor excess ever renders man happy.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Abuse is the weapon of the vulgar.
quotes.author: Samuel Griswold Goodrich

quotes.quote: Whipping and abuse are like laudanum; you have to double the dose as the sensibilities decline.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Child abuse casts a shadow the length of a lifetime.
quotes.author: Herbert Ward

quotes.quote: Every abuse ought to be reformed, unless the reform is more dangerous than the abuse itself.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: We should meet abuse by forbearance. Human nature is so constituted that if we take absolutely no notice of anger or abuse, the person indulging in it will soon weary of it and stop.
quotes.author: Mohandas Gandhi

quotes.quote: Verbal abuse is still abuse. It's abuse in the form of words. Don't assume that a few hurtful words won't cost them their life. Words hurt.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Abuse if you slight it, will gradually die away; but if you show yourself irritated, you will be thought to have deserved it.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: Abuse a man unjustly, and you will make friends for him.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: The abuse of greatness is when it disjoins remorse from power.
quotes.author: Mary Bertone

quotes.quote: So many people suffer from abuse, and suffer alone.
quotes.author: Pamela Stephenson

quotes.quote: Abuse is abuse; Be nice.. Harsh words don't break bones but they often break hearts.
quotes.author: Rev Run

quotes.quote: To those who abuse: the sin is yours, the crime is yours, and the shame is yours. To those who protect the perpetrators: blaming the victims only masks the evil within, making you as guilty as those who abuse. Stand up for the innocent or go down with the rest.
quotes.author: Flora Jessop

quotes.quote: Overcoming abuse doesn't just happen, It takes positive steps everyday. Let today be the day you start to move forward.
quotes.author: Assunta Harris

quotes.quote: The biggest abuses in society happen when people are not able to communicate and not able to connect.
quotes.author: Heather Brooke

quotes.quote: Any abuse of animals is the same as abuse of men, women, or children.
quotes.author: Alison Goldfrapp

quotes.quote: The greater the power, the more dangerous the abuse.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Pity those who nature abuses; never those who abuse nature.
quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.quote: Do not suppose that abuses are eliminated by destroying the object which is abused. Men can go wrong with wine and women. Shall we then prohibit and abolish women?
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: When purpose is not known, abuse is inevitable.
quotes.author: Dr. Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: Not all forms of abuse leave bruises.
quotes.author: Danielle Steel

quotes.quote: Men will let you abuse them if only you will make them laugh.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: There is no excuse for human rights abuse, whether in the name of security or in the name of liberation.
quotes.author: Irene Khan

quotes.quote: The abuse of a harmless thing is the essence of sin.
quotes.author: Aw Tozer

quotes.quote: These are the four abuses: desire to succeed in order to make oneself famous; taking credit for the labors of others; refusal to correct one's errors despite advice; refusal to change one's ideas despite warnings.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Never join with your friend when he abuses his horse or his wife, unless the one is about to be sold, and the other to be buried.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Learn to use an axe, and respect it and you can't help but love it. But abuse one and it will wear your hands raw and open your foot like an overcooked sausage.
quotes.author: Richard Proenneke

quotes.quote: Do you never look at yourself when you abuse another person?
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: Self-centeredness is part of being abusive and disrespectful. The opposite is selflessness. Selflessness is a part of being non-abusive and respectful.
quotes.author: Jennie Dibartolomeo

quotes.quote: Many verbally abusive relationships will never cross the physical abuse line, but don't be deceived; the absence of physical abuse does not make a verbally abusive relationship any less destructive or acceptable---verbal or emotional abuse is not okay.
quotes.author: Janice Romney Farnsworth

quotes.quote: In not putting a stop to verbal abuse may enable your relationship to escalate into a physical violence.
quotes.author: Janice Romney Farnsworth

quotes.quote: When one person intimidates, hurts or continually puts down the other person, it's abuse whether it is physical/emotional/mental or verbal.
quotes.author: Janice Romney Farnsworth

quotes.quote: Your victory over verbal abuse is our victory over the cloud of confusion that shadows our planet.
quotes.author: Patricia Evans

quotes.quote: Verbal abuse often seeks to injure the reputation of others using tactics such as backbiting, barbs, or belittling talk, and strategies as slander, slurs, and lies.
quotes.author: Psalm 52:3

quotes.quote: Verbal abuse is the systematic, ongoing use of harmful words or a sharp tone in an attempt to control or dominate another person.
quotes.author: June Hunt

quotes.quote: Ultimately, words move from being positive to being abusive when they hurt our hearts and harm our relationships.
quotes.author: June Hunt

quotes.quote: Abuse wears many faces--faces as varied as the people who give it and receive it. But with all its differences, abuse is always either verbal or nonverbal in delivery, and it always deeply impacts your personal and social life.
quotes.author: June Hunt

quotes.quote: Abuse does not emerge by a certain age, happen in a single socioeconomic group, present in a distinct way, or occur in a single setting.
quotes.author: Sharon Stark

quotes.quote: Abuse should never happen to anyone. All types of abuse are horrific and affect people in all walks of life, regardless of age, educational background, gender, economic status, religion, or nationality.
quotes.author: Sharon Stark

quotes.quote: Abuse can harm people physically and emotionally, as well as leave them feeling isolated and lonely. Abuse does not discriminate. It affects children, adults, and older people.
quotes.author: Sharon Stark

quotes.quote: A more salient form of violence is verbal abuse, which often goes unreported but has lasting and psychologically damaging effects.
quotes.author: Sharon Stark

quotes.quote: Verbal abuse leaves no visible scars; however, the emotional damage to the victim can be devastating.
quotes.author: Sharon Stark

quotes.quote: Verbal abuse assaults the mind and spirit, causing wounds that are extremely difficult to heal.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: Emotional blackmail is one of the most powerful forms if manipulation.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: If I had to choose between physical and verbal abuse, I'd take a beating anytime. You can see the marks, so at least people feel sorry for you. With the verbal stuff, it just make you crazy. The wounds are invisible. Nobody cares. Real bruises heal a lot faster than insults.
quotes.author: Susan Forward
