quotes.quote: Such blatant verbal abuse can sear into a child's self-worth like a cattle brand, leaving deep psychological scars.
quotes.author: Susan Forward

quotes.quote: The impossible expectation that children be perfect is another common trigger of severe verbal attacks.
quotes.author: Susan Forward

quotes.quote: Sometimes verbal abuse can hurt as bad as physical abuse. The real difference between the two for me is that one left psychological scars and the other left physical scars, but again both are painful!
quotes.author: J F Scott

quotes.quote: For those who have never experience verbal abuse could never understand this feeling of anguish.
quotes.author: J F Scott

quotes.quote: The lie of abuse is that it is shameful. But in reality, the only thing shameful is the act of the abuse administered by the the abuser.
quotes.author: Janet Marie Napper

quotes.quote: Abuse that we have suffered stays hidden and keeps us in prison. Tell someone if you have been abused!
quotes.author: Janet Marie Napper

quotes.quote: A second key to understanding emotional abuse is accepting the fact that it is intangible. That is, there are no bruises or visible indications that show someone has been emotionally abused.
quotes.author: David Royse

quotes.quote: What makes emotional abuse so hurtful to the child is that it generally comes from those who ought to love the child.
quotes.author: David Royse

quotes.quote: The impact of verbal abuse is immeasurable. The shock and trauma are often disabling.
quotes.author: Patricia Evans

quotes.quote: Your victory over verbal abuse is our victory over the cloud of confusion that shadows our planet.
quotes.author: Patricia Evans

quotes.quote: Being blamed, defined, and deprived can impact anyone's confidence, expectations, and aspirations.
quotes.author: Patricia Evans

quotes.quote: Verbal abuse is an attempt to control you.
quotes.author: Patricia Evans

quotes.quote: Those targeted by verbal abuse can become confused, adapted to the abuse, and brainwashed while their spirit and sense of self are crowded.
quotes.author: Patricia Evans

quotes.quote: Verbal abuse is damaging to the spirit. It takes the joy and vitality out of life. It distorts reality because the abuser's response does not corelate with the partner's communication.
quotes.author: Ron Clark

quotes.quote: Verbal abuse causes emotional damage because of the victim's sense of rejection of their value as a person. May isolate a person from friendship by destroying the self-esteem needed for these relationships.
quotes.author: Ron Clark

quotes.quote: Verbal abuse is designed to humiliate, control, and cause self-doubt in the partner.
quotes.author: Ron Clark

quotes.quote: Indirect form of verbal and emotional abuse causes the other person to be confused, and lowers self-esteem.
quotes.author: Ron Clark

quotes.quote: Verbal abuse is any verbal attack or ridicule of your mate, usually in an attempt to control or hurt. Constant nagging about something can be verbal abuse.
quotes.author: Carole Wilkinson

quotes.quote: Most compulsive controllers need to be careful of being verbally abusive. Men, as well as women, are guilty of this type of abuse.
quotes.author: Carole Wilkinson

quotes.quote: Verbal abuse is mean and unkind words.
quotes.author: Carole Wilkinson

quotes.quote: Attacking another person's dignity is another form of verbal abuse.
quotes.author: Carole Wilkinson

quotes.quote: Both men and women can be guilty of verbal abuse. Whatever the reason, verbal abuse is wrong and destructive.
quotes.author: Carole Wilkinson

quotes.quote: Verbal abuse can be the most damaging and longest lasting.
quotes.author: Philip G. Ney

quotes.quote: The heart of a mother is a deep abyss at the bottom of which you will always find forgiveness.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: It is by going down into the abyss that we recover the treasures of life. Where you stumble, there lies your treasure.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: We come from a dark abyss, we end in a dark abyss, and we call the luminous interval life.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster. And if you gaze long enough into an abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The human being is flesh and consciousness, body and soul; his heart is an abyss which can only be filled by that which is godly.
quotes.author: Olivier Messiaen

quotes.quote: We know nothing in reality; for truth lies in an abyss.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: The fear is the abyss between failure and success.
quotes.author: Alexander Zalan

quotes.quote: Hypocrisy can plunge the mind of a man into a dark abyss, when he believes his own self-flattery instead of God's verdict.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: There comes a time when the cup of endurance runs over, and men are no longer willing to be plunged into the abyss of despair.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: The only way to escape the abyss is to look at it, gauge it, sound it out and descend into it.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: Faith is a process of leaping into the abyss not on the basis of any certainty about where we shall land, but rather on the belief that we shall land.
quotes.author: Carter Heyward

quotes.quote: The cradle rocks above an abyss, and common sense tells us that our existence is but a brief crack of light between two eternities of darkness.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: The gaps in power, the gaps in wealth, the gaps in ideology which hold the nations apart also make up the abyss into which mankind can fall to annihilation.
quotes.author: Barbara Ward

quotes.quote: One mustn't look at the abyss, because there is at the bottom an inexpressible charm which attracts us.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: We must prepare and study truth under every aspect, endeavoring to ignore nothing, if we do not wish to fall into the abyss of the unknown when the hour shall strike.
quotes.author: H. P. Blavatsky

quotes.quote: If you understand hallucination and illusion, you don't blindly follow any leader. You must know if the person is sane or insane, over the abyss.
quotes.author: Marguerite Young

quotes.quote: Man looks in the abyss, there's nothing staring back at him. At that moment, man finds his character. And that is what keeps him out of the abyss.
quotes.author: Hal Holbrook

quotes.quote: Thoughts are like an open ocean, they can either move you forward within its waves, or sink you under deep into its abyss.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: What can we gain by sailing to the moon if we are not able to cross the abyss that separates us from ourselves? This is the most important of all voyages of discovery, and without it, all the rest are not only useless, but disastrous.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Let me be strong, for to be anything else is to languish in the abyss of compromise and to descend to places of impoverishment so destitute that they will squelch my soul and crush my heart.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: He is free to evade reality, he is free to unfocus his mind and stumble blindly down any road he pleases, but not free to avoid the abyss he refuses to see.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: There are no words to express the abyss between isolation and having one ally. It may be conceded to the mathematician that four is twice two. But two is not twice one; two is two thousand times one.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The process of delving into the black abyss is to me the keenest form of fascination.
quotes.author: H.P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: You need tremendous spirituality to stop yourself falling into the abyss.
quotes.author: Ingrid Betancourt

quotes.quote: To leap across an abyss, one is better served by faith than doubt.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Creation pulls something from an abyss of nothing. Startups take the something and give it to those in the dark, at first, perhaps, for nothing.
quotes.author: Ryan Lilly

quotes.quote: Meditation gives you the wherewithal to pause, observe how easily the mind can exaggerate the severity of a setback, and resist getting drawn into the abyss.
quotes.author: Richard Davidson

quotes.quote: There's a thing you confront when you're going into something new and you come to this sort of abyss, and then you push yourself. It makes you try different things.
quotes.author: Forest Whitaker

quotes.quote: Follow humbly wherever and to whatever abyss Nature leads, or you shall learn nothing.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: I could see that everything I had identified as really me, was not really me, but was just a pattern of strategies to avoid some kind of abyss or emptiness.
quotes.author: Gangaji

quotes.quote: Hope knows no fear. Hope dares to blossom even inside the abysmal abyss. Hope secretly feeds and strengthens promise.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: Even if a minefield or the abyss should lie before me, I will march straight ahead without looking back.
quotes.author: Zhu Rongji

quotes.quote: The academic life is wonderful. That's why people love to do research.
quotes.author: Michael Marmot

quotes.quote: The reason academic disputes are so vicious is that so little is at stake.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: To overcome the academic prose you have first to overcome the academic pose.
quotes.author: C. Wright Mills

quotes.quote: Nothing infuriates an academic more than a talented and successful colleague.
quotes.author: William McKeen

quotes.quote: A literary academic can no more pass a bookstore than an alcoholic can pass a bar.
quotes.author: Carolyn Heilbrun

quotes.quote: In academic life, false ideas are merely false, and useless ones can be fun to play with.
quotes.author: Michael Ignatieff

quotes.quote: Academic staff rather enjoy coming to conclusions, but they don't like coming to decisions at all.
quotes.author: Noel Annan

quotes.quote: My whole academic career was totally out of Jewish anxiety, and issues surrounding achievement and adequacy.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: The academic world was marching toward ever more specialized knowledge, expressed in ever more dense jargon.
quotes.author: Michael Crichton

quotes.quote: Academic and aristocratic people live in such an uncommon atmosphere that common sense can rarely reach them.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: The armoury of having any academic education does not necessarily set you up for being a good or better actor.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.quote: The academic mind reflects infinity, and is full of light by the simple process of being shallow and standing still.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The academic community has in it the biggest concentration of alarmists, cranks and extremists this side of the giggle house.
quotes.author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quotes.quote: If you need to invoke your academic pedigree or job title for people to believe what you say, then you need a better argument.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: All too often, academic departments defend their territory with the passion of cornered animals, though with far less justification.
quotes.author: Bruce Jackson

quotes.quote: No academic ever expects to be taken seriously by more than three other people, because really, we write for three people in our field.
quotes.author: Howard Gardner

quotes.quote: The failure of academic feminists to recognize difference as a crucial strength is a failure to reach beyond the first patriarchal lesson. In our world, divide and conquer must become define and empower.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Some people stay in the academic world just to avoid becoming self-aware. You can quote me on that.
quotes.author: Michael McKean

quotes.quote: Academic education is the act of memorizing things read in books, and things told by college professors who got their education mostly by memorizing things read in books.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Academic disciplines are subject to being overtaken by attacks of "knowingness"- a state of mind and soul that prevents shudders of awe and makes one immune to enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Richard Rorty

quotes.quote: Academic work is one of those fields which contain a pearl so precious that it is worth while to sell all our possessions, keeping nothing for ourselves, in order to be able to acquire it.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Academics love to make theories about a body of work, but each book consumes the writer and is the sum of his or her world.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Academic questions are interlopers in a world where so few of the real ones have been answered.
quotes.author: Henry S. Haskins

quotes.quote: Academics get paid for being clever, not for being right.
quotes.author: Donald Norman

quotes.quote: When academics claim a topic is obsolete, they mean merely they are tired of flogging it with their cliches.
quotes.author: Kenny Smith

quotes.quote: And in most highly academic environments in the United States, no one fails anything.
quotes.author: Paul Tough

quotes.quote: Most academic economists know nothing of economy. In fact, they know little of anything.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: An academic dialect is perfected when its terms are hard to understand and refer only to one another.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: As an academic, what do you have? You have the quality of your work and the integrity with which you do it.
quotes.author: Ezekiel Emanuel

quotes.quote: First fulfill your academic obligations and then you will have the right to call yourself a leader of the left.
quotes.author: Salvador Allende

quotes.quote: In the academic world, most of the work that is done is clerical. A lot of the work done by professors is routine.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: In academic life you seek to state absolute truths; in politics you seek to accommodate truth to the facts around you.
quotes.author: Pierre Trudeau

quotes.quote: Academic failure contributes to poverty and poor health and undermines workforce productivity in ways that harm the entire society.
quotes.author: Anthony Biglan

quotes.quote: Academic training in beauty is a sham. We have been so deceived, but so well deceived that we can scarcely get back even a shadow of the truth.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: It is still an act of academic heresy to regard Egypt as the cradle of civilization and originator of Jewish and Christian religious traditions.
quotes.author: Michael Tsarion

quotes.quote: Academic freedom is being lost by a great many people who dare to challenge Darwinism. That's a terrifying situation. That's contrary to the principles of science.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: The academic mind, as we know, is sometimes capable of assuming an aggressive attitude. The official mind, on the contrary, is and has to be, expert in the art of self-defence.
quotes.author: Ronald Fisher

quotes.quote: Academic achievement was something I'd always sought as a form of reward. Good grades pleased my parents, good grades pleased my teachers; you got them in order to sew up approval.
quotes.author: Caroline Knapp

quotes.quote: Academics tend to have wonderfully infantile senses of humor.
quotes.author: John Lithgow

quotes.quote: Academics act like they are important, but when something is academic it is meaningless. People say, 'It's academic, now let's get work done.
quotes.author: Evan Sayet

quotes.quote: Academic sociologists have been trained to conceive of their discipline - sociology - as the scientific study of society, and to remit to the sister discipline of psychology the study of individuals.
quotes.author: Richard Wall

quotes.quote: Academic Marxists, with their elitist sense of superiority to popular taste, are the biggest snobs in America.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: Academic politics is the most vicious and bitter form of politics, because the stakes are so low.
quotes.author: Wallace S. Sayre

quotes.quote: Academic Marxism is a fantasy world, and unctuous compassion-sweepstakes, into which real workers or peasants never penetrate.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: Academics don't normally manage to alter people's way of thinking through their strength of argument.
quotes.author: David Crystal

quotes.quote: The idea that academics should remain ''above the fray'' only gives ideologues license to misuse our work.
quotes.author: Stephanie Coontz

quotes.quote: Acceptance of what has happened is the first step to overcoming the consequences of any misfortune.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Acceptance doesn't mean resignation; it means understanding that something is what it is and that there's got to be a way through it.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: The art of acceptance is the art of making someone who has just done you a small favor wish that he might have done you a greater one.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Letting go doesn't mean that you don't care about someone anymore. It's just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself.
quotes.author: Deborah Reber

quotes.quote: The more you know who you are, and what you want, the less you let things upset you.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: Some people believe holding on and hanging in there are signs of great strength. However, there are times when it takes much more strength to know when to let go and then do it.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: For after all, the best thing one can do when it is raining, is to let it rain.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Die while alive and be thoroughly dead. Then do what you will, and all will be well.
quotes.author: Philip Kapleau

quotes.quote: I am Dead, but it's not so bad. I've learned to live with it.
quotes.author: Isaac Marion

quotes.quote: Every woman that finally figured out her worth, has picked up her suitcases of pride and boarded a flight to freedom, which landed in the valley of change.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: A man cannot be comfortable without his own approval.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Know that everything is in perfect order whether you understand it or not.
quotes.author: Valery Satterwhite

quotes.quote: Sometimes you just have to regret things and move on.
quotes.author: Charlaine Harris

quotes.quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: Have a big enough heart to love unconditionally, and a broad enough mind to embrace the differences that make each of us unique.
quotes.author: D.B. Harrop

quotes.quote: We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: You're always with yourself, so you might as well enjoy the company.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: It is easier to make our wishes conform to our means than to make our means conform to our wishes.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: Acceptance doesn't mean that life gets better; it just means that my way of living life on life's terms improves.
quotes.author: Sharon E. Rainey

quotes.quote: Laugh at yourself, not with ridicule but with objectivity and acceptance of self.
quotes.author: C. W. Metcalf

quotes.quote: When you stop living your life based on what others think of you real life begins. At that moment, you will finally see the door of self acceptance opened.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Accept - then act. Whatever the present moment contains, accept it as if you had chosen it. Always work with it, not against it.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Live your life, sing your song. Not full of expectations. Not for the ovations. But for the joy of it.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Nobody's going to win all the time. On the highway of life you can't always be in the fast lane.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: The opinion which other people have of you is their problem, not yours.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Not everything that is faced can be changed. But nothing can be changed until it is faced.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: I'm not okay, you're not okay, and that's okay.
quotes.author: William Sloane Coffin

quotes.quote: Acceptance makes an incredible fertile soil for the seeds of change.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: When you find peace within yourself, you become the kind of person who can live at peace with others.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: As you become more clear about who you really are, you'll be better able to decide what is best for you - the first time around.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: But there isn't any second half of myself waiting to plug in and make me whole. It's there. I'm already whole.
quotes.author: Sally Field

quotes.quote: Acceptance is not submission; it is acknowledgement of the facts of a situation. Then deciding what you're going to do about it.
quotes.author: Kathleen Casey Theisen

quotes.quote: The only thing that will make you happy is being happy with who you are, and not who people think you are.
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.quote: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
quotes.author: Joseph Goldstein

quotes.quote: Accept yourself as you are. Otherwise you will never see opportunity. You will not feel free to move toward it; you will feel you are not deserving.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: Accept yourself: flaws, quirks, talents, secret thoughts, all of it, and experience true liberation.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Acceptance is a letting-go process. You let go of your wishes and demands that life can be different. It's a conscious choice.
quotes.author: Gary Emery

quotes.quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.author: Maria Robinson

quotes.quote: If you don't like something change it; if you can't change it, change the way you think about it.
quotes.author: Mary Engelbreit

quotes.quote: We did not change as we grew older; we just became more clearly ourselves.
quotes.author: Lynn Hall

quotes.quote: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Acceptance is observation of life and suspension of judgment about whether what is happening is good or bad, right or wrong.
quotes.author: Ron Smotherman

quotes.quote: Whether it is the best of times or the worst of times, it is only time we have.
quotes.author: Art Buchwald

quotes.quote: One must not attempt to justify them, but rather to sense their nature simply and clearly.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Accept everything about yourself -- I mean everything, You are you and that is the beginning and the end -- no apologies, no regrets.
quotes.author: Clark Moustakas

quotes.quote: Everything begins with accepting oneself. Without self-acceptance, one cannot accomplish anything.
quotes.author: Xuan-Thu Nguyen

quotes.quote: I love my past. I love my present. I'm not ashamed of what I've had, and I'm not sad because I have it no longer.
quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quotes.quote: Accept that some days you're the pigeon, and some days you're the statue.
quotes.author: Roger C. Anderson

quotes.quote: Don't try to understand everything. Because sometimes it's not meant to be understood, but to be accepted.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I always thought that when we accepted things they overpowered us in some way or other. This turns out not to be true at all, and it is only by accepting them that one can assume an attitude toward them.
quotes.author: Richard Wilhelm and C.G. Jung

quotes.quote: Acceptance means that the people with whom I live give me a feeling of self-respect, a feeling that I am worthwhile.
quotes.author: Peter G. van Breemen

quotes.quote: They are happy that I am who I am. Acceptance means that I am welcome to be myself. Acceptance means that though there is need for growth, I am not forced. I do not have to be the person I am not.
quotes.author: Peter G. van Breemen

quotes.quote: When a person is appreciated for what he does, he is not unique; someone else can do the same work perhaps better than the other. But when a person is loved for what he is, then he becomes a unique and irreplaceable personality.
quotes.author: Peter G. van Breemen

quotes.quote: He who is in a state of rebellion cannot receive grace, to use the phrase of which the Church is so fond — so rightly fond, I dare say — for in life as in art the mood of rebellion closes up the channels of the soul, and shouts out the airs of heaven.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: You often try to run away from your life, but you're wasting your time. If you sincerely believe that your life is worthwhile and necessary, then you will have accepted it.
quotes.author: Michel Quoist

quotes.quote: Truly loving another means letting go of all expectations. It means full acceptance, even celebration, of another's personhood.
quotes.author: Karen Casey

quotes.quote: The art of acceptance is the art of making someone who has just done you a small favor wish that he might have done you a greater one.
quotes.author: Russell Lynes

quotes.quote: Happiness can exist only in acceptance.
quotes.author: Denis de Rougamont

quotes.quote: Open yourself to the Tao, then trust your natural responses; and everything will fall into place.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: What it is forbidden to be put right becomes lighter by acceptance.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: The fates lead him who will — him who won't, they drag.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Adapt yourself to the life you have been given, and truly love the people with whom destiny has surrounded you.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Accept whatever comes to you woven in the pattern of your destiny, for what could more aptly fit your needs?
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Things without remedy should be without regard; what is done is done.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Since we cannot get what we like, let us like what we can get.
quotes.author: Spanish Saying

quotes.quote: What cannot be altered must be borne, not blamed.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: We win half the battle when we make up our minds to take the world as we find it, including the thorns.
quotes.author: Orison S. Marden

quotes.quote: Life is not always what one wants it to be, but to make the best of it, as it is, is the only way of being happy.
quotes.author: Jennie Jerome Churchill

quotes.quote: Rowing against the tide is hard and uncertain. To go with the tide and thus take advantage of the workings of the great natural force is safe and easy.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Trine

quotes.quote: We cannot change anything unless we accept it. Condemnation does not liberate, it oppresses.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: My advice to you is not to enquire why or whither, but just enjoy your ice cream while it's on your plate.
quotes.author: Wilder

quotes.quote: Don't try to force anything. Let life be a deep let-go. See God opening millions of flowers every day without forcing the buds.
quotes.author: Osho Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Life works when you choose what you've got.
quotes.author: Werner Erhard

quotes.quote: Acceptance is not submission; it is an acknowledgment of the facts of a situation. Then deciding what you're going to do about it.
quotes.author: M. Kathleen Casey

quotes.quote: Accept what comes to you totally and completely so that you can appreciate it, learn from it, and then let it go.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: We walk through so many myths of each other and ourselves; we are so thankful when someone sees us for who we are and accepts us.
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.quote: The secret to success is to learn to accept the impossible, to do without the indispensable, and to bear the intolerable.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: He who submits to fate without complaint is wise.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Against necessity, against its strength, no one can fight and win.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: When in doubt, choose change.
quotes.author: Lily Leung

quotes.quote: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: You're always you, and that don't change, and you're always changing, and there's nothing you can do about it.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Taking a new step, uttering a new word, is what people fear most.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: Things don't go on forever, and the quicker you accept that change is inevitable, the happier you're gonna be.
quotes.author: Trey Anastasio

quotes.quote: We cannot change anything until we accept it. Condemnation does not liberate, it oppresses.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Change the changeable, accept the unchangeable, and remove yourself from the unacceptable.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: I was willing to accept what I couldn't change.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: We keep moving forward, opening new doors, and doing new things, because we're curious and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Conrad Hall

quotes.quote: Looking back isn't going to help you. Moving forward is the thing you have to do.
quotes.author: McKayla Maroney

quotes.quote: I think that the power is the principle. The principle of moving forward, as though you have the confidence to move forward, eventually gives you confidence when you look back and see what you've done.
quotes.author: Robert Downey, Jr.

quotes.quote: Look at what you want to change, gather a few people who believe in it like you do, and start moving forward. It's important to remember that you don't always need a destination. Sometimes, you just have to make forward motion. And you absolutely can.
quotes.author: Debby Ryan

quotes.quote: There's some real dark days where you just feel like the story is falling apart in every one. Just keep moving forward, even when you are bluffing, even when you don't quite know what is going to happen next.
quotes.author: Dan Scanlon

quotes.quote: Don't fear change - embrace it.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: The first step toward change is awareness. The second step is acceptance.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.quote: Change brings opportunity.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: Any change, even a change for the better, is always accompanied by drawbacks and discomforts.
quotes.author: Arnold Bennett

quotes.quote: We must all obey the great law of change. It is the most powerful law of nature.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: To change one's life: start immediately, Do it flamboyantly, no exceptions, no excuses.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: A lot of people resist transition and therefore never allow themselves to enjoy who they are. Embrace the change, no matter what it is; once you do, you can learn about the new world you're in and take advantage of it.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.quote: Learn to adjust yourself to the conditions you have to endure, but make a point of trying to alter or correct conditions so that they are most favorable to you.
quotes.author: William Frederick Book

quotes.quote: Change is always tough. Even for those who see themselves as agents of change, the process of starting a new thing can cause times of disorientation, uncertainty and insecurity.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: You cannot expect to achieve new goals or move beyond your present circumstances unless you change.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: You must constantly change and adapt to a new environment.
quotes.author: Jong-Yong Yun

quotes.quote: Noticing small changes early helps you adapt to the bigger change that are to come.
quotes.author: Spencer Johnson

quotes.quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: You must welcome change as the rule but not as your ruler.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: The ability to change constantly and effectively is made easier by high-level continuity.
quotes.author: Michael Porter

quotes.quote: The more you adapt, the more interesting you are.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to adapt new ingredients into your own techniques, and traditional ingredients into new recipes.
quotes.author: Jose Garces

quotes.quote: We have to adapt and overcome, that's all we can do.
quotes.author: Frank Knight

quotes.quote: When you're in a situation that is foreign to you, you just have to pull yourself together and adapt.
quotes.author: Dasha Zhukova

quotes.quote: We have to be able to adapt to new situation. It's another form of the definition of intelligent behavior.
quotes.author: Hasso Plattner

quotes.quote: Embrace change. Envision what could be, challenge the status quo, and drive creative destruction.
quotes.author: Charles Koch

quotes.quote: Look for solutions, instead of being difficult; be more thoughtful, instead of allowing anger to burn you out. Look at things from a different perspective, embrace change, look out for opportunities and you will feel much more in control.
quotes.author: Steve Backley

quotes.quote: In embracing change, entrepreneurs ensure social and economic stability.
quotes.author: George Gilder

quotes.quote: We can embrace change by knowing we serve an unchanging God.
quotes.author: David Jeremiah

quotes.quote: Embrace change, even when the change slaps you in the face.
quotes.author: Walter Breuning

quotes.quote: Life happens. Adapt. Embrace change, and make the most of everything that comes your way.
quotes.author: Nick Jonas

quotes.quote: Adaptability is about the powerful difference between adapting to cope and adapting to win.
quotes.author: Max McKeown

quotes.quote: Adaptability is not imitation. It means power of resistance and assimilation.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: All changes, even the most longed for, have their melancholy, for what we leave behind us is a part of ourselves; we must die to one life before we can enter into another.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Become a student of change. It is the only thing that will remain constant.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Most folks are about as happy as they make their minds up to be.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The measure of intelligence is the ability to change.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The world as we have created it is a product of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Nothing happens until the pain of staying the same outweighs the pain of change.
quotes.author: Arthur Burt

quotes.quote: Of course there is no formula for success except, perhaps, an unconditional acceptance of life and what it brings.
quotes.author: Arthur Rubinstein

quotes.quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person, or if we wait for some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Change is inevitable. Change is constant.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The price of doing the same old thing is far higher than the price of change.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: You never change things by fighting the existing reality. To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.
quotes.author: Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: It is not the strongest or the most intelligent who will survive but those who can best manage change.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Don’t let yesterday use up too much of today.
quotes.author: Cherokee Proverb

quotes.quote: A wise man adapts himself to circumstances, as water shapes itself to the vessel that contains it.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A scholar who loves comfort is not fit to be called a scholar.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Open your arms to change, but don’t let go of your values.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: You need to learn how to select your thoughts just the same way you select what clothes every day. This is a power you can cultivate. If you want to control things in your life so bad, work on the mind. That’s the only thing you should be trying to control.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: The snake which cannot cast its skin has to die. As well the minds which are prevented from changing their opinions, they cease to be mind.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I cannot say whether things will get better if we change. What I can say is they must change if they are to get better.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: It’s never too late to become what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: Change has to come for life to struggle forward.
quotes.author: Helen Hollick

quotes.quote: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.
quotes.author: Henri Bergson

quotes.quote: If you always do what you’ve always done, you’ll always get what you’ve always got.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Change before you have to.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: You must take personal responsibility. You cannot change the circumstances, the seasons, or the wind, but you can change yourself. That is something you have charge of.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: We must all suffer one of two things, the pain of discipline or the pain of regret or disappointment.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Those who expect moments of change to be comfortable and free of conflict have not learned their history.
quotes.author: Joan Wallach Scott

quotes.quote: Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The art of life is a constant readjustment to our surroundings.
quotes.author: Kakuzo Okakaura

quotes.quote: A year from now you will wish you had started today.
quotes.author: Karen Lamb

quotes.quote: We are taught you must blame your father, your sisters, your brothers, the school, the teachers. But never blame yourself. It’s never your fault. But it’s always your fault, because if you wanted to change you’re the one who has got to change.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: When lifes seems hopeless, rearrange things for a dose of dopeness.
quotes.author: Kid Cudi

quotes.quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don’t resist them that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: If you wait, all that happens is you get older.
quotes.author: Larry McMurtry

quotes.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: We are restless because of incessant change, but we would be frightened if change were stopped.
quotes.author: Lyman Lloyd Bryson

quotes.quote: One child, one teacher, one pen, and one book can change the world.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: Growth is painful. Change is painful. But nothing is a painful as staying stuck somewhere you don’t belong.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Change can either challenge or threaten us. Your beliefs pave your way to success or block you.
quotes.author: Marsha Sinetar

quotes.quote: If you can’t fly, then run. If you can’t run, then walk. If you can’t walk, then crawl. But whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: We can not become what we need to by remaining what we are.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Continuity gives us roots, change gives us branches, letting us stretch and grow and reach new heights.
quotes.author: Pauline R. Kezer

quotes.quote: Courage is the power to let go of the familiar.
quotes.author: Raymond Lindquist

quotes.quote: You’ve got to make a conscious choice every day to shed the old whatever “the old” means for you.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: I have noticed even people who claim everything is predestined, and that we can do nothing to change it, look before they cross the road.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems, it’s the ability to deal with them.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be. When I let go of what I have, I receive what I need.
quotes.author: Tao Te Ching

quotes.quote: Girls you’ve gotta know when it’s time to turn the page.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: When patterns are broken, new worlds emerge.
quotes.author: Tuli Kupferberg

quotes.quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Frankl

quotes.quote: Times and conditions change so rapidly that we must keep our aim constantly focused on the future.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: To improve is to change to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: If there was a choice on spending a lot of money on accessories or dress, I always chose accessories. I think jewelry can change an outfit more than anything else.
quotes.author: Iris Apfel

quotes.quote: The object of the passion is just an accessory to the passion itself.
quotes.author: Zadie Smith

quotes.quote: In every woman's wardrobe, there are certain accessories that cannot be separated from their back stories.
quotes.author: Sloane Crosley

quotes.quote: Wear an unusual accessory to complete your outfit.
quotes.author: Chelsea Leyland

quotes.quote: Accessories are everything. To me, they're more important than the clothes.
quotes.author: Rachel Zoe

quotes.quote: Confidence is the best accessory. It can make or break an outfit.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: As far as accessories are concerned, I think it is always best to be as minimalist as possible.
quotes.author: Alice Temperley

quotes.quote: Accessories are important and becoming more and more important every day. They can completely change the look of an outfit, and women like the idea of having a wardrobe that's versatile. For instance, a strong piece of jewelry can make a simple outfit look elegant.
quotes.author: Giorgio Armani

quotes.quote: It's not what you spend but how you wear it that counts. The key is often to dress up inexpensive basics with accessories. Something like a beautiful designer bag or belt can make everything else look richer and more luxurious.
quotes.author: Chloe Sevigny

quotes.quote: When I'm stylizing, it's all about accessories.
quotes.author: Zac Efron

quotes.quote: The best accessories a girl can have are her closest friends.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: The best accessory a girl can wear is confidence.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Accessories are crucial. A great bag and a piece of statement jewelry are the fastest way to elevate an otherwise understated look.
quotes.author: Ivanka Trump

quotes.quote: You should only have so many accessories. You have to make sure you have the right ones at the right time.
quotes.author: Olly Murs

quotes.quote: A well dressed man is a best accessory a woman can have.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Sometimes simple accessories are all you need when your dress speaks for itself.
quotes.author: Jenny Packham

quotes.quote: Cute accessories always help bring out your outfit and pull it all together.
quotes.author: Ciara

quotes.quote: Women show off their personality and character through accessories more than with low-cut shirts and skirts with huge slits.
quotes.author: Sarah Lafleur

quotes.quote: Accessories are like vitamins to fashion.
quotes.author: Anna Dello Russo

quotes.quote: When putting on accessories, take off the last thing you've put on.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Accessories are the perfect way to add something special. A hair comb or a beaded clutch can be a lovely detail to finish your bridal look.
quotes.author: Jenny Packham

quotes.quote: It is the unseen, unforgettable, ultimate accessory of fashion that heralds your arrival and prolongs your departure.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: The term accessories has come to include a host of photographic gadgets of questionable value.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: Good dressing is largely a question of detail and accessories.
quotes.author: Elsie de Wolfe

quotes.quote: A woman makes an outfit her own with accessories.
quotes.author: Oscar de la Renta

quotes.quote: A tan is the best accessory for any outfit!
quotes.author: Kourtney Kardashian

quotes.quote: It is just as disastrous to have the wrong accessories in your room, as it is to wear sport shoes with an evening dress.
quotes.author: Dorothy Draper

quotes.quote: The vital accessories to my work are my reference books, such as the complete Shakespeare and a prayer book, and a large refuse bin.
quotes.author: Beryl Bainbridge

quotes.quote: Accessories are important and becoming more and more important every day.
quotes.author: Giorgio Armani

quotes.quote: Knowledge is always accompanied with accessories of emotion and purpose.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Be faithful to your own taste, because nothing you really like is ever out of style.
quotes.author: Billy Baldwin

quotes.quote: Fashion is not something that exists in dresses only.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Elegance comes from being as beautiful inside as outside.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: I design for real people. I think of our customers all the time. There is no virtue whatsoever in creating clothing or accessories that are not practical.
quotes.author: Giorgio Armani

quotes.quote: War being the greatest of evils, all its accessories necessarily partake of the same character.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Pearls are always appropriate.
quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.quote: The basic thing nobody asks is why do people take drugs of any sort? Why do we have these accessories to normal living to live I mean, is there something wrong with society that's making us so pressurized, that we cannot live without guarding ourselves against it.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Any opportunity to adorn oneself is human, and accessories are an easy way to do it.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: Men who care passionately for women attach themselves at least as much to the temple and to the accessories of the cult as to their goddess herself.
quotes.author: Marguerite Yourcenar

quotes.quote: Beneath the makeup and behind the smile I am just a girl who wishes for the world.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: I've always thought of accessories as the exclamation point of a woman's outfit.
quotes.author: Michael Kors

quotes.quote: Have nothing in your home that you don’t know to be useful or believe to be beautiful.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: Through historical accident, we've ended up with a global network that pretty much allows anybody to communicate with anyone else at any time.
quotes.author: Jonathan Zittrain

quotes.quote: What men call accident is God's own part.
quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

quotes.quote: Accident is as much a part of fiction as anything else, symbolic of the grace that, along with will, conspires to put words on the page.
quotes.author: Mark Helprin

quotes.quote: Accident is veiled necessity.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: Accident is simply unforeseen order.
quotes.author: Novalis

quotes.quote: Slightest accidents open up new worlds.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: There are no accidents without intentions.
quotes.author: Alex Miller

quotes.quote: Some things happen by accident - embrace them.
quotes.author: Mario Testino

quotes.quote: Accidents will occur in the best-regulated families.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Name the greatest of all inventors. Accident.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as accident; it is fate misnamed.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Sometimes an accident can be an unhappy womans best friend.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Follow the accident, fear the fixed plan--that is the rule.
quotes.author: John Fowles

quotes.quote: There are no such things as accidents. Only fate redesigned.
quotes.author: Soroosh Shahrivar

quotes.quote: It's not an accident that successful people read more books.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: There is no accident, just as there is no beginning and no end.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: Accidents ambush the unsuspecting, often violently, just like love.
quotes.author: Andrew Davidson

quotes.quote: There are too many accidents that can befall life on a single planet.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Accidents are not accidents but precise arrivals at the wrong right time.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: It is always an accident that saves us. It is someone we have never seen.
quotes.author: James Salter

quotes.quote: Accidents don't happen to people who take accidents as a personal insult.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: The sweet accident of coincidence is the best foundation on which to build.
quotes.author: Gregory Maguire

quotes.quote: Accidents, try to change them - it's impossible. The accidental reveals man.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Accident ruled every corner of the universe except the chambers of the human heart.
quotes.author: David Guterson

quotes.quote: There are no accidents... there is only some purpose that we haven't yet understood.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: I don't believe in accidents. There are only encounters in history. There are no accidents.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: If you go around looking for accidents, asking for them, they can't be called accidents any more.
quotes.author: Margaret Millar

quotes.quote: Accidents are just from where you're looking; to the ego, it looks like it's miracles and accidents.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Accident counts for as much in companionship as in marriage.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: It was an accident of circumstance that I never married.
quotes.author: Quentin Blake

quotes.quote: Almost all accidents take place because of human distraction.
quotes.author: Sebastian Thrun

quotes.quote: Accident is design / And design is accident / In a cloud of unknowing.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Every accident, no matter how minor, is a failure of the organization.
quotes.author: Jerome F. Lederer

quotes.quote: Through pure accident of birth, I've managed to stay relatively youthful.
quotes.author: Niall Ferguson

quotes.quote: There is no accident in our choice of reading. All our sources are related.
quotes.author: Francois Mauriac

quotes.quote: The different accidents of life are not so changeable as the feelings of human nature.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quotes.quote: Accidents, and particularly street and highway accidents, do not happen - they are caused.
quotes.author: Ernest Greenwood

quotes.quote: It was not by accident that the greatest thinkers of all ages were deeply religious souls.
quotes.author: Max Planck

quotes.quote: There would be far fewer accidents if we could only teach telephone poles to be more careful.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: If the accident of genes has put you in a place where you can be a role model, then be somebody!
quotes.author: Lauren Hutton

quotes.quote: The desire accomplished is sweet to the soul.
quotes.author: Solomon

quotes.quote: You can accomplish His will, without stopping midway, and even though you may face obstacles, you will overcome.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: A man has always to be busy with his thoughts if anything is to be accomplished.
quotes.author: Antonie van Leeuwenhoek

quotes.quote: Great things are not accomplished by those who yield to trends and fads and popular opinion.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: What great accomplishments we'd have in the world if everybody had done what they intended to do.
quotes.author: Frank Clark

quotes.quote: The challenge of the unknown future is so much more exciting than the stories of the accomplished past.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: There is joy in work. There is no happiness except in the realization that we have accomplished something.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Progress is not accomplished in one stage.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Every great accomplishment rests on the foundation of what came before it; when you trace it back, you'll see one small step that started it all.
quotes.author: Stephen Guise

quotes.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Nothing great in the world has ever been accomplished without passion.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.quote: The prospect of achieving goals means that that there is something that you seriously want to accomplish in your life.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Accomplishments give you a sense of confidence and encouragement.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: If you have accomplished all that you have planned for yourself, you have not planned enough.
quotes.author: Edward Everett Hale

quotes.quote: It is amazing how much can be accomplished if no one cares who gets the credit.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Nothing stops the man who desires to achieve. Every obstacle is simply a course to develop his achievement muscle. It's a strengthening of his powers of accomplishment.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: If you doubt you can accomplish something, then you can't accomplish it. You have to have confidence in your ability, and then be tough enough to follow through.
quotes.author: Rosalynn Carter

quotes.quote: Great things are accomplished by talented people who believe they will accomplish them.
quotes.author: Warren G. Bennis

quotes.quote: Most of us define success as the accomplishment of various goals, aims, and purposes.
quotes.author: Stefan Sillner

quotes.quote: The size of your accomplishments, the quality of your achievement, will depend very largely on how big a man you see in yourself, what sort of image you get of your possible self, yourself at your best.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: There are few better ways to learn and become a more accomplished person than through coaching, as it pushes the boundaries and opens up brand new opportunities.
quotes.author: Tom Mahalo

quotes.quote: Be modest. A lot was accomplished before you were born.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: All things are accomplished by the meditative act of releasing illusions and simply becoming.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: All the great things of humanity have been accomplished in the name of absolute principles.
quotes.author: Ernest Renan

quotes.quote: You can have anything you want if you want it badly enough. You can be anything you want to be, do anything you set out to accomplish if you hold to that desire with singleness of purpose.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The destination is a happy life, an accomplished life that doesn't end with death but with eternal life.
quotes.author: Angelo Scola

quotes.quote: In today's world of distraction and interruption, you must remain focused on your key priorities if you are going to accomplish your goals.
quotes.author: Eric Lofholm

quotes.quote: It is impossible to get anything made or accomplished without stepping on some toes; enemies are inevitable when one is a doer.
quotes.author: Norma Shearer

quotes.quote: Nothing right can be accomplished in art without enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Robert Schumann

quotes.quote: When you are trying to complete many different tasks you should have rewards for those that get accomplished and punishments for those that do not.
quotes.author: Felix Oberman

quotes.quote: You always want your people to be proud of what you have accomplished.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Even the accomplished suffers setbacks sometimes. The more bitter the lessons, the greater the successes will be.
quotes.author: Lucio Tan

quotes.quote: Raise the bar and set yourself some new challenges. You can accomplish more than you think.
quotes.author: Rebecca Gordon

quotes.quote: When you've accomplished a certain amount in your career, you're not so focused on your ambitions.
quotes.author: Michael Douglas

quotes.quote: To accomplish a bright future is to accomplish bright and huge tasks.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: If you can react the same way to winning and losing, that's a big accomplishment.
quotes.author: Chris Evert

quotes.quote: Knowledge may give weight, but accomplishments give lustre, and many more people see than weigh.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: You can have meaning, accomplishment, engagement and good relationships, even if you are dull on the positive affect side.
quotes.author: Martin Seligman

quotes.quote: The great accomplishments of man have resulted from the transmission of ideas of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: Every big accomplishment is a series of little accomplishments.
quotes.author: David Joseph Schwartz

quotes.quote: Your ability to set goals and to make plans for their accomplishment is the master skill of success.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: To accomplish a difficult task one must first make it easy.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: The supreme accomplishment is to blur the line between work and play.
quotes.author: Arnold J. Toynbee

quotes.quote: There shall be wings! If the accomplishment be not for me, it's for some other.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: It's a great sense of accomplishment when you can take something and really think it's really tough, and then all of a sudden you conquer it. That makes you feel pretty good.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: Heat is required to forge anything. Every great accomplishment is the story of a flaming heart.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Retton

quotes.quote: Be ashamed to die until you have won some victory for humanity.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: A sense of accomplishment comes when you have completed the tasks for the goals you have set for yourself.
quotes.author: Brenda Johnson Padgitt

quotes.quote: Blessedness consists in the accomplishment of our desires, and in our having only regular desires.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how great your shoes are if you don't accomplish anything in them.
quotes.author: Martina Boone

quotes.quote: My most important professional accomplishment to date is the ability to keep working with absolutely no skills whatsoever.
quotes.author: Colin Mochrie

quotes.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Nothing builds self-esteem and self-confidence like accomplishment.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: We would accomplish many more things if we did not think of them as impossible.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: An invincible determination can accomplish almost anything and in this lies the great distinction between great men and little men.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The bigger the challenge, the bigger the sense of accomplishment when you get to the end of it.
quotes.author: Roz Savage

quotes.quote: Every time you acquire a new interest, even more, a new accomplishment, you increase your power of life.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: No matter how short or long your journey to your accomplishment is, if you don't begin you can't get there. Beginning is difficult, but unavoidable!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: If you want to accomplish the goals of your life, you have to begin with the spirit.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: A man's accomplishments in life are the cumulative effect of his attention to detail.
quotes.author: John Foster Dulles

quotes.quote: Everyone is trying to accomplish something big, not realizing that life is made up of little things.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: All men are prepared to accomplish the incredible if their ideals are threatened
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.quote: High moral character is not a precondition for great moral accomplishments.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Your greatest accomplishment may not be something you do but someone you raise.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: The greatest feeling of accomplishment for me is the fact that I was an athlete who was somewhat disabled.
quotes.author: Bill Toomey

quotes.quote: It is through accomplishment that man makes his contribution and contribution is life's greatest reward.
quotes.author: John C. Portman Jr.

quotes.quote: Accomplishment is socially judged by ill defined criteria so that one has to rely on others to find out how one is doing
quotes.author: Albert Bandura

quotes.quote: To accomplish great things, we must dream as well as act.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: The greatest accomplishment is not in never failing, but in rising again after you fall.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Today's accomplishments were yesterday's impossibilities.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: There exists a sacred strength for every great accomplishment.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Being varied is something I do instinctively and naturally. I feel a tremendous sense of accomplishment.
quotes.author: Sarah Brightman

quotes.quote: It's no use saying, "We are doing our best." You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: A great accomplishment shouldn't be the end of the road, just the starting point for the next leap forward.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: A great accomplishment shouldn't be the end of the road, just the starting point for the next leap forward.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: Every worthwhile accomplishment, big or little, has its stages of drudgery and triumph: a beginning, a struggle, and a victory.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You measure the size of the accomplishment by the obstacles you have to overcome to reach your goals.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: In wilderness I sense the miracle of life, and behind it our scientific accomplishments fade to trivia.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Great accomplishments start with great aspirations.
quotes.author: Gary Hamel

quotes.quote: The intelligent man is one who has successfully fulfilled many accomplishments, and is yet willing to learn more.
quotes.author: Ed Parker

quotes.quote: It is perhaps life's greatest accomplishment to live to old age, maintaining one's wits, one's sense of humor, one's health, and one's charm.
quotes.author: Yehudi Menuhin

quotes.quote: Aim for the high mark, and you will hit it.
quotes.author: Annie Oakley

quotes.quote: By taking the time to stop and appreciate who you are and what you've achieved - and perhaps learned through a few mistakes, stumbles and losses - you actually can enhance everything about you. Self-acknowledgement and appreciation are what give you the insights and awareness to move forward toward higher goals and accomplishments.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: Let the future tell the truth, and evaluate each one according to his work and accomplishments. The present is theirs; the future, for which I have really worked, is mine.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: The most glorious moments in your life are not the so-called days of success, but rather those days when out of dejection and despair you feel rise in you a challenge to life, and the promise of future accomplishments.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: You have to remember that the hard days are what make you stronger. The bad days make you realize what a good day is. If you never had any bad days, you would never have that sense of accomplishment.
quotes.author: Aly Raisman

quotes.quote: The greatest accomplishment is not in never falling, but in rising again after you fall.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Being busy does not always mean real work. The object of all work is production or accomplishment and to either of these ends there must be forethought, system, planning, intelligence, and honest purpose, as well as perspiration. Seeming to do is not doing.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: I know the price of success: dedication, hardwork, and an unremitting devotion to the things you want to see happen.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: We can accomplish almost anything within our ability if we but think that we can! Every great achievement in this world was first carefully thought out.
quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

quotes.quote: Financial rewards follow accomplishment, they don't precede it.
quotes.author: Harry F. Banks

quotes.quote: Sweat is the cologne of accomplishment.
quotes.author: Heywood Hale Broun

quotes.quote: There is nothing that God has judged good for us that He has not given us the means to accomplish, both in the natural and moral world. If we cry, like children, for the moon, like children we must cry on.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: "I can't do it" never yet accomplished anything; "I will try" has performed wonders.
quotes.author: George P. Burnham

quotes.quote: Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Knowledge may give weight, but accomplishments give lustre, and many more people see than weigh.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Always there will be, along the sidelines of life, inferior souls who throw mud at those whose attainments they do not quite understand. The man who really accomplishes doesn't pay attention to such detractors. If he did, he'd be on their level. He keeps an eye singled on the higher goal—and the mud never touches him.
quotes.author: Jerome P. Fleishman

quotes.quote: Too few accomplish twice as much as too many.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Too many of us, when we accomplish what we set out to do, exclaim, "See what I have done!" instead of saying, "See where I have been led."
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Everyone has superstitions. One of mine has always been when I started to go anywhere, or to do anything, never to turn back or to stop until the thing intended was accomplished.
quotes.author: Ulysses S. Grant

quotes.quote: If well thou hast begun, go on; it is the end that crowns us, not the fight.
quotes.author: Robert Herrick

quotes.quote: You can do what you want to do, accomplish what you want to accomplish, attain any reasonable objective you may have in mind... Not all of a sudden, perhaps, not in one swift and sweeping act of achievement... But you can do it gradually-day by day and play by play-if you want to do it, if you will to do it, if you work to do it, over a sufficiently long period of time.
quotes.author: William E. Holler

quotes.quote: Accomplishment of purpose is better than making a profit.
quotes.author: Hausan Proverb

quotes.quote: Accomplishments are lifelong benefits to those who possess them.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: If you wish a thing done, go; if not, send.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Knowing how to do a job is the accomplishment of labor - showing others is the accomplishment of the teacher - making sure the work is done by others is the accomplishment of the manager - inspiring others to do better work is the accomplishment of the leader.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Do you wish to be great? Then begin by being. Do you desire to construct a vast and lofty fabric? Think first about the foundations of humility. The higher your structure is to be, the deeper must be its foundation.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: You are not judged by the height you have risen, but from the depth you have climbed.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: Strive to make something of yourself; then strive to make the most of yourself.
quotes.author: Alexander Crummel

quotes.quote: Up you mighty race, you can accomplish what you will.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: We build our temples for tomorrow, strong as we know how, and we stand on top of the mountain, free within ourselves.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: Accomplishments have no color.
quotes.author: Leontyne Price

quotes.quote: For me it's the challenge - the challenge to try to beat myself or do better than I did in the past. I try to keep in mind not what I have accomplished but what I have to try to accomplish in the future.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.quote: The most agreeable thing in life is worthy accomplishment. It is not possible that the idle tramp is as contented as the farmers along the road who own their own farms, and whose credit is good at the bank in town. When the tramps get together at night, they abuse the farmers, but do not get as much satisfaction out of it as do the farmers who abuse the tramps. The sounder your argument, the more satisfaction you get out of it.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: For truth and duty it is ever the fitting time; who waits until circumstances completely favor his undertaking, will never accomplish anything.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: I am an acme of things accomplished, and I am an encloser of things to be.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: If you have known how to compose your life, you have accomplished a great deal more than the man who knows how to compose a book. Have you been able to make your stride? You have done more than man who has taken cities and empires.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: The man who has accomplished all that he thinks worth while, has begun to die.
quotes.author: E. T. Trigg

quotes.quote: It is by what we ourselves have done, and not by what others have done for us, that we shall be remembered in after ages.
quotes.author: Francis Wayland

quotes.quote: The secret of the true love of work is the hope of success in that work; not for the money reward, for the time spent, or for the skill exercised, but for the successful result in the accomplishment of the work itself.
quotes.author: Sidney A. Weltmer

quotes.quote: There is not in all America a more dangerous trait than the deification of mere smartness unaccompanied by any sense of moral responsibility.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The corporation is the creature of the state. It should always be held accountable to some sovereign, and this accountability shoul be real and not a sham.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: No one sets higher standards for students or higher accountability for teachers than effective teachers do--for it is teachers who suffer the most from a lack of accountability.
quotes.author: Andy Baumgartner

quotes.quote: At the end of the day we are accountable to ourselves - our success is a result of what we do.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: When we are really honest with ourselves we must admit our lives are all that really belong to us. So it is how we use our lives that determines the kind of men we are.
quotes.author: Ceasar Chavez

quotes.quote: A duty dodged is like a debt unpaid; it is only deferred, and we must come back and settle the account at last.
quotes.author: Joseph Fort Newton

quotes.quote: My philosophy is that not only are you responsible for your life, but doing the best at this moment puts you I the best place for the next moment.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: It is wrong and immoral to seek to escape the consequences of one's acts.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: We have a problem when the same people who make the law get to decide whether or not they themselves have broken the law.
quotes.author: Michel Templet

quotes.quote: Good men are bound by conscience and liberated by accountability.
quotes.author: Wes Fessler

quotes.quote: There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: When a man points a finger at someone else, he should remember that four of his fingers are pointing at himself.
quotes.author: Louis Nizer

quotes.quote: A person may cause evil to others not only by his actions but by his inaction, and in either case he is justly accountable to them for injury.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: He that is good for making excuses is seldom good for anything else.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: ...if a man is not faithful to his own individuality, he cannot be loyal to anything.
quotes.author: Claude Mckay

quotes.quote: No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Lec

quotes.quote: I am a member of a team, and I rely on the team, I defer to it and sacrifice for it, because the team, not the individual, is the ultimate champion.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: It has always been my belief that a man should do his best, regardless of how much he receives for his services, or the number of people he may be serving or the class of people served.
quotes.author: Napolean Hill

quotes.quote: The day you take complete responsibility for yourself, the day you stop making any excuses, that's the day you start to the top.
quotes.author: O. J. Simpson

quotes.quote: Sometimes if you want to see a change for the better, you have to take things into your own hands.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: Good people do not need laws to tell them to act responsibly, while bad people will find a way around the laws.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Accountability breeds response-ability.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: We preach accountability. A player has to understand what he's doing and why. And we have to be responsible for improving them.
quotes.author: Jeff Banister

quotes.quote: Accountability separates the wishers in life from the action-takers that care enough about their future to account for their daily actions.
quotes.author: John Di Lemme

quotes.quote: God judges men according to the use they make of the light which He gives them.
quotes.author: Joseph Smith

quotes.quote: God gave burdens, also shoulders.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: The way to get things done is not to mind who gets the credit of doing them.
quotes.author: Benjamin Jowett

quotes.quote: If you let other people do it for you, they will do it to you.
quotes.author: Robert Anthony

quotes.quote: If you can't stand the heat, you'd better get out of the kitchen.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: A memorandum is written not to inform the reader but to protect the writer.
quotes.author: Dean Acheson

quotes.quote: It is easier to fight for one's principles than to live up to them.
