quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: Never promise more than you can perform.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: It is not only what we do, but also what we do not do, for which we are accountable.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Every person's work, whether it be literature or music or pictures or architecture or anything else, is always a portrait of that person.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: It is easy to dodge our responsibilities, but we cannot dodge the consequences of dodging our responsibilities.
quotes.author: Sir Josiah Stamp

quotes.quote: Think of these things, whence you came, where you are going, and to whom you must account.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Duties are not performed for duty's sake, but because their neglect would make the man uncomfortable. A man performs but one duty - the duty of contenting his spirit, the duty of making himself agreeable to himself.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Mankind must put an end to war, before war puts an end to mankind.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: What you do, tells me everything about you.
quotes.author: Jerry Fernandez

quotes.quote: Life is not accountable to us. We are accountable to life.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: If a picture speaks a thousand words, your actions forever record what you believe in.
quotes.author: Jerry Fernandez

quotes.quote: Accountability is the measure of a leaders height.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Benjamin

quotes.quote: So then each of us will give an account of himself to God.
quotes.author: 1 Thessalonians 5:11

quotes.quote: And no creature is hidden from his sight, but all are naked and exposed to the eyes of him to whom we must give account.
quotes.author: Hebrews 4:13

quotes.quote: All that is necessary for the triumph of evil is that good men do nothing.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Our tradition calls for a commitment to accountability. This is not an assumption - this is a promise that I will be there for you; and I can count on you being there for me.
quotes.author: Bob Ladouceur

quotes.quote: Responsibility equals accountability equals ownership. And a sense of ownership is the most powerful weapon a team or organization can have.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.quote: Leaders must develop a lower threshold for alibis and become better communicators and enforcers of what they want done. Holding people accountable to high standards and results is nothing to apologize for. Failing to stretch them to their potential is.
quotes.author: Dave Anderson

quotes.quote: On good teams coaches hold players accountable, on great teams players hold players accountable.
quotes.author: Joe Dumars

quotes.quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The greatest discovery of our generation is that human beings can alter their lives by altering their attitudes of mind. As you think, so shall you be.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Henceforth it is my duty to keep Thy commandments, and I now become responsible for my own actions and I alone am answerable for them to Thee.
quotes.author: Haham Benjamin Artom

quotes.quote: No ordinary work done by a man is either as hard or as responsible as the work of a woman who is bringing up a family of small children.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Reagan concluded that it's hard to hld the first lady actually responsible for what the administraton is doing because she's not really responsible.
quotes.author: Leonard Kniffel

quotes.quote: I have too much respect for the idea of God to make it responsible for such an absurd world.
quotes.author: Georges Duhamel

quotes.quote: As Christians we have an obligation to show others what God says about living self-controlled lives and being responsible for our moral actions, as God defines them.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: God holds every man accountable for his rejection of Christ.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Every one of us is responsible for everyone else in every way. Everyone is really responsible for everyone and everything.
quotes.author: Father Zossima

quotes.quote: Few things help an individual more than to place responsibility upon him, and to let him know that you trust him.
quotes.author: Boooker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Man's responsibility increases as that of the gods decreases.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: None of us are responsible for our birth. Our responsibility is the use we make of life.
quotes.author: Joshua Henry Jones

quotes.quote: I believe that every right implies responsibility; every opportunity, an obligation; every possession, a duty.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: It is each person's responsibility to free himself from the errors of his time.
quotes.author: Marguerite Yourcenar

quotes.quote: I am here; I must do the best I can, and bear the responsibility of taking the course which I feel I ought to take.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: In your area of responsibility, if you do not control events, you are at the mercy of events.
quotes.author: Harland Svare

quotes.quote: An honest man is not accountable for the vice and folly of his trade, and therefore ought not to refuse the exercise of it.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: The most important thought I ever had was that of my individual responsibility to God.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.quote: A wrong decision can make me very miserable. But I have trust in God. If you have this trust you don't have to worry, as you don't have sole responsibility.
quotes.author: Alfred Thompson

quotes.quote: Responsibility brings accountability.
quotes.author: Ken Robins

quotes.quote: I believe in the soul. Furthermore, I believe, it is prompt accountability for one's choices, a willing acceptance of responsibility for one's thoughts, behavior, and actions that makes it powerful.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: To let oneself be bound by a duty from the moment you see it approaching, is a part of integrity that alone justifies responsibility.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: When it comes to privacy and accountability, people always demand the former for themselves and the latter for everyone else.
quotes.author: David Brin

quotes.quote: A body of men holding themselves accountable to nobody ought not to be trusted by anybody.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: As for the journey of life; at some point you will realize that you are the driver and you will drive!
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: A president cannot defend a nation if he is not held accountable to its laws.
quotes.author: DaShanne Stokes

quotes.quote: You will not experience dramatic change in your struggle as long as you use accountability to describe your sins instead of declaring your need for help in the midst of temptation.
quotes.author: Heath Lambert

quotes.quote: Big pay and little responsibility are circumstances seldom found together.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: We are all responsible and accountable for what we do or say even if those behaviors occur in stressful times.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Neither age nor experience matters when it comes to being personally accountable for any and all outcomes- no excuses whatsoever- be they positive or negative, nor shifting blame to other people or to external factors.
quotes.author: Kory Livingstone

quotes.quote: Accountability is a statement of personal promise, both to yourself and to the people around you, to deliver specific defined results.
quotes.author: Brian Dive

quotes.quote: Candor and accountability in a democracy is very important. Hypocrisy has no place.
quotes.author: Alan Dershowitz

quotes.quote: What we are missing, utterly and completely, in this government is accountability.
quotes.author: Paul Hawken

quotes.quote: Don't ever let your business get ahead of the financial side of your business. Accounting, accounting, accounting. Know your numbers.
quotes.author: Tilman J. Fertitta

quotes.quote: Accounting does not make corporate earnings or balance sheets more volatile. Accounting just increases the transparency of volatility in earnings.
quotes.author: Diane Garnick

quotes.quote: You have to know accounting. It's the language of practical business life. It was a very useful thing to deliver to civilization. I've heard it came to civilization through Venice which of course was once the great commercial power in the Mediterranean. However, double entry bookkeeping was a hell of an invention.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: Legacy accounting: Will you have been an asset or a liability on the world's balance sheet?
quotes.author: Ryan Lilly

quotes.quote: You have to understand accounting and you have to understand the nuances of accounting. It's the language of business and it's an imperfect language, but unless you are willing to put in the effort to learn accounting - how to read and interpret financial statements - you really shouldn't select stocks yourself.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The word accounting comes from the word accountability. If you are going to be rich, you need to be accountable for your money.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote:
Balanced budget requirements seem more likely to produce
accounting ingenuity than genuinely balanced budgets.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Proper accounting is like engineering. You need a margin of safety. Thank God we don't design bridges and airplanes the way we do accounting.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: There's no accounting for laws. Or the changes wrought by men and time.
quotes.author: James Crumley

quotes.quote: Aggressive accounting does not mean illegal accounting.
quotes.author: Kenneth Lay

quotes.quote: Accounting is a hot domain with the number of accounting majors up nationwide. I think the recent scandals have brought a new level of attention to the accounting profession as gatekeepers and custodians of social interest.
quotes.author: Paul Browne

quotes.quote: Life is like accounting, everything must be balanced.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Accounting for the most part, remains a legalistic and traditional practice, almost immune to self-criticism by scientific methods.
quotes.author: Kenneth E. Boulding

quotes.quote: Mark-to-market accounting is like crack. Don't do it.
quotes.author: Andrew Fastow

quotes.quote: It sounds extraordinary, but it's a fact that balance sheets can make fascinating reading.
quotes.author: Mary Archer

quotes.quote: Creative accounting is an absolute curse to a civilization. One could argue that double-entry bookkeeping was one of history's great advances. Using accounting for fraud and folly is a disgrace. In a democracy, it often takes a scandal to trigger reform. Enron was the most obvious example of a business culture gone wrong in a long, long time.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: Creativity is great-but not in accounting.
quotes.author: Charles Scott

quotes.quote: Managers and investors alike must understand that accounting numbers are the beginning, not the end, of business valuation.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: In the corporate world, sometimes things aren`t exactly black and white when it comes to accounting procedures.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Accounting rules give financial institutions flexibility about when they choose to recognize venture capital profits.
quotes.author: Alex Berenson

quotes.quote: There is nothing wrong with good accounting, except that it does not necessarily lead to good science.
quotes.author: Gerhard Herzberg

quotes.quote: Accounting is a big subject and there are huge forces in play. The entire momentum of existing thinking and existing custom is in a direction that allows terrible follies to happen, and the terrible follies have terrible consequences.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: Cost Accounting is enemy number one of productivity.
quotes.author: Eliyahu M. Goldratt

quotes.quote: Life as we know it, with all its ups and downs, will soon be over. We all will give an accounting to God of how we have lived.
quotes.author: William Wilberforce

quotes.quote: Balance Sheets are meaningless. Our accounting systems are still based on the assumption that 80% of costs are manual labor.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Accounting is the language of business.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: There is no accounting for tastes.
quotes.author: Ann Radcliffe

quotes.quote: There's no business like show business, but there are several businesses like accounting.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: Each generation makes it's own accounting to its children.
quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

quotes.quote: False accounting is not growth; it is growth's mirror image.
quotes.author: Morgen Witzel

quotes.quote: Never ask of money spent / Where the spender thinks it went / Nobody was ever meant / To remember or invent / What he did with every cent.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Companies run by engineers don't make money, but companies run by accountants don't make anything at all.
quotes.author: Peter Krueger

quotes.quote: Count your blessings, name them one by one / Count your blessings, see what God hath done / Count your blessings, name them one by one / And it will surprise you what the Lord hath done!
quotes.author: Johnson Oatman Jr.

quotes.quote: Creative accounting refers to the presenting of financial information in such a way that it influences whoever peruses it toward a contrived conclusion and possibly hides some unwelcome facts.
quotes.author: Leo Bloom

quotes.quote: Accounting noise: the current mess of confusing financial statements, created by a combination of excessive rules, and occasionally management manipulation.
quotes.author: Luke Johnson

quotes.quote: In many respects, this case appears to be eerily similar to the accounting hocus-pocus taht occured at Enron.
quotes.author: R.H. Tawney

quotes.quote: O Christian, whose chastened curiosity loveth things mysterious. Accounting them shadows and eclipses of Him,the one great light.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Count, count your hopes, heirs of immortality and love; And hear my kindred faith, and turn again to bless me.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: This agency is out here in a sense to try to hold accountable a financial-services industry that ran wild, that brought our economy to the edge of collapse.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren

quotes.quote: E'en as a toper from the dram-shop reeling, / Sees in his garret's blackness, dazzling fair, / All that he might have been, and, heart-sick, kneeling, / Sobs in the passion of a vast despair: / So my ideal self haunts me alway--/ When the accounting comes, how shall I pay?
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: I will go to the lovely Sur Rivers / And dip my arms in them up to the shoulders. / I will find my accounting where the alder leaf quivers / In the ocean wind over the river boulders.
quotes.author: Robinson Jeffers

quotes.quote: But, in the valley of the Gauri, men / Beneath the shadow of the big new dam, / Relate a foolish legend of the flood, / Accounting for the little loss of life.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Looks like accounting's not accountable /For anything or anyone at all / Johnny took the fall / Johnny took the fall.
quotes.author: Isaac Brock

quotes.quote: These are the souls of the broken factories / The subject slaves of the broken crown / The dead accounting of old guilty promises / These are the souls of the broken town.
quotes.author: Gordon Sumner

quotes.quote: For the needs of many are the sins of a few / And the day is forthcoming when accounting is due / Sing a song for sweet justice with a fire in her eyes / Sing of Stone haven mountain home, Stone haven Sunrise.
quotes.author: John Denver

quotes.quote: When it's all over but the shoutin' / When God the Father's done his final accounting / And I find out that I made the cut / Boys I'm gonna get me a chariot.
quotes.author: John Caldwell

quotes.quote: I love women / Have all my life / Love my dear mother / I love my wife / God bless her / Even love my teenaged daughter / There's no accounting for it / Apparently I don't care how I'm treated / My love's unconditionally or something.
quotes.author: Randy Newman

quotes.quote: There’s no accounting for the mysteries of the human heart.
quotes.author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quotes.quote: People always ask me, ‘Were you funny as a child?’ Well, no, I was an accountant.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: In the long run managements stressing accounting appearance over economic substance usually achieve little of either.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Companies figured out that the easiest way to make money was to reissue records that the accounting department had paid for years ago and already made a profit.
quotes.author: Chris Cornell

quotes.quote: If you want an accounting of your worth, count your friends.
quotes.author: Mary Browne

quotes.quote: history, like nature, has its own economy, its own balancing of forces in the final accounting. Nothing can be lost, except to awareness.
quotes.author: Helen Foster Snow

quotes.quote: We have the most crude accounting tools. It's tragic because our accounts and our national arithmetic doesn't tell us the things that we need to know.
quotes.author: Susan George

quotes.quote: To multiply the years and divide by the desire to live is a kind of false accounting.
quotes.author: Peter Heller

quotes.quote: What is meat for one is not for another--no accounting for fancy.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: The wildlife of today is not ours to do with as we please. The original stock was given to us in trust for the benefit both of the present and the future. We must render an accounting of this trust to those who come after us.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The scriptures make the danger of delay clear. It is that we may discover that we have run out of time. The God who gives us each day as a treasure will require an accounting.
quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.quote: Almost all decisions based on cost accounting are utterly wrong.
quotes.author: Eliyahu Goldratt

quotes.quote: The power of accurate observation is commonly called cynicism by those who have not got it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Done right, precision can help clarify, plus it's fun.
quotes.author: Betsy Hodges

quotes.quote: Exactness and neatness in moderation is a virtue, but carried to extremes narrows the mind.
quotes.author: FranÃ§ois FÃ©nelon

quotes.quote: Accuracy of observation is the equivalent of accuracy of thinking.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: Accuracy is essential to beauty.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: One accurate measurement is worth a thousand expert opinions.
quotes.author: Grace Hopper

quotes.quote: Accuracy of statement is one of the first elements of truth; inaccuracy is a near kin to falsehood.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: No person will deny that the highest degree of attainable accuracy is an object to be desired, and it is generally found that the last advances towards precision require a greater devotion of time, labour, and expense, than those which precede them.
quotes.author: Charles Babbage

quotes.quote: There is no substitute for accurate knowledge. Know yourself, know your business, know your men.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: Accuracy is the basis of style. Words dress our thoughts and should fit; and should fit not only in their utterances, but in their implications, their sequences, and their silences, just as in architecture the empty spaces are as important as those that are filled.
quotes.author: Freya Stark

quotes.quote: Accuracy of language is one of the bulwarks of truth
quotes.author: Anna Jameson

quotes.quote: By concentrating on precision, one arrives at technique, but by concentrating on technique one does not arrive at precision.
quotes.author: Bruno Walter

quotes.quote: Fast is fine, but accuracy is everything.
quotes.author: Wyatt Earp

quotes.quote: Precision is, after all, not only a form of responsibility and a kind of pleasure, but an instrument of compassion. To be precise requires care, time, and attention to the person, place, or process being described.
quotes.author: Marilyn Chandler McEntyre

quotes.quote: The difference between something good and something great is attention to detail.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Accuracy is to a newspaper what virtue is to a lady, but a newspaper can always print a retraction
quotes.author: Charles Revson

quotes.quote: Precision of communication is important, more important than ever, in our era of hair trigger balances, when a false or misunderstood word may create as much disaster as a sudden thoughtless act.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Exactness cannot be established in the arguments unless it is first introduced into the definitions.
quotes.author: Henri Poincare

quotes.quote: In the landscape of extinction, precision is next to godliness.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: Accurate and minute measurement seems to the non-scientific imagination, a less lofty and dignified work than looking for something new. But nearly all the grandest discoveries of science have been but the rewards of accurate measurement and patient long-continued labour in the minute sifting of numerical results.
quotes.author: Baron William Thomson Kelvin

quotes.quote: Without minute neatness of execution, the sublime cannot exist! Grandeur of ideas is founded on precision of ideas.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Consistency and accuracy instills believability.
quotes.author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quotes.quote: Accuracy is the twin brother of honesty; inaccuracy, of dishonesty.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Thoroughness characterizes all successful men. Genius is the art of taking infinite pains. All great achievement has been characterized by extreme care, infinite painstaking, even to the minutest detail.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Accuracy is, in every case, advantageous to beauty, and just reasoning to delicate sentiment. In vain would we exalt the one by depreciating the other.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: Be precise. A lack of precision is dangerous when the margin of error is small.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: Precision is not reality.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: Tiny details imperceptible to us decide everything!
quotes.author: Winfried Georg Sebald

quotes.quote: Precision, accuracy and pondering in wisdom and sciences, will nourish and develop a person's brain.
quotes.author: Jafar ibn Muhammad as-S

quotes.quote: Simplify the task. Continually look for faster, better, easier ways to get the job done.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: You cannot describe the universe completely with any accuracy unless you're willing to admit that it's both physical and mental in nature.
quotes.author: Christopher Langan

quotes.quote: A new report says that dogs can sniff out prostate cancer with almost 98 percent accuracy. The report also finds that cats can sniff it out with 100 percent accuracy but they prefer to watch you die.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.quote: Good design is thorough down to the last detail. Nothing must be arbitrary or left to chance. Care and accuracy in the design process show respect towards the consumer.
quotes.author: Dieter Rams

quotes.quote: The game of life is a game of boomerangs. Our thoughts, deeds, and words return to us sooner or later with astounding accuracy.
quotes.author: Florence Scovel Shinn

quotes.quote: Accuracy builds credibility.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The Rule of Accuracy, when working toward the solution of a problem, it always helps if you know the answer.
quotes.author: John Peers

quotes.quote: Men were not intended to work with the accuracy of tools, to be precise and perfect in all their actions.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Put it before them briefly so they will read it, clearly, so they will appreciate it, picturesquely so they will remember it and, above all, accurately so they will be guided by its light.
quotes.author: Joseph Pulitzer

quotes.quote: Quality is determined by accuracy and completeness.
quotes.author: Larry Sanger

quotes.quote: Our mission is to report these horrors of war with accuracy and without prejudice.
quotes.author: Marie Colvin

quotes.quote: Whoever said that love is blind was dead wrong. Love is the only thing on this earth that lets us see each other with the remotest accuracy.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: No accurate thinker will judge another person by that which the other person's enemies say about him.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Well the way we perceive accuracy and what accuracy is statistically are really two different things.
quotes.author: Nate Silver

quotes.quote: Accuracy and clarity of statement are mutually exclusive.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: Insanity is often the logic of an accurate mind overtasked.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr

quotes.quote: Build, therefore, your own world. As fast as you conform your life to the pure idea in your mind, that will unfold its great proportions.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Listen, I don't know anything about polygraphs and I don't know how accurate they are, but I know they'll scare the hell out of people.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: In all pointed sentences, some degree of accuracy must be sacrificed to conciseness.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Everybody knows there is no fineness or accuracy of suppression; if you hold down one thing, you hold down the adjoining.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: In some instances, the accuracy of past-life memories can be objectively verified, sometimes with remarkable detail.
quotes.author: Stanislav Grof

quotes.quote: If observed facts of undoubted accuracy will not fit any of the alternatives it leaves open, the system itself is in need of reconstruction.
quotes.author: Talcott Parsons

quotes.quote: It is a rare man who can prevail in the face of comfort. Freedom is fragile and elusive, for rarely does the appreciation of it exceed the pleasure of being able to tell others what to do. There is but one tick on the accuracy scale between 'optimism' and 'denial.'
quotes.author: Terry Rossio

quotes.quote: The child who has been taught to make an accurate elevation, plan, and section of a pint pot has had an admirable training in accuracy of eye and hand.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: One should avoid carrying out an experiment requiring more than 10 percent accuracy.
quotes.author: Walther Nernst

quotes.quote: Fast is fine, but accuracy is everything. In a gunfight. You need to take your time in a hurry
quotes.author: Wyatt Earp

quotes.quote: Because of recent improvements in the accuracy of theoretical predictions based on large-scale ab initio quantum mechanical calculations, meaningful comparisons between theoretical and experimental findings have become possible.
quotes.author: Yuan T. Lee

quotes.quote: I will not deny but that the best apology against false accusers is silence and sufferance, and honest deeds set against dishonest words.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Too liberal self-accusations are generally but so many traps for acquittal with applause.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: When you have no basis for an argument, abuse the plaintiff.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: All accusation is of the devil, no matter where it comes from. It is just as dangerous to accuse others as it is to give the accuser room in your own life. The accuser gives no hope. God does not accuse us, but He does give us promptings that bring light and hope.
quotes.author: Esther Smith

quotes.quote: When one person makes an accusation, check to be sure he himself is not the guilty one. Sometimes it is those whose case is weak who make the most clamour.
quotes.author: Piers Anthony

quotes.quote: Neither let us be slandered from our duty by false accusations against us, nor frightened from it by menaces of destruction to the Government nor of dungeons to ourselves. Let us have faith that right makes might, and in that faith, let us, to the end, dare to do our duty as we understand it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Malice scorned, puts out itself; but argued, give a kind of credit to a false accusation.
quotes.author: Philip Massinger

quotes.quote: There is a 100% assurance that what your friend's enemy tells you about your friend is false. What your failure tells you about your passion is fake. Don't give up.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: One of the indictments of civilizations is that happiness and intelligence are so rarely found in the same person.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Even the false accusations of a person of dubious morality can taint the reputation of an upright servant.
quotes.author: Hock G. Tjoa

quotes.quote: Everyone is presumed good, and in doubtful cases the resolution should be for the accused.
quotes.author: Roman Law

quotes.quote: Be happy when you are blamed and accused wrongly, for then you have the chance to see all the bitter, hostile or self-pitying responses that your sinful soul wants to spew out as if these puny things could in any way defend you! Watch and see if any of these poisons come out of you when your spirit is pricked by an accusation. Only then can you see yourself as you are, and confess thy sin that is within you and forsake yourself again into the Lords care.
quotes.author: Teresa of Avila

quotes.quote: An indictment is not a conviction.
quotes.author: Howard Coble

quotes.quote: Before you condemn someone else for a wrongful act, check your behavior and see if you too, have committed an act similar or even worse than the act that person has done. Then you won't be in a position to judge.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: As in all moral panics, an accusation is enough to destroy a person's life. Hysteria trumps evidence.
quotes.author: Carol Tavris

quotes.quote: Before you abuse, criticize, and accuse walk a mile in my shoes.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: When we assign blame we are pointing the finger to who or what is responsible for a fault or for a wrong doing. We are trying to make others accountable. Blaming does not solve a problem it usually only makes people defensive.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: He that accuses all mankind of corruption ought to remember that he is sure to convict only one.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: People love as self-recognition what they hate as an accusation.
quotes.author: Elias Canetti

quotes.quote: The breath of accusation kills an innocent name, and leaves for lame acquittal the poor life, which is a mask without it.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Even doubtful accusations leave a stain behind them.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The accusation is always on the first page, and the retraction on page 19.
quotes.author: Paul Newman

quotes.quote: We must remember always that accusation is not proof and that conviction depends upon evidence and due process of law.
quotes.author: Edward Murrow

quotes.quote: Before someone lifts a finger at me, I make sure he washed his hands before.
quotes.author: Saurabh Monga

quotes.quote: When a man points a finger at someone else, he should remember that three of his fingers are pointing at himself.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Guilt has very quick ears to an accusation.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: It is not human nature we should accuse but the despicable conventions that pervert it.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Blame is the demonstrated lack of self-respect choosing to deposit one's negative actions onto others to reinforce one's view of being of good, fair, and approved.
quotes.author: Byron R. Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Accusations fit on a bumper sticker; the truth takes longer.
quotes.author: Michael Hayden

quotes.quote: It is just so much easier to accuse than to defend, as it is easier to inflict than to heal a wound.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: One against whom accusations, when made, are easily believed.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: Accusing the times is but excusing ourselves.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Not able to produce more accusations than your own weak-hinged fancy.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I need not be barren of accusations, he hath faults, with a surplus, to tire in repetition.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Start by calling something alleged, and you end by denying it altogether.
quotes.author: Hitchens

quotes.quote: Unorganized protocol to secure the spot / Unprotected and contamination of samples / Process unsynchronized in the investigation / Witnesses are in early hard accusations.
quotes.author: Herbert Guitang

quotes.quote: Questioned by accusations only business can answer done right...
quotes.author: Dwight Drummond

quotes.quote: I jumped to conclusions / making false accusations / I'm sorry for what I've done.
quotes.author: Maria Shaw

quotes.quote: The accuser of the brethren! / How fitting is the name! / Since the creation of the world / His business is the same; / Bringing false accusations, / Watching the halting of the saints, / And striking at the life.
quotes.author: Eliza Paul Kirkbride Gurney

quotes.quote: False accusations, I can't take back / My mouth was moving but you know that my mind was off track.
quotes.author: Robert Cray

quotes.quote: I'm tired of these accusations / Always fighting for a slight chance of innocence / What was the point of my demise? / Do I even get a chance to make a stand? / Will you ever let me share my side? / I'm guilty as charged.
quotes.author: Alive Enough

quotes.quote: Can't you admit the fault of your mind? / Why don't you come to grip with it? / All the denial causing more pain / Can't you see I'm sick of it?
quotes.author: Jimmy Cliff

quotes.quote: Lock your door rather than accuse your neighbor.
quotes.author: Lebanese Proverb

quotes.quote: God detests a man who rushes to accuse a neighbor.
quotes.author: Hebrew Proverb

quotes.quote: The fault-finder will find faults even in paradise.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Grace silences the voice of accusation and wipes all the evidence of guilt.
quotes.author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quotes.quote: I couldn't quite understand how an ordinary man's good qualities could become crushing accusations against a guilty man.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Everyone should experience a wrong accusation…if only to learn how not to be quick to accuse another.
quotes.author: Chukuwuneta Oby

quotes.quote: Don't conclude so fast, you may never know what is behind the fact you know!
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: Accusation reveals the character of the accuser more than the accused.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: We are all guilty of sin, error, and moments of sheer stupidity; none of us should be casting stones. The occasional arced pebble might be overlooked.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: So when they win, it's their hard work. And when they lose, it's their bad luck.
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: Do not cast away an honest man for a villain's accusation.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: If someone speaks badly of you, do not defend yourself against the accusations, but reply; "you obviously don't know about my other vices, otherwise you would have mentioned these as well.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Some people get dealt all the aces in life.
quotes.author: Anne Mallory

quotes.quote: Aces are larger than life and greater than mountains.
quotes.author: Mike Caro

quotes.quote: The key to acing a job interview is a killer résumé, a firm handshake, and, of course, a perfectly polished outfit.
quotes.author: Tanya Whelan

quotes.quote: Success is deliberate. It doesn't come as an accident. What you work for is what you achieve. Faith without work is a vain hope.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The most important thing you can do to achieve your goals is to make sure that as soon as you set them you immediately begin to create momentum.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: When your desires are strong enough you will appear to possess superhuman powers to achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: You can achieve the set-goals with passion, persistent with perseverance.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: When you believe it, you've created it, whatever it is.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Achieving meaningful goals requires that you commit your entire ass, not just one cheek.
quotes.author: Steve Pavlina

quotes.quote: Achieving a goal is nothing. The getting there is everything.
quotes.author: Jules Michelet

quotes.quote: A key to achieving success is to assemble a strong and stable management team.
quotes.author: Vivek Wadhwa

quotes.quote: To achieve greatness, feel grateful for what you have.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: To achieve, you need thought. You have to know what you are doing and that's real power.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: What you are prepared to do in order to achieve what you want is the only cost involved in achieving that goal.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Achieving a goal requires endurance and sacrifices beyond limitations.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: To achieve the impossible, you must attempt the absurd.
quotes.author: Jon R. Michaelsen

quotes.quote: If you want to achieve a high goal, you're going to have to take some chances.
quotes.author: Alberto Salazar

quotes.quote: That some achieve great success, is proof to all that others can achieve it as well.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

quotes.quote: If you have a dream, it's definitely achievable through hard work, through dedication, sacrifice, everything.
quotes.author: Carli Lloyd

quotes.quote: We must walk consciously only part way toward our goal and then leap in the dark to our success.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Great achievement requires personal force, determined spirit and self-confidence.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: We can achieve our goals either by human effort or by the power of God. The dependence on God's power is the best choice.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Begin somewhere. You cannot build a reputation on what you intend to do.
quotes.author: Liz Smith

quotes.quote: Those who believe that they are exclusively in the right are generally those who achieve something.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: If you believe in yourself, you can achieve your desired dream.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Who you are tomorrow begins with what you do today.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: You can achieve the goal with courage, confidence and commitment.
quotes.author: LollyDaskal

quotes.quote: Research indicates that the desire to achieve the skills associated with success is more highly correlated with achievement than the desire for success itself.
quotes.author: Marshall Goldsmith

quotes.quote: If achieving success were easy, more people would do it.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: For a man to achieve all that is demanded of him he must regard himself as greater than he is.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
quotes.author: Gail Devers

quotes.quote: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in you. Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: You can't achieve anything in life without a small amount of sacrifice.
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.quote: Make the most of what you have and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters. Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: We cannot achieve more in life than what we believe in our heart of hearts we deserve to have.
quotes.author: James R. Ball

quotes.quote: If you can achieve action, you will achieve happiness.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: We can achieve even more than we could expect if we try to be less distracted by the fuss of life and concentrate more on developing some qualities or characteristic of our soul and character.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Achievement seems to be connected with action. Successful men and women keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: No one has ever achieved greatness without dreams.
quotes.author: Roy Bennett

quotes.quote: Every achievement is a servitude. It compels us to a higher achievement.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: All achievements, all earned riches, have their beginning in an idea.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Our achievements speak for themselves. What we have to keep track of are our failures, discouragements and doubts.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Achievement has no color.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: If you want to achieve your goals, help others achieve theirs.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The value of achievement lies in the achieving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Our achievements of today are but the sum total of our thoughts of yesterday.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: To achieve the impossible; it is precisely the unthinkable that must be thought.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Take into account that great love and great achievements involve great risk.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: All great achievements require time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: You are the greatest achievement of your own life.
quotes.author: Sarah Rees Brennan

quotes.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Achievement is largely the product of steadily raising one's level of aspiration and expectation.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: Any great achievement is preceded by many difficulties and many lessons; great achievements are not possible without them.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Patience is not a virtue. It is an achievement.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Achievement results from work realizing ambition.
quotes.author: Adam Ant

quotes.quote: Only those who attempt the absurd can achieve the impossible.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Every great achievement is the victory of a flaming heart.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The most splendid achievement of all is the constant striving to surpass yourself and to be worthy of your own approval.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Dissatisfaction with possession and achievement is one of the requisites to further achievement.
quotes.author: John Hope

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the final achievement.
quotes.author: Frederic Chopin

quotes.quote: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Those who believe that they are exclusively in the right are generally those who achieve something.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: There is no great achievement that is not the result of patient working and waiting.
quotes.author: J. G. Holland

quotes.quote: Failures are finger posts on the road to achievement.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Without failure there is no achievement.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: People seem to think that life began with the achievement of personal independence.
quotes.author: Katharine Anthony

quotes.quote: To achieve something is better than not achieving.
quotes.author: Sam Winters

quotes.quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: That some achieve great success, is proof to all that others can achieve it as well.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Use missteps as stepping stones to deeper understanding and greater achievement.
quotes.author: Susan L. Taylor

quotes.quote: The only real limitation on your abilities is the level of your desires. If you want it badly enough, there are no limits on what you can achieve.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: An achievement is a bondage. It obliges one to a higher achievement.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: The Roots for true achievement lie in the will to become the best that you can become.
quotes.author: Harold Taylor

quotes.quote: Even a mistake may turn out to be the one thing necessary to a worthwhile achievement.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Man has always needed to believe in some form of a continuity of achievement.
quotes.author: Robert Vaughn

quotes.quote: Hard work is the foundation of all achievements, and no one ever succeeds without hard work.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Behind every great achievement is a dreamer of great dreams.
quotes.author: Robert K. Greenleaf

quotes.quote: A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Don't mistake activity with achievement.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: The achievement of one goal should be the starting point of another.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Every great achiever is inspired by a great mentor.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The achiever is the only individual who is truly alive.
quotes.author: George Allen Sr.

quotes.quote: Achievers don't submit to instant gratification; they invest in the long-term payoff.
quotes.author: Darren Hardy

quotes.quote: The real achievers are those who, in the dreary pit of sacrifice, still smile up at the goal.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Great achievers are driven, not so much by the pursuit of success, but by the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Larry Ellison

quotes.quote: To be a great achiever, you must first discover your main purpose of existing through feasible communication mode with your maker, the source of your destiny. This brings you a conviction to work with.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Achievers have a can-do attitude that sets them apart from mere dreamers. Achievers are sold out to success-no matter the obstacles-and they are willing to put forth the effort and pay the price of success.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Achievers are resolute in their goals and driven by determination. Discouragement is temporary, obstacles are overcome, and doubt is defeated, yielding to personal victory. You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals. Accept the challenges, so that you may feel the exhilaration of victory.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Achievers are those who have redefined impossible, changing what can't be done into a work in progress.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Achievers can almost literally taste success because they imagine their goals in such vivid detail. Setbacks only seem to add spice and favor to the final taste of victory.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: No one is fearless. The difference between achievers and everyone else is that they take action despite their fears.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: Achievers move forward at all times. Achievement is not a plateau, it's a beginning.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: The real achiever does one thing at a time.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: The highest achievers in the world have all succeeded because they mapped out their visions.
quotes.author: Darren Hardy

quotes.quote: A prophet or an achiever must never mind an occasional absurdity, it is an occupational risk.
quotes.author: Oswald Mosley

quotes.quote: One of the things you realize with a lot of high achievers: You have to figure out a way to make things their idea.
quotes.author: Hank Haney

quotes.quote: Achievers rarely, if ever, see a problem as permanent, while those who fail see even the smallest problems as permanent.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Confidence is a characteristic of a positive attitude. The greatest achievers and leaders remain confident regardless of circumstances.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: You care, you dare and you share; this is the unforgettable rule of every true believer and achiever.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Achievers are not born talented but they possess the, 'I can do it' attitude.
quotes.author: Gladys Bejani

quotes.quote: To become an expert achiever in any human activity, it takes practice... practice... practice.
quotes.author: Pranita P Deshpande

quotes.quote: High achievers tend to have major weaknesses. People without major weaknesses tend to be mediocre.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: High achievers dwell on what they do well and spend very little time evaluating themselves and their performances.
quotes.author: John Eliot

quotes.quote: One key quality of all global achievers is that, they keep improving day after day. They set standards that they keep surpassing year after year.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Every great achiever nurtures a positive mindset.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: One common thing about great achievers is that, they keep asking useful questions every day. They ask questions like; “What do I want and what do I need to do to get it?
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Every great achiever knows the power of motivation.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: No great achiever - even those who made it seem easy - ever succeeded without hard work.
quotes.author: Jonathan Sacks

quotes.quote: No high achiever ever woke up in the morning and said ‘let’s see what happens.’
quotes.author: Dan Miller

quotes.quote: No one is born achiever. Its all in attitude.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Achieving life is not the equivalent of avoiding death.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: You got to try and reach for the stars or try and achieve the unreachable.
quotes.author: Cathy Freeman

quotes.quote: A key to achieving success is to assemble a strong and stable management team.
quotes.author: Vivek Wadhwa

quotes.quote: There are countless ways ofÂ achievingÂ greatness, but any road toÂ achievingÂ one's maximum potential must be built on a bedrock of respect for the individual, a commitment to excellence, and a rejection of mediocrity.
quotes.author: Buck Rodgers

quotes.quote: ToÂ achieveÂ great things, two things are needed; a plan, and not quite enough time.
quotes.author: Leonard Bernstein

quotes.quote: What you are capable ofÂ achievingÂ is determined by your talent and ability. What you attempt to do is determined by your motivation. How well you do something is determined by your attitude.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: The first step toward making the workerÂ achievingÂ is to make work productive.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: If you want to reach a goal, you must 'see the reaching' in your own mind before you actually arrive at your goal.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: There will always be something higher for me to reach for, and as long as there is, I'll keep reaching.
quotes.author: David McNeill

quotes.quote: Nothing stops the man who desiresÂ toÂ achieve. Every obstacle is simply a courseÂ toÂ develop his achievement muscle. It's a strengthening of his powers of accomplishment.
quotes.author: Eric Butterworth

quotes.quote: If you wantÂ toÂ achieveÂ a high goal, you're goingÂ toÂ haveÂ toÂ take some chances.
quotes.author: Alberto Salazar

quotes.quote: ToÂ achieveÂ great things we must live as though we were never goingÂ toÂ die.
quotes.author: Marquis De Vauvenargues

quotes.quote: There are two ways of attaining an important end, force and perseverance; the silent power of the latter grows irresistible with time.
quotes.author: Sophie Swetchine

quotes.quote: The discipline you learn and character you build from setting andÂ achievingÂ a goal can be more valuable than the achievement of the goal itself.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: The thing that contributes to anyone's reaching the goal he wants is simple wanting that goal badly enough.
quotes.author: Charles E. Wilson

quotes.quote: To exercise at or near capacity is the best way I know of reaching a true introspective state. If you do it right, it can open all kinds of inner doors.
quotes.author: Al Oerter

quotes.quote: It is easierÂ toÂ achieveÂ a desired result in short pieces.
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: You cannot expectÂ toÂ achieveÂ new goals or move beyond your present circumstances unless you change.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Direct your energy toward achieving a goal, and tackle the problems with an emphasis on edging closer to a successful result.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: The greater danger for most of us lies not in setting our aim too high and falling short; but in setting our aim too low, and achieving our mark.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: The first rule ofÂ achievingÂ goodness is this: think only about self-perfection.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Having an aim is the key to achieving your best.
quotes.author: Henry J. Kaiser

quotes.quote: Having an aim is the key toÂ achievingÂ your best.
quotes.author: Henry J. Kaiser

quotes.quote: The formula forÂ achievingÂ a successful relationship is simple: you should treat all disasters as if they were trivialities but never treat a triviality as if it were a disaster.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: The three great essentials toÂ achieveÂ anything worth while are, first, hard work; second, stick-to-itiveness; third, common sense.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: If you wantÂ toÂ achieveÂ excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: ToÂ achieve, you need thought. You haveÂ toÂ know what you are doing and that's real power.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: If you want to achieve things in life, you've just got to do them, and if you're talented and smart, you'll succeed.
quotes.author: Juliana Hatfield

quotes.quote: If you want to achieve what you dream of achieving, whatever it may be, you're going to have to earn it.
quotes.author: Miles D. White

quotes.quote: There's nothing better than achieving your goals, whatever they might be.
quotes.author: Paloma Faith

quotes.quote: You have all the reason in the worldÂ toÂ achieveÂ your grandest dreams. Imagination plus innovation equals realization.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: The greatest barrier to someone achieving their potential is their denial of it.
quotes.author: Simon Travaglia

quotes.quote: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude fromÂ achievingÂ his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: For a manÂ toÂ achieveÂ all that is demanded of him he must regard himself as greater than he is.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: To achieve the impossible, it is precisely the unthinkable that must be thought.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: In order to achieve anything you must be brave enough to fail.
quotes.author: Kirk Douglas

quotes.quote: There is simply no substitute for hard work when it comes to achieving success.
quotes.author: Heather Bresch

quotes.quote: You can't achieve anything in life without a small amount of sacrifice
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.quote: You should never worry too much about achieving your goals, because in the long run you might not find yourself too happy when you get there.
quotes.author: Chad Channing

quotes.quote: You must not let your negative emotions distract you from achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Clay Clark

quotes.quote: Achieving a goal is nothing. The getting there is everything.
quotes.author: Jules Michelet

quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: What enables us to achieve our greatness contains the seeds of our destruction.
quotes.author: Jim Valvano

quotes.quote: Let us then be up and doing, with a heart for any fate; stillÂ achieving, still pursuing. Learn to labor and to wait.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: If nothing else, the act of reaching a milestone often serves to reveal a superstar's true nature.
quotes.author: Stephen Rodrick

quotes.quote: Achieving a goal requires endurance and sacrifices beyond limitations.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: There's so much leftÂ toÂ achieve, there's so much moreÂ toÂ do, there's so much that has not been done.
quotes.author: Blu Cantrell

quotes.quote: Sometimes if you want to achieve something great, there will be curveballs. You just have to dodge them every once in a while.
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.quote: As a rule, we find what we look for; we achieve what we get ready for.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: LSD is just a tool to turn us into what we are supposed to be.
quotes.author: Albert Hofmann

quotes.quote: If God dropped acid, would he see people?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Anger's like a battery that leaks acid right out of me and it starts from the heart 'til it reaches my outer me.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Memories are like stones, time and distance erode them like acid.
quotes.author: Ugo Betti

quotes.quote: All life is nucleic acid the rest is commentary.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Tragedy is like strong acid it dissolves away all but the very gold of truth.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: We were left with nothing because of a love like acid that ate its way through our entire family.
quotes.author: R D Ronald

quotes.quote: Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: First deal with your own tears; tomorrow do something about acid rain.
quotes.author: BettyJane Wylie

quotes.quote: Saying sulfates do not cause acid rain is the same as saying that smoking does not cause lung cancer.
quotes.author: Drew Lewis

quotes.quote: I thought, my God, this is like Buddy Guy on acid.
quotes.author: Eric Clapton

quotes.quote: Alienation is a form of living death. It is the acid of despair that dissolves society.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Hatred plays the same part in government as acid in chemistry.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: There are three side effects of acid: enhanced long-term memory, decreased short-term memory, and I forget the third.
quotes.author: Timothy Leary

quotes.quote: I never did acid, I am just so high anyway.
quotes.author: Cilla Black

quotes.quote: Loneliness becomes an acid that eats away at you.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Hate is like acid. It can damage the vessel in which it is stored & destroy the object on which it is poured.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: The acid test of any truth is found in whether it aids victims in their struggle to overcome victimisation.
quotes.author: James H. Cone

quotes.quote: Fear is an acid which is pumped into one's atmosphere. It causes mental, moral and spiritual asphyxiation, and sometimes death; death to energy and all growth.
quotes.author: Horace Fletcher

quotes.quote: Tragedy is like strong acid - it dissolves away all but the very gold of truth.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: If you've never seen an elephant ski, you've never been on acid.
quotes.author: Eddie Izzard

quotes.quote: The best way to get acid out of your body is to wash it out. The best way to wash it out is to provide plenty of water to do the job.
quotes.author: Robert O. Young

quotes.quote: Lies were like acid, corrosive, they could dissolve trust in a heartbeat.
quotes.author: Rob Thurman

quotes.quote: It’s hard to stay away from religion when you mess with acid.
quotes.author: Robert Stone

quotes.quote: One amino acid does not a protein make let alone a being.
quotes.author: Preston Cloud

quotes.quote: Throwing acid is wrong in some people's eyes.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carr

quotes.quote: Self pity is an acid which eats holes in happiness.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Real life isn't always going to be perfect or go our way, but the recurring acknowledgement of what is working in our lives can help us not only to survive but surmount our difficulties.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: Understanding is the first step to acceptance, and only with acceptance can there be recovery
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Life, she realized, so often became a determined, relentless avoidance of pain-of one's own, of other people's. But sometimes pain had to be acknowledged and even touched so that one could move into it and through it and past it. Or else be destroyed by it.
quotes.author: Mary Balogh

quotes.quote: Whatever you acknowledgement gains the legitimacy to exist within your world.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Embrace contradictions for they make up all of life:You will eternally be looking for yourself andseeking ways to lose yourself.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: Trouble will come soon enough, and when he does come receive him as pleasantly as possible. The more amiably you greet him, the sooner he will go away.
quotes.author: Artemus Ward

quotes.quote: When we acknowledge that all of life is sacred and that each act is an act of choice and therefore sacred, then life is a sacred dance lived consciously each moment. When we live at this level, we participate in the creation of a better world.
quotes.author: Scout Cloud Lee

quotes.quote: Acceptance of one's life has nothing to do with resignation; it does not mean running away from the struggle. On the contrary it means accepting it as it come. To accept is to say yes to life in its entirety.
quotes.author: Paul Tournier

quotes.quote: No one who achieves success does so without acknowledging the help of others. The wise and confident acknowledge this help with gratitude.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: We must accept life for what it actually is â€” a challenge to our quality without which we should never know of what stuff we are made, or grow to our full stature.
quotes.author: Ida R. Wylie

quotes.quote: Your first step towards perfection is acknowledging your imperfections.
quotes.author: Wahab H. Butt

quotes.quote: We only acknowledge small faults in order to make it appear that we are free from great ones.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Everyone needs acknowledgement. When we're kids, we need it from our parents. If you don't get love from your family, you're destroyed inside.
quotes.author: Carla Bruni

quotes.quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them; that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Acknowledgement is possession. When you acknowledge, think or have conviction in something, it actually will come true
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: The moment that judgement stops through acceptance of what it is, you are free of the mind. You have made room for love, for joy, for peace.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: We should feel empowered by where we came from and who we are, not hide it. It is important to acknowledge that everything we do affects our ancestors as much as they have affected us.
quotes.author: Lorin Morgan-Richards

quotes.quote: Acknowledge all of your small victories. They will eventually add up to something great.
quotes.author: Kara Goucher

quotes.quote: The acknowledgement of a single possibility can change everything.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: Acknowledgement is the only way to keep love alive.
quotes.author: Barry Long

quotes.quote: Acknowledging reality for myself was one thing. Having to explain what as happening - and what was going to happen - to another person was something else entirely. That would make it too real.
quotes.author: Gavin Extence

quotes.quote: We win half the battle when we make up our minds to take the world as we find it, including the thorns
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Acceptance of what has happened is the first step to overcoming the consequences of any misfortune.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: And while acknowledging the darkest and heaviest times we experience is important, we still need to spin the moment, paint it a different color, and transform it because positivity saves lives.
quotes.author: Debbie Lynn

quotes.quote: When someone is unable to recognize the truth spoken, this person will also in retrospect be too blind to perceive a reflected imbecility.
quotes.author: Dan Demarques

quotes.quote: Many people who helped me along my life journey and provided massive support, advice, time, and energy to help mold me into who I am.
quotes.author: Jadarius Dean

quotes.quote: Genius all over the world stands hand in hand, and one shock of recognition runs the whole circle round.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: I don't ask for your pity, but just your understanding,— no, not even that— no. Just for your recognition of me in you, and the enemy, time, in us all.
quotes.author: William Tennessee

quotes.quote: We find everywhere a clear recognition of the same truth...because of a general recognition of this truth, the question has seldom been presented to the courts.
quotes.author: David Josiah Brewer

quotes.quote: Recognition of the Supreme being is the first— the most basic—expression of Americanism.
quotes.author: Henry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: There are those who have earned the right to be recognized but never received recognition. Then three are tode recognized but never earned the recognition.
quotes.author: Keith Simmonds

quotes.quote: The minute you fixate on the recognition that 'This is 'it,' you are immediately bound hand and foot and cannot move around anymore. So as soon as it is given this recognition, nothing is right, whatever it may be. If you don't fixate on recognition, you can still be saved.
quotes.author: Fuyan Qingyuan

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is but a recognition, not a change at all.
quotes.author: Helen Schucman

quotes.quote: It is the delighted self-recognition of one's own absurdity, and a loving cynicism with respect to one's own pretentious.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: The mind has become so filled with that what contradicts this that even the truth has to await recognition.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: Recognition of the reality of evil necessarily relativizes the good, and the evil likewise, converting both into halves of a paradoxical whole.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: I like being well-known. The recognition is important; it gives me a sense of security.
quotes.author: Marisol

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving is recognition of a debt that cannot be paid. We express thanks, whether or not we are able otherwise to reimburse the giver.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Today, we have something which is a desire for individual recognition. We strive for recognition by trying to achieve perfection, and we deceive ourselves into calling the result heaven. We want whatever we do to be unique.
quotes.author: Bernard Leach

quotes.quote: Oh, my world / Tell me / Into which language / I would write / You might notice, / To recognize me?
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Knowledge is in the end based on acknowledgment.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: It is easy to acknowledge, but almost impossible to realize for long, that we are mirrors whose brightness, if we are bright, is wholly derived from the sun that shines upon us.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: We just have to have visibility. We have to have acknowledgment. We have to have accountability for how we treat one another.
quotes.author: Zachary Quinto

quotes.quote: Leaders don't look for recognition from others, leaders look for others to recognize.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Research has shown over and over again that the more you acknowledge your past successes, the more confident you become in taking on and successfully accomplishing new ones.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: To realize that you were mistaken, is just the acknowledgment, that you are wiser today than you were yesterday.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: The main thing I wanted to say, and thankfully it’s what most people say they get out of the book, is simply an acknowledgment that we do affect each other in ways we can’t predict.
quotes.author: Jay Asher

quotes.quote: Anytime you deny the acknowledgment of God you are undermining the entire basis for which our country exists.
quotes.author: Roy Moore

quotes.quote: Appreciation is the highest form of prayer, for it acknowledges the presence of good wherever you shine the light of your thankful thoughts.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: You can't heal what you don't acknowledge.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: When we express our gratitude, it grows.⁣
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: Appreciation has the amazing habit of bringing more reasons to be grateful for.
quotes.author: Isabelle Koldras

quotes.quote: The only valuable acknowledgment is the acknowledgment you grant yourself.
quotes.author: Dahi Tamara Koch

quotes.quote: Take pride in what you do every day. Give yourself the acknowledgment for how far you have come on this journey of learning and life.
quotes.author: Purvi Raniga

quotes.quote: Friends and acquaintances are the surest passport to fortune.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Acquaintances are always abundant; friends are always scarce!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quotes.quote: A new acquaintance is like a new book. I prefer it, even if bad, to a classic.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: We need two kinds of acquaintances, one to complain to, while to the others we boast.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: An acquaintance that begins with a compliment is sure to develop into a real friendship.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Acquaintance. A person whom we know well enough to borrow from, but not well enough to lend to.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: In meeting again after a separation, acquaintances ask after our outward life, friends after our inner life.
quotes.author: Marie Von Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: The difference between a friend and an acquaintance is that a friend helps; an acquaintance merely advises.
quotes.author: Bob Edwards

quotes.quote: Acquaintances represent a source of social power, and the more acquaintances you have the more powerful you are.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: After an acquaintance of ten minutes many women will exchange confidences that a man would not reveal to a lifelong friend.
quotes.author: Page Smith

quotes.quote: If a man does not make new acquaintances as he advances through life, he will soon find himself left alone. A man, Sir, should keep his friendship in constant repair.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Acquaintance softens prejudice.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Intimate acquaintance must precede real friendship.
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.quote: Acquaintance lessens fame.
quotes.author: Claudius

quotes.quote: A long novitiate of acquaintance should precede the vows of friendship.
quotes.author: Henry Bolingbroke

quotes.quote: When you're rich, you don't have friends; you just have endless acquaintances.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Acquaintances we meet, enjoy, and can easily leave behind; but friendship grows deep roots.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr

quotes.quote: The mere process of growing old together will make the slightest acquaintance seem a bosom friend.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: Acquaintance is a degree of friendship called slight when its object is poor and obscure, and intimate when he is rich and famous.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: We may have many acquaintances, but we can have but few friends; this made Aristotle say that he that hath many friends hath none.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: A slender acquaintance with the world must convince every man that actions, not words, are the true criterion of the attachment of friends.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: We shall say that we have acquaintance with anything of which we are directly aware, without the intermediary of any process of inference of any knowledge of truths.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: It is easy to make acquaintances, but very difficult to shake them off, however irksome and unprofitable they are found, after we have once committed ourselves to them.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: It is expedient to have an acquaintance with those who have looked into the world; who know men, understand business, and can give you good intelligence and good advice when they are wanted.
quotes.author: Thomas Hartwell Horne

quotes.quote: An acquaintance had become a lover, might become a husband, but would retain all that she had noted in the acquaintance; and love must confirm an old relation rather than reveal a new one.
quotes.author: E M Forster

quotes.quote: An acquaintance merely enjoys your company, a fair-weather companion flatters when all is well, a true friend has your best interests at heart and the pluck to tell you what you need to hear.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: There is a wide difference between general acquaintance and companionship. You may salute a man and exchange compliments with him daily, yet know nothing of his character, his inmost tastes arid feelings.
quotes.author: William Matthews

quotes.quote: Chance acquaintances are sometimes the most memorable, for brief friendships have such definite starting and stopping points that they take on a quality of art, of a whole thing, which cannot be broken or spoiled.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: It's very good for an idea to be commonplace. The important thing is that a new idea should develop out of what is already there so that it soon becomes an old acquaintance. Old acquaintances aren't by any means always welcome, but at least one can't be mistaken as to who or what they are.
quotes.author: Penelope Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Without an acquaintance with the rules of propriety, it is impossible for the character to be established.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The slightest acquaintance with history shows that powerful republics are the most warlike and unscrupulous of nations.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: It is evident that an acquaintance with natural laws means no less than an acquaintance with the mind of God therein expressed.
quotes.author: James Prescott Joule

quotes.quote: People are already disappointed by their acquaintances, they can not handle anymore hate from strangers, so show some instantaneous kindness and forgiveness to them.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: A child without an acquaintance of some kind with a classic of literature … suffers from that impoverishment for the rest of his life. No later intimacy is like that of the first.
quotes.author: Lizette Woodworth Reese

quotes.quote: Acting is the least mysterious of all crafts. Whenever we want something from somebody or when we want to hide something or pretend, we're acting. Most people do it all day long.
quotes.author: Marlon Brando

quotes.quote: Acting is a marvelous profession ... If you can spend enough time playing other people, you don't have to think too much about your own character and motivations.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz
