quotes.quote: Acting is a sport. On stage you must be ready to move like a tennis player on his toes. Your concentration must be keen, your reflexes sharp; your body and mind are in top gear, the chase is on. Acting is energy. In the theatre people pay to see energy.
quotes.author: Clive Swift

quotes.quote: Acting deals with very delicate emotions. It is not putting up a mask. Each time an actor acts he does not hide; he exposes himself.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Acting is magical. Change your look and your attitude, and you can be anyone.
quotes.author: Alicia Witt

quotes.quote: Acting is all about honesty. If you can fake that, you've got it made.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Acting is the expression of a neurotic impulse. It's a bum's life. Quitting acting, that's the sign of maturity.
quotes.author: Marlon Brando

quotes.quote: Acting is a nice childish profession - pretending you're someone else and, at the same time, selling yourself.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: Acting is not about being famous, it's about exploring the human soul.
quotes.author: Annette Bening

quotes.quote: Film acting is one of the only industries where you're criticized for working hard. In any other industry, it's considered a quality and something to behold.
quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

quotes.quote: Acting is a question of absorbing other people's personalities and adding some of your own experience.
quotes.author: Paul Newman

quotes.quote: Great acting is not easy; anyone who says it is is either shallow or a charlatan. And one of the hardest things about acting is admitting that it is hard
quotes.author: Robert Cohen

quotes.quote: Acting is half shame, half glory. Shame at exhibiting yourself, glory when you can forget yourself.
quotes.author: John Gielgud

quotes.quote: Acting is not being emotional, but being able to fully express emotion.
quotes.author: Kate Reid

quotes.quote: Acting is a spiritual quest to touch human beings.
quotes.author: Larry Moss

quotes.quote: Acting provides the fulfillment of never being fulfilled. You're never as good as you'd like to be. So there's always something to hope for.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Acting is nothing more or less than playing. The idea is to humanize life.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Acting doesn't bring anything to a text. On the contrary, it detracts from it.
quotes.author: Marguerite Duras

quotes.quote: Acting is not about dressing up. Acting is about stripping bare. The whole essence of learning lines is to forget them so you can make them sound like you thought of them that instant.
quotes.author: Glenda Jackson

quotes.quote: I must say that acting was good training for the political life that lay ahead of us.
quotes.author: Nancy Reagan

quotes.quote: Acting is not about being someone different. It's finding the similarity in what is apparently different, then finding myself in there.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: As always, with acting, you can't be too self-conscious. You shouldn't care about what people are thinking about you at the time because they're not caring about you, they're caring about the character.
quotes.author: Freddie Highmore

quotes.quote: The art of acting consists in keeping people from coughing.
quotes.author: Ralph Richardson

quotes.quote: People acting in their own self-interest is the fuel for all the discovery, innovation, and prosperity that powers the world.
quotes.author: John Stossel

quotes.quote: Acting is like a Halloween mask that you put on.
quotes.author: River Phoenix

quotes.quote: Acting is happy agony.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Acting is a matter of giving away secrets.
quotes.author: Ellen Barkin

quotes.quote: I really think that effective acting has to do literally with the movement of molecules.
quotes.author: Charlotte Whitton

quotes.quote: Acting is standing up naked and turning around very slowly.
quotes.author: Rosalind Russell

quotes.quote: Conflict is what creates drama. The more conflict actors find, the more interesting the performance.
quotes.author: Michael Shurtleff

quotes.quote: Acting is behaving truthfully under imaginary circumstances.
quotes.author: Sanford Meisner

quotes.quote: The actor has to develop his body. The actor has to work on his voice. But the most important thing the actor has to work on is his mind.
quotes.author: Stella Adler

quotes.quote: Acting requires faith. You just have to believe that you are the person you’re playing and that what is happening is happening to you.
quotes.author: Ivana Chubbuck

quotes.quote: The thing I like about acting is being able to lose yourself completely in someone else. I’m not that comfortable when I get recognised.
quotes.author: Ellen Page

quotes.quote: The difference between acting and reacting is that in a bad picture, you see them acting all over the place. In a good picture, they react in a logical way to a situation they're in, so the audience can identify with the actors.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: I merely try to act naturally. If I start acting phony on the screen, you start looking at me instead of feeling with me.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: Acting... is the ability to react to imaginary stimuli; and its essential elements remain the twin requisites... 'unusual sensitivity and extraordinary intelligence,' this latter not in the form of book learning but in the ability to comprehend the workings of the human soul. The essential problems in acting—does the actor 'feel' or does he merely imitate? Should he speak naturally or rhetorically? What is natural? etc.—are as old as acting itself. They derive not from the realistic movement but from the nature of the acting process.
quotes.author: Lee Strasberg

quotes.quote: Of all the arts, I think acting must be the least concrete, the most solitary. One gains experience continually, both at rehearsals and in performance, from the presence of a large assembly of people. These people are essential to the development of one's performance—they are the living canvas upon which one hopes to paint the finished portrait which one has envisaged.
quotes.author: Sir John Gielgud

quotes.quote: Acting is horrible, painful, and yet also intoxicating and emotionally liberating.
quotes.author: Jodie Foster

quotes.quote: Acting is an intimate thing. You entrust your partner with something very private, a tremendous bond develops and that intimacy is like love.
quotes.author: Kevin Kline

quotes.quote: Acting provides the fulfillment of never being fulfilled. You're never as good as you'd like to be. So there's always something to hope for.
quotes.author: Glenda Jackson

quotes.quote: Acting is simply my way of investigating human nature and having fun at the same time.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: Acting is the ability to dream on cue.
quotes.author: Sir Ralph Richardson

quotes.quote: Acting is a sad business where you crawl from hope to hope.
quotes.author: Walter Slezak

quotes.quote: Acting is a leap of faith. There has to be that moment where you go, I give myself to ... the spirit.
quotes.author: Christopher Walken

quotes.quote: Thrust into my profession without any training whatsoever, I had to just flounder and just find my way. It was an agonizing experience. It's like jumping off a diving board in the Olympic contest without knowing how to swim or dive, and I just had to find my way. So one day, I said to Jimmy Cagney, 'Jimmy, what is acting?' and he said, 'I don't know.' He said, 'All I can tell you is whatever you say, mean it,' and I thought that marvelous counsel. It is key. Wonderful.
quotes.author: Olivia de Havilland

quotes.quote: Acting is a great panacea. I can turn the world to right, all the sad and distressing things that happen in real life can be transformed into something soothing and great.
quotes.author: Sir Derek Jacobi

quotes.quote: Like all actors, I really just reveal my shadow every time I work. And the shadow is all the pain, shame, anger and rage, the creativity and sexuality.
quotes.author: John Cusack

quotes.quote: Acting is so pure. It's not necessarily all the mundane moments that we have in real life. It's like condensed drama. It's all the exciting moments in two hours. Your senses have to be heightened.
quotes.author: Sam Rockwell

quotes.quote: Actors are people who were good at playing 'Let's Pretend' as kids and now we're getting money to play house.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: They say that all great actors are crazy. Life has driven them mad, but that madness gives them a well of opportunity to draw experiences from 'til they can relate to what seems obscure and far away and out of reach.
quotes.author: Terrence Howard

quotes.quote: Acting is only the second oldest profession, but society has always looked on both trades with equal suspicion.
quotes.author: Charlton Heston

quotes.quote: An actor is akin to the magician—an illusionist in the profession of making things look real.
quotes.author: Brian Adams

quotes.quote: Being the wood that the nail banged into doesn't feel good—that's what acting is.
quotes.author: Sean Penn

quotes.quote: Sometimes you want to tell the audience, "If you only knew what we've been going through!"
quotes.author: Burt Lancaster

quotes.quote: Acting is the most minor of gifts and not a very high-class way to earn a living. Shirley Temple could do it at the age of four.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: The mere mechanical technique of acting can be taught, but the spirit that is to give life to lifeless forms must be born in a man. No dramatic college can teach its pupils to think or to feel.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Without wonder and insight, acting is just a trade. With it, it becomes creation.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: Acting deals with very delicate emotions. It is not putting up a mask. Each time an actor acts he does not hide; he exposes himself.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.quote: Acting is like prize fighting. The downtown gyms are smelly, but that's where the champions are.
quotes.author: Kirk Douglas

quotes.quote: The basic essential of a great actor is that he loves himself in acting.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: You spend all your life trying to do something they put people in asylums for.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: Acting is a masochistic form of exhibitionism. It is not quite the occupation of an adult.
quotes.author: Laurence Olivier

quotes.quote: A painter paints, a musician plays, a writer writes - but a movie actor waits.
quotes.author: Mary Astor

quotes.quote: To grasp the full significance of life is the actor's duty, to interpret it is his problem, and to express it his dedication.
quotes.author: Marlon Brando

quotes.quote: Acting is just making stuff up. But, that's okay. Life is a rehearsal. Life is an improvisation.
quotes.author: Marlon Brando

quotes.quote: We could change the whole story of love / Same old play I'm getting tired / No more acting these predictable roles / Just us living / Unconditional love.
quotes.author: Esperanza Spalding

quotes.quote: Actions speak louder than words.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Deeds are fruits; words are leaves.
quotes.author: English (on words and deeds)

quotes.quote: Great minds have purposes, others have wishes.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Do not be like the cat who wanted a fish but was afraid to get his paws wet.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Nothing is easy to the unwilling.
quotes.author: Gaelic (on attitude)

quotes.quote: Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
quotes.author: Chaucer

quotes.quote: The reward of a thing well done, is to have done it.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Willing is not enough, we must do.
quotes.author: Johann Von Goethe

quotes.quote: It's the action, not the fruit of the action, that's important. You have to do the right thing. It may not be in your power, may not be in your time, that there will be any fruit. But that doesn't mean you stop doing the right thing. You may never know what results come from your action. But if you do nothing, there will be no result.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The superior man is modest in his speech but exceeds in his actions.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Never confuse motion with action.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Be content to act, and leave the talking to others.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: I do not believe in a fate that falls on men however they act; but I do believe in a fate that falls on them unless they act.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: I never worry about action, but only inaction.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Action is the last resource of those who know not how to dream.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Action may not always bring happiness. But there is no happiness without action.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: We do not need, and indeed never will have, all the answers before we act. It is often through taking action that we can discover some of them.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bunch

quotes.quote: Take time to deliberate, but when the time for action has arrived, stop thinking and go in.
quotes.author: Napolean Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Well done is better than well said.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Always do more than is required of you.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Action hangs, as it were, dissolved in speech, in thoughts whereof speech is the shadow; and precipitates itself therefrom. The kind of speech in a man betokens the kind of action you will get from him.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Everywhere in life, the true question is not what we gain, but what we do.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.quote: Whatever you do may seem insignificant to you, but it is most important that you do it.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Make up your mind to act decidedly and take the consequences. No good is ever done in this world by hesitation.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: For purposes of action, nothing is more useful than narrowness of thought combined with energy of will.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Action is the antidote to despair.
quotes.author: Joan Baez

quotes.quote: We are all inclined to judge ourselves by our ideals; others, by their acts.
quotes.author: Harold Nicolson

quotes.quote: A good action is never lost; it is a treasure laid up and guarded for the doer's need.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.quote: Everything you want is out there waiting for you to ask. Everything you want also wants you. But you have to take action to get it.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: The vision must be followed by the venture. It is not enough to stare up the steps - we must step up the stairs.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: Men acquire a particular quality by constantly acting in a particular way. We become just by performing just action, temperate by performing temperate actions, brave by performing brave action.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The only correct actions are those that demand no explanation and no apology.
quotes.author: Red Auerbach

quotes.quote: It is easy to sit up and take notice. What is difficult is getting up and taking action.
quotes.author: Al Batt

quotes.quote: Nothing happens until something moves.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Sally Berger

quotes.quote: The world can only be grasped by action, not by contemplation. The hand is the cutting edge of the mind.
quotes.author: Jacob Bronowski

quotes.quote: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Russell C. Taylor

quotes.quote: Your words become your actions, your actions become your habits.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The universe doesn’t give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: You need to know it's your actions that will make you a good person, not desire.
quotes.author: Matthew Quick

quotes.quote: I have always thought the actions of men the best interpreters of their thoughts.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: I am not imposed upon by fine words; I can see what actions mean.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: People are not who they say but rather who their actions reveal them to be. Be smart about it.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: Your actions must reflect your goals in order to achieve true success.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: If your actions don't live up to your words, you have nothing to say.
quotes.author: DaShanne Stokes

quotes.quote: Thoughts do more. Words to much. Actions do much more.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: When the actions becomes frequent than the words, success becomes heavier than the dreams. Do more, say less.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The future is greatly different than your life now, the actions that you take must also be greatly different. You cannot do the same thing and get something different.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Actions always have consequences!
quotes.author: Joel Coen

quotes.quote: Think about it this way--our actions speak truth our words cannot.
quotes.author: Suzanne Hayes

quotes.quote: The smallest actions reveal the most about a heart's true color, so pay attention to them. Actions are the true words of the heart.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Our inactions, like our actions, define who we are and what are true values are.
quotes.author: Richard H. Eyster

quotes.quote: After a while, you realize that putting your actions where your mouth makes you less likely to have to put your money where your mouth is.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: We can’t sufficiently define love with our words. Therefore, the only option that we’re left with is to show it in our actions. And if our actions don’t show it, the words don’t matter. Neither does anything else.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Show the youth the consequences of their actions and why they should choose wisely.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Consequences are connected to our actions. Therefore, it is crucial to be ever conscious and aware of what we think, do, and say. Those thoughts, action, and words will literally define who we are.
quotes.author: Michael G Sawaya

quotes.quote: Actions speak louder than words, especially the actions of bringing the loudspeaker closer to your mouth!
quotes.author: Ankala Subbarao

quotes.quote: Actions really are louder than words, judge everyone by their ability to be as good as her/his word. Give a second chance once.
quotes.author: Tracy Malone

quotes.quote: Make your words follow your actions and not the other way around.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Our actions must be directed, tempered and brought under the full authority of a greater calling.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: You have that choice to do actions which make closer to your goals in life.
quotes.author: Purvi Raniga

quotes.quote: Your actions will show if your words are true.
quotes.author: Lidia Longorio

quotes.quote: The future is only as bright and as wonderful as the dreams and actions that you create.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: The actions of an adult are clearly distinguishable from that of a baby. He clears every doubt without a doubt thereby proving beyond all reasonable and unreasonable doubts that his maturity is not superficial.
quotes.author: Vincent Okay Nwachukwu

quotes.quote: If you are not happy today, it is because you have not performed the right actions at the right time in the past.
quotes.author: Awdhesh Singh

quotes.quote: Only when one is free to choose, one can be responsible for one’s actions.
quotes.author: Et Imperatrix Noctem

quotes.quote: There are situations that make you ask questions and actions that give you answers.
quotes.author: Carlos Wallace

quotes.quote: Certain emotions drive certain thoughts and actions. Knowing your emotional drivers is essential to regulate behavior.
quotes.author: Krishna Saagar Rao

quotes.quote: All actions begin with a thought.
quotes.author: Jim Genovese

quotes.quote: Think like a man of action, and act like a man of thought.
quotes.author: Henri L. Bergson

quotes.quote: Your actions are loud that I can't hear what you're saying.
quotes.author: Godfrey Thomas

quotes.quote: There are risks and costs to a program of action. But they are far less than the long-range risks and costs of comfortable inaction.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The one thing you say you will do require thousands of actions.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: To map out a course of action and follow it to an end requires courage.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Actions are divided into two categories - physical actions and mental actions.
quotes.author: Zett Why

quotes.quote: Others only see a tiny part of our actions, because we usually hide our real thoughts and their intentions in realizing and avoiding possible complications.
quotes.author: Zett Why

quotes.quote: All that happens to us is a direct consequence of our actions and the choices we have made.
quotes.author: Zett Why

quotes.quote: Take responsibility for your actions, and bring in the fear of death as a lawyer.
quotes.author: Zett Why

quotes.quote: A defeated mindset will never produce winning actions.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Margo

quotes.quote: If people remembered that they must reap the negative verbal attacks and spiteful actions done against others, I believe many of their words and actions would be different.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Margo

quotes.quote: Trying to "incorporate" the likeness and actions of others.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Margo

quotes.quote: Actions are also contagious.
quotes.author: I. C. Robledo

quotes.quote: This is about how much I love you. Theres no words or actions that could ever show.
quotes.author: Kayla Bailey Jay

quotes.quote: To see who were their friends or foes, and how our actions fell or rose;
quotes.author: Matthew Prior

quotes.quote: It’s feelin’ kind an’ gentle to everything that’s weak, and doin’ jus’ sich actions as nearly seem to speak.
quotes.author: Dame Mary Gilmore

quotes.quote: Stand for what you believe, speak less and let actions define you.
quotes.author: Beverley Childs

quotes.quote: Your thoughts will become your actions.
quotes.author: I. C. Robledo

quotes.quote: Your actions will become reaction in others - and those reactions will mimic the original action.
quotes.author: I. C. Robledo

quotes.quote: Our default actions are likely to fall back to what we have seen our parents do.
quotes.author: I. C. Robledo

quotes.quote: I have taken great care not to laugh at human actions, not to weep at them, not to hate them, but to understand them.
quotes.author: James Owen

quotes.quote: We must intentionally build more character from our actions so that we can inject more character into our world.
quotes.author: Jason B. Cunningham

quotes.quote: Don't assume that the inevitable will occur by chance, for our actions and words are not meaningless exercises of free will.
quotes.author: Jason B. Cunningham

quotes.quote: One's words will always matter, but one's actions are the better indicator of the character beneath one's skin.
quotes.author: Jason B. Cunningham

quotes.quote: Our thoughts determine our actions.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: A man who did not leave a mark in actions should try to leave a mark in words; but when you fail in both you shall be considered the most miserable.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: A man with so many words and does not have so many actions, let the wise be afraid of him.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: The largeness of a man's heart is determined by his actions.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: Much discussion without actions does not make a man a warrior.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: It is not what a person says that should be heard but the observation of the actions that surrounds his words.
quotes.author: Beverley Childs

quotes.quote: There can be no activist judges from any political party.
quotes.author: Mauricio Macri

quotes.quote: Being an activist and an artist - those two things should go together. You should allow the artistic sensibility to control some of your activism, but never should it be allowed to paralyze you.
quotes.author: Bill Ayers

quotes.quote: Every moment is an organizing opportunity, every person a potential activist, every minute a chance to change the world.
quotes.author: Dolores Huerta

quotes.quote: An activist is one who is actively involved in creating community, whether that is locally in their neighborhood or internationally. It is an admirable quality.
quotes.author: Jasmine Guy

quotes.quote: Being an activist is about getting things done. It's not about standing around shaking your fist in anger.
quotes.author: Christine Quinn

quotes.quote: Activists need to get the facts right. One of the big assets we have on our side is the truth, and we lose credibility and power if w e're loose with that.
quotes.author: Annie Leonard

quotes.quote: Most people who are activists and are concerned about issues get their information from sources which reinforce their opinions and give them the facts that they want to hear.
quotes.author: Barney Frank

quotes.quote: As an activist, you gotta pick something that's particularly interesting to you and go for it - because there's no shortage of things to do. And it's sort of a long-term commitment. Activism is for life.
quotes.author: Patrick Califia

quotes.quote: The activist is not the person who says the river is dirty. The activist is the person who cleans up the river
quotes.author: H. Ross Perot

quotes.quote: As animal rights activists, we have the duty to fight for the animal to live, not die.
quotes.author: Shane Barbi

quotes.quote: Activist government overreach and ongoing economic stagnation have shown us why Washington should not try to displace what is best left to civil society.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.quote: The activist is not the man who says the river is dirty. The activist is the man who cleans up the river.
quotes.author: Ross Perot

quotes.quote: Activists and geeks, standing together, are demonstrating powers beyond the reach of government control.
quotes.author: Barton Gellman

quotes.quote: Activists can get very preachy about things. It's more about understanding people's own experiences and tapping into them.
quotes.author: Duncan Green

quotes.quote: There are all the activist groups on every imaginable topic - solidarity groups, environmental and feminist groups - sectors of these movements do very valuable work.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Activists measure progress against the standard of perfection, or at least the most perfect possible choice. Historians gauge progress against what came before it.
quotes.author: Jonathan Chait

quotes.quote: When activists need a pretext to justify their violence, they always find it.
quotes.author: Charb

quotes.quote: Nothing in the world is more dangerous than sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: The work of the political activist inevitably involves a certain tension between the requirement that position be taken on current issues as they arise and the desire that one's contributions will somehow survive the ravages of time.
quotes.author: Angela Y. Davis

quotes.quote: An activist is someone who makes an effort to see problems that are not being addressed and then makes an effort to make their voice heard. Sometimes there are so many things that it's almost impossible to make your voice heard in every area, but you can sure try.
quotes.author: Joanne Woodward

quotes.quote: Don't be a witness. Be an activist.
quotes.author: DaShanne Stokes

quotes.quote: Any war that requires the suspension of reason as a necessity for support is a bad war.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: Activism begins with you, Democracy begins with you, get out there, get active! Tag, you're it
quotes.author: Thom Hartmann

quotes.quote: You must become an activist if you are going to live the natural life.
quotes.author: Clarissa Pinkola Estes

quotes.quote: If you are an activist, you have to stay active on a daily basis.
quotes.author: Iman Abdulmajid

quotes.quote: It's useful for activists just to be out there to keep you mindful and not get complacent, even if ultimately you think some of their criticism is misguided.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: An activist is someone who cannot help but fight for something. That person is not usually motivated by a need for power or money or fame, but in fact is driven slightly mad by some injustice, some cruelty, some unfairness, so much so that he or she is compelled by some internal moral engine to act to make it better.
quotes.author: Eve Ensler

quotes.quote: It's funny how social activists usually protest against the only things that have a credible chance of achieving the activists' goals.
quotes.author: Craig Reucassel

quotes.quote: CharacterÂ actorsÂ are becoming a thing of the past. They're just going by the wayside. They're just cutting through that caliber of acting.
quotes.author: Matthew Lillard

quotes.quote: A film actor is just a victim of directors and editors.
quotes.author: Helena Bonham Carter

quotes.quote: An actor is supposed to be a sensitive instrument.Â
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: People thinkÂ actorsÂ have such glamorous lives, but the truth isÂ actorsÂ go where nobody wants to go.
quotes.author: Juliette Binoche

quotes.quote: Actors are one family over the entire world.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: But allÂ actorsÂ go through the process, it's hit and miss, you have achievement and failure.
quotes.author: Thomas Haden Church

quotes.quote: An actor should always let humility outweigh ambition.
quotes.author: Anna Kendrick

quotes.quote: The greatÂ actorsÂ are the luminous ones. They are the great conductors of the stage.
quotes.author: Ethel Barrymore

quotes.quote: There are two types of actors: those who say they don't want to be famous, and those who are liars.
quotes.author: Kevin Bacon

quotes.quote: An actor's course is set even before he's out of the cradle.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: The key to every actor is deep, deep insecurity.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: And once you cease to be a real person, you stop being a good actor.
quotes.author: Scott Speedman

quotes.quote: MostÂ actorsÂ are either a shower of bloody scruffs or think they should dress like Hamlet off stage.
quotes.author: Martin Freeman

quotes.quote: ActorsÂ search for rejection. If they don't get it they reject themselves.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: The good thing about being an actor, and the gift of being an actor, is that you are beautifully forced to see the world with different eyes.
quotes.author: Javier Bardem

quotes.quote: Trying to be a good actor has to be involved with placing yourself imaginatively in different people's circumstances.
quotes.author: Paul Bettany

quotes.quote: Actors cannot choose the manner in which they are born. Consequently, it is the one gesture in their lives completely devoid of self-consciousness.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: The bestÂ actorsÂ do not let the wheels show.
quotes.author: Henry Fonda

quotes.quote: SomeÂ actorsÂ couldn't figure out how to withstand the constant rejection. They couldn't see the light at the end of the tunnel.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.quote: It's theÂ actorsÂ who are prepared to make fools of themselves who are usually the ones who come to mean something to the audience.
quotes.author: Christian Bale

quotes.quote: Show me a great actor and I'll show you a lousy husband. Show me a great actress, and you've seen the devil.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: Only a great actor finds the difficulties of the actor's art infinite.
quotes.author: Ellen Terry

quotes.quote: The best actors instinctively feel out what the other actors need, and they just accommodate it.
quotes.author: Christopher Nolan

quotes.quote: To be an actor, a true actor, you have to be brokenhearted.
quotes.author: Shia LaBeouf

quotes.quote: A good actor is somebody who can be truthful and fascinating and interesting and enlightening.
quotes.author: Bruce Davison

quotes.quote: The actor cannot afford to look only to his own life for all his material nor pull strictly from his own experience to find his acting choices and feelings.
quotes.author: Stella Adler

quotes.quote: Every actor has a natural animosity toward every other actor, present or absent, living or dead.
quotes.author: Louise Brooks

quotes.quote: As an actor, you are aware of how a role can seep into your real life.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.quote: He who is incapable of feeling strong passions, of being shaken by anger, of living in every sense of the word, will never be a good actor.
quotes.author: Sarah Bernhardt

quotes.quote: There are two main jobs in acting - the first one is to be a good actor, and the second one is to convince everyone that you're a good actor.
quotes.author: Laurence Fox

quotes.quote: One of the best things about being an actor is that it's a meritocracy.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.quote: No good actor ever stops learning. He is constantly evolving.
quotes.author: Mahesh Babu

quotes.quote: There's nothing more boring thanÂ actorsÂ talking about acting.
quotes.author: James Caan

quotes.quote: ActorsÂ who say they can dive inside a character are either schizophrenic or lying.
quotes.author: Bruce Campbell

quotes.quote: The actor creates with his own flesh and blood all those things which all the arts try in some way to describe.
quotes.author: Lee Strasberg

quotes.quote: Any good actor has to have a good sense of humour, too; they have to be able to manipulate people.
quotes.author: Chevy Chase

quotes.quote: Working with a bunch ofÂ actorsÂ is like trying to tune each violin.
quotes.author: Patrice Leconte

quotes.quote: That's one of the fun parts of becoming an actor: you can become whoever you want to be.
quotes.author: Michael B. Jordan

quotes.quote: A good actor must never be in love with anyone but himself.
quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

quotes.quote: An actor really is a kind of intermediary between an audience and the piece, whether it's a play or movie.
quotes.author: Christopher Walken

quotes.quote: ActorsÂ worry about bad breath, weight, receding hairlines and why their leading lady looks like their daughter.
quotes.author: Matthew Ashford

quotes.quote: An actor must interpret life, and in order to do so must be willing to accept all the experiences life has to offer. In fact, he must seek out more of life than life puts at his feet.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: ActorsÂ are able to trick themselves into treating anything as if it's fantastic. It's a kind of madness really.
quotes.author: Tom Baker

quotes.quote: The actor has to develop his body. The actor has to work on his voice. But the most important thing the actor has to work on is his mind.
quotes.author: Stella Adler

quotes.quote: To be an actor you have to be a child.
quotes.author: Paul Newman

quotes.quote: To be a good actor you have to feel life and observe life.
quotes.author: Lane Garrison

quotes.quote: ActorsÂ must practice restraint, else think what might happen in a love scene.
quotes.author: Cedric Hardwicke

quotes.quote: ActorsÂ take risks all the time. We put ourselves on the line. It is creative to be able to interpret someone's words and breathe life into them.
quotes.author: Patty Duke

quotes.quote: To be a good actor you have to be something like a criminal, to be willing to break the rules to strive for something new.
quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

quotes.quote: An actor is part illusionist, part artist, part ham.Â
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The thing about acting is you don't want to let on how enjoyable it is or then everybody would want to become an actress. But it really is. It's a pleasure to go and exchange your identity.
quotes.author: Gena Rowlands

quotes.quote: An actress must be a woman whose emotional perceptions are true, and to make them so, she must have a fine contempt for any art or thought that betrays them for something false.
quotes.author: Nance O'Neil

quotes.quote: There are wonderfully talented actresses. It's a really rich field. There isn't as rich a field of material.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: Actresses can get outrageously precious about the way they look. That's not what life's about. If you starve yourself to the point where your brain cells shrivel, you will never do good work. And if you're overly conscious of your arms flapping in the wind, how can you look the other actor in the eye to respond to them?
quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

quotes.quote: This is a culture filled with perfect images of women and perfect images of movie actresses, and most people can't live up to them.
quotes.author: Beeban Kidron

quotes.quote: As an actress, you never know when you're going to work again and there's so much dependency on working.
quotes.author: Alia Shawkat

quotes.quote: An extraordinary actress can not be an ordinary woman.
quotes.author: Radostina A. Angelova

quotes.quote: To be a good actor it is necessary to have a firmly tempered soul, to be surprised at nothing, to resume each minute the laborious task that has barely just been finished.
quotes.author: Sarah Bernhardt

quotes.quote: As an actress we don't beat one another. It's whoever's right for the part.
quotes.author: Juliette Binoche

quotes.quote: People think actors have such glamorous lives, but the truth is actors go where nobody wants to go.
quotes.author: Juliette Binoche

quotes.quote: For an actress there is no greater gift than having a camera in front of you, listening to the most beautiful music in the world and just being looked at!
quotes.author: Isabelle Huppert

quotes.quote: There are so many glamorous actresses, but you know what? In the real world, nobody looks like that.
quotes.author: Rebel Wilson

quotes.quote: Being an actress is the sublimation of feminity.
quotes.author: Monica Bellucci

quotes.quote: People often become actresses because of something they dislike about themselves: They pretend they are someone else.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: It's important to have female solidarity and support each other and other actresses.
quotes.author: Rose Byrne

quotes.quote: Every actor and actress is possessed of the absorbing passion to create something distinctive and unique.
quotes.author: Hattie McDaniel

quotes.quote: We used to have actresses trying to become stars; now we have stars trying to become actresses.
quotes.author: Laurence Olivier

quotes.quote: An actress must never lose her ego without it she has no talent.
quotes.author: Tom Lehrer

quotes.quote: An actress is not a machine, but they treat you like a machine. A money machine.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Rare actresses who was able to become the person she was playing and experience the emotions that that person was having. It was incredibly painful, almost psychic and quite devastating for her.
quotes.author: Kevin Brownlow

quotes.quote: An actress's life is so transitory suddenly you're a building.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: Good actresses can often accomplish miracles, and it is possible to be someone you've never been or will be. But in a sitcom, there's no time.
quotes.author: Patricia Richardson

quotes.quote: A big part of being an actress specifically is feeling entitled to your artistic opinion, feeling that it means something, and being able to stand by it.
quotes.author: Maggie Gyllenhaal

quotes.quote: An actress spends a lifetime observing people. You build up a mental library. No, not a library. Make that a repository.
quotes.author: Marian Seldes

quotes.quote: All that some actresses want is for people to take them seriously instead of caring about how they look.
quotes.author: Nikki Cox

quotes.quote: Ever since Eve gave Adam the apple, there has been a misunderstanding between the sexes about gifts.
quotes.author: Nan Robertson

quotes.quote: God didn't give Adam and Eve the right to decide what was good and evil. He gave them the right to choose between good and evil.
quotes.author: Mark Hart

quotes.quote: The Devil did not tempt Adam and Eve to steal, to lie, to kill, to commit adultery; he tempted them to live independent of God.
quotes.author: Bob Jones Sr

quotes.quote: It all goes back, of course, to Adam and Eve - a story which shows among other things, that if you make a woman out of a man, you are bound to get into trouble.
quotes.author: Carol Gilligan

quotes.quote: I sometimes think Adam and Eve were Russians. They didn't have a roof over their head, nothing to wear, but they had one apple between them and they thought that was Paradise.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Adam blamed Eve, Eve blamed the serpent and the serpent didn't have a leg to stand on.
quotes.author: Charles R Gerber

quotes.quote: Conversation between Adam and Eve must have been difficult at times because they had nobody to talk about.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Adam and Eve were the first of all unions to defy management.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Adam and Eve had many advantages, but the principal one was that they escaped teething.
quotes.author: S.L. Clemens

quotes.quote: Eve was not taken out of Adam's head to top him, neither out of his feet to be trampled on by him, but out of his side to be equal with him, under his arm to be protected by him, and near his heart to be loved by him.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: The true unconscious is the well-head, the fountain of real motivity. The sex of which Adam and Eve became conscious derived from the very God who bade them be not conscious of it.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Since antiquity, one story has stood at the center of every conversation about men and women. One couple has been the battleground for human relationships and sexual identity. That couple is Adam and Eve.
quotes.author: Bruce Feiler

quotes.quote: Adam was the image of God, he was man and woman, and yet neither of them before his Eve, but a masculine virgin in peculiar love, full of chastity and purity.
quotes.author: Jako Bohme

quotes.quote: We're children of God through our blood kinship with Christ. We're also sons and daughters of Adam and Eve, with a hereditary craving for forbidden fruit salad.
quotes.author: Barbara Brown Taylor

quotes.quote: Eve had one advantage over all the rest of her sex. In his wildest moments of rage Adam never could accuse her of being ‘just like her mother!
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Since Adam and Eve ate the apple, man has never refrained from any folly of which he was capable
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Ever since Eve started it all by offering Adam the apple, woman's punishment has been to supply a man with food then suffer the consequences when it disagrees with him.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: None of us can boast about the morality of our ancestors. The record does not show that Adam and Eve were ever married.
quotes.author: E.W. Howe

quotes.quote: The curse of Adam and Eve that fell upon the earth because of their sin will be lifted when Christ returns.
quotes.author: Tim LaHaye

quotes.quote: That world is ended, as if it had never been. Let the race of Adam and Eve take warning.
quotes.author: CS Lewis

quotes.quote: And so Adam, in that his speech to Eve, uttered his faith in the promise made to her of her seed, and so in that respect Adam himself came in under her covenant.
quotes.author: Thomas Goodwyn

quotes.quote: The most important factor in survival is neither intelligence nor strength but adaptability.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: The key to success is often the ability to adapt.
quotes.author: Anthony Brandt

quotes.quote: All fixed set patterns are incapable of adaptability or pliability. The truth is outside of all fixed patterns.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Change is the only constant in life. Ones ability to adapt to those changes will determine your success in life.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass. It's about learning how to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Vivian Greene

quotes.quote: It is not balance you need but adaptability.
quotes.author: Erwin Raphael McManus

quotes.quote: Adaptability cushions the impact of change or disappointment.
quotes.author: Marvin J. Ashton

quotes.quote: We must cut our coat according to our cloth, and adapt ourselves to changing circumstances.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.quote: Action and adaptability create opportunity.
quotes.author: Garrison Wynn

quotes.quote: The reasonable man adapts himself to the world; the unreasonable one persists to adapt the world to himself. Therefore all progress depends on the unreasonable man.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Adaptability is a great asset to have because life is so unpredictable, and things can change overnight for any of us.
quotes.author: Chanda Kochhar

quotes.quote: The more you adapt, the more interesting you are.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.quote: Be flexible and adapt easily to new things.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Adaptability is being able to adjust to any situation at any given time.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: The strongest will is the will that knows how to bend.
quotes.author: Alice Duer Miller

quotes.quote: Adaptability to change is itself a hallmark of successful education.
quotes.author: Peter Hilton

quotes.quote: To exist is to adapt, and if one could not adapt, one died and made room for those who could.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: It is not the strongest or the most intelligent who will survive but those who can best manage change.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Intelligence is ongoing, individual adaptability. Adaptations that an intelligent species may make in a single generation, other species make over many generations of selective breeding and selective dying.
quotes.author: Octavia E. Butler

quotes.quote: Forgive, Adapt and Evolve, because holding on stagnates your opportunity of being better.
quotes.author: Sachin Kumar Puli

quotes.quote: You must always be able to predict what's next and then have the flexibility to evolve.
quotes.author: Marc Benioff

quotes.quote: Adaptability is the simple secret of survival.
quotes.author: Jessica Hagedorn

quotes.quote: One learns to adapt to the land in which one lives.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: Man adapts himself to everything, to the best and the worst.
quotes.author: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.quote: As the world we live in is so unpredictable, the ability to learn and to adapt to change is imperative, alongside creativity, problem-solving, and communication skills.
quotes.author: Alain Dehaze

quotes.quote: The art of life lies in a constant readjustment to our surroundings.
quotes.author: Okakura Kakuzō

quotes.quote: The measure of intelligence is the ability to change.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Adaptability is about the powerful difference between adapting to cope and adapting to win.
quotes.author: Max McKeown

quotes.quote: You can't just keep doing what works one time, everything around you is changing. To succeed, stay out in front of change.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: Be willing to change, because life won't stay the same.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Adaptability is not imitation. It means power of resistance and assimilation.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: We cannot direct the wind, but we can adjust the sails.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Enjoying success requires the ability to adapt.
quotes.author: Nolan Ryan

quotes.quote: It is a wise person that adapts themselves to all contingencies; it's the fool who always struggles like a swimmer against the current.
quotes.author: Anomymous

quotes.quote: The most amazing thing about little children was their fantastic adaptability.
quotes.author: Kristin Hunter

quotes.quote: We must make the best of those ills which cannot be avoided.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: You never change things by fighting the existing reality. To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.
quotes.author: Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: A man is worked upon by what he works on. He may carve out his circumstances, but his circumstances will carve him out as well.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: Things good in themselves perfectly valid in the integrity of their origins, become fetters if they cannot alter.
quotes.author: Freya Stark

quotes.quote: In our lives, change is unavoidable, loss is unavoidable. In the adaptability and ease with which we experience change, lies our happiness and freedom.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself, it's about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: When you can’t change the direction of the wind adjust your sails
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: Whatever there be of progress in life comes not through adaptation but through daring.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: If you're not stubborn, you'll give up on experiments too soon. And if you're not flexible, you'll pound your head against the wall and you won't see a different solution to a problem you're trying to solve
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Change is the law of life, and those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
quotes.author: JFK

quotes.quote: It's no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: A society which is mobile, which is full of channels for the distribution of a change occurring anywhere, must see to it that its members are educated to personal initiative and adaptability.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Men are in fact, quite unable to control their own inventions they at best develop adaptability to the new conditions those inventions create.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.quote: It is not the strongest or the most intelligent who will survive but those who can best manage change.
quotes.author: Leon C. Megginson

quotes.quote: As we shall see, the tractable apostrophe has always done its proper jobs in our language with enthusiasm and elegance, but it has never been taken seriously enough its talent for adaptability has been cruelly taken for granted and now, in an age of supreme graphic frivolity, we pay the price.
quotes.author: Lynne Truss

quotes.quote: All failure is the failure to adapt all success is successful adaptation.
quotes.author: Max McKeown

quotes.quote: Adaptability and constant innovation is key to the survival of any company operating in a competitive market.
quotes.author: Shiv Nadar

quotes.quote: There can be no life without change, and to be afraid of what is different or unfamiliar is to be afraid of life.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Nature has color-coded groups of individuals so that statistically reliable predictions of their adaptability to intellectually rewarding and effective lives can easily be made and profitably used by the pragmatic man-in-the-street.
quotes.author: William Shockley

quotes.quote: All living things contain a measure of madness that moves them in strange, sometimes inexplicable ways. This madness can be saving it is part and parcel of the ability to adapt. Without it, no species would survive.
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: Every form of addiction is bad, no matter whether the narcotic be alcohol or morphine or idealism.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Addictions ... started out like magical pets, pocket monsters. They did extraordinary tricks, showed you things you hadn't seen, were fun. But came, through some gradual dire alchemy, to make decisions for you. Eventually, they were making your most crucial life-decisions. And they were ... less intelligent than goldfish.
quotes.author: William Gibson

quotes.quote: What fascinates me about addiction and obsessive behavior is that people would choose an altered state of consciousness that's toxic and ostensibly destroys most aspects of your normal life, because for a brief moment you feel okay.
quotes.author: Moby

quotes.quote: Quitting smoking is easy, I've done it hundreds of times.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Addiction begins with the hope that something "out there" can instantly fill up the emptiness inside.
quotes.author: Jean Kilbourne

quotes.quote: Addiction is just a way of trying to get at something else. Something bigger. Call it transcendence if you want, but it's like a rat in a maze. We all want the same thing. We all have this hole. The thing you want offers relief, but it's a trap.
quotes.author: Tess Callahan

quotes.quote: At first, addiction is maintained by pleasure, but the intensity of this pleasure gradually diminishes and the addiction is then maintained by the avoidance of pain.
quotes.author: Frank Tallis

quotes.quote: At every stage, addiction is driven by one of the most powerful, mysterious, and vital forces of human existence. What drives addiction is longing — a longing not just of brain, belly, or loins but finally of the heart.
quotes.author: Cornelius Platinga

quotes.quote: The mentality and behavior of drug addicts and alcoholics is wholly irrational until you understand that they are completely powerless over their addiction and unless they have structured help, they have no hope.
quotes.author: Russell Brand

quotes.quote: I have absolutely no pleasure in the stimulants in which I sometimes so madly indulge. It has not been in the pursuit of pleasure that I have periled life and reputation and reason. It has been the desperate attempt to escape from torturing memories, from a sense of insupportable loneliness and a dread of some strange impending doom.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: You know you're an alcoholic when you misplace things for like a decade.
quotes.author: Paul Williams

quotes.quote: I admire addicts. In a world where everybody is waiting for some blind, random disaster, or some sudden disease, the addict has the comfort of knowing what will most likely wait for him down the road. He's taken some control over his ultimate fate, and his addiction keeps the cause of death from being a total surprise.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Drugs have taught an entire generation of American kids the metric system.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: The initial journey towards sobriety is a delicate balance between insight into one's desire for escape and abstinence from one's addiction.
quotes.author: Debra L. Kaplan

quotes.quote: In the 1960s, people took acid to make the world weird. Now the world is weird, and people take Prozac to make it normal.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: What is addiction, really? It is a sign, a signal, a symptom of distress. It is a language that tells us about a plight that must be understood.
quotes.author: Alice Miller

quotes.quote: Addiction doesn't kill the addict. It kills the family, kids and people who tried to help!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you know someone who tries to drown their sorrows, you might tell them sorrows know how to swim.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
quotes.author: Francis Scott Key Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The first thing in the human personality that dissolves in alcohol is dignity.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: All the suffering, stress and addiction comes from not realizing you already are what you are looking for.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: Habit is habit, and not to be flung out of the window by any man, but coaxed downstairs a step at a time.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The dead drug leaves a ghost behind. At certain hours it haunts the house.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Addiction- When you can give up something any time, as long as it's next Tuesday.
quotes.author: Nikki Sixx

quotes.quote: The unfortunate thing about this world is that good habits are so much easier to give up than bad ones.
quotes.author: Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Reality is just a crutch for people who can't handle drugs.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Recovery from addiction requires hard work, a proper attitude and learning skills to stay sober, not drinking alcohol or using other drugs. Successful drug recovery or alcohol recovery involves changing attitudes, acquiring knowledge, and developing skills to meet the many challenges of sobriety.
quotes.author: Dennis Daley

quotes.quote: Addiction is a symptom of not growing up.
quotes.author: C. C. DeVille

quotes.quote: You can come out of the furnace of trouble two ways: if you let it consume you, you come out a cinder; but there is a kind of metal which refuses to be consumed, and comes out a star.
quotes.author: Jean Church

quotes.quote: You can get the monkey off your back, but the circus never leaves town.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Imagine trying to live without air. Now imagine something worse.
quotes.author: Amy Reed

quotes.quote: These feelings, no matter how painful, are part of living. Today, we are alive – not anesthetized, not sedated, not passed out. Take control of your feelings and through action you can change. Today, as every day of sober living, we have a choice.
quotes.author: Ann D. Clark

quotes.quote: Addiction, at its worst, is akin to having Stockholm Syndrome. You’re like a hostage who has developed an irrational affection for your captor. They can abuse you, torture you, even threaten to kill you, and you’ll remain inexplicably and disturbingly loyal.
quotes.author: Anne Clendening

quotes.quote: The deepest human defeat suffered by human beings is constituted by the difference between what one was capable of becoming and what one has in fact become.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.quote: If you can quit for a day, you can quit for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz

quotes.quote: Do not think that what your thoughts dwell on does not matter. Your thoughts are making you.
quotes.author: Bishop Steere

quotes.quote: It’s not the situation…… it’s your reaction to the situation.
quotes.author: Bob Conklin

quotes.quote: Understanding the difference between healthy striving and perfectionism is critical to laying down the shield and picking up your life. Research shows that perfectionism hampers success. In fact, it's often the path to depression, anxiety, addiction, and life paralysis.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
quotes.author: Carl Bard

quotes.quote: Sometimes you can only find Heaven by slowly backing away from Hell.
quotes.author: Carrie Fisher

quotes.quote: You are not an alcoholic or an addict. You are not incurably diseased. You have merely become dependent on substances or addictive behavior to cope with underlying conditions that you are now going to heal, at which time your dependency will cease completely and forever.
quotes.author: Chris Prentiss

quotes.quote: I wanted to write about the moment when your addictions no longer hide the truth from you. When your whole life breaks down. That’s the moment when you have to somehow choose what your life is going to be about.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: It is better to light one small candle than to curse the darkness.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: An over-indulgence of anything, even something as pure as water, can intoxicate.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: One of the things you learn in rehab is that you’re responsible for your own actions.
quotes.author: Dale Archer

quotes.quote: Remember, today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: A nail is driven out by another nail. Habit is overcome by habit.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: My fear of abandonment is exceeded only by my terror of intimacy.
quotes.author: Ethlie Ann Vare

quotes.quote: Every moment of resistance to temptation is a victory.
quotes.author: Frederick W. Faber

quotes.quote: If you are an approval addict, your behaviour is as easy to control as that of any other junkie. All a manipulator need do is a simple two-step process: Give you what you crave, and then threaten to take it away. Every drug dealer in the world plays this game.
quotes.author: Harriet B. Braiker

quotes.quote: Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it fully.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Here I am trying to live, or rather, I am trying to teach the death within me how to live.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Addiction begins with the hope that something ‘out there’ can instantly fill up the emptiness inside.
quotes.author: Jean Kilbourne

quotes.quote: An intelligent person can rationalize anything, a wise person doesn't try.
quotes.author: Jen Knox

quotes.quote: Drugs are a bet with your mind.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: A good addiction is a contradiction in terms. Anything people can’t give up or must have is not healthy, no matter what the activity.
quotes.author: Jody Dean

quotes.quote: Addiction is an adaptation. It’s not you–it’s the cage you live in.
quotes.author: Johann Hari

quotes.quote: The opposite of addiction is not sobriety, it's human connection.
quotes.author: Johann Hari

quotes.quote: Shame was an emotion he had abandoned years earlier. Addicts know no shame. You disgrace yourself so many times you become immune to it.
quotes.author: John Grisham

quotes.quote: Your life is the fruit of your own doing. You have no one to blame but yourself.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: No one told me you can love someone and still be miserable. How is that possible?
quotes.author: Krista Ritchie

quotes.quote: Drugs are a waste of time. They destroy your memory and your self-respect and everything that goes along with your self-esteem.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: Not feeling is no replacement for reality. Your problems today are still your problems tomorrow.
quotes.author: Larry Michael Dredla

quotes.quote: When you can stop you don't want to, and when you want to stop, you can't.
quotes.author: Luke Davies

quotes.quote: Every habit he’s ever had is still there in his body, lying dormant like flowers in the desert. Given the right conditions, all his old addictions would burst into full and luxuriant bloom.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: The three most harmful addictions are heroin, carbohydrates, and a monthly salary.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: The worst thing you can do for your loved one caught in alcoholism or addiction is to help the person continue in the deception that he or she is OK. Your best course of action is to speak the truth in love (see Eph. 4:15) and don't allow him or her to escape the consequences of wrong behavior.
quotes.author: Neil T. Anderson

quotes.quote: We use all kinds of ways to escape – all addictions stem from this moment when we meet our edge and we just can’t stand it. We feel we have to soften it, pad it with something, and we become addicted to whatever it is that seems to ease the pain.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Addiction should never be treated as a crime. It has to be treated as a health problem. We do not send alcoholics to jail in this country. Over 500,000 people are in our jails who are nonviolent drug users.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader

quotes.quote: Addiction is a serious disease; it will end with jail, mental institutions, or death.
quotes.author: Russell Brand

quotes.quote: We are addicted to our thoughts. We cannot change anything if we cannot change our thinking.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: There are all kinds of addicts, I guess. We all have pain. And we all look for ways to make the pain go away.
quotes.author: Sherman Alexie

quotes.quote: An addict is someone who uses their body to tell society that something is wrong.
quotes.author: Stella Adler

quotes.quote: Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: People use drugs, legal and illegal, because their lives are intolerably painful or dull. They hate their work and find no rest in their leisure. They are estranged from their families and their neighbors. It should tell us something that in healthy societies drug use is celebrative, convivial, and occasional, whereas among us it is lonely, shameful, and addictive. We need drugs, apparently, because we have lost each other.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Most addicts I have talked to report a similar experience. They did not start using drugs for any reason they can remember. They just drifted along until they got hooked. If you have never been addicted, you can have no clear idea what it means to need junk with the addict’s special need. You don’t decide to be an addict. One morning you wake up sick and you’re an addict.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: If we are facing in the right direction, all we have to do is keep on walking.
quotes.author: Zen Proverb

quotes.quote: Failure is a detour, not a dead-end street.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing. That’s why we recommend it daily.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: ADD is like going through life, carrying a one-man band contraption with a broken strap.
quotes.author: Julia Smith-Ruetz

quotes.quote: Every person with ADHD already knows that destination addiction is part of their disorder. However, if it doesn't have a positive outlet, it can destroy your life. It is not another person that will make your life better; it is the qualities in them that you admire. Incorporate those attributes into your own life and you won't miss a thing.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Do not say, that child has ADHD. Say it: He wears the 7R gene.
quotes.author: Gert Van Mol

quotes.quote: There is no more miserable human being than one in whom nothing is habitual but indecision.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: That's the other thing: Even if you're on medication, you still have to treat your body properly and take care of yourself. The idea that ADHD goes away or you grow out of it isn't true.
quotes.author: Ty Pennington

quotes.quote: I am not absentminded. It is the presence of mind that makes me unaware of everything else.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Forgive your child and yourself nightly. You didn't ask to live with the effects of ADHD any more than did your child.
quotes.author: Martin L. Kutscher

quotes.quote: It's like trying to listen to your favorite show with really bad noise disrupting the signal. All the while, loud children are screaming around you and throwing things.
quotes.author: Christine Ashley

quotes.quote: It is better to be high-spirited even though one makes more mistakes, than to be narrow-minded and all too prudent.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: ADHD is real and valid. The sooner we recognize the patterns and learn to work with these kids, the better assured we will be that they as adults with be healthy members of society.
quotes.author: Rhonda Van Diest

quotes.quote: ADHD is not about knowing what to do, but about doing what one knows.
quotes.author: Dr. Russell Barkley

quotes.quote: In the power of fixing the attention lies the most precious of the intellectual habits.
quotes.author: Robert Hall

quotes.quote: Picture a room with 1,000 TVs with each TV showing something different. Now try and concentrate on just one TV with out getting distracted.
quotes.author: Damian DaViking Aird

quotes.quote: Nothing like ADHD and a good fight to the death to make time fly.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: ADHD is a neurological and behavioral disorder that affects not only the person with it, but the entire family, including parents and the extended family of parental siblings and grandparents. It tests the limits of the family's ability to be supportive, understanding and loving.
quotes.author: Dresher Larry

quotes.quote: Behavior isn't something someone has. Rather, it emerges from the interaction of a person's biology, past experiences, and immediate context.
quotes.author: L. Todd Rose

quotes.quote: It's like being a cat with 100 people with lazer pointers.
quotes.author: Jamie Hynds

quotes.quote: People with ADHD often have a special feel for life, a way of seeing right into the heart of matters, while others have to reason their way methodically.
quotes.author: Edward M. Hallowell

quotes.quote: It is difficult to instruct children because of their natural inattention; the true mode, of course, is to first make our modes interesting to them.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: ADHD isn't a bad thing, and you shouldn't feel different from those without ADHD.
quotes.author: Adam Levine

quotes.quote: It's like opening 100 tabs in your browser at once and trying to do something different in each one at the same time. Then someone walks up and wants to have a conversation.
quotes.author: Jennifer Arnott

quotes.quote: ADHD is just another word for fun, exciting and adventurous.
quotes.author: Julie Posey

quotes.quote: I prefer to distinguish ADD as attention abundance disorder. Everything is just so interesting, remarkably at the same time.
quotes.author: Frank Coppola

quotes.quote: This is a mental health issue not a behavior issue! People including doctors and schools need to recognize it as such!
quotes.author: Ridge Meadows

quotes.quote: It's more than lack of focus.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lynn

quotes.quote: Living with ADHD is like walking up a down escalator.You can get there eventually but the journey is exhausting.
quotes.author: Kathleen Ely

quotes.quote: Be patient with me. Understand why I do the things I do. Don't yell at me. Believe me, I don't want to have ADHD.
quotes.author: Joane E Richardson

quotes.quote: If we run every class the way we run it for kids with ADHD, we'd probably have a much stronger education system.
quotes.author: Robert Reid

quotes.quote: When you have ADHD your home reflects our thought. disorganized and in disoray. And like with a disorganized house. you can only appologize for your disorganized brian so many time before it becomes exhausting.
quotes.author: Sarah Young

quotes.quote: Living with ADHD is like being locked in a room with 100 Televisions and 100 Radios all playing. None of them have power buttons so you can turn them off and the door is locked from the outside.
quotes.author: Sarah Young

quotes.quote: ADHD can affect every area of your life.
quotes.author: Natasha McCulloch

quotes.quote: I'm add and psychic. I know things ahead of time but lose track of which is which.
quotes.author: S. Kelley Harrell

quotes.quote: It has been said that idleness is the parent of mischief, which is very true; but mischief itself is merely an attempt to escape from the dreary vacuum of idleness.
quotes.author: George Borrow

quotes.quote: ADHD is not a choice or bad parenting. Kids with ADHD work twice as hard as their peers everyday but receive more negative feedback from the world.
quotes.author: DRB

quotes.quote: ADHD is a prime example of a fictitious disease.
quotes.author: Leon Eisenberg

quotes.quote: Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: I know what's it's like to grow up with ADHD and how important it is for parents, caregivers and patients, to have access to accurate information.
quotes.author: Ty Pennington

quotes.quote: I have more thoughts before breakfast than most people have all day.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The hardest thing about ADHD is that it’s invisible to outsiders. People just assume that we are not being good parents and that our child is a brat. When they don’t have an idea how exhausted we truly are.
quotes.author: S.C

quotes.quote: It turns out that up to 35 percent of people with bipolar disorder also have ADHD.
quotes.author: Julie A. Fast

quotes.quote: What I did next was so impulsive and dangerous I should've been named ADHD poster child of the year.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Never give up on someone with a mental illness. When I is replaced by we, illness becomes wellness.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: If you’ve told a child a thousand times and he still does not understand, then it is not the child who is the slow learner.
quotes.author: Walter Barbee

quotes.quote: If a child can’t learn the way we teach, maybe we should teach the way they learn.
quotes.author: Ignacio Estrada

quotes.quote: If a cluttered desk is a sign of a cluttered mind. What then is an empty desk a sign of?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I was trying to daydream but my mind kept wandering.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: My room may be a mess but it’s an organized mess. I know right where everything is.
quotes.author: Brandon Curtiss

quotes.quote: Mental illness is nothing to be ashamed of, but stigma and bias shame us all.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: Mental disorders don't really live out there waiting to be explained. They are constructs we have made up and often not very compelling ones.
quotes.author: Allen Frances

quotes.quote: Life at any time can become difficult: life at any time can become easy. It all depends upon how one adjusts oneself to life.
quotes.author: Morarji Desai

quotes.quote: Some times you lose more than you win. It's about handling losses and trying to turn them into positives. You get out into the big leagues and there's a period of adjustment to be made. You've got to handle it.
quotes.author: Lindsay Davenport

quotes.quote: The smallest change in perspective can transform a life. What tiny attitude adjustment might turn your world around?
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: When truth presents itself, the wise person sees the light, takes it in, and makes adjustments. The fool tries to adjust the truth so he does not have to adjust to it.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: Life is a series of adjustments; You can make changes along the way, but if you dodn't start moving forward you'll never get anywhere!
quotes.author: Kimora Lee Simmons

quotes.quote: The art of life lies in a constant readjustment to our surroundings.
quotes.author: Kakuzo Okakura

quotes.quote: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It's no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Beauty is the adjustment of all parts proportionately so that one cannot add or subtract or change without impairing the harmony of the whole.
quotes.author: Leon Battista Alberti

quotes.quote: The whole process of mental adjustment and atunement can be summed up in one word: Gratitude
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: Success comes from repeated efforts day in and day out. You learn from your mistakes, make adjustments and continue pressing forward until you achieve the results you desire.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: It is invariably saddening to look through new eyes at things upon which you have expended your own powers of adjustment.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The learned tradition is not concerned with truth, but with the learned adjustment of learned statements of antecedent learned people.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Adapt yourself to the needs of the people.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: All things have their birth in Love by adaptation.
quotes.author: Wald Wassermann

quotes.quote: To live is to exist within the boundaries of what is permissible and what is not. Adaptation to this is called life.
quotes.author: Elmar Hussein

quotes.quote: Adaptability is about the powerful difference between adapting to cope and adapting to win.
quotes.author: Max McKeown

quotes.quote: Adaptability to change is itself a hallmark of successful education.
quotes.author: Peter Hilton

quotes.quote: Adaptability is not imitation. It means power of resistance and assimilation.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Things change. The only thing constant is change. It’s up to you to be adaptable.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Action and adaptability create opportunity.
quotes.author: Garrison Wynn

quotes.quote: You've got to make adjustments as you get older.
quotes.author: Derek Jeter

quotes.quote: Pure morality is only an instinctive adjustment which the soul makes.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: A man is not rightly conditioned until he is a happy, healthy, and prosperous being; and happiness, health, and prosperity are the result of a harmonious adjustment of the inner with the outer of the man with his surroundings.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: But that constant adjustment and adaptation to your new environment, all the variables are the same. There's always a promoter, there's always a rider, there's always a shower, and there's always a stage.
quotes.author: Feist

quotes.quote: People seem to get used to anything, and it is a short step from adaptation to attachment
quotes.author: Lionel Shriver

quotes.quote: Be flexible and adapt easily to new things.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Take in every detail of your environment and adapt.
quotes.author: Carlos Wallace

quotes.quote: Adaptability is key.
quotes.author: Marc Andreessen

quotes.quote: We can admire what we see, but we can only love what we truly know.
quotes.author: Tyga
