quotes.quote: You can admire people for sure, and they're worth admiring, but you need to find that special thing about yourself. It takes working hard, getting the technique, and learning to sing and all that stuff, but the master class is about bringing yourself to the role.
quotes.author: Susan Egan

quotes.quote: You can love a woman. To admire her is hard. You are not dealing with something important.
quotes.author: Henri Michaux

quotes.quote: Knowing what you admire in others is a wonderful mirror into your deepest, as yet unborn, self.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.quote: All of us admire people we don't like and like people we don't admire.
quotes.author: Malcolm Muggeridge

quotes.quote: We may admire people for being wise, but we like them best when they are foolish.
quotes.author: Mary Russell Mitford

quotes.quote: There's nothing makes you admire people like seeing yourself in them.
quotes.author: Eleanor Hibbert

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is to admire without desiring.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: We admire people to the extent that we cannot explain what they do, and the word 'admire' then means 'marvel at.'
quotes.author: B. F. Skinner

quotes.quote: It's great to admire other people's fashion choices, but I don't think you should idolise anyone.
quotes.author: Cat Deeley

quotes.quote: You always admire what you really don't understand.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Be the mirror in which people admire their true potential.
quotes.author: Ron Kaufman

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is to admire without desiring. And that is not happiness.
quotes.author: F. H. Bradley

quotes.quote: A modern man may disapprove of some of his sweeping reforms, and approve others; but finds it difficult not to admire even where he does not approve.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: You can't ever be really free if you admire somebody too much.
quotes.author: Tove Jansson

quotes.quote: Learn to admire rightly; the great pleasure of life is that. Note what the great men admired; they admired great things; narrow spirits admire basely, and worship meanly.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you're treated unfairly it makes you stronger and more determined. I admire that kind of strength. People who have it take a stand and put their blood and soul into what they believe.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: It is the rooted instinct in men to admire what is better and more beautiful than themselves.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: Transform jealousy to admiration, and what you admire will become part of your life.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: It's easier to be terrified by an enemy you admire.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: The only things one can admire at length are those one admires without knowing why.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Developing a relationship with someone you admire, who can encourage you to reach your full potential, is something that everyone can benefit from.
quotes.author: Mandy Moore

quotes.quote: Those who admire modern civilization usually identify it with the steam engine and the electric telegraph.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: We shall not be well so long as we love and admire anything more than we love and admire God.
quotes.author: C S Lewis

quotes.quote: Admire the diamond that can bear the hits of a hammer. Many deceptive preachers, when critically examined, turn out to be false.
quotes.author: Kabir

quotes.quote: Let none admire that riches grow in hell; that soil may best deserve the precious bane.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: We always love those who admire us, but we do not always love those whom we admire.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Be not too hasty to trust or to admire the teachers of morality; they discourse like angels, but they live like men.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Everybody admires a go-getter if he is tactful.
quotes.author: Earl Tupper

quotes.quote: Be a big person; be generous of spirit; be the person you'd admire.
quotes.author: Allegra Huston

quotes.quote: Admire as much as you can. Most people do not admire enough.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: What a strange vanity painting is; it attracts admiration by resembling the original, we do not admire.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Whatever you do for the sole purpose of having others admire you, your efforts will most likely be in vain.
quotes.author: Dave Pelzer

quotes.quote: The truest test of independent judgment is being able to dislike someone who admires us, and to admire someone who dislikes us.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: Nobody admires anyone else without qualification. If they do they're after an image, not a person.
quotes.author: Scott Lynch

quotes.quote: The desire to please those we admire and respect often cripples conscience.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.quote: We tend to become like those whom we admire.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: He who meanly admires mean things is a Snob.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Men admire the man who can organize their wishes and thoughts in stone and wood and steel and brass.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: People don't admire you for what you hate, they admire you for what you do about it, and your slacks.
quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

quotes.quote: As long as one can admire and love, then one is young forever.
quotes.author: Pablo Casals

quotes.quote: Nature's beauty we all admire in every shape and form, but how much more we admire her when the weather's nice and warm.
quotes.author: Janet Hargreaves

quotes.quote: A hero is someone we can admire without apology.
quotes.author: Kitty Kelley

quotes.quote: A great part of art consists in imitation. For the whole conduct of life is based on this: that what we admire in others we want to do ourselves.
quotes.author: Quintilian

quotes.quote: We always admire the other person more after we've tried to do his job.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: All leaders are influenced by those they admire. Reading about them and studying their traits inevitably allows an inspiring leader to develop his own leadership traits.
quotes.author: Rudy Giuliani

quotes.quote: A fool can always find a greater fool who admires him.
quotes.author: Nicolas Boileau

quotes.quote: Enjoy your work and work for whom you admire.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: If one is to love oneself one must behave in ways that one can admire.
quotes.author: Irvin D. Yalom

quotes.quote: To love is to admire with the heart; to admire is to love with the mind.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.quote: When I was young, I admired clever people. Now that I am old, I admire kind people.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: Tell me who admires and loves you, and I will tell you who you are.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: If what most men admire, they would despise. Twould look as if mankind were growing wise
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Our admiration of fine writing will always be in proportion to its real difficulty and its apparent ease.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: To cease to admire is a proof of deterioration.
quotes.author: Charles Horton Cooley

quotes.quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: Instead of worrying about what people say of you, why not spend time trying to accomplish something they will admire.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Distance is a great promoter of admiration
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: Woman is not made to be the admiration of everybody, but the happiness of one.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The capacity to admire others is not my most fully developed trait.
quotes.author: Henry A. Kissinger

quotes.quote: Admiration is a very short-lived passion, that immediately decays upon growing familiar with its object.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Great is our admiration of the orator who speaks with fluency and discretion.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Bad artists always admire each others work.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Every day, tell at least one person something you like, admire, or appreciate about them.
quotes.author: Richard Carlson

quotes.quote: Life for the strongest. There is no sympathy for the slain, only admiration for the winner's strength.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: Admiration is the daughter of ignorance.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Blessed is he who has learned to admire but not envy, to follow but not imitate, to praise but not flatter, and to lead but not manipulate.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Though familiarity may not breed contempt, it takes off the edge of admiration.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: A student never forgets an encouraging private word, when it is given with sincere respect and admiration.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: We live by admiration, hope and love
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Little souls find their way to you, whether they're from your womb or someone else's.
quotes.author: Sheryl Crow

quotes.quote: It's important to realize that we adopt not because we are rescuers. No. We adopt because we are rescued.
quotes.author: David Platt

quotes.quote: Families don't have to match. You don't have to look like someone else to love them.
quotes.author: Leigh Anne Tuohy

quotes.quote: Not flesh of my flesh, nor bone of my bone, but still miraculously my own. Never forget for a single minute, you didn't grow under my heart but in it.
quotes.author: Fleur Conkling Heyliger

quotes.quote: Adoption carries the added dimension of connection not only to your own tribe but beyond, widening the scope of what constitutes love, ties, and family. It is the larger embrace.
quotes.author: Isabella Rossellini

quotes.quote: Being a mother is an attitude, not a biological relation.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Adoption is when a child grew in its mommy's heart instead of her tummy.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: However motherhood comes to you, it's a miracle.
quotes.author: Valerie Harper

quotes.quote: Being a parent wasn't just about bearing a child. It was about bearing witness to its life.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Adopting any child is a walk into the unknown. It takes Faith.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We should not be asking who this child belongs to, but who belongs to this child.
quotes.author: James L. Gritter

quotes.quote: They may not have my eyes, they may not have my smile, but they have all my heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A child born to another woman calls me mom. The depth of the tragedy and the magnitude of the privilege are not lost on me.
quotes.author: Jody Landers

quotes.quote: Family is not defined by our genes, it is built and maintained through love.
quotes.author: Amalia G.

quotes.quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Adoption is not the call to have the perfect, rosy family. It is the call to give love, mercy, and patience.
quotes.author: Hope For Orphans

quotes.quote: Adoptive Mom? I am Mom. I need no other label or prefix.
quotes.author: Joanne Greco

quotes.quote: There are times when the adoption process is exhausting and painful and makes you want to scream. But, I am told, so does childbirth.
quotes.author: Scott Simon

quotes.quote: If you have a heart for adoption don't let fear stand in the way.
quotes.author: Doug Chapman

quotes.quote: Adopting one child won't change the world: but for that child, the world will change.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My birth mother brought me into this world, but it was my adoptive parents who gave me life.
quotes.author: Christina Romo

quotes.quote: By choice, we have become a family, first in our hearts, and finally in breath and being. Great expectations are good; great experiences are better.
quotes.author: Richard Fischer

quotes.quote: We look at adoption as a very sacred exchange. It was not done lightly on either side. I would dedicate my life to this child.
quotes.author: Jamie Lee Curtis

quotes.quote: Adoption is not about finding children for families, it's about finding families for children.
quotes.author: Joyce Maguire Pavao

quotes.quote: Somehow destiny comes into play. These children end up with you and you end up with them. It's something quite magical.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: Children and mothers never truly part, bound together by the beating of one another's heart.
quotes.author: Charlotte Gray

quotes.quote: There are so many kids in this world, and in this country, that need homes. And so we're perfectly content to look into adoption one day, if for some reason we aren't able to have a biological child.
quotes.author: Lisa Ling

quotes.quote: Adoption has been a part of my life and a part of my family, so it was how I wanted to start. It felt natural and right to me.
quotes.author: Katherine Heigl

quotes.quote: I think adoption is a blessing all around when it's done right.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.quote: Every child deserves a home and love. Period.
quotes.author: Dave Thomas

quotes.quote: There are young people having babies every day that cannot possibly take care of them, and, as people who believe that every life is beautiful, we need to make them aware of another choice - to give that beautiful life up for adoption.
quotes.author: John Schneider

quotes.quote: Adoption comes from the heart, but the adoption process comes from the Law. You should follow your heart, but be sure you also follow the law.
quotes.author: Irina ORear

quotes.quote: Adoption was a bumpy ride – very bumpy. But God, was it worth the fight.
quotes.author: Mariska Hargitay

quotes.quote: I have four children. Two are adopted. I forget which two.
quotes.author: Bob Constantine

quotes.quote: My life has been shaped by the decision two people made over 24 years ago. They decided to adopt a child. They got me, and I got a chance at the kind of life all children deserve.
quotes.author: Karen Fowler

quotes.quote: Since I was five, I've known that I was adopted, which is a politically correct term for being clueless about one's own origins.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: The beggarly question of parentage--what is it, after all? What does it matter, when you come to think of it, whether a child is yours by blood or not? All the little ones of our time are collectively the children of us adults of the time, and entitled to our general care.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: Anyone who ever wondered how much they could love a child who did not spring from their own loins, know this: it is the same. The feeling of love is so profound, it's incredible and surprising.
quotes.author: Nia Vardalos

quotes.quote: A son or daughter in any human family is either born to or adopted by the parents. By definition, a child can't be both. But with God we're both born of Him and adopted by Him.
quotes.author: Jerry Bridges

quotes.quote: Orphanages are the only places that ever left me feeling empty and full at the same time.
quotes.author: John M. Simmons

quotes.quote: Adoption was such a positive alternative to abortion, a way to save one life and brighten two more: those of the adoptive parents.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Meeting your adoptive baby is like being set up on a blind date with someone you will have to spend the next eighteen years with. You care about looks, because you desperately want to fall in love with the stranger who will be your child.
quotes.author: Jana Wolff

quotes.quote: I learned that you need not be born into a family to be loved by one.
quotes.author: Lisa Wingate

quotes.quote: God, this adoption stuff is so overwhelming. There's inter-country adoption, dependency adoption... There are so many ways to go, and this is like the biggest decision of our lives.
quotes.author: David Crane

quotes.quote: You must both remember, once you adopt each other for cousins, you'll be cousins forever. Because adoption is real, and it's forever.
quotes.author: Bob Walsh

quotes.quote: You need to adopt them! Who knows what may happen if you don't adopt them! And they need a good home!
quotes.author: Joan S.

quotes.quote: Oh, no, getting adopted doesn't hurt. It's just another way people have of saying I love you.
quotes.author: Bob Walsh

quotes.quote: She's more than adopted. She's a part of me.
quotes.author: Sam Hellman

quotes.quote: The Hunters adopted me when I was a kid. They brought me over from the U.K. It's the best thing that ever happened to me. I'm just paying it forward.
quotes.author: Melle Runderkamp

quotes.quote: I think adoption is a wonderful thing. Three of my nine siblings were adopted. And someday, I'm gonna find them.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: A process which assumes that adoptive parents will choose their children on the basis of these factors also supports the notion that it's reasonable to change one's mind in the child turns out different from why they were chosen-as they almost always do.
quotes.author: Melanie Tem

quotes.quote: The adoptive parent if an infant , too, is often looked upon as something of a hero, or a martyr.
quotes.author: Melanie Tem

quotes.quote: The best relationships in life start with this in abundance and adopting a child is no different.
quotes.author: Satwinder Sandhu

quotes.quote: I firmly believe that adaption gives children in need a lifeline.
quotes.author: Satwinder Sandhu

quotes.quote: The legality of adoption is like the legality of marriage. It binds people together, meaning they usually think twice if they want to separate from the relationship.
quotes.author: Satwinder Sandhu

quotes.quote: Adoption is not a 'better' option but it is certainly more secure and truly a lifeline relationship.
quotes.author: Satwinder Sandhu

quotes.quote: Adoption is an 'affair of the heart.' But as much as adoption fills a need for love, there is much more involved.
quotes.author: Barbara A. Moe

quotes.quote: Adoption of children, in one form or another, is as old as human history.
quotes.author: Barbara A. Moe

quotes.quote: Placement day is an important date in the life of an adopted child, especially if he or she remembers that day. Some celebrate this date as an adoption birthday because it is the true beginning of the adaption.
quotes.author: Barbara A. Moe

quotes.quote: Adoption is a wonderful thing. Christians have rightly considered themselves as a people adopted by God, and adoption has been a central Christian practice for many branches of Christianity.
quotes.author: William B Eerdmans

quotes.quote: Adoption always involved losses. Losses prior to adoption affect the quality of attachment in adoption.
quotes.author: Gregory Keck

quotes.quote: Keep this in mind that actually raising your adopted child will cost whatever it would have cost if she had been born to you.
quotes.author: Corrie Lynn Player

quotes.quote: Adopted children can have emotional difficulties that require special services. Whatever the reason, it is important to understand that providing the necessary services to address the emotional problems can make significant demands on a family's finances.
quotes.author: Corrie Lynn Player

quotes.quote: When considering all the adoption options, you need to consider your comfort level with each one.
quotes.author: Corrie Lynn Player

quotes.quote: Children deserve to be brought into a strong, successful marriage or a stable single-parent home. If your home life is currently in conflict, now is not the best time to consider adoption.
quotes.author: Corrie Lynn Player

quotes.quote: Through all the trials of the foster and adoptive journey, I want you to know that the calling you've received to care for vulnerable children is valid. And it is beautiful.
quotes.author: Mike Berry

quotes.quote: Most of us enter the adoptive or foster parenting journey with hope. And we're filled with passion and energy. For good reason too--we've been called to do this.
quotes.author: Mike Berry

quotes.quote: The art of transplantation / Has saved a lot of lives / By frauding a child's adoption / I will be saving mine
quotes.author: Eric Reme Giguere

quotes.quote: Adoption's not the answer either / Is it fair for you to say / That she should go through pregnancy / So a total stranger can take it away
quotes.author: Glen Evans

quotes.quote: I didn't realize it when I was a lad / Just how great a burden my mother had / Adoption was offered but mama said no / She raised us and taught us the right way to go
quotes.author: William Carlisle

quotes.quote: A child needs loving, caring / Is there no other option than adoption for you babies / You're raffling and jacketing and auctioning your babies
quotes.author: Damian Robert Nesta Marley

quotes.quote: These days adoption is a hot thing / You can get a child for nearly nothing / You take them home to a nanny / Buy off you're guilt with toys and candy
quotes.author: Anouk Teeuwe

quotes.quote: Adorable children are considered to be the general property of the human race. Rude children belong to their mothers.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: How lovely it is to dream while you are awake.
quotes.author: Andre Agassi

quotes.quote: Lovely flowers are the smiles of god's goodness.
quotes.author: William Wilberforce

quotes.quote: How lovely life can be if one takes time to be friendly.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Lovely flowers have been known to grow out of trash heaps.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kata

quotes.quote: What is lovely never dies, But passes into other loveliness.
quotes.author: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quotes.quote: A lovely face is the solace of wounded hearts and the key of locked-up gates.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.quote: How lovely to think that no one need wait a moment, we can start now, start slowly changing the world!
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Be adorable always to each other; respect is everlasting.
quotes.author: Clarence Day

quotes.quote: What makes you adorable is how much you're able to contribute towards the improvement of the lives of people around you
quotes.author: Constance Chuks Friday

quotes.quote: Why can't I be the adorable one?
quotes.author: Dorothy Kilgallen

quotes.quote: It is not the most lovable individuals who stand more in need of love, but the most unlovable
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.quote: A thing is lovable according as it is good. But God is infinite good. Therefore He is infinitely lovable.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: You are lovable, you are loving; your choices about food will reflect that, if you give yourself a chance.
quotes.author: Geneen Roth

quotes.quote: His captivating speech came not from his grammar or vocabulary but from the joy he took in wielding them well.
quotes.author: Robert Lane Greene

quotes.quote: There is something captivating in spirit and intrepidity, to which, we often yield as to a resistless power; nor can he reasonably expect, the confidence of others who too apparently distrusts himself.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be.
quotes.author: Ellen Burstyn

quotes.quote: It's lovely to know that the world can't interfere with the inside of your head.
quotes.author: Frank McCourt

quotes.quote: How lovely goodness is in those who, stepping lightly, go smiling through the world.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: How lovely are the portals of the night, when stars come out to watch the daylight die.
quotes.author: Thomas Cole

quotes.quote: it would be lovely to sleep in a wild cherry-tree all white with bloom in the moonshine
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: It's lovely to have a part that requires you to learn something that's also interesting.
quotes.author: Harry Lloyd

quotes.quote: It was lovely when you found students who responded to things you were enthusiastic about.
quotes.author: William Maxwell

quotes.quote: It's lovely being a parent and being in a strong marriage with somebody who is your best friend.
quotes.author: Johnny Vegas

quotes.quote: It was lovely to see cynicism in one so young. It positively restored his faith in human nature.
quotes.author: Lauren Willig

quotes.quote: It's lovely to be told you're wonderful by someone when you're used to being told how awful you are.
quotes.author: Lysette Anthony

quotes.quote: It's always lovely to be part of a project that, on a creative level, is done for all the right reasons.
quotes.author: Elaine Cassidy

quotes.quote: It's just lovely to be involved in a movie that does go back to the basics - characters and great writing.
quotes.author: Clive Owen

quotes.quote: It is kind of lovely to be sitting alone, just thinking, very quiet, no one around. I don't feel alone or left out.
quotes.author: Vin Scully

quotes.quote: Nothing is more appealing than a handsome man who is also uncertain of himself.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Appealing workplaces are to be avoided. One wants a room with no view, so imagination can meet memory in the dark.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: It's always appealing to play a character that has to overcome himself as well as an obstacle. It makes the drama so much deeper.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: There is something very appealing about a room which one occupied as a child; it brings back one's childhood more vividly than anything else I know.
quotes.author: D.E. Stevenson

quotes.quote: The most appealing part is the feeling of learning something true - the pleasure of a truth. For me, that's mostly found in philosophical literature at the moment.
quotes.author: Eyvind Kang

quotes.quote: What is appealing is the idea of attaining the unattainable and learning from it. Once you obtain a fantasy it becomes a reality, and that reality is not as exciting as your fantasy. Through the fantasies you learn to appreciate your own realities.
quotes.author: Ricardo Montalban

quotes.quote: To gather with God's people in united adoration of the Father is as necessary to the Christian life as prayer.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: To insure the adoration of a theorem for any length of time, faith is not enough, a police force is needed as well.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: When you focus on how wonderful God is and all the great things He's done is doing and even will do in your life, your natural response will be praise, adoration and awe. Don't let yourself ever get used to it stay amazed!
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Worship is basically adoration, and we adore only what delights us. There is no such thing as sad adoration or unhappy praise.
quotes.author: John Crowder

quotes.quote: Your worship is proportional to your fellowship with God and how you are free.
quotes.author: Paul Gitwaza

quotes.quote: The daily adoration or visit to the Blessed Sacrament is the practice which is the fountainhead of all devotional works.
quotes.author: Pope Pius X

quotes.quote: Through adoration, the Christian mysteriously contributes to the radical transformation of the world and to the sowing of the Gospel. Anyone who prays to the Savior draws the whole world with him and raises it to God. Those who stand before the Lord are therefore fulfilling an eminent service. They are presenting to Christ all those who do not know him or are far from him: they keep watch in his presence on their behalf.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Perpetual Adoration, Eucharistic Adoration offers to our people the opportunity to join those in religious life to pray for the salvation of the world, souls everywhere and peace on earth. We cannot underestimate the power of prayer and the difference it will make in our world.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The act of divine worship is the inestimable privilege of man, the only created being who bows in humility and adoration.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: The answer to deep anxiety is the deep adoration of God.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: The more sanctified a person is the more heavily weighted his prayer time is in adoration.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: Adoration is made out of a solitary soul occupying two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: People only have true understanding when they look at everything from God's perspective. Authentic wisdom begins when we understand that God is to be the object of our devotion, our adoration, and our reverence.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: The adoration of the sun was one of the earliest and most natural forms of religious expression. Complex modern theologies are merely involvements and amplifications of this simple aboriginal belief.
quotes.author: Manly Hall

quotes.quote: Word and worship belong indissolubly to each other. All worship is an intelligent and loving response to the revelation of God, because it is the adoration of His name. Therefore, acceptable worship is impossible without preaching. For preaching is making known the name of the Lord, and worship is praising the name of the Lord made known.
quotes.author: John Stott

quotes.quote: Adoration is the spontaneous yearning of the heart to worship, honor, magnify, and bless God. We ask nothing but to cherish him. We seek nothing but his exaltation. We focus on nothing but his goodness.
quotes.author: Richard J. Foster

quotes.quote: A child of God should be a visible beatitude for joy and happiness, and a living doxology for gratitude and adoration.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Worship is admiration becoming adoration.
quotes.author: Matt Papa

quotes.quote: Our job as humans is to make admiration of others and adoration of God fully conscious and deliberate.
quotes.author: Richard Rohr

quotes.quote: Adoration is caring for God above all else.
quotes.author: Evelyn Underhill

quotes.quote: Adoration drives obedience, but throughout history people are prone to forget the faithfulness of God yesterday.
quotes.author: Matt Chandler

quotes.quote: Worship is the actual act of ascribing worth directly to God. Worshipful actions may do this indirectly, but when the Bible commands and commends worship as our highest expression, it is not talking about anything other than direct, intentional, Vertical outpouring of adoration.
quotes.author: James MacDonald

quotes.quote: The Life of true holiness is rooted in the soil of awed adoration .
quotes.author: J. I. Packer

quotes.quote: Adoration in prayer reminds us of God's identity and inclination. As we list his attributes, lifting up his character and personality, we reinforce our understanding of who he is.
quotes.author: Bill Hybels

quotes.quote: God as we ought to worship Him. God is Spirit, so we must worship Him in spirit and truth, that is, by a humble and true adoration of spirit in the depth and center of our souls.
quotes.author: Brother Lawrence

quotes.quote: The Spirit of prayer makes us so intimate with God that we scarcely pass through an experience before we speak to Him about it, either in supplication, in sighing, in pouring out our woes before Him, in fervent requests, or in thanksgiving and adoration.
quotes.author: Ole Hallesby

quotes.quote: Adoration in prayer purges our spirit and prepares us to listen to God.
quotes.author: Bill Hybels

quotes.quote: The heart wants what it wants. There's no logic to these things. You meet someone and you fall in love and that's that.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: We adore titles and heredities in our hearts and ridicule them with our mouths. This is our democratic privilege.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You are much closer than you think to creating a life you adore.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: I was not born to be free, I was born to adore and obey.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: I love you, and because I love you, I would sooner have you hate me for telling you the truth than adore me for telling you lies.
quotes.author: Pietro Aretino

quotes.quote: Man is made to adore and to obey: but if you will not command him, if you give him nothing to worship, he will fashion his own divinities, and find a chieftain in his own passions.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: We women adore failures. They lean on us.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Not he that adorns but he that adores makes a divinity.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: At the point when affection is not frenzy, it is not adore.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.quote: The People adore authority.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Worship is basically adoration, and we adore only what delights us. There is no such thing as sad adoration or unhappy praise.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: Jump for joy as we accomplish the dreams we adore.
quotes.author: Patch Adams

quotes.quote: If you wear things you adore, you just look better.
quotes.author: Margherita Missoni

quotes.quote: To adore one has to yearn.
quotes.author: Will Advise

quotes.quote: There is no treatment for adore, but to love far more.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: To adore the conqueror, who now beholds Cherub and seraph rolling in the flood.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: To find true love simply one must just adore.
quotes.author: Will Advise

quotes.quote: The ignorant man always adores what he cannot understand.
quotes.author: Cesare Lombroso

quotes.quote: All you require is adore. But just a little chocolate at times will not damage.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: The wind is blowing. Adore the wind.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Humanity adores only those who cause it to perish.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: We all romanticize the people we adore.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: We adore chaos because we love to produce order.
quotes.author: M. C. Escher

quotes.quote: It is the greatest shot of adrenaline to be doing what you have wanted to do so badly. You almost feel like you could fly without the plane.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: You only can live on adrenaline for so long; one thing is for sure, it doesn't pay the bills.
quotes.author: John Barrow

quotes.quote: The adrenaline and stress of an adventure are better than a thousand peaceful days.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Sometimes you need a little crisis to get your adrenaline flowing and help you realize your potential.
quotes.author: Jeannette Walls

quotes.quote: You needed jolts of fear, little hits of adrenaline, to appreciate the buzz of life.
quotes.author: Barbara Claypole White

quotes.quote: High risk is high adrenaline.
quotes.author: Jason Statham

quotes.quote: Because the pot takes the edge off the adrenaline, and it also clears your mind of it, and then you can see things a lot clearer.
quotes.author: Tommy Chong

quotes.quote: You want leaders driven by mission – not by adrenaline. No one wants to work with people who need to be heroes more than they need to be catalysts.
quotes.author: Robert Watson

quotes.quote: Nothing activates adrenaline production like pain.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: You have to balance reason with passion; reason keeps you open, passion keeps your adrenaline going.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A touch of the jitters sharpens the mind, gets the adrenaline flowing and helps you to focus.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: I’ve learned how to turn self-doubt into an energy source and to metabolize fear into a result-producing adrenaline.
quotes.author: Michael Strahan

quotes.quote: That's what falling in love really amounted to, your brain on drugs. Adrenaline and dopamine, oxytocin and serotonin. Chemical insanity, celebrated by poets.
quotes.author: Tess Gerritsen

quotes.quote: Channel your adrenaline, so that it powers you forward rather than hold you back.
quotes.author: Holly Maxwell Boydell

quotes.quote: Stop being an adrenaline junkie who is waiting for the happy ending instead of seeing the happy being.
quotes.author: Andrea T. Goeglein

quotes.quote: Don't aim for perfection. Aim for progress. Learn to slow the process down when your adrenaline gets pumping.
quotes.author: Kerry Patterson

quotes.quote: The simple truth is that there is nothing like a good challenge to get the adrenaline going.
quotes.author: Naina Lal Kidwai

quotes.quote: Adulthood is like the vet, and we're all the dogs that were excited for the car ride until we realized where we're going.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Adulthood is not an age, but a stage of knowledge of self.
quotes.author: John Fowles

quotes.quote: Maturity is a bitter disappointment for which no remedy exists, unless laughter could be said to remedy anything.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: For in every adult there dwells the child that was, and in every child there lies the adult that will be.
quotes.author: John Connolly

quotes.quote: Adults are just obsolete children and the hell with them.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The tough thing about adulthood is it starts before you even know it starts.
quotes.author: Robert Redford

quotes.quote: Adulthood brings with it a pernicious illusion of control.
quotes.author: Juan Gabriel

quotes.quote: Adulthood is the ever-shrinking period between childhood and old age. It is the apparent aim of modern industrial societies to reduce this period to a minimum.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: Until you're grown-up they send you to reform school. After you're grown-up they send you to the penitentiary.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Adulthood does not exist. Man is an eternal child.
quotes.author: Nelson Rodrigues

quotes.quote: Growing up is losing some illusions, in order to acquire others.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Adulthood was invented to repair the wounds of childhood.
quotes.author: Joy Browne

quotes.quote: Adulthood it a glacier encroaching quietly on youth. When it arrives, the stamp of childhood suddenly freezes, capturing us for good in the image of our last act, the pose we struck when the ice of age set in.
quotes.author: Ian Caldwell

quotes.quote: Adulthood is knowing that a fully realized character is always more important than the lines.
quotes.author: Megan Crane

quotes.quote: Adolescence is the conjugator of childhood and adulthood.
quotes.author: Louise J. Kaplan

quotes.quote: People evolve and it's important to not stop evolving just because you've reached adulthood.
quotes.author: J. K. Simmons

quotes.quote: Adulthood has something to do with not choosing any of the pure points of view, but living about half of what you really want to live.
quotes.author: Robert Bly

quotes.quote: Adulthood is like looking both ways before you cross the street and then getting hit by an airplane.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Once you've raised a child to adulthood, you can only be as demanding as your offspring allow.
quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

quotes.quote: Part of adulthood is searching for the people who understand you.
quotes.author: Hanya Yanagihara

quotes.quote: People thought becoming an adult meant that all your acts had consequences; in fact it was just the opposite.
quotes.author: Chad Harbach

quotes.quote: The great challenge of adulthood is holding on to your idealism after you lose your innocence.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: Childhood and adulthood were not factors of age but states of mind.
quotes.author: Alex Shakar

quotes.quote: You're a grown-up, and you get to decide what behaviors affect you for five minutes versus what behaviors change you as a person.
quotes.author: Kelly Williams Brown

quotes.quote: Adolescence is a border between childhood and adulthood. Like all borders, it's teeming with energy and fraught with danger.
quotes.author: Mary Pipher

quotes.quote: With adulthood comes responsibility.
quotes.author: Mary Lydon Simonsen

quotes.quote: A child becomes an adult when he realizes that he has a right not only to be right but also to be wrong.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: The great challenge of adulthood is holding on to your idealism after you lose your innocence
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: The body grows slowly and steadily but the soul grows by leaps and bounds. It may come to its full stature in an hour.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: Adulthood can do the most horrific things to the best of people.
quotes.author: Neal Shusterman

quotes.quote: Being an adult means accepting those situations where no action is possible.
quotes.author: John D. MacDonald

quotes.quote: We're all told at some point in time that we can no longer play the children's game, we just don't know when that's gonna be. Some of us are told at eighteen, some of us are told at forty, but we're all told.
quotes.author: Scout Barry (Barry Moss)

quotes.quote: Get old, you can't even cuss someone and have it bother 'em. Everything you do is either worthless or sadly amusing.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: Your hair got whiter, your ears got bigger, your nose got longer, but you still retain that unique, elusive pain in the ass quality that drives me berserk.
quotes.author: Oscar Madison

quotes.quote: The memory of having been read to is a solace one carries through adulthood. It can wash over a multitude of parental sins.
quotes.author: Kathleen Rockwell Lawrence

quotes.quote: In the earlier periods of history. adolescence was virtually unknown...Today, the span between childhood and adulthood may extend over ten years. Deferred adulthood is synonymous with deferred responsibility.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Another belief of mine: that everyone else my age is an adult, whereas I am merely in disguise.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: If this was adulthood, the only improvement she could detect in her situation was that now she could eat dessert without eating her vegetables.
quotes.author: Lisa Alther

quotes.quote: We have not passed that subtle line between childhood and adulthood until we move from the passive voice to the active voice— that is until we have stopped saying, 'It got lost,' and say, 'I lost it.'
quotes.author: George Harris

quotes.quote: When they tell you to grow up, they mean stop growing.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: We live protracted adolescence. At some point, you must leave the party.
quotes.author: Don Henley

quotes.quote: Being a grown-up means assuming responsibility for yourself, for your children, and— here's the big curve— for your parents
quotes.author: Wendy Wasserstein

quotes.quote: Growing up has never been easy but / Being an adult it gets a whole lot worse / When you gotta make your holidays magical / You realize how life goes and takes a turn.
quotes.author: Dimitri Dunn

quotes.quote: I do not want into adulthood, I do not want / This is an eternal race with everyone mortgages / Loans, responsibility, no freedom, no lust / It's easier to be a child and cuz I don't want into adulthood / Really.
quotes.author: Emil Bogatov

quotes.quote: It’s so hard to provide that shade of omniscience / While helping you see that adulthood’s unscripted.
quotes.author: Gavin Castleton

quotes.quote: I don't want to live in adulthood / Raping all the years from my childhood / Riding on a mat down a staircase / Crashing into life like a new wave / Years were passing by as the time stood / Rolling in the filth used to feel good / The child in me is hanging by a thread of hope / Safer in the swing of a jump rope.
quotes.author: John Edward Carey

quotes.quote: I am convinced that most people do not grow up...We marry and dare to have children and call that growing up. I think what we do is mostly grow old. We carry an accumulation of years in our bodies, and on our faces, but generally our real selves, the children inside, are innocent and shy as magnolias.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Being silly is still allowed, not excluded by adulthood. What's excluded by adulthood is thoughtlessness, so be thoughtful and silly.
quotes.author: Hank Green

quotes.quote: Yet there be certain times in a young man’s life, when, through great sorrow or sin, all the boy in him is burnt and seared away so that he passes at one step to the more sorrowful state of manhood.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Children are the closest we have to wisdom, and they become adults the moment that final drop of everything mysterious is strained from them.
quotes.author: Simon Van Booy

quotes.quote: As human beings, we all mature physically from childhood to adolescence and then into adulthood, but our emotions lag behind.
quotes.author: Bernard Sumner

quotes.quote: You think that adulthood will hit and you'll suddenly be more capable. But that doesn't happen, ever, does it?
quotes.author: Sally Hawkins

quotes.quote: People evolve and it's important to not stop evolving just because you've reached 'adulthood.'
quotes.author: J.K. Simmons

quotes.quote: What was it about becoming an adult? The color drained from the days and life became a calendar. I floated in debris of plausible dates and implausible plans.
quotes.author: Lara Prior-Palmer

quotes.quote: One becomes an adult on the day one realizes that others don't have to share one's beliefs or concerns.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Somehow her later years had become a mirror of her lonely childhood.
quotes.author: Amanda Eyre Ward

quotes.quote: But in the bleak light of full adulthood, which is to one's early twenties as Sunday morning is to Saturday night, he can clearly see what it really amounts to he's broke and unemployed.
quotes.author: Neal Stephenson

quotes.quote: For me, adulthood is realizing that there are no grown-ups and everyone else is winging it.
quotes.author: Sarah Beeny

quotes.quote: To be an adult is to be alone.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: When I became a man I put away childish things, including the fear of childishness and the desire to be very grown-up.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Being an adult is the ability to postpone a want for the sake of a family need.
quotes.author: Chris Hogan

quotes.quote: The advantage of the emotions is that they lead us astray.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It is the greatest of all advantages to enjoy no advantage at all.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The advantage of love at first sight is that it delays a second sight.
quotes.author: Natalie Clifford Barney

quotes.quote: When you have an advantage, you are obliged to attack; otherwise you are endangered to lose the advantage.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Steinitz

quotes.quote: Never esteem anything as of advantage to you that will make you break your word or lose your self-respect.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Next to knowing when to seize an opportunity, the most important thing in life is to know when to forgo an advantage.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: For myself, I want no advantage over my fellow man, and if he is weaker than I, all the more is it my duty to help him.
quotes.author: Eugene V. Debs

quotes.quote: Advantage is a better soldier than rashness.
quotes.author: H.G. Bohn

quotes.quote: Our advantages in life generally bear a direct proportion to the exertions we make to secure them; by neglecting them, they often flee from us never to return.
quotes.author: W.T. Burke

quotes.quote: The need for gain, and advantage over others, is one of the chief driving forces behind all human misery.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Move not unless you see an advantage; use not your troops unless there is something to be gained; fight not unless the position is critical.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: There is advantage in the wisdom won from pain.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: The softest things in the world overcome the hardest things in the world. Through this I know the advantage of taking no action.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The advantage of time and place in all practical actions is half a victory; which being lost is irrecoverable.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Drake

quotes.quote: The great advantage about telling the truth is that nobody ever believes it.
quotes.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

quotes.quote: The man who does not read good books has no advantage over the man who cannot read them.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Every little advantage is of great moment when men have to come to blows.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: It is no advantage to be near the light if the eyes are closed.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: We gain no easier advantage than by relentlessly pursuing our goal while others pursue an advantage.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: The great advantage of being in a rut is that when one is in a rut, one knows exactly where one is.
quotes.author: Arnold Bennett

quotes.quote: The advantage of growing up with siblings is that you become very good at fractions.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: One advantage of talking to yourself is that you know at least somebody's listening.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: We always deceive ourselves twice about the people we love - first to their advantage, then to their disadvantage.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: To take advantage of unexpected opportunities, we must leave ourselves available.
quotes.author: David A. Stoddard

quotes.quote: Take advantage of it now, while you are young, and suffer all you can, because these things don't last your whole life.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: Obviously, the highest type of efficiency is that which can utilize existing material to the best advantage.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: Let the fear of a danger be a spur to prevent it; he that fears not, gives advantage to the danger.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Adam and Eve had many advantages, but the principal one was that they escaped teething.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Against great advantages in another, there are no means of defending ourselves except love.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The only advantage of not being too good a housekeeper is that your guests are so pleased to feel how very much better they are.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It is only in adventure that some people succeed in knowing themselves in finding themselves.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Adventure is not outside man; it is within.
quotes.author: David Grayson

quotes.quote: Adventure must be held in delicate fingers. It should be handled, not embraced. It should be sipped, not swallowed at a gulp.
quotes.author: Barry Targan

quotes.quote: Adventures are to the adventurous.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Adventure: the pursuit of life.
quotes.author: Jenny Radcliffe

quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Never say 'no' to adventures. Always say 'yes', otherwise you'll lead a very dull life.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: Adventure is the point where you toss your life on the scales of chance and wait for the pointer to stop.
quotes.author: Murray Leinster

quotes.quote: Adventure is worthwhile.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Adventures don't come calling like unexpected cousins calling from out of town. You have to go looking for them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A man practices the art of adventure when he breaks the chain of routine and renews his life through reading new books, traveling to new places, making new friends, taking up new hobbies, and adopting new viewpoints.
quotes.author: Wilferd Peterson

quotes.quote: Adventure is not hanging on a rope off the side of a mountain. Adventure is an attitude that we must apply to the day to day obstacles of life.
quotes.author: John Amatt

quotes.quote: We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty, charm and adventure. There is no end to the adventures we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
quotes.author: Jawaharial Nehru

quotes.quote: An adventure is only an inconvenience rightly considered. An inconvenience is only an adventure wrongly considered.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: If adventure does not wait on the doorstep, climb out through the window
quotes.author: Loesje

quotes.quote: We're looking for an adventure. It's about getting out there and getting some exposure. It's about making a statement that this can be done, and it can be fun
quotes.author: Nick Pisca

quotes.quote: There is no certainty; there is only adventure.
quotes.author: Roberto Assagioli

quotes.quote: Without adventure civilization is in full decay.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Adventure is the child of courage.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: I decided that adventure was the best way to learn...
quotes.author: Lloyd Alexander

quotes.quote: I believe that all of us have the capacity for one adventure inside us, but great adventure is facing responsibility day after day.
quotes.author: William Gordon

quotes.quote: A large volume of adventures may be grasped within this little span of life, by him who interests his heart in everything.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: All great adventures have moments that are really crap.
quotes.author: Ellen Potter

quotes.quote: If travel has momentum and wants to stay in motion, as I mentioned earlier, then adventure has the gravitational pull of a black hole. The more you do it, the more you find a way to keep doing it.
quotes.author: Josh Gates

quotes.quote: We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty, charm and adventure. There is no end to the adventures we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
quotes.author: Jawaharal Nehru

quotes.quote: Adventure should be 80 percent 'I think this is manageable,' but it's good to have that last 20 percent where you're right outside your comfort zone. Still safe, but outside your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.quote: Adventure must start with running away from home.
quotes.author: William Bolitho

quotes.quote: Adventure is the vitaminizing element in histories both individual and social.
quotes.author: William Bolitho

quotes.quote: A man practices the art of adventure when he heroically faces up to life. When he has the daring to open doors to new experiences. When he is unafraid of new ideas, new theories and new philosophies. When he has the curiosity to experiment. When he breaks the chain of routine.
quotes.author: Wilfred Peterson

quotes.quote: Adventure, yeah. I guess that's what you call it when everybody comes back alive.
quotes.author: Mercedes Lackey

quotes.quote: I'd rather sing one wild song and burst my heart with it than live a thousand years watching my digestion and being afraid of the wet.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: Look at every experience as an adventure.
quotes.author: Brenda Bruce

quotes.quote: Blessed are curious, for they shall have adventures.
quotes.author: Lovelle Drachman

quotes.quote: The spirit of adventure, the lure of the unknown, the thrill of a gallant quest. How very grand indeed.
quotes.author: Norton Juster

quotes.quote: There ought not to be anything in the whole universe that man can't poke his nose into—that's the way we're built and I assume that there's some reason for it.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Both life and death are part of the same Great Adventure. Never yet was worthy adventure worthily carried through by the man who put his personal safety first.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: But life is a great adventure, and the worst of all fears is the fear of living.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A work of art is above all an adventure of the mind.
quotes.author: Eugene Ionesco

quotes.quote: The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences.
quotes.author: Jon Krakauer

quotes.quote: Each day is an adventure in discovering the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: To awaken quite alone in a strange town is one of the most pleasant sensations in the world. You are surrounded by adventure.
quotes.author: Freya Stark

quotes.quote: My favorite thing is to go where I've never been.
quotes.author: Diane Arbus

quotes.quote: The voyage is discovery is not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: There is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.
quotes.author: Chris McCandless

quotes.quote: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Life is either a great adventure or nothing.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The most fulfilling adventures happen when you start your journey without knowing where you're going because only then are you free to experience the unexpected detours you're meant to take.
quotes.author: A.J. Darkholme

quotes.quote: May your trails be crooked, winding, lonesome, dangerous, leading to the most amazing view.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Each thing she learned became a part of herself to be used over and over in new adventures.
quotes.author: Kate Seredy

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Stuff your eyes with wonder, live as if you'd drop dead in ten seconds. See the world. It's more fantastic than any dream made or paid for in factories.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: It is good to have an end to journey toward; but it is the journey that matters, in the end.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: If you miss the adventure, you miss all. If your life is not that of an adventure, of a search into the unknown, then you are living in vain.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: A life without adventure is likely to be unsatisfying, but a life in which adventure is allowed to take whatever form it will is sure to be short.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Adventure is just bad planning.
quotes.author: Roald Amundsen

quotes.quote: For me, an adventure is something that I can take an active part in but that I don't have total control over.
quotes.author: Peter Croft

quotes.quote: Walk into the woods. Keep walking. Do not plan where you are going. Take whatever directions appeal in the moment. Keep walking. When you are lost, look into the eyes of the dragon, then your adventure begins.
quotes.author: Tom Waterkrag

quotes.quote: Every man can transform the world from one of monotony and drabness to one of excitement and adventure.
quotes.author: Irving Wallace

quotes.quote: There was nowhere to go but everywhere, so just keep on rolling under the stars.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: The wonderful things in life are the things you do, not the things you have.
quotes.author: Reinhold Messner

quotes.quote: Jobs fill your pockets, but adventures fill your soul.
quotes.author: Jaime Lyn Beatty

quotes.quote: Adventure is allowing the unexpected to happen to you. Exploration is experiencing what you have not experienced before.
quotes.author: Richard Aldington

quotes.quote: Our drive, our ruggedness, our unquenchable optimism and zeal, and elan go back to the challenges of the untrammeled wilderness.
quotes.author: Harvey Broome

quotes.quote: I will find a way or make one.
quotes.author: Robert Peary

quotes.quote: Life is an adventure / with all its sights to see, / a brilliant, beautiful gift / that means everything to me.
quotes.author: Kassandra M. Konecny

quotes.quote: I am not an adventurer by choice but by fate.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: Adventure is worthwhile in itself.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: It is only in adventure that some people succeed in knowing themselves â€” in finding themselves.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: There is more security in the adventurous and exciting, for in movement there is life, and in change there is power.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Fill your life with tiny and large adventurous moments.
quotes.author: Sark

quotes.quote: Always remember, it's simply not an adventure worth telling if there aren't any dragons.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach.

quotes.quote: A large volume of adventures may be grasped within this little span of life, by him who interests his heart in everything.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: Without adventure civilization is in full decay.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Life is either a great adventure or nothing.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Blessed are the curious, for they shall have adventures.
quotes.author: Lovelle Drachman

quotes.quote: A man practices the art of adventure when he heroically faces up to life. When he has the daring to open doors to new experiences.
quotes.author: Wilfred Peterson

quotes.quote: There are some of us who are just born with a more adventurous spirit than others.
quotes.author: Lizzy Caplan

quotes.quote: Fill your life with adventure, not things. Have stories to tell, not stuff to show.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Adventure is not outside man; it is within.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Nothing adventured, nothing attained.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: Adventure: the pursuit of life.
quotes.author: Jenny Radcliffe

quotes.quote: Adventure is worthwhile.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Believe me! The secret of reaping the greatest fruitfulness and the greatest enjoyment from life is to live dangerously!
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Nothing makes a man so adventurous as an empty pocket.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Say yes to adventures.
quotes.author: Steve Pavlina

quotes.quote: To the sober person adventurous conduct often seems insanity.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Adventures are to the adventurous.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: There is no end to the adventures that we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: Let your walks now be a little more adventurous.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Plunge boldly into the thick of life, and seize it where you will, it is always interesting.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Only those who risk going too far can possibly find out how far they can go.
quotes.author: T.S Eliot

quotes.quote: Adventure, without it, why live?
quotes.author: Hortense Odlum

quotes.quote: It is always the adventurers who do great things, not the sovereigns of great empires.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It is always the adventurous who accomplish great things.
quotes.author: Baron de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: One way to get the most out of life is to look upon it as an adventure.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Let us step into the night and pursue that flighty temptress, adventure.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: A hard beginning maketh a good ending.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: A stumble is not a fall.
quotes.author: Haitian (on adversity)

quotes.quote: A true champion believes in themselves when no one else does.
quotes.author: nosagirl05

quotes.quote: Adversity is a gift.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Adversity makes strange bedfellows.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Anyone can stand adversity but to test a person's character, give them power.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Constant dripping will wear away a stone.
quotes.author: Greek Proverb

quotes.quote: Difficulties make you a jewel.
quotes.author: Japanese (on adversity)

quotes.quote: Don't buy other people's problems.
quotes.author: Chinese (on buying and selling)

quotes.quote: Don't let the critics get you down.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every adversity carries with it the seed of equal or greater benefit.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Everybody makes mistakes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Familiarity breeds contempt.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: If God wants people to suffer, he sends them too much understanding.
quotes.author: Yiddish (on balance and moderation)

quotes.quote: If the only tool you have is a hammer, you tend to see every problem as a nail.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: If you would hit the mark, you must aim a little above it.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: It is better to give than to receive.
quotes.author: Jesus

quotes.quote: It is the last straw that breaks the camel's back.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: It's not the end of the world.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Just because something doesn't do what you planned it to do, doesn't mean it's useless.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Kingdoms divided soon fall.
quotes.author: Bible (Matthew 12:25)

quotes.quote: Necessity never made a good bargain.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: No news is good news.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One man's beard is on fire; another man warms his hands on it.
quotes.author: Kashmiri (on perversity)

quotes.quote: Out of adversity comes opportunity.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Roll with the punches.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Smooth seas do not make skillful sailors.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: When you die, make others cry because you left something behind not because they lost something.
quotes.author: Submitter's name lost

quotes.quote: When you fall into a pit, you either die or get out.
quotes.author: Chinese (on adversity)

quotes.quote: We need to stop interrupting what people are interested in & be what people are interested in.
quotes.author: Craig Davis

quotes.quote: Nobody counts the number of ads you run; they just remember the impression you make.
quotes.author: Bill Bernbach

quotes.quote: Nobody reads ads. People read what interests them, and sometimes it's an ad.
quotes.author: Howard Luck Gossage

quotes.quote: Advertisements are now so numerous that they are very negligently perused
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Advertising, as a single entity capable of creating vast changes in our social structure, simply does not exist. Its impact is too diffuse, too omnidirectional.
quotes.author: William Hesse

quotes.quote: When executing advertising, it's best to think of yourself as an uninvited guest in the living room of a prospect who has the magical power to make you disappear instantly
quotes.author: John O'Toole

quotes.quote: There is a great deal of advertising that is much better than the product. When that happens, all that the good advertising will do is put you out of business faster.
quotes.author: Jerry Della Femina

quotes.quote: The most powerful element in advertising is the truth.
quotes.author: Bill Bernbach

quotes.quote: I am one who believes that one of the greatest dangers of advertising is not that of misleading people, but that of boring them to death.
quotes.author: Leo Burnett

quotes.quote: Advertising is what you do when you can't go see somebody. That's all it is.
quotes.author: Fairfax Cone

quotes.quote: The simplest definition of advertising, and one that will probably meet the test of critical examination, is that advertising is selling in print.
quotes.author: Daniel Starch

quotes.quote: Advertising in the final analysis should be news. If it is not news it is worthless.
quotes.author: Adolph S. Ochs

quotes.quote: The real question is, will they buy it?
quotes.author: Noel Peebles

quotes.quote: Creative without strategy is called art.' Creative with strategy is called advertising'.
quotes.author: Jef I. Richards

quotes.quote: Advertising may be described as the science of arresting the human intelligence long enough to get money from it.
quotes.author: S Leacoc

quotes.quote: If advertising had a little more respect for the public, the public would have a lot more respect for advertising.
quotes.author: James Randolph Adams

quotes.quote: I have always believed that writing advertisements is the second most profitable form of writing. The first, of course, is ransom notes.
quotes.author: Philip Dusenberry

quotes.quote: The man who stops advertising to save money is like the man who stops the clock to save time.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Brands are in people's peripheral vision, so they need to be blindingly obvious to get noticed at all.
quotes.author: David Turner

quotes.quote: Just because something is trending doesn't mean you jump on it.
quotes.author: Nancy Hill

quotes.quote: Brands should think of themselves not as storytellers but storybuilders. We plant seeds of content and let our community build on it.
quotes.author: Amy Pascal

quotes.quote: The very first law in advertising is to avoid the concrete promise and cultivate the delightfully vague.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Advertising is the modern substitute for argument; its function is to make the worse appear the better.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: If people aren't going to talk about your product, then it's not good enough.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kalmikoff

quotes.quote: Advertising is legalized lying.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: One ad is worth more to a paper than forty editorials.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Promise, large promise, is the soul of an advertisement.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The aim of marketing is to know and understand the customer so well the product or service fits him and sells itself.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Advertising is the greatest art form of the twentieth century.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Advertising is a valuable economic factor because it is the cheapest way of selling goods, particularly if the goods are worthless.
quotes.author: Sinclair Lewis

quotes.quote: Good marketing makes the company look smart. Great marketing makes the customer feel smart.
quotes.author: Joe Chernov

quotes.quote: The greatest thing to be achieved in advertising, in my opinion, is believability, and nothing is more believable than the product itself.
quotes.author: Leo Burnett

quotes.quote: We want consumers to say, 'That's a hell of a product' instead of, 'That's a hell of an ad'.
quotes.author: Leo Burnett

quotes.quote: The more informative your advertising, the more persuasive it will be.
quotes.author: David Ogivly

quotes.quote: For most companies, the ultimate objective for advertising should be to have a good return on the investment in the advertising campaign.
quotes.author: J. Scott Armstrong

quotes.quote: Comparative advertising is a source of important information to consumers and assists them in making rational purchase decisions.
quotes.author: J. Scott Armstrong

quotes.quote: Truth and honesty are vital for advertising, especially for organizations that desire continuing relationships.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The applications of the principles and methods of psychology to advertising was a need which was felt by all.
quotes.author: Walter Dill Scott

quotes.quote: In pleasure our minds expand. We become extremely suggestible and are likely to see everything in a favorable light.
quotes.author: Walter Dill Scott

quotes.quote: Facts are irrelevant. What matters is what the consumer believes.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: You can spend a fortune on your advertising, but most people will ignore it.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Never write an advertisement which you wouldn't want your own family to read. You wouldn't tell lies to your own wife. Don't tell them to mine. Do as you would be done by. If you tell lies about a product, you will be found out.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: Without promotion something terrible happens. Nothing!
quotes.author: P.T. Barnum

quotes.quote: Doing business without advertising is like winking at a girl in the dark.
quotes.author: Stuart Henderson Britt

quotes.quote: Make it simple. Make it memorable. Make it inviting to look at. Make it fun to read.
quotes.author: Leo Burnett

quotes.quote: Any fool can write a bad ad, but it takes a real genius to keep his hands off a good one.
quotes.author: Leo Burnett

quotes.quote: Fun without sell gets nowhere, but sell without fun tends to become obnoxious.
quotes.author: Leo Burnett

quotes.quote: There was a time when I used to get lots of ideas. I thought up the Seven Deadly Sins in one afternoon. The only thing I've come up with recently is advertising.
quotes.author: Peter Cook

quotes.quote: The business of the advertiser is to see that we go about our business with some magic spell or tune or slogan throbbing quietly in the background of our minds.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: The modern Little Red Riding Hood, reared on singing commercials, has no objection to being eaten by the wolf.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: A good example is the best sermon.
quotes.author: English (on advice)

quotes.quote: A penny saved is a penny earned.
quotes.author: Scottish Proverb

quotes.quote: A stitch in time saves nine.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Advice after mischief is like medicine after death.
quotes.author: Danish (on advice)

quotes.quote: Advise no one to go to war or marry.
quotes.author: Spanish (on advice)

quotes.quote: Avoid a cure that is worse than the disease.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Before you marry keep both eyes open; after marriage keep one eye shut.
quotes.author: Jamaican (on marriage)

quotes.quote: Better late than never.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Choose the hills wisely on which you must do battle.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Do good to thy friend to keep him, to thy enemy to gain him.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Don't believe everything you hear.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Early to bed and early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Focus on what's right in your world instead of what's wrong.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Get out of harms way.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Grin and bear it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you are hiding, don't light a fire.
quotes.author: Ghanaian (on common sense)

quotes.quote: If you can't bite, better not show your teeth.
quotes.author: Yiddish (on common sense)

quotes.quote: In night there is counsel.
quotes.author: Greek (on advice)

quotes.quote: Interest on debt grows without rain.
quotes.author: Yiddish (on indebtedness)

quotes.quote: It is better to prevent than to cure.
quotes.author: Peruvian (on common sense)

quotes.quote: It is easy to advise the wise.
quotes.author: Serbian (on advice)

quotes.quote: Keep an open mind.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Lend your money and lose your friend.
quotes.author: William Caxton

quotes.quote: Live life to the fullest because you may not have it tomorrow.
quotes.author: reader's name lost

quotes.quote: Live your own life, for you will die your own death.
quotes.author: Latin (on life and living)

quotes.quote: Make haste slowly.
quotes.author: Suetonius

quotes.quote: Marry in haste, repent in leisure.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Neither a borrower nor a lender be.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Never bet your money on another man's game.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never give advice unasked.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never spend your money before you have it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One day at a time.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Out of debt, out of danger.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Put on your thinking cap.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Rather go to bed supperless than run in debt for a breakfast.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Save for a rainy day.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Seek advice but use your own common sense.
quotes.author: Yiddish (on advice)

quotes.quote: Seize the day.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Spending is quick; earning is slow.
quotes.author: Russian (on thrift)

quotes.quote: Teeth placed before the tongue give good advice.
quotes.author: Italian (on advice)

quotes.quote: The best cure for a short temper is a long walk.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The only real test in life is to conquer your fears.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The only way to get the best of an argument is to avoid it.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Vessels large may venture more but little boats should keep near shore.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: When life's path is steep, keep your mind even.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Wish not so much to live long as to live well.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Write injuries in dust, benefits in marble.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Yield to all and you will soon have nothing to yield.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Just smiling goes a long way toward making you feel better about life. And when you feel better about life, your life is better.
quotes.author: Art Linkletter

quotes.quote: One of the quickest ways to feel better is be kind, helpful and generous.
quotes.author: Frances Goodhart

quotes.quote: Yet sometimes just reliving the memory behind an emotion is enough to make you feel better.
quotes.author: Andrew Tener
