quotes.quote: Happy life has more to do with what's inside you than with who's traveling beside you.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: When you face the adversity of challenging experiences head on you, you develop the skills, abilities, and strength, to face other adversities in the future.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: An action is always better than no action, and the right action will create more certainty and faith in your ability to take bigger risks.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: Don't play hide n seek with life. You can't hide form life challenges without seeking timely solution.
quotes.author: Sandeep Ravidutt Sharma

quotes.quote: Try your best to stay positive even when tides are not in your favor.
quotes.author: Sandeep Ravidutt Sharma

quotes.quote: Life's hard. It's even harder when you're stupid.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: It is better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to open one's mouth and remove all doubt.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Everything and anything is possible when you believe, put forth some action, and focus!
quotes.author: Aliya Abbas

quotes.quote: To push forward and show the world that you won't take any more of this nonsense truly defines the person you are and want to be.
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.quote: Hitting your bottom is like depression--it is the first step towards feeling better.
quotes.author: Tuchy Palmieri

quotes.quote: Whatever you think, that you will be. If you think yourselves weak, weak you will be; if you think yourselves strong, strong you will be.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Have faith in yourselves, great convictions are the mothers of great deeds.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: The winner in you must be ready to show up at all times, without fail in any given situation.
quotes.author: Laura Lyseight

quotes.quote: Accept the challenges so that you may feel the exhilaration of victory.
quotes.author: George S Patton

quotes.quote: Seek not, my soul, the life of immortals; but enjoy to the full the resources that are within thy reach.
quotes.author: Pindar

quotes.quote: Look not mournfully into the past. It comes not back again. Wisely improve the present. It is thine. Go forth to meet the shadowy future, without fear.
quotes.author: Longfellow

quotes.quote: Concentrating on the present moment can make you feel calmer, more grounded and accepting.
quotes.author: Frances Goodhart

quotes.quote: But try to remind yourself that 'feeling better' is not set in stone. Only you can know what 'feeling better' really means.
quotes.author: Frances Goodhart

quotes.quote: If you can't reach the sky the first time you jump, grab onto something and gradually climb your way to the top.
quotes.author: Derrick D. Richardson

quotes.quote: You, alone, are already all the things you could ever hope to be: confident, happy, free, spirited, ambitious, determined, independent, strong, and most of all, brave.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: It doesn't mean you're ready to sign a lifetime oath of singleness, or that you've given up the hope of finding your Happy Ending.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: If you feel better after examining an emotion, it's because you're mind replaced a negative assumption with a new, more positive interpretation.
quotes.author: Andrew Tener

quotes.quote: You can be young without money, but you can be old without it.
quotes.author: Tennesse Williams

quotes.quote: Gain strength through adversity simply means, what doesn't kill you, makes you stronger.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: Everyone wants to shine for someone. It's who you want to shine for that determines your character.
quotes.author: Derrick D. Richardson

quotes.quote: At times in life we get tired, we may get weak, and forget to seek, but as we sit patiently, we hear him speak.
quotes.author: Arlene De’Sha Jennings

quotes.quote: Always hold your head high, it will provide a sense of pride and will feel better inside.
quotes.author: Arlene De’Sha Jennings

quotes.quote: When life sends us a battlefield, we are blessed to be armed with a shield.
quotes.author: Arlene De’Sha Jennings

quotes.quote: Faith and doubt cannot exist in the same time, for one will dispel the other.
quotes.author: Thomas S Monson

quotes.quote: Never say, 'No', never say 'I cannot', for you are infinite, even time and space are nothing compared with your nature. You can do anything and everything, you are almighty.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Money puts you in a circle that broadens your horizons and leads you to exposure.
quotes.author: Derrick D. Richardson

quotes.quote: Challenges will come your way. But you must not lose faith or get discouraged by the temporary setbacks and roadblocks.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: Nothing is this world is impossible to accomplish if you are determined to pursue it. You have within you immense power, strength, and potential.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: Difficulties only make you aware of your strengths and bring out the best in you. They have made you who you are and have helped you reach where you are today.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: So come what may, never give up and never lose hope. No matter how big the troubles are, they cannot keep you down if your determination to get back on your feet is strong enough.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: When the chips are down and you are feeling worn out, give yourself a boost to get yourself back on track.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: Above all else, honor your body's own wisdom; you'll know which ideas feel good to you and which, for whatever reason, give you pause.
quotes.author: Eve Menezes Cunningham

quotes.quote: Let yourself picture everything being better than you've ever dreamed.
quotes.author: Eve Menezes Cunningham

quotes.quote: To do the best you can each moment is to manifest genius in living.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart . Who looks inside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Watch the world not just by your eyes but through your heart. Life is beautiful.
quotes.author: Sandeep Ravidutt Sharma

quotes.quote: Don't ignore crisis when it comes. They are meant to remind us that the wisdoms of yesterday had expired and should be discarded for new ones.
quotes.author: Ugochukwu Victor Okpara

quotes.quote: As tides of life rise and fall, life is constant, like the waves crashing upon the shore. Persistence is the key in high and low times...
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: From the word go, those who win the race of success and legacy started with the lifestyle of humility, audacity, integrity, sagacity and prosperity-mentality.
quotes.author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson

quotes.quote: Every experience you have experienced were necessary to enable you see-through the responsibility in maturity.
quotes.author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson

quotes.quote: No matter the challenges you are going through, great people went through it and came out of it. You are coming out a success; you are a success.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: Life is given. Living is work.
quotes.author: Derrick D. Richardson

quotes.quote: It takes more than your paycheck to provide a nice household. It also takes giving of yourself.
quotes.author: Derrick D. Richardson

quotes.quote: Always give with a happy heart--that's what makes it real.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Way to a happy life-believe that anything is possible.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Responsibility does not only lie with the leaders of our countries or with those who have been appointed or elected to do a particular job. It lies with each of us individually. Peace, for example, starts within each one of us. When we have inner peace, we can be at peace with those around us.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: To be merciful means to grow in a love which is courageous, generous and real.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: We must also look into our feelings of grief and loss. When we accept that everything is constantly changing, when we accept the inevitability that people and animals die, we can deal with pain in a much better fashion.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys

quotes.quote: Embrace your grief and your sadness felt towards those that have passed and remember them with love.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys

quotes.quote: Replace your grief with love and appreciation. That is truly what any who have departed from our lives would wish for us.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys

quotes.quote: You are more powerful than your circumstances. They don't define you. You do.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: The story you tell yourself defines the life you live and the actions you take. It's important to tell yourself a positive story.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: While fear and worry can weaken or harden you, love transforms you and the people and situations around you.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: You don't have to wait to feel positive enough for a smile to happen. You can generate a positive feeling by smiling. Your smile can be the source of your positivity, not the result of it. Smile more today.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Success is living my life based on purpose.
quotes.author: Malene Barnett

quotes.quote: Be authentic. Own your work style and don't ever think you have to change who you are to be successful.
quotes.author: Cheryl Day

quotes.quote: The world's successful people are more good and giving than most imagine.
quotes.author: Brendon Burchard

quotes.quote: The aesthetic can have its revenge upon ideology by revealing a power to complicate that is also a power to undermine.
quotes.author: Murray Krieger

quotes.quote: Fascism is fundamentally and at bottom an aesthetic conception, and it is your function as creators of beautiful things to portray with the greatest efficacy the sublime beauty and inevitable reality of the Fascist ideal.
quotes.author: Louis de Bernières

quotes.quote: Aesthetic emotion puts man in a state favorable to the reception of erotic emotion. Art is the accomplice of love. Take love away and there is no longer art.
quotes.author: Remy de Gourmont

quotes.quote: Beauty is how you feel inside, and it reflects in your eyes. It is not something physical.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: The beautiful, which is perhaps inseparable from art, is not after all tied to the subject, but to the pictorial representation. In this way and in no other does art overcome the ugly without avoiding it.
quotes.author: Paul Klee

quotes.quote: Appreciate the aesthetic and creativity of the nature and be grateful for being part of it.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: Nature holds the key to our aesthetic, intellectual, cognitive and even spiritual satisfaction.
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.quote: In the world there exists no aesthetic plane, not even the aesthetic plane of goodness.
quotes.author: Clarice Lispector

quotes.quote: Aesthetic freedom is like free speech; it is, indeed, a form of free speech.
quotes.author: George Edward Woodberry

quotes.quote: Only men are capable of aesthetic greatness.
quotes.author: Brian Sewell

quotes.quote: My particular aesthetic of light and color and design wouldn't change as a result of working with computer graphics rather than with slit scan or miniatures.
quotes.author: Douglas Trumbull

quotes.quote: Paper is a uniquely beautiful format, more so than the web, I think: you need to invest in the aesthetics.
quotes.author: Dave Eggers

quotes.quote: Art is the aesthetic ordering of experience to express meanings in symbolic terms.
quotes.author: Daniel Bell

quotes.quote: In so far as the mind sees things in their eternal aspect, it participates in eternity.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: Aesthetic matters are fundamental for the harmonious development of both society and the individual.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: Just because something causes you to have a feeling of aesthetic beauty does not make it a work of art.
quotes.author: Fred Ross

quotes.quote: It's odd that there is a high level of appreciation of nature. There is the aesthetic side that really loves nature and beauty.
quotes.author: Jerry Garcia

quotes.quote: Aesthetic pleasure is not to be taken lightly; it's very important for the spirit and therefore the health.
quotes.author: Robert Bateman

quotes.quote: Art is an invention of aesthetics, which in turn is an invention of philosophers. What we call art is a game.
quotes.author: Octavio Paz

quotes.quote: All efforts to make politics aesthetic culminate in one thing, war.
quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

quotes.quote: Behind every exquisite thing that existed, there was something tragic.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Aesthetic criticism returns us to the autonomy of imaginative literature and the sovereignty of the solitary soul, the reader not as a person in society but as the deep self, our ultimate inwardness.
quotes.author: Harold Bloom

quotes.quote: I had always wanted to expand to beauty, but I knew I wanted to be able to translate my design aesthetic in an authentic way.
quotes.author: Charlotte Ronson

quotes.quote: The aesthetic experience has to be given. And beauty is a regular experience of every person every person who is not clinically depressed!
quotes.author: Peter Schjeldahl

quotes.quote: Art is the imposing of a pattern on experience, and our aesthetic enjoyment is recognition of the pattern.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: There is none more beautiful than the lover of beauty.
quotes.author: Raheel Farooq

quotes.quote: Aesthetics is for the artist like ornithology is for the birds.
quotes.author: Barnett Newman

quotes.quote: We all appreciated a certain aesthetic, and with that appreciation came a certain stylized presence.
quotes.author: Amber Heard

quotes.quote: The aesthetic principle is the same in every art, only the material differs.
quotes.author: Robert Schumann

quotes.quote: The main reason why men and women make different aesthetic judgments is the fact that the latter, generally incapable of abstraction, only admire what meets their complete approval.
quotes.author: Franz Grillparzer

quotes.quote: All great art is the work of the whole living creature, body and soul, and chiefly of the soul.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Beauty is a combination of qualities. I don't think one can deny that certain people or things feel aesthetically pleasing. But without an equally pleasing being behind that form, there is no beauty there.
quotes.author: Teri Hatcher

quotes.quote: Design can be art. Design can be aesthetics. Design is so simple, that's why it is so complicated.
quotes.author: Paul Rand

quotes.quote: We find beauty not in the thing itself but in the patterns of shadows, the light and the darkness, that one thing against another creates.
quotes.author: Jun'ichirÅ Tanizaki

quotes.quote: Aesthetic judgments, rather than abstract reasoning, guide and shape the process by which we all come to know what we know.
quotes.author: Daniel Tammet

quotes.quote: All I can say about the work I try to do, is that the aesthetic is in reality itself.
quotes.author: Helen Levitt

quotes.quote: Beauty is the main positive form of the aesthetic assimilation of reality, in which aesthetic ideal finds it direct expression.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: I believe that one of the most powerful things of all is aesthetics.
quotes.author: Kalle Lasn

quotes.quote: The more people explore the world, the more they realize in every country there's a different aesthetic. Beauty really is in the eye of the beholder.
quotes.author: Helena Christensen

quotes.quote: In the life of the individual, an aesthetic sensibility is both more authentic and more commendable than a political or religious one.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: There is an aesthetic excitement about painting which is one of the most beautiful experiences that can be. Put things down while you feel that joy.
quotes.author: Charles Webster Hawthorne

quotes.quote: The aesthetic serviceability of objects of beauty is not greatly nor universally heightened by possession.
quotes.author: Thorstein Veblen

quotes.quote: There is a sort of aesthetic poverty about conservatism.
quotes.author: Alan Hollinghurst

quotes.quote: The aesthetic of architecture has to be rooted in a broader idea about human activities like walking, relaxing and communicating. Architecture thinks about how these activities can be given added value.
quotes.author: Thom Mayne

quotes.quote: As for everything else, so for a mathematical theory: beauty can be perceived but not explained.
quotes.author: Arthur Cayley

quotes.quote: The darkening of the world makes the irrationality of art rational: radically darkened art.
quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

quotes.quote: Needing to have reality confirmed and experience enhanced by photographs is an aesthetic consumerism to which everyone is now addicted.
quotes.author: Elizabeth W. Bruss

quotes.quote: Art is the imposing of a pattern on experience, and our aesthetic enjoyment is recognition of the pattern.
quotes.author: Melissa S. Ragain

quotes.quote: The aesthetic can have its revenge upon ideology by revealing a power to complicate that is also a power to undermine.
quotes.author: Michael L. Clark

quotes.quote: The priority of aesthetic value and the privileged status of the literary text had been firmly established among theories.
quotes.author: Michael L. Clark

quotes.quote: I traveled with the aesthetic as its fortunes were rising in the criticism around me, so that it long seemed to me that my career and the fortunes of the aesthetic went hand in hand.
quotes.author: Michael L. Clark

quotes.quote: The companionship of the aesthetic brought with it the need to defend the literary as a mode of discourse whose workings persuade us to distinguish it from other modes.
quotes.author: Michael L. Clark

quotes.quote: The aesthetic component of those instruments enhanced their function but was never central, never an independent, nonutilitarian thing.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Lem

quotes.quote: Aesthetics is the study of ideal form or beauty; it is the philosophy of art.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: Aesthetic detachment will not stop the suffering of desire nor will the agonies of the boudoir cure the desire of suffering.
quotes.author: David Hosford

quotes.quote: A candle in the void, a bubble shining like a bead of quicksilver in the stagnant pool of existence, enchantment condensing inside its walls, the creation of antiworld with no utility but our aesthetic.
quotes.author: David Hosford

quotes.quote: The historical division between the beautiful and the sublime indicates that an aesthetic experience is not necessarily linked to beauty, but can also be induced by the unpleasant, unbalanced, distorted, or even hideous.
quotes.author: Kristine H. Harper

quotes.quote: Aesthetic decay leaves traces and stories on the surface of the object.
quotes.author: Kristine H. Harper

quotes.quote: Aesthetics make life lovely and wonderful, fill it with new forms, and give it progress, and variety and change.
quotes.author: Frank Harris

quotes.quote: It is through its very incompleteness that art becomes complete in beauty, and so addresses itself, not to the faculty of recognition nor to the faculty of reason, but to the aesthetic sense alone.
quotes.author: Frank Harris

quotes.quote: Aesthetics, in fact, are to Ethics in the sphere of conscious civilisation, what in the sphere of the external world.
quotes.author: Frank Harris

quotes.quote: The aesthetics aren't merely a side note, they're as important as anything else.
quotes.author: Sylvain Neuvel

quotes.quote: The aesthetic view of the world is extremely hospitable to many of the uncivilized ideas and dissociated yearnings.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: But perhaps those same people will find it distasteful to see an aesthetic problem taken so seriously
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: In the psychology of aesthetics, there is a name for the moment between the anxiety of confronting something new and the satisfying click of understanding it. It is called an aesthetic aha.
quotes.author: Carmine Gallo

quotes.quote: Aesthetic sense is the twin of one's instinct for self-preservation and is more reliable than ethics.
quotes.author: Dana Amir

quotes.quote: One interesting thing is the idea that people have of a kind of science of Aesthetics.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: It's not the face, but the expressions on it. It's not the voice, but what you say.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: It's not how you look in that body, but the thing you do with it. You are beautiful.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: You are imperfect, permanently and inevitably flawed. And you are beautiful.
quotes.author: Amy Bloom

quotes.quote: It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious - the fundamental emotion which stands at the cradle of true art and true science.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: There is no exquisite beauty without some strangeness in the proportion.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: There is no justification for having an affair.
quotes.author: Shanola Hampton

quotes.quote: The love affair you seek is with yourself.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Of all human powers operating on the affairs of mankind, none is greater than that of competition.
quotes.author: Henry Clay

quotes.quote: Once someone has had the good fortune to share a true love affair with a Golden Retriever, one's life and one's outlook is never quite the same.
quotes.author: Betty White

quotes.quote: Immense power is acquired by assuring yourself in your secret reveries that you were born to control affairs.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Good content is the stuff of love affairs.
quotes.author: Tom Webster

quotes.quote: An affair now and then is good for a marriage. It adds spice, stops it from getting boring I ought to know.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: The best love affairs are those we never had.
quotes.author: Norman Lindsay

quotes.quote: It is frequently a misfortune to have very brilliant men in charge of affairs. They expect too much of ordinary men.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.quote: Never speak about private affairs for the general public to hear.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: The beautiful affair of sun, sky and the sea brings a perfect moment of love, peace and joy
quotes.author: Umair Siddiqui

quotes.quote: Every affair is a fairy tale or a tragedy.
quotes.author: Cherie Priest

quotes.quote: Lack of reciprocity ruins friendships, but makes love affairs exciting for a time.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: People are hurt in love affairs and never recover, more than a boxing match.
quotes.author: George Foreman

quotes.quote: Every man, however wise, needs the advice of some sagacious friend in the affairs of life.
quotes.author: Titus

quotes.quote: In all human affairs there are efforts, and there are results, and the strength of the effort is the measure of the result.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: The End of the Affair is almost like a play.
quotes.author: Neil Jordan

quotes.quote: Any affair, by its very nature, is quite dysfunctional.
quotes.author: Rebekah Brooks

quotes.quote: You put two egos together and you've either got a conflict, which is always interesting, or better yet, a love affair.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Nothing is more interesting in a novel or a play than an affair.
quotes.author: Howard Jacobson

quotes.quote: The affairs of life embrace a multitude of interests, and he who reasons in any one of them, without consulting the rest, is a visionary unsuited to control the business of the world.
quotes.author: James Fenimore Cooper

quotes.quote: Affection reproaches, but does not denounce.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Any love or happiness given to anyone always comes back. Unfortunately we expect it from the same person.
quotes.author: Brahma Kumaris

quotes.quote: Love is one of the strongest feelings one can ever have. It comes over you all of a sudden and totally absorbs before you manage to realize the fact.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Never regret anything you have done with a sincere affection; nothing is lost that is born of the heart.
quotes.author: Basil Rathbone

quotes.quote: We become what we behold.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Affection should not be too sharp eyed, and love is not made by magnifying glasses.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: The hardest of all is learning to be a well of affection, and not a fountain; to show them we love them not when we feel like it, but when they do.
quotes.author: Nan Fairbrother

quotes.quote: Sharing the same passionate love with another person, gives a feeling of being alive! The experience of something real, is unforgettable.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: Needs cause motivation. Deep-rooted desires for esteem, affection, belonging, achievement, self-actualization, power, and control motivate us to push for what we want and need in our lives.
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: Affection expressed physically made friendship so complete and binding.
quotes.author: Gordon Merrick

quotes.quote: Affection is like the noonday sun; it does not need the presence of another to be manifest.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: Real living is living for others.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: There is no power greater than true affection.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Affection is the source of self-confidence, happiness, security, and a comfortable mental state.
quotes.author: Amanda Mosher

quotes.quote: Affection cannot be created; it can only be liberated.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: All the beautiful sentiments in the world weigh less than a single lovely action.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: A little bit of affection goes a long way toward reconciling one with the world.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: The greater are our affections the deeper are our afflictions, and the more we love the more we have to weep.
quotes.author: J.C. Ryle

quotes.quote: Affection will burn cheerily when the white flame of love is flickered out. Affection is a fire that can be fed from day to day and be piled up ever higher as the wintry years draw nigh.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: When you love someone as much as that, you don't believe they can die. You think your love protects them.
quotes.author: IrÃ¨ne NÃ©mirovsky

quotes.quote: A concrete love is a mass of emotion formed into a compound mixtureÂ  of affection, care, desire and expectation.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Affection would not be affection if it was loudly and frequently expressed; to produce it in public is like getting your household furniture out for a move. It did very well in its place, but it looks shabby or tawdry or grotesque in the sunshine.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A mixture of admiration and pity is one of the surest recipes for affection.
quotes.author: Arthur Helps

quotes.quote: True love is deep spiritual affection.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Affection is blind reason.
quotes.author: James Howell

quotes.quote: Affection is a habit.
quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.quote: Set your affection to infinity and your hate to zero!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: True affection and love have a purity which shall always prevail over bigotry.
quotes.author: Libba Brat

quotes.quote: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Affection is like bread, unnoticed till we starve, and then we dream of it, and sing of it, and paint it, when every urchin in the street has more than he can eat.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Affection is the broadest basis of a good life.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A little love and affection in everything you do will make the world a better place with or without you.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our lives.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Affection makes your spirit slither out from its concealing spot.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: Affection is a much profound emotion, which is inexplicable but can be fathomed through our pores. It percolates down our skin slowly.
quotes.author: Balroop Singh

quotes.quote: Laughter is more than just a pleasurable activity...When people laugh together, they tend to talk and touch more and to make eye contact more frequently.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.quote: With our love, we could save the world.
quotes.author: Geirge Harrison

quotes.quote: Expressions of affection, like putting your arm around someone's shoulder, holding hands, or giving a kiss good night, involve the principle of honesty.
quotes.author: John Bytheway

quotes.quote: No man can protect you like your father, No women can love you like your mother.
quotes.author: Pradeepa Pandiyan

quotes.quote: Only as we mature does affection begin to depend on achievement.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of showing affection. Be warm and tender, thoughtful and affectionate. Men are more helped by sympathy than by service. Love is more than money, and a kind word will give more pleasure than a present.
quotes.author: Sir John Lubbock

quotes.quote: He was not his father, and this was not his work; but he was the master, and this was his masterpiece.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Often we withhold our affections, waiting first for love to be extended to us. The irony is that we are loved for loving.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Talk not of wasted affection; affection never was wasted.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: We are what comes to us and by what we choose to fulfill. We learn love by experiencing other people loving us and by cultivating compassion for all humankind.
quotes.author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.quote: No emotion was supposed to cross the great divide of class. Affection could erase all hierarchy; in this was the danger, and the delight.
quotes.author: Damon Galgut

quotes.quote: Affection, like melancholy, magnifies trifles; but the magnifying of the one is like looking through a telescope at heavenly objects; that of the other, like enlarging monsters with a microscope.
quotes.author: James Henry Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: Sometimes words are like water and lips as strong as wine.
quotes.author: Dave Guerrero

quotes.quote: It's true that nothing in this world makes us so necessary to others as the affection we have for them.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Be kindly affectioned to one another in brotherly love, in honour preferring one another. Show love and peace will abound.
quotes.author: The Holy Bible (Romans 12:10)

quotes.quote: In truth, fair Montague, I am too fond.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare (Romeo and Juliet)

quotes.quote: Few misfortunes can befall a boy which bring worse consequences than to have a really affectionate mother.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: It is a curious thought, but it is only when you see people looking ridiculous, that you realize just how much you love them.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Holding hands at midnight / 'Neath a starry sky... / Nice work if you can get it, / And you can get it if you try.
quotes.author: Ira Gershwin

quotes.quote: I loved not yet, yet I loved to love ... I sought what I might love, loving to love.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: Does it really matter what these affectionate people do — so long as they don’t do it in the streets and frighten the horses!
quotes.author: Beatrice Stella Tanner Campbell

quotes.quote: The child who is not embraced by the village will burn it down to feel its warmth.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: You don’t need another human being to make your life complete, but let’s be honest. Having your wounds kissed someone who doesn’t see them as disasters in your soul but cracks to put their love into is the most calming thing in this world.
quotes.author: Emery Allen

quotes.quote: Love is a verb. Love — the feeling — is a fruit of love, the verb.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Affection is the most instinctive, in that sense the most animal, of the loves; its jealousy is proportionately fierce. It snarls and hares its teeth like a dog whose food has been snatched away.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our natural lives.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Affection produces happiness if—and only if— there is common sense and give and take and 'decency.' In other words, only if something more, and other, than Affection is added. The mere feeling is not enough. . . . There is no disguising the fact that this means goodness; patience, self-denial, humility, and the continual intervention of a far higher sort of love than Affection, in itself, can ever be. That is the whole point. If we try to live by Affection alone, Affection will 'go bad on us.'
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Affection and devotion are qualities that are able to adorn and render beautiful a character that is otherwise unattractive, and even repulsive.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: My affection hath an unknown bottom, like the bay of Portugal.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare (As You Like It)

quotes.quote: In a great romance, each person basically plays a part that the other really likes.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Ashley

quotes.quote: In a great romance, each person basically plays a part that the other really likes.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Ashley

quotes.quote: I have perfumed my bed with myrrh, aloes, and cinnamon. Come, let us take our fill of love until the morning.
quotes.author: The Holy Bible (Proverbs 7: 17-18)

quotes.quote: When I saw you I fell in love, and you smiled because you knew.
quotes.author: Arrigo Boito

quotes.quote: For all the things my hands have held the best by far is you.
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.quote: When you look into your mother’s eyes, you know that is the purest love you can find on this earth.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Love is won by affectionate words.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: Like all my family and class, I considered it a sign of weakness to show affection; to have been caught kissing my mother would have been a disgrace, and to have shown affection for my father would have been a disaster.
quotes.author: Agnes Smedley

quotes.quote: Do you know what it means to come home at night to a woman who'll give you a little love, a little affection, a little tenderness? It means you're in the wrong house, that's what it means.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: The essential elements of giving are power and love - activity and affection - and the consciousness of the race testifies that in the high and appropriate exercise of these is a blessedness greater than any other.
quotes.author: Mark Hopkins

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: A man reserves his true and deepest love not for the species of woman in whose company he finds himself electrified and enkindled, but for that one in whose company he may feel tenderly drowsy.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.quote: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
quotes.author: Max Muller

quotes.quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: A kiss makes the heart young again and wipes out the years.
quotes.author: Rupert Brooke

quotes.quote: I like not only to be loved, but also to be told I am loved.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: If you want to be loved, be lovable.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: If we treated everyone we meet with the same affection we bestow upon our favorite cat, they, too, would purr.
quotes.author: Martin Delany

quotes.quote: I see when men love women they give but a little of their lives, but women, when they love, give everything.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Loving can cost a lot but not loving always costs more, and those who fear to love often find that want of love is an emptiness that robs the joy from life.
quotes.author: Merle Shain

quotes.quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: For every beauty there is an eye somewhere to see it. For every truth there is an ear somewhere to hear it. For every love there a heart somewhere to receive it.
quotes.author: Ivan Panin

quotes.quote: Love is something far more than desire for sexual intercourse; it is the principal means of escape from the loneliness which afflicts most men and women throughout the greater part of their lives.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Love is missing someone whenever you're apart, but somehow feeling warm inside because you're close in heart.
quotes.author: Kay Knudsen

quotes.quote: Love is shown in your deeds, not in your words.
quotes.author: Fr. Jerome Cummings

quotes.quote: Love is shown in your deeds, not in your words.
quotes.author: Fr. Jerome Cummings

quotes.quote: I heard what you said. I’m not the silly romantic you think. I don’t want the heavens or the shooting stars. I don’t want gemstones or gold. I have those things already. I want...a steady hand. A kind soul. I want to fall asleep, and wake, knowing my heart is safe. I want to love, and be loved.
quotes.author: Shana Abe

quotes.quote: There is no feeling more comforting and consoling than knowing you are right next to the one you love.
quotes.author: Kay Knudsen

quotes.quote: Love is what makes two people sit in the middle of a bench when there is plenty of room at both ends.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: I'm actually feeling very affectionate toward you, but of course that could just be the hormones.
quotes.author: Dr. Temperance 'Bones' Brennan

quotes.quote: I want a man who's there when I want him and gone when I don't, and is affectionate, not too much, and has great hair and good hygiene.
quotes.author: Brianna Hanson

quotes.quote: Therefore let us be happy while we are happy. Let us be kind, generous, affectionate and good. It is necessary and not at all shameful to take pleasure in the little world.
quotes.author: Gustav Adolf Ekdahl

quotes.quote: I believe the more you love a man, / The more you give your trust, / The more you're bound to lose; / Although, when shadows fall I think if only / Somebody splendid really needed me, / Somebody affectionate and dear, / Cares would be ended / If I knew that he wanted to have me near.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: He's so affectionate and I'll say this / That when he kisses me, I'll sure stay kissed / When my sugar walks down the street / The little birdies go, "tweet, tweet, tweet"
quotes.author: Gene Austin; Irving Mills; Jimmy McHugh

quotes.quote: Mamma said, 'A little love and affection / In everything you do / Will make the world a better place / With or without you.'
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: The object of my affection can change my complexion / From white to rosy red / Anytime she holds my hand / And tells me that she's mine
quotes.author: H. Coy Poe; Jimmie Grier; Pinky Tomlin

quotes.quote: Affirmations are like seed planted in soil. Poor soil, poor growth. Rich soil, abundant growth. The more you choose to think thoughts that make you feel good, the quicker the affirmations work.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Affirmation plus action equals miracles.
quotes.author: Cheryl Richardson

quotes.quote: Man lives more by affirmation than by bread.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Affirmation without discipline is the beginning of delusion.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: An attitude of gratitude is life's most powerful affirmation
quotes.author: Angie Karan Krezos

quotes.quote: Affirmations don't make something happen; they make something welcome.
quotes.author: Michael Beckwith

quotes.quote: Every thought we think and every word we speak is an affirmation of what we believe about life and it's the same with magnetism.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: A prayer and positive affirmation are the keys for a divine intervention in any situation.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: It's the repetition of affirmations that leads to belief. And once that belief becomes a deep conviction, things begin to happen.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: To give someone a blessing is the most significant affirmation we can offer.
quotes.author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

quotes.quote: The affirmation of one's own life, happiness, growth and freedom, is rooted in one's capacity to love.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: A good affirmation has five basic ingredients: it's personal, it's positive, it's present tense, it's visual, and it's emotional.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: The affirmation of one's essential being in spite of desires and anxieties creates joy.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: An affirmation to say everyday: The healing power of God is working in me right now. Every day I get better and better in every way.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: There is no affirmation without the one who affirms. in this sense, everything to which you grant your love is yours.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The anxiety of fate is conquered by the self-affirmation of the individual as an infinitely significant microcosmic representation of the universe.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Now in these troubled times, even more than ever, we need an affirmation that there is goodness and beauty in the world.
quotes.author: Bob Benson

quotes.quote: One can experience an unconditional affirmation of life only when one has accepted death, not as contrary to life, but as an aspect of it.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Every thought and every word you speak is an affirmation. So why not choose to use only positive affirmations to create an exceptional life? I know you can do it!
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Affirmations are our mental vitamins, providing the supplementary positive thoughts we need to balance the barrage of negative events and thoughts we experience daily.
quotes.author: Tia Walker

quotes.quote: Affirmation statements are going beyond the reality of the present into the creation of the future through the words you use in the now.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Repeating an affirmation several times a day keeps you focused on your goal, strengthens your motivation, and programs your subconscious by sending an order to your crew to do whatever it takes to make that goal happen.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: People who do affirmations will have the sensation that they are causing the environment to conform to their will. This is an immensely enjoyable feeling because the illusion of control is one of the best illusions you can have.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: By using affirmations and by surrounding ourselves with people who are positive and will support us in holding thoughts about what we want to experience (and not what we don't) we'll naturally start to shift our experience.
quotes.author: Cheryl Richardson

quotes.quote: The most rewarding thing for me has been this affirmation for me that people are basically good and smart, and if you give them a simple tool that allows them to exhibit that behavior, they'll prove it to you every single day.
quotes.author: Biz Stone

quotes.quote: An affirmation is almost like a mantra. It does not really matter if what you are affirming is not totally true as yet. By repeating an affirmation over and over again, it becomes embedded in the subconscious mind, and eventually it becomes your reality.
quotes.author: Stuart Wilde

quotes.quote: An affirmation opens the door. It's a beginning point on the path to change.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Self-affirmation cannot be found in love; it is a prior condition of genuine love.
quotes.author: Jo Coudert

quotes.quote: Affirmations are so easy that some people think they are too simple to be effective.
quotes.author: Ruth Fishel

quotes.quote: It would not be necessary to make an affirmation more than once if one had perfect faith.
quotes.author: Florence Scovel Shinn

quotes.quote: Develop an affirmation today, and start getting instant confirmation in all works of like.
quotes.author: Richmond Akhigbe

quotes.quote: Choosing one's leaders is an affirmation that the person making the choice has inherent worth.
quotes.author: Linda Chavez

quotes.quote: Fear is an affirmation of your growth.
quotes.author: Rhonda Britten

quotes.quote: Affirmations need to be used if they are to become incorporated into the fabric of your being.
quotes.author: Eric Maisel

quotes.quote: Humor is an affirmation of dignity, a declaration of man's superiority to all that befalls him.
quotes.author: Romain Gary

quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear and pain, but the affirmation of life despite fear and pain.
quotes.author: Earl A Grollman

quotes.quote: Using affirmations on a daily basis is one of the easiest things we can do to change our lives.
quotes.author: Robert Anthony

quotes.quote: A tattoo is an affirmation: that this body is yours to have and to enjoy while you're here. Nobody else can control what you do with it.
quotes.author: Don Ed Hardy

quotes.quote: There is no limit to positive affirmations.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Art is essentially the affirmation, the blessing, and the deification of existence.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Affirmation literally means to validate or confirm. So when we think a thought over and over again, we are validating or confirming it as the truth.
quotes.author: Robert Anthony

quotes.quote: Affirmation of the world, which means affirmation of the will-to-live that manifests itself around me, is only possible if I devote myself to other life.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Affirmations are not bound up in rules. An affirmation can be long or short, poetic or plain. If you love a phrase and find that it helps you, that is a valid affirmation.
quotes.author: Eric Maisel

quotes.quote: Success is a process, a quality of mind and way of being, an outgoing affirmation of life.
quotes.author: Alex Noble

quotes.quote: Nothing but breathing the air of Africa, and actually walking through it, can communicate the indescribable sensations.
quotes.author: William Burchell

quotes.quote: Africa suffered under European dominance for centuries.
quotes.author: Jacob Zuma

quotes.quote: In Africa, music is not an art form as much as it is a means of communication.
quotes.author: Vernon Reid

quotes.quote: One cannot resist the lure of Africa.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: It's really beautiful. It feels like God visits everywhere else but lives in Africa.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: Africa is wealthy in natural resources; the problem is they are not optimally utilized.
quotes.author: Yoweri Museveni

quotes.quote: Africa had a way of coming back and simply covering everything up again.
quotes.author: Alexander Mccall Smith

quotes.quote: You are not a country, Africa. You are a concept.You are not a concept, Africa. You are a glimpse of the infinite.
quotes.author: Ali Mazrui

quotes.quote: You know you are truly alive when you're living among lions.
quotes.author: Isak Dinesen

quotes.quote: Africa is less a wilderness than a repository of primary and fundamental values, and less a barbaric land than an unfamiliar voice.
quotes.author: Beryl Markham

quotes.quote: Africa is not a country, but it is a continent like none other. It has that which is elegantly vast or awfully little.
quotes.author: Douglas wilder

quotes.quote: Africa is not just about where you are born. For me, Africa is the whole continent; from south to north, to east to west.
quotes.author: Angelique Kidjo

quotes.quote: The richness of Africa, culturally, is vast. That's the challenge that we have to face, because most of the time, people in the western world, their attention span is really narrow.
quotes.author: Angelique Kidjo

quotes.quote: The more Africa depends on aid the less opportunities it creates for its people.
quotes.author: Benjamin Kofi Quansah

quotes.quote: Africa doesn't need strongmen, it needs strong institutions.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: They say that somewhere in Africa the elephants have a secret grave where they go to lie down, unburden their wrinkled gray bodies, and soar away, light spirits at the end.
quotes.author: Robert R. McCammon

quotes.quote: Africa has become the big game of the nation hunters. Today, Africa looms as the greatest commercial, industrial and political prize in the world.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: Nature is the guardian of Africa. While the sun lights the African sky in day time, the moon begs the world to help her lighting Africa in the night.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Everything in Africa bites but the safari bug is worst of all.
quotes.author: Brian Jackman

quotes.quote: There is something about safari life that makes you forget all your sorrows and feel as if you had drunk half a bottle of champagne - bubbling over with heartfelt gratitude for being alive.
quotes.author: Karen Blixen

quotes.quote: We are all children of Africa, and none of us is better or more important than the other. This is what Africa could say to the world: it could remind it what it is to be human.
quotes.author: Alexander Mccall Smith

quotes.quote: Africa gives you the knowledge that man is a small creature, among other creatures, in a large landscape.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: Africa is our center of gravity, our cultural and spiritual mother and father, our beating heart, no matter where we live on the face of this earth.
quotes.author: John Henrik Clarke

quotes.quote: Africa is always only portrayed as a continent of suffering, but most figures are vastly exaggerated.
quotes.author: James Shikwati

quotes.quote: Africa is an extraordinary opportunity at the moment.
quotes.author: David Adjaye

quotes.quote: Africa is one continent, one people and one nation.
quotes.author: Kwame Nkrumah

quotes.quote: Africa is to be pitied, worshipped or dominated.
quotes.author: Binyavanga Wainaina

quotes.quote: Africa gives you the knowledge that man is a small creature, amongst other creatures, in a large landscape.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: Africa is a cruel country; it takes your heart and grinds it into powdered stone - and no one minds.
quotes.author: Elspeth Huxley

quotes.quote: In Africa, you know, if you're poor, at least you can go to the forest and share some mangoes with the gorillas and monkey.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Jal

quotes.quote: In Africa today, we recognise that trade and investment, and not aid, are pillars of development.
quotes.author: Paul Kagame

quotes.quote: Africa is a land of slavery, the stronger always making war on the weaker, and dragging them into captivity.
quotes.author: Maria Louisa Charlesworth

quotes.quote: If the white man filled the cup of African slavery to the brim, drugging it with seven fold bitterness and making it overflow. The white man also but with a heart far different rose as Africa's deliverer, protector and blessing.
quotes.author: Maria Louisa Charlesworth

quotes.quote: Africa itself, a free colony for the liberated slave.
quotes.author: Maria Louisa Charlesworth

quotes.quote: Africans, accustomed from their birth to express every feeling with vehement emotion, poor captured slaves whose every sense and every affection had been pierced, wounded and torn.
quotes.author: Maria Louisa Charlesworth

quotes.quote: Africa experienced major culture clashes which derived from the impact of complex economic, social, political and religious forces on the indigenous societies.
quotes.author: Cambridge University Press

quotes.quote: African peoples south of the Sahara had no urban tradition worthy of the name, and hence that urban life and problems in contemporary Africa are essentially of external and European origin.
quotes.author: Cambridge University Press

quotes.quote: The Portuguese were the first imperial contenders to make contact with most of the coasts of tribal Africa.
quotes.author: Cambridge University Press

quotes.quote: The West coast of Africa is generally low and flat.
quotes.author: World Bank Publications

quotes.quote: Women are commonly considered to perform the bulk of work in African agriculture.
quotes.author: World Bank Publications

quotes.quote: South Africa belongs to all who live in it, black and white.
quotes.author: United States Department of State

quotes.quote: Africa is the least productive; but we forbear for the present.
quotes.author: Chas. W. Thomas

quotes.quote: Africa is, in all respects, a land of deep shades.
quotes.author: Chas. W. Thomas

quotes.quote: Africa is a land of sunshine, and, without a paradox, the light and darkness dwell together.
quotes.author: Chas. W. Thomas

quotes.quote: Africa is a land of slavery, the stronger always making war on the weaker, and dragging them into captivity and death.
quotes.author: Maria Louisa Charlesworth

quotes.quote: Africa is undergoing a profound transformation that is changing the lives of hundreds of millions of people on the continent.
quotes.author: Jussi S. Jauhiainen

quotes.quote: Africa is a continent that lies above the equator and half below it. This gave ancient Africa a warm and varied climate and landscape.
quotes.author: Hazel Richardson

quotes.quote: Africa is one of the most important places in human history. It is the birthplace of the earliest humans, and home of the world's oldest and most powerful civilizations.
quotes.author: Hazel Richardson

quotes.quote: Africa does not give up its secrets easily. Buried there lie answers to our questions about the origins of humankind.
quotes.author: Martin Meredith

quotes.quote: Africa is often encountered as a continent in which all manners of extremities converge.
quotes.author: Wale Adebanwi

quotes.quote: Africa is mystic; it is wild; it is a sweltering inferno; it is a photographer’s paradise, a hunter’s Valhalla, an escapist’s Utopia.
quotes.author: Beryl Markham

quotes.quote: The earliest known evidence anywhere in the world for the existence of man and the emergence of human society comes from Africa.
quotes.author: John Fage

quotes.quote: I dream of an Africa, which is in peace with itself.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: This is what is meant by last words: they are keys to unlock the afterlife. They're not last words but passwords, and as soon as they're spoken you can go.
quotes.author: Daniel Wallace

quotes.quote: The chief problem about death ... is the fear that there may be no afterlife - a depressing thought.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: I am convinced of the afterlife, independent of theology. If the world is rationally constructed, there must be an afterlife.
quotes.author: Kurt Friedrich Gödel

quotes.quote: In one sense there is no death. The life of a soul on earth lasts beyond departure. You will always feel that life touching yours, that voice speaking to you. He/She lives on in your life and in the lives of all others that knew him/her.
quotes.author: Angelo Patri

quotes.quote: I firmly believe that when you die you will enter immediately into another life. They who have gone before us are alive in one form of life and we in another.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: There is no "next" after you are dead and gone from your own world.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: The vision people hold of the world to come is but a reflection, with predictable wishful distortions, of the world in which they live.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: We have no reliable guarantee that the afterlife will be any less exasperating than this one, have we?
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: It is what we see when we imagine what the afterlife must be like: our happiest triumphs, our most sincere moments, stolen from the seam of our lives, a respite just before the onset of imminent tragedy.
quotes.author: Joe Meno

quotes.quote: Anyone who craves an afterlife has not lived their life to the fullest.
quotes.author: Robert Black

quotes.quote: Men long for an afterlife in which there apparently is nothing to do but delight in heaven's wonders.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: If this world isn't good enough for us then an afterlife won't be enough.
quotes.author: Fanny Howe

quotes.quote: My understanding of life is very existential. I think that we are our bodies. There's nothing else, and when we die, that's it. No afterlife.
quotes.author: David Cronenberg

quotes.quote: In the afterlife you don't have to worry about looking for work.
quotes.author: Ed Wood

quotes.quote: Is death the last sleep? No, it is the last and final awakening
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Perhaps passing through the gates of death is like passing quietly through the gate in a pasture fence. On the other side, you keep walking, without the need to look back. No shock, no drama, just the lifting of a plank or two in a simple wooden gate in a clearing. Neither pain, nor floods of light, nor great voices, but just the silent crossing of a meadow.
quotes.author: Mark Helprin

quotes.quote: The best way to earn paradise in the afterlife is to create it in your life and in the life of your neighbor.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: The afterlife is whatever a soul wishes or believes it to be.
quotes.author: Aimee Carter

quotes.quote: Afterlife exist in the unidentified substances.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: To emphasize the afterlife is to deny life. To concentrate on heaven is to create hell.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: You appreciate the little details in life once you realize how fragile it is, you respect the afterlife when you realize how powerful it is.
quotes.author: Zak Bagans

quotes.quote: The thought of being nothing after death is a burden insupportable to a virtuous man.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: No Christian is abandoned at the moment of death. The angels are the ushers, and our passage to heaven is under their escort.
quotes.author: David Jeremiah

quotes.quote: The only 'afterlife' is what other people remember of you.
quotes.author: Craig Venter

quotes.quote: In sorrow we must go, but not in despair. Behold! we are not bound for ever to the circles of the world, and beyond them is more than memory.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: The yearning for an afterlife is the opposite of selfish: it is love and praise for the world that we are privileged, in this complex interval of light, to witness and experience.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote:
Memories are aches; they are the laughter
Smiles of time flee to seize the hereafter.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: If we can prove an afterlife, then we have less pressure to make our physical life last forever.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: After your death, you will be what you were before your birth.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: The idea of an afterlife where you can be reunited with loved ones can be immensely consoling â€“ though not to me.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Death is but a transition from this life to another existence where there is no more pain and anguish. All the bitterness and disagreements will vanish, and the only thing that lives forever is love.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: My view of the afterlife is that it's made of different levels, depending on how spiritual a life we live.
quotes.author: John Edward

quotes.quote: I believe that when death closes our eyes we shall awaken to a light, of which our sunlight is but the shadow.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Life does not end when we die. Death is a rebirth into a spirit world of light and love, a transition from the physical to the spiritual that is no more frightening or painful than passing between rooms through an open doorway. It is a joyful homecoming to our natural home.
quotes.author: Betty Eadie

quotes.quote: Do for this life as if you live forever, do for the afterlife as if you will die tomorrow.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: The real question of life after death isn't whether or not it exists, but even if it does what problem this really solves.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: Whether you reach a lot of people or have a profound impact on a few people, their memories of you are your afterlife.
quotes.author: Greg Graffin

quotes.quote: Life is cruel. Why should the afterlife be any different!
quotes.author: Davy Jones

quotes.quote: Belief in the future life is the appetite of reason.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: People think of life as being so sacred and they feel like this is their only chance and they have to do something with their life and make an impact As far as I'm concerned, it's just a pitstop for the afterlife. It's just a little test to see how you can handle reality.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: Of course you don't die. Nobody dies. Death doesn't exist. You only reach a new level of vision, a new realm of consciousness, a new unknown world.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: The afternoon knows what the morning never suspected.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Afternoon tea should be provided, fresh supplies, with thin bread-and-butter, fancy pastries, cakes, etc., being brought in as other guests arrive.
quotes.author: Isabella Beeton

quotes.quote: The late afternoon sunlight, warm as oil, sweet as childhood
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: If you can spend a perfectly useless afternoon in a perfectly useless manner, you have learned how to live.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Summer afternoon, summer afternoon; to me those have always been the two most beautiful words in the English language
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: The pleasures of afternoon tea run like a trickle of honey through English literature from Rupert Brooke's wistful lines on the Old Vicarage at Grantchester to Miss Marple, calmly dissecting a case over tea cakes at a seaside hotel.
quotes.author: Stan Hey

quotes.quote: There is an hour of the afternoon when the plain is on the verge of saying something. It never says, or perhaps it says it infinitely, or perhaps we do not understand it, or we understand it and it is untranslatable as music
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: It is the still, yellow kind of afternoon when one is apt to get stuck in a dream if one sits very quiet
quotes.author: Dodie Smith

quotes.quote: It is the end of a fine bronze tinted afternoon with purple shadows and febrile scraps of cloud.
quotes.author: Daniel Arsand

quotes.quote: Think what a better world it would be if we all, the whole world, had cookies and milk about three o'clock every afternoon and then lay down on our blankets for a nap.
quotes.author: Barbara Jordan

quotes.quote: The afternoon of a human life must have a significance of its own, and cannot be merely a pitiful appendage to life's morning.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The afternoon had made them tranquil for a while, as if to give them a deep memory for the long parting the next day promised.
quotes.author: F Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The Afternoon is not only the middle part of the day. It is the time to complete our essential task and go ahead on life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: People say that age is just a state of mind. I say it's more about the state of your body.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Parfitt

quotes.quote: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: In youth we learn; in age we understand.
quotes.author: Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: Age does not depend upon years, but upon temperament and health. Some men are born old, and some never grow up.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: Age is not a particularly interesting subject. Anyone can get old. All you have to do is live long enough.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Age is like the newest version of a software it has a bunch of great new features but you lost all the cool features the original version had.
quotes.author: Carrie Latet

quotes.quote: Wisdom doesn't necessarily come with age. Sometimes age just shows up all by itself.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.quote: At age 20, we worry about what others think of us. At age 40, we don't care what they think of us. At age 60, we discover they haven't been thinking of us at all.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: A man's age is something impressive, it sums up his life: maturity reached slowly and against many obstacles, illnesses cured, griefs and despairs overcome, and unconscious risks taken; maturity formed through so many desires, hopes, regrets, forgotten things, loves. A man's age represents a fine cargo of experiences and memories.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Age does not make us childish, as some say it only finds us true children still.
quotes.author: Johann Von Goethe

quotes.quote: Age is no barrier. It's a limitation you put on your mind.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.quote: Age is of no importance unless you are a cheese.
quotes.author: Billie Burke

quotes.quote: Age is just a number. It's totally irrelevant unless, of course, you happen to be a bottle of wine.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.quote: Age carries all things away even the mind.
quotes.author: Publius Vergilius Maro Virgil

quotes.quote: Sometimes age succeeds, sometimes it fails. It depends on you.
quotes.author: Ravensara Noite

quotes.quote: Age swallows our childhood.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Age is a matter of feeling...not of years.
quotes.author: George William Curtis

quotes.quote: Age is opportunity no less,Than youth itself, through in another dress.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Age is wisdom if one has lived ones life properly.
quotes.author: Miriam Makeba

quotes.quote: Age is information failure. The body loses fluency.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Age is foolish and forgetful when it underestimates youth.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Age is a very high price to pay for maturity.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Age is whatever you think it is. You are as old as you think you are.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Age is getting to know all the ways the world turns, so that if you cannot turn the world the way you want, you can at least, get out of the way so you won't get run over.
quotes.author: Miriam Makeba

quotes.quote: I believe the true function of age is memory. I'm recording as fast as I can.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: Age should not have its face lifted, but it should rather teach the world to admire wrinkles as the etchings of experience and the firm line of character.
quotes.author: Ralph B. Perry

quotes.quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: I don't look my age, I don't feel my age and I don't act my age. To me age is just a number.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.quote: Age imprints more wrinkles in the mind than it does on the face.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Age has been the perfect fire extinguisher for flaming youth.
quotes.author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quotes.quote: The wiser mind mourns less for what age takes away than what it leaves behind.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: He who is of a calm and happy nature will hardly feel the pressure of age, but to him who is of an opposite disposition, youth and age are equally a burden.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Age does not protect you from love, but love to some extent protects you from age.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.quote: No matter what your age you can be great.
quotes.author: Kishore Bansal

quotes.quote: Age appears to be best in four things, - old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
quotes.author: Alonso Of Aragon

quotes.quote: Count your blessings for your age, as there are many who never get the opportunity.
quotes.author: C Pulsifer

quotes.quote: They say that age is all in your mind. The trick is keeping it from creeping down into your body.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Age does not diminish the extreme disappointment of having a scoop of ice cream fall from the cone.
quotes.author: Jim Fiebig

quotes.quote: Age is no guarantee of maturity.
quotes.author: Lawana Blackwell

quotes.quote: Age does not matter if the matter does not age.
quotes.author: Carlos P. Romulo

quotes.quote: Age attacks when we least expect it.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: The surest sign of age is loneliness.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: Age is like love, it cannot be hid
quotes.author: Thomas Dekker

quotes.quote: Age is how we determine how valuable you are.
quotes.author: Jane Elliot

quotes.quote: Age is just the amount of time that you have been on earth, what really matters is where you are going after your time is up.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Age is simply the number of years the world has enjoyed you!
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Your age does not define you, you define your age.
quotes.author: Vincent Archer

quotes.quote: Live your life and forget your age.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Sometimes age succeeds, sometimes it fails. It depends on you.
quotes.author: Ravensara Noite

quotes.quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: When grace is joined with wrinkles, it is adorable. There is an unspeakable dawn in happy old age.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Some age. Others mature.
quotes.author: Sean Connery

quotes.quote: Nobody grows old merely by living a number of years. We grow old by deserting our ideals. Years may wrinkle the skin, but to give up enthusiasm wrinkles the soul.
quotes.author: Samuel Ullman

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as old age, there is only sorrow.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: We turn not older with years but newer every day.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: The age of a woman doesn't mean a thing. The best tunes are played on the oldest fiddles.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A graceful and honorable old age is the childhood of immortality.
quotes.author: Pindar

quotes.quote: Age, that lessens the enjoyment of life, increases our desire of living
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Age considers. Youth ventures.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Age either transfigures or petrifies.
quotes.author: Marie Von Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: Age, like woman, requires fit surroundings.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Age affects how people experience time.
quotes.author: Edward T. Hall

quotes.quote: Age whitens hairs, but not sin.
quotes.author: Jean Antoine Petit-Senn

quotes.quote: Age before beauty, and pearls before swine.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Age and treachery will overcome youth and skill.
quotes.author: Fausto Coppi

quotes.quote: Age wrinkles the body. Quitting wrinkles the soul.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: Age is a slowing down of everything except fear.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Age isn't how old you are but how old you feel.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: Age appears to be best in four things. Old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Middle age is youth without levity, and age without decay.
quotes.author: Doris Day

quotes.quote: Old age isn't so bad when you consider the alternative.
quotes.author: Maurice Chevalier

quotes.quote: Youth and age touch only the surface of our lives.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Old age is the most unexpected of all things that happen to a man.
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: Age is not all decay. It is the ripening, the swelling, of the fresh life within, that withers and bursts the husk.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: What our age lacks is not reflection, but passion.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Age is rarely despised but when it is, contemptible.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Age is such a natural progression you shouldn't fight it.
quotes.author: Ann-Margret

quotes.quote: Old age is not an illness, it is a timeless ascent. As power diminishes, we grow toward the light.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: It's as though a smile is ageless, or perhaps eternal, independent of the decay and collapse of the surrounding features.
quotes.author: Justin Cartwright

quotes.quote: Beauty and femininity are ageless and can't be contrived, and glamour, although the manufacturers won't like this, cannot be manufactured. Not real glamour; it's based on femininity.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Inside, we are ageless and when we talk to ourselves, it’s the same age of the person we were talking to when we were little. It’s the body that is changing around that ageless center.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: Laughter is timeless, imagination has no age, dreams are forever.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Ultimately, a timeless story has to be about the human condition.
quotes.author: Astro Teller

quotes.quote: Elegance is timeless. It withstands trend; It withstands the commercialization of what fashion and style have become.
quotes.author: Zac Posen

quotes.quote: The casual body is the most ancient and timeless part of a person. It has the capacity to know and do things that the physical mind and body cannot.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The real you is timeless and beyond life and death.
quotes.author: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj

quotes.quote: Your timeless self does not age and has no fear of the future. Contemplate your physical self and all its possessions, and practice laughing peacefully at it all.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Love is timeless and dependable. It's a safe place where I can breathe.
quotes.author: Jo Dee Messina

quotes.quote: Love is timeless.... Death does not separate the lover from the beloved.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Each human needs to find his or her timeless and formless essence identity.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: A great song will be great forever – it’s timeless and classic in that way.
quotes.author: Kacey Musgraves

quotes.quote: Truth is Timeless, and returning to Truth is better than continuing in Falsehood.
quotes.author: Umar

quotes.quote: There are two things that make a room timeless: a sense of history and a piece of the future.
quotes.author: Charlotte Moss

quotes.quote: Words are timeless. You should utter them or write them with a knowledge of their timelessness.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is a timeless void. It's an emptiness that's filled with the most excellent light.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The timelessness of art is its capacity to represent the transformation of endless becoming into being.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: There's something timeless and important about making people laugh, about being the right spot in their day
quotes.author: Reese Witherspoon

quotes.quote: The scenery is time bound but the seer is timeless. You are the timeless seer in the midst of time bound scenery.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Timeless comes to mind. When you listen to it, you can't tell what year the thing was made. And you don't even care.
quotes.author: Jason Mraz

quotes.quote: If one understands eternity as timelessness, and not as an unending timespan, then whoever lives in the present lives for all time.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: The timeless in you is aware of life's timelessness. And knows that yesterday is but today's memory and tomorrow is today's dream.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran
