quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It is better to aim high and miss than to aim low and hit.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: One shouldÂ aimÂ not at being possible to understand, but at being impossible to misunderstand.
quotes.author: Quintilian

quotes.quote: If the highest aim of a captain were to preserve his ship, he would keep it in port forever.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: To aim and hit, you need one eye only, and one good finger.
quotes.author: Moshe Dayan

quotes.quote: The ultimate aim of the human mind, in all its efforts, is to become acquainted with truth.
quotes.author: Eliza Farnham

quotes.quote: Always aim at complete harmony of thought and word and deed. Always aim at purifying your thoughts and everything will be well.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: ToÂ aimÂ to convert a man by miracles is a profanation of the soul.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Do not let it be your aim to be something, but to be someone.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Your aim will be knowledge and wisdom, not the reflected glamour of fame.
quotes.author: Abbott L. Lowell

quotes.quote: Those who aim at great deeds must also suffer greatly.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: CommonÂ aimÂ is stronger than blood.
quotes.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

quotes.quote: Those whoÂ aimÂ low usually hit their targets.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.quote: Having an aim is the key to achieving your best.
quotes.author: Henry J. Kaiser

quotes.quote: The aim of the wise is not to secure pleasure, but to avoid pain.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something.
quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

quotes.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Aim above morality. Be not simply good, be good for something.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You're never too old to start learning, and you're never too young to aim high and achieve great things.
quotes.author: Asa Hutchinson

quotes.quote: You are capable of more than you know. Choose a goal that seems right for you and strive to be the best, however hard the path. Aim high. Behave honorably. Prepare to be alone at times, and to endure failure. Persist! The world needs all you can give.
quotes.author: E.O. Wilson

quotes.quote: The leader must aim high, see big, judge widely, thus setting himself apart form the ordinary people who debate in narrow confines.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: Make big plans; aim high in hope and work, remembering that a noble, logical diagram once recorded will not die, but long after we are gone be a living thing, asserting itself with ever-growing insistence.
quotes.author: Daniel Burnham

quotes.quote: Aim high and don't sell yourself short. Know that you're capable. Understand that a lot of people battle with a lot of things - depression, body image or whatever else - so know that it's not just you. You're not alone.
quotes.author: Holly Holm

quotes.quote: Aim high! The future you see, is the person you will be.
quotes.author: Jim Cathcart

quotes.quote: The key of success is for you to set one big, challenging goal and then to pay any price, overcome any obstacle and persist through any difficulty until you finally achieve it.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Do not aim low, you will miss the mark. Aim high and you will be on a threshold of bliss.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: High achievement always takes place in the framework of high expectation.
quotes.author: Jack Kinder

quotes.quote: Don't let small thinking cut your life down to size. Think big, aim high, act bold. And see just how big you can blow up your life.
quotes.author: Gary W. Keller

quotes.quote: It's very hard to fail completely, if you aim high enough.
quotes.author: Larry Page

quotes.quote: Remember, no more effort is required to aim high in life, to demand abundance and prosperity, than is required to accept misery and poverty.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: If you aim for only wealth, beauty, fame, and power, you aim too low. Humility, gentleness, gratitude, and service is aiming high.
quotes.author: Lecrae

quotes.quote: It is better to aim high and miss than to aim low and hit.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: It is important for you to have a goal. You simply can't get there if you don't know where you are going. Begin to build in your mind a dream. The write it down and make your goal realistic. Aim high enough that you will have to stretch your ability and your potential to reach it.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Any crusade requires optimism and the ambition to aim high.
quotes.author: Paul Allen

quotes.quote: What the mind of man can conceive and believe, the mind of man can achieve with Positive Mental Attitude. It is a form of self-suggestion. It is a self-motivator to success. When it becomes a part of you, you dare to aim higher.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: You might as well aim high. Why shoot yourself in the foot when you can shoot yourself in the head?
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.quote: Sometimes people have to remind you to aim high. Most of us are afraid of aiming high for fear of failure and our biggest failure is that we aim too low.
quotes.author: Shai Agassi

quotes.quote: If you aim higher than you expect, you could reach higher than you dreamed.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: As you go along your own road in life, you will, if you aim high enough, also meet resistance... But no matter how tough the opposition may seem, have courage still and persevere.
quotes.author: Madeleine Albright

quotes.quote: Aim high, aim at the highest, and all lower aims are thereby achieved. It is looking below on the stormy sea of differences that makes you sink. Look up, beyond these and see the One Glorious Real, and you are saved.
quotes.author: Sri Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: You must aim high, not in what you are going to do at some future date, but in what you are going to make yourself do to-day. Otherwise, working is just a waste of time.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: Maturity is the ability to harness your abilities and your energies and do more than is expected. The mature person refuses to settle for mediocrity. He/she would rather aim high and miss the mark than low-and make it.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Aim High, Drive hard.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Aim higher. Stay focused.
quotes.author: Brandom Adams

quotes.quote: I never thought of myself as unlucky. When you aim high, it's tough to get there unless something really fortunate happens.
quotes.author: Henry Cavill

quotes.quote: When you have big dreams, you’re going to have big challenges. If you were an average person you would have average problems.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Aim high, work hard, and love your family.
quotes.author: Deborah Roberts

quotes.quote: Don't just aim high, reach it and grab some happiness along the way.
quotes.author: Christina Dodd

quotes.quote: You'll never really be great unless you aim high.
quotes.author: Stella Adler

quotes.quote: One of the most powerful forces in the world is the will of men and women who believe in themselves, who dare to hope and aim high, who go confidently after the things they want from life.
quotes.author: Richard DeVos

quotes.quote: We now need to look beyond our immediate future and aim higher and farther.
quotes.author: Paul Biya

quotes.quote: Aim high to achieve excellence. Be determined to succeed. Use self-discipline to achieve golden excellence.
quotes.author: Mark F. LaMoure

quotes.quote: If you have fallen down, you cannot go further down, so pick yourself up and aim high, you've got nothing to lose.
quotes.author: Unarine Ramaru

quotes.quote: Commit yourself to do something innovative which average people are afraid to do. Aim high and push yourself to achieve every thing you wished.
quotes.author: Anil Sinha

quotes.quote: Study with purpose, both in church and in school. Write down your goals and what you plan to do to achieve them. Aim high, for you are capable.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: We set ourselves limits, but we are all strong enough to aim higher, to achieve our goals. All we have to do is find such strength within ourselves. Know how to develop it.
quotes.author: Alain Robert

quotes.quote: Bring your dreams into reality. Believe in yourself. You know you have what it takes to make your dreams come true. Start now and work with ambition for total success. Aim high and make it happen.
quotes.author: Mark F. LaMoure

quotes.quote: The air of summer was sweeter than wine.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The air of ideas is the only air worth breathing.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: The air is the only place free from prejudice.
quotes.author: Bessie Coleman

quotes.quote: Air, an undervalued necessity, that earns your gratitude when you inhale it for the last time.
quotes.author: Shaun Neil King

quotes.quote: Air and manners are more expressive than words.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: Every breath of air we take is coming from the ocean.
quotes.author: Jean-Michel Cousteau

quotes.quote: The air of one's native country is the most healthy air.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: Wind is a floating wave of air, whose undulation continually varies.
quotes.author: Vitruvius

quotes.quote: To keep the air fresh among words is the secret of verbal cleanliness.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: The water is clearer than the air, and the air is the air that angels breathe.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The air has finally gotten to the place that we can breathe it together.
quotes.author: Septima Poinsette Clark

quotes.quote: The air we see in the paintings of the old masters is never the air we breathe.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: The air is crowded with birds – beautiful, tender, intelligent birds – to whom life is a song.
quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

quotes.quote: Air is the very substance of our freedom, the substance of superhuman joy.... aerial joy is freedom.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.quote: This air we breathe is precious, and the glaciers helped me understand that and stay focused on that.
quotes.author: James Balog

quotes.quote: Air is beautiful, yet you cannot see it. It's soft, yet you cannot touch it. Air is a little like my brain.
quotes.author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

quotes.quote: Fresh air is good if you do not take too much of it; most of the achievements and pleasures of life are in bad air.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: The very air in which you live is an inspiration.
quotes.author: William Henry

quotes.quote: Best way to clear the air is to have it all out in the open.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.quote: The air is all softness.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Compressed air can provide limitless amounts of clean energy using technology we have had for hundreds of years.
quotes.author: Bill Mollison

quotes.quote: Never get on an airplane if the pilot is wearing a hat that has more than three pastel colors.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: The airplane stays up because it doesn't have the time to fall.
quotes.author: Orville Wright

quotes.quote: Quite likely the twentieth century is destined to see the natural forces which will enable us to fly from continent to continent with a speed far exceeding that of a bird.
quotes.author: Simon Newcomb

quotes.quote: Logic proved that airplanes can't fly and that H-bombs won't work and that stones don't fall out of the sky. Logic is a way of saying that anything which didn't happen yesterday won't happen tomorrow.
quotes.author: Robert Heinlein

quotes.quote: Aviation is proof that given, the will, we have the capacity to achieve the impossible.
quotes.author: Edward Vernon Rickenbacker

quotes.quote: To invent an airplane is nothing. To build one is something. But to fly is everything.
quotes.author: Otto Lilienthal

quotes.quote: Airplanes may kill you, but they ain't likely to hurt you.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: Flight by machines heavier than air is unpractical and insignificant, if not utterly impossible.
quotes.author: Simon Newcomb

quotes.quote: I feel about airplanes the way I feel about diets. It seems to me they are wonderful things for other people to go on.
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: Airplane travel is nature's way of making you look like your passport photo.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: We can't hear the balance yet because the soloist is still on the airplane.
quotes.author: Eugene Ormandy

quotes.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The sky itself will have to be the roof of the auditorium of the future, I will have to forego the car and even the airplane when I move from place to place, for the crowds pressing around them will be too huge.
quotes.author: Sri Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: When the weight of the paper equals the weight of the airplane, only then you can go flying.
quotes.author: Donald Wills

quotes.quote: If this plane were to crash, we could get a new start on this quasar problem.
quotes.author: William Fowler

quotes.quote: Oldtimers weekends and airplane landings are alike. If you can walk away from them, they're successful.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel quotes

quotes.quote: The man who flies an airplane ... must believe in the unseen.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Nine g's is good, if the pilot can stand it. We couldn't stand it. Not in the airplanes of World War II.
quotes.author: Adolf Galland

quotes.quote: The engine is the heart of an airplane, but the pilot is its soul.
quotes.author: Walter Raleigh

quotes.quote: My airplane is quiet, and for a moment still an alien, still a stranger to the ground, I am home.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The aeroplane has unveiled for us the true face of the earth.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: The century of airplanes has a right to its own music.
quotes.author: Claude Debussy

quotes.quote: I am well convinced that Aerial Navigation will form a most prominent feature in the progress of civilization.
quotes.author: Sir George Cayley

quotes.quote: There are only two reasons to sit in the back row of an airplane: Either you have diarrhea, or you're anxious to meet people who do.
quotes.author: Henry A Kissinger

quotes.quote: Man is flying too fast for a world that is round. Soon he will catch up with himself in a great rear end collision.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: I'm in the same traffic as everybody else. I'm in the same airplane delay as everybody else. I sit in the same coach seat as everybody else.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: A fighter without a gun...is like an airplane without a wing.
quotes.author: Brigadier General Robin

quotes.quote: I was a pilot flying an airplane and it just so happened that where I was flying made what I was doing spying.
quotes.author: Francis Gary Power

quotes.quote: Anyone who's not interested in model airplanes must have a screw loose somewhere.
quotes.author: Paul MacCready

quotes.quote: There are aphorisms that, like airplanes, stay up only while they are in motion.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: To be happy in this world, first you need a cell phone and then you need an airplane. Then you're truly wireless.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: And like no other sculpture in the history of art, the dead engine and dead airframe come to life at the touch of a human hand, and join their life with the pilot's own.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: What’s important is that a customer should get off the airplane feeling, ‘I didn’t just get from A to B. I had one of the most pleasant experiences I ever had, and I’ll be back for that reason.
quotes.author: Herb Kelleher

quotes.quote: A pilot who says he has never been frightened in an airplane is, I'm afraid, lying.
quotes.author: Louise Thaden

quotes.quote: There are no atheists on turbulent airplanes.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: The modern airplane creates a new geographic dimension ... the world is small, the world is one.
quotes.author: Wendell Willkie

quotes.quote: Like many air travelers, I am aware that airplanes fly aided by capricious fairies and invisible strings.
quotes.author: J. Maarten Troost

quotes.quote: If you take one rivet out of an airplane, it will be all right, it'll keep flying. You take another rivet out of the airplane and it still flies. So what the heck, let's take more rivets out of the airplane, and sooner or later, the airplane drops from the sky.
quotes.author: Ted Danson

quotes.quote: If you have a fear of flying, don't. The data are very clear: If you have to travel someplace, the safest way is by airplane.
quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

quotes.quote: But remember this, Japanese boy... airplanes are not tools for war. They are not for making money. Airplanes are beautiful dreams. Engineers turn dreams into reality.
quotes.author: Hayao Miyazaki

quotes.quote: Most pilots learn, when they pin on their wings and go out and get in a fighter, especially, that one thing you don't do, you don't believe anything anybody tells you about an airplane.
quotes.author: Chuck Yeager

quotes.quote: If you can walk away from a landing, it's a good landing. If you use the airplane the next day, it's an outstanding landing.
quotes.author: Chuck Yeager

quotes.quote: I like that they call it an airplane cabin. A cabin is where you go to get away from stress. The cabin is a respite from the terminals on either end of the flight where noise bombards you as soon as you walk through the gate.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: I went to the University of Washington as a physics and astronomy major. My other interest, of course, was aviation. I always wanted to be a pilot. And if you're going to fly airplanes, the best place to be is the Air Force.
quotes.author: Michael P. Anderson

quotes.quote: Airplanes are interesting toys, but of no military value.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Foch

quotes.quote: Learning to fly an airplane taught me a way of thinking, an approach to problem-solving that was applicable and effective. Pilots are very methodical and meticulous, and artists tend not to be.
quotes.author: Chris Carter

quotes.quote: When once you have tasted flight, you will forever walk the earth with your eyes turned skyward, for there you have been, and there you will always long to return.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: The genius of Leonardo da Vinci imagined a flying machine, but it took the methodical application of science by those two American bicycle mechanics to create it.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: I confess that in 1901, I said to my brother Orville that man would not fly for fifty years... Ever since, I have distrusted myself and avoided all predictions.
quotes.author: Wilbur Wright

quotes.quote: I look with amazement upon our audacity in attempting flights with a new and untried machine.
quotes.author: Orville Wright

quotes.quote: Aeronautics was neither an industry nor a science. It was a miracle.
quotes.author: Igor Sikorsky

quotes.quote: There are no practical alternatives to air transportation.
quotes.author: Daniel S. Goldin

quotes.quote: Speed is life; altitude is life insurance.
quotes.author: Pilot's proverb

quotes.quote: What's produced the aeroplane is not so much a desire to fly as a rebellion against the tyranny of time and space. And that's a process that can never stop, no matter how high our Titovs and Glenns may go.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Touchdown of an airplane was as smooth as arriving at the ground floor in a lift.
quotes.author: Donald Seaman

quotes.quote: A plane is a bad place for an all-out sleep, but a good place to begin rest and recovery from the trip to the faraway places you've been, a decompression chamber between Here and There. Though a plane is not the ideal place really to think, reassess or reevaluate things, it is a great place to have the illusion of doing so, and often the illusion will suffice.
quotes.author: Shana Alexander

quotes.quote: Both optimists and pessimists contribute to our society. The optimist invents the airplane and the pessimist the parachute.
quotes.author: Gladys Bronwyn Stern

quotes.quote: Airplanes are beautiful, cursed dreams, waiting for the sky to swallow them up.
quotes.author: Caproni

quotes.quote: As soon as they close the door to the aircraft, that's when they begin the safety lecture. I love the safety lecture! This is my favorite part of the airplane ride! I listen very carefully to the safety lecture, especially that part where they teach us how to use the seat belts! Imagine this: here we are, a plane full of grown human beings... many of us partially educated, and they're actually taking time out to describe the intricate workings of a belt buckle!
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Airplanes, airplanes / Flying all around the sky / Airplanes, airplanes / Flying way up high / Some airplanes can land on water / But most land on landing strips (so versus high) / Some airplanes fly just for fun / Some fly for business trips (business or pleasure) / You can make an airplane now with paper / Through it in the air and watch it go / I love to look up and see its wings / Waiving down at me (hey airplane!)
quotes.author: John Stevin Walter

quotes.quote: Can we pretend that airplanes / In the night sky / Are like shooting stars / I could really use a wish right now / And it seems like yesterday it was just a dream / But those days are gone, they're just memories / And it seems yesterday it was just a dream / But those days are gone
quotes.author: Jeremy Dussolliet; Timothy Sommers; Christine Dominguez; et al.

quotes.quote: It was exciting to be off on a journey she had looked forward to for months. Oddly, the billowing diesel fumes of the airport did not smell like suffocating effluence, it assumed a peculiar pungent scent that morning, like the beginning of a new adventure, if an adventure could exude a fragrance.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Air travel reminds us who we are. It’s the means by which we recognize ourselves as modern. The process removes us from the world and sets us apart from each other. We wander in the ambient noise, checking one more time for the flight coupon, the boarding pass, the visa.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: You know… the airport is the only place you can walk around with no shoes, a glazed look on your face, and sleep on the benches and no one judges you.
quotes.author: Coriander Woodruff

quotes.quote: Maybe I live in the gates that lead to outbound international flights. Maybe that is home. And do I feel more comfortable at the departures or at the arrivals?
quotes.author: Michal Coret

quotes.quote: There is truly no other place bearing so much love as airports.
quotes.author: Ioana Cristina Casapu

quotes.quote: An altar is like an airport where spirits take off and land.
quotes.author: Steven Chuks Nwaokeke

quotes.quote: Best of stories are created at Airports, Dinner Tables and Showers!
quotes.author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quotes.quote: An airport is a place where you go through hell to reach your alleged paradise.
quotes.author: Stewart Stafford

quotes.quote: Stations and airports are rehearsals for separations by death.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: I always feel comfortable, basically in any situation except perhaps airports.
quotes.author: Andre Leon Talley

quotes.quote: Nobody is ever met at the airport when beginning a new adventure. It's just not done.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Warnock Fernea

quotes.quote: Multiple airports, runways, two successful landings, we are simply mimicking what the computer already told us.
quotes.author: Todd Komarnicki

quotes.quote: You take someone to the airport, it's clearly the beginning of the relationship. That's why I have never taken anyone to the airport at the beginning of a relationship.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: It seems like I've been here forever / Killing time in an airport bar / I see a tourist / With a face like a razor
quotes.author: Doug Martin

quotes.quote: Kisses at airports, wide-open car doors / So slow to let go, wrapped up with eyes closed / Some mean 'I missed you,' some mean 'I'm going to' / But somehow they mean more
quotes.author: Chase Mcgill

quotes.quote: Captain's voice so loud and clear amplifies into my ear / Assuring me I'm flying friendly skies / L.A. International Airport / Where the big jet engines roar
quotes.author: Leanne Scott

quotes.quote: Airport, you've got a smiling face / You took my lady to another place / Fly her away - fly her away.
quotes.author: Andrew Mcmaster

quotes.quote: Cut your hair short, then walk through an airport, / So that you can dream of destinations
quotes.author: Matthew Thiessen

quotes.quote: This old airport's got me down, it's no earthly good to me / Cause I'm stuck here on the ground, / Cold and drunk, as I might be.
quotes.author: Gordon Lightfoot

quotes.quote: Somewhere in the sky... / Foggy or fair, / Gotta be there / Lighting a flare at the airport
quotes.author: Bernard D Hanighen

quotes.quote: Meeting a square at the airport / Gotta arrive / Happy new jive / Maybe I'll get me a contract
quotes.author: Bernard D Hanighen

quotes.quote: Around and around it's gonna spin / Out at the airport where the planes come in / People buzzing like flies / Out at the airport where the planes come in
quotes.author: Robert Plant

quotes.quote: That airport looked so big and then so small / I couldn't hold a teardrop back at all
quotes.author: Tom T Hall

quotes.quote: And I'm picking up another bag / And I pack another knapsack / The airport's like a stop light to me / Sitting on red, green light go / Can't see my family
quotes.author: Ed Sheeran

quotes.quote: And these airports have seen / truer kisses then wedding halls
quotes.author: Joey Parker

quotes.quote: Gonna go out to the arrivals gate at the airport / And sit there all day / Watch people reuniting, public affection so exciting / It even makes airports okay
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: Airports are vital national resources. They serve a key role in transportation of people and goods and in regional, national, and international commerce.
quotes.author: James H. Grothaus

quotes.quote: Many small airports have no airport manager, but rather are managed by elected or appointed local officials, such as a city clerk or a director of public works.
quotes.author: James H. Grothaus

quotes.quote: Each airport is unique and may have attributes such as a geographic location that lends itself to possibilities such as scenic flights for hire.
quotes.author: James H. Grothaus

quotes.quote: Well-designed airports offer the passenger an experience which supports ad enhances the journey.
quotes.author: Brian Edwards

quotes.quote: Airports are now major gateways to continents and to countries.
quotes.author: Brian Edwards

quotes.quote: Airport terminal are the cathedrals of our age - a huge public space where people gather, wait, eat, sometimes sleep, and usually shop.
quotes.author: Brian Edwards

quotes.quote: The airport terminal is the central building of the air transport system.
quotes.author: Brian Edwards

quotes.quote: As air travel becomes more popular and accessible, the airport has assumed greater importance as a fundamentally new and challenging building type.
quotes.author: Brian Edwards

quotes.quote: The airport is cast as a predictable space where travel time potentially turns into endless waiting.
quotes.author: Christopher Schaberg

quotes.quote: Working at the airport was like entering a parallel universe.
quotes.author: Christopher Schaberg

quotes.quote: The airport industries continues to grow. There are many jobs that need to be done at airports.
quotes.author: Jeff Mapua

quotes.quote: Smaller airports often have similar look. As airports become larger, they become more complex.
quotes.author: Jeff Mapua

quotes.quote: Airports differ in how their facilities are used. Some difference is appropriate: air carriers differ, both in terms of markets they serve.
quotes.author: FAA/OST Task Force Study

quotes.quote: Modern airports, as we have seen, are coming to look more and more like shopping malls.
quotes.author: George Ritzer

quotes.quote: All human life can be found in an airport.
quotes.author: David Walliams

quotes.quote: Waiting for inspiration is like standing at the airport waiting for a train.
quotes.author: Leigh Michaels

quotes.quote: People who say life is precious don't spend much time on line at the airport.
quotes.author: Dov Davidoff

quotes.quote: Intelligence is the airport; will power is the airplane; man is the passenger and happiness is the destination!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It can hardly be a coincidence that no language on earth has ever produced the expression, 'As pretty as an airport.'
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: If you never miss a plane, you’re spending too much time at the airport.
quotes.author: George Stigler

quotes.quote: Life is like an airport. It's where every hello and goodbye take place.
quotes.author: Mia Haryono

quotes.quote: I think you should dress nicely for airports. You're surrounded by people coming from all walks of life. You should look your best.
quotes.author: Casey Neistat

quotes.quote: People who meet in airports are seventy-two percent more likely to fall for each other than people who meet anywhere else.
quotes.author: Jennifer E. Smith

quotes.quote: The only way my head was going truly somewhere else was to travel to a different life and not a different airport.
quotes.author: Lionel Shriver

quotes.quote: Anyone can look for fashion in a boutique or history in a museum. The creative explorer looks for history in a hardware store and fashion in an airport.
quotes.author: Robert Wieder

quotes.quote: I get pretty much all the exercise I need walking down airport concourses carrying bags.
quotes.author: Guy Clark

quotes.quote: Being stuck in airports, you always end up buying perfume and sunglasses.
quotes.author: Lexa Doig

quotes.quote: The state of Alabama can take my freedom, the state of Alabama can take my future, but the state of Alabama cannot take my joy.
quotes.author: Anthony Ray Hinton

quotes.quote: You can say a lot of bad things about Alabama, but you can't say that Alabamans as a people are duly afraid of deep fryers.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: By growing up in Alabama, I had a melting pot of the whole pie: R&B, gospel, country.
quotes.author: Lionel Richie

quotes.quote: I grew up in Mobile, Alabama - somebody's got to be from Mobile, right? - and Mobile sits at the confluence of five rivers, forming this beautiful delta. And the delta has alligators crawling in and out of rivers filled with fish and cypress trees dripping with snakes, birds of every flavor.
quotes.author: Mike deGruy

quotes.quote: I got the sense that Alabama is a place where people don't want handouts and don't much care for people talking out of the side of their mouth.
quotes.author: Adam McKay

quotes.quote: Ladies and gentlemen: There can be no greater investment in Alabama's future than an investment in education.
quotes.author: Bob Riley

quotes.quote: The repeal of racist language in the Constitution of Alabama was and still is a necessary step in the state's ability to progress.
quotes.author: Artur Davis

quotes.quote: Alabama citizens, like the vast majority of Americans, respect and value the meaning of decency, and appreciate public institutions that reflect the common values of our society.
quotes.author: Mike Rogers

quotes.quote: Everyone tends to think of October as being an autumn month. Not so much in south Alabama, usually. There, it's another warm, if not hot, summer month. But the Alabama summer heat will sometimes get broken by cooler days. The haze of the depth of summer lifts, the humidity backs off, and the sky takes on a clearer, sharper blueness that the more languid summer days rarely could manage. And sometimes, there will be a day where the temperature gives a clear peek of what's coming.
quotes.author: JF Smith

quotes.quote: I lived in Alabama and Georgia, and the people in the south are wonderful. It's God, faith, family, country.
quotes.author: Sean Hannity

quotes.quote: There are gods in Alabama: Jack Daniel’s, high school quarterbacks, trucks, big tits, and also Jesus.
quotes.author: Joshilyn Jackson

quotes.quote: Justice is a funny thing, and in Alabama, justice isn't blind. She knows the color of your skin, your educational level, and how much money you have in the bank.
quotes.author: Anthony Ray Hilton

quotes.quote: We have built a genuine level of enthusiasm and goodwill with people throughout this district. People are really excited about the possibilities this election holds, not just for this district, but because of the message Alabama sent to the rest of the country.
quotes.author: Artur Davis

quotes.quote: If you are a gay couple living in Alabama, you know one thing: your family has no standing under the law; and it can and will be violated by strangers.
quotes.author: Andrew Sullivan

quotes.quote: Living in Montgomery, I've been antagonized by the emergence of a narrative about our history that I believe is quite false and misleading, and actually dangerous. And the narrative that emerges when you spend time in the South - places likes Alabama, Georgia, Mississippi, Louisiana - is that we have always been a noble, wonderful, glorious region of the country, with wonderful, noble, glorious people doing wonderful, noble, glorious things. And there's great pride in the Alabamians of the nineteenth century.
quotes.author: Bryan Stevenson

quotes.quote: I think you'd change Alabama fundamentally if in six years someone said, 'If you want the best education in America, you've got to live in Alabama.' you'd change economic development, change the image of this state, you'd offer these kids an opportunity they otherwise would never have had.
quotes.author: Bob Riley

quotes.quote: I live in rural Alabama, and it's very conservative. I've had one guy say 'you can't be a minister and a DJ at the same time'. I thought 'how does someone get to choose what God has assigned me to do - God has given me a ministry.
quotes.author: Robert Hood

quotes.quote: The light in Alaska in particular is so beautiful. So beautiful! Such incredible light.
quotes.author: Sebastiao Salgado

quotes.quote: Alaska is what happens when Willy Wonka and the witch from Hansel and Gretel elope, buy a place together upstate, renounce their sweet teeth, and turn into health fanatics.
quotes.author: Sloane Crosley

quotes.quote: Alaska has long been a magnet for dreamers and misfits, people who think the unsullied enormity of the Last Frontier will patch all the holes in their loves. The bush is an unforgiving place, however, that care nothing for hope or longing.
quotes.author: Jon Krakauer

quotes.quote: To the lover of wilderness, Alaska is one of the most wonderful countries in the world.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: John Muir, the famous naturalist, wrote in his journal that you should never go to Alaska as a young man because you'll never be satisfied with any other place as long as you live. And there's a lot of truth to that.
quotes.author: Tom Bodett

quotes.quote: Alaska itself is an unusual state.
quotes.author: Fareed Zakaria

quotes.quote: Nobody is accidentally in Alaska. The people who are in Alaska are there because they choose to be, so they’ve sort of got a real frontier ethic. The people are incredibly friendly, interesting, smart people – but they also stay out of each other’s business.
quotes.author: Marcus Sakey

quotes.quote: Historically, Alaska is a place that has attracted those fed up with conventionality.
quotes.author: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.quote: In terms of wilderness preservation, Alaska is the last frontier. This time, given one great final chance, let us strive to do it right. Not in our generation, nor ever again, will we have a land and wildlife opportunity approaching the scope and importance of this one.
quotes.author: Mo Udall

quotes.quote: We are greater than the sum of our parts.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: The Bermuda Triangle got tired of warm weather. It moved to Alaska. Now Santa Claus has gone missing.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Good fences make good neighbors.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Relegating grizzlies to Alaska is about like relegating happiness heaven one may never get there.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: You can't just make yourself matter and then die, Alaska, because now I am irretrievably different.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: A changing environment will affect Alaska more than any other state, because of our location. I'm not one though who would attribute it to being man-made.
quotes.author: Sarah Palin

quotes.quote: What is good for Alaska is good for the country. Transferring power from the federal government to the states provides opportunity to all states, not just Alaska.
quotes.author: Joe Miller

quotes.quote: There is magic, but you have to be the magician. You have to make the magic happen.
quotes.author: Sidney Sheldon

quotes.quote: One man's "magic" is another man's engineering.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Learn the alchemy true human beings know. The moment you accept what troubles you've been given the door with open.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: There is an alchemy in sorrow. It can be transmuted into wisdom, which, if it does not bring joy, can yet bring happiness.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Magic is not a practice. It is a living, breathing web of energy that, with our permission, can encase our every action.
quotes.author: Dorothy Morrison

quotes.quote: Real magic can never be made by offering someone else's liver. You must tear out your own, and not expect to get it back.
quotes.author: Peter S. Beagle

quotes.quote: The real alchemy is transforming the base self into gold or into spiritual awareness. That's really what new alchemy's all about.
quotes.author: Fred Alan Wolf

quotes.quote: Scientists have calculated that the chances of something so patently absurd actually existing are millions to one. But magicians have calculated that million-to-one chances crop up nine times out of ten.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: A little magic can take you a long way.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: Alchemy: In times of recession it's not wise to argue about the price of gold.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: The universe is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
quotes.author: Eden Phillpotts

quotes.quote: The true alchemists do not change lead into gold; they change the world into words.
quotes.author: William H. Gass

quotes.quote: There is an alchemy of quiet malice by which women can concoct a subtle poison from ordinary trifles.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: True magic is the art and science of changing states of mind at will.
quotes.author: Douglas Monroe

quotes.quote: Alchemy. The link between the immemorial magic arts and modern science. Humankind's first systematic effort to unlock the secrets of matter by reproducible experiment.
quotes.author: John Ciardi

quotes.quote: Alchemy is the art of manipulating life, and consciousness in matter, to help it evolve, or to solve problems of inner disharmonies.
quotes.author: Jean Dubuis

quotes.quote: Alchemy is the art of far and near, and I think poetry is alchemy in that way. It's delightful to distort size, to see something that's tiny as though it were vast
quotes.author: Robert Morgan

quotes.quote: Alchemy is really the secret tradition of the redemption of spirit from matter.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Magic and all that is ascribed to it is a deep presentiment of the powers of science. The shoes of swiftness, the sword of sharpness, the power of subduing the elements, of using the secret virtues of minerals, of understanding the voices of birds, are the obscure efforts of the mind in a right direction.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The alchemy of life is to turn coins into cents, by making sense of change.
quotes.author: Jennifer Sodini

quotes.quote: Alchemy is about the generation of a psychic construct, a wholeness, a thing which has many properties, which is paradoxical, which is both mind and matter, which can do anything.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: We are master alchemists: We may not have discovered how to make gold out of lead, but we are able to make heaven out of hell, hell out of heaven, and purgatory out of nothing.
quotes.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.quote: At it's essence, art is an alchemical process. Alchemy is a process of transformation.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: You are an alchemist; make gold of that.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The Alchemy's secret key is hidden in the laboratory of the man and woman.
quotes.author: Samael Aun Weor

quotes.quote: The secrets of alchemy exist to transform mortals from a state of suffering and ignorance to a state of enlightenment and bliss.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Chymia, or Alchemy and Spagyrism, is the art of resolving compound bodies into their principles and of combining these again.
quotes.author: Georg Ernst Stahl

quotes.quote: The real alchemy consists in being able to turn gold back again into something else; and that's the secret that most of your friends have lost.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: Alchemy is a kind of philosophy: a kind of thinking that leads to a way of understanding.
quotes.author: Marcel Duchamp

quotes.quote: Alchemy is the art that separates what is useful from what is not by transforming it into its ultimate matter and essence.
quotes.author: Philippus Aureolus Paracelsus

quotes.quote: Real magic is not about gaining power over others: it is about gaining power over yourself.
quotes.author: Rosemary Ellen Guiley

quotes.quote: The alchemy of a fight card is a mysterious thing. Even the most meticulous matchmaking can sometimes misfire.
quotes.author: Katie Kitamura

quotes.quote: True alchemy lies in this formula. Your memory and your senses are but the nourishment of your creative impulse.
quotes.author: Arthur Rimbaud

quotes.quote: The goal of astrology is the alchemy of personality. It is to transform chaos into cosmos, collective human nature into individual and creative personality.
quotes.author: Dane Rudhyar

quotes.quote: None but a poet can write a tragedy. For tragedy is nothing less than pain transmuted into exaltation by the alchemy of poetry.
quotes.author: Edith Hamilton

quotes.quote: The act of writing is the act of making soul, alchemy.
quotes.author: Gloria E. Anzaldúa

quotes.quote: The beautiful souls of the world have an art of saintly alchemy, by which bitterness is converted into kindness, the gall of human experience into gentleness, ingratitude into benefits, insults into pardon.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Leaders must invoke an alchemy of great vision.
quotes.author: Henry A. Kissinger

quotes.quote: Concerning alchemy it is more difficult to discover the actual state of things, in that the historians who specialise in this field seem sometimes to be under the wrath of God themselves; for, like those who write of the Bacon-Shakespeare controversy or on Spanish politics, they seem to become tinctured with the kind of lunacy they set out to describe.
quotes.author: Herbert Butterfield

quotes.quote: Religion isn’t about believing things. It's ethical alchemy. It’s about behaving in a way that changes you, that gives you intimations of holiness and sacredness.
quotes.author: Karen Armstrong

quotes.quote: Alchemy is the process of changing lead into gold. Inner alchemy (personal transformation) occurs when we clear our clutter—internal and external and let go of things that no longer serve us well. This creates balance and space, a place that nurtures contentment, which I believe is true success.
quotes.author: Laurie Buchanan

quotes.quote: Gratitude helps us stop trying to control outcomes. It is the key that unlocks positive energy in our life. It is the alchemy that turns problems into blessings, and the unexpected into gifts.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: The alchemist of the West has turned stone into glass But my alchemy has transmuted glass into flint Pharaohs of today have stalked me in vain.
quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

quotes.quote: Medicine rests upon four pillars philosophy, astronomy, alchemy, and ethics.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: Although Alchemy has now fallen into contempt, and is even considered a thing of the past, the physicain should not be influenced by such judgements.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: Many have said of Alchemy, that it is for the making of gold and silver. For me such is not the aim, but to consider only what virtue and power may lie in medicines.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: This process is alchemy its founder is the smith Vulcan.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: I like to use the term alchemy, which is the soul of the world, or those of Jung's collective unconscious. You connect with a space where everything is.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Awareness is the greatest alchemy there is. Just go on becoming more and more aware you will find your life changing for the better in every possible dimension. It will bring great fulfilment
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Awareness is the greatest alchemy there is. Just go on becoming more and more aware you will find your life changing for the better in every possible dimension. It will bring great fulfilment
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The sense of gratitude produces true spiritual alchemy, makes us magnanimous large souled.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: Our music is our alchemy.
quotes.author: Saul Williams

quotes.quote: I have always looked upon alchemy in natural philosophy to be like enthusiasm in divinity, and to have troubled the world much to the same.
quotes.author: Sir William Temple

quotes.quote: Alchemy is really the secret tradition of the redemption of spirit from matter.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Genius is another word for magic, and the whole point of magic is that it is inexplicable.
quotes.author: Margot Fonteyn

quotes.quote: Music is the strongest form of magic.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: Think of the magic of that foot, comparatively small, upon which your whole weight rests. It’s a miracle, and the dance is a celebration of that miracle
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: Those who don’t believe in magic will never find it.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: The first thing in the human personality that dissolves in alcohol is dignity.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: O God, that men should put an enemy in their mouths to steal away their brains! that we should, with joy, pleasance, revel, and applause, transform ourselves into beasts!
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
quotes.author: Francis Scott Key Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Alcohol impairs calcium absorption by affecting the liver's ability to activate vitamin D. Vitamin D is important in the metabolism of calcium. The more alcohol you drink, the more you hinder your body's ability to build up and maintain healthy bones.
quotes.author: Harvey & Marilyn Diamond

quotes.quote: There is this to be said in favor of drinking, that it takes the drunkard first out of society, then out of the world.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Drunkenness is nothing but voluntary madness.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Reality is an illusion created by a lack of alcohol.
quotes.author: N.F. Simpson

quotes.quote: When you stop drinking, you have to deal with this marvelous personality that started you drinking in the first place.
quotes.author: Jimmy Breslin

quotes.quote: It's like gambling somehow. You go out for a night of drinking and you don't know where you're going to end up the next day. It could work out good or it could be disastrous. It's like the throw of the dice.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Fill up the goblet and reach to me some! Drinking makes wise, but dry fasting makes glum.
quotes.author: William R. Alger

quotes.quote: No substance in nature, as far as yet known, has, when it reaches the brain, such power to induce mental and moral changes of a disastrous character as alcohol. Its transforming power is marvelous, and often appalling. It seems to open a way of entrance into the soul for all classes of foolish, insane or malignant spirits, who, so long as it remains in contact with the brain, are able to hold possession.
quotes.author: Timothy Shay Arthur

quotes.quote: The sway of alcohol over mankind is unquestionably due to its power to stimulate the mystical faculties of human nature.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: The fact that a believer is happier than a skeptic is no more to the point than the fact that a drunken man is happier than a sober one.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Drinking is an emotional thing. It joggles you out of everyday life, out of everything being the same. It yanks you out of your body and your mind and throws you against the wall. I have the feeling that drinking is a form of suicide where you're allowed to return to life and begin all over the next day. It's like killing yourself, and then you're reborn. I guess I've lived about ten or fifteen thousand lives now.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: I would not put a thief in my mouth to steal my brains.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Wine is bottled poetry.
quotes.author: R L Stevenson

quotes.quote: It is sad that people need alcohol to make them happy.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: To a drinker the sensation is real and pure and akin to something spiritual: you seek; in the bottle, you find.
quotes.author: Caroline Knapp

quotes.quote: Drunkenness is temporary suicide: the happiness that it brings is merely negative, a momentary cessation of unhappiness.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Alcohol is the anaesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Then trust me, there's nothing like drinking, So pleasant this side of the grave; It keeps the unhappy from thinking, And makes e'en the valiant more brave.
quotes.author: Charles Dibdin

quotes.quote: I have taken more out of alcohol than alcohol has taken out of me.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Herb is the healing of a nation, alcohol is the destruction.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: When the wine is in, the wit is out.
quotes.author: Thomas Becon

quotes.quote: Alcohol doesn't console, it doesn't fill up anyone's psychological gaps, all it replaces is the lack of God. It doesn't comfort man. On the contrary, it encourages him in his folly, it transports him to the supreme regions where he is master of his own destiny.
quotes.author: Marguerite Duras

quotes.quote: Alcohol is barren. The words a man speaks in the night of drunkenness fade like the darkness itself at the coming of day.
quotes.author: Marguerite Duras

quotes.quote: Alcohol is necessary for a man so that he can have a good opinion of himself, undisturbed be the facts.
quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunne

quotes.quote: Wine makes a man better pleased with himself; I do not say that it makes him more pleasing to others.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: There is a devil in every berry of the grape.
quotes.author: The Koran

quotes.quote: Wine sets even a thoughtful man to singing, or sets him into softly laughing, sets him to dancing. Sometimes it tosses out a word that was better unspoken.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: I got sober. I stopped killing myself with alcohol. I began to think, 'Wait a minute— if I can stop doing this, what are the possibilities?' And slowly it dawned on me that it was maybe worth the risk.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguison

quotes.quote: I am glad now, at age sixty-six that I never used alcohol or tobacco. I've buried a lot of friends who used tobacco or alcohol.
quotes.author: Jerry Falwell

quotes.quote: You can't drown yourself in drink, I've tried; you float.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: There is more refreshment and stimulation in a nap, even of the briefest than in all the alcohol ever distilled.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: That's all drugs and alcohol do, they cut off your emotions in the end.
quotes.author: Ringo Starr

quotes.quote: A drunken man is fitly named; he has drunk, till he is drunken: the wine swallows his consciousness, and it sinks therein.
quotes.author: Augustus William Hare And Julius Charles Hare

quotes.quote: Liquor is such a nice substitute for facing adult life.
quotes.author: Dorothy B. Hughes

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a good preservative for everything but brains.
quotes.author: Mary Pettibone Poole

quotes.quote: The chief reason for drinking is the desire to behave in a certain way, and to be able to blame it on alcohol.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Alcohol is like love; the first kiss is magic, the second is intimate, the third is routine. After that, you just take the girl's clothes off.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: And malt does more than Milton can / To justify God's ways to man / Ale, man, ale's the stuff to drink / For fellows whom it hurts to think.
quotes.author: A.E. Housman

quotes.quote: Wine may well be considered the most healthful and most hygienic of beverages.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.quote: Whenever someone asks me if I want water with my scotch, I say I'm thirsty, not dirty.
quotes.author: Joe E. Lewis

quotes.quote: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the Bible says love your enemy.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: The really important things are said over cocktails and are never done.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: Beer is not a good cocktail-party drink, especially in a home where you don't know where the bathroom is.
quotes.author: Billy Carter

quotes.quote: Drunkenness is not a new vice. Its ravages have always been a scourge on the human race...Alcohol is a killer, a murderer.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Do not seek solace in alcohol. Alcohol obscures good judgement and leaves you unable t think clearly, or understand what God is trying to say to you.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Alcohol may be used for medicine, but it can also become a terrible drug.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Maybe alcohol picks you up a little bit, but it sure lets you down in a hurry.
quotes.author: Betty Ford

quotes.quote: Alcohol is like Photoshop for real life.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.quote: Always carry a flagon of whiskey in case of snakebite and furthermore always carry a small snake.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: The simple act of opening a bottle of wine has brought more happiness to the human race than all the collective governments in the history of the earth.
quotes.author: Jim Harrison

quotes.quote: I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade...And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka and have a party.
quotes.author: Ron White

quotes.quote: If the headache would only precede the intoxication, alcoholism would be a virtue.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: I never drink anything stronger than gin before breakfast.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: There are better things in life than alcohol, but alcohol makes up for not having them,
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: I like to have a martini, / Two at the very most. / After three I'm under the table, / After four I'm under my host.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Quickly, bring me a beaker of wine, so that I may wet y mind and say something clever.
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.quote: When the wine is out, the wit is out.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: I was so jazzed about sobering up and starting a new life, I had to stop at a bar to get a drink just to calm down.
quotes.author: April Rhosed (Glee)

quotes.quote: Alcoholism is an imperfect spiritual longing.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: One key symptom of alcoholism is that the individual comes to need a drink for every mood--one to calm down, one to perk up, one to celebrate, one to deal with disappointment, and so on.
quotes.author: Phyllis A. Balch

quotes.quote: Alcoholism is a devastating, potentially fatal disease. The primary symptom of having it is telling everyone--including yourself--that you are not an alcoholic.
quotes.author: Herbert l. Gravitz

quotes.quote: Alcoholism is a well documented pathological reaction to unresolved grief.
quotes.author: David Cook

quotes.quote: Alcoholism is a disease of the whole person.
quotes.author: Maurice Gelinas

quotes.quote: The first step toward recovery from alcoholism is the recognition that a problem exists. Once the problem drinker breaks through denial and admits to having a problem, a range of treatment options become available.
quotes.author: JEFFREY S. NEVID

quotes.quote: Alcoholism is the disease of more.
quotes.author: Caroline Knapp

quotes.quote: Alcoholism is the only disease that you can get yelled at for having.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: Physicians who are familiar with alcoholism agree there is no such thing as making a normal drinker out of an alcoholic.
quotes.author: ALCOHOLICS ANONYMOUS

quotes.quote: I became a very angry person and it was all due to alcoholism.
quotes.author: Christopher Atkins

quotes.quote: Herb is the healing of a nation, alcohol is the destruction.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Alcohol does not solve problems but becomes a problem in itself.
quotes.author: Amit Abraham

quotes.quote: A drinking man's someone who wants to forget he isn't still young and believing.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Drunkenness is nothing but voluntary madness.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Drunkenness is temporary suicide.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: A drinker has a hole under his nose that all his money runs into.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a good preservative for everything but brains.
quotes.author: Mary Pettibone Poole

quotes.quote: Alcoholism and drug addiction are killer of mental and physical health. Alcoholic and drug addicts are killing themselves slowly.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Alcoholism is a thief of health, mental sanity and human dignity.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Alcoholism is above all a disease of denial.
quotes.author: David Stafford

quotes.quote: Alcoholism is a choice... not a life sentence.
quotes.author: David Norman

quotes.quote: Alcoholism or addiction is a disease because it fits the definition of disease. It is progressive and chronic, and left untreated, it will kill.
quotes.author: Irene Tomkinson

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a very patient drug. It will wait for the alcoholic to pick it up one more time.
quotes.author: Mercedes McCambridge

quotes.quote: Alcohol is the anesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The first thing in the human personality that dissolves in alcohol is dignity.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The intermediate stage between socialism and capitalism is alcoholism.
quotes.author: Norman Brenner

quotes.quote: When the wine goes in, strange things come out.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: Alcoholism does more havoc than three historical scourge together; famine, plague and war.
quotes.author: William Gladstone

quotes.quote: Alcohol decimated the working class and so many people.
quotes.author: Martin Scorsese

quotes.quote: Alcohol is the cause of all my problems.
quotes.author: Jayson Williams

quotes.quote: We are imprisoned in life in the company of persons powerfully unlike us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Alienation as our present destiny is achieved only by outrageous violence perpetrated by human beings on human beings.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.quote: Disconnection or alienation from the past has political consequences.
quotes.author: Mal Peet

quotes.quote: The alienation of man thus appeared as the fundamental evil of capitalist society.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: This whole theory of alienation that intellectuals have been passing on, really is just to stop a lot of ham acting. If you fill something with a proper emotion, it didn't worry him at all.
quotes.author: John Hurt

quotes.quote: Not knowing where your food comes from is a primary form of alienation.
quotes.author: Allen Lacy

quotes.quote: There is a terrible alienation in the ordinary man between what he is being told and what he secretly believes.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: Modern humanity's sense of alienation lies in the fact that we have cut ourselves adrift from both the natural world and from the roots of our past.
quotes.author: Philip Carr-Gomm

quotes.quote: Mankind's self-alienation has reached such a degree that it can experience its own destruction as an aesthetic pleasure of the first order.
quotes.author: Jerry Mander

quotes.quote: We are born into a world where alienation awaits us. We are potentially men, but are in an alienated state, and this state is not simply a natural system. Alienation as our present destiny is achieved only by outrageous violence perpetrated by human beings on human beings.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.quote: To a man utterly without a sense of belonging, mere life is all that matters. It is the only reality in an eternity of nothingness, and he clings to it with shameless despair.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: It is really an alienation to believe that learning is the result of teaching.
quotes.author: Ivan Illich

quotes.quote: All separation, every kind of estrangement and alienation is false. All is one.
quotes.author: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj

quotes.quote: It's such a profound alienation for a person not to be at home in their own body.
quotes.author: Marilyn Wann

quotes.quote: There is no alienation that a little power will not cure.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: When we bury our feelings, we also bury ourselves. It means we exist in a state of alienation. We rarely know it, but we are lonely for ourselves.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.quote: We live in a time where there's an alienation factor. There's a certain disconnection. We don't have any real sense of community anymore.
quotes.author: Alan Ball

quotes.quote: Without alienation, there can be no politics.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: Alienation produces eccentrics or revolutionaries.
quotes.author: Jenny Holzer

quotes.quote: Young alienation, disappointment and heartache is all a part of the first real growing up that we do.
quotes.author: Judd Nelson

quotes.quote: To ward off alienation and gloom, it is only necessary to remember the unremembered heroes of the past, and to look around us for the unnoticed heroes of the present.
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.quote: Alienation and loneliness plant the seeds for rebellion and consciousness.
quotes.author: B. W. Powe

quotes.quote: Loneliness is caused by an alienation from life. It is a loneliness from your real self.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: Alienation, I suppose, can't be hackneyed because it will always exist.
quotes.author: Mike Birbiglia

quotes.quote: Alienation is a form of living death. It is the acid of despair that dissolves society.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: The only thing that scares me more than space aliens is the idea that there aren't any space aliens. We can't be the best that creation has to offer. I pray we're not all there is. If so, we're in big trouble.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: I am discounting reports of UFOs. Why would they appear only to cranks and weirdos?
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: I believe alien life is quite common in the universe, although intelligent life is less so. Some say it has yet to appear on planet Earth.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Considering the number of planets and stars that we know exist, it's extremely unlikely that we are the only form of evolved life
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: If we can find one fossil on Mars, or one little tube worm deep under the oceans of Europa or Enceladus, then the universe is full of life
quotes.author: Chris Hadfield

quotes.quote: That these people are wandering around, looking for aliens to justify the emptiness inside them and let them feel special without effort, creeps me out.
quotes.author: Thomm Quackenbush

quotes.quote: You don't need to prove the existence of aliens. That's unproductive, unless we make a bet on it.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: I take aliens very seriously and don't appreciate light entertainment or weak approximations being made of them.
quotes.author: Helen Oyeyemi

quotes.quote: Whatever is not commonly seen is condemned as alien.
quotes.author: Iris Chang

quotes.quote: Aliens didn't come down to Earth and give us technology. We invented it ourselves. Therefore it can never be alienating; it can only be an expression of our humanity.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Xenogenesis also examines humans coexisting, cooperating, and conflicting with an alien species, after a nuclear apocalypse destroys the world and mankind must merge their DNA with the aliens to survive in some form.
quotes.author: Butler

quotes.quote: Bloodchild tells us the story of humans in an alien world, who are protected by an insect-like aliens that use the humans as host for breeding their young.
quotes.author: Butler

quotes.quote: The inside of the Earth is a tropical paradise that is home to an advanced race of beings that could be humans, aliens, giants, or some combination thereof.
quotes.author: Moxie LaBouche

quotes.quote: Stephen Hawking's been watching too many Hollywood movies. I think the only kind aliens in Hollywood are the ones created by Steven Spielberg — 'Close Encounters of the Third Kind' and 'E.T.,' for example. All other aliens are trying to suck our brains out.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: No astrophysicist would deny the possibility of life. I think we're not creative enough to imagine what life would be like on another planet. Show me a dead alien. Better yet, show me a live one.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: For me at age 11, I had a pair of binoculars and looked up to the moon, and the moon wasn't just bigger, it was better. There were mountains and valleys and craters and shadows. And it came alive.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Perhaps we've never been visited by aliens because they have looked upon Earth and decided there's no sign of intelligent life.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: I said that if an alien came to visit, I'd be embarrassed that we fight wars to pull fossil fuels out of the ground to run our transportation. They'd be like,'What?'
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Most laptop computers are powerful enough to override the communication systems of any invading alien civilizations.
quotes.author: Lawrence Dorfman

quotes.quote: There are definite worlds both like and unlike this world of ours...We must believe that in all worlds, there are living creatures and plants and other things we see in this world.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: To my mathematical brain, the numbers of planets in the universe make thinking about aliens perfectly rational.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: While the search for alien life has yielded few results, the public's fascination with extraterrestrials remains high.
quotes.author: Stuart A. Kallen

quotes.quote: With billions of planets in the universe, it might only be a matter of time before contact is made and humanity joins with an alien civilization to forge a new future in the infinite cosmos
quotes.author: Stuart A. Kallen

quotes.quote: Space creatures might not be visiting Earth with peaceful intentions.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: The dominance of a hierarchical myth of origins means that humans immediately believe the aliens to be a race of telepathic superbeings.
quotes.author: Jenny Wolmark

quotes.quote: Unfortunately, however, many of the same science fiction writers who started us thinking about the possibility of extraterrestrial life did nothing to make us think about here-at-home variation — women, blacks, Indians, Asians, Hispanics, etc.
quotes.author: Octavia Butler

quotes.quote: Numerous ancient stone carvings, rock paintings, and mysterious monuments throughout the world hint that extraterrestrials may have visited this planet in the distant past.
quotes.author: Preston Dennett

quotes.quote: If aliens ever visit us, I think the outcome would be much as Christopher Columbus first landed in America, which didn't turn out very well for the Native Americans.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: If the government is covering up knowledge of aliens, they are doing a better job of it than they do at anything else.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: You don't need to prove the existence of aliens. That's unproductive, unless we make a bet on it.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: If you align expectations with reality, you will never be disappointed.
quotes.author: Terrell Owens

quotes.quote: With the right alignment, everything you want makes its way into your experience. You are the keeper of your own gate.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: Just as your car runs more smoothly and requires less energy to go faster and farther when the wheels are in perfect alignment, you perform better when your thoughts, feelings, emotions, goals, and values are in balance.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: I think it's one of the scars in our culture that we have too high an opinion of ourselves. We align ourselves with the angels instead of the higher primates.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: Close alliances with despots are never safe for free states.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: I believe the choice to be excellent begins with aligning your thoughts and words with the intention to require more from yourself.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Peace, commerce and honest friendship with all nations; entangling alliances with none.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: If they want to have a meaningful impact, your actions should be aligned with your words.
quotes.author: Brian Hamburger

quotes.quote: When you are in alignment with the desires of your heart, things have a way of working out.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: I believe the stars align so souls can find one another. Whether they are meant to be souls in love or souls in life remains to be seen.
quotes.author: Renee Ahdieh

quotes.quote: Alignment = Magic & Miracles ... Keep your standards high. YOU are worth it!
quotes.author: Sheri Fink

quotes.quote: I believe that the Galactic alignment stimulates consciousness evolution on this planet, whether or not beings alive during the alignment era are aware of it happening.
quotes.author: John Jenkins

quotes.quote: If you can tune into your purpose and really align with it, setting goals so that your vision is an expression of that purpose, then life flows much more easily.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: You can't separate peace from freedom because no one can be at peace unless he has his freedom.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: It's in every person's life, around 27 to 29 years old, the stars and the planets align themselves to exactly the way they were when you were born. You're faced with yourself. There's no running away.
quotes.author: Lykke Li

quotes.quote: A lot of the conflict you have in your life exists simply because you're not living in alignment; you're not be being true to yourself.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: What you want is already here, in the unified field of pure potential. Everything you need to fulfill your greatest desire is already part of your being. But it can't come out until you align with it, let go of the obstructions to it, and raise your vibration to the level at which it already exists.
quotes.author: Derek Rydall

quotes.quote: The true courage of civilized nations is readiness for sacrifice in the service of the state, so that the individual counts as only one amongst many. The important thing here is not personal mettle but aligning oneself with the universal.
quotes.author: G. W. F. Hegel

quotes.quote: Union may be strength, but it is mere blind brute strength unless wisely directed.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Alignment trumps everything. Stay off the subject that disturbs your alignment, and everything that you are about will come into alignment.
quotes.author: Abraham Hicks

quotes.quote: To turn your dreams into reality, all your resources, efforts and concentration should be aligned in the same direction.
quotes.author: Dr Roopleen

quotes.quote: Let your alignment (with Well-Being) be first and foremost, and let everything else be secondary. And not only will you have an eternally joyous journey, but everything you have ever imagined will flow effortlessly into your experience. There is nothing you cannot be or do or haveâ€”but your dominant intent is to be joyful. The doing and the having will come into alignment once you get that one down.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: Even the most seemingly unpleasant situations - if you become aligned with it, something good will emerge from that.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: When people align around shared political, social, economic or environmental values, and take collective action, thinking and behavior that compromises the lives of millions of people around the world can truly change.
quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

quotes.quote: On learning: If you really want alignment, go to a chiropractor.
quotes.author: Andy Hargreaves

quotes.quote: True freedom is where an individual's thoughts and actions are in alignment with that which is true, correct, and of honor - no matter the personal price.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: When you examine the lives of the most influential people who have ever walked among us, you discover one thread that winds through them all. They have been aligned first with their spiritual nature and only then with their physical selves.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The purpose of a team is not goal attainment but goal alignment.
quotes.author: Tom DeMarco

quotes.quote: Align yourself with people that you can learn from, people who want more out of life, people who are stretching and searching and seeking some higher ground in life.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: To attain inner peace you must actually give your life, not just your possessions. When you at last give your life - bringing into alignment your beliefs and the way you live then, and only then, can you begin to find inner peace.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: Every experience that you have and will have upon the Earth encourages the alignment of your personality with your soul.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Deep within, you know that the only thing that is truly important is being in alignment with spirit.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: If you align your personality to your heart song, your soul song, then the only thing that you can create is true happiness and pure bliss because you will be in true alignment with your purpose.
quotes.author: Tracy Friesen

quotes.quote: When you do things that are not in alignment with your core you may not be happy with yourself and may end up confused.
quotes.author: Tracy Friesen

quotes.quote: We transform our being to be in alignment with their being. Alternatively, the same goes for the people we do not like.
quotes.author: Tracy Friesen

quotes.quote: It is through the alignment of the body that I discovered the alignment of my mind, self, and intelligence.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Alignment creates an intercommunicating structure that, like a cathedral, is an offering to God.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Alignment is a metaphysical word.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Correct alignment creates correct space, as in a well-constructed building.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Alignment means to work with, both physically and mentally, to befriend, ally with and support.
quotes.author: Tony Higo

quotes.quote: Let your alignment be first and foremost, and let everything else be secondary.
quotes.author: Abraham Hicks

quotes.quote: The things that bring you the greatest joy are in alignment with your purpose.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: Now is all you ever have. There never is anything else. So, you might as well make the now your friend. Otherwise, you are out of alignment with life itself.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: To live in alignment with your Spirit is to live your truth and build your life upon it.
quotes.author: Sonia Choquette

quotes.quote: To feel more fulfilled your actions and activities need to be in alignment with what you deem important.
quotes.author: Deborah Day

quotes.quote: When you find that your life is out of alignment with your grandest idea of yourself, seek to change it.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: The more convinced of the power of the word, the more power will the word have.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: You must learn to be still in the midst of activity and to be vibrantly alive in repose.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: Labor to keep alive in your breast that little spark of celestial fire, called conscience.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: I enjoy life when things are happening. I don't care if it's good things or bad things. That means you're alive.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers
