quotes.quote: To me, life is a gift, and it's a blessing to just be alive. And each person should learn what a gift it is to be alive no matter how tough things get.
quotes.author: Tony Bennett

quotes.quote: If you think nobody cares if you're alive, try missing a couple of car payments.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: I like living. I have sometimes been wildly, despairingly, acutely miserable, racked with sorrow, but through it all I still know quite certainly that just to be alive is a grand thing.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: When you feel pain, you know that you are still alive.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: A coward is a man who'd rather live dead than die alive.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: When we give up on our dreams, we die while still alive.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: No one really knows why they are alive until they know what they'd die for.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: The mystery of human existence lies not in just staying alive, but in finding something to live for.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: Don’t ask what the world needs. Ask what makes you come alive, and go do it. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.quote: I finally figured out the only reason to be alive is to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside while still alive. Never surrender.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: The goodbyes we speak and the goodbyes we hear are the good byes that tell us we're still alive.
quotes.author: Steven King

quotes.quote: We can only be said to be alive in those moments when our hearts are conscious of our treasures.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: The whole point of being alive is to evolve into the complete person you were intended to be.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Passion rebuilds the world for the youth. It makes all things alive and significant.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you are fully alive to the prospect of dying, you really start reprioritising your life.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: I don't believe people are looking for the meaning of life as much as they are looking for the experience of being alive.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Try to learn to breathe deeply, really to taste food when you eat, and when you sleep, really to sleep. Try as much as possible to be wholly alive with all your might, and when you laugh, laugh like hell. And when you get angry, get good and angry. Try to be alive. You will be dead soon enough.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is just to be alive. It is so plain and so obvious and so simple. And yet, everybody rushes around in a great panic as if it were necessary to achieve something beyond themselves.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: To be fully alive, fully human, and completely awake is to be continually thrown out of the nest.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Our lives are to be used and thus to be lived as fully as possible, and truly it seems that we are never so alive as when we concern ourselves with other people.
quotes.author: Harry Chapin

quotes.quote: Suddenly you’re ripped into being alive. And life is pain, and life is suffering, and life is horror, but my god you’re alive and its spectacular.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: My mom said the only reason men are alive is for lawn care and vehicle maintenance.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.quote: Humor keeps us alive. Humor and food. Don't forget food. You can go a week without laughing.
quotes.author: Josh Whedon

quotes.quote: A tree grows. If you're staying the same, something is wrong. You're not alive.
quotes.author: Hamza Yusuf

quotes.quote: Life must be lived and curiosity kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Our fate is determined by how far we are prepared to push ourselves to stay alive - the decisions we make to survive. We must do whatever it takes to endure and make it through alive.
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.quote: Hope can keep you alive in the midst of the turbulence.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Let us learn to show our friendship for a man when he is alive and not after he is dead.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Every one of us is losing something precious to us. Lost opportunities, lost possibilities, feelings we can never get back again. That’s part of what it means to be alive.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: In order to understand, observe, deduce, man must first be conscious of himself as alive.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: The greatest weakness of most humans is their hesitancy to tell others how much they love them while they're alive.
quotes.author: Orlando A. Battista

quotes.quote: Carpe diem! Rejoice while you are alive; enjoy the day; live life to the fullest; make the most of what you have. It is later than you think.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: When we were children, we used to think that when we were grown-up we would no longer be vulnerable. But to grow up is to accept vulnerability... To be alive is to be vulnerable.
quotes.author: Madelaine L'Engle

quotes.quote: We are most alive when we're in love.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: To know what you prefer instead of humbly saying Amen to what the world tells you ought to prefer, is to have kept your soul alive.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: The real question is not whether life exists after death. The real question is whether you are alive before death.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Hope is the foundational quality of all change, and encouragement is the fuel which keeps hope alive.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Allah is with people who show patience. If you are down in the dumps, Allah will help you if you have belief. But this is a personal thing between you and him. You can't fool Allah.
quotes.author: Mohammad Azharuddin

quotes.quote: Allah SWT will not be merciful to those who are not merciful to mankind.
quotes.author: Sahih Al-Bukhari

quotes.quote: When we repair our relationship with Allah SWT, He repairs everything else for us.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Allah's plan is better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Salman al-Ouda

quotes.quote: Patience is seeking help only from Allah.
quotes.author: Dhul-Nun al-Misri

quotes.quote: To Allah we belong and to Him is our return.
quotes.author: Abdullah Yusuf Ali

quotes.quote: You will never find true love until you first learn to love Allah.
quotes.author: Boonaa Mohammed

quotes.quote: Allah always gives you signs, when you are with Him, that He is with you.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: If you complain that Allah is testing you too much, you're failing the test.
quotes.author: Omar Suleiman

quotes.quote: Allah never changes a people's state unless they change what's in themselves.
quotes.author: Haroon Siddiqui

quotes.quote: If Allah created you for this world, He would have created you without death.
quotes.author: Habib Umar bin Hafiz

quotes.quote: Whoever desires to purify his heart, then let him prefer Allah to his desires.
quotes.author: Ibn Qayyim Al-Jawziyya

quotes.quote: Allah makes the way to Jannah easy for him who treads the path in search of knowledge.
quotes.author: Abu Hurairah

quotes.quote: Allah is Most Merciful even when He sends us trials, for even His punishment is for our own good.
quotes.author: Omar Suleiman

quotes.quote: Allah executed and rendered justice for the sake of putting together and harmonization of the hearts.
quotes.author: Fatima bint Muhammad

quotes.quote: Allah does not withhold to withhold. Remaking the heart was the objective. To remake it, He sometimes breaks it first.
quotes.author: Yasmin Mogahed

quotes.quote: Allah will never disappoint the sincere caller. Even when you think He hasn't answered you, He plans in your favor.
quotes.author: Omar Suleiman

quotes.quote: Allah made us all a different shade and colour. Nations and tribes recognize one another! 'Cause every single person is your sister and brother.
quotes.author: Dawud Wharnsby Ali

quotes.quote: Without Allah on your side, you can do nothing. With Allah on your side, there is nothing you cannot do.
quotes.author: Boonaa Mohammed

quotes.quote: When you make dua, it is a sign that Allah SWT loves you & has intended good for you.
quotes.author: Imam Ibn al-Qayyim

quotes.quote: Allah is displeased when you stop asking Him and mankind is displeased when asked.
quotes.author: Ibn Al-Qayyim

quotes.quote: And it is Allah (SWT) who gives strength in times of weakness.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Allah(God) is the greatest friend.
quotes.author: Muhammad

quotes.quote: When Allah decides a matter, it is done.
quotes.author: Khalid ibn al-Walid

quotes.quote: Nothing happens except by the permissive or active Will of Allah.
quotes.author: Louis Farrakhan

quotes.quote: The more knowledge you have, the greater will be your fear of Allah.
quotes.author: Abu Bakr

quotes.quote: Whenever you feel down, always remember that Almighty Allah has better plans for you.
quotes.author: Shahid Afridi

quotes.quote: Allah made joining and connecting with the kinship and cognation, the cause of lengthening of life.
quotes.author: Fatima bint Muhammad

quotes.quote: I have allergies, and I've had my share of nosebleeds, but that's usually related to pollen.
quotes.author: Stephen Curry

quotes.quote: I have terrible chemical allergies, and I'm constantly battling unsightly reactions.
quotes.author: Wendi McLendon-Covey

quotes.quote: It prompted patches of allergy to spread on skin, was resistant to the strongest of medicinal balm.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Your skin turned crimson red; with infinite patches in your neck developing disdainful allergy.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: It was as if someone had hurled tones of chili powder; and the interiors of my eye developed a severe red allergy.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Allergies to dust and grain, maladies, remedies and still these allergies remain.
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: Growing wild, not in the city gave me an allergy. And my reaction's, what's gonna happen?
quotes.author: Blondie

quotes.quote:
Allergic to cats, allergic to bees, allergic to dust, allergic to trees and allergic to molds. Got to be trickified of something to eat
allergies.
quotes.author: Barenaked Ladies

quotes.quote: Her allergy's been forsaken maybe stir it all on at me.
quotes.author: Melvins

quotes.quote: Getting allergies, gotta use visine so I can see through my eyes.
quotes.author: MobyTheRapper

quotes.quote: Deadly allergy? not enough to stop me from going to the zoo.
quotes.author: Danny

quotes.quote: Losing you are a sure way to set off my allergies.
quotes.author: Randy Travis

quotes.quote: Awful allergies that made me sneeze.
quotes.author: Carpenters

quotes.quote: If you are allergic to a thing, it is best not to put that thing in your mouth, particularly if the thing is cats.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.quote: Every season can be allergy season, depending on what you're allergic to.
quotes.author: Clara Chung

quotes.quote: We have currently a built-in allergy to unpleasant or disturbing information. Our mass media reflect this. But unless we get up off our fat surpluses and recognize that television in the main is being used to distract, delude, amuse, and insulate us, then television and those who finance it, those who look at it, and those who work at it, may see a totally different picture too late.
quotes.author: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.quote: People with asthma or allergies will be at particular risk of breathing in substances that are a threat to their health.
quotes.author: Rosemary Shahan

quotes.quote: The only definitive test for food allergy is whether a person can consume that food without an adverse reaction.
quotes.author: David Fleischer

quotes.quote: The joy from eating does not come from the exclusivity of the food, but instead from the sensitivity that we eat it with.
quotes.author: Nino Gruettke

quotes.quote: The difference between an itch and an allergy is about one hundred bucks.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A cold will usually clear up in about three to five days, whereas with an allergy the sufferer may be sneezing or have difficulty breathing, but not run a fever like someone with a cold would.
quotes.author: Clara Chung

quotes.quote: About 20 per cent of the population believe themselves to have a food allergy and only about five per cent actually do.
quotes.author: John Warner

quotes.quote: Some people are so allergic to goodness that they cannot bear it even at oneself.
quotes.author: Ansh Rajora

quotes.quote: The more green tea you drink, the more the allergic reactions are suppressed. Green tea has an anti-inflammatory effect on the immune system.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Most of the food allergies die under garlic and onion.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: We trace the hand of the Almighty in framing the constitution of our land, and believe that the Lord raised up men purposely for the accomplishment of this object, raised them up and inspired them to frame the Constitution of the United States
quotes.author: Lorenzo Snow

quotes.quote: Believe in this. Almighty makes life better because you deserve a better life.
quotes.author: Ibn Jeem

quotes.quote: Before the throne of the Almighty, man will be judged not by his acts but by his intentions. For God alone reads our hearts.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: If the ways of the Almighty are not humanly logical, it is not the fault of the Almighty but of the limitations of human logic.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Without prayer, without faith in the Almighty, the civil rights movement would have been like a bird without wings.
quotes.author: John Lewis

quotes.quote: Part of me suspects that I'm a loser, and the other part of me thinks I'm God Almighty.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: We never, ever judge someone on who's going to heaven, hell. That's the Almighty's job.
quotes.author: Phil Robertson

quotes.quote: Emotionally, I depend only on myself. My strong belief in the Almighty carries me.
quotes.author: Mohammad Azharuddin

quotes.quote: It boggles my mind that someone can see life breathed into a baby, watch the grass die and then come to life again, see leaves fall and watch the rebirth of a tree, or gaze on any of the majestic splendor that is this earth and not be overpowered by the presence of an Almighty God!
quotes.author: Bill Mccartney

quotes.quote: I don't even think about a retirement program because I'm working for the Lord, for the Almighty. And even thought the Lord's pay isn't very high, his retirement program is, you might say, out of this world.
quotes.author: George Foreman

quotes.quote: God Almighty is, to be sure, unmoved by passion or appetite, unchanged by affection; but then it is to be added that He neither sees nor hears nor perceives things by any senses like ours; but in a manner infinitely more perfect.
quotes.author: Joseph Butler

quotes.quote: If the Lord says to give more than you think you are able to give, know that He will provide for you. Whether things are sailing smoothly or the bottom has dropped out, He is always trustworthy. You can count on Almighty God to keep His everlasting Word.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: When any civil government steps outside the mandate authorized by God Almighty, then that government does not have any further claim over its citizens.
quotes.author: Pat Robertson

quotes.quote: Perhaps the best proof of the Almighty's existence is that we never know when we are to die.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.quote: The task of preserving and advancing the highest humanity, given to this earth by the benevolence of the Almighty, seems a truly high mission.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: Of all the systems of religion that ever were invented, there is none more derogatory to the Almighty, more unedifying to man, more repugnant to reason, and more contradictory in itself, than this thing called Christianity. Too absurd for belief, too impossible to convince, and too inconsistent for practice, it renders the heart torpid, or produces only atheists and fanatics.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: The purposes of the Almighty are perfect, and must prevail, though we erring mortals may fail to accurately perceive them in advance.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: What others say and do cannot stop you from fulfilling your destiny. Your destiny was handed down by Almighty God.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: When it is a question of God's almighty Spirit, never say, 'I can't.'
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: One Almighty is more than all mighties
quotes.author: William Gurnall

quotes.quote: God rose up from His throne and said to demon powers tormenting the sinless Son of God, ‘Let Him go.' Then the resurrection power of Almighty God went through hell and filled Jesus. .. He was resurrected from the dead - the first born-again man
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: It must never be forgotten that Almighty God rules this world. He is not an absentee God.
quotes.author: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.quote: He gave us eyes to see them, And lips that we might tell How great is God Almighty, Who has made all things well.
quotes.author: Cecil Frances Alexander

quotes.quote: I would rather have the whole world against me but know that the Almighty God is with me, be called an apostate but know that I have the approval of the God of glory.
quotes.author: Mehdi Dibaj

quotes.quote: The hardest word to swallow is almost.
quotes.author: R.Y.S. Perez

quotes.quote: Almost all quality improvement comes via simplification of design, manufacturing layout, processes, and procedures.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: Almost all of our sorrows spring out of our relations with other people.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Almost all of our relationships begin and most of them continue as forms of mutual exploitation, a mental or physical barter, to be terminated when one or both parties run out of goods.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: Almost all the noblest things that have been achieved in the world, have been achieved by poor men; poor scholars, poor professional men, poor artisans and artists, poor philosophers, poets, and men of genius.
quotes.author: Albert Pike

quotes.quote: A well-written life is almost as rare as a well-spent one.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Almost every wise saying has an opposite one, no less wise, to balance it.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Almost always, the creative dedicated minority has made the world better.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Almost everything that's made conventionally is also grown organically.
quotes.author: Rod Moyer

quotes.quote: Almost all our desires, when examined, contain something too shameful to reveal.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: It is nearly always the most improbable things that really come to pass.
quotes.author: E. T. A. Hoffmann

quotes.quote: Almost dying is awfully easy. It's the living that's hard.
quotes.author: Jennifer L. Holm

quotes.quote: Almost everyone is dying to leave home, eventually; and almost everyone needs to.
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.quote: Almost everybody embraces life.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Edwards

quotes.quote: Almost anything is possible with time.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Almost all life depends on probabilities.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Almost everything in leadership comes back to relationships.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.quote: Almost everyone can do or be something for someone else in need.
quotes.author: Joy F. Evans

quotes.quote: Perfect understanding will sometimes almost extinguish pleasure.
quotes.author: A. E. Housman

quotes.quote: In almost everything, experience is more valuable than precept.
quotes.author: Quintilian

quotes.quote: Success is almost totally dependent upon drive and persistence. The extra energy required to make another effort or try another approach is the secret of winning.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: The most important things in your life are almost always impossible to predict.
quotes.author: Joe Meno

quotes.quote: Almost every important choice in our lives is really just an expression of hope.
quotes.author: John Twelve Hawks

quotes.quote: Almost everything that is great has been done by youth.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Language... has created the word 'loneliness' to express the pain of being alone. And it has created the word 'solitude' to express the glory of being alone.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be.
quotes.author: Ellen Burstyn

quotes.quote: I love to be alone. I never found the companion that was so companionable as solitude.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I think it's good for a person to spend time alone. It gives them an opportunity to discover who they are and to figure out why they are always alone.
quotes.author: Amy Sedaris

quotes.quote: It is better to be alone than in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: People who cannot bear to be alone are generally the worst company.
quotes.author: Albert Guino

quotes.quote: Solitude is a chosen separation for refining your soul. Isolation is what you crave when you neglect the first.
quotes.author: Wayne Cordeiro

quotes.quote: Being solitary is being alone well: being alone luxuriously immersed in doings of your own choice, aware of the fullness of your own presence rather than of the absence of others. Because solitude is an achievement.
quotes.author: Alice Koller

quotes.quote: Sometimes life is too hard to be alone, and sometimes life is too good to be alone.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: A man can be himself alone so long as he is alone if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom; for it is only when he is alone that he is really free.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhaur

quotes.quote: The trouble is not really in being alone, it's being lonely. One can be lonely in the midst of a crowd, don't you think?
quotes.author: Christine Feehan

quotes.quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: Solitude is the profoundest fact of the human condition. Man is the only being who knows he is alone.
quotes.author: Octavio Paz

quotes.quote: And if you couldn't be loved, the next best thing was to be let alone.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: The person who tries to live alone will not succeed as a human being. His heart withers if it does not answer another heart. His mind shrinks away if he hears only the echoes of his own thoughts and finds no other inspiration.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: The most terrible poverty is loneliness, and the feeling of being unloved.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Pray that your loneliness may spur you into finding something to live for, great enough to die for.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: When we truly realize that we are all alone is when we need others the most.
quotes.author: Ronald Anthony

quotes.quote: All of our unhappiness comes from our inability to be alone.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Being isolated at times doesn't always mean that you want to distance yourself from others; it simply means that you need some space to see things clearly.
quotes.author: Wazim Shaw

quotes.quote: I don't want to be alone, I want to be left alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Sometimes you just have to stand alone to make sure you still can.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: People think being alone makes you lonely, but I don't think that's true. Being surrounded by the wrong people is the loneliest thing in the world.
quotes.author: Kim Culbertson

quotes.quote: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It is far better to be alone than to wish you were.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Be able to be alone. Lose not the advantage of solitude, and the society of thyself.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.quote: I have a huge, active imagination, [and] I think I'm really scared of being alone; because if I'm left to my own devices, I'll just turn into a madwoman.
quotes.author: Claire Danes

quotes.quote: It's a real man who can go out with a woman who's taller than he is. That's an alpha male right there.
quotes.author: Miranda Hart

quotes.quote: The alpha male is always willing to walk away.
quotes.author: Roosh V

quotes.quote: Whether you like it or not, the digital age has produced a new format for modern romance, and natural selection may be favoring the quick-thumbed quip peddler over the confident, ice-breaking alpha male.
quotes.author: Ashton Kutcher

quotes.quote: Let justice be done though the heavens should fall.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: If I were dropped out of a plane into the ocean and told the nearest land was a thousand miles away, I’d still swim. And I’d despise the one who gave up.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: My public caricature that of a self confident alpha male is only partly accurate.
quotes.author: Alastair Campbell

quotes.quote: One man with courage makes a majority.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

quotes.quote: Stand your ground! Don't fire unless fired upon, but if they mean to have a war, let it begin here.
quotes.author: Captain John Parker

quotes.quote: He who conquers himself is the mightiest warrior.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: I never expected I would be connected to the Alpha male as some kind of ancillary object and to this day it mystifies me.
quotes.author: Courtney Love

quotes.quote: It is better to die on your feet than to live on your knees.
quotes.author: Emiliano Zapata

quotes.quote: I believe that forgiving them is God's function, our job is simply to arrange the meeting.
quotes.author: General Norman Schwarzkopf

quotes.quote: I can hear you! The rest of the world hears you! And the people who knocked these buildings down will hear all of us soon!
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Success doesn't come from what you do occasionally it comes from what you do consistently.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: The man is meant to be the alpha in the relationship on the money and power front.
quotes.author: Jamie Dornan

quotes.quote: Be the one to stand out in the crowd.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Self discipline is doing what needs to be done even when you don't want to do it.
quotes.author: John Parks Le Tellier

quotes.quote: I wish to have no connection with any ship that does not sail fast, for I intend to go in harm’s way.
quotes.author: John Paul Jones

quotes.quote: The key to success is to keep growing in all areas of life, mental, emotional, spiritual, as well as physical.
quotes.author: Julius Erving

quotes.quote: Pain is temporary. It may last a minute, or an hour, or a day, or a year, but eventually it will subside and something else will take its place. If I quit, however, it lasts forever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: It’s not the size of the dog in the fight, it’s the size of the fight in the dog.
quotes.author: Mark Twain.

quotes.quote: My center is giving way, my right is in retreat, situation excellent. I shall attack.
quotes.author: Marshal Foch

quotes.quote: A man who wants to lead the orchestra must turn his back on the crowd.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: You may abandon your own body but you must preserve your honour.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: The most common cause of death among alpha males was ego.
quotes.author: Nelson DeMille

quotes.quote: Doctors and scientists said that breaking the four minute mile was impossible, that one would die in the attempt. Thus, when I got up from the track after collapsing at the finish line, I figured I was dead.
quotes.author: Roger Bannister

quotes.quote: Work while they sleep. Learn while they party. Save while they spend. Then live like they dream.
quotes.author: Steve Canter

quotes.quote: When your goals are more important than a party, welcome to the 1% club.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Embrace your inner alpha male, make a decision and embrace the consequences.
quotes.author: Vin Petrillo

quotes.quote: I am determined to sustain myself for as long as possible, and die like a soldier who never forgets what is due to his own honor and that of this country.
quotes.author: William Travis

quotes.quote: But if we fail, then the whole world, including the United States, including all that we have known and cared for, will sink into the abyss of a new dark age made more sinister, and perhaps more protracted, by the lights of perverted science. Let us therefore brace ourselves to our duties, and so bear ourselves, that if the British Empire and its Commonwealth last for a thousand years, men will still say, This was their finest hour.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Learn to say no without explaining yourself, and practice becoming more assertive
quotes.author: Manuel J. Smith

quotes.quote: Altruism is a barbarism. Love is the word.
quotes.author: John Lancaster Spalding

quotes.quote: Human altruism which is not egoism, is sterile.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Altruism is a hard master, but so is opportunism.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Altruism is for those who cannot endure their desires.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Altruism accrues little benefit to those lying cold in the gutter.
quotes.author: Raymond E. Feist

quotes.quote: Altruism is the best source of happiness. There is no doubt about that.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Beware of altruism. It is based on self-deception, the root of all evil.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Altruism is a fine motive, but if you want results, greed works much better.
quotes.author: Henry Spencer

quotes.quote: The most popular form of altruism is giving to others the advice you cannot use yourself.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Altruism is masked self-interest. Aggressive self-interest is a masked urge to self-destruction.
quotes.author: Greg Bear

quotes.quote: It often turns out on closer inspection that acts of apparent altruism are really selfishness in disguise.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Capitalism and altruism are incompatible; they are philosophical opposites; they cannot co-exist in the same man or in the same society.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: A large part of altruism, even when it is perfectly honest, is grounded upon the fact that it is uncomfortable to have unhappy people about one.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Altruism is a brief phase through which some adolescents must pass. It is rather like acne. Happily, as with acne, only a few are permanently scarred.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: There is another kind of altruism that seems to go beyond that, a kind of super-altruism, which humans appear to have. And I think that does need a Darwinian explanation.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Infinite altruism is the basis of peace and happiness. If you want altruism, you must control hate and you must practice patience. The main teachers of patience are our enemies.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Altruism has always been one of biology's deep mysteries. Why should any animal, off on its own, specified and labeled by all sorts of signals as its individual self, choose to give up its life in aid of someone else?
quotes.author: Lewis Thomas

quotes.quote: Altruism declares that any action taken for the benefit of others is good, and any action taken for one's own benefit is evil. Thus the beneficiary of an action is the only criterion of moral value - and so long as that beneficiary is anybody other than oneself, anything goes.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Altruism does not mean mere kindness or generosity, but the sacrifice of the best among men to the worst, the sacrifice of virtues to flaws, of ability to incompetence, of progress to stagnation-and the subordinating of all life and of all values to the claims of anyone's suffering.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Altruism is one of the most fundamentally social impulses, and doing things for others without expecting anything in return is core to what makes us human. This is why, from the day Facebook Platform launched in 2007, Causes has been honored to be one of the most popular applications, with over 140 million users.
quotes.author: Joe Greene

quotes.quote: Very usually, altruism is only the sublimest form of selfishness.
quotes.author: Sri Aurobindo

quotes.quote: Anonymity is the truest expression of altruism.
quotes.author: Eric Gibson

quotes.quote: The Way of our Master is none other than conscientiousness of altruism.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The person who works for recognition devalues the work he does.... altruism's true name is always Anonymous.
quotes.author: David Marusek

quotes.quote: Altruism is an instinct for survival that may be in our genes--an internal force for goodness in everyone that begins with birth.
quotes.author: James R. Ozinga

quotes.quote: Altruism in nature remains an exception. It poses a puzzle, being in prima facie conflict with the survival of the fittest and most selfish.
quotes.author: Peter Birks

quotes.quote: Altruism is rarer than it should be among leaders, and that's a shame, because selflessness is key to being aware and avoiding a myopic view of things.
quotes.author: John Mattone

quotes.quote: Charity should be spontaneous. Calculated altruism is an affront
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Altruism is but a phantom in our world. Only the most foolish among us would believe that our first priority is not to follow the empirical evidence that leads to one's own self-preservation!
quotes.author: Lary A. Sims

quotes.quote: Altruism eventuates in all realities, else self-destruction consumes it.
quotes.author: Guy Lozier

quotes.quote: All altruism springs from putting yourself in the other person's place.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: The root of happiness is altruism - the wish to be of service to others.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Altruism is selfishness out with a pair of field glasses and imagination.
quotes.author: Christina Stead

quotes.quote: Altruism is innate, but it's not instinctual. Everybody's wired for it, but a switch has to be flipped.
quotes.author: David Rakoff

quotes.quote: Altruism became the sole legitimate motivation for giving a kidney. And it is a partial - I say a partial failure.
quotes.author: Sally Satel

quotes.quote: The altruism of foresters can serve as a motto for humanity in general: "We reap what we have not sown. We sow what we do not reap."
quotes.author: Leo Errera

quotes.quote: If you don't have altruism, inner strength, inner peace, attention, then it's a trauma. It makes a difficult life for you and for others.
quotes.author: Matthieu Ricard

quotes.quote: Altruism itself depends on a recognition of the reality of other persons, and on the equivalent capacity to regard oneself as merely one individual among many.
quotes.author: Thomas Nagel

quotes.quote: At the core, our motives are always self-serving, Kate. Altruism is a fog created by sly minds seeking to benefit from the energy and skill of others. Nothing more.
quotes.author: Ilona Andrews

quotes.quote: Altruism is written in everlasting and resplendent character on the Cross of Christ, and it was at Calvary that the centre of life was shifted from selfishness to sacrifice.
quotes.author: Jon Weber

quotes.quote: The practice of altruism is the authentic way to live as a human being, and it is not just for religious people. As human beings, our purpose is to live meaningful lives, to develop a warm heart. There is meaning in being everyone's friend. The real source of peace amongst our families, friends and neighbours is love and compassion.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Gratitude: An imaginary emotion that rewards an imaginary behavior, altruism. Both imaginaries are false faces for selfishness, which is a real and honest emotion.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Altruism may be ... so fundamental, so essential to the survival of human beings that it has taken root in neurocircuitries designed for other purposes, finding its expression in numerous unexpected, but largely successful ways.
quotes.author: Shelley E. Taylor

quotes.quote: Which is more subversive-and corrosive-to believe in altruism or to see it simply as a cloak of self interest? Even if altruism did not exist, it would be necessary to believe in it. Pessimists in power are prone to despotism.
quotes.author: Frank Prochaska

quotes.quote: Altruism always lived in my heart. I knew it was there, I knew it from the start
quotes.author: Charmaine J Forde

quotes.quote: Always remember that striving and struggling precede success, even in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: Suspicion always haunts the guilty mind.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: There is always space for improvement, no matter how long you've been in the business.
quotes.author: Oscar De La Hoya

quotes.quote: It is always wise to look ahead, but difficult to look further than you can see.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You cannot always control what goes on outside. But you can always control what goes on inside.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: There'll always be serendipity involved in discovery.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: The high road is always respected. Honesty and integrity are always rewarded.
quotes.author: Scott Hamilton

quotes.quote: Always do what you are afraid to do.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: People haven't always been there for me, but music always has.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: It's always best to ask for forgiveness if you feel that you made a mistake. And again, asking for forgiveness is not just saying the words 'I'm sorry'; it is also offering what you need to do.
quotes.author: Grace Poe

quotes.quote: There's always failure. And there's always disappointment. And there's always loss. But the secret is learning from the loss, and realizing that none of those holes are vacuums.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: Loneliness is and always has been the central and inevitable experience of every man.
quotes.author: Thomas Wolfe

quotes.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Always desire to learn something useful.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Always keep that happy attitude. Pretend that you are holding a beautiful fragrant bouquet.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Always seek out the seed of triumph in every adversity.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Metamorphosis has always been the greatest symbol of change for poets and artists. Imagine that you could be a caterpillar one moment and a butterfly the next.
quotes.author: Louie Schwartzberg

quotes.quote: Always recognize that human individuals are ends, and do not use them as means to your end.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: There are always people who are into the old way of doing things. I don't think it's a bad thing necessarily, but things change - nothing stays the same. If you can stay true to yourself, you're always going to be legendary.
quotes.author: Lil Uzi Vert

quotes.quote: Life isn't always black and white. You're not always sure you're right. At least I'm not.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.quote: What's meant to be will always find a way.
quotes.author: Trisha Yearwood

quotes.quote: Kindness is always fashionable, and always welcome.
quotes.author: Amelia Barr

quotes.quote: God has always given me the strength to say what is right.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: Always in life bad times will lead to great times.
quotes.author: M. Night Shyamalan

quotes.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Always kiss your children goodnight, even if they're already asleep.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Don't try to impress people. Always be yourself!
quotes.author: Bella Thorne

quotes.quote: Always render more and better service than is expected of you, no matter what your task may be.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: You always admire what you really don't understand.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Always laugh when you can. It is cheap medicine.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: It's always difficult to say goodbye, especially when one has spent a long time - literally years, in the case of a series - inside a character or two, suffering and celebrating with them.
quotes.author: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.quote: Trees and plants always look like the people they live with, somehow.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Boredom always precedes a period of great creativity.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Things are not always what they seem; the first appearance deceives many; the intelligence of a few perceives what has been carefully hidden.
quotes.author: Phaedrus

quotes.quote: There's always a way - if you're committed.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Always forgive your enemies - nothing annoys them so much.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Always wear a smile because you never know who is watching.
quotes.author: Gracie Gold

quotes.quote: Always keep your mind as bright and clear as the vast sky, the great ocean, and the highest peak, empty of all thoughts. Always keep your body filled with light and heat. Fill yourself with the power of wisdom and enlightenment.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Always Do Your Best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment; it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
quotes.author: Mother Theresa

quotes.quote: Man's memory shapes Its own eden within.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: You can't converse with Alzheimer's sufferers in the way you do with others; the dialogue tends to go round in circles.
quotes.author: Kevin Whately

quotes.quote: What really scares me is Alzheimer's or premature senility, losing that ability to read and enjoy and to write. And you do it, and some days maybe aren't so good, and then some days, you really catch a wave, and it's as good as it ever was.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Suffering is always hard to quantify especially when the pain is caused by as cruel a disease as Alzheimer's. Most illnesses attack the body; Alzheimer's destroys the mind and in the process, annihilates the very self.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.quote: The thing about Alzheimer's is that it's it's sort of like all these little, small deaths along the way, before they actually physically die.
quotes.author: Lucinda Williams

quotes.quote: Alzheimer's disease is death before death, and I'm terrified of it.
quotes.author: Joey Comeau

quotes.quote: I think the earlier stages of Alzheimer's are the hardest. Particularly because the person knows that they are losing awareness. They're aware that they're losing awareness, and you see them struggling.
quotes.author: Patti Davis

quotes.quote: Alzheimer's is a disease for which there is no effective treatment whatsoever. To be clear, there is no pharmaceutical agent, no magic pill that a doctor can prescribe that will have any significant effect on the progressive downhill course of this disease.
quotes.author: David Perlmutter

quotes.quote: The great tragedy of Alzheimer's disease, and the reason why we dread it, is that it leaves us with no defence, not even against those who love us.
quotes.author: P. D. James

quotes.quote: Alzheimer's is a devastating disease. It was painful for me and my family to watch my grandfather deteriorate. We must find a cure for this horrible disease.
quotes.author: David Hyde Pierce

quotes.quote: I think the best thing I ever did with my life was stand up and say I've got Alzheimer's.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Alzheimer's disease starts when a protein that should be folded up properly misfolds into a kind of demented origami.
quotes.author: Gregory Petsko

quotes.quote: To put it simply our brain span should match our lifespan.
quotes.author: Meryl Comer

quotes.quote: People do not realize that Alzheimer's is not old age. It is a progressive and fatal disease and staggering amounts of people develop Alzheimer's every day.
quotes.author: Melina Kanakaredes

quotes.quote: If you want to avoid Alzheimer's disease, sleep 8 hours a night.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Do you know what Irish Alzheimer's is? It's when you forget everything but your grudges.
quotes.author: Dana Gould

quotes.quote: It seems that when you have cancer you are a brave battler against the disease, but when you have Alzheimer's you are an old fart. That's how people see you. It makes you feel quite alone.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Alzheimer's it is a barren disease, as empty and lifeless as a desert. It is a thief of hearts and souls and memories.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: There is a version of Alzheimer's which is early onset Alzheimer's. And it's - it's horrible, because people do get it in their 50s and 60s. And it's terrible.
quotes.author: Patti Davis

quotes.quote: "I often hear people say that a person suffering from Alzheimer's is not the person they knew. I wonder to myself - Who are they then?
quotes.author: Bob DeMarco

quotes.quote: Each form of Alzheimer's disease should perturb different brain networks and so influence the concentration of different proteins that can be measured in the blood.
quotes.author: Leroy Hood

quotes.quote: Alzheimer's disease locks all the doors and exits. There is no reprieve, no escape.
quotes.author: Patti Davis

quotes.quote: To care for those who once cared for us is one of the highest honors.
quotes.author: Tia Walker

quotes.quote: Alzheimer's usually comes later than AIDS, but I decline to call that progress.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Alzheimer's caregivers are heroes.
quotes.author: Leeza Gibbons

quotes.quote: Never let the brain idle. 'An idle mind is the devil's workshop.' And the devil's name is Alzheimer's.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: I think I'm getting a little bit of Alzheimer's. Just a little.
quotes.author: Christopher Walken

quotes.quote: People with Alzheimer's deserve to be seen, so that we can find a cure!
quotes.author: Julianne Moore

quotes.quote: The mind is like an iceberg, it floats with one-seventh of its bulk above water.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: I must admit I am nervous about getting Alzheimer's. Once it hits, I might tell my best joke and never know it.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: Jewish Alzheimer's is forgetting everything except a grudge.
quotes.author: Maureen Lipman

quotes.quote: Suffering is always hard to quantify especially when the pain is caused by as cruel a disease as Alzheimer's. Most illnesses attack the body; Alzheimer's destroys the mind and in the process, annihilates the very self.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.quote: Alzheimer's is a devastating disease. It was painful for me and my family to watch my grandfather deteriorate. We must find a cure for this horrible disease.
quotes.author: David Hyde Pierce

quotes.quote: Alzheimer's is literally killing us, and the only way to fight this 'crime' is through a groundswell of people who continue to raise their voices and funds to ensure it gets the attention it deserves.
quotes.author: Tess Gerritsen

quotes.quote: She is not sailing into the dark: the voyage is over, and under the dark escort of Alzheimer's she has arrived somewhere. So have I.
quotes.author: John Bayley

quotes.quote: I can face death, but I cannot face watching myself disappear from within...I don't know who I am anymore.
quotes.author: Claude Jutra

quotes.quote: I now begin the journey that will lead me into the sunset of my life.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: I have gone from being her lover to her principal carer. When I hug her, it is almost a gesture she does not recognize. She doesn't know how to react.
quotes.author: John Suchet

quotes.quote: No matter who you are, what you've accomplished, what your financial situation is— when you're dealing with a parent with Alzheimer's, you yourself feel helpless. The parent can't work, can't live alone, and is totally dependent, like a toddler. As the disease unfolds, you don't know what to expect.
quotes.author: Maria Shriver

quotes.quote: As a writer, I have to admit, there is something darkly compelling about Alzheimer's because it attacks the two things most central to a writer's craft— language and memory, which together make up an individual's identity. Alzheimer's makes a new character out of a familiar person.
quotes.author: Charlie Pierce

quotes.quote: Let them vent. Rest assured this, too, shall pass, because in the middle stages the person doesn't think anything is wrong with them. It gets easier for them because they don't remember that they don't remember.
quotes.author: Jolene Brackey

quotes.quote: Our value lies in what we are and what we have been, not in our ability to recite the recent past.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: All you know is what you think you know, but that isn't always what's real.
quotes.author: Carrie Vaughn

quotes.quote: A hug, a handshake, and a smile. He looks at you and says, 'I haven't seen you in a while.' He said the same thing when you saw him yesterday.
quotes.author: Marvea

quotes.quote: A short visit and he is as happy as can be. He says, to no one in particular, 'Who is that person?' So glad he came to visit me.'
quotes.author: Marvea

quotes.quote: Alzheimer's destroys a lifetime of memories ad whittles away at the core of a person's identity.
quotes.author: Robert N. Butler

quotes.quote: Alzheimer's disease is one of the great scourges of old age in the twenty-first century. Devastating, irreversible, and progressive, it robs millions of older Americans of their use of language, reasoning, memory, and judgment.
quotes.author: Robert N. Butler

quotes.quote: Sometimes something is familiar to me. / Most times, there is no recognition / of the fabric of my life. / Only frayed remnants of who I was once was.
quotes.author: Koenig Coste

quotes.quote: I suffer most for my loss of self-esteem / not for the loss of choosing my wardrobe.
quotes.author: Koenig Coste

quotes.quote: I am seeking, I am not lost / I am forgetful, I am not gone.
quotes.author: Koenig Coste

quotes.quote: My head feels like an old depot, / worn by time and tears. / No more locomotives passing through, / cafe filled with tales and baggage. / The old depot's barren now / There has been a great brain robbery.
quotes.author: Koenig Coste

quotes.quote: It occurred to me that at one point it was like I had two diseases — one was Alzheimer’s, and the other was knowing I had Alzheimer’s.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Alzheimer’s creates a kind of friction that the family needs to be strong for. You have to hold onto things and know what is true in life.
quotes.author: Candy Crowley

quotes.quote: We're really a composite of our life experiences – memory layered upon memory and Alzheimer’s steals that away.
quotes.author: Meryl Comer

quotes.quote: Even slight elevations in blood sugar have been shown to increase the risk of Alzheimer’s disease.
quotes.author: David Perlmutter

quotes.quote: I can't stand the thought of looking at you someday, this face I love, and not knowing who you are.
quotes.author: Lisa Genova

quotes.quote: I like it when people remember that I'm a person, not just a person with Alzheimer's.
quotes.author: Sally Hepworth

quotes.quote: You only know yourself because of your memories.
quotes.author: Andrea Gillies

quotes.quote: You have to be patient with Alzheimer’s. Once you understand that it’s a medical condition, you become a little more compassionate. You get less frustrated.
quotes.author: Kim Campbell

quotes.quote: I intend to live the remainder of the years God gives me on this earth doing the things I have always done.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Alzheimer’s is brutal. I mean, it’s associated with losing your memory, but you don't just forget who people are; you also forget how to talk, how to eat, how to do everything. That’s hard to wrap your head around until you actually see it.
quotes.author: Seth Rogen

quotes.quote: Alzheimer’s, while a horrible shroud that keeps out so many joys of life, also blanketed away the aggressive and shrill dimensions of modern life.
quotes.author: Rick Steves

quotes.quote: Alzheimer’s is me, unwinding, losing trust in myself, a butt of my own jokes, and on bad days capable of playing hunt the slipper by myself and losing. You can't battle it, you can’t be a plucky ‘survivor.’ It steals you from yourself.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: For baby boomers, I feel like the canary in the coal mine while scientists search for a cure. I fear the day when I put my fingers on the keyboard and don't know how to write anymore.
quotes.author: Greg O'Brien

quotes.quote: Ambiguity is very interesting in writing; it's not very interesting in science.
quotes.author: Janna Levin

quotes.quote: That must be wonderful; I have no idea of what it means.Â
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Ambiguity: the bastard child of creativity and cowardice.
quotes.author: Yahia Lababidi

quotes.quote: The greater theÂ ambiguity, the greater the pleasure.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: The least degree ofÂ ambiguityÂ which leaves the mind in suspense as to the meaning ought to be avoided with the greatest care.
quotes.author: Hugh Blair

quotes.quote: Intolerance ofÂ ambiguityÂ is the mark of an authoritarian personality.
quotes.author: Theodor Wiesengrund Adorno

quotes.quote: The awareness of theÂ ambiguityÂ of one's highest achievements, as well as one's deepest failures is a definite symptom of maturity.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: AmbiguityÂ lurks in generality and may thus become an instrument of severity.
quotes.author: Felix Frankfurter

quotes.quote: Learning to live with ambiguity is learning to live with how life really is, full of complexities and strange surprises.
quotes.author: James Hollis

quotes.quote: In a universe ofÂ ambiguity, this kind of certainty comes only once, and never again, no matter how many lifetimes you live.
quotes.author: Robert James Waller

quotes.quote: The machinations ofÂ ambiguityÂ are among the very roots of poetry.
quotes.author: William Empson

quotes.quote: A certain ambiguity of rhythm is one of the beauties of a poem.
quotes.author: Anne Ridler

quotes.quote: Unlike theÂ ambiguityÂ of life, theÂ ambiguityÂ of language does reach a limit.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Take advantage of theÂ ambiguityÂ in the world. Look at something and think what else it might be.
quotes.author: Roger Von Oech

quotes.quote: The state of ambiguity â€“ that messy, greasy, mixed-up, confused, and awful situation you're living through right now â€“ is enlightenment itself.
quotes.author: Brad Warner

quotes.quote: Ambiguity depletes as your budget rises.
quotes.author: Tony Gilroy

quotes.quote: Ambiguity is a big part of this post-truth world we're living in.
quotes.author: Paul G. Tremblay

quotes.quote: What is important is to keep learning, to enjoy challenge, and to tolerateÂ ambiguity. In the end there are no certain answers.
quotes.author: Martina Horner

quotes.quote: There is something special about the beauty in the unclear, the ambiguity, the in-between that you can't totally recognise.
quotes.author: Alessandro Michele

quotes.quote: Once life is finished it acquires a sense; up to that point it has not got a sense; its sense is suspended and therefore ambiguous.
quotes.author: Pier Paolo Pasolini

quotes.quote: The charge of being ambiguous and indefinite may be brought against every human composition, and necessarily arises from the imperfection of language. Perhaps no two men will express the same sentiment in the same manner and by the same words; neither do they connect precisely the same ideas with the same words.
quotes.author: Oliver Ellsworth

quotes.quote: The greater the ambiguity, the greater the pleasure.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: The mental mist of ambiguity and the fog of ambivalence hamper human existence.
quotes.author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.quote: Ambiguity supposes eventual resolution of itself whereas certitude implies further ambiguity.
quotes.author: John Ashbery

quotes.quote: Even righteousness is an ambiguous thing.
quotes.author: Nadia Hashimi

quotes.quote: The enemy of accountability is ambiguity.
quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

quotes.quote: The awareness of the ambiguity of one's highest achievements as well as one's deepest failures is a definite symptom of maturity.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Ambiguity lurks in generality, and may thus become an instrument of severity.
quotes.author: Felix Frankfurter

quotes.quote: The truth always carries the ambiguity of the words used to express it.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: All our qualities, whether good or bad, are unstable and ambiguous, and almost all are at the mery of chance.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: The more elusive and ambiguous a symbol is, the more it gains significance and power.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: Testing is the process of comparing the invisible to the ambiguous, so as to avoid the unthinkable happening to the anonymous.
quotes.author: James Marcus Bach

quotes.quote: Hope is ambiguous, but fear is precious.
quotes.author: Leo Rosten

quotes.quote: Many are ambitious of saying grand things, that is, of being grandiloquent.
quotes.author: Augustus Hare

quotes.quote: Stuff that's hidden and murky and ambiguous is scary because you don't know what it does.
quotes.author: Jerry Garcia

quotes.quote: Life remains ambiguous as long as there is life.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Ambiguous things that ape goats in their visage, women in their shape.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: All things will be ambiguous, for this is the curse of wisdom.
quotes.author: Greg Bear

quotes.quote: All men are naturally included to obscure the morally ambiguous element in their political cause by investing it with religious sanctity.
quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quotes.quote: That ambiguous area of culture where something unfailingly political, though separate from the political choices of the day, infiltrates judgment and language.
quotes.author: Roland Barthes

quotes.quote: Ambiguity is very interesting in writing; it's not very interesting in science.
quotes.author: Janna Levin

quotes.quote: Ambition is a good servant but a bad master.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Great ambition is the passion of a great character. Those endowed with it may perform very good or very bad acts. All depends on the principles which direct them.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Ambition is a lust that is never quenched, but grows more inflamed and madder by enjoyment.
quotes.author: Thomas Otway

quotes.quote: Ambition is the germ from which all growth of nobleness proceeds.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Ambition beats genius 99% of the time
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: A man without ambition is like a beautiful worm--it can creep, but it cannot fly.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Ambition is to the mind what the cap is to the falcon; it blinds us first, and then compels us to tower, by reason of our blindness. But alas, when we are at the summit of a vain ambition, we are also at the depth of real misery. We are placed where time cannot improve, but must impair us; where chance and change cannot befriend, but may betray us; in short, by attaining all we wish, and gaining all we want, we have only reached a pinnacle where we have nothing to hope, but everything to fear.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Ambition first sprung from your blest abodes; The glorious fault of Angels and of Gods.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Ambition is a dream with a V8 engine.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: Ambition is like love, impatient both of delays and rivals.
quotes.author: Sir John Denham

quotes.quote: Ambition is an uncomfortable companion many times. He creates a discontent with present surroundings and achievements; he is never satisfied but always pressing forward to better things in the future. Restless, energetic, purposeful, it is ambition that makes of the creature a real man.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: Ambition is so powerful a passion in the human breast, that however high we reach we are never satisfied.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Ambition has its disappointments to sour us, but never the good fortune to satisfy us. Its appetite grows keener by indulgence and all we can gratify it with at present serves but the more to inflame its insatiable desires.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Ambition is an idol, on whose wings great minds are carried only to extreme, to be sublimely great, or to be nothing.
quotes.author: Thomas Southerne

quotes.quote: Ambition is a Dead Sea fruit, and the greatest peril to the soul is that one is likely to get precisely what he is seeking.
quotes.author: Edward Dahlberg

quotes.quote: Where ambition can cover its enterprises, even to the person himself, under the appearance of principle, it is the most incurable and inflexible of passions.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: Ambition often puts Men upon doing the meanest offices; so climbing is performed in the same position with creeping.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: It is the nature of ambition to make men liars and cheats, to hide the truth in their breasts, and show, like jugglers, another thing in their mouths, to cut all friendships and enmities to the measure of their own interest, and to make a good countenance without the help of good will.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: Ambition. An overmastering desire to be vilified by enemies while living and made ridiculous by friends when dead.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Ambition is a poor excuse for not having sense enough to be lazy.
quotes.author: Edgar Bergen

quotes.quote: Say what we will, we may be sure that ambition is an error. Its wear and tear on the heart are never recompensed.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: It will not be amiss to distinguish the three kinds and, as it were, grades of ambition in mankind. The first is of those who desire to extend their own power in their native country, a vulgar and degenerate kind. The second is of those who labor to extend the power and dominion of their country among men. This certainly has more dignity, though not less covetousness. But if a man endeavor to establish and extend the power and dominion of the human race itself over the universe, his ambition (if ambition it can be called) is without doubt both a more wholesome and a more noble thing than the other two.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Most people would succeed in small things, if they were not troubled with great ambitions.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Ambition is a gilded misery, a secret poison, a hidden plague, the engineer of deceit, the mother of hypocrisy, the parent of envy, the original of vices, the moth of holiness, the blinder of hearts, turning medicines into maladies, and remedies into diseases.
quotes.author: Thomas Brooks

quotes.quote: Ambition has but one reward for all: A little power, a little transient fame, A grave to rest in, and a fading name!
quotes.author: William Winter

quotes.quote: Ambition destroys its possessor.
quotes.author: Hebrew (on ambition)

quotes.quote: Ambition begets vexations.
quotes.author: Singhalese (on ambition)

quotes.quote: If you would get ahead, be a bridge.
quotes.author: Welsh (on ambition)

quotes.quote: Ambition is putting a ladder against the sky.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Ambition and the belly are the two worst counselors.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Love, a pleasant folly; ambition, a serious stupidity.
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.quote: Though ambition in itself is a vice, yet it is often the parent of virtues.
quotes.author: Quintilian

quotes.quote: The very substance of the ambitious is merely the shadow of a dream.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Big results require big ambitions.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: Great minds have purposes; others have wishes.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
quotes.author: Bill Bradley

quotes.quote: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: I've got a great ambition to die of exhaustion rather than boredom.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal, nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Ambition can creep as well as soar.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Every man is said to have his peculiar ambition.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Failure is only postponed success as long as courage coaches ambition. The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.
quotes.author: Herbert Kaufman

quotes.quote: Ambition has no rest.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: All ambitions are lawful except those which climb upward on the miseries or credulities of mankind.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: When you go in search of honey you must expect to be stung by bees.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Ambition is the way in which a vulgar man aspires.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Most people would succeed in small things if they were not troubled with great ambitions.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Ambition is pitiless. Any merit that it cannot use it finds despicable.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Ambition has one heel nailed in well, though she stretch her fingers to touch the heavens.
quotes.author: William Lilly

quotes.quote: To be happy at home is the ultimate result of all ambition.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Men rise from one ambition to another. First, they seek to secure themselves against attack, and then they attack others.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: There is a loftier ambition than merely to stand high in the world. It is to stoop down and lift mankind a little higher.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Never look down to test the ground before taking your next step, only he who keeps his eye fixed on the far horizon will find the right road.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: Ambition is the last refuge of the failure.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: An once of hypocrisy is worth a pound of ambition.
quotes.author: Michael Korda

quotes.quote: Beauty is the sole ambition, the exclusive goal of Taste.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Ambition is not a vice of little people.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: A man without ambition is dead. A man with ambition but no love is dead. A man with ambition and love for his blessings here on earth is ever so alive.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: Ambition breaks the ties of blood, and forgets the obligations of gratitude.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: Though ambition in itself is a vice, it often is also the parent of virtue.
quotes.author: Edgar Quinet

quotes.quote: A man's worth is no greater than his ambitions.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The universe is not required to be in perfect harmony with human ambition.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Whether we fall by ambition, blood, or lust, like diamonds we are cut with our own dust.
quotes.author: John Webster

quotes.quote: America will never be destroyed from the outside. If we falter and lose our freedoms, it will be because we destroyed ourselves.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: America was not built on fear. America was built on courage, on imagination and an unbeatable determination to do the job at hand.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: Only in America can someone start with nothing and achieve the American Dream. That's the greatness of this country.
quotes.author: Rafael Cruz

quotes.quote: America is the land of the second chance - and when the gates of the prison open, the path ahead should lead to a better life.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: This nation will remain the land of the free only so long as it is the home of the brave.
quotes.author: Elmer Davis

quotes.quote: America is a passionate idea or it is nothing. America is a human brotherhood or it is chaos.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: America is another name for opportunity. Our whole history appears like a last effort of divine providence on behalf of the human race.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There is nothing wrong with America that cannot be cured by what is right with America.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: We need an America with the wisdom of experience. But we must not let America grow old in spirit.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: America is a tune. It must be sung together.
quotes.author: Gerald Stanley Lee

quotes.quote: America is so vast that almost everything said about it is likely to be true, and the opposite is probably equally true.
quotes.author: James T. Farrell

quotes.quote: America is great because it has as much diversity in geographies as it does in peoples.
quotes.author: Aurora Raigne

quotes.quote: America is a nation with many flaws, but hopes so vast that only the cowardly would refuse to acknowledge them.
quotes.author: James Michener

quotes.quote: If you take advantage of everything America has to offer, there's nothing you can't accomplish.
quotes.author: Geraldine Ferraro

quotes.quote: Only Americans can hurt America.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: America is the only nation in history which, miraculously, has gone directly from barbarism to degeneration without the usual interval of civilization.
quotes.author: Georges Clemenceau

quotes.quote: In America, through pressure of conformity, there is freedom of choice, but nothing to choose from.
quotes.author: Peter Alexander Ustinov

quotes.quote: America is much more than a geographical fact. It is a political and moral fact ? the first community in which men set out in principle to institutionalize freedom, responsible government, and human equality
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson

quotes.quote: The great social adventure of America is no longer the conquest of the wilderness but the absorption of fifty different peoples.
quotes.author: Walter Lippman

quotes.quote: America is an enormous frosted cupcake in the middle of millions of starving people.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: America: Where a man can say what he thinks, if he isn't afraid of his wife, his boss, his customer, his neighbors, or the government.
quotes.author: Joe Moore

quotes.quote: America is a country that doesn't know where it is going but is determined to set a speed record getting there.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: America is a large friendly dog in a small room. Every time it wags its tail it knocks over a chair.
quotes.author: Arnold Toynbee

quotes.quote: America is a vast conspiracy to make you happy.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: America makes prodigious mistakes, America has colossal faults, but one thing cannot be denied: America is always on the move. She may be going to Hell, of course, but at least she isn't standing still.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: America is the best half-educated country in the world.
quotes.author: Nicholas Murray Butler

quotes.quote: The United States is a nation of laws: badly written and randomly enforced.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: America is therefore the land of the future, where, in the ages that lie before us, the burden of the World's History shall reveal itself.
quotes.author: Georg W. Hegel

quotes.quote: America is a young country with an old mentality.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: The business of America is not business. Neither is it war. The business of america is justice and securing the blessings of liberty.
quotes.author: George F. Will

quotes.quote: America, we are better than these last eight years. We are a better country than this.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: America is just downright mean.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: In America, your ancestors don't matter so much. You're just you.
quotes.author: Lensey Namioka

quotes.quote: America is another name for opportunity.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There is nothing wrong in America that can't be fixed with what is right in America.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: America had often been discovered before Columbus, but it had always been hushed up.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I think in our desire to create a better America,we have to have civilized debate in this country and not just yelling.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: It is our duty and our privilege to keep America moving forward.
quotes.author: Bill Frist

quotes.quote: It was wonderful to find America, but it would have been more wonderful to miss it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Regarding the fitness craze: America has lost its soul; now it's trying to save its body.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: America preaches integration and practices segregation.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: America is too great for small dreams.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: America is great because she is good. If America ceases to be good, America will cease to be great.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.quote: The major fortunes in America have been made in land.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: America, thou half-brother of the world; with something good and bad of every land.
quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

quotes.quote: The magic of America is that we're a free and open society with a mixed population. Part of our security is our freedom.
quotes.author: Madeleine Albright

quotes.quote: America is the only idealistic nation in the world.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: America is great, because America is free.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: America is not merely a nation but a nation of nations.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: America will never run... And we will always be grateful that liberty has found such brave defenders.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: America is a great country, but you can't live in it for nothing.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The essential American soul is hard, isolate, stoic, and a killer. It has never yet melted.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: America did not invent human rights. In a very real sense, it is the other way round. Human rights invented America.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: America forms the longest and straightest bone in the earth's skeleton.
quotes.author: Ellsworth Huntington

quotes.quote: The freedom to be an individual is the essence of America.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant
