quotes.quote: America is a large, friendly dog in a very small room. Every time it wags its tail, it knocks over a chair.
quotes.author: Arnold Toynbee

quotes.quote: America is the only country that went from barbarism to decadence without civilization in between.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: America is a nation with many flaws, but hopes so vast that only the cowardly would refuse to acknowledge them.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: All great change in America begins at the dinner table.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: In America, anyone can become president. That's the problem.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: In the unlikely story that is America, there has never been anything false about hope.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: United States: the country where liberty is a statue.
quotes.author: Nicanor Parra

quotes.quote: There is no America without labor, and to fleece the one is to rob the other.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The thing that impresses me the most about America is the way parents obey their children.
quotes.author: King Edward VIII

quotes.quote: Anyone who believes the competitive spirit in America is dead has never been in a supermarket when the cashier opens another check-out line.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: The idea of America is so wonderful because the more equal something is, the more American it is
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: America is a land where men govern, but women rule.
quotes.author: John Mason Brown

quotes.quote: America's greatest strength, and its greatest weakness, is our belief in second chances, our belief that we can always start over, that things can be made better.
quotes.author: Anthony Walton

quotes.quote: The only foes that threaten America are the enemies at home, and these are ignorance, superstition and incompetence.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: America is not just a country, it's an idea.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: America's one of the finest countries anyone ever stole.
quotes.author: Bobcat Goldthwaite

quotes.quote: By heritage and by choice, the United States of America will make that stand.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: From the earliest days of our founding, America has been the story of ordinary people who dare to dream. That's how we win the future.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: What makes us Americans is our shared commitment to an idea— that all of us are created equal, and all of us have the chance to make of our lives what we will.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The bosom of America is open to receive not only the Opulent & respectable stranger but the oppressed & persecuted of all Nations & Religions; whom we shall welcome to a participation of all our rights and privileges.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: The United States of America should have a foundation free from the influence of clergy.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: The declaration of Independence only guarantees the American people the right to pursue happiness. You have to catch it yourself.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: So, at last, I was going to America! Really, really going, at last! The boundaries burst. The arch of heaven soared. A million sun shone out of every star. The winds rushed out into outer space, roaring in my ears, 'America! America!'
quotes.author: Mary Antin

quotes.quote: Americans were involved, not simply in a defense of their own rights but in a worldwide struggle for the salvation of liberty itself.
quotes.author: Gordon Wood

quotes.quote: The fate of America cannot depend on anyone man. The greatness of America is grounded in principle and not on any single personality.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: What the people want is very simple - they want an America as good as its promise.
quotes.author: Barbara Jordan

quotes.quote: The thing we find hard to understand about supremacy is why, if it is right for America, it isn't right for every other nation.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: Eastward I go only by force, but westward I go free.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The people stared at us everywhere, and we stare at them. We bore down on them with America's greatness until we crushed them.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Yet, in America, it is the poor who make the laws and usually they reserve the greatest benefits of society for themselves
quotes.author: Tocqueville

quotes.quote: The name of the game in America is banks and power. And one does not have to investigate too far to discover that the Western economy has been built on the backs of non-white people.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: O, yes, / I say it plain, / America never was America to me / And yet I swear this oath— / America will be.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: Woman governs America because America is a land of boys who refuse to grow up.
quotes.author: Salvador De Madriaga

quotes.quote: There is not a liberal America and a conservative America - there is the United States of America. There is not a black America and a white America and Latino America and Asian America - there's the United States of America.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The greatness of America lies not in being more enlightened than any other nation, but rather in her ability to repair her faults.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.quote: America's present need is not heroics but healing; not nostrums but normalcy; not revolution but restoration.
quotes.author: Warren G. Harding

quotes.quote: What I love about America is not necessarily the American Dream but the fact that there's so much spirit of fighting to continue to dream once the dreams are broken.
quotes.author: Chloe Zhao

quotes.quote: Where you have the most armed citizens in America, you have the lowest violent crime rate. Where you have the worst gun control, you have the highest crime rate.
quotes.author: Ted Nugent

quotes.quote: America's healthcare system is neither healthy, caring, nor a system.
quotes.author: Walter Cronkite

quotes.quote: I believe in an America where millions of Americans believe in an America that's the America millions of Americans believe in. That's the America I love.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.quote: That's why they call it the American Dream because you have to be asleep to believe it.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Half of the American people have never read a newspaper. Half never voted for President. One hopes it is the same half.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: 'You're in America now,' I said. 'Our idea of diplomacy is showing up with a gun in one hand and a sandwich in the other and asking which you'd prefer.'
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: This is the story of America. Everybody's doing what they think they're supposed to do.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: The greatest Americans / have not been born yet / they are waiting patiently / for the past to die.
quotes.author: Saul Williams

quotes.quote: Being an American is about having the right to be who you are. Sometimes that doesn't happen.
quotes.author: Herb Ritts

quotes.quote: “n America everybody is of the opinion that he has no social superiors since all men are equal, but he does not admit that he has no social inferiors, for, from the time of Jefferson onward, the doctrine that all men are equal applies only upwards, not downwards.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: It is time to remember that old wisdom our soldiers will never forget: that whether we are black or brown or white, we all bleed the same red blood of patriots, we all enjoy the same glorious freedoms, and we all salute the same great American Flag.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: The American flag is the symbol of our freedom, national pride and history.
quotes.author: Mike Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: The American flag represents all of us and all the values we hold sacred.
quotes.author: Adrian Cronauer

quotes.quote: The American flag, Old Glory, standing tall and flying free over American soil for 228 years is the symbol of our beloved country. It is recognized from near and afar, and many lives have been lost defending it.
quotes.author: Jeff Miller

quotes.quote: When we honor our flag we honor what we stand for as a Nation -- freedom, equality, justice, and hope.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: That's what makes America great; the fabric and the core of our beliefs and our being is we wrap ourselves around diversity. We say that the American flag represents our right to be free in every aspect of what that is, and every veteran who fought, fought for that freedom. So what we have to do is realize it's not a choice between the country and racial justice; it's about what we believe in at the core of our being, and that's that we are free.
quotes.author: Jennifer Welter

quotes.quote: We take the stars from heaven, the red from our mother country, separating it by white stripes, thus showing that we have separated from her, and the white stripes shall go down to posterity, representing our liberty.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Our flag means all that our fathers meant in the Revolutionary War. It means all that the Declaration of Independence meant. It means justice. It means liberty. It means happiness. Every color means liberty. Every thread means liberty. Every star and stripe means liberty.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The flag of the United States has not been created by rhetorical sentences in declarations of independence and in bills of rights. It has been created by the experience of a great people, and nothing is written upon it that has not been written by their life. It is the embodiment, not of a sentiment, but of a history.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: This flag, which we honor and under which we serve, is the emblem of our unity, our power, our thought and purpose as a nation. It has no other character than that which we give it from generation to generation. The choices are ours. It floats in majestic silence above the hosts that execute those choices, whether in peace or in war. And yet, though silent, it speaks to us — speaks to us of the past, or the men and women who went before us, and of the records they wrote upon it.
quotes.author: President Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: We identify the flag with almost everything we hold dear on earth, peace, security, liberty, our family, our friends, our home. … But when we look at our flag and behold it emblazoned with all our rights we must remember that it is equally a symbol of our duties. Every glory that we associate with it is the result of duty done.
quotes.author: President Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: The flag is the embodiment, not of sentiment, but of history. It represents the experiences made by men and women, the experiences of those who do and live under that flag.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: With five chances on each hand and one unwavering aim, no boy, however poor, need despair. There is bread and success for every youth under the american flag who has energy and ability to seize his opportunity.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: The American flag has not been planted on foreign soil to acquire more territory but for humanity's sake.
quotes.author: William McKinley

quotes.quote: Our flag does not fly because the wind moves it. It flies with the last breath of each soldier who died protecting it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There are those who wrap themselves in flags and blow the tinny trumpet of patriotism as a means of fooling the people.
quotes.author: George Galloway

quotes.quote: On what rests the hope of the republic? One country, one language, one flag!
quotes.author: Alexander Henry

quotes.quote: Let it be borne on the flag under which we rally in every exigency, that we have one country, one constitution, one destiny.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.quote: A thoughtful mind, when it sees a nation's flag, sees not the flag only, but the nation itself; and whatever may be its symbols, its insignia, he reads chiefly in the flag the government, the principles, the truths, the history which belongs to the nation that sets it forth.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A flag will always fly in the face of oppression.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: The whole inspiration of our life as a nation flows out from the waving folds of this banner.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: People take that uniform and the American Flag very seriously, you don’t get to say you fought for it when you clearly haven’t.
quotes.author: John Velis

quotes.quote: Our flag is not just one of many political points of view. Rather, the flag is a symbol of our national unity.
quotes.author: Adrian Cronauer

quotes.quote: American history is longer, larger, more various, more beautiful, and more terrible than anything anyone has ever said about it.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: I think the most important idea is to remember that there have been times throughout American history where what is right is not the same as what is legal.
quotes.author: Edward Snowden

quotes.quote: The force that has come closest across American history to actually ending America was white supremacy. That was the Civil War.
quotes.author: Pete Buttigieg

quotes.quote: The 1950s and 1960s had been a period of enormous growth, the highest in American history, maybe in economic history.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: In every election in American history both parties have their cliches. The party that has the cliches that ring true wins.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: I like stories in specific time periods. 'The Revenant's' era of American history was fascinating because it was this lawless no-man's land. It defined the idea of the American frontiersman as man conquering nature. In a way, the story of Hugh Glass is about man dominating nature.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: No event in American history is more misunderstood than the Vietnam War. It was misreported then, and it is misremembered now.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: Up to our own day American history has been in a large degree the history of the colonization of the Great West. The existence of an area of free land, its continuous recession, and the advance of American settlement westward, explain American development.
quotes.author: Frederick Jackson Turner

quotes.quote: So many people of color who made major contributions to American history have been trapped in the purgatory of history.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Gates

quotes.quote: By looking into more details of American history, we can make more sense of what's happening today.
quotes.author: Christoph Waltz

quotes.quote: In time, foods such as hamburgers and ice cream became more than just meals. They became part of American history and culture, touchstones that are almost immediately nostalgic and sentimental no matter how old you are or what part of the country you are from
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.quote: Black history isn't a separate history. This is all of our history, this is American history, and we need to understand that. It has such an impact on kids and their values and how they view black people
quotes.author: Karyn Parsons

quotes.quote: The great and abiding lesson of American history, particularly the cold war, is that the engine of capitalism, the individual, is mightier than any collective.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.quote: There is one unmistakable lesson in American history: A community that allows a large number of young men to grow up in broken families, dominated by women, never acquiring any stable relationship to male authority, never acquiring any set of rational expectations about the future
quotes.author: Daniel Patrick Moynihan

quotes.quote: American history contains much matter for pride and congratulation, and much matter for regret and humiliation
quotes.author: Herbert Croly

quotes.quote: We've reached a point in American history when death has become almost the last obscenity. Have you noticed how many of us refuse to say ‘he or she died'? We're far more likely to say ‘she passed away, ' as though death were a sterile process of modest preparation, followed by shrink-wrapping, then rapid transit-where? Well, elsewhere. In short, it's the single thing we're loath to discuss in public
quotes.author: Will Schwalbe

quotes.quote: English history is all about men liking their fathers, and American history is all about men hating their fathers and trying to burn down everything they ever did
quotes.author: Malcom Bradbury

quotes.quote: American history is not something dead and over. It is always alive, always growing, always unfinished.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: There is no time in American history in which there was more economic conflict between segments of the population than there was prior to the Civil War.
quotes.author: G. Edward Griffin

quotes.quote: Throughout American history many of our social gains and much of our progress toward democracy were made possible by the active intervention of the federal government.
quotes.author: Harold Washington

quotes.quote: Through American history, we have had populist movements that often, often, often have this ugly racial element. But, often, there are warning signs of some deeper social and economic problem.
quotes.author: David Brooks

quotes.quote: The irony of American history is the tendency of good white Americanas to presume racial innocence. Ignorance of how we are shaped racially is the first sign of privilege.In other words. It is a privilege to ignore the consequences of race in America.
quotes.author: Tim Wise

quotes.quote: The land is sacred. These words are at the core of your being. The land is our mother, the rivers our blood. Take our land away and we die. That is, the Indian in us dies.
quotes.author: Mary Brave Bird

quotes.quote: If the white man wants to live in peace with the Indian, he can live in peace... Treat all men alike. Give them all the same law. Give them all an even chance to live and grow.All men were made by the same Great Spirit Chief.They are all brothers. The Earth is the mother of all people, and all people should have equal rights upon it.
quotes.author: White Elk

quotes.quote: It almost seems that nobody can hate America as much as native Americans. America needs new immigrants to love and cherish it.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Everyone who's born in the Western Hemisphere is a Native American. We are all Native Americans.
quotes.author: Russell Means

quotes.quote: In my own view, the life expectancy of Native Americans in the United States is one of the really great moral crises that we face.
quotes.author: Jim Yong Kim

quotes.quote: People tend to forget that in our country, we'd pretty much all be immigrants, except for the Native Americans.
quotes.author: Amy Bloom

quotes.quote: I'm proud of being part Cherokee, and I think it's time all us Indians felt the same way.
quotes.author: Loretta Lynn

quotes.quote: The Trail of Tears has a great deal of meaning for every person of American Indian ancestry, whether they are Cherokee or not. For me, it has always stood for what is best and worst about the history of the United States.
quotes.author: Joseph Bruchac

quotes.quote: America is - and will always be - a success story. We have African Americans, Native Americans, Hispanics, and members of other ethnic groups elected to positions inside our governments.
quotes.author: Markwayne Mullin

quotes.quote: When you start to look at Native American history, you realize that, very far from being a peaceful, morally superior people, Native Americans were not that different from Europeans.
quotes.author: Philipp Meyer

quotes.quote: The contributions of all American Indian tribes to our national culture have been long overlooked.
quotes.author: Sue Rose

quotes.quote: It's a Cherokee rose. The story is that when American soldiers were moving Indians off their land on the trail of tears the Cherokee mothers were grieving and crying so much 'cause they were losing their little ones along the way from exposure and disease and starvation.
quotes.author: Frank Darabont

quotes.quote: I'll tell you, if anyone got a raw deal it's the American Indian. This country has a black mark on its soul for what was done to them.
quotes.author: John C. Richards

quotes.quote: I admire American Indians so much. They so proud of their culture. if you insult their culture, they'll sue you. They will sue you and everybody in your family.
quotes.author: George Lopez

quotes.quote: If war come, Red Hawk be Indian. Not can be white man. Not can be alone. Red Hawk be Indian, make strong fight.
quotes.author: Herb Meadow

quotes.quote: As a matter of fact, Indians can smell white people.
quotes.author: James Edward Grant

quotes.quote: My sweet Indian warrior / One day I'll hold you / In my arms fold you / Oh, Cherokee / Brave Indian warrior
quotes.author: Sascha Konietzko

quotes.quote: I am an American Indian, / My tribe is Cherokee / My forefathers loved this land / They left it here for me
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: We are heroes of the homeland, American remains / We live in many faces and answer many names / We will not be forgotten, we won't be left behind / Our memories live on in mortal minds / And poets pens / We'll ride again
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: Many of the customs and traditions of the North American Indians / Are preserved today by the Black Indians of New Orleans. This is a practice / Traditionally a practice begins with the Indian prayer song, 'My Indian Red.'
quotes.author: Dawn Richard

quotes.quote: Don't believe in your American Dream. / The Indians, the buffalo and old Joe Mason, / They died from memory.
quotes.author: Nanci Griffith

quotes.quote: Cowboys say Howdy, Indians say How / No matter where you're meeting folks. / It's the real American way of greeting folks.
quotes.author: Roger Edens

quotes.quote: On reservations / A hopeless situation / Respect is something that you earn / Our Indian brothers' getting burned / Original American / Turned into second class citizen
quotes.author: Charlie L Benante

quotes.quote: Cry, cry, cry for the Indians / Love the land and fellow man / Peace is what we strive to have / Some folks have none of this / Hatred and prejudice
quotes.author: Charlie L Benante

quotes.quote: Could you tell that the empty quivered, / Brown skinned Indian on the banks / That were crowded and narrow, / Held a broken arrow?
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: Oh, the history books tell it / They tell it so well / The cavalries charged / The Indians fell / The cavalries charged / The Indians died / Oh, the country was young / With God on its side
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Regardless of outside pressures the Indians have remained Indians, and they always will.
quotes.author: Bertha Pauline Dutton

quotes.quote: As with many Native American tribes, the Cherokee held their own religious and tribal beliefs and customs. Many of these traditions remain important to the Cherokee today. There were rituals, ceremonies, and stories devoted to every aspect of life.
quotes.author: Cassie M. Lawton

quotes.quote: You are not Cherokee because you have a BIA [Bureau of Indian Affairs] enrollment card. You have to live and be the culture that is based on a unique heritage.
quotes.author: J. T. Garrett

quotes.quote: American Indian traditional values of sharing, cooperation, noninterference, being, family and tribe, harmony with nature, a time orientation toward living in the present.
quotes.author: J. T. Garrett

quotes.quote: West Indian cultural mentality and a North American life equals the perfect balance.
quotes.author: Melanie Fiona

quotes.quote: When a white army battles Indians and wins, it is called a great victory, but if they lose it is called a massacre.
quotes.author: Chiksika

quotes.quote: Being is a spiritual proposition. Gaining is a material act. Traditionally, American Indians have always attempted to be the best people they could. Part of that spiritual process was and is to give away wealth, to discard wealth in order not to gain.
quotes.author: Russell Means

quotes.quote: The old Indian teaching was that is is wrong to tear loose from its place on the earth anything that may be growing there. It may be cut off, but it should not be uprooted. The trees and the grass have spirits. Whatever one of such growth may be destroyed by some good Indian, his act is done in sadness and with a prayer for forgiveness because of his necessities.
quotes.author: Wooden Leg

quotes.quote: The American Indian was an individualist in religion as in war. He had neither a national army nor an organized church.
quotes.author: Charles Alexander Eastman

quotes.quote: Indian intellectuals today feel radical when they condemn fundamentalism, but not many people are talking about the links between privatization, globalization, and fundamentalism.
quotes.author: Arundhati Roy

quotes.quote: We Indians are like an island in the middle of the river. The white man comes upon us as a flood. We crumble and fall.
quotes.author: Opothleyoholo

quotes.quote: What the American Indian Movement says is that the American Indians are the Palestinians of the United States, and the Palestinians are the American Indians of Europe.
quotes.author: Russell Means

quotes.quote: We owe a lot to the Indians, who taught us how to count, without which no worthwhile scientific discovery could have been made.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There are more American Indians alive today than there were when Columbus arrived or at any other time in history. Does this sound like a record of genocide?
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: It takes a strong effort on the part of each American Indian not to become Europeanized. The strength for this effort can only come from the traditional ways, the traditional values that our elders retain.
quotes.author: Russell Means

quotes.quote: There is no death, only a change of worlds.
quotes.author: Chief Seattle

quotes.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Traditional American Indian values and attributes include a sense of humor that can only be appreciated because of living that culture and time, as is the case with other cultures of people.
quotes.author: J. T. Garrett

quotes.quote: The key to American Indian values, attitudes, and behaviors is to be strong and endure while belonging to a group, while respecting nature, the elders, the family and the tribe.
quotes.author: J. T. Garrett

quotes.quote: The traditional Indian view is to accept the differences as a way of life, and that is okay.
quotes.author: J. T. Garrett

quotes.quote: This is why the old Indian still sits upon the earth instead of propping himself up and away from its life-giving forces. For him, to sit or lie upon the ground is to be able to think more deeply and to feel more keenly; he can see more clearly into the mysteries of life and come closer in kinship to other lives about him.
quotes.author: Chief Luther Standing Bear

quotes.quote: The Indian lived---lived in every sense of the world---from his first to his last breath.
quotes.author: Chief Luther Standing Bear

quotes.quote: Indian etiquette was very strict, and among the requirements was that of avoiding direct address. A term of relationship or some title of courtesy was commonly used instead of the personal name by those who wished to show respect.
quotes.author: Charles Alexander Eastman (Ohiseya)

quotes.quote: There is no swear word in the Indian languages, and I haven't yet learned to swear.
quotes.author: Gertude S Bonnin

quotes.quote: American Indian s were the original rulers and caretakers of the vast territory that is today the United States.
quotes.author: Sharon O'Brien

quotes.quote: Europeans considered Indians 'children of nature' or 'savage beasts.'
quotes.author: Sharon O'Brien

quotes.quote: Indians seen as being very religious, yet they have no organized religion in our sense of the word.
quotes.author: William Lyon

quotes.quote: Because medicine traditions are at the very heart and core of every Indian culture, to disregard them as merely superstition is to lose sight of the basic nature of traditional American Indians.
quotes.author: William Lyon

quotes.quote: Traditional Indians know of this personal connection to the Great Mystery. Much of their daily life involved aligning themselves, in one way or another, with the powers of the Great Mystery.
quotes.author: William Lyon

quotes.quote: Among the North American Indians, supernatural events were a daily affair. Obviously, that's not the problem.
quotes.author: William Lyon

quotes.quote: Some Indian people developed complex mythologies and religions, whereas others made do with relatively simple beliefs.
quotes.author: Barry Pritzker

quotes.quote: But the American Indian tribes that remain are proudly keeping their culture alive.
quotes.author: Sandy Phan

quotes.quote: American Indians were the first people to live in Texas. Eventually, most American Indians were forced to leave Texas and settle on reservations in Oklahoma.
quotes.author: Sandy Phan

quotes.quote: The ways in which American Indians have resisted assimilation and maintained their identity are as creative and diverse as the people themselves.
quotes.author: The University of Arizona Press

quotes.quote: The advisors believed that most American Indian societies have adapted well to change when they have given anything like a fair chance to make the most of a new situation on their own terms.
quotes.author: The University of Arizona Press

quotes.quote: None of the American Indians were or are red-skinned, but were either a light or a dark brown, or as fair as any Frenchman.
quotes.author: Jon Manchip White

quotes.quote: Long ago, Georgia was home to many American Indians. Some lived in the mountains. Others lived in the river valleys. They all lived in groups called tribes.
quotes.author: Kelly Rodgers

quotes.quote: If you can't be funny, be interesting.
quotes.author: Harold Ross

quotes.quote: Everything is funny, if you can laugh at it.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: Small things amuse small minds.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: There's only one true superpower amongst human beings, and that is being funny. People treat you differently if you can make them laugh.
quotes.author: Jeff Garlin

quotes.quote: Funny is when you're serious.
quotes.author: Harvey Korman

quotes.quote: If we entertain temptations, soon they begin entertaining us!
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Life's more amusing than we thought.
quotes.author: Andrew Lang

quotes.quote: But with comedy it's a simple premise. If it's funny, people laugh. If it's not, they don't.
quotes.author: Steve Coogan

quotes.quote: Comedy is just complaining in an entertaining way, Enterplaining.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Being funny is not the same as being happy.
quotes.author: Dana Gould

quotes.quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Normal people with normal problems can be hilarious.
quotes.author: Tommy Lee Jones

quotes.quote: Kids can amuse themselves with almost anything.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.quote: We never respect those who amuse us, however we may smile at their comic powers.
quotes.author: Marguerite Gardiner

quotes.quote: To live simply to die is by no means amusing, but to live with the knowledge that you will die before your time, that's really is idiotic
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: What is amusing now had to be taken in desperate earnest once.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Everything considered, work is less boring than amusing oneself.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: If people are talking behind your back, be happy that you are the one in front.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sometimes wrong is worth the funny!
quotes.author: Billy Gardell

quotes.quote: To make fun of a person to his face is a brutal way of amusing one's self; be delicate and cunning, and keep your laugh in your sleeve, lest you frighten away your game.
quotes.author: Gelett Burgess

quotes.quote: There is definitely a pressure for funny people to be funny. People want them to perform all the time.
quotes.author: Marsha Thomason

quotes.quote: There's nothing more fun than entertaining kids.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Of course, everyone wants to be healthy. The amusing thing is no one's really sure how to do it.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Some people are like clouds. When they go away, it's a brighter day.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's not by amusing oneself that one learns.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Grilling takes the formality out of entertaining. Everyone wants to get involved.
quotes.author: Bobby Flay

quotes.quote: The implication that there was something wrong with the war plan is amusing.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: The only way to amuse some people is to slip and fall on an icy pavement.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.quote: Kids are anarchy writ large.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.quote: Hunger is the mother of anarchy.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: The media is the right arm of anarchy.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: Anarchy is merely the illusion of liberty.
quotes.author: Stephan Attia

quotes.quote: Anarchy is order, government is civil war.
quotes.author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon

quotes.quote: Anarchy is the only slight glimmer of hope.
quotes.author: Mick Jagger

quotes.quote: Democracy leads to anarchy, which is mob rule.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Anarchy is the stepping stone to absolute power.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: In morals as in politics anarchy is not for the weak.
quotes.author: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.quote: Why anarchy? Because anything less would be uncivilized.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Tucker

quotes.quote: Anarchy is as detestable in grammar as it is in society.
quotes.author: Maurice Druon

quotes.quote: Without real nonviolence, there would be perfect anarchy.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Anarchy doesn't mean out of control; it means out of their control.
quotes.author: Jim Dodge

quotes.quote: In times of anarchy one may seem a despot in order to be a saviour.
quotes.author: Victor de Riqueti

quotes.quote: The mischiefs of anarchy have been equaled by the mischiefs of government.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The anarchy that threatens a degrading society is not its punishment, but its remedy.
quotes.author: Nicolás Gómez Dávila

quotes.quote: A culture without property, or in which creators can't get paid, is anarchy, not freedom.
quotes.author: Lawrence Lessig

quotes.quote: Anarchy raised its seductive head. He could do anything; there was nothing that was not allowed.
quotes.author: Paul Russell

quotes.quote: Tyranny and anarchy are alike incompatible with freedom, security, and the enjoyment of opportunity.
quotes.author: Jeane Kirkpatrick

quotes.quote: Anarchy could never get a man to the moon, but it may the only mode that can allow us to survive on earth.
quotes.author: Sheldon B. Kopp

quotes.quote: It is not honest inquiry that makes anarchy; but it is error, insincerity, half belief and untruth that make it.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Anarchy is like custard cooking over a flame; it has to be constantly stirred or it sticks and gets heavy, like government.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Mere anarchy is loosed upon the world, the blood-dimmed tide is loosed, and everywhere the ceremony of innocence is drowned.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Innocence is drowned in anarchy. The best lack conviction given time to think, and the worst are full of passion without mercy.
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.quote: Sadly, anarchy has gotten such a bad name. We don't really see much evidence of it because people associate it with reckless abandon.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: Anarchy is no guarantee that some people won't kill, injure, kidnap, defraud, or steal from others. Government is a guarantee that some will.
quotes.author: Gustave de Molinari

quotes.quote: People, if given the choice between anarchy and dictatorship, will always choose dictatorship because anarchy is the worst dictatorship of all.
quotes.author: Eric Sevareid

quotes.quote: Liberty begets anarchy, anarchy leads to despotism, and despotism brings about liberty once again. Millions of human beings have perished without being able to make any of these systems triumph.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Without anarchy, there would be chaos.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Tucker

quotes.quote: Tyranny and anarchy are never far apart.
quotes.author: Jeremy Bentham

quotes.quote: In anarchy there is no automatic harmony.
quotes.author: Kenneth Waltz

quotes.quote: Whenever government abandons law, it proclaims anarchy.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The ideally non-violent state will be an ordered anarchy.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Anarchy is a state of society where the only government is reason.
quotes.author: Michael Schwab

quotes.quote: When anarchy is declared, the first thing we do, let's kill all the anarchists.
quotes.author: Craig Bruce

quotes.quote: If anarchy is chaos, and chaos is war, why wasn't a single war started by anarchists?
quotes.author: Jakub Bożydar Wiśniewski

quotes.quote: Anarchy is the sure consequence of tyranny; for no power that is not limited by laws can ever be protected by them.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Lawlessness is lawlessness. Anarchy is anarchy is anarchy. Neither race nor color nor frustration is an excuse for either lawlessness or anarchy.
quotes.author: Thurgood Marshall

quotes.quote: Anarchy is a function, not of a society's simplicity and lack of social organization, but of it's complexity and multiplicity of social organizations.
quotes.author: Colin Ward

quotes.quote: We have to claim anarchy and realize that systems have a life of their own that is anti-humanist. There is definitely an anti-humanist tendency in all systems.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Anarchy is law and freedom without force. Despotism is law and force without freedom. Barbarism force without freedom and law. Republicanism is force with freedom and law.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: There are different forms of anarchy and different currents in it. I must, first say very simply what anarchy I have in view. By anarchy I mean first an absolute rejection of violence.
quotes.author: Jacques Ellul

quotes.quote: Our ancestors who changed the world did so through new ideas which came to them as they acted.
quotes.author: Raymond Charles Barker

quotes.quote: We are bound to our ancestors and to those who made us, whether we want to be or not. What matters is what we make of what we are.
quotes.author: Kate Elliott

quotes.quote: Our ancestors have invented, we can at least innovate.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: We rarely know who our ancestors were. Who can even remember the names of their great-grandparents? They have vanished into the dim and distant past.
quotes.author: Dmitri Volkogonov

quotes.quote: Most of our ancestors were not perfect ladies and gentlemen. The majority of them weren't even mammals.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: Our ancestors are an ever widening circle of hope.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: The ancestors are very much invested in the children, because the children are the ones who are going to continue the world that the ancestors made.
quotes.author: Robert Bly

quotes.quote: The point is that for our ancestors, the universe was a picture; for modern physics it is a story.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: There is nothing glorious about what our ancestors call history. It is simply a succession of mistakes, intolerances and violations.
quotes.author: Claude Vorilhon

quotes.quote: Our ancestors, possessed a right, which nature has given to all men, of departing from the country in which chance, not choice has placed them.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Ancestor worship, or filial piety so characteristic of Asian cultures, for example, does not really resonate with Americans who favor children, not grandparents.
quotes.author: Alan Dundes

quotes.quote: When we know about our ancestors, when we sense them as living and as supporting us, then we feel connected to the genetic life-stream, and we draw strength and nourishment from this.
quotes.author: Philip Carr-Gomm

quotes.quote: We were not the victims of ancestor worship. We had the benefits of a fresh start.
quotes.author: Matthew D. Miller

quotes.quote: None of us can boast about the morality of our ancestors. The record does not show that Adam and Eve were ever married.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: Our ancestors lived out of doors. They were as familiar with the night sky as most of us are with our favorite television programs.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: The ancestor of every action is a thought.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Our ancestors have travelled the iron age; the golden is before us.
quotes.author: Jacques-Henri Bernardin de Saint-Pierre

quotes.quote: Life is surely given us for higher purposes than to gather what our ancestors have wisely thrown away, and to learn what is of no value but because it has been forgotten.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: W are all carrying the imprints of our most ancient ancestors. Not simply in the genetic code, but in the imprints of attention that are passed on.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Though we have rightly applauded our ancestors for their spiritual achievements, those of us who prevail today will have done no small thing.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Seeds carry life from generation to generation without end. Through the seeds speak the voices of the ancestors. Each time we plant a seed, we become ancestors for the generations to come.
quotes.author: Kenny Ausubel

quotes.quote: The search for knowledge is in our genes. It was put there by our distant ancestors who spread across the world, and it's never going to be quenched.
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.quote: Our ancestors worshipped the Sun, and they were not that foolish. It makes sense to revere the Sun and the stars, for we are their children.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: We are connected, like it or not, to the ancestors of our biological families, and their templates.
quotes.author: Robert Moss

quotes.quote: Distinguished ancestors shed a powerful light on their descendants, and forbid the concealment either of their merits or of their demerits.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: Indeed, if our ancestors of millions of years ago hadn't learned how to care for one another and hunt in packs, they'd all have ended up being eaten by leopards.
quotes.author: Robert Shea

quotes.quote: We are the ancestors of our grandchildren's children. We look after them, just as our ancestors look after us. We aren't here for ourselves. We are here for each other and for the children of our grandchildren.
quotes.author: Roy Sesana

quotes.quote: Our ancestors are totally essential to our every waking moment, although most of us don't even have the faintest idea about their lives, their trials, their hardships or challenges.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.quote: We are the ancestors of the future and what we do now will have an impact.
quotes.author: Luisah Teish

quotes.quote: Men can know more than their ancestors did if they start with a knowledge of what their ancestors had already learned.That is why a society can be progressive only if it conserves its traditions.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: Our ancestors built temples for their gods. We build department stores.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: Be a good ancestor. Stand for something bigger than yourself. Add value to the Earth during your sojourn.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: It is indeed a desirable thing to be well-descended, but the glory belongs to our ancestors.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: The ancestor of every destructive action, every destructive decision, is a negative thought.
quotes.author: Eknath Easwaran

quotes.quote: Christianity doesn't demand that we worship our ancestors. If we don't remember our ancestors, then, in all likelihood, we cannot also recall the distant past.
quotes.author: F. Sionil Jose

quotes.quote: A man's ancestry is a positive property to him.
quotes.author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: People will not look forward to posterity, who never look backward to their ancestors.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: I'd rather have an inch of a dog than miles of pedigree.
quotes.author: Dana Burnet

quotes.quote: There are many kinds of conceit, but the chief one is to let people know what a very ancient and gifted family one descends from.
quotes.author: Benvenuto Cellini

quotes.quote: To forget one's ancestors is to be a brook without a source, a tree without a root.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Man is descended from a hairy-tailed quadruped, probably arboreal in his habits.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Every man is his own ancestor, and every man his own heir. He devises his own future and he inherits his own past.
quotes.author: H.F. Hedge

quotes.quote: Whoever serves his country well has no need of ancestors.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Our ancestors are very good kinds of folks, but they are the last people I should choose to have visiting acquaintance with.
quotes.author: Richard B. Sheridan

quotes.quote: We pay for the mistakes of our ancestors, and it seems only fair that they should leave us the money to pay with.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: I am very grateful for the indiscriminate behavior of my ancestors. I was conceived in St. Petersburg, but born in London— a Swiss cottage, of course.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Ancestor worship must be an appealing idea to those who are about to become ancestors.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: They who depend on the merits of ancestors, search in the roots of the tree for the fruits which the branches ought to produce.
quotes.author: Isaac Barrow

quotes.quote: We are human because, at a very early stage in the history of the species, our ancestors discovered a way of preserving and disseminating the results of experience.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: The proper time to influence the character of a child is about a hundred years before he is born.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.quote: If you would civilize a man, begin with his grandmother.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Genealogy: An account of one's descent from an ancestor who did not particularly care to trace his own.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Genealogy: A perverse preoccupation of those who seek to demonstrate that their forebears were better people than they are.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: Some people are your relatives but others are your ancestors, and you choose the ones you want to have as ancestors. You create yourself out of those values.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: Hereditary honors are a noble and splendid treasure to descendants.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Some men by ancestry are only the shadow of a mighty name.
quotes.author: Lucan

quotes.quote: Because they had no root, they withered away.
quotes.author: Matthew 13:6

quotes.quote: Call it a clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family. Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.
quotes.author: Jane Howard

quotes.quote: Look for the good, not for the evil, in the conduct of members of a family. One of life's greatest mysteries is how the boy who wasn't good enough to marry your daughter can be the father of the smartest grandchild in the world.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: As the family goes, so goes the nation and so goes the whole world in which we live.
quotes.author: John Paul II

quotes.quote: Every man is an omnibus in which his ancestors ride.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.quote: He who boasts of his descent praises the deeds of another.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Let us make future generations remember us as proud ancestors just as, today, we remember our forefathers.
quotes.author: Roh Moo-hyun

quotes.quote: Our history begins before we are born. We represent the hereditary influences of our race, and our ancestors virtually live in us.
quotes.author: James Nasmyth

quotes.quote: To understand and reconnect with our stories, the stories of our ancestors is to build our identities.
quotes.author: Frank Delaney

quotes.quote: Whatever you are is because of what your ancestors have done.
quotes.author: Li Lu

quotes.quote: We're all ghosts. We all carry, inside us, people who came before us.
quotes.author: Liam Callanan

quotes.quote: No self is of itself alone. It has a long chain of intellectual ancestors. The "I" is chained to ancestry by many factors… This is not a mere allegory, but an eternal memory.
quotes.author: Erwin Schrödinger

quotes.quote: You carry all of us in your heart. We shall live in every breath you take. Every incantation you speak.
quotes.author: Tomi Adeyemi

quotes.quote: It is in the roots, not the branches, that a tree’s greatest strength lies.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: If you know where you are from, it is harder for people to stop you from where you are going.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Ancestors from all times have shared their essence with you. Accept the light and let go of the rest.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: It is a far, far better thing to have a firm anchor in nonsense than to put out on the troubled seas of thought.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: We should not moor a ship with one anchor, or our life with one hope.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: People are looking for stability in a shaky world. They want something they can get hold of that's firm and sure and an anchor in the midst of all of this instability in which they're living.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Sometimes you don't realize you're actually drowning when you're trying to be everyone else's anchor
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The anchor holds in spite of the storm.
quotes.author: Ray Boltz

quotes.quote: Allow yourself to be an anchor and anchored by others.
quotes.author: Asa Don Brown

quotes.quote: You're stronger than us. Once you find your anchor never let go of it. No matter what.
quotes.author: John Marrs

quotes.quote: Have an anchor so that life doesn't toss you around.
quotes.author: Debby Ryan

quotes.quote: Unless man anchors the real love, man will always drift in the middle of nowhere!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Don't drag anchors of unforgiveness into your relationships. Forgive who you need to forgive. Reach out to someone who may be able to help you work this through. Don't drag around those things that "encumber" you.
quotes.author: Lee Ezell

quotes.quote: We can endure almost anything if we are centered, if we have some focus in our life. You can endure if you have an anchor.
quotes.author: Renita J. Weems

quotes.quote: The anchor man / thrown overboard / has simply rooted us / in history's repeating cycle.
quotes.author: Saul Williams

quotes.quote: To lose our connection with the body is to become spiritually homeless. Without an anchor we float aimlessly, battered by the winds and waves of life
quotes.author: Anodea Judith

quotes.quote: Visit the port of goodness often; if you can, cast your anchor over there!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Be anchored in life. Be anchored in love. Be anchored in what you believed.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't bring an anchor, on a sinking boat
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: To reach a port we must sail, sometimes with the wind, and sometimes against it. But we must not drift or lie at anchor.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.quote: Without an anchor, we can be drifted to any shore.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You can anchor the mind into answering a question a certain way by giving them a totally unrelated piece of information dropped before.
quotes.author: Michael Lewis

quotes.quote: It is well to moor your bark with two anchors.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: The anchors now made are contrived so as to sink into the ground as soon as they reach it, and to hold a great strain before they can be loosened or dislodged from their station.
quotes.author: William Falconer

quotes.quote: I live by the ocean / And during the night / I dive into it / Down to the bottom / Underneath all currents / And drop my anchor / As this is where I'm staying / This is my home
quotes.author: Bjork

quotes.quote: Do not forget to entertain strangers, for by so doing some people have entertained angels without knowing it.
quotes.author: Hebrews 13:2

quotes.quote: When angels visit us, we do not hear the rustle of wings, nor feel the feathery touch of the breast of a dove; but we know their presence by the love they create in our hearts.
quotes.author: Mary Baker Eddy

quotes.quote: Are not all angels ministering spirits sent to serve those who will inherit salvation?
quotes.author: Hebrews 1:14

quotes.quote: The reason angels can fly is because they take themselves lightly.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: God not only sends special angels into our lives, but sometimes He even sends them back again if we forget to take notes the first time!
quotes.author: Eileen Elias Freeman

quotes.quote: Make yourself familiar with the angels and behold them frequently in spirit; for without being seen, they are present with you.
quotes.author: St. Francis de Sales

quotes.quote: Angels are sent to bring us messages from God's heart.
quotes.author: Charles Hunter

quotes.quote: The soul at its highest is found like God, but an angel gives a closer idea of him. That is all an angel is: an idea of God.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Angels are all around us, all the time, in the very air we breathe.
quotes.author: Eileen Elias Freeman

quotes.quote: Angels are inseparable friends, who bring strength and consolation to those who include them in their lives. In truth, Angels are our best friends.
quotes.author: Janice T. Connell

quotes.quote: Angels are intelligent reflections of light, that original light which has no beginning. They can illuminate. They do not need tongues or ears, for they can communicate without speech, in thought.
quotes.author: John Of Damascus

quotes.quote: Angels have no philosophy but love.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Angels encourage us by guiding us onto a path that will lead to happiness and hope.
quotes.author: Andy Lakey

quotes.quote: Angels represent God's personal care for each one of us.
quotes.author: Andrew M. Greeley

quotes.quote: O passing angel, speed me with a song, a melody of heaven to reach my heart and rouse me to the race and make me strong.
quotes.author: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.quote: All God's angels come to us disguised.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: Angels are messengers, but sometimes we misunderstand their language.
quotes.author: Linda Solegato

quotes.quote: Angels shine from without because their spirits are lit from within by the light of God.
quotes.author: Eileen Elias Freeman

quotes.quote: An angel can illuminate the thought and mind of man by strengthening the power of vision, and by bringing within his reach some truth which the angel himself contemplates.
quotes.author: St Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: The Lord will command his angels to take good care of you. They will lift you up in their hands. Then you won't trip over a stone.
quotes.author: The Bible

quotes.quote: It is not because angels are holier than men or devils that makes them angels, but because they do not expect holiness from one another, but from God alone.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Angels descending, bring from above, echoes of mercy, whispers of love.
quotes.author: Fanny J. Crosby

quotes.quote: Pride ruined the angels.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: All God's angels come to us disguised.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: The gaurdian angels of life sometimes fly so high as to be beyond our sight, but they are always looking down upon us.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: Angels represent God's personal care for each one of us.
quotes.author: Andrew Greeley

quotes.quote: An angel is a spiritual creature created by God for the service of Christendom and the church.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: The angels are the dispensers and administrators of the divine beneficence toward us; they regard our safety, undertake our defense, direct our ways, and exercise a constant solicitude that no evil befall us.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: Music is well said to be the speech of angels.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: But if these beings guard you, they do so because they have been summoned by your prayers.
quotes.author: Saint Ambrose

quotes.quote: Angels are visible to those who accept the light and break the pact made with darkness.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: We are each of us angels with only one wing, and we can only fly by embracing one another.
quotes.author: Luciano De Crescenzo

quotes.quote: Angels appear in many different forms to hold your hand through the difficult times.
quotes.author: Doreen Virtue

quotes.quote: It was pride that changed angels into devils; it is humility that makes men as angels.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: The guardian angels of life sometimes fly so high as to be beyond our sight, but they are always looking down upon us.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: If instead of a gem, or even a flower, we should cast the gift of a loving thought into the heart of a friend, that would be giving as the angels give.
quotes.author: John Of Damascus

quotes.quote: Every visible thing in this world is put in the charge of an angel.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Gratitude is our most direct line to God and the angels.
quotes.author: Terry Taylor

quotes.quote: I saw the angel in the marble and carved until I set him free.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: The air up there in the clouds is very pure and fine, bracing and delicious. And why shouldn't it be? It is the same the angels breathe.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You're in the arms of the Angels. May you find some comfort here.
quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

quotes.quote: Angels are spirits, but it is not because they are spirits that they are angels. They become angels when they are sent. For the name angel refers to their office, not their nature. You ask the name of this nature, it is spirit, you ask its office, it is that of an Angel, which is a messenger.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Everything that we see is a shadow cast by that which we do not see.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Beside each believer stands an Angel as protector and shepherd, leading him to life.
quotes.author: Saint Basil

quotes.quote: The angels stand between us and God, but they are translucent, even transparent, and they beckon us to penetrate their luminosity.
quotes.author: Peter Wilson

quotes.quote: Outside the open window The morning air is all awash with angels.
quotes.author: Richard Wilbur

quotes.quote: Angels transcend every religion, every philosophy, every creed. In fact Angels have no religion as we know it. Their existence precedes every religious system that has ever existed on Earth.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: If men were angels, no government would be necessary.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: Everything we call a trial, a sorrow, or a duty, believe me, that angel's hand is there.
quotes.author: Giovanni Giocondo

quotes.quote: An angel is a spiritual creature created by God without a body, for the service of Christendom and of the church.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote:
Angels are not merely forms of extraterrestrial intelligence.
They are forms of extra-cosmic intelligence.
quotes.author: Mortimer Adler

quotes.quote: All forces that reside in the body are angels.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: Better the devil you know than the angel you don't.
quotes.author: Hama Tuma

quotes.quote: In heaven an angel is nobody in particular.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Trust no friend without faults, and love a woman, but no angel.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: The angels as the guardians of men are set over men as instructors and monitors. This shows the relationship that is to exist between them. Man's attitude is to be one of obedience and subjection. He is to follow the lead of the angels, and consequently some reverence is already implied in the very relationship that exists between man and angel.
quotes.author: Tertullian

quotes.quote: Death makes angels of us all and gives us wings where we had shoulders smooth as raven's claws.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: While mortals sleep, the angels keep their watch of wondering love.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: Angels can fly because they take themselves lightly.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: God always has an angel of help for those who are willing to do their duty.
quotes.author: Theodore L. Cuyler

quotes.quote: If you are patient in one moment of anger, you will escape a hundred days of sorrow.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A hand ready to hit, may cause you great trouble.
quotes.author: Maori (on anger)

quotes.quote: A man in a passion, rides a mad horse.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Anger ventilated often hurries toward forgiveness; and concealed often hardens into revenge.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: A quarrelsome man has no good neighbours.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If a small thing has the power to make you angry, does that not indicate something about your size?
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: He who angers you conquers you.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kenny

quotes.quote: Fire in the heart sends smoke into the head.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Anger is often more hurtful than the injury that caused it.
quotes.author: English (on anger)

quotes.quote: A quick temper will make a fool of you soon enough.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Anger is a wind which blows out the lamp of the mind.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Anger is one letter short of danger.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Where there is anger, there is always pain underneath.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote:
Anger makes you smaller, while forgiveness
forces you to grow beyond what you are.
quotes.author: Cherie Carter-Scott

quotes.quote: You can't shake hands with a clenched fist.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: Bitterness is like cancer. It eats upon the host. But anger is like fire. It burns it all clean.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Beware the fury of a patient man.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Do not teach your children never to be angry; teach them how to be angry.
quotes.author: Lyman Abbott

quotes.quote: Never respond to an angry person with a fiery comeback, even if he deserves it...Don't allow his anger to become your anger.
quotes.author: Bohdi Sanders

quotes.quote: Anger dwells only in the bosom of fools.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The sharpest sword is a word spoken in wrath.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: At the core of all anger is a need that is not being fulfilled.
quotes.author: Marshall B. Rosenberg

quotes.quote: A man can't eat anger for breakfast and sleep with it at night and not suffer damage to his soul.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Whatever is begun in anger ends in shame.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Not the fastest horse can catch a word spoken in anger.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Anger is a valid emotion. It's only bad when it takes control and makes you do things you don't want to do.
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: How much more grievous are the consequences of anger than the causes of it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: There are two things a person should never be angry at, what they can help, and what they cannot.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The more anger towards the past you carry in your heart, the less capable you are of loving in the present.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: Learn this from me. Holding anger is a poison. It eats you from inside. We think that hating is a weapon that attacks the person who harmed us. But hatred is a curved blade. And the harm we do, we do to ourselves.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Anger is what makes a clear mind seem clouded.
quotes.author: Kazi Shams

quotes.quote: Anger is never without a reason, but seldom with a good one.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems — not people; to focus your energies on answers — not excuses.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: It is a waste of energy to be angry with a man who behaves badly just as it is to be angry with a car that won't go.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Hard words break no bones.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you kick a stone in anger you will hurt your foot.
quotes.author: Korean (on anger)

quotes.quote: Postpone today's anger until tomorrow.
quotes.author: Tagalog (Filipino) (on anger)

quotes.quote: The anger of the prudent never shows.
quotes.author: Burmese (on anger)

quotes.quote: Anger is a short madness.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: The greatest remedy for anger is delay.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes when I'm angry I have the right to be angry, but that doesn't give me the right to be cruel.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Anger ... it's a paralyzing emotion ... you can't get anything done.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Get mad, then get over it.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Exaggeration is truth that has lost its temper.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: To be angry is to revenge the faults of others on ourselves.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Every time you get angry, you poison your own system.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.quote: Speak when you are angry and you will make the best speech you will ever regret.
quotes.author: Ambrose Brierce

quotes.quote: Anybody can become angry – that is easy, but to be angry with the right person and to the right degree and at the right time and for the right purpose, and in the right way – that is not within everybody’s power and is not easy.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Never do anything when you are in a temper, for you will do everything wrong.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: When angry we let others' mistakes punish us. To forgive others is to be kind to yourself.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: When anger rises, think of the consequences.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: When you are caught up in a destructive emotion, you have lost one of your greatest assets: your independence.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: If you and I want to stir up a resentment tomorrow that may rankle across the decades and endure until, death, just let us indulge in a little stinging criticism - no matter how certain we are that it is justified.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Anger makes dull men witty, but it keeps them poor.
quotes.author: Elizabeth I

quotes.quote: In days that follow, I discover that anger is easier to handle than grief.
quotes.author: Emily Giffin

quotes.quote: Anger is a momentary madness, so control your passion or it will control you.
quotes.author: G. M. Trevelyan

quotes.quote: Anger and jealousy can no more bear to lose sight of their objects than love.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Anger is never without an argument, but seldom with a good one.
quotes.author: George Savile

quotes.quote: I lose my temper, but it's all over in a minute," said the student. "So is the hydrogen bomb," I replied. "But think of the damage it produces!"
quotes.author: George Sweeting

quotes.quote: Anger at lies lasts forever. Anger at truth can't last.
quotes.author: Greg Evans

quotes.quote: Anger is momentary madness, so control your passion or it will control you.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: My friends, love is better than anger. Hope is better than fear. Optimism is better than despair. So let us be loving, hopeful and optimistic. And we'll change the world.
quotes.author: Jack Layton

quotes.quote: The best remedy for a short temper is a long walk.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Schiff

quotes.quote: But angry people are not always wise.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Anger is just anger. It isn't good. It isn't bad. It just is. What you do with it is what matters. It's like anything else. You can use it to build or to destroy. You just have to make the choice.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: Holding on to anger, resentment and hurt only gives you tense muscles, a headache and a sore jaw from clenching your teeth. Forgiveness gives you back the laughter and the lightness in your life.
quotes.author: Joan Lunden

quotes.quote: Anger doesn’t demand action. When you act in anger, you lose self-control.
quotes.author: Joe Hyams

quotes.quote: The truth will set you free, but first it will piss you off.
quotes.author: Joe Klaas

quotes.quote: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you’re doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: The longer I live, the more I observe that carrying around anger is the most debilitating to the person who bears it.
quotes.author: Katharine Graham

quotes.quote: Something my mum taught me years and years and years ago, is life’s just too short to carry around a great bucket-load of anger and resentment and bitterness and hatreds and all that sort of stuff.
quotes.author: Kevin Rudd

quotes.quote: Don't hold to anger, hurt or pain. They steal your energy and keep you from love.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Anger is a killing thing: it kills the man who angers, for each rage leaves him less than he had been before – it takes something from him.
quotes.author: Louis L’Amour

quotes.quote: Anger, if not restrained, is frequently more hurtful to us than the injury that provokes it.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Man should forget his anger before he lies down to sleep.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Anger is the enemy of non-violence and pride is a monster that swallows it up.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Anger and intolerance are the enemies of correct understanding.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Usually when people are sad, they don't do anything. They just cry over their condition. But when they get angry, they bring about a change.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Consider how much more you often suffer from your anger and grief, than from those very things for which you are angry and grieved.
quotes.author: Marcus Antonius

quotes.quote: When angry, count to four; when very angry, swear.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The opposite of anger is not calmness, its empathy.
quotes.author: Mehmet Oz

quotes.quote: There are three things all wise men fear: the sea in storm, a night with no moon, and the anger of a gentle man.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: The strong man is not the good wrestler; the strong man is the only one who controls himself when he is angry.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad

quotes.quote: A fool gives full vent to his anger, but a wise man keeps himself under control.
quotes.author: PROVERBS 29:11

quotes.quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There was never an angry man that thought his anger unjust.
quotes.author: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.quote: He that will be angry for anything will be angry for nothing.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: It is a waste of time to be angry about my disability. One has to get on with life and I haven't done badly. People won’t have time for you if you are always angry or complaining.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: If you don’t control your temper. Your temper will control you.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Anger is like a storm rising up from the bottom of your consciousness. When you feel it coming, turn your focus to your breath.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Two things a man should never be angry at: What he can help, and what he cannot help.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: When angry count to ten before you speak. If very angry, count to one hundred.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: If it won’t matter in 5 years, don’t spend more than 5 minutes getting angry about it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Anger is the emotion preeminently serviceable for the display of power.
quotes.author: Walter B. Cannon

quotes.quote: It is impossible for you to be angry and laugh at the same time. Anger and laughter are mutually exclusive and you have the power to choose either.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: My tongue will tell the anger of my heart, or else my heart concealing it will break.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Anger is a great force. If you control it, it can be transmuted into a power which can move the whole world.
quotes.author: William Shenstone

quotes.quote: Love is looking at the same mountains from different angles.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Look at situations from all angles, and you will become more open.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: View life through a wide angle lens attitude and see your horizons broaden.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: The state of minds vary according to the angle under which one examines them.
quotes.author: Ella Maillart

quotes.quote: There are an infinity of angles at which one falls, only one at which one stands.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Every fight is one between different angles of vision illuminating the same truth
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: From some angles, up is toward the earth and down toward the sky, and everything—people, horses, cathedrals, dreams—is suspended over the ceaseless void, barely hanging on.
quotes.author: Rachel Hartman

quotes.quote: Every man of genius sees the world at a different angle from his fellows, and there is his tragedy.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: The more we view the country through the prism of Aboriginality, the more likely we are to get the angle right.
quotes.author: Paul Keating

quotes.quote: As you get older, you see the world at a different angle, maybe more cynically, but I just bury my anger.
quotes.author: Zach Galifianakis

quotes.quote: Everybody has an angle. The only time I say no to an interview is when someone says they don't have an angle. I know right away that that's not honest.
quotes.author: Steven Crowder

quotes.quote: All you need is a bad angle and suddenly youre 30 pounds overweight.
quotes.author: Rachel Hunter

quotes.quote: As long as you do the best work that you can and not make it bland... because you're going down a lane that is trying to make everybody happy. You have to take an angle on these things.
quotes.author: Gerard Butler

quotes.quote: Even if someone is already in your market space, ask yourself whether you can approach it from a different angle and thereby secure your own customer base.
quotes.author: Benjamin Cohen

quotes.quote: The best angle from which to approach any problem is the try-angle.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I suppose my formula might be: dream, diversify and never miss an angle.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Nothing is taboo if you have an angle on it.
quotes.author: Sarah Silverman

quotes.quote: A figure with curves always offers a lot of interesting angles.
quotes.author: Wesley Ruggles

quotes.quote: Creativity arises from our ability to see things from many different angles.
quotes.author: Keri Smith

quotes.quote: Like many features of a landscape, knowledge looks different from different angles.
quotes.author: David Bloor

quotes.quote: What is life but the angle of vision? A man is measured by the angle at which he looks at objects.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you focus too much on development of the visual angle, it could be a detriment to what you're doing musically.
quotes.author: Grimes

quotes.quote: To knock a thing down, especially if it is cocked at an arrogant angle, is a deep delight of the blood.
quotes.author: George Santayana
