quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: I would rather have questions that can't be answered than answers that can't be questioned.
quotes.author: Richard Feynman

quotes.quote: To get answers, ask questions; but to get good answers, ask good questions.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Live your questions now, and perhaps even without knowing it, you will live along some distant day into your answers.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: There are always answers...We just fail to notice them.
quotes.author: Sahina

quotes.quote: He who asks questions, cannot avoid the answers
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: I refuse to answer that question on the grounds that I don't know the answer.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: A wise man's question contains half the answer.
quotes.author: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

quotes.quote: Life is made up of constant calls to action, and we seldom have time for more than hastily contrived answers.
quotes.author: Learned Hand

quotes.quote: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems - not people; to focus your energies on answers - not excuses.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Man is a question; woman is an answer. The mistake women make today is to offer themselves as answers before being questioned.
quotes.author: Jose Bergamin

quotes.quote: You're like a wrong answer to the unpredictable question. Busy asking for certainty, you're like the wrong answer to which I am compelled to attempt, knowing that it won't be correct hoping to score full marks.
quotes.author: Mrunjan

quotes.quote: Our desires always disappoint us; for though we meet with something that gives us satisfaction, yet it never thoroughly answers our expectation.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The ant is knowing and wise, but he doesn't know enough to take a vacation.
quotes.author: Clarence Day

quotes.quote: If ants are such busy workers, how come they find time to go to all the picnics?
quotes.author: Marie Dressler

quotes.quote: Ants are good citizens; they place group interest first. But they carry it so far, they have few or no political rights. An ant doesn't have the vote, apparently; he just has his duties.
quotes.author: Clarence Day

quotes.quote: An ant on the move does more than a dozing ox.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The ant's a centaur in his dragon world.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: Ants and savages put strangers to death.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Ants in the house seem to be, not intruders, but the owners.
quotes.author: Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

quotes.quote: An ant has no quarrel with a boot.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: If ants had nuclear weapons, they would probably end the world in a week.
quotes.author: Bert Holldobler

quotes.quote: Ants, fighting together, will vanquish the lion.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.quote: It's only when you look at an ant through a magnifying glass on a sunny day that you realize how often they burst into flames.
quotes.author: Harry Hill

quotes.quote: The ant is a collectively intelligent and individually stupid animal; man is the opposite.
quotes.author: Karl von Frisch

quotes.quote: Not every ant which stays under the elephant's foot dies; the most powerful cannot always kill the weakest!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Every ant  knows the  formula of its ant-hill, every  bee knows  the formula  of its  beehive. They know it  in their own way, not in our way. Only humankind does not know its own formula.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Ants can live together in solidarity and forget themselves in the community. In a normative capitalist society, everyone is an egoist. In the ants' civilization, you are part of the group; you don't live for yourself alone.
quotes.author: Bernard Werber

quotes.quote: What is it about the ant way of life that has stood the test of time so well? All ants belong to extended families, and carry their prey home to share. Unselfishness is the rule. Everything they do is for their colony's good.
quotes.author: Bill Mason

quotes.quote: An ant is a wise creature for itself, but it is a shrewd thing, in an orchard or garden.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The idiotic industry of an ant building his hill in the path of a glacier, and imagining that he is free.
quotes.author: John Clellon Holmes

quotes.quote: If an ant carries an object a hundred times its weight, you can carry burdens many times your size.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: It is the ant, not the lion, which the elephant fears.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: An ant may well destroy a whole dam.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.quote: Ants are more like the parts of an animal than entities on their own. They are mobile cells, circulating through a dense connective tissue of other ants in a matrix of twigs. The circuits are so intimately interwoven that the anthill meets all the essential criteria of an organism.
quotes.author: Lewis Thomas

quotes.quote: The ants and the bees are, in many ways, far more intelligent and ingenious; they manage their government with vastly less quarreling, wastefulness and imbecility.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Ants are a terrific analogy for the route to success. They will go over, under, around, or through whatever gets in their way. They never stop moving, and neither should you. Take the word impossible and turn it into I'm Possible.
quotes.author: Honoree Corder

quotes.quote: Ants are not only efficient, they are hard-working and thrifty, qualities which have always seemed like good reasons for seeing them as virtuous role models.
quotes.author: William Morton Wheeler

quotes.quote: The greatest enemies of ants are other ants, just as the greatest enemies of men are other men.
quotes.author: Auguste Forel

quotes.quote: For example, the tiny ant, a creature of great industry, drags with its mouth whatever it can, and adds it to the heap which she is piling up, not unaware nor careless of the future.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: The instincts of the ant are very unimportant, considered as the ants; but the moment a ray of relation is seen to be a monitor, a little body with a mighty heart, then all its habits, even that said to be recently observed, that it never sleeps, become sublime.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Go to the ant, thou sluggard; consider her ways, and be wise.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: If army ants are wandering around and they get lost, they start to follow a simple rule:Just do what the ant in front of you does. The ants eventually end up in a circle. There's this famous example of one that was 1,200 feet long and lasted for two days; the ants just kept marching around and around in a circle until they died.
quotes.author: James Surowiecki

quotes.quote: To an ant on the ground, an airplane probably looks like an ant.
quotes.author: Amanda Bynes

quotes.quote: The life of an ant and the life of my child should be accorded equal respect.
quotes.author: Wayne Pacelle

quotes.quote: Next time you see an ant, remember: winter is coming! The best time to prepare for tomorrow is today.
quotes.author: Haddon W. Robinson

quotes.quote: It would seem that the ant works its way tentatively, and, observing where it fails, tries another place and succeeds.
quotes.author: Richard Jefferies

quotes.quote: Each of us deserves the freedom to pursue our own version of happiness. No one deserves to be bullied.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The common mistake that bullies make is assuming that because someone is nice that he or she is weak. Those traits have nothing to do with each other. In fact, it takes considerable strength and character to be a good person.
quotes.author: Mary Elizabeth William

quotes.quote: Bullying is never fun, it's a cruel and terrible thing to do to someone. If you are being bullied, it is not your fault. No one deserves to be bullied, ever.
quotes.author: Raini Rodriguez

quotes.quote: Some people won't be happy until they've pushed you to the ground. What you have to do is have the courage to stand your ground and not give them the time of day. Hold on to your power and never give it away.
quotes.author: Donna Schoenrock

quotes.quote: Bullying builds character like nuclear waste creates superheroes. It's a rare occurrence and often does much more damage than endowment.
quotes.author: Zack W. Van

quotes.quote: You will never reach higher ground if you are always pushing others down.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Benjamin

quotes.quote: Bullying is the manifestation of an infantile and primitive need to become the leader of the pack. The modern day bully believes he is a human being, but he is an animal.
quotes.author: Bona

quotes.quote: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life; define yourself.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.quote: Bullying is killing our kids. Being different is killing our kids and the kids who are bullying are dying inside. We have to save our kids whether they are bullied or they are bullying. They are all in pain.
quotes.author: Cat Cora

quotes.quote: When people hurt you over and over, think of them like sand paper. They may scratch and hurt you a bit, but in the end, you end up polished and they end up useless.
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.quote: Children should be able to live a life free from bullying and harassment and it is time that we all took a stand against this.
quotes.author: Katherine Jenkins

quotes.quote: If people are trying to bring you down, it only means you are above them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: They're not bullying you because of you, they're bullying you because of how they are.
quotes.author: Jessie J

quotes.quote: Words have great power that could make or break others...so please be careful with them.
quotes.author: Timothy Pina

quotes.quote: I would rather be a little nobody, then to be a evil somebody.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: I realized that bullying never has to do with you. It's the bully who's insecure.
quotes.author: Shay Mitchell

quotes.quote: Don't ever let anyone bring you down, define who you are or destroy your AWESOMENESS.
quotes.author: Tanya Masse

quotes.quote: Don't you ever let a soul in the world tell you that you can't be exactly who you are.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: What if the kid you bullied at school, grew up, and turned out to be the only surgeon who could save your life?
quotes.author: Lynette Mather

quotes.quote: When you hold people up for ridicule, you have to take responsibility when other people act on it.
quotes.author: Jay Asher

quotes.quote: The Practical joker can be a funny guy, until he finds someone who doesn't find him funny. Then the bully within him has identified a potential victim.
quotes.author: Barrisdoff

quotes.quote: You always have to remember that bullies want to bring you down because you have something that they admire. Also, when you get made fun of-when people point out your weaknesses, it's an opportunity for you to rise above.
quotes.author: Zac Efron

quotes.quote: Bullies are always cowards at heart and may be credited with a pretty safe instinct in scenting their prey.
quotes.author: Anna Julia Cooper

quotes.quote: Courage is fire, and bullying is smoke.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Bullying is a horrible thing. It sticks with you forever. It poisons you. But only if you let it.
quotes.author: Heather Brewer

quotes.quote: Bullying doesn't solve anything. Love does. Learning what love is will be the first step in turning all of this around.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you let a bully intimidate you, he's going to do it again. You've got to stand up to these strong-arm tactics.
quotes.author: Charles Djou

quotes.quote: Bullying does much more damage than you'll ever know. When you have thoughts of bullying or doing or saying anything mean to anyone—don't do it, just let it go.
quotes.author: Ty Howard

quotes.quote:
Words have power, and sometimes, they stay with
you for life. It's up to you to allow those words to define who you become.
quotes.author: Daniele Lanzarotta

quotes.quote: Bullying is not gonna stop, but we can at least be confident enough to stand up to it.
quotes.author: Greyson Chance

quotes.quote: Life is a fight, but not everyone's a fighter. Otherwise, bullies would be an endangered species.
quotes.author: Andrew Vachss

quotes.quote: Faith and determination spares us from five evils: bullies, teasers, haters, mean-spirited people, and false friends.
quotes.author: Ty Howard

quotes.quote: Fighting means you could lose. Bullying means you can't. A bully wants to beat somebody; he doesn't want to fight somebody.
quotes.author: Andrew Vachss

quotes.quote: Bullying needs to stop. When will people learn that it's not okay to be mean to someone just because you don't like how they were born.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: A BULLY is someone who believes in Behaving Ugly, Looking Lame, Yelling Ignorance, and Needing Game.
quotes.author: Ty Howard

quotes.quote: Bullying is cruel so don't act like a fool. Meaness is a sign of weakness.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Stop Bullying. No one deserves to feel worthless.
quotes.author: Rebecca Black

quotes.quote: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Bullying consists of the least competent most aggressive employee projecting their incompetence on to the least aggressive most competent employee and winning.
quotes.author: Tim Field

quotes.quote: Aggressive, scowling and critical attitude in our relations, with our friends or subordinates, is another form of bullying.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you can't, continue to be nice to them. Eventually, they may start being nice. A bully wants to have friends, too.
quotes.author: Cara Van Ness

quotes.quote: Bullying exists because of a lack of adult intervention.
quotes.author: Stuart Green

quotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up.
quotes.author: John Holmes

quotes.quote: Be kind for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The test of courage comes when we are in the minority. The test of tolerance comes when we are in the majority.
quotes.author: Ralph W. Sockman

quotes.quote: Knowing what’s right doesn’t mean much unless you do what’s right.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Don’t you ever let a soul in the world tell you that you can’t be exactly who you are.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: True courage is cool and calm. The bravest of men have the least of a brutal, bullying insolence, and in the very time of danger are found the most serene and free.
quotes.author: Lord Shaftesbury

quotes.quote: You have power over your mind – not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: All it takes is one good friend and school is a good place to be.
quotes.author: Judy H. Wright

quotes.quote: Encourage don't belittle, embrace their individuality. And show them that no matter what they will always have value if they stay true to themselves.
quotes.author: Solange nicole

quotes.quote: Open your eyes, and let everyone be free. Free to be you and free to be me. Take comfort in knowing we are all leaves on the same big, beautiful tree.
quotes.author: Jennifer Sodini

quotes.quote:
How to change the world:
• spread positivity
• bring people up instead of dragging them down
• treat others the way you wish to be treated.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: There's no room for hate and violence in this world. We must learn to be more kind, compassionate, empathetic, and sympathetic to humanity.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Sticks and stones will break your bones if you ever try to cut me with your words.
quotes.author: Taylor Parsons

quotes.quote: A person who posses a cunning attitude are not always academically intelligent, but they are considered clever because they can manipulate and cause harm towards others in order to gain something out of them for their own benefit. They can be defeated if people stand up towards them and point out their actual inappropriate behavioral activities with logical reasoning.
quotes.author: Saaif Alam

quotes.quote: One's dignity may be assaulted, vandalized and cruelly mocked, but it can never be taken away unless it is surrendered.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: Isn’t it kind of silly to think that tearing someone else down builds you up?
quotes.author: Sean Covey

quotes.quote: People who love themselves, don’t hurt other people. The more we hate ourselves, the more we want others to suffer.
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: If they don’t like you for being yourself, be yourself even more.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: People who repeatedly attack your confidence and self-esteem are quite aware of your potential, even if you are not.
quotes.author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.quote: Perhaps it is only human nature to inflict suffering on anything that will endure suffering, whether by reason of its genuine humility, or indifference, or sheer helplessness.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzaca

quotes.quote: We explain when someone is cruel or acts like a bully, you do not stoop to their level. Our motto is when they go low, you go high.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote:
Life is full of choices all your whole life through.
So let us raise our voices and sing about the thing we all should do.I'm gonna be the kind of person that I like to be around
I'm gonna be the kind of friend that I'm always glad I found.
quotes.author: Jim Rule

quotes.quote:
Don’t be bossy
Don’t be mean
I’m here to tell you just what I mean
Be nice. Be nice.
Now I have told you twice …be nice.
quotes.author: Todd Werner

quotes.quote:
Did someone hurt you
Make you feel small
You take it out on me
'Cause it makes you feel tall
I bet you're scared and alone
If you looked in my eyes, you'd see
Hey, bully, you're a lot like me.
quotes.author: Morgan Roxanne Frazier

quotes.quote: You should go home and be a kid. And remember, the next time you run into a bully that there is some goodness in there.
quotes.author: Jerry Siegel

quotes.quote: Racism is the oldest form of bullying.
quotes.author: Jerry Siegel

quotes.quote: Bullies only have power if you let them.
quotes.author: Aaron Korsh

quotes.quote: Educators need to learn all facets of bullying and examine the relationships in their classrooms. The relationships teachers from with children and the relationships teachers help students establisj can stifle or fuel abuse.
quotes.author: Phyllis Kaufman Goodstein

quotes.quote: Anti-bullying policies are quite likely to be included in behaviour programmes and to run alongside other policies such as special needs policies, or anti-racist policies, with which they will partly overlap.
quotes.author: Tiny Arora

quotes.quote: Part of the anti-bullying policy needs to include arrangements for reviewing the effectiveness of the project, normally on an annual basis, using accumulated evidence from surveys of various kinds.
quotes.author: Tiny Arora

quotes.quote: Initiatives taken by various local education authorities during the 1990s have demonstrated that the anti-bullying programme is an area where education professionals based outside schools can be helpful to schools.
quotes.author: Tiny Arora

quotes.quote: One of the most essential mechanisms for garnering school community support for anti-bullying initiatives is to convene a committee of individuals to assist in the initiative as member of an anti-bullying committee.
quotes.author: Elizabeth A. Barton

quotes.quote: In most cases, anti-bullying initiatives may be cleanly placed within the current school safety plan.
quotes.author: Elizabeth A. Barton

quotes.quote: The anti-bullying plan should also include a careful analysis of the playground area-the most common site of bullying, particularly in elementary grades.
quotes.author: Elizabeth A. Barton

quotes.quote: Environmental factors such as unstructured play areas may foster bullying and exclusion and increase boredom, competition, and conflict if resources are scarce.
quotes.author: Elizabeth A. Barton

quotes.quote: The purpose of an anti-bullying policy is to promote a consistent approach and to create a climate in which all types of bullying are regarded unacceptable.
quotes.author: Elizabeth A. Barton

quotes.quote: The anti-bullying policies should have very clear goals and objectives that are necessary to develop appropriate programming.
quotes.author: Elizabeth A. Barton

quotes.quote: Anti-bullying policies usually share a common goal: to promote a safe and secure learning envirorment for students, free from threat, harassment, and bullying (physical, verbal, relational, sexual).
quotes.author: Elizabeth A. Barton

quotes.quote: The anti-bullying policy is an important step in creating a safe school climate that allows victims or witnesses to bullying to relax and focus their attention on learning rather than staying safe.
quotes.author: Elizabeth A. Barton

quotes.quote: Bullying does not have to be a part of life. Bullying is not an instance of 'blowing off steam'.
quotes.author: Mona O'Moore

quotes.quote: Bullying may occur in many schools, but it should be worried about, and should never be accepted.
quotes.author: Mona O'Moore

quotes.quote: Words do cause hard, and bullying is always harmful.
quotes.author: Mona O'Moore

quotes.quote: Being bullied never did anybody any favours. All it does is to destroy a person's confidence and sel-esteem, and to cause physical, emotional and psychological damage of the potentially most serious and long-lasting kind.
quotes.author: Mona O'Moore

quotes.quote: Bullying is a process, thus all aggressive acts must be challenged in order to interrupt the process.
quotes.author: Mona O'Moore

quotes.quote: Anyone within the school community may become involved in bullying and aggressive behavious, either as a perpetrator or as a victim.
quotes.author: Mona O'Moore

quotes.quote: Parents are a critical group, in terms of anti-bullying efforts, because they often become aware of bullying problems before schools do.
quotes.author: Mona O'Moore

quotes.quote: This world of ours must avoid becoming a community of dreadful fear and hate, and be, instead, a proud confederation of mutual trust and respect.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: The more money you spend on guns, the less money you spend on people! More weapons, less happiness; more guns, more misery!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A country which prefers guns to flowers will live the beauty of the flowers only in its graveyards!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Whoever wants peace among nations must seek to limit the state and its influence most strictly.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: The real and lasting victories are those of peace and not of war.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: No more war, war never again! Peace, it is peace which must guide the destinies of people and of all mankind.
quotes.author: Pope Paul VI

quotes.quote: Bullets cannot be recalled. They cannot be uninvented. But they can be taken out of the gun.
quotes.author: Martin Amis

quotes.quote: Free nations are peaceful nations. Free nations don't attack each other. Free nations don't develop weapons of mass destruction.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: No weapon has ever settled a moral problem. It can impose a solution but it cannot guarantee it to be a just one.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The means of defense against foreign danger historically have become the instruments of tyranny at home.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: Nonintervention does not mean that nothing happens. It means that something else happens.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: Those who give up essential liberties for temporary safety deserve neither liberty nor safety.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: All forms of violence, especially war, are totally unacceptable as means to settle disputes between and among nations, groups and persons.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: Peace, commerce and honest friendship with all nations; entangling alliances with none.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: A man who says that no patriot should attack the war until it is over is saying no good son should warn his mother of a cliff until she has fallen.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: No war has ever won in the history, because people died in every single war! Where there are deaths, there is no victory!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It is in unity that we find strength, in unity we find hope, and in unity we can stand firm as the darkness approaches. Let us stand together and stand firm against the many faces of hate.
quotes.author: Nick Lowles

quotes.quote: War is an instrument entirely inefficient toward redressing wrong; and multiplies, instead of indemnifying losses.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: If you're anti-war it doesn't mean you are pro one side or the other in a conflict.
quotes.author: Eddie Vedder

quotes.quote: Protecting the rights of even the least individual among us is basically the only excuse the government has for even existing.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The nationalist not only does not disapprove of atrocities committed by his own side, but he has a remarkable capacity for not even hearing about them.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: No more wars, no more bloodshed. Peace unto you. Shalom, salaam, forever.
quotes.author: Menachem Begin

quotes.quote: Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Of all the enemies of public liberty, war is perhaps the most to be dreaded, because it comprises and develops the germ of every other.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: Society has arisen out of the works of peace; the essence of society is peacemaking. Peace and not war is the father of all things.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: Sometimes war takes an arm, or an eye, or it takes two legs from us, but above all the war takes our belief in humanity away from us!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It is our true policy to steer clear of entangling alliances with any portion of the foreign world.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: War is the greatest plague that can afflict humanity, it destroys religion, it destroys states, it destroys families. Any scourge is preferable to it.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Make no mistake: the anti-war voices long for us to lose any war they cannot prevent.
quotes.author: Ralph Peters

quotes.quote: Expecting is the greatest impediment to living. In anticipation of tomorrow, it loses today.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: An intense anticipation itself transforms possibility into reality; our desires being often but precursors of the things which we are capable of performing.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: Anticipation, I suppose, sometimes exceeds realization.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: By anticipation we sugar misery and enjoy happiness before they are in being. We can set the sun and stars forward, or lose sight of them by wandering into those retired parts of eternity when the heavens and earth shall be no more.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Anticipation leads the way to victory, and is the spur to conquest.
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.quote: The idea of waiting for something makes it more exciting.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Anticipate the difficult by managing the easy.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Anticipation was the soul of enjoyment.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gaskell

quotes.quote: Perpetual anticipation is good for the soul but it's bad for the heart.
quotes.author: Stephen Joshua Sondheim

quotes.quote: Anticipation - It's a ticklish thing really, Quivering, exciting, waiting, Until it dies - Killed by it's own self Lost through virtue of being there
quotes.author: Dal Perry

quotes.quote: Never forget that anticipation is an important part of life. Work's important, family's important, but without excitement, you have nothing. You're cheating yourself if you refuse to enjoy what's coming.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Looking forward to things is half the pleasure of them.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: We love to expect, and when expectation is either disappointed or gratified, we want to be again expecting.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: We need the sweet pain of anticipation to tell us we are really alive.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Oft expectation fails, and most oft there where most it promises; and oft it hits where hope is coldest, and despair most fits.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It is expectation makes a blessing dear; heaven were not heaven if we knew what it were.
quotes.author: John Suckling

quotes.quote: Anticipation is a gift. Perhaps there is none greater. Anticipation is born of hope. Indeed it is hope's finest expression.
quotes.author: Steven L. Peck

quotes.quote: Anticipating pain was like enduring it twice. Why not anticipate pleasure instead?
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.quote: Anticipation is making me late, it's keeping me waiting.
quotes.author: Carly Simon

quotes.quote: Anticipation makes pleasure more intense.
quotes.author: Iris Johansen

quotes.quote: When you expect things to happen - strangely enough - they do happen.
quotes.author: J. P. Morgan

quotes.quote: Live with the anticipation that something incredible might happen at any time.
quotes.author: Sharon Gannon

quotes.quote: Anticipation! It occurred to him that his anticipation was more pleasant to him than the experiencing.
quotes.author: Patricia Highsmith

quotes.quote: Expectation is the mother of all frustration.
quotes.author: Antonio Banderas

quotes.quote: Wait for it, wait for it! Anticipation is half the fun, So I've been told...
quotes.author: Phil Collins

quotes.quote: Anticipation is the greater part of pleasure.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: The excitement of anticipation was *almost* equal to the thrill of lovemaking ...
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.quote: Never yield to gloomy anticipation. Place your hope and confidence in God. He has no record of failure.
quotes.author: Lettie Cowman

quotes.quote: Anticipation is sometimes more exciting than actual events.
quotes.author: Ana Monnar

quotes.quote: Somehow the anticipation of pain can be even more troubling, more a misery than the pain itself.
quotes.author: Joanne Harris

quotes.quote: Of all the hardships a person had to face, none was more punishing than the simple act of waiting.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: If you come at four in the afternoon, I'll begin to be happy by three.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Engage people with what they expect, it is what they are able to discern and confirms their projections. It settles them into predictable patterns of response, occupying their minds while you wait for the extraordinary moment that which they cannot anticipate.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: There is no terror in the bang, only in the anticipation of it.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: The reason why most people face the future with apprehension instead of anticipation is because they don't have it well designed!
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: There are two ways to face the future. One way is with apprehension; the other is with anticipation.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Anticipation of pleasure is, in itself, a very considerable pleasure.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: We act as though comfort and luxury were the chief requirements in life, when all we need to make us really happy is something to be enthusiastic about.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: I live in the present. I only remember the past, and anticipate the future.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: As Daddy said, life is 95 percent anticipation.
quotes.author: Gloria Swanson

quotes.quote: Fear defeats more people than any other one thing in the world.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Having a dream is what keeps you alive. Overcoming the challenges makes life worth living.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.quote: Wisdom consists of the anticipation of consequences.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: This is the precept by which I have lived. Prepare for the worst; expect the best and take what comes.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: One of the most delightful things about a garden is the anticipation it provides.
quotes.author: W. E. Johns

quotes.quote: We usually get what we anticipate.
quotes.author: Claude M. Bristol

quotes.quote: Anticipation and Hope are born twins.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: The most glorious moments in your life are not the so-called days of success, but rather those days when out of dejection and despair you feel rise in you a challenge to life, and the promise of future accomplishments.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: People don't realize that now is all there ever is there is no past or future except as memory or anticipation in your mind.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Conscience in most men, is but the anticipation of the opinions of others.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: He who matures early lives in anticipation.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: If pleasures are greatest in anticipation, just remember that this is also true of trouble.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Such is the state of life, that none are happy but by the anticipation of change, the change itself is nothing when we have made it, the next wish is to change again.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Our desires always disappoint us for though we meet with something that gives us satisfaction, yet it never thoroughly answers our expectation.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: I have good anticipation, and good reaction to the the ball because I've played so many matches in my life.
quotes.author: Martina Hingis

quotes.quote: The truth is, that no mind is much employed upon the present recollection and anticipation fill up almost all our moments.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Successful investing is anticipating the anticipations of others.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.quote: Those who are animated by hope can perform what would seem impossibilities to those who are under the depressing influence of fear.
quotes.author: Maria Edgeworth

quotes.quote: I may be an antique like the Stones, but antiques are valuable.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: An antique is anything old with class.
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: Antique things have an appreciation and worth. Something can be old, but it can be timeless; therefore, it becomes an antique. If this antique is preserved and deemed precious, it could be passed down as a family heirloom.
quotes.author: CeeLo Green

quotes.quote: Veil after veil of thin dusky gauze is lifted, and by degrees the forms and colours of things are restored to them, and we watch the dawn remaking the world in its antique pattern.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Japanese would never 'restore' an antique. The signs of age and wear are to them its most beautiful qualiities.
quotes.author: Thomas Hoover

quotes.quote: Too much perfection and wonderfulness takes away the antique.
quotes.author: Faizu

quotes.quote: Men’s brains are only attics stuffed with disused antiques.
quotes.author: Benjamin de Casseres

quotes.quote: Far from the truth lay the antique assumption that man had fathered the weapon. The weapon, instead, had fathered man.
quotes.author: Robert Ardrey

quotes.quote: Our admiration of the antique is not admiration of the old, but of the natural.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A house with old furniture has no need of ghosts to be haunted.
quotes.author: Hope Mirrlees

quotes.quote: On the other hand, I don't understand the enthusiasm for everything in the antique shop that Grandma threw out. There, the sense of quality has declined; otherwise Grandma wouldn't have thrown it out.
quotes.author: Arne Jacobsen

quotes.quote: I don't get attached to anything. I'm like a good antique dealer. I'm prepared to sell my most valuable table.
quotes.author: Ridley Scott

quotes.quote: It is not architectural achievement that makes the structures of earlier times seem to us so full of significance but the circumstance that antique temples, Roman basilicas, and even the cathedrals of the Middle Ages are not the works of single personalities but creations of entire epochs.
quotes.author: Ludwig Mies Van Der Rohe

quotes.quote: Give me insight into today and you may have the antique and future world.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: More strange than true I never may believe these antique fables, nor these fairy toys.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The woods of Arcady are dead, And over is their antique joy; Of old the world on dreaming fed Gray Truth is now her painted toy.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Forget about wrinkles, they are just antique smiles.
quotes.author: L. Chatterjee

quotes.quote: What makes my language special is it is Antique, it is unique, its simplicity attracts everyone all over the world.
quotes.author: Mohammed Tariq

quotes.quote: When we're young, everyone over the age of thirty looks middle-aged, everyone over fifty antique. And time, as it goes by, confirms that we weren't that wrong. Those little age differentials, so crucial and so gross when we are young erode. We end up all belonging to the same category, that of the non-young. I've never much minded this myself.
quotes.author: Julian Barnes

quotes.quote: Be a person with character. Because you will find followers everywhere. But rulers are not extinct. Be the first one to rule by creating the trend. Beacuse Antique pieces are not made again.
quotes.author: Padmaja Kar

quotes.quote: In youth, love and art. In age, investments and antiques.
quotes.author: Mason Coley

quotes.quote: Wheresoe'er I turn my view, All is strange, yet nothing new: Endless labor all along, Endless labor to be wrong: Phrase that Time has flung away; Uncouth words in disarray, Trick'd in antique ruff and bonnet, Ode, and elegy, and sonnet.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Antique things are not only seen in Museums, but there should be an antique mind which can find unique things to its surroundings.
quotes.author: Simran Narola

quotes.quote: When people complain of your complexity, they fail to remember that they made fun of your simplicity.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Humans are naturally social; civilization causes us to be antisocial.
quotes.author: Kirk D. Sinclair

quotes.quote: Self abuse is anti-social, aggression still natural.
quotes.author: Richey Edwards

quotes.quote: The theoretically unrestricted right to develop power, to wage war against other states, is antisocial and is doubly dangerous, because the state as a mass entity represents a low moral and intellectual level.
quotes.author: Christian Lous Lange

quotes.quote: And for this you must have quiet and solitude. But society does not allow you to have them. You must be with people, outwardly active at all costs. If you are alone you are considered antisocial or peculiar, or you are afraid of your own loneliness.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: To bring into the world an unwanted human being is as antisocial an act as murder.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: Nobody enjoys the company of others as intensely as someone who usually avoids the company of others.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: You might be an introvert if you were ready to go home before you left the house.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Anti-social behaviour still blights lives, wrecks communities and provides a pathway to criminality.
quotes.author: Theresa May

quotes.quote: Anti-social behavior is a trait of intelligence in a world full of conformists.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: Apparently when it's two people, it's quirky and funny, but when it's a person doing the same stuff on her own, it's rebellious and antisocial.
quotes.author: Katie Alender

quotes.quote: Nobody adopts antisocial behaviour unless they fear that they will fail if they remain on the social side of life.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: Sometimes those who don't socialize much aren't actually anti-social, they just have no tolerance for drama and fake people.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The trouble with not being into social networking is that people think you're anti social when you're only anti-networking.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: People with antisocial personality disorders aren't automatically bad, they simply approach the world with a more ruthless set of lenses. The lack of empathy or very weak empathy and the ability to read other people's weak spots can be a flammable combination when you get in the way of something they want. But they aren't a different species. They're a part of our spectrum.
quotes.author: Eden Robinson

quotes.quote: Being anti-social can also mean that you're aware of how annoying it is to be social.
quotes.author: Dov Davidoff

quotes.quote: If you think about computer programming, it's as antisocial as it gets.
quotes.author: Shawn Fanning

quotes.quote: I had been to the movies and had been annoyed, as one often is, by people chatting and commenting in the back row. This is the height of antisocial behavior, because it ruins the pleasure of others while bringing no benefit to the offender. I normally deal with it as I do when people in cinemas fail to turn off their cell phones. I turn around and tell them that I know where they live, and I know where their children go to school.
quotes.author: Hitchens

quotes.quote: But self-criticism is a luxury the anti-social cannot afford. Only the ane, balanced-person tries to correct his conduct
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: The antisocial personality may actually become ill if you try to assist him or her; he'll likely blame the sickness on your blame
quotes.author: Ruth Minshull

quotes.quote: How sweet, how passing sweet, is solitude! But grant me still a friend in my retreat, Whom I may whisper, solitude is sweet.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: We ought not to isolate ourselves, for we cannot remain in a state of isolation. Social intercourse makes us the more able to bear with ourselves and with others.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: I love to be alone. I never found the companion that was so companionable as solitude.
quotes.author: Thoreau

quotes.quote: I was so criticized for many years for being unsociable, but for me, how can you be mates with people you're trying to beat?
quotes.author: Nick Faldo

quotes.quote: It's easy to be unpopular with unpopular people, but it's harder to be unpopular with popular people...what I mean is the knowledge that it is okay to feel differently than the pack. That that is the fundamental right. That it's okay to disagree.
quotes.author: Whoopi Goldberg

quotes.quote: A free society is a society where it is safe to be unpopular.
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson

quotes.quote: It would be narcissistic of us to feel that we're alone in the universe.
quotes.author: Lindsay Crouse

quotes.quote: Perhaps someday psychiatrists will learn some way to help them pay the toll to that demon at the door, so narcissists can return to the human way of life. Let us hope for that day, but let us not, in the meantime, be dangerously naive.
quotes.author: Kathleen Krajco

quotes.quote: Narcissists don't just project their faults and failings onto you, they also project their feelings, emotions, and beliefs onto you.
quotes.author: Kathleen Krajco

quotes.quote: Narcissists feel abandonment so much that they are terribly insecure. Also, since they invest nothing but bad-faith in their end of a relationship, they think everybody is as untrustworthy as they.
quotes.author: Kathleen Krajco

quotes.quote: Socializing through an app, / Texting side by side, / Socially antisocial, / On a media-driven ride.
quotes.author: E.S. Conway

quotes.quote: To me, socializing was like sinking to the bottom of a deep, deep ocean... Until eventually you couldn't take it anymore and had to come up for air.
quotes.author: Hitoma Iruma

quotes.quote: But I guess that was the whole problem, at that point, my inability to deal with normal human interaction.
quotes.author: Kristen Roupenian

quotes.quote: One might have all sorts of reasons for avoiding people. It's none of our business.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: She doesn't want to see anyone. She's happy like that, I think. Always relieved at the end of a visit.
quotes.author: Helen Oyeyemi

quotes.quote: I am not antisocial, I just feel better when people are not around.
quotes.author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

quotes.quote: I'm on the benevolent side of antisocial. I don't mind people, but I'd prefer not to have a lot of them around.
quotes.author: J.R. Ward

quotes.quote: For introverts, to be alone with our thoughts is as restorative as sleeping, as nourishing as eating.
quotes.author: Jonathan Rauch

quotes.quote: I'm kind of an antisocial person. I realised when I was playing in bands that I wasn't that comfortable being on-stage, and I preferred to be behind-the-scenes. I like the seclusion of composing.
quotes.author: Cliff Martinez

quotes.quote: In a society as broken as ours, "antisocial" behavior is the only behavior worth defending.
quotes.author: Lauren McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Many people believe that introversion is about being antisocial, and that's really a misperception. Because actually, it's just that introverts are differently social. So they would prefer to have a glass of wine with a close friend as opposed to going to a loud party full of strangers.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: You could call me antisocial, I've called myself that sometimes too, but I just prefer to be alone, and that's nothing against you.
quotes.author: Dawud Wharnsby Ali

quotes.quote: Companionship is a foreign concept to some people. They fear it as much as the majority of people fear loneliness.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Introverts don't get lonely if they don't socialize with a lot of people, but we do get lonely if we don't have intimate interactions on a regular basis.
quotes.author: Sphia Dembling

quotes.quote: I enjoyed the discipline and solitariness of long-distance running, which allowed me to escape from the hurly-burly of school life.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Anxiety is the dizziness of freedom.
quotes.author: Sren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Anxiety is love's greatest killer. It makes others feel as you might when a drowning man holds on to you. You want to save him, but you know he will strangle you with his panic.
quotes.author: Anas Nin

quotes.quote: To hear the phrase "our only hope" always makes one anxious, because it means that if the only hope doesn't work, there is nothing left.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: Worrying is carrying tomorrow's load with today's strength- carrying two days at once. It is moving into tomorrow ahead of time. Worrying doesn't empty tomorrow of its sorrow, it empties today of its strength.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Anxiety's like a rocking chair. It gives you something to do, but it doesn't get you very far.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Its not stress that kills us, it is our reaction to it.
quotes.author: Hans Selye

quotes.quote: Anxiety is a thin stream of fear trickling through the mind. If encouraged, it cuts a channel into which all other thoughts are drained.
quotes.author: Arthur Somers Roche

quotes.quote: Don't let your mind bully your body into believing it must carry the burden of its worries.
quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

quotes.quote: Don't try to steer the river.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Anxiety is the hand maiden of creativity.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: People tend to dwell more on negative things than on good things. So the mind then becomes obsessed with negative things, with judgments, guilt and anxiety produced by thoughts about the future and so on.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Every tomorrow has two handles. We can take hold of it with the handle of anxiety or the handle of faith.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: I'm trying to stay as calm as possible and focus one day at a time, but when reality sets in, I feel everything: anxiety, excitement, nerves, pressure and joy.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: What else does anxiety about the future bring you but sorrow upon sorrow?
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: Anxiety is a thin stream of fear trickling through the mind. If encouraged, it cuts a channel into which all other thoughts are drained.
quotes.author: Robert Albert Bloch

quotes.quote: Fear can, though it is not God, create something from nothing.
quotes.author: Caspar De Aguilar

quotes.quote: We probably wouldn't worry about what people think about us if we knew how seldom they do.
quotes.author: Olin Miller

quotes.quote: Fears are educated into us and can, if we wish, be educated out.
quotes.author: Karl A. Menninger

quotes.quote: He who fears he will suffer, already suffers from his fear.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Do not anticipate trouble, or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: There are more things to alarm us than to harm us, and we suffer more often in apprehension than reality.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Borrow trouble for yourself, if that's your nature, but don't lend it to your neighbors.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: The misfortunes hardest to bear are these which never came.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: Who's not sat tense before his own heart's curtain.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Don't waste your life in doubts and fears: spend yourself on the work before you, well assured that the right performance of this hour's duties will be the best preparation for the hours or ages that follow it.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: No longer forward nor behind I look in hope and fear; But grateful take the good I find, The best of now and here.
quotes.author: John G. Whittier

quotes.quote: Never let life's hardships disturb you ... no one can avoid problems, not even saints or sages.
quotes.author: Nichiren Daishonen

quotes.quote: It is not work that kills men, it is worry. Work is healthy; you can hardly put more on a man than he can bear. But worry is rust upon the blade. It is not movement that destroys the machinery, but friction.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The mind that is anxious about future events is miserable.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Like dogs in a wheel, birds in a cage, or squirrels in a chain, ambitious men still climb and climb, with great labor, and incessant anxiety, but never reach the top.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Anxiety destroys scale, and suffering makes us lose perspective.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: We walk in circles, so limited by our own anxieties that we can no longer distinguish between true and false, between the gangster's whim and the purest ideal.
quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

quotes.quote: Work done with anxiety about results is far inferior to work done without such anxiety, in the calm of self-surrender.
quotes.author: The Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: Do not be anxious about tomorrow, for tomorrow will be anxious for itself. Let the day's own trouble be sufficient for the day.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Christ told his disciples not to be anxious about tomorrow, but he never said not to consider tomorrow. Intelligent problem solving demands careful consideration of the future effects of present solutions.
quotes.author: R.C. Sproul

quotes.quote: Whenever a man allows himself to have anxieties, fears, or complaints, he must consider his behaviour as either a denial of the wisdom of God or as a confession that he is out of his will.
quotes.author: Williams Law

quotes.quote: Anxiety is the mark of spiritual insecurity.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: You can never become a great man or woman until you have overcome anxiety, worry, and fear. It is impossible for an anxious person, a worried one, or a fearful one to perceive truth; all things are distorted and thrown out of their proper relations by suc
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: I'm just suggesting that when you're faced with fear and anxiety, don't medicate. Meditate instead.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.quote: A warrior of the light...never confuses tension with anxiety.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Anxiety is caused by lack of control, organization, preparation, and action.
quotes.author: David Kekich

quotes.quote: Anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strength.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: To each of man's ages the Lord gives its own anxieties.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: If we can recognize that change and uncertainty are basic principles, we can greet the future and the transformation we are undergoing with the understanding that we do not know enough to be pessimistic.
quotes.author: Hazel Henderson

quotes.quote: The experience of separateness arouses anxiety; it is, indeed, the source of all anxiety.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: You don't have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Anxiety is the space between the "now" and the "then.
quotes.author: Richard Abell

quotes.quote: Neither comprehension nor learning can take place in an atmosphere of anxiety.
quotes.author: Rose F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Anxiety is the essential condition of intellectual and artistic creation
quotes.author: Charles Frankel

quotes.quote: It requires a great deal of inexperience to be beyond the reach of anxiety.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Anxiety isn't all bad: at least it gives you something to think about while watching television.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Anxiety is like sand in a oyster: a little produces a pearl, too much kills the creature.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Most people are anxious to do a favor for those who don't need it.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The sense of anxiety and guilt doesn't come from having too much to do; it's the automatic result of breaking agreements with yourself.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Anxiety: the dizziness of freedom.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: No good work is ever done while the heart is hot and anxious and fretted.
quotes.author: Olive Schreiner

quotes.quote: A paranoid individual's characteristic problems with appearance, speech, thought, behavior, mood, insight, judgement, and intelligence when taken together trace recognizable pattern called the mental status.
quotes.author: Martin Kantor

quotes.quote: In some paranoid individuals the signs of change in appearance that occur are subtle.
quotes.author: Martin Kantor

quotes.quote: In some paranoid individuals the changes in appearance resemble those found in individuals who are depressed.
quotes.author: Martin Kantor

quotes.quote: Depressed paranoid individuals may use what they believe to be positive changes in their appearance to compensate for feeling defective.
quotes.author: Martin Kantor

quotes.quote: Paranoid individuals like individuals who are depressed feel pessimistic due to the belief that they will never have any sort of life.
quotes.author: Martin Kantor

quotes.quote: Being paranoid is accepting that you can see a very small window of a much larger reality.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: At any moment, there is always something that will take you down, you just have to wait for it, and most importantly watch for it.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: Paranoia is a hunch that is not yet proven.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: Everything is connected, that makes the world as dangerous as it is beautiful.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: Sometimes I get the feeling the whole world is against me, but deep down I know that's not true.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: My first psychiatrist said I was paranoid, but I want a second opinion because I think he's out to get me.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.quote: Anxiety is the wound of our times.
quotes.author: Sheryl Paul

quotes.quote: Anxiety, when approached from the mindset of learning, directs you to something deep inside that needs to be seen, a call from soul to pay attention, an invitation from the wellsprings of being to turn inward and heal at the next layer of growth.
quotes.author: Sheryl Paul

quotes.quote: Anxiety's emissaries arrive in many forms: worry, intrusive thoughts, obsessions, compulsions, insomnia, somatic symptoms. If we greet these emissaries with shame and try to sequester them into the far down, hidden recesses of psyche, they will gather in in numbers and strength until we are forced to listen.
quotes.author: Sheryl Paul

quotes.quote: Seeing anxiety and intrusive thoughts thoughts as wise manifestations of the unconscious is a vastly different view--and a much more hopeful and life enhancing view --of anxiety than one our culture holds.
quotes.author: Sheryl Paul

quotes.quote: Anxiety is a doorway into a self that longs for wholeness.
quotes.author: Sheryl Paul

quotes.quote: Anxiety is a meteor shower of what-ifs.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Fear results in fight or flight. Anxiety creates doom and gloom.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Anxiety and fear are cousins but not twins. Fear sees a threat. Anxiety imagines one.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: The presence of anxiety is unavoidable, but the prison of anxiety is optional.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Anxiety is not a sin; it is an emotion. Anxiety can, however, lead to sinful behavior.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Anxiety is life's inescapable accompaniment, its constant undertow. Every step we take offers it an opportunity; to avoid anxiety we would have to lock ourselves away.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Anxiety can be replaced only by the freedom whose harsh requirements are its cause.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Being free requires us to release the brakes that anxiety represents in order to accept and appropriate our proper spiritual fulfillment or perhaps even to recognize, if that is what we in the end believe, that no such prospect is in store.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: We truly live in anxious times. We're reacting instead of acting, leading and calming down.
quotes.author: Kathleen Smith

quotes.quote: When we feel threatened, we must respond to the threat. This is the simplest and best definition of anxiety: anxiety is your response to a real or imagined threat.
quotes.author: Kathleen Smith

quotes.quote: Our anxiety serves serves a very important purpose, because the central goal of being a human is simple: to not die for as long as you can.
quotes.author: Kathleen Smith

quotes.quote: Stress is an ignorant state. It believes that everything is an emergency. Nothing is that important.
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.quote: Worry is an addiction that interferes with compassion.
quotes.author: Deng Ming-Dao

quotes.quote: Rule number one is, don't sweat the small stuff. Rule number two is, it's all small stuff.
quotes.author: Robert Eliot

quotes.quote: If worrying were an Olympic sport, you'd get the gold for sure.
quotes.author: Stephenie Geist

quotes.quote: We are anxious in the face of our unchangeable past; we long to recreate segments of our private histories, but we are stuck with them.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Anxiety is a thin stream of fear trickling through the mind. If encouraged, it cuts a channel into which all other thoughts are drained.
quotes.author: Arthur Somers Roche

quotes.quote: Anxiety is the dizziness of freedom.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Anxiety is the handmaiden of contemporary ambition.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: The mind that is anxious about the future is miserable.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Anxiety's like a rocking chair. It gives you something to do, but it doesn't get you very far.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Don't be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Henry S. Haskins

quotes.quote: Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Worry ducks when purpose flies overhead.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Our anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strengths.
quotes.author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quotes.quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A pleasure a day keeps stress away.
quotes.author: Ethel Roskies

quotes.quote: The desire to annoy no one, to harm no one, can equally well be the sign of a just as of an anxious disposition.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: When thinking about life, remember this; No amount of guilt can solve the past and no amount of anxiety or worry can change the future.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Trust yourself. You've survived a lot, and you'll survive whatever is coming.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: Do not be anxious about tomorrow, for tomorrow will be anxious for itself. Let the day's own trouble be sufficient for the day.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.quote: Whoever has learned to be anxious in the right way has learned the ultimate.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Keep walking through the storm. Your rainbow is waiting on the other side.
quotes.author: Heather Stillufsen

quotes.quote: Worry, doubt, fear and despair are the enemies which slowly bring us down to the ground and turn us to dust before we die.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: Worry never robs tomorrow of its sorrow, it only saps today of its joy.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: A negative mind will never give a positive life.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Unexpected kindness is the most powerful, least costly, and most underrated agent of human change.
quotes.author: Bob Kerrey

quotes.quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Worrying is like sitting in a rocking chair. It gives you something to do, but it doesn't get you anywhere.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Worry trades the joy of now for the unlikely catastrophes of later.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: I think anything's possible! Whatever you dream up, the Lord will have for you!
quotes.author: David Berg

quotes.quote: Winners are an indicator that anything is possible if you put your heart and mind in a task.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: There is nothing you ca' do, if you set your mind to it. Anything is possible.
quotes.author: Rick Hansen

quotes.quote: Believe in your dreams and that anything is possible.
quotes.author: Usain Bolt

quotes.quote: In today's world, we all live with the burden of feeling that anything is possible if we're only clever enough, smart enough, work hard enough.
quotes.author: Elizabeth McGovern

quotes.quote: When you throw everything up in the air anything becomes possible.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
quotes.author: Gail Devers

quotes.quote: As children, our imaginations are vibrant, and our hearts are open... Everything amazes us, and we think anything is possible. We continuously experience life with a sense of newness and unbridled curiosity.
quotes.author: Yehuda Berg

quotes.quote: Believe anything is possible and then work like hell to make it happen.
quotes.author: Julianna Margulies

quotes.quote: Anything is possible, and the truth is any human being at any given moment, no matter how good they are not only at their job but also as a person they're capable of anything, and it's not always a conscious thing.
quotes.author: Sarah Paulson

quotes.quote: Anything is possible, but you have to believe and you have to fight.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Anything is possible, and that's something we should not lose sight of. The inspiration and the permission to dream is huge.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: Be strong, be fearless, be beautiful. And believe that anything is possible when you have the right people there to support you.
quotes.author: Misty Copeland

quotes.quote: Anything is possible. You can be told that you have a 90-percent chance or a 50-percent chance or a 1-percent chance, but you have to believe, and you have to fight.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Anything is possible if you get off your but and stand!
quotes.author: Sean Stephenson

quotes.quote: Impossibility is more possible than everything which we hold to be possible.
quotes.author: Karl Barth

quotes.quote: ife is unpredictable and usually never goes the way we plan it or would like it to go, but we have it and with life anything is possible.
quotes.author: Rashida Rowe

quotes.quote: I think anything is possible if you have the mindset and the will and desire to do it and put the time in.
quotes.author: Roger Clemens

quotes.quote: When you have the feeling that anything's possible, sometimes you wind up acting on it.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.quote: I want you to remember the guiding principles of my life. You can be what you want to be, if you believe in yourself and work hard, because anything, and I'm telling you anything, is possible.
quotes.author: Kirby Puckett

quotes.quote: Never tell a young person that anything cannot be done. God may have been waiting centuries for someone ignorant enough of the impossible to do that very thing.
quotes.author: G. M. Trevelyan

quotes.quote: I truly believe anything is possible if you fully manifest it.
quotes.author: Matt Sorum

quotes.quote: If you have a strong belief, then anything is possible.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: I would encourage you to set really high goals. Set goals that, when you set them, you think they're impossible. But then every day you can work towards them, and anything is possible, so keep working hard and follow your dreams.
quotes.author: Katie Ledecky

quotes.quote: There are many things that we can understand, but in the end it is a case of anything is possible.
quotes.author: David Icke

quotes.quote: Dreams do come true if you keep believing in yourself. Anything is possible.
quotes.author: Jennifer Capriati

quotes.quote: Anything is possible as long as you're focused, determined and you really want to do it.
quotes.author: Gabriel Iglesias

quotes.quote: I think anything is possible to anyone who dreams, dares, works and never gives up.
quotes.author: Xavier Dolan

quotes.quote: If you believe in yourself anything is possible.
quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

quotes.quote: If you believe in a dream and have the courage to try, anything is possible.
quotes.author: Rick Hansen

quotes.quote: Anything is possible if you wish hard enough.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.quote: Anything is possible if you believe you deserve it.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: It is the possibility that keeps me going, and though you may call me a dreamer or a fool or any other thing, I believe that anything is possible.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible unless you think it is.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: You become what you believe. And to believe that you are created by the power that's greater than yourself means anything is possible.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Anything is possible in the life of a man if he lives long enough. Even maturity.
quotes.author: Howell Raines

quotes.quote: Anything is possible, but only a few things actually happen.
quotes.author: Richard Rosen

quotes.quote: As long as nothing happens anything is possible.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: Once you start believing in yourself, anything is possible. Once you start believing in yourself, your dreams take shape. The more you believe, the more you achieve.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: Anything is possible when your man smells like Old Spice and not a lady. I'm on a horse.
quotes.author: Isaiah Mustafa

quotes.quote: Anything is possible if you put your mind to it and you really work hard.
quotes.author: Steve Case

quotes.quote: Yesterday is long gone for you to worry about, tomorrow may never be yours, but today is precious because it's you here and anything is possible today.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: But since everything and anything are always possible, the miraculous is always nearby, and wonders shall never, ever cease.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: Anything is possible in this world. I really believe that.
quotes.author: Liza Minnelli

quotes.quote: Never let life impede on your ability to manifest your dreams. Dig deeper into your dreams and deeper into yourself and believe that anything is possible, and make it happen.
quotes.author: Corin Nemec

quotes.quote: Everything is possible. Anything is possible at any time and at any time in life. That's such an affirmative kind of feeling.
quotes.author: Lillete Dubey

quotes.quote: Anything is possible. My background is a bad background, but a lot of people said I couldn't do it. You can do anything if you put your mind to it.
quotes.author: Michael Oher

quotes.quote: There are no limitations, unless you create them yourselves. Anything is possible. You are only limited by your own imagination.
quotes.author: Dolores Cannon

quotes.quote: Anything is possible even the most far fetched idea can come to being through a series of seemingly small decisions and actions.
quotes.author: Kandyse Mcclure

quotes.quote: Opportunity is defined as a set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something.
quotes.author: Beverly Kaye

quotes.quote: It's easy to get sucked into the day-to-day grind. I've got to find every opportunity possible to keep my crew thinking big picture.
quotes.author: Beverly Kaye

quotes.quote: Success depends upon tapping the very best that each employee has to offer and enabling the highest possible levels of engagement.
quotes.author: Beverly Kaye

quotes.quote: You won't always be victorious, but you never know what's truly possible unless you try.
quotes.author: Marie Forleo

quotes.quote: If you don't believe something is possible for you, it's not. Period. End of story.
quotes.author: Marie Forleo

quotes.quote: Nothing is possible if you think it is impossible. Nothing is impossible if you think it is possible. Think positive and work hard, and ANYTHING is possible.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.quote: Anything that enlarges the sphere of human powers and shows man he can do what he thought he could not do is valuable.
quotes.author: Ben Johnson

quotes.quote: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.quote: That which is achieved the most, still has the whole of it's future yet to be achieved.
quotes.author: Lao Tsu

quotes.quote: Winning starts with beginning.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.quote: They can because they think they can.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: People are not lazy; they just have impotent goals, that is, goals that do not inspire them.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Man is not the sum of what he has, but the totality of what he does not yet have and what he might have.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Have a dream so BIG that you cannot achieve it until you grow into the person who can.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.quote: It is not enough to have knowledge; one must apply it. It is not enough to have wishes; one must also accomplish it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Become a possibilitarian. No matter how dark things seem to be or actually are, raise your sights and see the possibilities-always see them, for they are always there.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: I haven't failed; I just found 10,000 ways that didn't work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: The secret to success is to be ready when opportunity comes.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Exceed expectations. We are not driven to do extraordinary things, but to do ordinary things extraordinarily well.
quotes.author: Bishop Gore

quotes.quote: Show me someone who has done something worthwhile, and I'll show you someone who has overcome adversity.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction inn knowing that you did your best to become the best you are capable of becoming.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: The world makes way for a man who knows where he is going.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Our limitations and success will be based most often on our own expectations for ourselves. What the mind dwells upon, the body acts upon.
quotes.author: Thomas Deward

quotes.quote: You may have a fresh start at any moment you choose, for this thing we call 'failure' is not falling down, but staying down.
quotes.author: Mary Pickford

quotes.quote: We must walk consciously only part way toward our gold, and then leap into the dark to our success.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Step by step. I can't think of any other way of accomplishing anything.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Plan your work for today and everyday, and then work on your plan today and everyday.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: The only limit of our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity inn every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: To win, you have to risk loss.
quotes.author: Jean Claude Killy

quotes.quote: High expectations are the key to everything.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: The victory of success is half won when one gains the habit of setting goals and achieving them.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Even the most tedious chore will become endurable as you parade through each day convinced that every task, no matter how menial or boring, brings you closer to achieving your dreams.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Donald Kendall

quotes.quote: It takes the hammer of persistence to drive the nail of success.
quotes.author: John Mason

quotes.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
quotes.author: Sir Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: The quality of a person's life is in direct proportion to their commitment to excellence, regardless of their chosen field of endeavor.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: He who stops being better, stops being good.
quotes.author: Oliver Cromwell

quotes.quote: If what you did yesterday seems big, you haven't done anything today.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Every great and commanding movement in the annals of the world is the triumph of enthusiasm. Nothing great was every achieved without it.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It is the constant and determined effort that breaks down resistance and sweeps away all obstacles.
quotes.author: Claude M. Bristol

quotes.quote: Life's most important battle; he defeated the battle of not trying.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Predetermine the objectives that you want to accomplish. Think big, act big, and set out to accomplish big results.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: I've never doubted that apartheid - because it was of itself fundamentally, intrinsically evil - was going to bite the dust eventually.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Abhorrence of apartheid is a moral attitude, not a policy.
quotes.author: Edward Heath

quotes.quote: We don't want apartheid liberalized. We want it dismantled. You can't improve something that is intrinsically evil.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: We believe that the world, too, can destroy apartheid, firstly by striking at the economy of South Africa.
quotes.author: Oliver Tambo
