quotes.quote: Apartheid does not happen spontaneously, like bad weather conditions.
quotes.author: Jonathan Kozol

quotes.quote: It may be that apartheid brings such stupendous economic advantages to countries that they would sooner have apartheid than permit its destruction.
quotes.author: Oliver Tambo

quotes.quote: Apartheid cannot be reformed, it has to be eliminated.
quotes.author: Olof Palme

quotes.quote: The U.S. is the last country that should see itself as an ally of the apartheid system.
quotes.author: Oliver Tambo

quotes.quote: Apartheid - both petty and grand - is obviously evil. Nothing can justify the arrogant assumption that a clique of foreigners has the right to decide on the lives of a majority.
quotes.author: Steven Biko

quotes.quote: One can't erase the tremendous burden of apartheid in 10 years, 20 years, I believe, even 30 years.
quotes.author: Susan Rice

quotes.quote: You build dreams, you build castles in the air, and you hope that at least part of that will be realized, even under apartheid.
quotes.author: Winnie Madikizela-Mandela

quotes.quote: Unsure about its place and identity, a whole nation was made to believe that ethnic pride and culture could only descend from race.
quotes.author: Arianna Dagnino

quotes.quote: Apartheid didn't impinge on music. It impinged on people's freedoms.
quotes.author: Hugh Masekela

quotes.quote: Apartheid is a lie, people can work together, people can create together.
quotes.author: John Kani

quotes.quote: Difficult times do not produce gentility, as if there is an angle hovering over the world of the oppressed.
quotes.author: Jonny Steinberg

quotes.quote: There is no more apartheid in South Africa than in the United States.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: You can't change a regime on the basis of compassion. There's got to be something harder.
quotes.author: Nadine Gordimer

quotes.quote: It was not lack of ability that limited my people, but lack of opportunity.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Apartheid either is or is not. And it must not be.
quotes.author: Oliver Tambo

quotes.quote: When a man is denied the right to live the life he believes in, he has no choice but to become an outlaw.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: For to be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The sanctions will not kill us. It's apartheid that's killing us.
quotes.author: Oliver Tambo

quotes.quote: We should have sent the apartheid monsters to jail, not let them off with an amnesty.
quotes.author: Winnie Madikizela-Mandela

quotes.quote: Now, myself, I'm not a pacifist at all. I believe in just war. I would have joined the spirit of the nation to fight against apartheid.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: I don't fancy colors of the face, I'm always attracted to colors of the brain.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Division and separation means no harm to the society. It makes everyone unique.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Racism is one of the most common results of the combination of stupidity and the ability to see.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: I am usually able to tolerate all kinds of victims of indoctrination except those who have been infected with xenophobia, racism, or homophobia.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: I would be guilty only if I were innocent of working to destroy racism in my country.
quotes.author: Nadine Gordimer

quotes.quote: Don't fight the system. Mock the system.
quotes.author: Trevor Noah

quotes.quote: I liberate minds with my music. That's more important than liberating a few people from apartheid or whatever.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: Apathy is one of the characteristic responses of any living organism when it is subjected to stimuli too intense or too complicated to cope with. The cure for apathy is comprehension.
quotes.author: John Dos Passos

quotes.quote: Apathy is the glove into which evil slips its hand.
quotes.author: Bodie Thoene

quotes.quote: Apathy is the death knell of any order. Once a system has degenerated to the point that apathy is the only thing holding it in place it, it is in its twilight phase. Then one day the music stops.
quotes.author: JOHN BERLING HARDY

quotes.quote: Apathy and evil. The two work hand in hand. They are the same, really.... Evil wills it. Apathy allows it. Evil hates the innocent and the defenseless most of all. Apathy doesn't care as long as it's not personally inconvenienced.
quotes.author: JAKE THOENE

quotes.quote: Apathy is a sort of living oblivion.
quotes.author: Horace Greeley

quotes.quote: Apathy is the self-defense of the powerless.
quotes.author: Letty Pogrebin

quotes.quote: Hate is not the opposite of love; apathy is.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: The greatest danger to our future is apathy.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: Apathy - If we don't take care of the customer, maybe they'll stop bugging us.
quotes.author: Larry Kersten

quotes.quote: We may have found a cure for most evils; but it has found no remedy for the worst of them all -- the apathy of human beings.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Scientists announced today that they have discovered a cure for apathy. However, they claim no one has shown the slightest interest in it.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: By far the most dangerous foe we have to fight is apathy - indifference from whatever cause, not from a lack of knowledge, but from carelessness, from absorption in other pursuits, from a contempt bred of self satisfaction.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: It is important for people to realize that we can make progress against world hunger, that world hunger is not hopeless. The worst enemy is apathy.
quotes.author: Reverend David Beckmann

quotes.quote: Apathy occurs when you aren't interested enough in your own life to be the chief influence in it.
quotes.author: A. Brandon Trean

quotes.quote: Apathy in general; people who are not standing up for what they believe in because somebody's got a louder mouth than them; it doesn't make any sense.
quotes.author: Avan Jogia

quotes.quote: Public apathy is more powerful than public opinion. There's more of it.
quotes.author: Dr. Jim Boren

quotes.quote: Apathy can be overcome by enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Arnold J. Toynbee

quotes.quote: A lot of you cared, just not enough.
quotes.author: Jay Asher

quotes.quote: Apathy is a trap. There is no challenge... so there is no reward. Remember, there is always free cheese in a mousetrap.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: To be apathetic is literally to be without passion.
quotes.author: Erwin Raphael McManus

quotes.quote: If moderation is a fault, then indifference is a crime.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: There is nothing harder than the softness of indifference.
quotes.author: Juan Montalvo

quotes.quote: Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike.
quotes.author: J K Rowling

quotes.quote: Always remember, the future of all of our tomorrows will be reflected by how we react to the mediocrity and apathy of others today.
quotes.author: George Kincses

quotes.quote: Most ignorance is the direct result of apathy; people don't know because they don't care to know.
quotes.author: Vikrant Parsai

quotes.quote: Your life begins to end the moment you start being silent about the things that matter.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr

quotes.quote: The world is in chaos not because of violence by bad people but because of silence of good people.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: The price of apathy towards public affairs is to be ruled by evil men.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The worst sin towards our fellow creatures is not to hate them, but to be indifferent to them: that's the essence of inhumanity.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Bad men need nothing more to compass their ends, than that good men should look on and do nothing.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: Truth is not only violated by falsehood; it may be equally outraged by silence.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: In communications, familiarity breeds apathy.
quotes.author: William Bernbach

quotes.quote: Lack of something to feel important about is almost the greatest tragedy a man may have.
quotes.author: Charles C. Noble

quotes.quote: Not to he who is offensive to us are we most unfair but to he who does not concern us at all.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The hottest places in hell are reserved for those who in time of great moral crisis maintain their neutrality.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Indifference may not wreck a man's life at any one turn but it will destroy him with a kind of dry-rot in the long run.
quotes.author: Bliss Carman

quotes.quote: Mourn not the dead that in the cool earth lie, but rather mourn the apathetic, throng the coward and the meek who see the world's great anguish and its wrong, and dare not speak.
quotes.author: Ralph Chaplin

quotes.quote: Most human beings have an infinite capacity for taking things for granted.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: If you are neutral in situations of injustice, you have chosen the side of the oppressor. If an elephant has its foot on the tail of a mouse and you say that you are neutral, the mouse will not appreciate your neutrality.
quotes.author: Bishop Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: When an individual fear or apathy passes by the unfortunate, life is of no account.
quotes.author: Haniel Long

quotes.quote: Apathy is the acceptance of the unacceptable.
quotes.author: John Stott

quotes.quote: You are not only responsible for what you say, but also for what you do not say.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The ultimate tragedy is not the oppression and cruelty by the bad people but the silence over that by the good people.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: A different world cannot be built by indifferent people.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.quote: Nothing for preserving the body like having no heart.
quotes.author: John Petit-Senn

quotes.quote: Bad people are less a problem than indifferent people.
quotes.author: Gerhard Kocher

quotes.quote: Men are accomplices to that which leaves them indifferent.
quotes.author: George Steiner

quotes.quote: It is the apathetic person that sees the cause while the charitable person sees the need.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The tyranny of a prince in an oligarchy is not so dangerousto the public welfare as the apathy of a citizen in a democracy.
quotes.author: Montesquieu

quotes.quote: Apathy and evil. The two work hand in hand. They are the same,really. Evil wills it. Apathy allows it. Evil hates the innocent andthe defenseless most of all. Apathy doesn't careas long as it's not personally inconvenienced.
quotes.author: Jake Thoene

quotes.quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The accomplice to the crime of corruption is frequently our own indifference.
quotes.author: Bess Myerson

quotes.quote: The main dangers in this life are the people who want to change everything...or nothing.
quotes.author: Lady Nancy Astor

quotes.quote: The sad truth is that most evil is done by people who never make up their minds to be either good or evil.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: As the people of the world see mass murder, the destruction of defenseless and innocent people, and all of the crime and lack of morals which go with war, they become numb and apathetic.
quotes.author: Alan J. Whiticker

quotes.quote: Indolence created first an apathy, and apathy crept on until all that was estimable and praiseworthy in man, was sunk into torpor, like waters that stagnate when they cease to flow
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: Come to me, my apathetic children...I love you all. You don't start fights. You don't escalate wars. You don't invent weapons. You don't seek power above all else. You are fair and honorable and everybody hates you.
quotes.author: Simon Satori Hendley

quotes.quote: Never compose anything unless the not composing of it becomes a nuisance to you.
quotes.author: Gustav Holst

quotes.quote: Your head’s in the sand, / the canary at hand / The coward inside you, / his kingdom commands. / Mired in apathy, / lost in denial / One last Armageddon / —the price of your wile.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: There is no emotion / Only apathy / Perhaps I have died a long time ago / Perhaps I'm a corpse in a world I don't know / Who would trade anything / To feel something / Anything.
quotes.author: Katie Odell

quotes.quote: God gave us apathy / Our people are starving on the streets tonight / Doesn't it make you feel hungry / A hundred people killed by war tonight / Doesn't it make you feel warm / And cozy.
quotes.author: David Jordan

quotes.quote: I found the light in your darkness / I found hope, in your mistakes / You left me broken, and heartless / You will feel my apathy.
quotes.author: New Day Rising

quotes.quote: What's the point in dying / When you might as well be dead already / It's the apathy that keeps me going steady.
quotes.author: Finn Sylvester

quotes.quote: Apathy is the overrated protection of that rock you're hiding under.
quotes.author: Laura J.W. Ryan

quotes.quote: Those who choose not to empathize enable real monsters, for without ever committing an act of outright evil ourselves we collude with it through our apathy.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: It is ... far more important to resist apathy than anarchy or despotism for apathy can give rise, almost indifferently, to either one.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.quote: Apathy is a spiritual numbness that creeps in and corrupts the good that God intends for our life and the good that He wants us to accomplish for Him and His kingdom.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George

quotes.quote: If I didn't care for fun and such, / I'd probably amount too much. / But I shall stay the way I am, / Because I do not give a damn.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: It's a disease. Nobody thinks or feels or cares anymore; nobody gets excited or believes in anything except their own comfortable little God damn mediocrity.
quotes.author: Richard Yates

quotes.quote: Sometimes we have to behave indifferently towards people who proclaim their love to us, just to see if they are really different.
quotes.author: Michale Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Even extreme grief may ultimately vent itself in violence--but more generally takes the form of apathy.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Apathy is never positive, and rarely harmless. To be apathetic is to be dispirited, empty of feeling. In its more extreme forms, it is a living death.
quotes.author: Donald Capps

quotes.quote: I didn't care about anything. And there's a freedom in apathy, a wild, dizzying liberation on which you can almost get drunk.
quotes.author: Lionel Shriver

quotes.quote: Neither love nor terror makes one blind: indifference makes one blind.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Apathy is merely a learned behavior, a habit that can be changed.
quotes.author: Susanna Barbee

quotes.quote: Empathy nurtures wisdom. Apathy cultivates ignorance.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: There are only two tragedies in life: one is not getting what one wants, and the other is getting it.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: An aphorism is never exactly true; it is either a half-truth or one-and-a-half truths.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: We endeavor to stuff the universe into the gullet of an aphorism.
quotes.author: Paul Eldridge

quotes.quote: The hunter for aphorisms on human nature has to fish in muddy water, and he is even condemned to find much of his own mind.
quotes.author: F. H. Bradley

quotes.quote: An aphorism is an extreme synthesis of thesis and antithesis, theory and practice, it's a mixture of intuition and observation, hypothesis and illusions of certainty and probability, history and stupidity.
quotes.author: William C. Brown

quotes.quote: Our live experiences, fixed in aphorisms, stiffen into cold epigrams. Our heart's blood, as we write it, turns to mere dull ink.
quotes.author: F. H. Bradley

quotes.quote: The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: There are aphorisms that, like airplanes, stay up only while they are in motion.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: An aphorism is true where it has fixed the impression of a genuine experience
quotes.author: Francis Herbert Bradley

quotes.quote: Worrying is like paying a debt you don't owe.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: An aphorism ought to be entirely isolated from the surrounding world like a little work of art and complete in itself like a hedgehog.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.quote: The excellence of aphorisms consists not so much in the expression of some rare or abstruse sentiment, as in the comprehension of some useful truth in a few words.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The quoting of an aphorism, like the angry barking of a dog or the smell of overcooked broccoli, rarely indicates that something helpful is about to happen.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: The old aphorisms are basically sound. First impressions are lasting.
quotes.author: Jessie Redmon Fauset

quotes.quote: We often feel that a clever aphorism captures a truth that would require pages to defend in any other way.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: The aphorism is cultivated only by those who have known fear in the midst of words, that fear of collapsing with all the words.
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.quote: There is nothing more difficult to define than an aphorism.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: The great writers of aphorisms read as if they had all known each other well.
quotes.author: Elias Canetti

quotes.quote: A good aphorism is too hard for the tooth of time, and is not worn away by all the centuries, although it serves as food for every epoch.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The aphorism-that uneasy compromise between poetry and philosophy.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: An aphorism is the last link in a long chain of thought.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: The laughter of the aphorism is sometimes triumphant, but seldom carefree.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Aphorisms are bad for novels. They stick in the reader's teeth.
quotes.author: Anatole Broyard

quotes.quote: Aphorisms are portable wisdom, the quintessential extracts of thought and feeling.
quotes.author: William Rounseville Alger

quotes.quote: An aphorism is a single sentence that totally exhausts its subject.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Aphorisms are literature's hand luggage. Light and compact, they fit easily into the overhead compartment of your brain.
quotes.author: James Geary

quotes.quote: An aphorism is a mental exercise, psychical, logical, linguistic, spiritual, ritual, emotional and rational, it is a major conceptual and literary activity, a mixture of prose and poetry that conveys, in addition to ideology, sympathy or antipathy.
quotes.author: William C. Brown

quotes.quote: It is a good thing for an uneducated man to read books of quotations.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: An aphorism is a personal observation inflated into a universal truth, a private posing as a general.
quotes.author: Stefan Kanfer

quotes.quote: An aphorism is a generalization of sorts, and our present-day writers seem more at home with the particular.
quotes.author: Anatole Broyard

quotes.quote: The trouble about man is twofold. He cannot learn truths which are too complicated; he forgets truths which are too simple.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: It seems, in fact, as though the second half of a man`s life is made up of nothing, but the habits he has accumulated during the first half.
quotes.author: Fyodor Mikhailovich Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: It is the nature of aphoristic thinking to be always in a state of concluding; a bid to have the final word is inherent in all powerful phrase-making.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Aphorisms may equivocate, but they must not wobble.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Aphorisms are the true form of the universal philosophy.
quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.quote: The aphorism, 'As a man thinketh in his heart, so he is, 'embraces the whole of man's being. It is so comprehensive that it reaches out to every condition and circumstance of life.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: A man is literally what he thinks. His character is the sum of his thoughts.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Aphorisms are salted and not sugared almonds at reason's feast.
quotes.author: Evar Esar

quotes.quote: Aphorisms prick with the sharp point of truth, but with the sting removed.
quotes.author: Evar Esar

quotes.quote: Don't let go too soon, but don't hang on too long.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: If you would persuade, you must appeal to interest rather than intellect.
quotes.author: Rick Kirschner

quotes.quote: An aphorism is a brief expression of an important principle that you seek to employ in your pitch.
quotes.author: Rick Kirschner

quotes.quote: Civilization is a race between catastrophe and education.
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: It ain't what you don't know that gets you into trouble.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You can take the boy out of the country, but you can't take the country out of the boy.
quotes.author: F.Bunce

quotes.quote: You can fool some of the people all of the time, and all of the people some of the time, but you can't fool all of the people all of the time.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always got.
quotes.author: Morris C. Katzoff

quotes.quote: The race isn't always to the swift, nor the fight to the strong, but that's the way to bet.
quotes.author: Damon Runyan

quotes.quote: An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.
quotes.author: James L. D'Adamo

quotes.quote: All things come to those who wait.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: All things require skill but an appetite.
quotes.author: George Latimer Apperson

quotes.quote: When a person uses an aphorism, they are implicitly asserting the relevance of the image evoked to some given situation, and this assertion frequently implies some kind of judgement as to what kind of values are to be given prime consideration in this situation.
quotes.author: State University of New York Press

quotes.quote: Those who wish well towards their friends disdain to please them with words which are not true.
quotes.author: Bharavi

quotes.quote: Like a earthen pot, a bad man is easily broken, and cannot readily be restored to his former situational but a virtuous man, like a vase of gold, is broken with difficulty, and easily repaired.
quotes.author: Hitopadesa

quotes.quote: The apocalypse is not something which is coming. The apocalypse has arrived in major portions of the planet and it's only because we live within a bubble of incredible privilege and social insulation that we still have the luxury of anticipating the apocalypse.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Apocalypse does not point to a fiery Armageddon, but to our ignorance and complacency coming to an end.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Selfishness alone is sufficient to bring apocalypse upon a nation.
quotes.author: Khem Veasna

quotes.quote: Apocalypse has become banal, a set of statistical risk parameters to everyone's existence.
quotes.author: Anthony Giddens

quotes.quote: Apocalypse has come and gone. We're just grubbing in the ashes.
quotes.author: Samuel R. Delany

quotes.quote: The apocalypse is the millennium, and the psychedelics move you into the future.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Soft things are terrifying. They're the real signals of death. Images of strength can never be that terrifying. It's the images of weakness that are a real apocalypse.
quotes.author: Jenny Hval

quotes.quote: Once we start believing that the apocalypse is coming, the amygdala goes on high alert, filtering out most anything that says otherwise.
quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

quotes.quote: The probability of apocalypse soon cannot be realistically estimated, but it is surely too high for any sane person to contemplate with equanimity.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: That even an apocalypse can be made to seem part of the ordinary horizon of expectation constitutes an unparalleled violence that is being done to our sense of reality, to our humanity.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Apocalypse could not be repealed by the democratic process.
quotes.author: Greg Bear

quotes.quote: There's no big apocalypse. Just an endless procession of little ones.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Apocalypses don't happen very often. They tend to be separated by tens or even hundreds of millions of years.
quotes.author: Dale Jamieson

quotes.quote: A zombie apocalypse isn't the most jovial situation.
quotes.author: Danai Gurira

quotes.quote: We are living on the brink of the apocalypse, but the world is asleep.
quotes.author: Joel C. Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Apocalypse is the eye of a needle, through which we pass into a different world.
quotes.author: George Zebrowski

quotes.quote: The end approaches, but the apocalypse is long lived.
quotes.author: Jacques Derrida

quotes.quote: Literature is a human apocalypse, man's revelation to man, and criticism is not a body of adjudications, but the awareness of that revelation, the last judgement of mankind.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Apocalypse can mean the unveiling of the deeper self of humanity.
quotes.author: Barbara Marx Hubbard

quotes.quote: If one wants to talk about the end of the world, the apocalypse, you're talking about the world itself. It's not Southern California breaking into the sea. The story is global, and it requires that kind of approach.
quotes.author: David Seltzer

quotes.quote: The Apocalypse is not a consecutive Prophecy. Rather, it is to be regarded as a synoptical system of co-ordinate Prophecies. And so it was regarded by the Ancient Expositors. They perceived that it consisted of frequent anticipations and frequent recapitulations; that is, they saw that the inspired Writer, borne as it were on the wings of the Spirit, hastened on to future events, which he would again describe more fully hereafter; and that, when he had arrived at the brink of the consummation of all things, he suddenly returned, either to the first age of Christianity or to some intermediate point; and then, beginning, as it were, from a fresh source, traveled down by a new stream; and that this he did at several successive times.
quotes.author: Christopher Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The hugest changes were the ones that could not be seen that's where the real apocalypse lay: in people's hearts, their souls, their beings.
quotes.author: Dianna Hardy

quotes.quote: I can see we're in for a fabulous evening's apocalypse.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Wild, dark times are rumbling toward us, and the prophet who wishes to write a new apocalypse will have to invent entirely new beasts, and beasts so terrible that the ancient animal symbols of St. John will seem like cooing doves and cupids in comparison.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: Let us think today of the prospect of sharing in a sublime and blessed existence such as is portrayed in the text of the Apocalypse before us, and let us ask ourselves whether it should or should not make any difference in our present state of being.
quotes.author: Henry Parry Liddon

quotes.quote: Apocalypse does not point to a fiery Armageddon but to the fact that our ignorance and our complacency are coming to an end. The exclusivism of there being only one way in which we can be saved, the idea that there is a single religious group that is in sole possession of the truth—that is the world as we know it that must pass away. What is the kingdom? It lies in our realization of the ubiquity of the divine presence in our neighbors, in our enemies, in all of us.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Don't blame yourself. The apocalypse wasn't your fault. Actually, it was just as much your fault as it was anyone else's. Come to think of it, if you're an American, it was probably about 80-90 percent more your fault than the average human. But don't let that get you down. It wasn't exclusively your fault. Unless you're the president. Then it might be your fault. But you'll have plenty of interns to tell you that it wasn't, so you'll be fine.
quotes.author: Meghann Marco

quotes.quote: As far as love is concerned, possession, power, fusion and disenchantment are the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse
quotes.author: Zygmunt Bauman

quotes.quote: Never apologize for showing your feelings. When you do, you are apologizing for the truth.
quotes.author: Jose N. Harris

quotes.quote: A meaningful apology is one that communicates three R's: regret, responsibility, and remedy.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: Apologies are great, but they don't really change anything. You know what does? Action.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.quote: Apology is not for the faint of heart, but then, neither is life.
quotes.author: John Kador

quotes.quote: Apologetic explanations do not develop unless there is a reality that has to be explained and defended. Jesus was undeniably a figure of history.
quotes.author: John Shelby Spong

quotes.quote: Apologizing does not always mean you're wrong and the other person is right. It just means you value your relationship more than your ego.
quotes.author: Mark Matthews

quotes.quote: Being sorry is the highest act of selfishness, seeing value only after discarding it.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: An apology might help, but you can change your life without one.
quotes.author: Robin Quivers

quotes.quote: Apology calls for a willingness to sacrifice on behalf of the wronged party and the inherent value of the relationship, not for what it brings to you but for what you can bring to it.
quotes.author: John Kador

quotes.quote: Apology is not about saying I'm sorry, but it is about the meaning you put behind the apology and admitting that you are the wrong part.
quotes.author: Unarine Ramaru

quotes.quote: In this life, when you deny someone an apology, you will remember it at time you beg forgiveness.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Would sorry have made any difference? Does it ever? It's just a word. One word against a thousand actions.
quotes.author: Sarah Ockler

quotes.quote: An apology is the super glue of life. It can repair just about anything.
quotes.author: Lynn Johnston

quotes.quote: Apology makes you self responsible while excuse makes you undependable.
quotes.author: Prabakaran Thirumalai

quotes.quote: Apologies require taking full responsibility. No half-truths, no partial admissions, no rationalizations, no finger pointing, and no justifications belong in any apology.
quotes.author: Cathy Burnham Martin

quotes.quote: Apology is both transactional, in that it restores what has been broken to what it was before, and transformational, in that it creates opportunities that didn't exist before.
quotes.author: John Kador

quotes.quote: Apology may start as a feeling, a desire to make matters right, but it requires a commitment to move that desire into practice, to actually take on the great courageous task of showing compassion to others.
quotes.author: John Kador

quotes.quote: More people should apologize, and more people should accept apologies when sincerely made.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.quote: Apology is a lovely perfume; it can transform the clumsiest moment into a gracious gift.
quotes.author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

quotes.quote: If you don't feel apologetic for slavery, if you don't feel apologetic for colonialism, if you feel proud of it then say that.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: An apology given just to appease one's conscience is self-serving and better left unspoken!
quotes.author: Evinda Lepins

quotes.quote: Apology doesn't mean that you were wrong, or other person was right. Its mean that your relationship is valuable than your ego.
quotes.author: Ain Eineziz

quotes.quote: Apologizing a very desperate habit one that is rarely cured.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: If an apology is followed by an excuse or a reason, it means they are going to commit same mistake again they just apologized for.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Apologizing - a very desperate habit - one that is rarely cured. Apology is only egotism wrong side out.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: A person can apologize endlessly, and even if you forgive them, sometimes you can't forget the pain they've caused you.
quotes.author: Nishan

quotes.quote: We value apology in the abstract, but turn our backs on it in practice.
quotes.author: John Kador

quotes.quote: Apologies only account for that which they do not alter.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: An apology can be a wonderful thing so long as it is infrequent and from the heart. However, beware of the person who justifies bad behavior with apologies. For them it is a means to an end, and quite often at your expense.
quotes.author: Gary Hopkins

quotes.quote: Apology may be scorned, but it retains its inherent value.
quotes.author: John Kador

quotes.quote: A good apology is like antibiotic, a bad apology is like rubbing salt in the wound.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: Sorry is, indeed, one of the most difficult and most powerful words in the English language, provided one can feel and say it at the same time.
quotes.author: Uday Mukerji

quotes.quote: Sincere apologies are for those that make them, not for those to whom they are made. Sincere apologies are for those that make them, not for those to whom they are made.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.quote: Apology is the practice of extending ourselves because we value the relationship more than we value the need to be right.
quotes.author: John Kador

quotes.quote: An apology informed is good; an apology performed is better.
quotes.author: John Kador

quotes.quote: Apologetics has an important place in the local church as we seek to influence our communities for Christ in an increasingly skeptical culture.
quotes.author: Lee Strobel

quotes.quote: Apology reminds us that each person (including ourselves) deserves to be respected and treated fairly.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: Apologies come in all shapes and sizes. You can give diamonds, candy, flowers, or just your deepest heartfelt sentiment.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: The best apology against false accusers is silence.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: An effective apology focuses more on compassion for the victim than redemption for the offender.
quotes.author: John Kador

quotes.quote: Apologizing does not always mean that you are wrong and the other person is right. It just means that you value your relationship more than your ego.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: It's easier to apologize than ask for permission.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: An apology is the superglue of life. It can repair just about anything.
quotes.author: Lynn Johnston

quotes.quote: More people should apologize, and more people should accept apologies when sincerely made.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.quote: You can't spend your life apologizing.
quotes.author: Jude Law

quotes.quote: The ability of a person to atone has always been the most remarkable of human features.
quotes.author: Leon Uris

quotes.quote: A stiff apology is a second insult. The injured party does not want to be compensated because he has been wronged; he wants to be healed because he has been hurt.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The best way to have the last word is to apologize.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: When you realize you've made a mistake, make amends immediately. It's easier to eat crow while it's still warm.
quotes.author: Dan Heist

quotes.quote: Nothing wrong with apologizing, but saying I'm sorry does nothing when you continue to make the same mistakes.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: It is polite to apologize, but it is more polite not to do anything calling for an apology.
quotes.author: Vikrant Parsai

quotes.quote: When an apology is due, give it freely, then follow your apology with action.
quotes.author: Judy Ford

quotes.quote: Apologizing - a very desperate habit - one that is rarely cured.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: It is a good rule in life never to apologize. The right sort of people do not want apologies, and the wrong sort take a mean advantage of them.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehous

quotes.quote: Never apologize for showing feeling. When you do so you apologize for truth.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: To apologize is to lay the foundation for a future offense.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Apologies are pointless, regrets come too late. What matters is you can move on, you can grow, you can do better in the future.
quotes.author: Kelsey Grammer

quotes.quote: To apologize for what you most wanted to do, to concede that it was obnoxious, boring, 'vulgar and unsafe' --- that was the worst thing.
quotes.author: Alan Hollinghurst

quotes.quote: One cannot apologize for something fundamental, and a child feels and knows this as well and as deeply as any sage.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: It never hurts to apologize, especially if you don't mean it.
quotes.author: Jim Bouton

quotes.quote: Apologize quickly when you wrong someone, because I'm sorry has no value in the grave.
quotes.author: Lakesha Ruise

quotes.quote: Apologize! That's the least you can do to try to make right something you have wronged.
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: Never apologize and never explain-it's a sign of weakness.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: When someone says that it's too late for apologize then you have to do it anyway because it's your duty.
quotes.author: P_teris Bit_ns

quotes.quote: I apologize for apologizing.Thank you.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: The first to apologize is the bravest. The first to forgive is the strongest. The first to move forward is the happiest.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Never ruin an apology with an excuse.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Never apologize when you are right unless it is to your wife.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of character strength to apologize quickly out of one's heart rather than out of pity. A person must possess himself and have a deep sense of security in fundamental principles and values in order to genuinely apologize.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: An apology given just to appease one's conscience is self-serving and better left unspoken!
quotes.author: Evinda Lepins

quotes.quote: Never make a defense or an apology until you are accused.
quotes.author: King Charles I

quotes.quote: Being sorry is the highest act of selfishness, seeing value only after discarding it.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: Apologies only account for that which they do not alter.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Sacrifice is at the heart of repentance. Without deeds, your apology is worthless.
quotes.author: Bryan Davis

quotes.quote: In this life, when you deny someone an apology, you will remember it at time you beg forgiveness..
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: A person can apologize endlessly, and even if you forgive them, sometimes you can't forget the pain they've caused you.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Any good apology has 3 parts: 1)I'm sorry 2)It's my fault 3)What can I do to make it right? Most people forget the third part.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Saying 'I'm sorry' is saying 'I love you' with a wounded heart in one hand and your smothered pride in the other.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: You can always say sorry but the real apology is when you hear the sadness in their voice and see the look in their eyes. And you realize that they have hurt themselves just as much.
quotes.author: Kid Cudi

quotes.quote: A truly humble apology works to part storm clouds, calm rough seas, and bring on the soft lights of dawn; it has the power to change a person's world.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Apologies are great, but they don't really change anything. You know what does? Action.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.quote: I can wholeheartedly apologize for not being at all sorry. And it really is the least I can do.
quotes.author: April Winchell

quotes.quote: I have learned that sometimes "sorry" is not enough. Sometimes you actually have to change.
quotes.author: Claire London

quotes.quote: Would 'sorry' have made any difference? Does it ever? It's just a word. One word against a thousand actions.
quotes.author: Sarah Ockler

quotes.quote: In some families, please is described as the magic word. In our house, however, it was sorry.
quotes.author: Margaret Laurence

quotes.quote: An apology might help, but you can change your life without one.
quotes.author: Robin Quivers

quotes.quote: Right actions in the future are the best apologies for bad actions in the past.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: An apology is an expression of regret where the voice rarely matches the words
quotes.author: Vikrant Parsai

quotes.quote: An apology is saying the right thing after doing the wrong thing.
quotes.author: Vikrant Parsai

quotes.quote: Actions speak louder than words. We can apologize over and over, but if our actions don't change, the words become meaningless.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Never ruin an apology with an excuse.
quotes.author: Kimberly Johnson

quotes.quote: If I've done anything I'm sorry for, I'm willing to be forgiven.
quotes.author: Edward Noyes Westcott

quotes.quote: Apology is only egotism wrong side out.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Every great mistake has a halfway moment, a split second when it can be recalled and perhaps remedied.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Be quick to apologize and mend relationships. Be quick to heal wounded relationships.
quotes.author: Hamp Lee III

quotes.quote: A true gentleman is one that apologizes anyways even though he has not offended a lady intentionally.
quotes.author: Everbooks Editorial

quotes.quote: It takes two to argue and one to apologize.
quotes.author: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.quote: Love is saying you're sorry even with your foot is in your mouth.
quotes.author: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.quote: Staying with someone out of sympathy will certainly make you feel sorry for yourself later.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: It takes real talent to be able to apologize in a manner that makes the offended person feel guilty.
quotes.author: David Young

quotes.quote: I lost the need to live my life as an apology. Pride in who I am and what I have to offer developed.
quotes.author: Stephen Harrison

quotes.quote: Forgiving is not just about accepting an apology. It is being able to let go even when someone fails to apologize.
quotes.author: Torion Kent

quotes.quote: It's much easier to apologize than it is to get permission.
quotes.author: Dr.Grace Hopper

quotes.quote: A harsh word can't be taken back; no apology can fully repair it's damage.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: An apology is a good way to have the last word.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: By apologizing, parents teach children that everyone can be wrong and its worth to admit it.
quotes.author: Nancy Semallin

quotes.quote: Love means not ever having to say you're sorry.
quotes.author: Erich Segal

quotes.quote: Let the wife make the husband glad to come home, and let him make her sorry to see him leave.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Friends are God's apology for relations.
quotes.author: Hugh Kingsmill

quotes.quote: Men are thought to apologize for their weaknesses, women for their strengths.
quotes.author: Bathroom Readers' Institute

quotes.quote: Never apologize for showing feeling. When you do so, you apologize for the truth.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The less a man says the more he doesn't have to apologize.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: An apology has more impact when it's specific.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: Those we care about most are those most affected by our apologies.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: When you need to apologize to someone, do it in person.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: If you dial a wrong number, don't just hang up; offer an apology.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: Apologizing to oneself requires self-talk.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: We want to end an uncomfortable moment as quickly as possible, even if this means telling the person who is apologizing.
quotes.author: Harriet Lerner

quotes.quote: The ability to apologize is one of the greatest gifts that we can give to our kids.
quotes.author: Harriet Lerner

quotes.quote: If a person is not worried about making you happy, apologizing for his or her mistakes, and trying to improve to improve to make you proud, that person doesn't love you.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: What most people are looking for in an apology is sincerity.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: For an apology to be accepted, you need to speak the language that conveys to the offended your sincerity.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: Expressing regret is the emotional aspect of an apology.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: An apology has more impact when it's specific.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: Anytime an apology is followed by an excuse for the offense, the excuse cancels out the apology in my mind.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: It is all wonderful to say sorry while trying your best not to smirk not laugh while uttering the sensitive word.
quotes.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quotes.quote: In a relationship, the worry is worth more than gold. However, the more it's mentioned the lesser your love and affection becomes.
quotes.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quotes.quote: A sincere apology will deepen the relationship rather than destroy it.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: The quicker and more thorough the apology, the more likely the apologizer is to receive genuine forgiveness and restoration of the relationships.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: A forgiving person stands ready to forgive when an apology is offered.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: When no apology is forthcoming, a forgiving person will take the initiative to lovingly confront the person in the wrong and offer forgiveness.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: Christ is the master; the Scriptures are only the servant.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: An apostolic missionary must have both heart and tongue ablaze with charity.
quotes.author: Anthony Mary Claret

quotes.quote: The more fully that the gospel is preached, in the grand old apostolic way, the more likely is it to accomplish the results which it did in the apostolic days.
quotes.author: Horatius Bonar

quotes.quote: The apostolic plan was not to raise ways and means, but to go and do the work.
quotes.author: James Hudson Taylor

quotes.quote: A Christianity without a passion to turn the world upside down is not reflective of apostolic Christianity.
quotes.author: Carl F. H. Henry

quotes.quote: Apostolic preaching cannot be carried on unless there be apostolic prayer. Men of God, before anything else, are indispensable to the furtherance of the kingdom of God on earth.
quotes.author: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.quote: In an apostolic network the person in charge of maintaining the DNA of the network is the lead apostle, who consults with those he or she chooses, and no one else.
quotes.author: C. Wagner

quotes.quote: To be a Christian is to be a theologian-a student of God and his will. The contemporary disdain for theological content and emphasis on self-image and emotions were not shared by the apostolic church.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: The Spirit is testifying that a new day is dawning. The stage of the world is being set for a fullness of a harvest and a genuine apostolic reformation in a new way.
quotes.author: Mark Chironna

quotes.quote: Apostolic preaching is not marked by its beautiful diction, or literary polish, or Cleverness of expression, but Operates â€œin demonstration of the Spirit and of power.
quotes.author: Arthur Wallis

quotes.quote: We are in the times of the beginning of a new epoch for Christianity. True apostolic Christianity is being restored to the earth.
quotes.author: Rick Joyner

quotes.quote: Apostles go into new territory and establish God's kingdom.
quotes.author: Sherry K. White

quotes.quote: True apostles do not speak to flatter people. True apostles are not self seeking. True apostles do not seek praise from mere men.
quotes.author: Billy

quotes.quote: The apostles were moved, not so much by an intellectual apprehension, as by a spiritual illumination. They met men, and the need of those men whom they met cried aloud to them.
quotes.author: Roland Allen

quotes.quote: An Apostle is a missionary, bearing testimony of the reality and divinity of Jesus Christ in all the world.
quotes.author: David A. Bednar

quotes.quote: The apostles had this instinct: When in trouble, pray. When intimidated, pray. When challenged, pray. When persecuted, pray!
quotes.author: Jim Cymbala

quotes.quote: Apostles receive revelations from God, and consequently they are able to say this is what the Spirit is saying to the churches right now. Making such a statement with credibility carries with it tremendous authority.
quotes.author: C. Wagner

quotes.quote: Christ had given the apostles a world-wide commission, embracing all the nations; but intellectually they did not understand what He meant. They found that out as they followed the impulse of the Spirit.
quotes.author: Roland Allen

quotes.quote: The apostles were very sure that everything of theirs which had to do with salvation was a gift to them from God. Increase our faith Lk. 17:5. They did not presume that the fullness of faith would come to them merely because they freely opted for it. They believed, rather, that it was a gift of God which would have to be granted to them.
quotes.author: John Cassian

quotes.quote: True, the apostles did not expressly say that people will be saved only if they repent, believe, and confess. But most evangelicals assume with good reason that this is what the apostles implied.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: Let it ever be remembered that genuine faith in Christ will ever be productive of good works; for this faith worketh by love, as the apostle says, and love to God always produces obedience to his holy laws.
quotes.author: Adam Clarke Quotes

quotes.quote: There is an urgent need for the emergence of a new generation of apostles anchored firmly in the word of Christ, capable of responding to the challenges of our times and prepared to spread the Gospel far and wide.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: The apostle enters upon his subject thus let every soul be subject unto the higher powers; for there is no power but of God: the powers that be, are ordained of God.
quotes.author: Jonathan Mayhew

quotes.quote: How apostles are received is a key measuring stick as to how the Lord will release blessings or judgments on a territory. Apostles also have authority over the demonic rulers of a region. They have the ability to demonstrate supernatural power that draws a whole region to our life-giving God.
quotes.author: Chuck Pierce

quotes.quote: Appearances are a glimpse of the unseen.
quotes.author: Anaxagoras

quotes.quote: Appearance blinds, whereas words reveal.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Appearances do not deceive if there are enough of them.
quotes.author: Laura Riding

quotes.quote: The fear of appearances is the first symptom of impotence.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: Your appearance can be a weapon. As powerful as any knife or gun.
quotes.author: Barbara

quotes.quote: Appearance is something absolute, but reality is not that way - everything is interdependent, not absolute.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: It is only in appearance that time is a river. It is rather a vast landscape and it is the eye of the beholder that moves.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: Appearances can be deceiving, but the true colours of your soul remain.
quotes.author: Angelica Hopes

quotes.quote: If your appearance is all people see, they have no respect for your mind.
quotes.author: Trudi Canavan

quotes.quote: Outward appearance is nothing to Him if it is not an expression of the inner.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The appearance of the law must be upheld - especially when it's being broken.
quotes.author: Boss Tweed

quotes.quote: Keeping up the appearance of having all your marbles is hard work, but important.
quotes.author: Sara Gruen

quotes.quote: All appearances are real and negatio; sophistical: All reality must be sensation.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Your external appearance can be great, but your stunning beauty beams from within.
quotes.author: Wayne Chirisa

quotes.quote: You cannot judge by outward appearances; the soul is only transparent to its Maker.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: An appearance of delicacy is inseparable from sweetness and gentleness of character.
quotes.author: Lydia Sigourney

quotes.quote: Appearance should never attain reality, And if nature conquers, then must art retire.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: It's not the appearance that binds you, it's the attachment to the appearance that binds you.
quotes.author: Tilopa

quotes.quote: If you judge after appearances, you will continue to be enslaved by the evidence of your senses.
quotes.author: Neville Goddard

quotes.quote: Our appearance belongs to others, we live in the darkness of the body-part of all darkness but felt.
quotes.author: Antony Gormley

quotes.quote: The appearance of a single great genius is more than equivalent to the birth of a hundred mediocrities
quotes.author: Cesare Lombroso

quotes.quote: It is not your outward appearance that you should beautify, but your soul, adorning it with good works.
quotes.author: Clement of Alexandria

quotes.quote: When appearance and reality coincide, philosophy and literary criticism find themselves with nothing to say.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Appearances are nothing.... And first of all they should not be feared, they are only dangerous to the weak.
quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

quotes.quote: If appearances are deceitful, then they do not deserve any confidence when they assert what appears to them to be true.
quotes.author: Diogenes Laertius

quotes.quote: The appearances of goodness and merit often meet with a greater reward from the world than goodness and merit themselves.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: In avoiding the appearance of evil, I am not sure but I have sometimes unnecessarily deprived myself and others of innocent enjoyments.
quotes.author: Rutherford B. Hayes

quotes.quote: Appearances are deceiving.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Appearance rules the world.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: Appearance is a type of power.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: First appearance deceives many.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Appearance is valued too much in our society.
quotes.author: Claude Lelouch

quotes.quote: Appearances have very little to do with happiness.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The appearance doesn't matter as much as the content.
quotes.author: Katherine Harris

quotes.quote: The sudden appearance of mushrooms after a summer rain is one of the more impressive spectacles of the plant world.
quotes.author: John Tyler Bonner

quotes.quote: Neglect of appearance becomes men.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Risking the appearance of weakness takes strength. And the market knows it.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: The appearance of things to the mind is the standard of every action to man.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: An appearance of delicacy, and even fragility, is almost essential to beauty.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The appearance of religion only on Sunday proves that it is only an appearance.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: A respectable appearance is sufficient to make people more interested in your soul.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: We try to create this interesting appearance to make ourselves feel better about ourselves.
quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

quotes.quote: The appearance of the other in the world corresponds therefore to a congealed sliding of the whole universe.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: The appearance is the allusion of abstraction when in fact I am in control of every aspect of that symmetry.
quotes.author: Kerry James Marshall

quotes.quote: Appearance matters a great deal because you can often tell a lot about people by looking at how they present themselves.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.quote: Appearances are significant, and never more than in politics. You can always sway the crowd, provided you have a good story.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Most of the appearance of mirth in the world is not mirth, it is art. The wounded spirit is not seen, but walks under a disguise.
quotes.author: Robert South

quotes.quote: Our outward appearance is a reflection of what we are on the inside. Our lives reflect that for which we seek. And if with all our hearts we truly seek to know the Savior and to be more like Him, we shall be, for He is our divine, eternal Brother.
quotes.author: Margaret D. Nadauld

quotes.quote: What lies behind appearance is usually another appearance.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Augmenting your appearance so drastically that it elicits a reaction from literally every acquaintance you greet is a sea change.
quotes.author: Emily Weiss

quotes.quote: Appreciate what you have instead of regret ting for something you don't have.
quotes.author: rah_U

quotes.quote: We need to appreciate how precious life is.
quotes.author: Shelley Fabares

quotes.quote: Appreciate the aesthetic and creativity of the nature and be grateful for being part of it.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: Too many times we get so caught up in moving forward we forget to appreciate where we are and what we have.
quotes.author: Shaddona Richards

quotes.quote: It's an amazing feeling to be appreciated for what you do and to feel like you have brought happiness to others.
quotes.author: Marie Osmond

quotes.quote: Nothing is appreciated till it is revealed for all to see, hear and treasure.
quotes.author: Thomas Meyer

quotes.quote: Be thankful for what you have. Your life, no matter how bad you think it is, is someone else's fairytale.
quotes.author: Wale Ayeni

quotes.quote: Feeling appreciated is one of the most important needs that people have. When you share with someone your appreciation and gratitude, they will not forget you. Appreciation will return to you many times.
quotes.author: Steve Brunkhorst

quotes.quote: Admiration and appreciation are two things that always have a positive effect on any person. But when showing how much you appreciate or appreciate someone, be specific in what you say.
quotes.author: Jessica Gardner

quotes.quote: We have to appreciate that managing the consequences of behaviour is the best way to change it.
quotes.author: James Neal

quotes.quote: The value of liberty was thus enhanced in our estimation by the difficulty of its attainment, and the worth of characters appreciated by the trial of adversity.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Attraction happens when you feel important, valued, appreciated and wanted.
quotes.author: Amy Dickinson

quotes.quote: Developing your unique thought to the level of being appreciated and adopted by the world that's genius.
quotes.author: Ogwo David Emenike

quotes.quote: Life is too short to waste your time on people who don't respect, appreciate, and value you.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Life is not only meant to be appreciated in retrospect. There is something each day to embrace and cherish.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: Appreciate what you have while you still have it because one day you won't.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: Make time to fully appreciate yourself throughout the day. Be mindful of how you feel. Learn to smell the roses.
quotes.author: John Noel

quotes.quote: Life holds so many simple blessings, each day bringing its own individual wonder.
quotes.author: John McLeod

quotes.quote: Appreciate your life because even though you might not have it all, you still have life, something that someone else could not have no matter how much they wanted to.
quotes.author: Gugu Mona

quotes.quote: A person who feels appreciated will always do more than what is expected.
quotes.author: Malika E Nura

quotes.quote: The greatest gains and values are farthest from being appreciated. We easily come to doubt if they exist. We soon forget them. They are the highest reality.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Appreciate what you have, because someone else is wishing for it.
quotes.author: Karon Waddell

quotes.quote: Someone who feels appreciated will always be and do more than expected. This holds true in love and business.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: The most powerful force in a woman's life is the need to be appreciated, loved and cherished for what she is.
quotes.author: Amish Tripathi

quotes.quote: Life appreciates those who appreciate it, you are life so appreciate yourself, and everything around you will be appreciated.
quotes.author: Blaze Olamiday

quotes.quote: We are remembering to be appreciative of simple, little things. Bigger is not always better, and in this case we want to start by taking time to smell the little flowers.
quotes.author: Francoise White

quotes.quote: The great art of giving consists in this the gift should cost very little and yet be greatly coveted, so that it may be the more highly appreciated.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: You can show that appreciation in big and little ways. It's often the little things that really count and will add up to a stable, loving, and mutually beneficial relationship.
quotes.author: W. C. Dukenfeld

quotes.quote: Appreciate what you have, where you are and who you are with in this moment.
quotes.author: Tony Clark

quotes.quote: Appreciation can make a day, even change a life. Your willingness to put it into words is all that is necessary.
quotes.author: Margaret Cousins

quotes.quote: Appreciate and value your time because this is the key to succes.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: A team will always appreciate a great individual if he's willing to sacrifice for the group.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: To help you appreciate yourself and your assets, understand that flowers in a garden do not compare themselves with the rose
quotes.author: Miriam Kinai

quotes.quote: Of course, it feels good to be appreciated, but the sheer enjoyment of the sun on your face, the smell of the sea, and the giggle of a baby gives true meaning to the word.
quotes.author: Greg Henry Quinn

quotes.quote: One of a person's greatest emotional needs is to feel appreciated. Start by appreciating yourself.
quotes.author: Denise Austin

quotes.quote: Appreciate your heart; really know how to take care of your heart.
quotes.author: Yuna

quotes.quote: Feeling grateful or appreciative of someone or something in your life actually attracts more of the things that you appreciate and value into your life.
quotes.author: Christiane Northrup

quotes.quote: Your patience will be both appreciated and rewarded.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: We like to sense that our efforts are appreciated, and that our spouse sees something good in us. When we are affirmed, we aspire to be better.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: Contentment is the reward of being appreciative and grateful. It goes that if you are grateful in every situation, you will be happy with everything and your happiness will be abundant and boundless.
quotes.author: Clement Getate

quotes.quote: We must value life and treasure each breath we take. We must value each person and how he or she touches our lives everyday.
quotes.author: Shadonna Richards

quotes.quote: Our life becomes happier when we learn to appreciate all that we have rather than letting our focus be on what we do not have.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: People appreciate when you make an effort to speak their language.
quotes.author: Sam Altman

quotes.quote: Learn to appreciate your positives. It is far too easy for us to get carried away with perceived faults in our character.
quotes.author: Laurie Cain

quotes.quote: Everyone appreciates being appreciated!
quotes.author: Lance Mitchell

quotes.quote: Everyone wants to be appreciated, so if you appreciate someone, don't keep it a secret.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: You cannot appreciate what you have never experienced. Sadly, full appreciation tends to come only after the experience is past.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Sometimes we don't realize the blessings we have until we no longer have them. Appreciate all the blessings in your life, take none for granted.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: If you believe in others and give them a positive reputation to uphold, you can help them to become better than they think they are.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Being told something positive about yourself, whether from someone you're close to, or a passing acquaintance, should really lift the spirits. Just the fact that someone has taken the time to let you know, should have you feeling noticed and appreciated.
quotes.author: Paul Bailey

quotes.quote: You will never have enough, do enough or be enough, until you see yourself today as enough.
quotes.author: Cindy Keating

quotes.quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought, and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder.
quotes.author: GK Chesteron

quotes.quote: Appreciation is the highest form of prayer, for it acknowledges the presence of good wherever you shine the light of your thankful thoughts.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Not what we say about our blessings, but how we use them, is the true measure of our thanksgiving.
quotes.author: W.T. Purkiser

quotes.quote: I know what it's like to feel that fear and the need of affirmation and appreciation. To build confidence in yourself is the toughest thing.
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.quote: Appreciation is a wonderful thing: It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Be thankful for what you have and you'll end up having more.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: You won't be happy with more until you're happy with what you've got.
quotes.author: Viki King

quotes.quote: Things turn out best for people who make the best of the way things turn out.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Even in the mist of imperfection or mistakes, you can appreciate and draw close to your strengths.
quotes.author: Jason Scotts

quotes.quote: We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Feeling grateful or appreciative of someone or something in your life actually attracts more of the things that you appreciate and value into your life.
quotes.author: Northrup Christiane

quotes.quote: Now is no time to think of what you do not have. Think of what you can do with what there is.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Feeling appreciated is one of the most important needs that people have. When you share with someone your appreciation and gratitude, they will not forget you. Appreciation will return to you many times.
quotes.author: Steve Brunkhorst

quotes.quote: To speak gratitude is courteous and pleasant, to enact gratitude is generous and noble, but to live gratitude is to touch heaven.
quotes.author: Johannes Gaertner

quotes.quote: Feeling gratitude, and not expressing it, is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Be verbal in acknowledging your appreciation.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all others.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: A grateful mind is a great mind, which eventually attracts to itself great things.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The essence of all beautiful art is gratitude.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzche

quotes.quote: And you also know that we should appreciate the work of God's hands. But oftentimes we wish we looked differently than we do.
quotes.author: Patricia Meyers

quotes.quote: I feel a very unusual sensation â€“ if it is not indigestion, it must be gratitude.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: If you haven't all the things you want, be grateful for the things you don't have that you wouldn't want.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: My legacy doesn't matter. It isn't important that I be remembered. It's important that when I stand before the Lord, he says, 'Well done, good and faithful servant.' I want to finish strong.
quotes.author: James Dobson

quotes.quote: If you can't reward then you should thank.
quotes.author: Arabic Proverb

quotes.quote: Think of a special friend or person you admire. Think of the love and appreciation you have for them. Think of the qualities that make them stand out for you.
quotes.author: Jenny Clift

quotes.quote: Contentment is the reward of being appreciative and grateful. It goes that if you are grateful in every situation, you will be happy with everything and your happiness will be abundant and boundless.
quotes.author: Clement Getate

quotes.quote: No duty is more urgent than that of returning thanks.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: To live a life fulfilled reflect on the things you have with gratitude.
quotes.author: Jaren Davis

quotes.quote: There has never been another you. With no effort on your part you were born to be something very special and set apart. What you are going to do in appreciation of that gift is a decision only you can make.
quotes.author: Dan Zadra

quotes.quote: Appreciation can make a day, even change a life. Your willingness to put it into words is all that is necessary.
quotes.author: Margaret Cousins

quotes.quote: Whenever I count my blessings, I find myself becoming more grateful because the good things of life outweigh the not so pleasant things that are happening in my life.
quotes.author: James Jason

quotes.quote: It is not joy that makes us grateful; it is gratitude that makes us joyful.
quotes.author: David Steindl-Rast

quotes.quote: When you meet people, show real appreciation, then genuine curiosity.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: Some people are always grumbling because roses have thorns; I am thankful that thorns have roses.
quotes.author: Alphonse Karr

quotes.quote: It is necessary, then, to cultivate the habit of being grateful for every good thing that comes to you, and to give thanks continuously. And because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: Give thanks for a little and you will find a lot.
quotes.author: Hansa Proverb

quotes.quote: Well done is better than well said.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It's easy to not feel misplaced if this tidal wave of appreciation is coming your way.
quotes.author: Christoph Waltz

quotes.quote: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: We must value life and treasure each breath we take. We must value each person and how he or she touches our lives everyday.
quotes.author: Shadonna Richards

quotes.quote: Saying thank you is more than good manners. It is good spirituality.
quotes.author: Alfred Painter

quotes.quote: The deepest craving of human nature is the need to be appreciated.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: My son appreciates his life. Those who don't appreciate life do not deserve life.
quotes.author: Leigh Whannell

quotes.quote: Happiness grows at our firesides, and is not to be picked in stranger's garden.
quotes.author: Douglas Jerrold

quotes.quote: Happiness comes fleeting now and then to those who have learned to do without it, and to them only.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: The happiest people seem to be those who have no particular reason for being happy except that they are.
quotes.author: W. R. Inge

quotes.quote: You were supposed to be born into a world of joyful ecstasy.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: It may have been a bumpy ride on the planet, but you can claim your joy now.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Joy is an idea, but it's also an action or state of being.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Joy can pervade every part of your life if you let it.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Happy is the person who has learned the secret of being content with whatever life brings him, and has learned to rejoice in the simple and beautiful things around him.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Those who give up the things they love doing and do well lose their purpose in life.
quotes.author: Héctor García

quotes.quote: It's so important to keep doing things of value, making progress, bringing beauty or utility to others, helping out, and shaping the world around you, even after your 'official' professional activity has ended.
quotes.author: Héctor García

quotes.quote: Less is more when it comes to eating for long life, too. According to the 80 percent rule, in order to stay healthier longer, we should eat a little less than our hunger demands instead of stuffing ourselves.
quotes.author: Héctor García

quotes.quote: Friends are the best medicine, there for confiding worries over a good chat, sharing stories that brighten your day, getting advice, having fun, dreaming. In other words, living.
quotes.author: Héctor García

quotes.quote: The body you move through life in needs a bit of daily maintenance to keep it running for a long time. Plus, exercise releases hormones that make us feel happy.
quotes.author: Héctor García

quotes.quote: Everyone has bad days when happiness feels out of reach. And sure, you can't always control what happens, but you can control how you react to it.
quotes.author: Julia Dellitt

quotes.quote: Everyday is an opportunity to shift your mindset to a happier, more positive place.
quotes.author: Julia Dellitt

quotes.quote: If the sight of the blue skies fills you with joy, rejoice, for your soul is alive.
quotes.author: Eleanora Duse

quotes.quote: Pure and complete is as impossible as pure and complete joy.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: He who is of a calm and happy nature will hardly feel the pressure of age, but to him who is of an opposite disposition, youth and age are equally a burden.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
quotes.author: John Bowring

quotes.quote: Developing a cheerful disposition ca permit as atmosphere wherein one's spirit can be nurtured and encouraged to blossom and bear fruit. Being pessimistic and negative about our experiences will not enhance the quality of our lives. A determination to be of good cheer can help us and those around us to enjoy life more fully.
quotes.author: Barbara Winder

quotes.quote: Happiness surely is among the simplest of human emotions and the most spontaneous.
quotes.author: David Malouf

quotes.quote: I do not depend for my happiness upon what is happening to me. My life, my happiness, my joy and my experience are dependent of the things that are going on about me, and even of the things that may be happening to me.
quotes.author: D. Martyn Llyod-Jones

quotes.quote: The eleven secrets of a happy life aren't about splashy surface waves, but subsurface determinants of your whole way of being.
quotes.author: Bill Giovannetti

quotes.quote: Instead of worrying, write a list of things you're grateful for, happy about, hopeful for.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: Instead of worrying, think about good things for our loved ones.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: Whatever your path in life, if you can rely on yourself and have self confidence you succeed and be happy.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: You can't become a happy person or build a happier life without a clear understanding of what happiness is, what it means to you and what steps you can take to be happier.
quotes.author: Michele Moore

quotes.quote: And when you accept what is, you find strangely enough, that all there is left is a feeling of peace, and then you feel happy despite your troubles!
quotes.author: Barbara Berger

quotes.quote: But it is our interpretations of these inner and outer events that makes us feel good or bad, happy or sad.
quotes.author: Barbara Berger
