quotes.quote: Our unhappiness arises the minute we compare ourselves to other people or to what we think we should be doing and feelin g at this particular moment. But if we stop comparing, what's left?
quotes.author: Barbara Berger

quotes.quote: The truth is you and I can lead happy lives regardless or our situation. Because when we drop our interpretation of events, we find that happiness is our nature.
quotes.author: Barbara Berger

quotes.quote: Always give with a happy heart--that's what makes it real.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Way to a happy life-believe that anything is possible.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: We found habitually happy people have a very distinctive way of looking at the world that fuels their ever present joy and helps them from pain and distress.
quotes.author: Michele Moore

quotes.quote: Everyone wants to be happy and live an enjoyable, fulfilling life. Happiness is a universal human goal and desire.
quotes.author: Michele Moore

quotes.quote: Happiness is just like any other goal, you have to know what it is, how it works and what to odo to achieve it.
quotes.author: Michele Moore

quotes.quote: Happy people are 'positive evidence collectors' constantly looking for awesome things, people, and events to put into a mental folder labeled 'Proof Life is Awesome.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Don't change yourself, ever just to make someone happy. Unless that someone is you.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Don't waste your energy on hate and resentment; invest in love and contentment.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Happy people fill up their mental folders with lots of happy evidence that life is indeed awesome.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: It's amazing how powerful changing your belief system about the world can be. When you change the way you look at the world, you change what you notice and create for yourself.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: The best way to cheer yourself is to try to cheer someone else up.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The human race has one really effective weapon, and that is laughter.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The quest for a happy and meaningful life makes one thing clear; it not east to accomplish and each moment of happiness seems a fleeting experience.
quotes.author: Wassili Zafiris

quotes.quote: There are days it seems as if the whole world is trying to teach us something about happiness and being happy.
quotes.author: Wassili Zafiris

quotes.quote: On the one hand, our striving after happiness seems a survival mechanism, on the other hand, a slick advertising ploy to ensure that we keep the economy going.
quotes.author: Wassili Zafiris

quotes.quote: We live in a happiness culture, everything around us is aimed at happiness.
quotes.author: Wassili Zafiris

quotes.quote: Happiness is like the gold of life. Everybody wishes for it and once you have it you think you can deal with the world.
quotes.author: Wassili Zafiris

quotes.quote: There is twofold joy that comes to the person who possesses and practices the submissive mind.
quotes.author: Warren W. Wiersbe

quotes.quote: If you find yourself losing your inner peace and joy, stop and take inventory.
quotes.author: Warren W. Wiersbe

quotes.quote: Everyone has bad days when happiness feels out of reach. And sure, you can't always control what happens, but you can control how you react to it.
quotes.author: Julia Dellitt

quotes.quote: Everyday is an opportunity to shift your mindset to a happier, more positive place.
quotes.author: Julia Dellitt

quotes.quote: Our ambition should not be to win, then, but to play with our full effort. Our intention is not to be thanked or recognized, but to help and to do what we think is right.
quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

quotes.quote: Don't let your reflection on the whole sweep of life crush you. Don't fill your mind with all the bad things that might still happen. Stay focused on the present situation and ask yourself why it's so unbearable and can't be survived.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Be thankful for what you have. Focus on your strengths. Celebrate the strengths of others.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Positivity is more that a state of mind that makes you feel better. It's a state of action that makes your team and the world better.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: You have a desire to be great because you were meant to be average. Don't let fear keep you from becoming all you're meant to be.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Happiness is often the result of being too busy to be miserable.
quotes.author: Ramesh Deonaraine

quotes.quote: This is the true joy-the being used for the purpose recognized as a mighty one.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: You will never gain anyone's approval by begging for it. When you stand confident in your own worth, respect follows.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: I much prefer the sharpest criticism of a single intelligent man to the thoughtless approval of the masses.
quotes.author: Johannes Kepler

quotes.quote: What do you mean I have to wait for someone's approval? I'm someone. I approve. So I give myself permission to move forward with my full support!
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: A truly strong person does not need the approval of others any more than a lion needs the approval of sheep.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: Until we accept and approve of ourselves, no amount of approval from others will keep us permanently secure.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: When you lose need and take away the demand for validation you remain free of approval from the outside world.
quotes.author: Tammy Wooster

quotes.quote: Once we begin chasing approval, we never stop running. It's servitude to a thousand masters instead of one to please.
quotes.author: David Jeremiah

quotes.quote: We can secure other people's approval, if we do right and try hard but our own is worth a hundred of it, and no way has been found out of securing that.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: So long as you are still worried about what others think of you, you are owned by them. Only when you require no approval from outside yourself can you own yourself.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I have yet to find the man, however exalted his station, who did not do better work and put forth greater effort under a spirit of approval than under a spirit of criticism.
quotes.author: Charles Schwab

quotes.quote: Do not look for approval except for the consciousness of doing your best.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Work at not needing approval from anyone and you will be free to be who you really are.
quotes.author: Nachman of Breslov

quotes.quote: Blessed are the uncool; for they shall be happy without needing the approval of others.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Always speak and think kindly about yourself, because your soul needs your love and approval.
quotes.author: Doreen Virtue

quotes.quote: Needing approval is like saying 'your view of me is more important than my own opinion of myself'.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: People who want the most approval get the least and people who need approval the least get the most.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Getting that audience approval is always a question mark, and it's always that flag that flutters in front of you.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.quote: When you're appeasing too much, you might be egotistically over-estimating everyone's need for your approval.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Of course love is never earned. It is a grace we give one another. Anything we need to earn is only approval.
quotes.author: Rachel Naomi Remen

quotes.quote: The most splendid achievement of all is the constant striving to surpass yourself and to be worthy of your own approval.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: With age comes wisdom and confidence, and I don't feel like I'm seeking approval as much as I used to from other people.
quotes.author: Terri Clark

quotes.quote: Most fears of rejection rest on the desire for approval from other people. Don't base your self-esteem on their opinions.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: If we are addicted to people's approval, we will always experience pain when that approval is withdrawn--as it always is.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Our human condition makes us tend to share only the best of ourselves, because we are always searching for love and approval.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: You should resolve not to seek public approval of your private business, when you are not also prepared to accept public disapproval.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: It is our nature to conform; it is a force which not many can successfully resist. What is its seat? The inborn requirement of self-approval.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Many people think of perfectionism as striving to be your best, but it is not about self-improvement; it's about earning approval and acceptance.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Many people allow their need for other people's approval to control their lives. They spend their lives worrying about what others think of them.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Life ain't about how fast you run or how high you climb, It's all about how good you bounce. A man cannot be comfortable without his own approval.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You have to accept the fact that some people are never going to be for you. Treat them with respect, but you don't need their approval to fulfill your destiny.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: It seems, by today's standards, that it's better to seek approval than to tell the truth. It's better to utter sweet nothings than to boldly say something of substance.
quotes.author: Monica Johnson

quotes.quote: I didn't realize that I was in a self-made prison of human approval and human acceptance. Didn't even realize it. Most of the prisons we live in we are not conscious of.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.quote: We're so used to presenting ourselves and getting approval according to our achievements that it's difficult to be authentic and trust that we'll be accepted just as we are.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.quote: The people who receive the most approval in life are the ones who care the least about it--so technically, if you want the approval of others, you need to stop caring about it.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Remember, you have been criticizing yourself for years and it hasn’t worked. Try approving of yourself and see what happens.
quotes.author: Louise L. Hay

quotes.quote: Most people think everybody feels about them much more violently than they actually do; they think other people's opinions of them swing through great arcs of approval or disapproval.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: When a man has a gift in speaking the truth, brute aggression is no longer his security blanket for approval. He, on the contrary, spends most of his energy trying to tone it down because his very nature is already offensive enough.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Everyone wants to be liked; everyone wants approval. No one likes being ignored.
quotes.author: Mallory Ortberg

quotes.quote: I know it sounds really weedy, but we are all children who seek approval from our parents.
quotes.author: Gurinder Chadha

quotes.quote: A creative life cannot be sustained by approval any more than it can be destroyed by criticism.
quotes.author: Will Self

quotes.quote: There is nothing more shocking than to see assertion and approval dashing ahead of cognition and perception.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Pleasure is Nature's test, her sign of approval. When man is happy, he is in harmony with himself and his environment.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Comfort and luxury are usually the chief requirements of life for your ego - its top priorities tend to be accumulations, achievements, and the approval of others.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: When we consistently suppress and distrust our intuitive knowingness, looking instead for authority, validation, and approval from others, we give our personal power away.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: It was a bright cold day in April, and the clocks were striking thirteen.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: We can't possibly have a summer love. So many people have tried that the name's become proverbial. Summer is only the unfulfilled promise of spring, a charlatan in place of the warm balmy nights I dream of in April. It's a sad season of life without growth...It has no day.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: They came on one of April's most brilliant days--a day as sparkling as a newly-washed lemon...a day when even the shadows were a melange of blue and orange and jade, like the shadows that poured from the tipsy brush of Monet
quotes.author: Beverley Nichols

quotes.quote: April is the kindest month. April gets you out of your head and out working in the garden.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: But it is a sort of April-weather life that we lead in this world. A little sunshine is generally the prelude to a storm.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: You spend so much time hating the fact that April behaves more like a mother than a sister, but you're the one who's holding onto the apron strings every time she tries to cut them.
quotes.author: Nicola Sinclair

quotes.quote: The tantalizing scent transported me to a white, sandy beach lapped by a turquoise sea under a tropical sun. Lime and coconut were the getaway flavors my bakery customers needed in April, tax time.
quotes.author: Judith Fertig

quotes.quote: Again the blackbirds sings; the streams / Wake, laughing, from their winter dreams, / And tremble in the April showers / The tassels of the maple flowers.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: April in Paris, chestnuts in blossom, holiday tables under the trees.
quotes.author: E. Y. Harburg

quotes.quote: It is best to be born in April or August when the life-giving Sun is in its exaltation sign Aries or Leo, its home, for then we enter the sea of life on the crest-wave and are backed in the battle of existence by an abundant fund of vim and energy.
quotes.author: Max Heindel

quotes.quote: It was in the month of April, / When the boys they sailed away / And they made a sight so glorious, / As they marched along Broadway
quotes.author: Ken Casey

quotes.quote: April; the cruelest month / I reckon this much could be a contender / There's only so much sorrow a man can take / I can't change my face, Don't you remember?
quotes.author: Alexis Benjamin

quotes.quote: April, pride of woodland ways, / Of glad days, / April, bringing hope of prime, / To the young flowers that beneath / Their bud sheath / Are guarded in their tender time;
quotes.author: Remy Belleau

quotes.quote: April, joy of the green hours, / Clothes with flowers / Over all her locks of gold / My sweet Lady; and her breast / With the blest / Birds of summer manifold.
quotes.author: Remy Belleau

quotes.quote: April, by thy hand caressed, / From her breast / Nature scatters everywhere / Handfuls of all sweet perfumes, / Buds and blooms, / Making faint the earth and air.
quotes.author: Remy Belleau

quotes.quote: Daffodil and eglantine, / And woodbine, / Lily, violet, and rose / Plentiful in April fair, / To the air, / Their pretty petals do unclose.
quotes.author: Remy Belleau

quotes.quote: April, all to welcome thee, / Spring sets free / Ancient flames, and with low breath / Wakes the ashes grey and old / That the cold / Chilled within our hearts to death.
quotes.author: Remy Belleau

quotes.quote: April again! the willow wands are yellow / Rose-red the brambles that the passing wind knows, / Comes a / robin's note like the note of a 'cello, / And across the valley, the calling of the crows,- / April again!
quotes.author: Virna Sheard

quotes.quote: April with its haunting joy, and swift-stinging tears,- / Month of mist and music, and the old moon-madness, / Month of magic fluting, the spirit only hears
quotes.author: Virna Sheard

quotes.quote: O sweet wild April / Came over the hills, / He skipped with the winds / And he tripped with the rills; / His raiment was all / Of the daffodils. / Sing hi, / Sing hey, / Sing ho!
quotes.author: William Force Stead

quotes.quote: The April sun, the April sun, / Glints through the rain in fitful splendor, / And in grey shaw and woodland dun / The little leaves spring forth and tender
quotes.author: Mathilde Blind

quotes.quote: When April comes with softly shining eyes, / And daffodils bound in her wind-blown hair, / Oh, she will coax all clouds from out the skies, / And every day will bring some sweet surprise,-- / The swallows will come swinging through the air / When April comes!
quotes.author: Virna Sheard

quotes.quote: And at the break of morning we will hear / The piping of the robins crystal clear-- / While bobolinks will whistle through the days, / When April comes!
quotes.author: Virna Sheard

quotes.quote: April now walks the fields again, / Trailing her tearful leaves / And holding all her frightened buds against her heart: / Wrapt in her clouds and mists, / She walks, / Groping her way among the graves of men.
quotes.author: Leonora Speyer

quotes.quote: April is in the world again, / And all the world is filled with flowers- / Flowers for others, not for me! / For my one flower I cannot see, / Lost in the April showers.
quotes.author: Richard Le Gallienne

quotes.quote: Sang the sun rise on an amber morn - / Earth, be glad! An April day is born. / Winter's done, and April's in the skies, / Earth, look up with laughter in your eyes!
quotes.author: Sir Charles George Douglas Roberts

quotes.quote: But April always, as I find thee now: / A constant freshness unto me be thou, / And not the ripeness that must soon be sere. / Why should I be Time's dupe, and wish more near
quotes.author: Alfred Austin

quotes.quote: April is, by universal consent, admitted to be the month of 'fools'.
quotes.author: Joseph Grimaldi

quotes.quote: April will not fail to turn out as it should be, and as it generally is, one of the sweetest, dearest, loveliest months of the year.
quotes.author: Joseph Grimaldi

quotes.quote: Yes, April is a lovely, soul-inspiring, life-invigorating month.
quotes.author: Joseph Grimaldi

quotes.quote: In April, the first soft, tender, delicate green of spring salutes the eye in every direction.
quotes.author: Joseph Grimaldi

quotes.quote: April is a month of melody. In April, you can hear the warbling of mockingbirds and the chattering or squirrels.
quotes.author: Ellen Jackson

quotes.quote: April is courtship time for many animals.
quotes.author: Ellen Jackson

quotes.quote: How the rain showers come in the month of April, bringing nourishment to the flowers so they can bloom in the spring.
quotes.author: David C. Reyes

quotes.quote: The coming of April heralds the time to plant seeds of magic and fill the heart and home with the joy of light and life.
quotes.author: Lotuswulf Satyrhorn

quotes.quote: The month of April is often brings the rains needed to stimulate growth in the earth and fertility is reaching for its peak.
quotes.author: Lotuswulf Satyrhorn

quotes.quote: April is a time of growth, magic and joy for the otherkin coven.
quotes.author: Lotuswulf Satyrhorn

quotes.quote: Spring is in the air, certainly in this merry month of April, and with April showers, there are May flowers.
quotes.author: Summer Bacon

quotes.quote: It dances like water in the stream, my dear friends, the water of April showers that bring the May flowers of your soul to life.
quotes.author: Summer Bacon

quotes.quote: You will feel the intoxication if you live life very consciously in this beautiful, merry month of April.
quotes.author: Summer Bacon

quotes.quote: April showers could bring a cold winter mood when it poured. Then when it was gone, it wasn't warm or cold, but stayed in a residual flavor of both.
quotes.author: R. Lupi

quotes.quote: April mark as the real end of winter. Daffodils pop open and nod their yellow heads. Grass starts to recover from its frozen cover of snow, trees bud, forsythia shows its yellow cloak, tulips display their lips, and the animals--chipmunks, squirrels, rabbits and other animals--wake up from their winter sleep.
quotes.author: Sharon Leah

quotes.quote: Rain soaks the earth, prompting growth and preparing the flowers of the season. And we find ourselves shedding our winter coats on the first warm spring day. This is April!
quotes.author: Sharon Leah

quotes.quote: A gush of bird-song, a patter of dew, A cloud, and a rainbow's warning, Suddenly sunshine and perfect blue-- An April day in the morning.
quotes.author: Harriet Prescott Spofford

quotes.quote: April is the cruelest month, breeding lilacs out of the dead land, mixing memory and desire, stirring dull roots with spring rain.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Here cometh April again, and as far as I can see the world hath more fools in it than ever.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Some people can't be fooled on April Fool's Day because they were fooled too many times during their entire lifetime.
quotes.author: Akash B Chandran

quotes.quote: April showers bring forth May flowers.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Sweet April showers Do bring May flowers.
quotes.author: Thomas Tusser

quotes.quote: April hath put a spirit of youth in everything.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Oh, the lovely fickleness of an April day!
quotes.author: W. H. Gibson

quotes.quote: The April winds are magical, And thrill our tuneful frames; The garden-walks are passional To bachelors and dames.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: April fool, n. The March fool with another month added to his folly.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Sweet April's tears, Dead on the hem of May.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: April weather, rain and sunshine both together.
quotes.author: English Country Saying

quotes.quote: April is a promise that May is bound to keep.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.quote: If April showers should come your way, they bring the flowers that bloom in May.
quotes.author: Buddy de Sylva

quotes.quote: Why are people so tired on April 1st? Because they just finished a 31-day March.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: April Fools gone past, and you're the biggest fool at last.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The first of April is the day we remember what we are the other 364 days of the year.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: April comes like an idiot, babbling and stewing flowers.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: Our spring has come at last with the soft laughter of April suns and shadow of April showers.
quotes.author: Byron Caldwell Smith

quotes.quote: April prepares her green traffic light and the world thinks Go.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: One of the hallmarks of the sign of Aquarius is the campaign for justice. Everybody is my brother. Justice is very important to me.
quotes.author: Morgan Fairchild

quotes.quote: As an Aquarius, I was born an outsider. I'm awkward at social events. I can be social, but I feel like nobody truly understands who I am.
quotes.author: Denzel Curry

quotes.quote: The good news is that she is one of the nicest people in the universe. The bad news is, that's because she always does exactly what she pleases. An Aquarius female is rebellious, headstrong, and contrary. She can be selfishly independent and exasperating, especially when she is running through the house screaming, "freedom!
quotes.author: Hazel Dixon-Cooper

quotes.quote: A new consciousness has been emerging through the age of Aquarius, and a rapid spiritual awakening is occurring, which science, and organized religions have not yet fully tapped into.
quotes.author: J.J. Hughes

quotes.quote: When the moon is in the seventh house / And Jupiter aligns with Mars, / Then peace will guide the planets, / And love will steer the stars; / This is the dawning of the age of Aquarius, / The age of Aquarius.
quotes.author: Gerome Ragni

quotes.quote: The 'Aquarian Age'. It is a new age and a new change will come about.
quotes.author: Peter Max

quotes.quote: My name is Dean Winchester. I'm an Aquarius, I enjoy sunsets, long walks on the beach and frisky women.
quotes.author: Dean Winchester

quotes.quote: Interesting? Arre, then you must be Aquarius. You're both intelligent and beautiful.
quotes.author: KP aka Kut Price

quotes.quote: We have manic people talking about the Age of Aquarius, where everything is just going to be wonderful, and then we have depressive people talking about atomic bombs and the destruction of civilization.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: I need you Aquarius / Enchanted I will have to stay / I feel you Aquarius / Cause you the sea set me free / You call to me Aquarius / You call to me, you set me free.
quotes.author: Daniel Gibson

quotes.quote: Aquarius, was born the night / The shining stars, needed brighter shining light / Aquarius, was my savior / It came along, like a blast from out of sight / When I was weak, you came along / Enlightened me, covered the sun / You seduced me, I can never ever run / Aquarius, is the stardust / It kills the faith, and the only one I trust / It calls your name, and you listen / It steals your soul, and your hunger and your lust.
quotes.author: James Rado

quotes.quote: Children of Aquarius / Your world is my world / I've waited for a long time for our time to come / Children of Aquarius / Your dream is my dream / Your soul and my soul have now become one.
quotes.author: Marcus Uzilevsky

quotes.quote: How is your trade, Aquarius, / This frosty night? / Complaints is many and various / And my feet are cold, says Aquarius, / There's Venus objects to Dolphin-scales, / And Mars to Crab-spawn found in my pails, / And the pump has frozen to-night, / And the pump has frozen to-night.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: These, and far more than these, / The Poet sees! / He can behold / Aquarius old / Walking the fenceless fields of air; / And from each ample fold / Of the clouds about him rolled / Scattering everywhere / The showery rain, / As the farmer scatters his grain.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The solar fires now faint and wat'ry burn, / Just where with ice Aquarius frets his urn! / If thaw'd, forth issue, from its mouth severe, / Raw clouds, that sadden all th' inverted year.
quotes.author: Richard Savage

quotes.quote: Aquarius think about all of their options fully before making a decision, and will worry nonstop in hopes that they made the right one.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You see, in the image of Aquarius, it's a man who pours water into the fish. Now the fish is the unconscious. It is not enough just to have it. We have to actively turn towards it and support it so that it then helps us.
quotes.author: Marie Louise von Franz

quotes.quote: The Age of Aquarius is the age of excellence in which personal purity shall absolutely matter.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh Yogi

quotes.quote: I love water - I'm an Aquarius, but that has nothing to do with it - and I've never been away from water in any place.
quotes.author: Andre Balazs

quotes.quote: Aquarius is a miscellaneous set of stars all at different distances from us, which have no connection with each other except that they constitute a (meaningless) pattern when seen from a certain (not particularly special) place in the galaxy (here).
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: In the Age of Aquarius, the depression and stress on mankind will tear up people who do not have the technical knowledge of self.
quotes.author: Yogi Bhajan

quotes.quote: Archaeology is like a jigsaw puzzle, except that you can't cheat and look at the box, and not all the pieces are there.
quotes.author: Stephen Dean

quotes.quote: The limitations of archaeology are galling. It collects phenomena, but hardly ever can isolate them so as to interpret scientifically; it can frame any number of hypotheses, but rarely, if ever, scientifically prove.
quotes.author: David George Hogarth

quotes.quote: Archaeology gives a sense of place. It grounds us within the landscape and every place is unique. … Archaeology can also give an understanding of where we come from.
quotes.author: Stephen Dean

quotes.quote: Archaeology is the peeping Tom of the sciences. It is the sandbox of men who care not where they are going; they merely want to know where everyone else has been.
quotes.author: Jim Bishop

quotes.quote: For me archaeology is not a source of illustrations for written texts, but an independent source of historical information, with no less value and importance, sometimes more importance, that the written sources.
quotes.author: Michael I. Rostovtzeff

quotes.quote: Were I asked to define it, I should reply that archæology is that science which enables us to register and classify our knowledge of the sum of man’s achievement in those arts and handicrafts whereby he has, in time past, signalized his passage from barbarism to civilization.
quotes.author: Amelia Blanfold Edwards

quotes.quote: History may be accurate. But archaeology is precise.
quotes.author: Doug Scott

quotes.quote: Archaeology is not only the hand maid of history, it is also the conservator of art.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Archaeology is the study of humanity itself, and unless that attitude towards the subject is kept in mind archaeology will be overwhelmed by impossible theories or a welter of flint chips.
quotes.author: Margaret Murray

quotes.quote: In archaeology, context is the basis of many discoveries that are imputed to the deliberate workings of intelligence. If I find a rock chipped in such a way as to give it a sharp edge, and the discovery is made in a cave, I am seduced into ascribing this to tool use by distant, fetid and furry ancestors.
quotes.author: Seth Shostak

quotes.quote: Archaeology holds all the keys to understanding who we are and where we come from.
quotes.author: Sarah Parcak

quotes.quote: In archaeology, context is everything. Objects allow us to reconstruct the past. Taking artifacts from a temple or an ancient private house is like emptying out a time capsule.
quotes.author: Sarah Parcak

quotes.quote: When you think about archaeology, archaeology is the only field that allows us to tell the story of 99 percent of our history prior to 3,000 B.C. and writing.
quotes.author: Sarah Parcak

quotes.quote: As the archaeology of our thought easily shows, man is an invention of recent date. And one perhaps nearing its end.
quotes.author: Michael Foucault

quotes.quote: In archaeology you uncover the unknown. In diplomacy you cover the known.
quotes.author: Thomas R. Pickering

quotes.quote: Archaeology is the anthropology of the past, and science fiction is the anthropology of the future.
quotes.author: Joan D. Vinge

quotes.quote: What's interesting in archaeology is that we always understand other cultures by digging up their cities; architecture is almost always a way for us to formulate a diagram of how people used to live.
quotes.author: Jimenez Lai

quotes.quote: Hell, I don't break the soil periodically to 'reaffirm my status'. I do it because archeology is still the most fun you can have with your pants on.
quotes.author: Kent V. Flannery

quotes.quote: There can be no doubt that archaeology has confirmed the substantial historicity of Old Testament tradition.
quotes.author: William F. Albright

quotes.quote: Archaeology is the science of digging in the earth to try and find a civilization worse than ours.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Statements that will hold good for all time are difficult to obtain in archaeology. The most that can be done at any one time is to report on the current state of knowledge.
quotes.author: Jennifer K. McArthur

quotes.quote: I have been photographing the portrait of an end of an era, as machines and computers replace human workers. What we have in these pictures is an archeology
quotes.author: Sebastiao Salgado

quotes.quote: Archery does not get difficult or hard to understand until the arrow misses.
quotes.author: Milan E. Elott

quotes.quote: In archery we have something like the way of the superior man. When the archer misses the center of the target, he turns round and seeks for the cause of his failure in himself.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: There is no excellence in archery without great labour.
quotes.author: Maurice Thompson

quotes.quote: In the case of archery, the hitter and the hit are no longer two opposing objects, but are one reality.
quotes.author: Eugen Herrigel

quotes.quote: A good archer is known not by his arrows but by his aim.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: An archer cannot hit the bullseye if he doesn't know where the target is.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: But you must be patient and careful; nor should you expect to become an accomplished archer without long and severe training.
quotes.author: Maurice Thompson

quotes.quote: So long as the new moon returns in heaven a bent, beautiful bow, so long will the fascination of archery keep hold in the hearts of men.
quotes.author: Maurice Thompson

quotes.quote: Whether you are a beginning, intermediate, or even advanced archer, Archery will give you something that's almost impossible to find elsewhere.
quotes.author: Usa Archery

quotes.quote: The archer that shoots badly has a lie ready.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Even as the archer loves the arrow that flies, so too he loves the bow that remains constant in his hands.
quotes.author: Nigerian Proverb

quotes.quote: You have to relax when you're shooting an arrow. You can't be tense. And that just helps, in your day-to-day life.
quotes.author: Stephen Amell

quotes.quote: Nothing clears a troubled mind better than shooting a bow.
quotes.author: Fred Bear

quotes.quote: I shoot an arrow into the air, where it lands I do not care: I get my arrows wholesale!
quotes.author: Curly Howard

quotes.quote: An arrow is never afraid of shooting from the bow; but it is afraid of not reaching the target!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Draw not your bow till your arrow is fixed.
quotes.author: English Proverbs

quotes.quote: Don't think of what you have to do, don't consider how to carry it out! The shot will only go smoothly when it takes the archer himself by surprise.
quotes.author: Eugen Herrigel

quotes.quote: If you would hit the mark [at long range], you must aim a little above it: Every arrow that flies feels the pull of the earth.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: In the long run, you only hit what you aim at.
quotes.author: Henry Thoreau

quotes.quote: You are the bows from which your children as living arrows are sent forth.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: The archer sees the make upon the path of the infinite, and He bends you with His might that His arrows may go swift and far.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Fundamentally the marksman aims at himself.
quotes.author: D.T. Suzuki

quotes.quote: I can teach you to shoot better than the greatest archer in 30 minutes provided we blindfold him and spin him around so he doesn't know where the target is at.
quotes.author: Peter Hill

quotes.quote: The archer is the true weapon; the bow is just a long piece of wood.
quotes.author: Sebastien de Castell

quotes.quote: If love be blind, love cannot hit the mark.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The way to write is to throw your body at the mark when all your arrows are spent.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I'm not sure why anyone on the face of the planet would want to use a bow and arrow. I mean, it seems like a fairly limited field of expertise and usefulness. Unless your name is Katniss.
quotes.author: Andrea Portes

quotes.quote: Famous archer, Howard Hill won all of the 267 archery contests he entered. He could hit a bullseye at 50 feet, then split first arrow with the second. Would it be possible for you to shoot better than him? YES, if he were blindfolded! How can you hit a target you can't see? Even worse, how can you hit a target you don't even have!? You need to have GOALS in your life!
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The history of the bow and arrow is the history of mankind
quotes.author: Fred Bear

quotes.quote: The shot will go smoothly only when it takes the archer himself by surprise.
quotes.author: Eugen Herrigel

quotes.quote: Archery is something that I took up later and didn't know I had a natural aptitude for.
quotes.author: Geena Davis

quotes.quote: I am a very good archer. I use archery as my way of meditation. I cannot sit down and just meditate in the classical sense. I am very active. So, I use archery. I have my bow, my arrow and I use this tension and relaxation in the second after throwing the arrow. And it is my way to meditate and this is the only thing that clears my mind. When I do archery, I am totally there with my bow, my target, my arrow, and I don't think, I am communion with the universe.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: You are the bows from which your children as living arrows are sent forth.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: I don't enjoy indoor archery especially with myself as a possible target.
quotes.author: Richard Schayer

quotes.quote: Yes. Robin even said that I was as good at archery as I am at magic.
quotes.author: Marc Thompson

quotes.quote: I need a break. There's no retirement home for assassins is there? Archery at four. Riflery at five.
quotes.author: Richard Shepard

quotes.quote: He's well-known for his archery skills, and shows it off with his trusty weapon of choice: the Palutena Bow.
quotes.author: Sam Mitchell

quotes.quote: Our mental discipline is matched only by our skill in archery... I only hope these are enough to withstand this awful trial.
quotes.author: Stieg Hedlund

quotes.quote: Oh, of course, the returning game. I had no idea you were so interested in archery.
quotes.author: Paolo Levi

quotes.quote: Do you know anyone hiring ex-billionaires with superior archery skills?
quotes.author: Greg Berlanti

quotes.quote: Perfect precision marksman / Spit darts and flip charts, and / Archery shots aimed at your heart then
quotes.author: Clifford Smith

quotes.quote: We walk out to archery / And trail behind the pack / His shoes kick up Caliche / As he shuffles like me
quotes.author: T.C. Superstar

quotes.quote: I think I finally learned to swim alone in the deep end / Oh I gotta go, Oh it's time for archery, it starts at 3
quotes.author: Brittni Nichole Stewart

quotes.quote: My archery is all unlearn'd / And grief against myself has turn'd / My arrows and my bow!
quotes.author: Thomas Hood

quotes.quote: When from a meadow by / Like a storm suddenly / The English archery / Stuck the French horses.
quotes.author: Michael Drayton

quotes.quote: Tis, I believe, this archery to show / That so much cost in colors thou / And skill in painting, dost bestow / Upon thy ancient arms, the gaudy heavenly bow.
quotes.author: Abraham Cowley

quotes.quote: To practise games and archery / How proud and happy they! the crowd / Of Lookers-on how pleased and proud! / And from the scorching noon-tide sun.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Archery has been there since ages but it has not lost its exuberance. Although advent of firearms made archery obsolete still there are people who love archery.
quotes.author: Andrew Harrison

quotes.quote: Archery is the skill of shooting arrows from a bow at a target.
quotes.author: Andrew Harrison

quotes.quote: There are two types of archeries the Target Archery and the Field Archery.
quotes.author: Andrew Harrison

quotes.quote: Archery is the game that involves the shooting of arrows that is released from the bow and shot at a target.
quotes.author: Andrew Harrison

quotes.quote: The Sport of Archery: What Is Archery? Archery Lessons On How to Make a Bow & Arrow, the History of Archery, Best Archery Equipment and Tips On Hitting the Target.
quotes.author: Andrew Harrison

quotes.quote: Archery was introduced as an official sport in the 1900 Paris Olympic Games and included in the 1904, 1908, and 1920 Olympics.
quotes.author: Dennis J. Caine

quotes.quote: Among the arts that have been carried to a high degree of perfection in this kingdom, there is no one more conspicuous than that of Archery.
quotes.author: Joseph Strutt

quotes.quote: Our ancestors used the bow for a double purpose: in the time war, it was a dreadful instrument of destruction; and in peace it became an object of amusement.
quotes.author: Joseph Strutt

quotes.quote: In Elizabeth's reign archery was warmly recommended as a healthy pastime
quotes.author: Joseph Strutt

quotes.quote: Forsake your lov'd Olympian games awhile, With which the tedious minutes you beguile, Wave quoits and nine-pins, those bear-garden sports, And follow shooting, often used at courts.
quotes.author: Joseph Strutt

quotes.quote: Long did he live the honour of the bow, And his long life to that alone did owe ; But how can art secure, or what can save Extreme old age from an appointed grave? Surviving archers much his loss lament, And in respect bestow'd this monument, Where whistling arrows did his worth proclaim, And eternize his memory and name.
quotes.author: Joseph Strutt

quotes.quote: The sport of archery! This modern sport with ancient roots has grown in recent years to become one of the world's fastest-growing Olympic sports.
quotes.author: Teresa Johnson

quotes.quote: Nearly every culture in the world has created some form of archery in its history-for survival, combat, and competition.
quotes.author: Teresa Johnson

quotes.quote: Recently, archery has been at the forefront of pop culture, making appearances in films such as The Hunger Games and Brave, and it was one of the most-watched sports at the London 2012 Olympic Games.
quotes.author: Teresa Johnson

quotes.quote: Archery tournaments and festivals remained strong in Europe long after bows were replaced by gunpowder for defense.
quotes.author: Teresa Johnson

quotes.quote: Archery evolved into a competitive sport not only in Europe but also in Asia and the United States.
quotes.author: Teresa Johnson

quotes.quote: Architecture is the will of the age conceived in spatial terms.
quotes.author: Ludwig Mies Van Der Rohe

quotes.quote: Any work of architecture which does not express serenity is a mistakes.
quotes.author: Luis Barragan

quotes.quote: Architecture is not an inspirational business, it's a rational procedure to do sensible and hopefully beautiful things; that's all.
quotes.author: Harry Seidler

quotes.quote: Architecture should speak of its time and place, but yearn for timelessness.
quotes.author: Frank Gehry

quotes.quote: A great building must begin with the unmeasurable, must go through measurable means when it is being designed and in the end must be unmeasurable.
quotes.author: Louis Kahn

quotes.quote: Architecture starts when you carefully put two bricks together. There is begins.
quotes.author: Ludwig Mies Van Der Rohe

quotes.quote: Architecture is the alpha principle of all arts.
quotes.author: Louis-Ferdinand Céline

quotes.quote: The hand expresses what the heart already knows.
quotes.author: Samuel Mockbee

quotes.quote: The physician can bury his mistakes, but the architect can only advise his client to plant vines.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Modern architecture does not mean the use of immature new materials; the main thing is to refine materials in a more human direction.
quotes.author: Alvar Aalto

quotes.quote: One of the great beauties of architecture is that each time it is like life starting all over again.
quotes.author: Renzo Piano

quotes.quote: All architecture is great architecture after sunset; perhaps architecture is really a nocturnal art, like the art of fireworks.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Architecture is the king or queen of the arts.
quotes.author: Gaetano Pesce

quotes.quote: Only architecture that considers human scale and interaction is successful architecture.
quotes.author: Jan Gehl

quotes.quote: Architecture is really about well-being. I think that people want to feel good in a space. On the one hand it's about shelter, but it's also about pleasure.
quotes.author: Zaha Hadid

quotes.quote: Architecture is supposed to complete nature. Great architecture makes nature more beautiful it gives it power.
quotes.author: Claudio Silvestrin

quotes.quote: Architecture is about public space held by buildings.
quotes.author: Richard Rogers

quotes.quote: Architecture begins where engineering ends.
quotes.author: Walter Gropius

quotes.quote: Architecture depends on its time. It is the crystallization of its inner structure, the slow unfolding of its form.
quotes.author: Ludwig Mies Van Der Rohe

quotes.quote: Architecture is basically a container of something. I hope they will enjoy not so much the teacup, but the tea.
quotes.author: Yoshio Taniguchi

quotes.quote: Architecture is a visual art, and the buildings speak for themselves.
quotes.author: Julia Morgan

quotes.quote: Architecture can't force people to connect, it can only plan the crossing points, remove barriers, and make the meeting places useful and attractive.
quotes.author: Denise Scott Brown

quotes.quote: Architecture is about the understanding of the world and turning it into a more meaningful and humane place.
quotes.author: Juhani Pallasmaa

quotes.quote: As an architect you design for the present, with an awareness of the past, for a future which is essentially unknown.
quotes.author: Norman Foster

quotes.quote: Architecture is a political act, by nature. It has to do with the relationships between people and how they decide to change their conditions of living.
quotes.author: Lebbeus Woods

quotes.quote: We shape our buildings; thereafter they shape us.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The mother art is architecture. Without an architecture of our own we have no soul of our own civilization.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Home development is about wishful thinking. It's about capturing a dream.
quotes.author: Barbara Delinsky

quotes.quote: Architecture is like a mythical fantastic. It has to be experienced. It can't be described. We can draw it up and we can make models of it, but it can only be experienced as a complete whole.
quotes.author: Maya Lin

quotes.quote: All architecture is shelter, all great architecture is the design of space that contains, cuddles, exalts, or stimulates the persons in that space.
quotes.author: Philip Johnson

quotes.quote: Whenever we witness art in a building, we are aware of an energy contained by it.
quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

quotes.quote: We need houses as we need clothes, architecture stimulates fashion. It's like hunger and thirst you need them both.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: A building is not just a place to be but a way to be.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: I think architecture is one of the predominant orderings of social space. It can construct and contain our experiences. It defines our days and nights. It literally puts us in our place.
quotes.author: Barbara Kruger

quotes.quote: Architecture should be dedicated to keeping the outside out and the inside in.
quotes.author: Leonard Baskin

quotes.quote: Architecture is the very mirror of life. You only have to cast your eyes on buildings to feel the presence of the past, the spirit of a place; they are the reflection of society.
quotes.author: I. M. Pei

quotes.quote: Architecture is what nature cannot make. Architecture is something unnatural but not something made up.
quotes.author: Louis Kahn

quotes.quote: Architecture is how the person places herself in the space. Fashion is about how you place the object on the person.
quotes.author: Zaha Hadid

quotes.quote: Architecture is an expression of values.
quotes.author: Norman Foster

quotes.quote: I believe that architecture is a pragmatic art. To become art it must be built on a foundation of necessity.
quotes.author: I. M. Pei

quotes.quote:
Architecture appears for the first time when the sunlight hits a wall.
The sunlight did not know what it was before it hit a wall.
quotes.author: Louis Kahn

quotes.quote: Architecture is bound to situation. And I feel like the site is a metaphysical link, a poetic link, to what a building can be.
quotes.author: Steven Holl

quotes.quote: Architecture is not based on concrete and steel, and the elements of the soil. It's based on wonder.
quotes.author: Daniel Libeskind

quotes.quote: Architecture is the learned game, correct and magnificent, of forms assembled in the light.
quotes.author: Le Corbusier

quotes.quote: In architecture the pride of man, his triumph over gravitation, his will to power, assume a visible form. Architecture is a sort of oratory of power by means of forms.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Architecture is my first love, if you want to talk about what moves me the ordering of space, the visual pleasure, architecture's power to construct our days and nights.
quotes.author: Barbara Kruger

quotes.quote: Architecture is a art when one consciously or unconsciously creates aesthetic emotion in the atmosphere and when this environment produces well being.
quotes.author: Luis Barragan

quotes.quote: This building is like a book. Its architecture is the binding, its text is in the glass and sculpture.
quotes.author: Malcolm Miller

quotes.quote: Architecture is the will of an epoch translated into space.
quotes.author: Ludwig Mies Van Der Rohe

quotes.quote: Whatever good things we build end up building us.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Architecture is the art of how to waste space.
quotes.author: Philip Johnson

quotes.quote: It is not the beauty of a building you should look at; it's the construction of the foundation that will stand the test of time.
quotes.author: David Allan Coe

quotes.quote: Every great architect is - necessarily - a great poet. He must be a great original interpreter of his time, his day, his age.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Make big plans; aim high in hope and work, remembering that a noble, logical diagram once recorded will not die, but long after we are gone be a living thing, asserting itself with ever growing insistence.
quotes.author: Daniel Burnham

quotes.quote: Building art is a synthesis of life in materialised form. We should try to bring in under the same hat not a splintered way of thinking, but all in harmony together.
quotes.author: Alvar Aalto

quotes.quote: My buildings will be my legacy... they will speak for me long after I'm gone.
quotes.author: Julia Morgan

quotes.quote: I try to give people a different way of looking at their surroundings. That's art to me.
quotes.author: Maya Lin

quotes.quote: Color in certain places has the great value of making the outlines and structural planes seem more energetic.
quotes.author: Antoni Gaudi

quotes.quote: Architecture arouses sentiments in man. The architect's task therefore, is to make those sentiments more precise.
quotes.author: Adolf Loos

quotes.quote: Space has always been the spiritual dimension of architecture. It is not the physical statement of the structure so much as what it contains that moves us.
quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

quotes.quote: My passion and great enjoyment for architecture, and the reason the older I get the more I enjoy it, is because I believe we - architects - can effect the quality of life of the people.
quotes.author: Richard Rogers

quotes.quote: Great buildings that move the spirit have always been rare. In every case they are unique, poetic, products of the heart.
quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

quotes.quote: I don't divide architecture, landscape and gardening; to me they are one.
quotes.author: Luis Barragan

quotes.quote: I believe that the way people live can be directed a little by architecture.
quotes.author: Tadao Ando

quotes.quote: The dialogue between the client and architect is about as intimate as any conversation you can have, because when you're talking about building a house, you're talking about dreams.
quotes.author: Robert A. M. Stern

quotes.quote: Good buildings come from good people, and all problems are solved by good design.
quotes.author: Stephen Gardiner

quotes.quote: To provide meaningful architecture is not to parody history but to articulate it.
quotes.author: Daniel Libeskind

quotes.quote: All the revision in the world will not save a bad first draft: for the architecture of the thing comes, or fails to come, in the first conception, and revision only affects the detail and ornament.
quotes.author: T. E. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Architecture, of all the arts, is the one which acts the most slowly, but the most surely, on the soul.
quotes.author: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.quote: When you look at Japanese traditional architecture, you have to look at Japanese culture and its relationship with nature. You can actually live in a harmonious, close contact with nature - this very unique to Japan.
quotes.author: Tadao Ando

quotes.quote: Architects in the past have tended to concentrate their attention on the building as a static object. I believe dynamics are more important: the dynamics of people, their interaction with spaces and environmental condition.
quotes.author: John Portman

quotes.quote: Architects have made architecture too complex. We need to simplify it and use a language that everyone can understand.
quotes.author: Toyo Ito

quotes.quote: Architects of grandeur are often the master builders of disillusionment.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: No architecture is so haughty as that which is simple.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: A structure becomes architectural, and not sculptural, when its elements no longer have their justification in nature.
quotes.author: Guillaume Apollinaire

quotes.quote: I love building spaces: architecture, furniture, all of it, probably more than fashion. The development procedure is more tactile. It's about space and form and it's something you can share with other people.
quotes.author: Donna Karan

quotes.quote: To work in architecture you are so much involved with society, with politics, with bureaucrats. It's a very complicated process to do large projects. You start to see the society, how it functions, how it works. Then you have a lot of criticism about how it works.
quotes.author: Ai Weiwei

quotes.quote: Architect: One who drafts a plan of your house, and plans a draft of your money.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The future of architecture does not lie so much in continuing to fill up the landscape as in bringing back life and order to our cities and towns.
quotes.author: Gottfried Boehm

quotes.quote: Architecture is the alphabet of giants; it is the largest set of symbols ever made to meet the eyes of men. A tower stands up like a sort of simplified stature, of much more than heroic size.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The brevity of human life gives a melancholy to the profession of the architect.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I call architecture petrified music. Really there is something in this: The tone of mind produced by architecture approaches the effect of music.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Of all the forms of visible otherworldliness, the Gothic is at once the most logical and the most beautiful. It reaches up magnificently—and a good half of it is palpably worthless.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: When we build, let us think that we build forever. Let it not be for present delight, nor for present use alone; let it be such work as our descendants will thank us for, and let us think, as we lay stone on stone, that a time is to come when those stones will be held sacred because our hands have touched them, and that men will say as they look upon the labor and wrought substance of them, See! this our fathers did for us.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Architects believe that not only do they sit at the right hand of God, but that if God ever gets up, they take the chair.
quotes.author: Karen Moyer

quotes.quote: In my experience, if you have to keep the lavatory door shut by extending your left leg, it's modern architecture.
quotes.author: Nancy Banks Smith

quotes.quote: Ah, to build, to build! That is the noblest of all the arts.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Architecture is not all about the design of the building and nothing else, it is also about the cultural setting and the ambiance, the whole affair.
quotes.author: Michael Graves

quotes.quote: I don't think of form as a kind of architecture. The architecture is the result of the forming. It is the kinesthetic and visual sense of position and wholeness that puts the thing into the realm if art.
quotes.author: Roy Lichtenstein

quotes.quote: Architecture should be at the head of the arts, not at the foot of the professions.
quotes.author: Reginald Blomfield

quotes.quote: Most architects think in drawings, or did think in drawings; today, they think on the computer monitor. The interior eye of the brain should be not flat but three dimensional so that everything is an object in space. We are not living in a two-dimensional world.
quotes.author: Frei Otto

quotes.quote: That's the beauty of argument, if you argue correctly, you're never wrong.
quotes.author: Christopher Buckley

quotes.quote: A mature society understands that at the heart of democracy is argument.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: Anger is never without an argument, but seldom with a good one.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: Be calm in arguing for fierceness makes error a fault and truth discourtesy.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Exhausting someone in argument is not the same as convincing him
quotes.author: Tim Kreider

quotes.quote: Arguing is the olympics of talking.
quotes.author: Stewart Stafford

quotes.quote: Sometimes, silence is the best way to win an argument.
quotes.author: Jorge P. Guerrero

quotes.quote: Discussion is an exchange of knowledge, argument an exchange of ignorance.
quotes.author: Robert Quillen

quotes.quote: Arguments of convenience lack integrity and inevitably trip you up.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: I never make the mistake of arguing with people for whose opinions I have no respect.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: Arguments are often like melodramas, they have a predictable beginning, middle, and end.
quotes.author: Gay Hendricks

quotes.quote: The thing I hate about an argument is that it always interrupts a discussion.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: There's no winning arguments with your parents.
quotes.author: Wendelin Van Draanen

quotes.quote: I think the biggest mistake I made was this wretched ability to see both sides of an argument.
quotes.author: John Major

quotes.quote: It's amazing how far the arguments can go.
quotes.author: Patrick Doyle

quotes.quote: Argument need not be heated; it can be punctuated with courteous smiles,or sympathetic tears.
quotes.author: J. Sidlow Baxter

quotes.quote: The most important thing in an argument, next to being right, is to leave an escape hatch for your opponent, so that he can gracefully swing over to your side without too much apparent loss of face.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: The best way to win an argument is to begin by being right.
quotes.author: Jill Ruckelshaus

quotes.quote: There can be no progress without head-on confrontation.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: It's hard to win an argument with a smart person, but it'd damn near impossible to win an argument with a stupid person.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: You never need an argument against the use of violence, you need an argument for it.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: When you have no basis for an argument, abuse the plaintiff.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: I'd rather lose an argument than get into a long discussion in order to win it.
quotes.author: Rafael Nadal

quotes.quote: To be clever in argument is not rationality but rationalization.
quotes.author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

quotes.quote: Arguments are extremely vulgar, for everyone in good society holds exactly the same opinion.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Winning an argument is losing it as it makes the loser feel bad.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Argument is between two sides or individuals, never say silly to your friend because he/she never argue on oneself.
quotes.author: Wilson M. Mukama

quotes.quote: If two men on the same job agree all the time, then one is useless. If they disagree all the time, both are useless.
quotes.author: Darryl F. Zanuck

quotes.quote: Behind every argument is someone's ignorance.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: The aim of argument, or of discussion, should not be victory, but progress.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: I'd rather lose an argument to you, than lose you to an argument.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Arguments have no chance against petrified training; they wear it as little as the waves wear a cliff.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Arguments, like men, are often pretenders.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: You can not control the thought, but you can control the tongue.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: If you go in for argument, take care of your temper. Your logic, if you have any, will take care of itself.
quotes.author: Joseph Farrell

quotes.quote: Arguments are to be avoided: they are always vulgar and often convincing.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Hear one side and you will be in the dark. Hear both and all will be clear.
quotes.author: Thomas C. Haliburton

quotes.quote: That awkward moment when you're in a middle of an argument & you realize you're wrong.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: No sensible man ever engages, unprepared, in a fencing match of words with a woman.
quotes.author: Wilkie Collins

quotes.quote: He who establishes his argument by noise and command shows that his reason is weak.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Argue for your limitations, and sure enough, they're yours.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Never argue when you're winning.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: The only way to get the best of an argument is to avoid it.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Beware of long arguments and long beards.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Anyone who conducts an argument by appealing to authority is not using his intelligence, he is just using his memory.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: The difficult part in an argument is not to defend one's opinion but rather to know it.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: Arguments cannot be answered by personal abuse; there is no logic in slander, and falsehood, in the long run, defeats itself.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Women get the last word in every argument. Anything a man says after that is the beginning of a new argument.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Argument is meant to reveal the truth, not to create it.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: The argument of the broken window pane is the most valuable argument in modern politics.
quotes.author: Emmeline Pankhurst

quotes.quote: Any woman who is sure of her own wits, is a match, at any time, for a man who is not sure of his own temper.
quotes.author: Wilkie Collins

quotes.quote: No sensible man ever engages, unprepared, in a fencing match of words with a woman.
quotes.author: Wilkie Collins

quotes.quote: Give me the liberty to know, to utter, and to argue freely according to conscience, above all liberties.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Without contraries is no progression. Attraction and repulsion, reason and energy, love and hate, are necessary to human existence.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: You cannot reason people out of a position that they did not reason themselves into.
quotes.author: Ben Goldacre

quotes.quote: I don't pretend to know everything; I just only speak on matters I know I'll win.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: It's not about whether or not someone is a bigot, but whether or not the argument which that someone is arguing is worth being a bigot about.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: It is never ridicule, but a compliment that knocks a philosopher off his feet. He is already positioned for every possible counter-attack, counter-argument, and retort... only to find a big bear hug coming his way.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Don't argue. Never deign to deny. Meet insults with laughter.
quotes.author: Leigh Bardugo

quotes.quote: The less you say, the more weight your words will carry.
quotes.author: Leigh Bardugo

quotes.quote: Arguments cannot be answered by personal abuse; there is no logic in slander, and falsehood, in the long run, defeats itself.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: There can be no progress without head-on confrontation.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: There is hardly a better way to avoid discussion than by releasing an argument from the control of the present and by saying that only the future will reveal its merits.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: A valid argument form is any set of truth-functional statements such that every argument with that form is a valid argument.
quotes.author: William Hughes

quotes.quote: If an argument has a valid argument form, then if its premises are true, its conclusion must also be true.
quotes.author: William Hughes

quotes.quote: Critical thinkers choose beliefs based on good arguments.
quotes.author: George W. Rainbolt

quotes.quote: As you watch an argumentative tennis match, you need to keep track of where the ball is.
quotes.author: George W. Rainbolt

quotes.quote: When you claim that someone is making a bad argument, you're either constructing an argument to show that someone else's argument fails the true premises test or constructing an argument to show that the other person's argument fails the proper from test.
quotes.author: George W. Rainbolt

quotes.quote: Good critical thinkers compose their own arguments, subject them to critical analysis, and use what they;ve learned from this critical analysis to compose new and better arguments.
quotes.author: George W. Rainbolt

quotes.quote: Argumentative people have one thing in common: they are always ready to dispute an indisputable fact.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The most common argument against marriage is the one between husband wife.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: When you win an argument with your wife, the argument is not over.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: An argument always leaves each party convinced that the other has a closed mind.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The less sound a man's argument, the louder he talks.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Conflict is a great way to learn more about other people.
quotes.author: Liggy Webb

quotes.quote: Whether it is an argument with a significant other or a boardroom full of colleagues, facing conflict is a great way to learn more about others.
quotes.author: Liggy Webb

quotes.quote: If you pay attention, you will learn not only about their particular points of view, but also about the way they choose to argue.
quotes.author: Liggy Webb

quotes.quote: If you pay close attention, you can pick up a lot of information about others when you actively engage in conflict.
quotes.author: Liggy Webb

quotes.quote: Another surprising benefit of conflict is that you can learn a great deal about yourself when you are participating in conflict.
quotes.author: Liggy Webb

quotes.quote: The precise definition of 'conflict' is: a direct disagreement of ideas or interests, a battle or struggle, antagonism or opposition.
quotes.author: Roy C. Lilley

quotes.quote: You can't deal with the differences in a clinical way without taking into account the emotions involved.
quotes.author: Roy C. Lilley

quotes.quote: Be clear, conflict will not be effectively resolved if there is no facility for emotional release in conflict resolution.
quotes.author: Roy C. Lilley

quotes.quote: Collaborating is ideal but the hardest to achieve.
quotes.author: Roy C. Lilley

quotes.quote: There are times when the other person may or may not know that his/her behaviour is causing a problem for you and talking to him or her can clear up what turns out to be a simple misunderstanding.
quotes.author: Roy C. Lilley

quotes.quote: Unfortunately, conflict invades Christian relationships just as it does every other human relationship.
quotes.author: Ken Sande

quotes.quote: Conflict happens among us in many ways.
quotes.author: Ken Sande

quotes.quote: There might be low-level conflict, behavior like gossip, slander, backbiting, criticism, undermining, etc.
quotes.author: Ken Sande

quotes.quote: Working toward peaceful solutions to conflict isn't our natural human response.
quotes.author: Ken Sande

quotes.quote: Some people see conflict as a hazard that threatens to sweep them off their feet and leave them bruised and hurting.
quotes.author: Ken Sande

quotes.quote: Collaboration involves people working together for resolutions that maximize the gains for all parties in the conflict.
quotes.author: Myra Warren Isenhart

quotes.quote: Lower levels of conflict, when parties are more collaborative, may require only discussion, facilitation, or mediation.
quotes.author: Myra Warren Isenhart

quotes.quote: Higher levels of conflict, when collaboration is low and competition is high, may require collaborative hybrids such as mediation/arbitration or voluntary arbitration.
quotes.author: Myra Warren Isenhart

quotes.quote: The fact conflict exists is a definite reason to develop skills to address issues that arise between individuals with differing opinions, ideologies, personalities, and attitudes.
quotes.author: Jarmel Bell MSE

quotes.quote: When approaching any disagreement, increased understanding is required.
quotes.author: Jarmel Bell MSE

quotes.quote: The discussion needed to resolve conflict expands people's awareness of the situation.
quotes.author: Jarmel Bell MSE

quotes.quote: If conflict is no handled effectively, the results can be damaging.
quotes.author: Jarmel Bell MSE

quotes.quote: In resolving conflict, look for motives, sometimes different people will see the same situation in a different light.
quotes.author: Jarmel Bell MSE

quotes.quote: Trouble will always find you, but it's how you respond that will dictate how long you stay in it.
quotes.author: Darlene Bennett

quotes.quote: It is better to be humble and happy than to be arrogant and lonely.
quotes.author: Darlene Bennett

quotes.quote: Being a peacemaker is true humility.
quotes.author: Darlene Bennett

quotes.quote: I'm an Aries and sort of a challenge to myself.
quotes.author: Debbie Reynolds

quotes.quote: I love the idea of being an Aries.
quotes.author: Vanessa Kirby

quotes.quote: I'm very Aries - every characteristic, good and the bad.
quotes.author: Molly Kerim

quotes.quote: Aries demands love, for like the infant, without love, Aries dies.
quotes.author: Linda Goodman

quotes.quote: Aries needs a partner willing to set sail at a moment’s notice – impulsive and action-oriented, he prefers not to plan and overthink a situation.
quotes.author: Lynn Hayes

quotes.quote: Aries continually needs to be reminded that “if winter comes”….. the miracle of spring cannot be far behind.
quotes.author: Linda Goodman

quotes.quote: This disarming naiveté is also why Aries people are so fearless.
quotes.author: Linda Goodman

quotes.quote: Aries anger flashes forth with the speed of sound, but it’s usually gone before the victim knows what it’s all about, and the happy, child-like smile quickly returns.
quotes.author: Linda Goodman

quotes.quote: Aries often defies emotional description. No one can show such tough, forceful behavior.
quotes.author: Linda Goodman

quotes.quote: Aries are independent and love their freedom, but they do not enjoy being alone.
quotes.author: Lynn Hayes

quotes.quote: Aries individuals need to be first, but they will want you to be a passenger on their adventure ride.
quotes.author: Lynn Hayes

quotes.quote: Aries represents the East, the Day Forces – which is why most of them fight sleep, tranquility, rest and resignation to Fate with such vigor.
quotes.author: Linda Goodman

quotes.quote: Aries is the firebrand, who forges his way through life with daring, initiative and enterprise, there’s a strange quirk to his bravery.
quotes.author: Linda Goodman

quotes.quote: An Aries must be put first. You will do good to remember this.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: He at fit periods walk through Aries, however our earthly motions varies.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: To bathe in a particular spot of the ganges, at the time when the sun enters the sign Aries.
quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.quote: Aries greatly altered I have seen the ruined dorata.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: Now not remote from Aries in his course called from the quick and vegetating womb of nature green or florid.
quotes.author: Richard Glover

quotes.quote: And sing their wild notes to the listening waste at last from Aries rolls the bounteous sun.
quotes.author: James Thomson

quotes.quote: Tenth of the first, sol into Aries enters and bids defiance to all tedious winters.
quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.quote: Reasons only knew when I talk about it Aries or treasons all renew.	Reasons only knew when I talk about it Aries or treasons all renew.
quotes.author: Foo Fighters

quotes.quote: Yet Aries to be very very ambitious.
quotes.author: The Whispers

quotes.quote: Stubborn as an Aries
quotes.author: Tink

quotes.quote: I play the down low very very incognito Aries is my sign I know that I can rhyme.
quotes.author: A Tribe Called Quest

quotes.quote: The high rise lights read your rights and a downtown storm with Aries rising.
quotes.author: La Devotee

quotes.quote: And I tell them cause shawty is the baddest she is flushed and she is Aries.
quotes.author: T-Pain

quotes.quote: Aries has a jealous heart.
quotes.author: Nana Moskouri

quotes.quote: Save you some embarrassment I'm an Aries and I ain't scared.
quotes.author: Da Brat

quotes.quote: Whistle a tune of I gotta see Jane yeah read the stars of an Aries girl wear a crown in another world.
quotes.author: Saint Etienne

quotes.quote: If an Aries hurt you you must deserve it every bit of a dime is worth it.
quotes.author: Da Brat

quotes.quote: Play no games Aries women set me on fire.
quotes.author: Eddie Kendricks

quotes.quote: Rather stack than live charge energy fully charged Aries born in late March.
quotes.author: Danny Evans

quotes.quote: Said I rage like a fire and I flow like the water ain't no surprise I was born under Aries.
quotes.author: Beverley Knight

quotes.quote: Ain't worth my time, can't compromise no that would be strange I'm still that Aries lady.
quotes.author: Beverley Knight

quotes.quote: Not alone as Aries waits with hate upon his fiery throne.
quotes.author: Antithesis

quotes.quote: Aries rules the head and brain and like Ram Arians go into battle headfirst.
quotes.author: Therrie Rosenvaid

quotes.quote: If they are convinced they are right which is most of the time, Aries people will express their views in a very colorful manner.
quotes.author: Therrie Rosenvaid

quotes.quote: Aries are forever seeking out the unknown and will dash off at a moments notice if something interesting is happening at the other end of the world.
quotes.author: Therrie Rosenvaid

quotes.quote: Aries woman looks for strength and willpower in a man.
quotes.author: Therrie Rosenvaid

quotes.quote: Aries in his many fits knows no favorites.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: What an Aries wants, an Aries gets.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You're passionate, energetic and forceful, so your star sign Aries says, so have a fun packed birthday, all our love is sent your way.
quotes.author: Susan Smith

quotes.quote: If you have a connection you'll know it immediately because an Aries is either into you in a big way or not at all.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I'm an Aries. I need everybody to like me.
quotes.author: Eric Andre

quotes.quote: An Aries will see through your lies like glass.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I'm probably less volatile and tempestuous than a lot of Aries, but I think I'm probably quite loud and outgoing and passionate. Maybe a bit difficult or stubborn.
quotes.author: Mackenzie Davis

quotes.quote: I am an Aries. Although I do not believe in astrology, I think this is exactly the right sign to have been born under.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Arizona is a great place to be a radiation researcher.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Arizona's vale of mountain-temples.
quotes.author: Robert Haven Schauffler

quotes.quote: Arizona is now recognized as a premier place in which to locate, expand and grow a business.
quotes.author: Jan Brewer

quotes.quote: Arizona is gorgeous. The sunshine in Arizona is gorgeous red.
quotes.author: Cecilia Bartoli

quotes.quote: You know you're from Arizona when you feed your chickens ice cubes to keep them from laying hard-boiled eggs.
quotes.author: Local saying

quotes.quote: You know you're from Arizona when you drive two miles around a parking lot looking for a shady place - even in the dead of winter.
quotes.author: Local saying

quotes.quote: Arizona faces unique healthcare challenges including uncompensated care for illegal immigrants, and the large number of Native Americans who live in remote and isolated areas of the state.
quotes.author: Rick Renzi

quotes.quote: Arizona may be the only state in America where mothers don't tell their children that someday they can grow up and be president.
quotes.author: John McCain

quotes.quote: Then the wind blew cool through the pinyons on the rim. There was a sweet tang of cedar and sage on the air and that indefinable fragrance peculiar to the canyon country of Arizona.
quotes.author: Zane Grey

quotes.quote: Welcome to Arizona, where summer spends the winter â€” and hell spends the summer
quotes.author: Local saying

quotes.quote: In the empire of desert, water is the king and shadow is the queen.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat İldan

quotes.quote: Nowhere on this planet is the desert as fascinating as it is in Arizona.
quotes.author: Joseph Stacey

quotes.quote: You know you live in Phoenix when the cold-water faucet is hotter than the hot-water faucet.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Arizona, our beautiful state, was built on mining.
quotes.author: Jan Brewer
