quotes.quote: You know you're an Arizona native when you hug a cactus only once in your lifetime.
quotes.author: Nancy Dedera

quotes.quote: You know you're an Arizona native, when a rainy day puts you in a good mood.
quotes.author: Marshall Trimble

quotes.quote: Arizona seeks only to enforce the nominal immigration policy of the United States. Perhaps the federal government should try it sometime.
quotes.author: Rich Lowry

quotes.quote: You know you're an Arizona native, when in your heart you're sure that at the end of the rainbow there is not a pot of goldâ€”but a good Mexican restaurant.
quotes.author: James W. Cook

quotes.quote: Today, Arizona's sons and daughters, mothers and fathers are proudly serving their country.
quotes.author: Jane D. Hull

quotes.quote: Arizona presents no specific reason for excepting capital defendants from the constitutional protections extended to defendants generally, and none is readily apparent.
quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quotes.quote: In Arizona, shade trees are your best friends â€” and occasionally the basis of small civil wars over parking.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Almost everyone in the world knows something about Arizona, and some of it is even true.
quotes.author: Jim Turner

quotes.quote: In Arizona we salt margaritas, not sidewalks.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If there's one thing Arizona is best in the nation at, it's water.
quotes.author: Doug Ducey

quotes.quote: Arizona now has one of the most innovative systems of financing school construction in the nation.
quotes.author: Jane D. Hull

quotes.quote: You know you're an Arizona native when you take rain dances seriously.
quotes.author: Skip Boyer

quotes.quote: By working together, we can make Arizona a place where everyone has an opportunity for a better life.
quotes.author: Doug Ducey

quotes.quote: The Arizona desert takes hold of a man's mind and shakes it.
quotes.author: David W. Toll

quotes.quote: The United States and Arizona are both losing jobs to offshore locations.
quotes.author: Janet Napolitano

quotes.quote: Arizona... a land where a good spring is far better than a gold mine.
quotes.author: E.E.A

quotes.quote: The Grand Canyon is carven deep by the master hand; it is the Gulf of silence, widened in the desert, it is all time inscribing the naked rock; it is the book of earth.
quotes.author: Donald Culross Peattie

quotes.quote: Land of extremes. Land of contrasts. Land of surprises. Land of contradictions.
quotes.author: Federal Writers' Project

quotes.quote: Across the Colorado River from the Needles, the dark and jagged ramparts of Arizona stood up against the sky, and behind them the huge tilted plain rising toward the backbone of the continent again.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck.

quotes.quote: As you know, Arizona recently passed the toughest anti-immigration bill in American history. The idea behind this bill is to drive illegal immigrants out of Arizona and back to their homeland in Los Angeles.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: The popular conception of Arizona is of an infertile desert country, yet the flora ranges from the subtropical to the sub-alpine.
quotes.author: WPA Guide to 1930s Arizona

quotes.quote: Arizona may be the youngest of the nation's contiguous states, but it is an ancient land that has been inhabited for millenniums.
quotes.author: Patrick Lavin

quotes.quote: Arizona is called the land of sunshine because it is one of the driest states in the United States.
quotes.author: Jennifer Quasha

quotes.quote: Arizona is also the biggest copper producer in the United States. This is how it got its nickname, the Copper State.
quotes.author: Jennifer Quasha

quotes.quote: Arizona is known for five 'Cs'-copper, citrus, cotton, cattle, and climate.
quotes.author: Kathleen Derzipilski

quotes.quote: Although Arizona is still a young state, its varied cultural traditions have created a rich and colorful history.
quotes.author: Peter Massey

quotes.quote: Driving through the backcountry of Arizona, you will notice countless natural wonders and traces of the past.
quotes.author: Peter Massey

quotes.quote: Arizona is a magnificent state. With something for everyone. I realize that no poem, song, picture, or words could ever do justice to Arizona.
quotes.author: Rick Harris

quotes.quote: Today, for most people, Arizona is a property, the land is ownership and market value.
quotes.author: Rick Harris

quotes.quote: You're not going to believe this, but, there are things you can collect in Arizona that are neither illegal, poisonous, or taxable. Fossils are one such item. Please don't tell the legislature.
quotes.author: Rick Harris

quotes.quote: Arizona has long reflected the traditionalistic values of the southerners who settled the territory and who have continued to migrate to the state over the years.
quotes.author: Rick Harris

quotes.quote: Arizona is practically synonymous with desert.
quotes.author: Paul Fiarkoski

quotes.quote: Arizona is the only state where you can hike into one of the Seven Natural Wonders of the World.
quotes.author: Roger Naylor

quotes.quote: In Arizona, you can hike among cactus as tall as office buildings.
quotes.author: Mike Coopsen

quotes.quote: I ain't movin' to Arizona! Dammit, there is nothing' there but gravel and scorpions.
quotes.author: Mary Doria Russell

quotes.quote: Things in Arizona don't just die; they bake and fry in the heat until there is nothing left.
quotes.author: Jeffry R. Halverson

quotes.quote: Even the plants in Arizona wanted to hurt you.
quotes.author: Janette Rallison

quotes.quote: Out of labor's struggle in Arizona came better conditions for the worker, who must everywhere, at all times, under advantage and disadvantage work out their own salvation.
quotes.author: Mary Harris Jones

quotes.quote: Arizona changes its state motto to 'Damn, it's hot.'
quotes.author: Greg Proops

quotes.quote: I hate Arizona. It's always eight hundred degrees outside and everybody's always saying, ‘But it's a dry heat!’ So's the inside of my microwave.'
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: I live in Arizona. I think the Hispanic people are amazing. I think when people talk about illegal immigration…It does them a disservice.
quotes.author: Charles Barkley

quotes.quote: Somebody said I am the most popular person in Arizona because I am speaking the truth.
quotes.author: Donald Trumph

quotes.quote: Arizona, with its wide-open spaces and no one peering over your shoulder, had always been a haven for folks who didn't like the law or other busybodies to know what they were up to.
quotes.author: Jeanette Walls

quotes.quote: Arizona is a red state, and we're going to keep it red.
quotes.author: Jan Brewer

quotes.quote: If you want to live in a state known for its corruption, come to Arizona!
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: You don't go to Gettysburg with a shovel, you don't take belt buckles off the Arizona.
quotes.author: Robert Ballard

quotes.quote: The legacy of the Armenian Genocide is woven into the fabric of America.
quotes.author: Adam Schiff

quotes.quote: You can talk about Holocaust denial, but it's really marginal for the most part. What is compelling about the Armenian genocide, is how it has been forgotten.
quotes.author: Atom Egoyan

quotes.quote: The Armenian genocide showed what could happen when empires were beaten into nations.
quotes.author: Niall Ferguson

quotes.quote: It is generally not known in the world that, in the years preceding 1916, there was a concerted effort made to eliminate all the Armenian people, probably one of the greatest tragedies that ever befell any group. And there weren't any Nuremberg trials.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: But I am Armenian and I understand what it is to lose a country and lose a family and have massacres and genocides and everything against my people.
quotes.author: Andrea Martin

quotes.quote: Moreover, as the leadership of the House confirmed last year, the Administration remains opposed to a congressional resolution on the Armenian Genocide due to Turkish objections. This approach sends absolutely the wrong signal to Turkey and to the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Patrick J. Kennedy

quotes.quote: 800,000 Armenian deportees were actually killed... by holding the guilty accountable the government is intent on cleansing the bloody past.
quotes.author: Djemal Pasha

quotes.quote: ... the Armenian massacre was the greatest crime of the war, and the failure to act against Turkey is to condone it ... the failure to deal radically with the Turkish horror means that all talk of guaranteeing the future peace of the world is mischievous nonsense.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If we compare the 2014-genocide to the Armenian genocide and the Anfal genocide, we will find that, whether religious or secular, the perpetrators of the three genocides have used a specific religion to legalize their crimes. Not even children were spared.
quotes.author: Widad Akreyi

quotes.quote: The Armenian Genocide is such a controversial and very sensitive issue because the Turkish and Armenian people disagree about the facts of what actually happened. I know how strongly Armenians feel about the Genocide, and how it's never been recognised. At the same time, I do not hold today's generation of people accountable.
quotes.author: Khloe Kardashian

quotes.quote: The idea of telling the story of the Armenian genocide - or, really, any other genocide - and repeating those stories is really important. I also think it's important to always be exposing the warning signs for what was leading up to it. Those tend to always be the same.
quotes.author: Chris Cornell

quotes.quote: This was a tragic event in human history, but by paying tribute to the Armenian community we ensure the lessons of the Armenian genocide are properly understood and acknowledged.
quotes.author: Jerry Costello

quotes.quote: The AXA and New York Life settlements are important building blocks not only toward seeking financial recovery for the losses resulting from the Armenian Genocide but also in our ultimate goal, which is for Turkey and the US to officially acknowledge the genocide.
quotes.author: Mark Geragos

quotes.quote: If Turkey is prepared to acknowledge the Armenian Genocide, then its leaders can proceed immediately to direct dialogue with its counterparts in Armenia to define a common vision for the future.
quotes.author: Mark Foley

quotes.quote: Like the genocide of the Armenians before it, and the genocide of the Cambodians which followed it ... the lessons of the Holocaust must never be forgotten.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: It was at first communicated to you that the Government, by order of the Jemiet had decided to destroy completely all the Armenians living in Turkey...An end must be put to their existence, however criminal the measures taken may be, and no regard must be paid to either age or sex nor to conscientious scruples.
quotes.author: Talaat Pasha

quotes.quote: What did my arms do before they held you?
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: Open your arms if you want the Beloved's embrace.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Our arms start from the back because they were once wings.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: Arms now empty will be filled and hearts now hurting from broken dreams and yearning will be healed.
quotes.author: Boyd K. Packer

quotes.quote: Love is always open arms. If you close your arms about love you will find that you are left holding only yourself.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: A mother's arms are made of tenderness and children sleep soundly in them.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: There's something about soft, unstructured arms that's very beautiful.
quotes.author: Jill Clayburgh

quotes.quote: A mother's arms are more comforting than anyone else's.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: The best place to cry is on a mother's arms.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: The ache of empty arms was an old tale to you.
quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

quotes.quote: Open your arms to change but don't let go of your values.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: A good woman's arms round a man's neck is a lifebelt thrown out to him from heaven.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: The length of a man's outspread arms is equal to his height.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: The arms of God reach to embrace, and somehow you feel yourself just outside God's fingertips.
quotes.author: Greg Boyle

quotes.quote: In the soft and gentle arms of a mother's love, children can come to know the voice of the Lord.
quotes.author: Dwan J. Young

quotes.quote: In conclusion, the arms of others either fall from your back, or they weigh you down, or they bind you fast.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: The arms of love encompass you with your present, your past, your future, the arms of love gather you together.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Relax in the precious arms of the Holy Spirit.
quotes.author: T. B. Joshua

quotes.quote: The force of arms only reveals man s weakness.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: When your arms are bigger than your head, something is wrong.
quotes.author: Steve Reeves

quotes.quote: Extend your arms in welcome to the future. The best is yet to come!
quotes.author: Anthony De Mello

quotes.quote: The legs and arms can be a revelation of the back, the spine's extensions.
quotes.author: Merce Cunningham

quotes.quote: The only way you preserve pitching arms is throwing; that makes the arm stronger.
quotes.author: Juan Marichal

quotes.quote: An army of philosophers would not be sufficient to change the nature of error and to make it truth.
quotes.author: Averroes

quotes.quote: Every man thinks meanly of himself for not having been a soldier, or not having been at sea.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: An army marches on its stomach.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: No army has ever done so much with so little.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: If I could tell soldiers one thing, it would be: have faith. Faith in the Army, the leadership, and their own ability.
quotes.author: Robert E. Hall

quotes.quote: Discipline is the soul of an army. It makes small numbers formidable; procures success to the weak, and esteem to all.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: There is strong. There is Army Strong. And then there is Army Wife Strong.
quotes.author: Aditi Mathur Kumar

quotes.quote: I am not afraid of an army of lions led by a sheep; I am afraid of an army of sheep led by a lion.
quotes.author: Alexander The Great

quotes.quote: A standing army is one of the greatest mischief that can possibly happen
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: Everyone imposes his own system as far as his army can reach.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.quote: Ten soldiers lead wisely will beat a hundred without a head.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: A military coup needs a sacrifice and courage that you can't find in an army without morale.
quotes.author: Jalal Talabani

quotes.quote: The army teaches boys to think like men.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: An army of principles can penetrate where an army of soldiers cannot.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: If goods don't cross borders, armies will.
quotes.author: Frederic Bastiat

quotes.quote: An army is a nation within a nation, it is one of the vices of courage.
quotes.author: Alfred de Vigny

quotes.quote: You don't want captains in the army who know too much or think too much.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: The Army is the true nobility of our country.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Good soldiers never pass up a chance to eat or sleep. They never know how much they'll be called on to do before the next chance
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: He belonged to that army known as invincible in peace, invisible in war.
quotes.author: William Tecumseh Sherman

quotes.quote: A safe army is better than a safe border
quotes.author: B.R. Ambedkar

quotes.quote: Behind every dreamer stands an army full of true believers.
quotes.author: Chris Burkmenn

quotes.quote: Victory usually goes to the army who has better trained officers and men.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: They be marching hand in hand, like going to war.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: A good battle plan that you act on today can be better than a perfect one tomorrow.
quotes.author: Gen George S. Patton

quotes.quote: An army without culture is a dull-witted army, and a dull-witted army cannot defeat the enemy
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: I'm not a leader now. I'm a whole damn army.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: No nation ever had an army large enough to guarantee it against attack in a time of peace or ensure it of victory in time of war.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: If our soldiers are not overburdened with money, it is not because they have a distaste for riches; if their lives are not unduly long, it is not because they are disinclined to longevity.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: The great armies, accumulated to provide security and preserve the peace, carried the nations to war by their own weight.
quotes.author: A. J. P. Taylor

quotes.quote: Every citizen should be a soldier. This was the case with the Greeks and Romans, and must
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: I can't expect loyalty from the army if I do not give it.
quotes.author: George C Marshall

quotes.quote: Two armies that fight each other is like one large army that commits suicide.
quotes.author: Henri Barbusse

quotes.quote: There is only one Army in which you serve. When that identity is gone, it is gone forever.
quotes.author: Stanley A. McChrystal

quotes.quote: A man will go to war, fight and die for his country. But he won't get a bikini wax.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: You must give soldiers reasons to have confidence and pride in themselves, in their leaders, and in their units. Only then will you have loyalty. Loyalty was the primary trait I looked for in soldiers.
quotes.author: George W. Dunaway

quotes.quote: The conventional army loses if it does not win. The guerrilla wins if he does not lose.
quotes.author: Henry A. Kissinger

quotes.quote: The army is at once the worst place for egoists, and the best.
quotes.author: Anthony Powell

quotes.quote: Without discipline the Army would just be a bunch of guys wearing the same color clothing.
quotes.author: Frank Burns

quotes.quote: National armies fight nations, royal armies fight their like, the first obey a mob, always demented and the second a king, generally sane.
quotes.author: J. F. C. Fuller

quotes.quote: Do not swallow bait offered by the enemy. Do not interfere with an army that is returning home.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: I can't expect loyalty from the army if I do not give it.
quotes.author: George Marshall

quotes.quote: When armies are mobilized and issues joined, the man who is sorry over the fact will win
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: I feel an army in my fist.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: The history of a soldier's wound beguiles the pain of it.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: The courage of a soldier is found to be the cheapest and most common quality of human nature.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: The army is always the same. The sun and the moon change. The army knows no seasons.
quotes.author: Frank S. Nugent

quotes.quote: What I really learned in the army was how to be a pacifist.
quotes.author: Utah Phillips

quotes.quote: It is fatal to enter a war without the will to win it.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: The army was kept in as good state of fitness as the funds would allow.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: A thing is mighty big when time and distance cannot shrink it.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: You may be gone by my sight, but you are never gone from my heart
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The situations we Army wives have to deal with are not normal ones at all. The nomadic life we lead, moving from station to station, being separated from our husbands for long stretches of time, and the constant fear that we live with if our husbands are anywhere near the sensitive areas in the country
quotes.author: Aditi Mathur Kumar

quotes.quote: Waiting for you to come back home to me is the hardest thing I've ever had to do. I love you, my soldier, my hero, my husband.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Thank God for men who manage to hold from afar, wipe tears away with tender words and dish out the life force that is hope. She has never felt so alone but out there, across an ocean, and in a foreign land, there is a man who loves her and would lay down his life just so she could feel the light once again.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: We as military spouses don't want special treatment, we want fair treatment.
quotes.author: Deanie Dempsey

quotes.quote: There is strong. There is Army Strong. And then there is Army Wife Strong.
quotes.author: Aditi Mathur Kumar

quotes.quote: We sit around waiting for them to come home, hoping every day that they are okay and that they know how much we love them our heroes.
quotes.author: Cierra Powell

quotes.quote: Behind every strong soldier, there is a strong woman who stands behind him, supports him, and loves him with all her heart.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Recipe for a Military Wife 1 1/2 cups Patience, 1 lb. Adaptability, 3/4 cup Tolerance, 1 tsp. Courage, A Dash of Adventure Combine above ingredients: Add 2 tablespoons elbow grease. Let sit alone for one year. Marinate frequently with salty tears. Pour off excess fat. Sprinkle lightly with money. Knead dough until payday. Season with international spices. Bake 20 years or until done.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: She stood in the storm, and when the wind did not blow her way and it surely has not, she adjusted her sails.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Edwards

quotes.quote: An Army wife is probably the only woman in the world who knows and readily accepts that she is the mistress, because, let's face it, the Army is the wife and the wife gets all the damn attention!
quotes.author: Aditi Mathur Kumar

quotes.quote: My hero doesn't wear a cape or tights; he doesn't have superpowers and he can't lift cars, but he fights to defend his country, and that is enough for me.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Arrogance diminishes wisdom.
quotes.author: Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: Don't be arrogant, because arrogance kills curiosity and passion.
quotes.author: Mina Bissell

quotes.quote: Arrogance is knowledge minus wisdom.
quotes.author: Celso Cukierkorn

quotes.quote: Arrogance is blind to the stumbling block.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Arrogance is a roadblock on the highway of wisdom.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: An arrogant bug is a cocky roach.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Don't confuse confidence with arrogance. Arrogance is being full of yourself, feeling you're always right, and believing your accomplishments or abilities make you better than other people. People often believe arrogance is excessive confidence, but it's really a lack of confidence. Arrogant people are insecure, and often repel others. Truly confident people feel good about themselves and attract others to them.
quotes.author: Christie Hartman

quotes.quote: Arrogance is a self-defense tactic to disguise insecurities.
quotes.author: Caroll Michels

quotes.quote: The arrogance of some people makes even their virtues appear vices.
quotes.author: Bouhours

quotes.quote: Arrogant people are non-learners. They invest their energies in maintaining a cozy feeling of complacency, and complacency is the biggest single enemy to the process of continuously learning from experience. Arrogant people are exactly the sort of people who are destined to have one year's experience 20 times rather than 20 years' worth of experience.
quotes.author: Peter Honey

quotes.quote: Confidence is a nice suit. Arrogance is the same suit with suspenders, Italian loafers, and gold cuff links.
quotes.author: Tim Schneider

quotes.quote: Arrogance is a kingdom without a crown.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: It's only arrogance if you're wrong.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Arrogance is a creature. It does not have senses.It has only a sharp tongue and the pointing finger.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Arrogance is an illusion of superiority one perpetrates upon their self. Some may ultimately find their way through the illusion, but only after many losses.
quotes.author: Debra Crown

quotes.quote: Arrogance makes you stronger from outside, but even weaker from inside.
quotes.author: Ujas Soni

quotes.quote: Arrogance really comes from insecurity, and in the end our feelingthat we are bigger than others is really the flip side of our feeling that we are smaller than others.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: The opposite of humility is arrogance--the belief that we are wiseror better than others. Arrogance promotes separation rather thancommunity. It looms like a brick wall between us and those from whom we could learn.
quotes.author: John Marks Templeton

quotes.quote: Arrogance likes to appear humble in public.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Ignorance is a horrible thing. But arrogance, the belief that knowing alittle more than the ignorant makes you wise, is more horrible still.
quotes.author: James Rozoff

quotes.quote: How great some people would be if they were not arrogant.
quotes.author: The Talmud

quotes.quote: Arrogance is trying to convince others you're more than who they know you are.
quotes.author: Bianca Frazier

quotes.quote: Never mistake arrogance for intellect.
quotes.author: D.B. Harrop

quotes.quote: Arrogance is shown in one's respect to the truth.
quotes.author: Lionel Suggs

quotes.quote: Arrogance is a weed that grows mostly on a dunghill.
quotes.author: Arab Proverb

quotes.quote: Abundance breeds arrogance.
quotes.author: Argentine Proverb

quotes.quote: Arrogance - The best leaders inspire by example. When that's not an option, brute intimidation works pretty well, too.
quotes.author: Larry Kersten

quotes.quote: An arrogant man will still feel immortal, even on his death bed.
quotes.author: Melchor Lim

quotes.quote: You can have a certain arrogance, and I think that's fine, but what you should never lose is the respect for the others.
quotes.author: Steffi Graf

quotes.quote: Arrogance leads to disaster, sometimes it's better not to be your own master.
quotes.author: Luke Garner

quotes.quote: Early in life, I had to choose between honest arrogance and hypocritical humility. I chose honest arrogance and have seen no occasions to change.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: An arrogant person considers himself perfect. This is the chief harm of arrogance. It interferes with a person's main task in life becoming a better person.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: A little arrogance in the hands of the extremely capable is well earned - and in most case, deserved.
quotes.author: Siddharth Katragadda

quotes.quote: Arrogance is a mixture of impertinence, disobedience, indiscipline, rudeness, harshness, and a self-assertive nature.
quotes.author: Sivananda

quotes.quote: Timing and arrogance are decisive factors in the successful use of talent.
quotes.author: Marya Mannes

quotes.quote: Arrogance and rudeness are training wheels on the bicycle of life -- for weak people who cannot keep their balance without them.
quotes.author: Laura Teresa Marquez

quotes.quote: Arrogance on the part of the meritorious is even more offensive to us than the arrogance of those without merit: for merit itself is offensive.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The worst kind of arrogance is arrogance from ignorance.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Your heart is the center of humility, your mind could be the source of arrogance.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: Arrogance cometh before reality.
quotes.author: Wes Fesler

quotes.quote: Man in his arrogance thinks himself a great work, worthy the interposition of a great deity. More humble and I believe true to consider him created from animals.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Arrogance is the conjoined twin of ignorance.
quotes.author: Andy Hargreaves

quotes.quote: Arrogance is not the prerogative of the gifted.
quotes.author: Andy Hargreaves

quotes.quote: If arrogance were shoes, he'd never go barefoot.
quotes.author: Tamora Pierce

quotes.quote: It is the great arrogance of the present to forget the intelligence of the past.
quotes.author: Ken Burns

quotes.quote: Arrogance and ignorance go hand in hand.
quotes.author: Metallica

quotes.quote: Pretend inferiority and encourage his arrogance.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: The arrogance of age must submit to be taught by youth.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The only thing more dangerous than ignorance is arrogance
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: People express their arrogance in their failed expectations.
quotes.author: Travis Luedke

quotes.quote: Without the compassionate understanding of the fear and trepidation that lie behind courageous speech, we are bound only to our arrogance.
quotes.author: David Whyte

quotes.quote: That arrogance of youth and that kind of ignorant confidence can get you through a whole lot of things, and then life does its stuff, and you get smashed around and beaten up. You get full of doubts, and you end up making a person out of those bits and pieces.
quotes.author: Robyn Davidson

quotes.quote: It is not a sign of arrogance for the king to rule. That is what he is there for.
quotes.author: William F. Buckley Jr.

quotes.quote: I am prepared to meet anyone, but whether anyone is prepared for the great ordeal of meeting me is another matter.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I've often said, the only thing standing between me and greatness is me.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: I could smell an arrogance, it was my cheap fragrance.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Because arrogance is born in personal vanity, arrogant people are driven without mercy. They can never get enough power to fill the soul's needs or enough respect to overcome the fear that they deserve less than they are getting.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: Arrogance is an unhealthy ego in need of repair.
quotes.author: Thomas Faranda

quotes.quote: Ah, how the seeds of cockiness blossom when soiled in ignorance.
quotes.author: Steve Alten

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of pride, both good and bad. 'Good pride' represents our dignity and self-respect. 'Bad pride' is the deadly sin of superiority that reeks of conceit and arrogance.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Learning and innovation go hand in hand. The arrogance of success is to think that what you did yesterday will be sufficient for tomorrow.
quotes.author: William Pollard

quotes.quote: There but for the grace of God, goes God.
quotes.author: Herman J. Mankiewicz

quotes.quote: Humility brings advantage; arrogance provokes disadvantage.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Honesty, truthfulness, integrity, unselfishness—these are always there. And whenever a leader violates these basic principles, through arrogance or through ignorance, there's a derogation of duty.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: If Othello were CEO of Enron and Oedipus Rex in charge of WorldCom, they might well have made the same mistakes as Jeff Skilling and Bernie Ebbers. In tragedies both ancient and modern, leaders fall because of arrogance.
quotes.author: Davis L. Dotlich and Peter C. Cairo

quotes.quote: They say my people love me and I would be naive to deny it.
quotes.author: Hastings Banda

quotes.quote: Pointe Noire may be the capital, but I'm the head of state, and I'm going to rule from Brazzaville.
quotes.author: Fulbert Youlou

quotes.quote: The Amhara is to rule, not to be ruled.
quotes.author: Amhara Proverb

quotes.quote: Among the walnuts only the empty one speaks.
quotes.author: Moroccan Proverb

quotes.quote: May my outer head not spoil my inner head.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: Charity... is a form of condescension.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: What I do mind is the pitying glance, or the heavy sigh, that is deployed these days. I am not ready to be patronized, or condescended to, unless by someone of some eminence who has earned that right. And even then I regard it as a sign of weakness rather than strength.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: The unspoken agreement to concede the black community to the sway of the pulpit is itself a form of racist condescension.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: Arrogance is the camouflage of insecurity.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: Confidence is when you believe in yourself and your abilities, arrogance is when you think you are better than others and act accordingly.
quotes.author: Stewart Stafford

quotes.quote: Confidence must be monitored so that it does not spoil or rot and turn to arrogance.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Arrogance and rudeness are training wheels on the bicycle of life for weak people who cannot keep their balance without them.
quotes.author: John Cho

quotes.quote: Arrogance and self-awareness seldom go hand in hand.
quotes.author: MI6

quotes.quote: I'm not being arrogant. It's just that after being barked at by so many ill-bred dogs, every now and then I take a kick at one for the dog's own good.
quotes.author: Reinhard Von Lohengrim

quotes.quote: In a world too often governed by corruption and arrogance, it can be difficult to stay true to one's philosophical and literary principles.
quotes.author: Jacquelyn

quotes.quote: And I remembered something else that makes us human: faith, the only weapon in our arsenal to battle doubt.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: With massive arsenals still on hair-trigger alert, a global holocaust is just as possible now, through mistakes or misjudgments, as it was during the depths of the Cold War.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: The most important persuasion tool you have in your entire arsenal is integrity.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The world has been gradually reducing its nuclear arsenals. Testing must stop so that progress on the destruction of nuclear weapons may begin.
quotes.author: Jenny Shipley

quotes.quote: Beauty was the ultimate arsenal. Beauty was meant to deceive. It was meant to trick and beguile so their prey never saw death coming.
quotes.author: Pepper Winters

quotes.quote: Armaments are necessary - or are maintained on the pretext of necessity - because of a real or an imagined danger of war.
quotes.author: Ludwig Quidde

quotes.quote: Obscenity is a moral concept in the verbal arsenal of the establishment, which abuses the term by applying it, not to expressions of its own morality but to those of another.
quotes.author: Herbert Marcuse

quotes.quote: Keep a well-stocked arsenal of healthy ingredients at your disposal. At the very least, you'll always be ready to whip up a green juice or smoothie.
quotes.author: Kris Carr

quotes.quote: Vision is the most powerful weapon in the leader's arsenal.
quotes.author: Bill Hybels

quotes.quote: The ever more sophisticated weapons piling up in the arsenals of the wealthiest and the mightiest can kill the illiterate, the ill, the poor and the hungry, but they cannot kill ignorance, illness, poverty or hunger.
quotes.author: Fidel Castro

quotes.quote: Words are weapons, and it is dangerous . . . to borrow them from the arsenal of the enemy.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Despite how utterly massive they might be, it is never the size of the arsenal nor the strength of the warrior. Rather, it is a heart bent on sacrifice that is the most potent weapon of all.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Every success in limiting armaments is a sign that the will to achieve mutual understanding exists, and every such success thus supports the fight for international law and order.
quotes.author: Ludwig Quidde

quotes.quote: If atomic bombs are to be added as new weapons to the arsenals of a warring world, or to the arsenals of nations preparing for war, then the time will come when mankind will curse the names of Los Alamos and of Hiroshima.
quotes.author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: Competition in armament, both land and naval, is not only a terrible burden upon the people, but I believe it to be one of the greatest menaces to the peace of the world.
quotes.author: Frank B. Kellogg

quotes.quote: The fish cannot leave the deep waters. The state's weaponry should not be displayed.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The world is over-armed and peace is under-funded.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: Nonviolence is pretty ballsy, pretty advanced weaponry.
quotes.author: Ava Duvernay

quotes.quote: The atom bomb was no 'great decision.' It was merely another powerful weapon in the arsenal of righteousness.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: Armaments; extremely useful for fighting wars, a deadweight in any civil economy.
quotes.author: John Ralston Saul

quotes.quote: Above all, we must realize that no arsenal, or no weapon in the arsenals of the world, is so formidable as the will and moral courage of free men and women. It is a weapon our adversaries in today's world do not have.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The national security state has many unfair and cruel weapons in its arsenal, but that of junk science is one which can be fought and perhaps defeated.
quotes.author: Aldrich Ames

quotes.quote: The bombs held in current nuclear arsenals are seventy times more powerful than the bomb dropped on Nagasaki. If we don't begin opposing the drift towards more and more of them, we will live in the shadow of the mushroom cloud for the rest of our lives â€” and millions may die there.
quotes.author: Johann Hari

quotes.quote: Two conditions render difficult this historic situation of mankind: It is full of tremendously deadly armament, and it has not progressed morally as much as it has scientifically and technically.
quotes.author: John Paul VI

quotes.quote: The terror created by weaponry has never stopped men from employing them.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: This is truth: When you sacrifice your life, you must make fullest use of your weaponry. It is false not to do so, and to die with a weapon as yet undrawn.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: We must be the great arsenal of democracy.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Democracy is a constant tension between truth and half-truth and, in the arsenal of truth, there is no greater weapon than fact.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: Every library is an arsenal.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Whoever said the pen is mightier than the sword obviously never encountered automatic weapons.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: Art attracts us only by what it reveals of our most secret self.
quotes.author: Jean-Luc Godard

quotes.quote: Art begins with resistance, at the point where resistance is overcome. No human masterpiece has ever been created without great labor.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Art consists of limitation. The most beautiful part of every picture is the frame.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Art does not imitate, but interpret.
quotes.author: Giuseppe Mazzini

quotes.quote: Art doesn't have to be pretty. It has to be meaningful.
quotes.author: Duane Hanson

quotes.quote: Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Art has the role in education of helping children become like themselves instead of more like everyone else.
quotes.author: Sydney Gurewitz Clemens

quotes.quote: Art inspires, produces an unwillingness to settle for what we have and a desire for something better. It is the product and producer of creative activity, change; it is essential for continuous development.
quotes.author: Russell L. Ackoff

quotes.quote: Art is a collaboration between God and the artist, and the less the artist does the better.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Art is a fruit that grows in man, like a fruit on a plant or a child in its mother's womb.
quotes.author: Jean Arp

quotes.quote: Art is an intersection of many human needs.
quotes.author: Carl Andre

quotes.quote: Art is born of the observation and investigation of nature.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Art is everywhere, except it has to pass through a creative mind.
quotes.author: L. Nevelson

quotes.quote: Art is literacy of the heart.
quotes.author: Elliot Eisner

quotes.quote: Art is magic delivered from the lie of being truth.
quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

quotes.quote: Art is man's constant effort to create for himself a different order of reality from that which is given to him.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: Art is not a thing, it is a way.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Art is not the application of a canon of beauty but what the instinct and the brain can conceive beyond any canon. When we love a woman we don't start measuring her limbs.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Art is not what you see, but what you make others see.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: Art is on the side of the oppressed. Think before you shudder at the simplistic dictum and its heretical definition of the freedom of art. For if art is freedom of the spirit, how can it exist within the oppressors?
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: Art is the concrete representation of our most subtle feelings.
quotes.author: Agnes Martin

quotes.quote: Art is the desire of a man to express himself, to record the reactions of his personality to the world he lives in.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: Art is the imposing of a pattern on experience, and our aesthetic enjoyment is recognition of the pattern.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Art is the most intense mode of individualism that the world has known.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Art is the only way to run away without leaving home.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: Art is the reason I get up in the morning, but the definition ends there. It doesn't seem fair that I'm living for something I can't even define.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: Art is the stored honey of the human soul, gathered on wings of misery and travail.
quotes.author: Theodore Dreiser

quotes.quote: Art is not the possession of the few who are recognized writers, painters, musicians; it is the authentic expression of any and all individuality.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Art reaches its greatest peak when devoid of self-consciousness. Freedom discovers man the moment he loses concern over what impression he is making or about to make.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Art remains the one way possible of speaking truth.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Art should comfort the disturbed and disturb the comfortable.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: Art suffers the moment other people start paying for it.
quotes.author: Hugh MacLeod

quotes.quote: Art, like morality, consists in drawing the line somewhere.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Art's whatever you choose to frame.
quotes.author: Fleur Adcock

quotes.quote: Don't think about making art, just get it done. Let everyone else decide if it's good or bad, whether they love it or hate it. While they are deciding, make even more art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: In art the hand can never execute anything higher than the heart can inspire.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It has been said that art is a tryst, for in the joy of it maker and beholder meet.
quotes.author: Kojiro Tomita

quotes.quote: It is no wonder if Art frequently prefers Illusion to Truth: for Illusion is her servant, but Truth her mistress.
quotes.author: Richard Garnett

quotes.quote: Life imitates art far more than art imitates life.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The arts do live continuously, and they live literally by faith; their names and their shapes and their uses and their basic meanings survive unchanged in all that matters through times of interruption, diminishment, neglect; they outlive governments and creeds and the societies, even the very civilization that produced them. They cannot be destroyed altogether because they represent the substance of faith and the only reality. They are what we find again when the ruins are cleared away.
quotes.author: Katherine Anne Porter

quotes.quote: The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: There is an art of reading, as well as an art of thinking, and an art of writing.
quotes.author: Isaac D'Israeli

quotes.quote: We all know that Art is not truth. Art is a lie that makes us realize truth, at least the truth that is given us to understand. The artist must know the manner whereby to convince others of the truthfulness of his lies.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Without tradition, art is a flock of sheep without a shepherd. Without innovation, it is a corpse.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Works of art, in my opinion, are the only objects in the material universe to possess internal order, and that is why, though I don't believe that only art matters, I do believe in art for art's sake.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: Great art picks up where nature ends.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.quote: The art of art, the glory of expression and the sunshine of the light of letters, is simplicity.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The object of art is not to reproduce reality, but to create a reality of the same intensity.
quotes.author: Alberto Giacometti

quotes.quote: If art reflects life, it does so with special mirrors.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: Art is the lie that enables us to realize the truth.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Painting is easy when you don't know how, but very difficult when you do.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: We have art in order not to die of the truth.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Perfection in art, as often in life, is better captured by eraser than pencil.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: The principles of true art is not to portray, but to evoke.
quotes.author: Jerzy Kosinski

quotes.quote: Art is anything you can get away with.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: There is no must in art because art is free.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: Art is never finished, only abandoned.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Art must be an expression of love or it is nothing.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.quote: Art is man's challenge to time, his rebuke to chaos; the protest will survive neither the triumph of fire, nor the finality of ice â€” but it is better than the silence of consent.
quotes.author: Dr. Idel Dreimer

quotes.quote: Painting is just another way of keeping a diary.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Life beats down and crushes the soul and art reminds you that you have one.
quotes.author: Stella Adler

quotes.quote: Art is basically made by dissatisfied people who are willing to find some means to relieve the dissatisfaction.
quotes.author: John Chamberlain

quotes.quote: Art is the proper task of life.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I found I could say things with color and shapes that I couldn't say any other way--things I had no words for.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.quote: Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Painting is poetry that is seen rather than felt, and poetry is painting that is felt rather than seen.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Art lies by its own artifice.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Art is pattern informed by sensibility.
quotes.author: Herbert Read

quotes.quote: If art, all art, is concerned with truth, then a society in denial will not find much use for it.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Fine art is that in which the hand, the head, and the heart of man go together.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Art is a little subversive, very subversive; it gets underneath the surface and reveals what is there; it is a Geiger counter for truth.
quotes.author: Pat Allen

quotes.quote: Good art is art that allows you to enter it from a variety of angles and to emerge with a variety of views.
quotes.author: Mary Schmich

quotes.quote: Art is a marriage of the conscious and the unconscious.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: If you hear a voice within you say, â€˜You cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Art without emotion its like chocolate cake without sugar. It makes you gag.
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.quote: In art, the hand can never execute anything higher than the heart can imagine.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Art is the only serious thing in the world. And the artist is the only person who is never serious.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Art is a microscope which the artist fixes on the secrets of his soul, and shows to people these secrets which are common to all.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Most art is fragile and some should be placed and never moved away.
quotes.author: Donald Judd

quotes.quote: The difference between Art and Life is that Art is more bearable.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: A picture is a poem without words.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: You don't take a photograph, you make it.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: Don't think about making art, just get it done. Let everyone else decide if it's good or bad, whether they love it or hate it. While they are deciding, make even more art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Art is the signature of civilizations.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.quote: Art is skill; that is the first meaning of the word.
quotes.author: Eric Gill

quotes.quote: What art offers is space—a certain breathing room for the spirit.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: There is no surer method of evading the world than by following Art and no surer method of linking oneself to it than by Art.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Art is the triumph over chaos.
quotes.author: John Cheever

quotes.quote: Art is indeed not the bread but the wine of life.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: Art is like a border of flowers along the course of civilization.
quotes.author: Lincoln Steffens

quotes.quote: I think of Art as a glue, a cultural and social glue. It's one of the means that has served to show us the things we believe in and the things we celebrate; it has served to reinforce our relationship to each other.
quotes.author: Eric Fischl

quotes.quote: Art completes what nature cannot bring to finish. The artist gives us knowledge of nature's unrealized ends.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Art is our chief means of breaking bread with the dead.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Art is an end in itself; its values are intrinsic.
quotes.author: Daniel Bell

quotes.quote: Art is who we are. It facilitates self-realization in everyone.
quotes.author: Philippe Benichou

quotes.quote: Art is not a mirror held up to reality, but a hammer with which to shape it.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: I once had the nerve to ask Picasso the question, 'What is art?' He answered, 'Art is a lie which makes us see the truth.'
quotes.author: James Dickey

quotes.quote: Art is a language that can transcend words. It can convey some of the nonverbal consciousness of the artist to the viewer.
quotes.author: Ron Gang

quotes.quote: Art is the human disposition of sensible or intelligible matter for an aesthetic end.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: Art is a line around your thoughts.
quotes.author: Gustav Klimt

quotes.quote: Art is our one true global language. It knows no nation; it favors no race, and it acknowledges no class. It speaks to our need to reveal, heal, and transform. It transcends our ordinary lives and lets us imagine what is possible.
quotes.author: Richard Kamler

quotes.quote: All art is a revolt against man's fate.
quotes.author: Andre Malraux

quotes.quote: Art is the imitation of nature in her manner of operation: Art is the principle of manufacture.
quotes.author: St. Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Artists... like bees, they must put their lives into the sting they give.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: In art, as in politics, there is no such thing as gratitude.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: In art., as in love, instinct is enough.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Art, like the microscope, reveals many things that the naked eye does not see.
quotes.author: George Moore

quotes.quote: Great art is as irrational as great music. It is mad with its own loveliness.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.quote: Art, like morality, consists of drawing the line somewhere.
quotes.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quotes.quote: Art is not a treasure in the past or an importation from another land, but part of the present life of all the living and creating peoples.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A work of art is above all an adventure of the mind.
quotes.author: Eugene Ionesco

quotes.quote: Great art is an instant arrested in eternity.
quotes.author: James G. Huneker

quotes.quote: Art is so wonderfully irrational, exuberantly pointless, but necessary, all the same.
quotes.author: Gunter Glass

quotes.quote: No great artist ever sees things as they really are. If he did, he would cease to be an artist.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Art is a human activity having for its purpose the transmission to others of the highest and best feelings to which men have risen.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: The truest expression of a people is in its dances and its music.
quotes.author: Agnes De Mille

quotes.quote: Supreme art is a traditional statement of certain heroic and religious truth, passed on from age to age, modified by individual genius, but never abandoned.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Art is the window to man's soul. Without it, he would never be able to see beyond his immediate world; nor could the world see the man within.
quotes.author: Claudia Johnson

quotes.quote: Art is the objectification of feelings
quotes.author: Susanne K. Langer

quotes.quote: Art is the soul of the people.
quotes.author: Romare Bearden

quotes.quote: Bad artists copy. Good artists steal.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: All great artists draw from the same resource: the human heart, which tells us that we are all more alike than we are unalike.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: An artist must be free to choose what he does, certainly, but he must also never be afraid to do what he might choose.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: An artist is somebody who produces things that people don't need to have.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: No great artist ever sees things as they really are. If he did, he would cease to be an artist.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Every artist dips his brush in his own soul, and paints his own nature into his pictures.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: It's good as an artist to always remember to see things in a new, weird way.
quotes.author: Tim Burton

quotes.quote: Every artist was first an amateur.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you are born an artist, you have no choice but to fight to stay an artist.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: To be an artist you have to give up everything, including the desire to be a good artist.
quotes.author: Jasper Johns

quotes.quote: Great artists suffer for the people.
quotes.author: Marvin Gaye

quotes.quote: A great artist can paint a great picture on a small canvas.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: No artist is ahead of his time. He is his time; it is just that others are behind the times.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: As artists, we do the work that we do. Receiving an award or not receiving an award in no way diminishes one's talent or value.
quotes.author: Phylicia Rashad

quotes.quote: Artists are just children who refuse to put down their crayons.
quotes.author: Al Hirschfeld

quotes.quote: Artists who seek perfection in everything are those who cannot attain it in anything.
quotes.author: Eugene Delacroix

quotes.quote: Great artists are people who find the way to be themselves in their art. Any sort of pretension induces mediocrity in art and life alike.
quotes.author: Margot Fonteyn

quotes.quote: Artists need some kind of stimulating experience a lot of times, which crystallizes when you sing about it or paint it or sculpt it. You literally mold the experience the way you want. It's therapy.
quotes.author: Erykah Badu

quotes.quote: Real artists take the misery and sadness of life and translate it into art.
quotes.author: Josh Peck

quotes.quote: The big artist keeps an eye on nature and steals her tools.
quotes.author: Thomas Eakins

quotes.quote: An artist can be truly evaluated only after he is dead. At the very 11th hour, he might do something that will eclipse everything else.
quotes.author: Van Cliburn

quotes.quote: The test of the artist does not lie in the will with which he goes to work, but in the excellence of the work he produces.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: An artist is a dreamer consenting to dream of the actual world.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: True artists are almost the only men who do their work for pleasure.
quotes.author: Auguste Rodin

quotes.quote: The artist is nothing without the gift, but the gift is nothing without work.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.quote: The artist must train not only his eye but also his soul.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: To be an artist includes much; one must possess many gifts - absolute gifts - which have not been acquired by one's own effort. And, moreover, to succeed, the artist much possess the courageous soul.
quotes.author: Kate Chopin

quotes.quote: You don't know how much artists go through to make it look so easy. It's all in the practice.
quotes.author: Lauryn Hill

quotes.quote: Artists today think of everything they do as a work of art. It is important to forget about what you are doing - then a work of art may happen.
quotes.author: Andrew Wyeth

quotes.quote: In fact, most artists want to make things a bit more difficult for themselves as they go along, to challenge themselves.
quotes.author: David Hockney

quotes.quote: An artist is always alone - if he is an artist. No, what the artist needs is loneliness.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: To the artist there is never anything ugly in nature.
quotes.author: Auguste Rodin

quotes.quote: Every artist picks what they want to put out there, what image they want to portray, and what they want people to know about where they're from.
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.quote: The modern artist is working with space and time, and expressing his feelings rather than illustrating.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: There is only one position for an artist anywhere; and that is upright.
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.quote: The artist never entirely knows. We guess. We may be wrong, but we take leap after leap in the dark.
quotes.author: Agnes De Mille

quotes.quote: An artist is forced by others to paint out of his own free will.
quotes.author: Willem de Kooning

quotes.quote: To me, what makes an artist is a unique personality that they're not afraid to let show.
quotes.author: Blake Shelton

quotes.quote: An artist, under pain of oblivion, must have confidence in himself, and listen only to his real master: Nature.
quotes.author: Pierre-Auguste Renoir

quotes.quote: A great artist is a great man in a great child.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Every artist preserves deep within him a single source from which, throughout his lifetime, he draws what he is, and what he says. When the source dries up, the work withers and crumbles.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Being an artist is dragging your innermost feelings out, giving a piece of yourself, no matter in which art form, in which medium.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: The difference between a bad artist and a good one is: the bad artist seems to copy a great deal; the good one really does.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Even a true artist does not always produce art.
quotes.author: Carroll O'Connor

quotes.quote: The great artist is a slave to his ideals.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: Only an artist can interpret the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Novalis

quotes.quote: Every artist writes his own autobiography.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: In order for the artist to have a world to express he must first be situated in this world, oppressed or oppressing, resigned or rebellious, a man among men.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: What gives the artist real prestige is his imitators.
quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

quotes.quote: The artist produces for the liberation of his soul. It is his nature to create as it is the nature of water to run down the hill.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Artwork is a representation of our devotion to life.
quotes.author: Agnes Martin

quotes.quote: I think the optimal artwork is in constant circulation with the world around itself.
quotes.author: Aleksandra Mir

quotes.quote: Artwork can be a portal, a kind of rethinking and reseeing of the world as we live it.
quotes.author: Todd Solondz

quotes.quote: While some part of the artwork may fail, the whole may have its own unique importance.
quotes.author: Eric Maisel

quotes.quote: The seed of your next artwork lies embedded in the imperfections of your current piece.
quotes.author: David Bayles

quotes.quote: There is much to be said for the artwork that answers horror by rejecting or transcending it.
quotes.author: Alex Ross

quotes.quote: Whenever you finish an artwork and the viewer comes and views it, at that moment you've given up control.
quotes.author: Jeff Koons

quotes.quote: An artwork should point in more than one direction, not be this sort of placating, self-demonstrating, witnessing element.
quotes.author: Luc Tuymans

quotes.quote: How can anybody learn anything from an artwork when the piece of art only reflects the vanity of the artist and not reality?
quotes.author: Lou Reed

quotes.quote: I think that artworks are like these spiritual objects: I think that they have energies and powers beyond what the eye can see.
quotes.author: Dan Colen

quotes.quote: To make an artwork good enough to enter people's hearts is like what ancient Chinese called 'making stone into gold.' It is alchemy.
quotes.author: Li Shan

quotes.quote: To give a price to an artwork, no matter how high or low, is always absurd. It's not something that can be measured by money or by certain numbers.
quotes.author: Ai Weiwei

quotes.quote: The artwork had very little to do with the thought process, and the writing too, for that matter. What happens, happens, and it happens outside the brain.
quotes.author: Jules Feiffer

quotes.quote: Attention is what creates value. Artworks are made as well by how people interact with them - and therefore by what quality of interaction they can inspire.
quotes.author: Brian Eno

quotes.quote: Some visual artworks are made to be talked about more than to be seen, others are made to be seen more than to be talked about. I think I belong in the latter category.
quotes.author: Mati Klarwein

quotes.quote: Artwork is not like a commercial business; there is no such thing as a schedule for art. You can't hurry art.
quotes.author: Michael Heizer

quotes.quote: Artwork is not thought up in consciousness and then, as a separate phase, executed by the hand. The hand surprises us creates and solves problems on its own. Often, enigmas that baffle our brains are dealt with easily, unconsciously, by the hand.
quotes.author: Stephen Nachmanovitch

quotes.quote: Artwork operates on two different levels: On one level there's artwork as a mode of expressivity, and then there's the other side, where the image is a construction that is meant to engage in a discursive field in order to preform a particular function.
quotes.author: Kerry James Marshall

quotes.quote: The promise of any artwork is that it can hold us - viewer and maker - in a conflicted or contestable space, without real-world injury or loss.
quotes.author: Kara Walker

quotes.quote: A work of art expresses itself as a balance sheet pitting the spoken against the unspoken.
quotes.author: Eli Siegel

quotes.quote: Every single work of art is the fulfillment of a prophecy; for every work of art is the conversion of an idea into an image.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The true work of art continues to unfold and create within the personality of the spectator. It is a continuous coming into being.
quotes.author: Mervyn Levy

quotes.quote: A work of art is one through which the consciousness of the artist is able to give its emotions to anyone who is prepared to receive them.
quotes.author: Muriel Rukeyser

quotes.quote: A work of art is above all an adventure of the mind.
quotes.author: Eugene Ionesco

quotes.quote: A work of art is the trace of a magnificent struggle.
quotes.author: Grace Hartigan

quotes.quote: A work of art which did not begin in emotion is not art.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.quote: Only the work of art itself can raise the standard of taste.
quotes.author: Diego Rivera

quotes.quote: A work of art doesn't dare you to realize it. It germinates and gestates by itself.
quotes.author: John Huston

quotes.quote: Every work of art is the child of its time, often it is the mother of our emotions.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: A work of art is a world in itself reflecting senses and emotions of the artist's world.
quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

quotes.quote: Any artwork needs time and patience and needs above a quiet mind.
quotes.author: Flora Thompson

quotes.quote: The digital artwork is characterized not by the technology which delivers it, but by the "passage" itself.
quotes.author: Masha Tupitsyn

quotes.quote: Any artwork is part of something larger, grander and, you know, the situation that it's in is very important.
quotes.author: Robert Barry

quotes.quote: In an artwork you're always looking for artistic decisions, so an ashtray is perfect. An ashtray has got life and death.
quotes.author: Damien Hirst

quotes.quote: Any work of art dignifies life.
quotes.author: James Ponsoldt

quotes.quote: The work of art is the exaggeration of an idea.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: The work of art is a scream of freedom.
quotes.author: Christo

quotes.quote: Any work of art ... is great when it makes you feel that its creator has dipped into your very heart for his sensation.
quotes.author: Fannie Hurst

quotes.quote: Any genuine work of art generates new work.
quotes.author: Donald Barthelme

quotes.quote: Every work of art depicts an aspect of reality.
quotes.author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quotes.quote: Any work of art must first of all tell a story.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: A work of art comes only from inside a human being.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.quote: The work of art is above all a process of creation.
quotes.author: Paul Klee

quotes.quote: In every work of art, the artist himself is present.
quotes.author: Christian Morgenstern

quotes.quote: A work of art comes out of a state of deep stillness.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Every true work of art must express a distinct feeling.
quotes.author: Caspar David Friedrich

quotes.quote: Every authentic work of art is a gift offered to the future.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: A great work of art is one that continues to repay attention.
quotes.author: Christopher Ricks

quotes.quote: A true work of art can stand many seeings, revealing anew at each seeing.
quotes.author: John Marin

quotes.quote: Any authentic work of art must start an argument between the artist and his audience.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: At His Ascension our Lord entered Heaven, and He keeps the door open for humanity to enter.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: The ascension of Christ makes heaven seem homelike to us as we journey toward it; for Jesus wears our humanity at the right hand of the Father.
quotes.author: Abbott Eliot Kittredge

quotes.quote: As we ascend the social ladder, viciousness wears athicker mask.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Ah, paths of the soul, mysterious ways of the heart! One must walk their full lengths before facing the supreme equation of Eternal Life. It is essential for you to live all their conflicts and to know them fully in the long process of spiritual ascension.
quotes.author: Andre Luiz Moreira

quotes.quote: The unseen essential awaits your enlightened heart's ascension to love.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Only a person who has passed through the gate of humility can ascend to the heights of the spirit.
quotes.author: Rudolf Steiner

quotes.quote: Every day you may make progress. Every step may be fruitful. Yet there will stretch out before you an ever-lengthening, ever-ascending, ever-improving path. You know you will never get to the end of the journey. But this, so far from discouraging, only adds to the joy and glory of the climb.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Our pleasures and our discontents,Are rounds by which we may ascend.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: In actual life a downward movement may sometimes be made the beginning of an ascent.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: The chains which cramp us most are those which weigh on us least.
quotes.author: Madame Swetchine

quotes.quote: Ascension to successive echelons in the pyramid of awareness is an act of inclusion requiring unconditional acceptance of all that lies below.
quotes.author: Gerald R. Stanek

quotes.quote: There's always another level up. There's always another ascension. More grace, more light, more generosity, more compassion, more to shed, more to grow.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Ascension through all levels of consciousness and awareness can only happen when you live life as you, and not how others think you should live. How could self-realization possibly be anything other than being yourself?
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Ascension is the triumph of mastered emotions; a process of gaining clarity in the darkness of blind spots and struggles, allowing you to perceive with the karmic intelligence of the Soul.
quotes.author: Ka Chinery

quotes.quote: Ascensions into heaven are like falling leaves sad and happy all at the same time Going away isn't really sad especially when your going enables a new kind of presence to be born.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The ascension is actually the birth of the inner you expressed as the spiritual individualism of the inner particle state.
quotes.author: Stuart Wilde

quotes.quote: Death is an ascension to a better library.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: I never learn anything talking. I only learn things when I ask question.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: You really want the truth? Ask a child.
quotes.author: Charmaine J Forde

quotes.quote: You need to trust To surrender / To ask for guidance / Go within for the answers / They're within you / You have the answers / All you need do is ask.
quotes.author: Karen Hackel

quotes.quote: It is not fair to ask of others what you are not willing to do yourself.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You can't just ask customers what they want and then try to give that to them. By the time you get it built, they'll want something new.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Asking for help with shame says: You have the power over me. Asking with condescension says: I have the power over you. But asking for help with gratitude says: We have the power to help each other.
quotes.author: Amanda Palmer

quotes.quote: You should never ask anyone for anything. Never- and especially from those who are more powerful than yourself.
quotes.author: Mikhail Bulgakov

quotes.quote: Questions are never foolish. Stupider are those who never ask anything.
quotes.author: Tamuna Tservadze

quotes.quote: Marty, my mother used to say 'Never get greedy with God.' I think what she meant was 'Don't dare ask for more if you already have what you need.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: To ask why we fall in love is to ask why the leaves fall. And to ask how we stay in love is to ask how the trees stay.
quotes.author: Jim Virle

quotes.quote: One of the biggest defects in life is the inability to ask for help.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: I don't think it's the job of filmmakers to give anybody answers. I do think, though, that a good film makes you ask questions of yourself as you leave the theatre.
quotes.author: Paul Haggis

quotes.quote: My job is to help my clients ask better questions. My mentor taught me, 'Ask a better question, get a better answer.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: And so, my fellow Americans, ask not what your country can do for you; ask what you can do for your country.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Older people sit down and ask, 'what is it', but the boy asks, What can I do with it?
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: When your mother asks, 'Do you want a piece of advice?' it is a mere formality. It doesn't matter if you answer yes or no. You're going to get it anyway.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: The questions which one asks oneself begin, at least, to illuminate the world, and become one's key to the experience of others.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: I you want something said, ask a man; If you want something done, ask a woman.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to ask questions. Don't be afraid to ask for help when you need it. I do that every day. Asking for help isn't a sign of weakness, it's a sign of strength. It shows you have the courage to admit when you don't know something, and to learn something new.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The strong individual is the one who asks for help when he needs it.
quotes.author: Rona Barrett

quotes.quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: I've had lots of kids come up and ask for my autograph, I've had a grandmother stop me and ask me if I know a good place to buy underwear.
quotes.author: Prince William

quotes.quote: Success comes from aspiration, desperation, perspiration, and inspiration!
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Dreams come true; without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: If you work hard enough and assert yourself, and use your mind and imagination, you can shape the world to your desires.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: An aspirational diet will have you dreaming of success; but it's the attachment of expectations and tangible goals that feeds the desire, persistence, and fortitude required to make the win.
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: A person who aims at nothing is sure to hit it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Without ambition one starts nothing. Without work one finishes nothing. The prize will not be sent to you. You have to win it.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Aim higher in case you fall short.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: Aspirations forms the plot of success.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: It takes a certain level of aspiration before one can take advantage of opportunities that are clearly offered.
quotes.author: Michael Harrington

quotes.quote: The most absurd and reckless aspirations have sometimes led to extraordinary success.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: Within our dreams and aspirations we find our opportunities.
quotes.author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quotes.quote: Our aspirations are our possibilities.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: To accomplish great things we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: To understand the heart and mind of a person, look not at what he has already achieved, but at what he aspires to.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: The young have aspirations that never come to pass, the old have reminiscences of what never happened.
quotes.author: Hector Hugh Munro

quotes.quote: If you would hit the mark, you must aim a little above it; Every arrow that flies feels the attraction of earth.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Don't let young people tell you their aspirations; when they drop them they will drop you.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith
