quotes.quote: In the long run men only hit what they aim at. Therefore, though they should fail immediately, they had better aim at something high.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: When aspirations are perceived to be achievable, ambition and drive can erase excuses.
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: Dream your dreams with open eyes and make them come true.
quotes.author: T. E. Lawrence

quotes.quote: You'll become that devil overnight, if you want to become that celebrity overnight.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Achievement is largely the product of steadily raising one's level of aspiration and expectation.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: If you always do what you've always done, you'll always get what you've always had. No one rises to low expectations.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Aspiration, it seems, is in danger of becoming the preserve of the wealthy.
quotes.author: Iain Duncan Smith

quotes.quote: If you can imagine it, you can create it. If you dream it, you can become it.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Don't expect others to hand success to you. Create it - with heart, energy and enterprise - and you'll make it come true.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Goals are dreams with deadlines.
quotes.author: Diana Scharf Hunt

quotes.quote: An aspiration is a joy forever, a possession as solid as a landed estate, a fortune which we can never exhaust and which gives us year by year a revenue of pleasurable activity.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It is important to dream big. What we imagine, we become, we achieve. Even if we don Ìt go the yonder, we will reach way much farther than where we currently stand.
quotes.author: Tina Sequeira

quotes.quote: You will become as small as your controlling desire; as great as you dominant aspiration.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Dreams pass into the reality of action. From the actions stems the dream again and this interdependence produces the highest form of living.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: All of our deeply held dreams and aspirations require us to build on our common bonds.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: We cannot seek achievement for ourselves and forget about progress and prosperity for our community. Our ambitions must be broad enough to include the aspirations and needs of others, for their sakes and for our own.
quotes.author: Cesar Chavez

quotes.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A leader's role is to raise people's aspirations for what they can become and to release their energies so they will try to get there.
quotes.author: David Gergen

quotes.quote: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.
quotes.author: Edgar Cayce

quotes.quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: Do not lose hold of your dreams or aspirations. For if you do, you may still exist but you have ceased to live.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When you look at a city, it's like reading the hopes, aspirations and pride of everyone who built it.
quotes.author: Hugh Newell Jacobsen

quotes.quote: In dreams and in love there are no impossibilities.
quotes.author: Janos Arany

quotes.quote: Normal is not something to aspire to, it's something to get away from.
quotes.author: Jodie Foster

quotes.quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: You cannot demonstrate an emotion or prove an aspiration.
quotes.author: John Morley

quotes.quote: Shoot for the moon and if you miss you will still be among the stars.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Far away there in the sunshine are my highest aspirations.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: The greatest danger for most of us is not that our aim is too high and we miss it, but that it is too low and we reach it.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: Cherish your visions and your dreams, as they are the children of your soul the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Our politics are our deepest form of expression: they mirror our past experiences and reflect our dreams and aspirations for the future.
quotes.author: Paul Wellstone

quotes.quote: When a person really desires something, all the universe conspires to help that person to realize his dream.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams. Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential.
quotes.author: Pope John XXII

quotes.quote: An aspiration is a joy forever, a possession as solid as a landed estate.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Your own words are the bricks and mortar of the dreams you want to realize. Behind every word flows energy.
quotes.author: Sonia Choquette

quotes.quote: Vision looks outward and becomes aspiration.
quotes.author: Stephen Samuel Wise

quotes.quote: Dream your dreams with open eyes and make them come true.
quotes.author: T. E. Lawrence

quotes.quote: The specific is not exclusive it lacks the aspiration to totality.
quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

quotes.quote: There is no greatness without passion to be great, whether it's the aspiration of an athlete or an artist, a scientist, a parent, or a businessperson.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Humor is something that thrives between man's aspirations and his limitations. There is more logic in humor than in anything else. Because, you see, humor is truth.
quotes.author: Victor Borge

quotes.quote: Don't bother just to be better than others. Try to be better than yourself.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: We grow great by dreams. All big men are dreamers.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Aspire not to have more, but to be more.
quotes.author: Oscar Romero

quotes.quote: Always aspire to become the next you, not someone else.
quotes.author: Prabal Gurung

quotes.quote: You aspire to great things? Begin with the little ones.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Don't aspire to make a living, aspire to make a difference.
quotes.author: Denzel Washington

quotes.quote: What we aspire to be is more than what we are yet less than what we are capable of.
quotes.author: Don Williams

quotes.quote: Those that aspire to raise their head above the crowd are most likely to have it shot off.
quotes.author: Leif Herrgesell

quotes.quote: Aspire greatly; anything less than a commitment to excellence becomes an acceptance of mediocrity.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: To never aspire to excellence means to never fully comprehend the amount of work required to achieve it.
quotes.author: John Avery

quotes.quote: Aspire higher to attain excellence in whatever you do. But be careful when you reach the peak, where the only way is the way downwards. Maintain your standard!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: To aspire to be superhuman is a most discreditable admission that you lack the guts, the wit, the moderating judgment to be successfully and consummately human.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: If you aspire to be a sparrow you will never be an eagle!
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: I don't aspire to be a good man. I aspire to be a whole man.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: To desire is to obtain; to aspire is to achieve.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Who aspires must down as low, As high he soar'd.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Aspire rather to be a hero than merely appear one.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: We do not aspire to communal life but to a life apart.
quotes.author: Max Stirner

quotes.quote: Aspire, break bounds. Endeavor to be good, and better still, best.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Aspire to be, and all that we are not God will give us credit for trying.
quotes.author: Nannie Helen Burroughs

quotes.quote: He who aspires to paradise should learn to deal with people with kindness.
quotes.author: Abu Bakr

quotes.quote: So if you aspire to be a good conversationalist, be an attentive listener.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Aspire to do better. Instead of being the leader of the group, be the little person.
quotes.author: Jake M. Johnson

quotes.quote: Most of us who aspire to be tops in our fields don't really consider the amount of work required to stay tops.
quotes.author: Althea Gibson

quotes.quote: Sincerely to aspire after virtue, is to gain her; and zealously to labour after her wages, is to receive them.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: When you're a little weird, you aspire to be normal; when you're very weird, you aspire to be recognized for it.
quotes.author: Neil Harbisson

quotes.quote: You must never aspire to 'finish' a house, you can merely hope to start it, and from then on it's an evolutionary process.
quotes.author: Stephen Bayley

quotes.quote: What we earnestly aspire to be, that in some sense we are.
quotes.author: Anna Jameson

quotes.quote: To aspire for success you must first recognize the possibility of failure.
quotes.author: Senora Roy

quotes.quote: You can only aspire to what you see. That's why role modeling is important.
quotes.author: Regina Agyare

quotes.quote: We should aspire to become enthusiastic and noble.
quotes.author: Atharva Veda

quotes.quote: Aspire to live in peace, not in plenty.
quotes.author: Sai Baba

quotes.quote: We should not aspire for acclaim and praise from those around us, but do service only to secure the Grace of God and not for any other reward from any one.
quotes.author: Sai Baba

quotes.quote: What you aspire to on a sitcom is the feeling of live comedy.
quotes.author: John Lithgow

quotes.quote: Let us not aspire to four-year goals but rather forty-year goals.
quotes.author: Michael Skolnik

quotes.quote: You need not aspire for or get any new state. Get rid of your present thoughts, that is all.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: If you aspire to be a leader of your own country, you must speak your own language, for God's sake.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: Aspire to be who you most admire.
quotes.author: Deborah A. Carr

quotes.quote: No matter what race or color you are, you can aspire to do something great.
quotes.author: Laurie Hernandez

quotes.quote: If you aspire to the highest place, it is no disgrace to stop at the second, or even the third, place.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: An Assassin, a real Assassin had to look like one-black clothes, hood, boots, and all. If they could wear any clothes, any disguise, then what could anyone do but spend all day in a small room with a loaded crossbow pointed at the door?
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: The greatest assassin of life is haste, the desire to reach things before the right time which means overreaching them.
quotes.author: Juan Ramon Jimenez

quotes.quote: My dad was a quiet assassin. He was really charming and smiley and softly spoken, but he could knock you out in a second.
quotes.author: Jimmy Barnes

quotes.quote: Words without actions are the assassins of idealism.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Assassins did have a certain code, after all. It was dishonorable to kill someone if you weren't being paid.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Assassin?… That sounds so exotic… I was just a murderer.
quotes.author: Richard Kuklinski

quotes.quote: I thought the Secret Service would protect me from the press, but they were at my house to protect me from assassins with guns, not with assassins with pencils.
quotes.author: Michael Reagan

quotes.quote: Idea-assassins rush forward to kill any new suggestion on the grounds of its impracticality, while defending whatever now exists as practical, no matter how absurd.
quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

quotes.quote: How shall the murdered man convince his assassin he will not haunt him.
quotes.author: Malcolm Lowry

quotes.quote: A wet boy has a deader, an assassin has a target, because assassins sometimes miss.
quotes.author: Brent Weeks

quotes.quote: I was no assassin. I got out during the amnesty because I had not committed any violent crimes.
quotes.author: Jose Mujica

quotes.quote: One kills a man, one is an assassin; one kills millions, one is a conqueror; one kills everybody, one is a God.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: War is the statesman's game, the priest's delight, the lawyer's jest, the hired assassin's trade.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: The important thing to know about an assassination or an attempted assassination is not who fired the shot, but who paid for the bullet.
quotes.author: Eric Ambler

quotes.quote: Being an assassin means knowing when to kill - and when not to kill.
quotes.author: Jennifer Estep

quotes.quote: Fear is an assassin; if you let it in your life, it will kill your dreams.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Assassins take no pride in fighting fairly. We take pride in winning.
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.quote: Assassins: they got sass and live on sin.
quotes.author: Natalya Vorobyova

quotes.quote: It would be either a very skilled or very unwise man to steal from an assassin. - Taliesin
quotes.author: Sabrina Zbasnik

quotes.quote: The weapon of the advocate is the sword of the soldier, not the dagger of the assassin.
quotes.author: Alexander Cockburn

quotes.quote: A man feared that he might find an assassin; Another that he might find a victim. One was more wise than the other.
quotes.author: Stephen Crane

quotes.quote: We work in the darkness to serve the light. We are Assassins.
quotes.author: Michael Lesslie

quotes.quote: I need a break. There's no retirement home for assassins, is there? Archery at four. Riflery at five.
quotes.author: Richard Shepard

quotes.quote: Yeah, an Assassin hired an Assassin and then followed the Assassin to supervise the Assassination and then Assassinated the Assassin when the Assassination went wrong.
quotes.author: Ryan George

quotes.quote: You're not an assassin of fate, Sloan. You're just a thug who can bend bullets.
quotes.author: Michael Brandt

quotes.quote: What do you call it when the assassins accuse the assassin? A lie. A lie and we have to be merciful.
quotes.author: John Milius

quotes.quote: I'm a warrior, an assassin. I don't dance.
quotes.author: James Gunn

quotes.quote: Think of it as a hobby. Something you do to relax. You're an 'assassination enthusiast.'
quotes.author: Chuck Barris

quotes.quote: All women are assassins of one stripe or another. Most of them just kill your dreams.
quotes.author: John Harvatine IV

quotes.quote: Dating an assassin and didn't even notice. Just another man underestimating a woman's capacity for evil.
quotes.author: John Harvatine IV

quotes.quote: Assassination has always been a legitimate tool of statecraft. Its respectability and public acceptance has varied from civilization to civilization, but its practical application has remained remarkably consistent.
quotes.author: Terry Nation

quotes.quote: When a man leads assassins, he is also an assassin.
quotes.author: Raoul Peck

quotes.quote: It only becomes assassination when people put their dignity and their past in a balance and removes one.
quotes.author: Kinoko Nasu

quotes.quote: That's a vulgar generalization. But yes, you take an ordinary man an turn him into an assassin. That was our goal.
quotes.author: Brian Helgeland

quotes.quote: Meaning I don't think the world doesn't need another League of Assassins. It could use a league of heroes. It wouldn't be a one-woman job.
quotes.author: Greg Berlanti

quotes.quote: Assassinations... little wars around the world.
quotes.author: Matt Nix

quotes.quote: Professional assassination... is the highest form of public service.
quotes.author: Richard Sapir

quotes.quote: You know, most assassinations are one and done. Hit men acquire a target, execute them, and then disappear.
quotes.author: Jeff Davis

quotes.quote: Assassins who stay too long wind up getting assassinated, and that ain't in my game plan.
quotes.author: Hal Dresner

quotes.quote: The assassin always dies, baby. It's necessary for the national healing.
quotes.author: Richard Condon

quotes.quote: But, of course, even assassins should have a holiday now and then.
quotes.author: Adrian Hodges

quotes.quote: It's nearly impossible to defend against an assassin who's willing to die for his cause.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: The higher you climb, the more you realize that you're surrounded by sycophants and assassins.
quotes.author: Michelle Lovretta

quotes.quote: Assassination is one percent shooting, ninety-nine percent preparation: anticipating moves, devising approaches, recruiting sources, finding the perfect opportunity so the bullet's almost an after-thought.
quotes.author: Matt Nix

quotes.quote: I said he was an assassin. There is a difference, you know. A hit man kills people, anyone, for a price. An assassin murders important figures, politicians, monarchs.
quotes.author: Ian David Diaz

quotes.quote: It is how it works. Let's say there's a massacre somewhere. There's an assassination, but the assassin never gets caught. I make people forget about them. Has there been a huge fraud? Call for me and I'll make them forget.
quotes.author: Hakan Gunday

quotes.quote: But an assassin that can go where he pleases is not to be taken lightly.
quotes.author: Akira Toriyama

quotes.quote: I'm a holistic assassin... I kill whoever I like killing all day and if I killed them, they were my target.
quotes.author: Max Landis

quotes.quote: You want to assassinate someone, vision is a basic requirement. It's like: step one: pick a person to kill. Step two: kill that person.
quotes.author: Jenji Kohan

quotes.quote: Assassins are meant to be quiet. Precise. We do not go announcing conspiracies from the rooftops to all who pass by.
quotes.author: Alex Hutchinson

quotes.quote: We're Assassins and we follow a creed, aye. But it does not command us to act or submit - only to be wise.
quotes.author: Darby McDevitt

quotes.quote: It's easy enough to assassinate a powerful man. The real trick, the art of it, is finding someone else to put the blame on.
quotes.author: Gary Stewart

quotes.quote: I mean maybe you could've saved thirty million lives. Changed history. Now, assassination, anything at all, is entirely ethical if you're on the right side.
quotes.author: H.F. Saint

quotes.quote: The assassins job was to kill.
quotes.author: Neil Davies

quotes.quote: That is why the assassin's job is so interesting: No job is the same as the last one.
quotes.author: Chappy

quotes.quote: Most of the assassins specialized in a special form of assassination and they all were quiet and smooth and clean.
quotes.author: W. Shane Wilson

quotes.quote: No matter what the assassin intended--to act out his fantasy, kill for profit, or spark a revolution--the death of a political figure has some political impact.
quotes.author: John Bowyer Bell

quotes.quote: Assassination is simply a violent crime with political implications.
quotes.author: John Bowyer Bell

quotes.quote: Yet even in the fierce and brutal politics of the Italian Renaissance, the moral assassin was not absent.
quotes.author: John Bowyer Bell

quotes.quote: The assassin is an assassin even when his victim escapes.
quotes.author: Augusto Boal

quotes.quote: The assassins have many faces, but they are of the same spirit.
quotes.author: Bobby Delgado

quotes.quote: I have great faith in fools self-confidence my friends will call it.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Don't live down to expectations. Go out there and do something remarkable.
quotes.author: Wendy Wasserstein

quotes.quote: They can do all because they think they can.
quotes.author: Vergil

quotes.quote: If you doubt yourself, then indeed you stand on shaky ground.
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.quote: The man of genius inspires us with a boundless confidence in our own powers.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Don't let others put thoughts into your mind that takes away your self-confidence.
quotes.author: Katori Hall

quotes.quote: The difference between successful people and really successful people is that really successful people say no to almost everything.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Nothing builds self-esteem and self-confidence like accomplishment.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or think you can't â€“ you are right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.
quotes.author: Edward Estlin Cummings

quotes.quote: It is confidence in our bodies, minds and spirits that allows us to keep looking for new adventures.
quotes.author: Oprah

quotes.quote: The way you treat yourself sets the standard for others.
quotes.author: Sonya Friedman

quotes.quote: Assertiveness is not what you do, it's who you are.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: Men give their confidence at once, but never their money.
quotes.author: Tristan Bernard

quotes.quote: The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease for ever to be able to do it.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: It's not who you are that holds you back, it's who you think you're not.
quotes.author: Attributed to Hanoch McCarty

quotes.quote: Control Your Own Destiny or Someone Else Will
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Confidence is knowing who you are and not changing it a bit because of someone's version of reality is not your reality.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Don't let anyone steal your dream. It's your dream, not theirs.
quotes.author: Dan Zadra

quotes.quote: Always be yourself, express yourself have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Nobody can give you freedom. Nobody can give you equality or justice or anything. If you're a man, you take it.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: With realization of one's own potential and self-confidence in one's ability, one can build a better world.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

quotes.quote: To be passive is to let others decide for you. To be aggressive is to decide for others. To be assertive is to decide for yourself. And to trust that there is enough, that you are enough.
quotes.author: Edith Eva Eger

quotes.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Confidence is like a dragon where, for every head cut off, two more heads grow back.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Self-confidence grows on trees, in other people's orchards.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Life marks us all down, so it's just as well that we start out by overpricing ourselves.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
quotes.author: Peter T.Mcintyre

quotes.quote: If you haven't confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life. With confidence, you have won even before you have started.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The way to develop self-confidence is to do the thing you fear and get a record of successful experiences behind you.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: Assertiveness is most effective when least applied.
quotes.author: Wes Fesler

quotes.quote: To be around someone whose self-confidence is more than what our first glance led us to expect is seductive.
quotes.author: Abraham Verghese

quotes.quote: Make the most of yourself, for that is all there is of you.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Confidence is preparation. Everything else is beyond your control.
quotes.author: Richard Kline

quotes.quote: Being assertive in the home does not produce any smiling faces, but it does bring out a few tongues.
quotes.author: Wes Fesler

quotes.quote: Calm self-confidence is as far from conceit as the desire to earn a decent living is remote from greed.
quotes.author: Channing Pollock

quotes.quote: Confidence is always the best accessory. Own the moment. Own your space.
quotes.author: Andrena Sawyer

quotes.quote: The assertive are ego against ego. Speaking out is not for the common good, according to the assertive philosophy but for getting ahead.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: Assertive is supposed to claim their ego is enough; affirmers justify their values.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: Adopt an assertive way of speaking— with confidence but without aggression.
quotes.author: Pyramid

quotes.quote: Be like water making its way through cracks. Do not be assertive, but adjust to the object, and you shall find a way around or through it. If nothing within you stays rigid, outward things will disclose themselves.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Adopt this attitude and you will be confident that you can cope with everything.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: He that wrestles with us strengthens our nerves and sharpens our skill. Our antagonist is our helper.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Assertive people are not tolerated in California. My friend there would tell me one of two things. They either said, 'Go into therapy' or 'Go to New York.' And so I actually did kind of both of those things.
quotes.author: Bill Heidbreder

quotes.quote: Hell is full of talented but Heaven of the energetic.
quotes.author: St. Jane Frances de Chantal

quotes.quote: In the wild there is no Credo / Nor hideous disbelief; / Song-birds are never assertive / Of the Truth, the Bliss, or Grief.
quotes.author: Gibran

quotes.quote: But as women learn to be more assertive and assume more positions of authority, their insecure nature will be replaced with more confidence and an improved image of reliability.
quotes.author: Lois Kerschen

quotes.quote: The implication is that people become more assertive with age and are less likely to allow others to impose on them.
quotes.author: Jamaican Saying

quotes.quote: Unlike the quiet cow, in order to survive or to avoid being imposed upon, one needs to be assertive and aggressive as one who is too quiet is likely to be taken advantage of.
quotes.author: Jamaican Saying

quotes.quote: I'd like to go to an assertiveness training class. First I need to check with my wife.
quotes.author: Adam Christing

quotes.quote: The duty we owe ourselves is greater than that we owe others.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Never retreat. Never explain. Get it done and let them howl.
quotes.author: Benjamin Jowett

quotes.quote: I think naturally if you're an actor, there's a high level of assertiveness that you need to have to survive this business. There's boldness in being assertive, and there's strength and confidence.
quotes.author: Bryan Cranston

quotes.quote: Nothing is as irritating to a shy man as a confident girl.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: It's not harsh to be assertive, it's harsher when people take advantage of you.
quotes.author: Janna Cachola

quotes.quote: When you are fulfilling the meaning of your life, your steps are assertive, but when you are after power or pleasure, you become aggressive.
quotes.author: Roumen Bezergianov

quotes.quote: Some people hate people who are overconfident, only because their overconfidence reminds them of their underconfidence.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Women are a little more assertive in terms of our ability to express our feelings when we fall in love.
quotes.author: Alicia Machado

quotes.quote: What some call rebellion, others call survival.
quotes.author: Shirley Fessel

quotes.quote: We are capable of performing the task.
quotes.author: Laila Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: One of the hardest expressions of self-assertiveness is challenging your limiting beliefs.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.quote: A bully hides his fears with fake bravado. That is the opposite of self-assertiveness.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.quote: Evaluation by others is not a guide for me.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Every decision you make reflects your evaluation of who you are.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Rational assessments too often led to rational surrenders.
quotes.author: Scott Jurek

quotes.quote: Assessment is today's means of modifying tomorrow's instruction.
quotes.author: Carol Ann Tomlinson

quotes.quote: On assessment: measure what you value instead of valuing only what you can measure.
quotes.author: Andy Hargreaves

quotes.quote: External things are not the problem. It's your assessment of them. Which you can erase right now.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Any assessment of where we stand in relationship to Him tells us that we do not stand at all. We kneel.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Assessments should compare the performance of students to a set of expectations, never to the performance of other students.
quotes.author: Alfie Kohn

quotes.quote: Life is now a constant assessment of whether what's happening in real life is more entertaining than what's happening on my phone.
quotes.author: Damien Fahey

quotes.quote: Honestly admitting what you lost and not trying to rationalize it or push it off is an important step in self-assessment and mindfulness.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Without proper self-evaluation, failure is inevitable.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: A man ought never to trust another man’s evaluation of a third man’s disposition.
quotes.author: Eleanor Catton

quotes.quote: Some people's unwillingness to think for themselves represents accurate self-evaluation.
quotes.author: Arthur D. Hlavaty

quotes.quote: If you have a high evaluation of yourself then your ability to recognize new facts is weakened.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: It's objective evaluations that give our hardwiring principles teeth and drive the organization toward results that last.
quotes.author: Quint Studer

quotes.quote: The natural response to evaluation is to feel judged. We have to mature to a place where we respond to it with gratitude, and love feedback.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: To be the best next-generation leader you can be, you must enlist the help of others. Self-evaluation is helpful, but evaluation from someone else is essential. You need a leadership coach. Coaching enables a leader to go further faster.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Evaluation is creation: hear it, you creators! Evaluating is itself the most valuable treasure of all that we value. It is only through evaluation that value exists: and without evaluation the nut of existence would be hollow. Hear it, you creators!
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Any evaluation which implies rightness or wrongness is a tragic, suicidal expression of an unmet need. Tragic, first because it decreases our likelihood of getting our need met! Even if we think it. And secondly, because it increases the likelihood of violence. That's why I'm suggesting any evaluation which implies rightness or wrongness is a tragic, suicidal expression of an unmet need. Say the need! Learn a need-consciousness.
quotes.author: Marshall B. Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the assessment that something else is more important than fear.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Act after having made assessments. The one who first knows the measure of far and near wins - this is the rule of armed struggle.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: The thesis that risk assessment itself is inherently risky is nowhere better borne out than in the area of high-consequence risks.
quotes.author: Anthony Giddens

quotes.quote: Some of the most interesting research that I did was about risk assessment and how ordinary citizens like me handle risk assessment and how irregular our risk assessments are.
quotes.author: Eula Biss

quotes.quote: Making resolutions is a cleansing ritual of self-assessment and repentance that demands personal honesty and, ultimately, reinforces humility. Breaking them is part of the cycle.
quotes.author: Eric Zorn

quotes.quote: The environmental assessment should give us the answers to all the issues that have been raised: potential lead migration, endangered species, noise abatement and proper disposal of shot, shells and things.
quotes.author: Steven Hall

quotes.quote: Proper evaluations of words and letters in their phonetic and associated sense can bring the people of earth to the clear light of pure cosmic wisdom.
quotes.author: Sun Ra

quotes.quote: Evaluation and coaching get tangled together. When this occurs, the noise of evaluation drowns out coaching efforts. Think of this like a term paper. When you get your assignment grade back (evaluation) you tend to tune out the professor notes in the margins (coaching) if the grade is higher or lower than expected.
quotes.author: Sheila Heen

quotes.quote: We all make basic assumptions about things in life, but sometimes those assumptions are wrong. We must never trust in what we assume, only in what we know.
quotes.author: Darren Shan

quotes.quote: Positive assumptions are needed only when you have negative assumptions that you're trying to overcome. But when you drop your assumptions altogether, your soul stands naked in the open fields of possibility. And what you choose to create from that space is up to you.
quotes.author: T.K. Coleman

quotes.quote: The assumption that humans could be a reliable back up for the system was a fallacy!
quotes.author: Astro Teller

quotes.quote: Assumptions are unopened windows that foolish birds fly into, and their broken bodies are evidence gathered too late.
quotes.author: Bryan Davis

quotes.quote: The assumption that things which have been conjured in the past will always be conjured in the guiding principle not of rational but of animal behavior.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: But you are making assumptions without all the facts, and that's not a sign of intelligence.
quotes.author: C.C. Hunter

quotes.quote: If we worked on the assumption that what is accepted as true really is true, then there would be little hope for advance.
quotes.author: Orville Wright

quotes.quote: We make the assumption that everyone sees life the way we do.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: An assumption is something that is generally accepted as being true.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Assumptions are made and most assumptions are wrong.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: When we believe in lies, we cannot see the truth, so we make thousands of assumptions and we take them as truth. One of the biggest assumptions we make is that the lies we believe are the truth!
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: The hardest assumption to challenge is the one you don't even know you are making.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: The assumption that men were created equal, with an equal ability to make an effort and win an earthly reward, although denied every day by experience, is maintained every day by our folklore and our daydreams.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: We make all sorts of assumptions because we don't have the courage to ask questions.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: New ideas can be supremely bad ideas, and by the time people realize how bad they are, it is sometimes difficult to get rid of them.
quotes.author: Alister E. McGrath

quotes.quote: Assumptions are quick exits for lazy minds that like to graze out in the fields without bother.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: The assumption of perfect knowledge is very far from reality a lot of the evil in the world is actually not intentional.
quotes.author: George Soros

quotes.quote: Assumptions allow the best in life to pass you by.
quotes.author: John Sales

quotes.quote: Assumptions are dangerous things to make, and like all dangerous things to make, bombs, for instance, or strawberry shortcake, if you make even the tiniest mistake you can find yourself in terrible trouble.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.quote: It is useless to attempt to reason a man out of a thing he was never reasoned into.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: We all make assumptions every day. Some more important than others. Some more damaging than others. And things, very often, are not at all what they seem.
quotes.author: B.B. Shepherd

quotes.quote: The assumption must be that those who can see value only in tradition, or versions of it, deny man's ability to adapt to changing circumstances.
quotes.author: Stephen Bayley

quotes.quote: Fixing is the illness model; acceptance is the identity model; which way any family goes reflects their assumptions and resources.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: Start with the assumption that the best way to do something is not the way it's being done right now.
quotes.author: Aaron Levie

quotes.quote: Most of our assumptions have outlived their uselessness.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Incorrect assumptions lie at the root of every failure. Have the courage to test your assumptions.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: If you start a conversation with the assumption that you are right or that you must win, obviously it is difficult to talk.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Most of us make assumptions about how someone will relate to us, and they are often unfounded.
quotes.author: Michele Jennae

quotes.quote: Assumptions are what we don't know we are making.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: The assumption that seeing is believing makes us susceptible to visual deceptions.
quotes.author: Kathleen Hall Jamieson

quotes.quote: The assumption of an absolute determinism is the essential foundation of every scientific enquiry.
quotes.author: Max Planck

quotes.quote: Never make assumptions about someone based on your past experiences with someone else.
quotes.author: Annonymuos

quotes.quote: Begin challenging your own assumptions. Your assumptions are your windows on the world. Scrub them off every once in while, or the light won't come in.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: If the assumptions used in calculating energy are changed, then this seriously affects the final result, even though the same body of data might be used.
quotes.author: Charles Francis Richter

quotes.quote: A theory's assumptions always are and ought to be unrealistic. Further, we should attempt to make them more unrealistic in order to increase a theory's fruitfulness.
quotes.author: Satoshi Kanazawa

quotes.quote: The problem with making assumptions is that we believe they are the truth. We could swear they are real.
quotes.author: Miguel Ruiz

quotes.quote: The assumption that what currently exists must necessarily exist is the acid that corrodes all visionary thinking.
quotes.author: Murray Bookchin

quotes.quote: Assumptions are usually presumptuous but often correct.
quotes.author: Walter Darby Bannard

quotes.quote: Assumptions, by their very nature, are hypotheses.
quotes.author: Victor Bogart Ph.D

quotes.quote: Assumptions are never more than our best guesses about everything from A to Z.
quotes.author: Victor Bogart Ph.D

quotes.quote: Assumptions can be major or minor, of worldly import or not, of depth and lasting consequence, or of limited and momentary significance.
quotes.author: Victor Bogart Ph.D

quotes.quote: All assumptions are valid and operative only within prescribed limits.
quotes.author: Victor Bogart Ph.D

quotes.quote: The power of assumptions to limit our exploring beyond their boundaries keeps us safe from imagined and feared unknowns.
quotes.author: Victor Bogart Ph.D

quotes.quote: Assumptions can misguide your decisions.
quotes.author: Hamp Lee III

quotes.quote: Be careful when allowing assumptions to become your reality.
quotes.author: Hamp Lee III

quotes.quote: Assumptions are not always based on truth.
quotes.author: Hamp Lee III

quotes.quote: A network of diverse theories and representations constitutes our assumptive world.
quotes.author: Ronnie Janoff-Bulman

quotes.quote: Our fundamental assumptions are the bedrock of our conceptual system; they are the assumptions that we are least aware of and least likely to challenge.
quotes.author: Ronnie Janoff-Bulman

quotes.quote: Generally, at the core of our assumptive world are abstract beliefs about ourselves, the external world, and the relationship between the two.
quotes.author: Ronnie Janoff-Bulman

quotes.quote: A negative attitude towards a person, based on poorly informed opinion and stereotypical assumptions, can lead to low self - esteem and feeling unwanted or rejected.
quotes.author: Marian Beaver

quotes.quote: To assume is to believe something without evidence or proof.
quotes.author: Marian Beaver

quotes.quote: Making assumptions can be very useful way of helping understand the world around us.
quotes.author: Marian Beaver

quotes.quote: Assumptions enable us to predict what is going to happen and to feel secure.
quotes.author: Marian Beaver

quotes.quote: Stereotyping involves assuming that all the people who share one characteristic also share another set of characteristics.
quotes.author: Marian Beaver

quotes.quote: Positive thinking can be learned and consciously applied by a continual optimistic analysis that is not necessarily based on reality but on the systematic screening of negative thoughts and assumptions to reduce negativity.
quotes.author: Warwick Pudney

quotes.quote: The power of positive assumptions is well documented. Phrases such as 'you get what you give' and expect the best and you get the best', have a truth endorsed by psychology.
quotes.author: Warwick Pudney

quotes.quote: Negative life assumptions reflect the parent's life and model negative responses to the child.
quotes.author: Warwick Pudney

quotes.quote: If others tell us something we make assumptions, and if they don't tell us something we make assumptions to fulfill our need to know and to replace the need to communicate.
quotes.author: Miguel Ruiz

quotes.quote: Even if we hear something and we don't understand we make assumptions about what it means and then believe the assumptions.
quotes.author: Miguel Ruiz

quotes.quote: We make all sorts of assumptions because we don't have the courage to ask questions.
quotes.author: Miguel Ruiz

quotes.quote: Casual assumptions can always be stated as cause and effect linkages, as in 'If I do A, then B will happen.'
quotes.author: Stephen D. Brookfield

quotes.quote: Prescriptive assumptions are assumptions about what we think ought to be happening in a particular situation.
quotes.author: Stephen D. Brookfield

quotes.quote: Of all the preposterous assumptions of humanity over humanity, nothing exceeds most of the criticism made on the habit of the poor by the well-housed, well-warmed and well-fed.
quotes.author: Shyamal Bhattacharjee

quotes.quote: Your assumptions are your windows on the world. Scrub them off every once in a while, or the light won't come in.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: If you challenge your own, you won't be so quick to accept the unchallenged assumptions of others.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: An assumption is a belief individuals accept as truth and often take for granted as fact.
quotes.author: Connie L. Schaffer

quotes.quote: Assumptions are dangerous things to make, and like all dangerous things to make -- bombs, for instance, or strawberry shortcake -- if you make even the tiniest mistake you can find yourself in terrible trouble.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: Making assumptions simply means believing things are a certain way with little or no evidence that shows you are correct, and you can see at once how this can lead to terrible trouble.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: You can see that it is better not to make too many assumptions, particularly in the morning.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: I suppose it is tempting, if the only tool you have is a hammer, to treat everything as if it were a nail.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: Don’t build roadblocks out of assumptions.
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: Whatever you believe, you make it true.
quotes.author: Geraldine Hills

quotes.quote: If you are feeling stressed, disempowered or depressed you can bet there's an unspoken assumption that you are accepting without knowing it.
quotes.author: Geraldine Hills

quotes.quote: We never look beyond our assumptions and what's worse, we have given up trying to meet others; we just meet ourselves.
quotes.author: Muriel Barbery

quotes.quote: The explanation requiring the fewest assumptions is most likely to be correct.
quotes.author: Patti Digh

quotes.quote: We do not realize how deeply our starting assumptions affect the way we go about looking for and interpreting the data we collect.
quotes.author: Carl C. Gaither

quotes.quote: Power of generalizing gives men so much the superiority in mistake over the dumb animals.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Spirituality is not adopting more beliefs and assumptions but uncovering the best in you.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: People assume that older individuals are incapable of expressing themselves clearly enough to take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Robert Schwalbe Ph.D.

quotes.quote: If an older person asks a younger person to repeat something, the younger person will assume that the older person is stone deaf.
quotes.author: Robert Schwalbe Ph.D.

quotes.quote: The law requires more than an assumption, the law requires a fact.
quotes.author: Robert Bolt

quotes.quote: I think it's the expectations and assumptions of others that cause heartache.
quotes.author: Paul Thomas Anderson

quotes.quote: If we stop assuming, we'll lose something important. An assumption, is a leap of faith to believe that, something that we really want to believe is actually true. If we stop making assumptions, we might just lose our faith.
quotes.author: Robert Dean Klein

quotes.quote: The link between allergies and asthma has been completely substantiated. It is very hard to discuss one without the other.
quotes.author: Fred Pescatore MD

quotes.quote: There is a strong association between the ozone levels in smog and the severity of asthma.
quotes.author: Fred Pescatore MD

quotes.quote: People don't realize that too much air can be harmful to health. Almost every asthmatic breathes through his mouth and takes deep, forceful inhalations that trigger a bronchospasm, 'the hallmark of asthma.'
quotes.author: Mrs. Yakovlev- Fredricksen

quotes.quote: My sister's asthmatic. In the middle of an asthma attack she got an obscene phone call. The guy said, 'Did I call you or did you call me?'
quotes.author: John Mendoza

quotes.quote: His frailty was a result of asthma, a disease for which there was then no effective treatment, and his triumph began with a humiliation at the hands of two bullies.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A british surgeon told a patient, 'I have asthma, you have cancer, we all have to die sometime.' Yeah, well you first, Mr. Bedside Manner.
quotes.author: Lawrence Dorfman

quotes.quote: Who hath considered the blessing of his breath, till the poison of an asthma struck him? / Who hath regarded the just pilses of is heart, till spasm or paralysis have stopped them? / Even thus, an unobserved routine of daily grace and wisdom./ When no more here, had worship of a world, whose penitence atoned for its neglect.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Using a nebulizer requires very little effort from the patient. This is important in a severe attack, as a breathless asthmatic may not be able to inhale the entire dose of an inhaler effectively.
quotes.author: Peter Kogler

quotes.quote: People with asthma are advised to carry an inhaler containing rescue medicine with them at all times.
quotes.author: Peter Kogler

quotes.quote: So although laws that help students with asthma are in place, there is more work to be done in the way the laws are interpreted and follows.
quotes.author: Peter Kogler

quotes.quote: On days when the ozone levels are high, it is best for people with asthma to remain indoors.
quotes.author: Peter Kogler

quotes.quote: Fatty fish, cheese, and the yolks of eggs are all naturally rich in vitamin D, which may be linked to less severe asthma attacks.
quotes.author: Peter Kogler

quotes.quote: Although there have been many advances in the treatment of asthma, death from this airways disease is still an unfortunate outcome in a minority of patients.
quotes.author: Andrew Harver

quotes.quote: There have been a few 'mini epidemics' of acute asthma during thunderstorms.
quotes.author: Mark Levy

quotes.quote: Alcoholic drinks can sometimes be a trigger for asthma.
quotes.author: Mark Levy

quotes.quote: Uncontrolled asthma can certainly be responsible for poor growth in children.
quotes.author: Mark Levy

quotes.quote: This is even more of a mystery, though we feel sure there must be some trigger in the environment which can 'switch on' asthma that has been dormant for many years.
quotes.author: Mark Levy

quotes.quote: Asthma is the most treatable of all chronic diseases.
quotes.author: Richard F. Lockey

quotes.quote: Being an athlete in a cold-weather sport is really difficult to deal with the asthma.
quotes.author: Charlie White

quotes.quote: Once you have asthma, you have it for life. You might not always be symptomatic. You might have it as a kid and grow out of it. But it may revisit at some point, usually when you have a stress in your life.
quotes.author: Roberta Fahey

quotes.quote: First off, do everything they can to give their kids the opportunities to play sports; asthma is not a deterrent to playing sports.
quotes.author: Dominique Wilkins

quotes.quote: Asthma research is a lot better and new medicines are always coming out to help young people.
quotes.author: Dominique Wilkins

quotes.quote: There are few restrictions on your life with asthma, as long as you take care of yourself.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.quote: Asthma attack: a technique to coach women through their contractions, induced by fear of the result.
quotes.author: Bauvard

quotes.quote: Asthma is a disease that has practically the same symptoms as passion except that with asthma it lasts longer.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When you're having an asthma attack, you don't have any breath. When you don't have any breath, it's hard to speak. You're limited by the amount of air you can spend from your lungs. That's not much, something between three to six words. It gives the word a meaning. You're searching through the piles of words in your head, picking the most important ones. And they have a cost. It's not like the healthy people that take out every word that has accumulated in their head like garbage. When someone, while having an asthma attack, says "I love you" or "I really love you", there's a difference. A word difference. And a word is a lot, because that word could have been "sit", "Ventolin" or even "ambulance".
quotes.author: Etgar Keret

quotes.quote: Asthma is treatable and well can be controlled.
quotes.author: Cathy Freeman

quotes.quote: Conventional medicine has largely shrugged its shoulders in confusion about the causes of allergies and asthma in millions of people.
quotes.author: Jack Challem

quotes.quote: Astrology is a fact, in most instances.Â  But astrological aspects are but signs, symbols.Â  No influence is of greater value or of greater help than the will of an individual.... Do not attempt to be guided by, but use the astrological influences as the means to meet or to overcome the faults and failures, or to minimize the faults and to magnify the virtues in self.Â Â
quotes.author: Edgar Cayce

quotes.quote: Astrology is a disease, not a science.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: Astrology enables us to feel a connection to this lifetime, as if our existence holds actual weight as thanks to our origination amidst the starry skies.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Davis

quotes.quote: AstrologyÂ is astronomy brought down to Earth and applied toward the affairs of men.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Astrology is a cousin of racism.
quotes.author: Penn Jillette

quotes.quote: As in the instances of alchemy,Â astrology, witchcraft, and other such popular creeds, political economy, has a plausible idea at the root of it.Â
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Astrology is like a map. Like a roadmap, astrology is meant to be a useful tool to help guide you to wherever you want to go.
quotes.author: Pila of Hawaii

quotes.quote: AstrologyÂ is an aesthetic affront. It cheapens astronomy, like using Beethoven for commercial jingles.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Astrology is like a weather report; it tells you what conditions you're likely to face in the future. If the weatherman says it's probably going to rain, you bring an umbrella. If you follow that advice, you won't get wet.
quotes.author: Lee Goldberg

quotes.quote: The goal ofÂ astrologyÂ is the alchemy of personality. It is to transform chaos into cosmos, collective human nature into individual and creative personality.
quotes.author: Dane Rudhyar

quotes.quote: Astrology, like any psychology, is able to predict the probabilities in a given situation because it relates experience to other experience. Experience itself is constant change, and any predictive judgment must obviously have a continual reorientation.
quotes.author: Marc Edmund Jones

quotes.quote: For all its complexity, however, astrology remains fundamentally simple. It offers a time-honored system of symbols that sum up key aspects of human life while providing profound insights and practical guidance.
quotes.author: Anne M. Nordhaus-Bike

quotes.quote: Astrology is like any other branch of knowledge. It can be used for good or for ill, properly or improperly, by skilled and unskilled practitioners alike.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Clare Prophet

quotes.quote: Astrology is almost always about reading signs properly, but sometimes the content of those signs is less important than the fonts they're written in.
quotes.author: Sterling Asterix

quotes.quote: About astrology and palmistry: they are good because they make people vivid and full of possibilities.Â  They are communism at its best.Â  Everybody has a birthday and almost everybody has a palm.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut, Jr.

quotes.quote: Astrology reveals the will of the gods.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Astrology is like any other superstition: It has no power unless people allow it to direct their lives.
quotes.author: Bill Myers

quotes.quote: Astrology has no more useful function than this, to discover the inmost nature of a man and to bring it out into his consciousness, that he may fulfill it according to the law of light.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: Astrology's roots lie in an ancient world-view which perceived the universe as a single living organism, animated by divine order and intelligence.
quotes.author: Liz Greene

quotes.quote: Astrology is assured of recognition from psychology, without further restrictions, because astrology represents the summation of all the psychological knowledge of antiquity.
quotes.author: C.G. Jung

quotes.quote: Astrology: do we make a hullabaloo among the stars, or do they make a hullabaloo down here?
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: There is something toÂ astrologyÂ for those who believe inÂ astrology, as there is something to medicine for those who believe in medicine. Every system works when we give our heart to it.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: AstrologyÂ presupposes that the heavenly bodies are regulated in their movements in harmony with the destiny of mortals: the moral man presupposes that that which concerns himself most nearly must also be the heart and soul of things.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Astrology is like gravity. You don't have to believe in it for it to be working in your life.
quotes.author: Zolar

quotes.quote: Astrology is for those bored by astronomy, but fascinated with themselves.
quotes.author: William Least Heat-Moon

quotes.quote: Who needs astrology? The wise man gets by on fortune cookies.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Astrology is like a gateway drug to a more cosmic world view.
quotes.author: Ruby Warrington

quotes.quote: I don't believe in astrology.Â  The only stars I can blame for my failures are those that walk about the stage.Â Â
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: AstrologyÂ is a science in itself and contains an illuminating body of knowledge. It taught me many things and I am greatly indebted to it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Astrology can clear up or mix up a person as much as any other psychological, philosophical or religious mirror, a looking glass in the endless mirror hall of life.Â Â
quotes.author: Markku Siivola

quotes.quote: Astrology is one of the earliest attempts made by man to find the order hidden behind or within the confusing and apparent chaos that exists in the world.Â
quotes.author: Karen Hamaker-Zondag

quotes.quote: Learning astrology is like learning any foreign language. You already have the ideas, concepts, and experiences of your life within you; you are just learning a new language for what you are already experiencing.
quotes.author: Barbara Goldsmith

quotes.quote: In many ways,Â astrology, numerology and palmistry are corruptions of the occult because they have attempted to make a practice out of something that is essentially imaginative.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: The celestial bodies are the cause of all that takes place in the sublunar world.Â Â
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Astrology is like religion itself, in a very equivocal state. There is a well-grounded reason for belief that it is a truth; but it is impossible for any man to read the details with accuracy. The quackery of astrology lies, like Pharisaical religion, in over pretensions.
quotes.author: James Elishama Smith

quotes.quote: Astrology is a language.Â  If you understand this language, the sky speaks to you.Â Â
quotes.author: Dane Rudhyar

quotes.quote: Astrology is one of the great languages of our individual psyche's pulsing relationship to the collective dream.
quotes.author: Caroline Casey

quotes.quote: Astrology is just a finger pointing at reality.
quotes.author: Steven Forrest

quotes.quote: You see, astrology is like fortune-telling. If you can't get it right, you say, Well, if Venus was doing something peculiar in the background, that would alter your prognostication because, of course, astrology is rubbish.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: To the medical man,Â astrologyÂ is invaluable in diagnosing diseases and prescribing a remedy, for it reveals the hidden cause of all ailments.
quotes.author: Max Heindel

quotes.quote: Astrology furnishes a splendid proof of the contemptible subjectivity of men.Â  It refers the course of celestial bodies to the miserable ego:Â  it establishes a connection between the comets in heaven and squabbles and rascalities on earth.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: AstrologyÂ had an important role in the ancient world. You can't understand many things unless you know something aboutÂ astrologyÂ - the plays of Shakespeare and so on.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: Dabbling in astrology is like carrying a lucky rabbit's foot as an omen of good luck which costs us very little and might have some beneficial effects.
quotes.author: Fred Singer

quotes.quote: Astrology and all these mystical things are generally signs of a weak mind; therefore as soon as they are becoming prominent in our minds, we should see a physician, take good food, and rest.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Without astrology man treads, as it were, in the dim twilight of ignorance.
quotes.author: Luke Dennis Broughton

quotes.quote: Some astronauts describe the routine flushing of urine into space, where the freezing temperatures turn the droplets into a cloud of bright, drifting crystals, as being among the most amazing sights they saw on an entire voyage.
quotes.author: Eugene Cernan

quotes.quote: Astronauts are very professional and when they're preparing for launch, they prepare for it as the most serious endeavor of our lives.
quotes.author: Ellen Ochoa

quotes.quote: Our astronauts, when they go orbiting around the earth, they actually come back slightly younger than a twin that they would have on the planet Earth who was stationary. This is called the twin paradox.
quotes.author: Michio Kaku

quotes.quote: When many astronauts go to space, they see the insignificant size of the earth and vastness of space, and they become very religious, because they have seen the Signs of Allah.
quotes.author: Cat Stevens

quotes.quote: We're all astronauts, really, aren't we; interstellar astronauts, travelling so far into the blackness we can never return.
quotes.author: S.K. Tremayne

quotes.quote: To become an astronaut is not a question of being the best at something or things coming easy to you, but it's being a person that can work with others and not give up. And, for me, that was part of it too.
quotes.author: Michael J Massimino

quotes.quote: It's very dangerous to put astronauts on a moon base where there's radiation, solar flares and micro meteorites. It'd be much better to put robots on the moon and have them mentally connected to astronauts on the Earth.
quotes.author: Michio Kaku

quotes.quote: Any astronaut can tell you you've got to do everything you can to learn about your life support system and then do everything you can to take care of it.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.quote: As an astronaut, you have a very defined set of tasks to do. Those tasks may require you to work 60, 70 or 80 hours a week.
quotes.author: Mae Jemison

quotes.quote: Earth is a small town with many neighborhoods in a very big universe.
quotes.author: Ron Garan

quotes.quote: The majority of astronauts have to change their eyeglasses while in space. They bring eyeglasses with them and typically change a few months into the mission.
quotes.author: Scott Kelly

quotes.quote: Space is for everybody. It's not just for a few people in science or math, or for a select group of astronauts. That's our new frontier out there, and it's everybody's business to know about space.
quotes.author: Christa McAuliffe

quotes.quote: Astronauts are like these mythic legends, but really, they are just regular people, people who wear chinos.
quotes.author: Mary Roach

quotes.quote: Astronauts cannot pick their nicknames and can only get their nicknames from other astronauts. Any astronaut who tries to give himself a cool nickname will regret it by getting just the opposite from his astronaut friends.
quotes.author: Michael J. Massimino

quotes.quote: Every single astronaut who has come back from space comes back determined to do more to protect it.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: The pressure suit helps if something goes wrong during launch or re-entry astronauts have a way to parachute off the shuttle. The suits protect you from loss of pressure in case of emergency.
quotes.author: Sally Ride

quotes.quote: This is one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: As an astronaut, especially during launch, half of the risk of a six-month flight is in the first nine minutes.
quotes.author: Chris Hadfield

quotes.quote: Astronauts were not the impulsive daredevils so dear to the stereopticonloving public. They couldn't afford to be. The hazards of the profession required an infinite capacity for cautious, contemplative thought.
quotes.author: Eric Frank Russell

quotes.quote: Astronauts are not superhuman. They lead ordinary lives and have varied personalities.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: Here men from the planet Earth first set foot upon the Moon July 1969, A.D. We came in peace for all mankind.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: Astronauts have been stuck in low-Earth orbit, boldly going nowhere. American attempts to kick-start a new phase of lunar exploration have stalled amid the realisation that NASA's budget is too small for the job.
quotes.author: Paul Davies

quotes.quote: Astronauts are inherently insane. And really noble.
quotes.author: Andy Weir

quotes.quote: We came all this way to explore the Moon, and the most important thing is that we discovered the Earth.
quotes.author: William Anders

quotes.quote: So most astronauts getting ready to lift off are excited and very anxious and worried about that explosion because if something goes wrong in the first seconds of launch, there's not very much you can do.
quotes.author: Sally Ride

quotes.quote: As an astronaut, when you're getting ready to go out of that hatch, you know that's the pinnacle of both your career and your life. The view completely blows you away. The real challenge is getting past the excitement and getting focused and down to work.
quotes.author: Thomas Marshburn

quotes.quote: Astronauts living on the International Space Station will soon be getting their drinking water from a new system that recycles their urine into drinkable water. Said one Space Station astronaut, 'It would have been nice to get a heads-up on that before we got here.
quotes.author: Seth Meyers

quotes.quote: Everybody knows what the moon is, everybody knows what this decade is, and everybody can tell a live astronaut who returned from the moon from one who didn't
quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

quotes.quote: Some astronauts sleep in sort of beds compartments that you can open up and crawl into and then close up, almost like a little bedroom.
quotes.author: Sally Ride

quotes.quote: Then there was the challenge to keep doing better and better, to fly the best test flight that anybody had ever flown. That led to my being recognized as one of the more experienced test pilots, and that led to the astronaut business.
quotes.author: Alan Shepard

quotes.quote: If I were an astronaut, I'd be one of the backup pilots. The minute they tried to put me in a spaceship, would I back up!
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Isn't it amazing? We go all the way to the moon to pick up rocks—and here on Earth, we don't even pick up beer bottles!
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: I'm so chicken, you ain't gonna see me on the moon until I can get there in something civilized— like an elevator!
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: I am an astronaut of boxing. Joe Louis and Dempsey were just jet pilots. I'm in a world of my own.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Science, enabled by engineering, empowered by NASA, tells us not only that we are in the universe but that the universe is in us. And for me, that sense of belonging elevates, not denigrates, the ego.
quotes.author: Neil de Grasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Mankind will not remain on Earth forever, but in its quest for light and space will at first timidly penetrate beyond the confines of the atmosphere, and later will conquer for itself all the space near the sun.
quotes.author: Konstantin E. Tsiolkovsky

quotes.quote: It is good to renew one's wonder, space travel once again made children of us all.
quotes.author: Ray Bradburry

quotes.quote: The effort to understand the universe is one of the very few things that lifts human life a little above the level of farce and gives it some of the grace of tragedy.
quotes.author: Steven Weinberg

quotes.quote: If you wish to make an apple pie from the scratch, you must first invent the universe
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: The surface is fine and powdery. I can kick it up loosely with my toe. It does adhere in fine layers, like powdered charcoal, to the sole and sides of my boots. I only go in small fraction of an inch, maybe an eighth of an inch, but I can see the footprints of my boots and the treads in the fine, sandy particles. There seems to be no difficulty in moving around, as we suspected.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: Bill Kaysing is wacky. His position makes me feel angry. We spent a lot of time getting ready to go to the moon. We spent a lot of money, we took great risks, and it's something everybody in the country ought to be proud of.
quotes.author: Jim Lovell

quotes.quote: We were on the dark side of the earth when we started to see outside this window the soft pink glow, which is a lot a little angry ions out there growing very fast. We were hitting them very fast.
quotes.author: Robert Crippen

quotes.quote: At no time when the astronauts were in space were they alone; there was a constant surveillance by UFOs.
quotes.author: Scott Carpenter

quotes.quote: There were twists, risks, brave astronauts stayed 'cool', / Back in the Earth's atmosphere parachutes slowed their motion, / Drifting down steadily into the Pacific Ocean, / Heroes in spacesuits floating on waves.
quotes.author: Glenn Lumb

quotes.quote: Everyone watched with a solemn obsession, / Rooting for the astronauts about to descend / The ladder from the capsule, bring an end / To an overdue achievement happening soon, / A human setting foot on the surface of the moon.
quotes.author: Glenn Lumb

quotes.quote: I'd like to be an astronaut and travel deep in space, / To see the earth and planets, the moon too, with its face.
quotes.author: Wallace Dean LaBenne

quotes.quote: He wanted to be / An astronaut when / He grew up; / To go far and / Visit every star. / But then he found / Out he was / Afraid of heights; / It totally turned / Out his lights. / Now he gets in / Lots of fights, / And stays awake / Most nights. / Usually he just sits / Around and writes.
quotes.author: Anonimo Magnifico

quotes.quote: I wish I was an astronaut, / I want to see the stars collide, / Watch the planets in the sky.
quotes.author: Megan

quotes.quote: Hello a year in Space, hello cognitive decline.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Suicide is as easy as riding a rocket into Heaven.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Rockets are the most dangerous form of transportation.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: The most dangerous job by far in the USA is an astronaut.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: In middle age, I decided to give up on my dream of being an astronaut and follow my second, to be a writer. Also, I heard there was no smoking in the space station.
quotes.author: Michael Kroft

quotes.quote: I must admit, maybe I am a piece of history after all.
quotes.author: Shepard

quotes.quote: Now you're coming back to Earth, and things are getting more and more dynamic.
quotes.author: Carey

quotes.quote: NASA was going to pick a public school teacher to go into space, observe and make a journal about the space flight, and I am a teacher who always dreamed of going up into space.
quotes.author: McAuliffe

quotes.quote: I'm looking forward to coming back, back to Earth, the landing, the views.
quotes.author: Carey

quotes.quote: I cannot join the space program and restart my life as an astronaut, but this opportunity to connect my abilities as an educator with my interests in history and space is a unique opportunity to fulfill my early fantasies.
quotes.author: McAuliffe

quotes.quote: What everyone in the astronaut corps shares in common is not gender or ethnic background, but the motivation, perseverance, and desire - the desire to participate in a voyage of discovery.
quotes.author: Ochoa

quotes.quote: It's a vast, lonely, forbidding expanse of nothing rather like clouds and clouds of pumice stone. And it certainly does not appear to be a very inviting place to live or work.
quotes.author: Borman

quotes.quote: It is clear to everyone that astronomy at all events compels the soul to look upwards, and draws it from the things of this world to the other.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The thing I like about astronomy is being outside at night and seeing the stars in a dark sky. It makes you feel small.
quotes.author: Jimmy Walker

quotes.quote: These earthly godfathers of Heaven's lights, that give a name to every fixed star, have no more profit of their shining nights than those that walk and know not what they are.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Astronomy is, not without reason, regarded, by mankind, as the sublimest of the natural sciences. Its objects so frequently visible, and therefore familiar, being always remote and inaccessible, do not lose their dignity.
quotes.author: Benjamin Silliman

quotes.quote: The stars, like dust, encircle me In living mists of light; And all of space I seem to see In one vast burst of sight.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Stars are beautiful, but they must not take an active part in anything, they must just look on forever. It is a punishment put on them for something they did so long ago that no star now knows what it was.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: Astronomy has revealed the great truth that the whole universe is bound together by one all-pervading influence.
quotes.author: William Leitch

quotes.quote: Astronomy compels the soul to look upwards and leads us from this world to another.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Astronomy is useful because it raises us above ourselves; it is useful because it is grand. It shows us how small is man's body, how great his mind, since his intelligence can embrace the whole of this dazzling immensity, where his body is only an obscure point, and enjoy its silent harmony.
quotes.author: Henri Poincare

quotes.quote: The history of astronomy is a history of receding horizons.
quotes.author: Jacob Bronowski

quotes.quote: Dark matter has a gravitation effect on other objects. You can't see it, you can't feel it, but you can watch something being pulled in its direction.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Astronomy to the selfish becomes astrology.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The most remarkable discovery in all of astronomy is that the stars are made of atoms of the same kind as those on the earth.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: Astronomy is the science of the harmony of infinite expanse.
quotes.author: John Scott Russell

quotes.quote: A time will come when men will stretch out their eyes. They should see planets like our Earth.
quotes.author: Christopher Wren

quotes.quote: Astronomy is perhaps the science whose discoveries owe least to chance, in which human understanding appears in its whole magnitude, and through which man can best learn how small he is.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Astronomy is one of the sublimest fields of human investigation. The mind that grasps its facts and principles receives something of the enlargement and grandeur belonging to the science itself. It is a quickener of devotion.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: The fact that astronomies change while the stars abide is a true analogy of every realm of human life and thought, religion not least of all.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: Most people today still believe, perhaps unconsciously, in the heliocentric universe every newspaper in the land has a section on astrology, yet few have anything at all on astronomy.
quotes.author: Hannes Alfven

quotes.quote: Astronomy is older than physics. In fact, it got physics started by showing the beautiful simplicity of the motion of the stars and planets, the understanding of which was the beginning of physics. But the most remarkable discovery in all of astronomy is that the stars are made of atoms of the same kind as those on the earth.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: We should do astronomy because it is beautiful and because it is fun. We should do it because people want to know. We want to know our place in the universe and how things happen.
quotes.author: John N. Bahcall

quotes.quote: We are all atheists about most of the gods that societies have ever believed in. Some of us just go one god further.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Religion, to me, is a bureaucracy between man and God that I don't need.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: Everyone starts out being an atheist. No one is born with belief in anything. Infants are atheists until they are indoctrinated.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: An atheist loves his fellow man instead of god. An atheist believes that heaven is something for which we should work now--here on earth for all men together to enjoy.
quotes.author: Madalyn Murray O'Hair

quotes.quote: The worst moment for the atheist is when he is really thankful and has nobody to thank.
quotes.author: Dante Gabriel Rossetti

quotes.quote: Even the atheists, who have pretended to disbelieve in God, have believed in Truth.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: “There are no gods, no devils, no angels, no heaven or hell. There is only our natural world. Religion is but myth and superstition that hardens hearts and enslaves minds.”
quotes.author: Anne Nicol Gaylor

quotes.quote: It is not as in the Bible, that God created man in his own image. But, on the contrary, man created God in his own image.
quotes.author: Ludwig Feuerbach

quotes.quote: Atheism turns out to be too simple. If the whole universe has no meaning, we should never have found out that it has no meaning.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: An atheist believes that a hospital should be built instead of a church. An atheist believes that a deed must be done instead of a prayer said. An atheist strives for involvement in life and not escape into death. He wants disease conquered, poverty vanquished, war eliminated.
