quotes.author: Madalyn Murray Ohair

quotes.quote: A young man who wishes to remain a sound atheist cannot be too careful of his reading.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: An atheist may be simply one whose faith and love are concentrated on the impersonal aspects of God.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: To be an atheist requires an indefinitely greater measure of faith than to recieve all the great truths which atheism would deny.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: The atheist, by merely being in touch with reality, appears shamefully out of touch with the fantasy life of his neighbors.
quotes.author: Sam Harris

quotes.quote: The atheist is cheating whenever he makes a moral judgment, acting as though it has an objective reference, when his philosophy in fact precludes it.
quotes.author: William A. Dembski

quotes.quote: Be an atheist if you want, but do not believe in anything unquestioningly.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Being an atheist makes someone a clearer thinking, fairer person. They are not doing things to be rewarded in heaven; they're doing things because they're right, because they live by a moral code.
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: One of the great tragedies of mankind is that morality has been hijacked by religion.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Question with boldness even the existence of a God; because, if there be one, he must more approve of the homage of reason, than that of blind-folded fear.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: An atheist strives for involvement in life and not escape into death.
quotes.author: Madalyn Murray O'Hair

quotes.quote: Atheism is nothing more than the noises reasonable people make when in the presence of religious dogma.
quotes.author: Sam Harris

quotes.quote: The true atheist is the one who refuses to see God's image in the face of their neighbour.
quotes.author: Shane Claiborne

quotes.quote: I am against religion because it teaches us to be satisfied with not understanding the world.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Religion is dangerous because it allows human beings who don't have all the answers to think that they do.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: It is time that we admitted that faith is nothing more than the license religious people give one another to keep believing when reasons fail.
quotes.author: Sam Harris

quotes.quote: We should foster a culture in which people’s private religious beliefs, including atheists and agnostics, are respected.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Atheists are pious people.
quotes.author: Max Stirner

quotes.quote: An atheist is a man who has no invisible means of support.
quotes.author: John Buchan

quotes.quote: The atheist has no hope.
quotes.author: James Freeman Clarke

quotes.quote: Atheists can be good people; they just have no objective way to judge the conduct of those who are not.
quotes.author: Michael Gerson

quotes.quote: An atheist is a man who believes himself an accident.
quotes.author: Francis Thompson

quotes.quote: All children are born Atheists; they have no idea of God.
quotes.author: Baron d'Holbach

quotes.quote: A man cannot become an atheist merely by wishing it.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: An atheist is someone who thinks (but doesn't believe) that nothing created everything.
quotes.author: Ray Comfort

quotes.quote: The existence of a single atheist does not disprove the existence of God.
quotes.author: William F. Devault

quotes.quote: Being an atheist is a matter not of moral choice, but of human obligation.
quotes.author: John Fowles

quotes.quote: Being an atheist frees you up to live this life properly, happily, and fully.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Atheists express their rage against God although in their view He does not exist.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: An atheist is a man who looks through a telescope and tries to explain what he can't see.
quotes.author: Orlando Aloysius Battista

quotes.quote: The atheist worldview of life is a materialistic culture that frees humanity from superstition.
quotes.author: Howard Thompson

quotes.quote: Never say never because limits, like fears, are often just an illusion.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Being an athlete, you know how to train and prepare your body for a performance and you're able to do it under pressure.
quotes.author: Kristi Yamaguchi

quotes.quote: A trophy carries dust. Memories last forever.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Retton

quotes.quote: Competing at the highest level is the greatest test of one's character.
quotes.author: Russell Mark

quotes.quote: There may be people that have more talent than you, but there's no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do.
quotes.author: Derek Jeter

quotes.quote: One man can be a crucial ingredient on a team, but one man cannot make a team.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: The hardest skill to acquire in this sport is the one where you compete all out, give it all you have, and you are still getting beat no matter what you do. When you have the killer instinct to fight through that, it is very special.
quotes.author: Eddie Reese

quotes.quote: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: Pain is temporary. It may last a minute, or an hour, or a day, or a year, but eventually it will subside and something else will take its place. If I quit, however, it lasts forever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Run when you can, walk if you have to, crawl if you must; just never give up.
quotes.author: Dean Karnazes

quotes.quote: To succeed, you need to find something to hold on to, something to motivate you, something to inspire you.
quotes.author: Tony Dorsett

quotes.quote: Never let the fear of striking out get in your way.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: The five S's of sports training are: stamina, speed, strength, skill, and spirit; but the greatest of these is spirit.
quotes.author: Ken Doherty

quotes.quote: Your biggest opponent isn't the other guy. It's human nature.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: You are never really playing an opponent. You are playing yourself, your own highest standards, and when you reach your limits, that is real joy.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.quote: If you can believe it, the mind can achieve it.
quotes.author: Ronnie Lott

quotes.quote: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: What you lack in talent can be made up with desire, hustle, and giving 110 percent all the time.
quotes.author: Don Zimmer

quotes.quote: Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
quotes.author: Sasha Cohen

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of dreams and the influence of the human spirit. We are all the same in this notion. The potential for greatness lives within each of us.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Success for an athlete follows many years of hard work and dedication.
quotes.author: Michael Diamond

quotes.quote: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered, and the courage with which you have maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: A winner is a loser who was willing to fail and get up, fail and get up, fail and get up, fail and get up and win.
quotes.author: Peter Zafra

quotes.quote: You have to believe in yourself when no one else does, that makes you a winner right there.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: What do do with a mistake: recognize it, admit it, learn from it, forget it.
quotes.author: Dean Smith

quotes.quote: The only one who can tell you â€˜you can't' is you. And you don't have to listen.
quotes.author: Nike

quotes.quote: People do not lack strength; they lack will.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: You've got to take the initiative and play your game. In a decisive set, confidence is the difference.
quotes.author: Chris Evert

quotes.quote: Only he who can see the invisible can do the impossible.
quotes.author: Frank L. Gaines

quotes.quote: Push yourself again and again. Don't give an inch until the final buzzer sounds.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.quote: Never give up, never give in, and when the upper hand is ours, may we have the ability to handle the win with the dignity that we absorbed the loss.
quotes.author: Doug Williams

quotes.quote: The man who cannot believe in himself cannot believe in anything else. The basis of all integrity and character is whatever faith we have in our own integrity.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: Gold medals aren't really made of gold. They're made of sweat, determination, and a hard-to-find alloy called guts.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: Somewhere behind the athlete you've become and the hours of practice and the coaches who have pushed you is a little girl who fell in love with the game and never looked back play for her.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: Concentration is why some athletes are better than others. You develop that concentration in training and concentrate in a meet.
quotes.author: Edwin Moses

quotes.quote: An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head.
quotes.author: Emil Zatopek

quotes.quote: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Suffer the pain of discipline or suffer the pain of regret.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: How you respond to the challenge in the second half will determine what you become after the game, whether you are a winner or a loser.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Age is no barrier. It's a limitation you put on your mind.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.quote: Just keep going. Everybody gets better if they keep at it.
quotes.author: Ted Williams

quotes.quote: Obstacles don't have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: It's not whether you get knocked down; it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Never give up! Failure and rejection are only the first step to succeeding.
quotes.author: Jim Valvano

quotes.quote: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: If you choose not to decide you still have made a choice.
quotes.author: Rush

quotes.quote: We choose our joys and sorrows long before we experience them.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: You are the person who has to decide. Whether you'll do it or toss it aside; you are the person who makes up your mind. Whether you'll lead or will linger behind. Whether you'll try for the goal that's afar. Or just be contented to stay where you are.
quotes.author: Edgar A. Guest

quotes.quote: Choose the life that is most useful, and habit will make it the most agreeable.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Choices are the hinges of destiny.
quotes.author: Edwin Markham

quotes.quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: The key to your universe is that you can choose.
quotes.author: Frederick Carl Frieseke

quotes.quote: When you have to make a choice and don't make it, that in itself is a choice.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Every person has free choice. Free to obey or disobey the Natural Laws. Your choice determines the consequences. Nobody ever did, or ever will, escape the consequences of his choices.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.quote: Choose always the way that seems the best, however rough it may be; custom will soon render it easy and agreeable.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: The truth is always there. The choice is yours, whether to face it or not.
quotes.author: Anthony Daher

quotes.quote: You have a choice. Choose positive, smiling, laughing. Life is too short for the alternative.
quotes.author: Joanne Bishop

quotes.quote: You don't get to choose if you get hurt in this world?but you do have some say in who hurts you. I like my choices.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: People make decisions, and maybe you don't always agree, but those choices are still their own.
quotes.author: Brenna Yovanoff

quotes.quote: You can be smart and happy or stupid and miserable. . . it's your choice.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Freedom of choice is more to be treasured than any possession earth can give.
quotes.author: David O. McKay

quotes.quote: Every choice you make has an end result.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Be careful the environment you choose for it will shape you; be careful the friends you choose for you will become like them.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Between two evils, choose neither; between two goods, choose both.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: It is about choices we make. And how the direction of our lives comes down to the choices we choose.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: We design our lives through the power of choices.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: There is nothing like staying at home for real comfort.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Now, God be praised, that to believing souls gives light in darkness, comfort in despair.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: If you look for truth, you may find comfort in the end; if you look for comfort you will not get either comfort or truth only soft soap and wishful thinking to begin, and in the end, despair.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Sometimes, the best way to help someone is just to be near them.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: Rainy days should be spent at home with a cup of tea and a good book.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: It was like the way you wanted sunshine on Saturdays, or pancakes for breakfast. They just made you feel good.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.quote: We find comfort among those who agree with us - growth among those who don't.
quotes.author: Frank Clark

quotes.quote: The place was silent and aware.
quotes.author: P.C. Wren

quotes.quote: There are no walls in the atmosphere.
quotes.author: Kim Prather

quotes.quote: Those who are finer and nobler are always alone and necessarily so and that because of this they can enjoy the purity of their own atmosphere.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Rain hangs about the place, like a friendly ghost. if it's not coming down in delicate droplets, then it's in buckets; and if neither, it tends to lurk suspiciously in the atmosphere.
quotes.author: Barbara Acton-Bond

quotes.quote: In comedy it helps if there's a friendly atmosphere on the set.
quotes.author: Chris O\'Dowd

quotes.quote: The atmosphere defines the environment of sound.
quotes.author: Bill Laswell

quotes.quote: The atmosphere was wide open in those circles that we traveled in.
quotes.author: David Amram

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness is the atmosphere in which all things thrive.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: The sounds I had heard seemed worthy to mingle with this bright and perfumed atmosphere, and to thrill the beautiful scenery around me.
quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.quote: I know: If you're looking down at Earth, you're looking through an atmosphere that has a bit of haze in many places and not just occasional clouds.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: A restaurant on the moon could not have had less atmosphere.
quotes.author: Geoff Dyer

quotes.quote: A sort of war of revenge on the intellect is what, for some reason, thrives in the contemporary social atmosphere.
quotes.author: Wyndham Lewis

quotes.quote: Human beings, like plants, grow in the soil of acceptance, not in the atmosphere of rejection.
quotes.author: John Powell

quotes.quote: Our emotions affect the atmosphere around us, and other people, because emotions influence the electromagnetic field our heart emits.
quotes.author: Sam Owen

quotes.quote: I believe your atmosphere and your surroundings create a mind state for you.
quotes.author: Theophilus London

quotes.quote: I would have had the same narrative, regardless of the atmosphere and the restrictions.
quotes.author: Asghar Farhadi

quotes.quote: If you fill the atmosphere with toxins, then you really cannot be surprised if the solar radiation transmission through it becomes toxic to humans.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Especially when you play at home, you need a good atmosphere behind you.
quotes.author: Jose Mourinho

quotes.quote: The atmosphere of orthodoxy is always damaging to prose, and above all it is completely ruinous to the novel, the most anarchical of all forms of literature.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Without atmosphere a painting is nothing.
quotes.author: Rembrandt

quotes.quote: Before a secret is told, one can often feel the weight of it in the atmosphere.
quotes.author: Susan Griffin

quotes.quote: The icy layers of the upper atmosphere contain conundrums enough to be worthy of humanity's greatest efforts.
quotes.author: Hugo Emil Hergesell

quotes.quote: Love is a portion of the soul itself, and it is of the same nature as the celestial breathing of the atmosphere of paradise.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: I think it is important that we rebuild an atmosphere of forgiveness and civility in every aspect of our lives.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.quote: To carry the atmosphere of God's Glory is to extend it to the whole earth.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: There are certain romances that belong in certain cities, in a certain atmosphere, in a certain time.
quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quotes.quote: When yellow lights struggle with blue shades in hairlike lines.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: A happy life must be to a great extent a quiet life, for it is only in an atmosphere of quiet that true joy dare live.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: It is better to have your head in the clouds, and know where you are. Than to breathe the clearer atmosphere below them, and think that you are in paradise.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: States of the atmosphere pass into us as water through the meshes of a sieve, and storms occur in us before they break upon the world without, creating restless sensations.
quotes.author: Julian Hawthorne

quotes.quote: I have to go someplace where I can soak myself in a creative atmosphere.
quotes.author: Jeff Ament

quotes.quote: The very atmosphere of firearms anywhere and everywhere restrains evil interference they deserve a place of honor with all that's good.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Expectancy is the atmosphere for miracles.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: An atmosphere of happiness is the atmosphere of the Kingdom of God.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: What a splendid thing watercolor is to express atmosphere and distance, so that the figure is surrounded by air and can breathe in it.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: The conscience of children is formed by the influences that surround them; their notions of good and evil are the result of the moral atmosphere they breathe.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: Green was the silence, wet was the light, the month of June trembled like a butterfly.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Looking through the atmosphere is somewhat like looking through a piece of old, stained glass. The glass has defects in it, so the image is blurred from that.
quotes.author: Nancy Roman

quotes.quote: Behave so the aroma of your actions may enhance the general sweetness of the atmosphere.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A woman should be home with the children, building that home and making sure there's a secure family atmosphere.
quotes.author: Mel Gibson

quotes.quote: In a gallery, there's an expectation of high prices and a somewhat elitist atmosphere.
quotes.author: John Cotton

quotes.quote: One of the most ephemeral and important things is atmosphere and tone and it's very hard to put your finger on what creates that.
quotes.author: Jennifer Jason Leigh

quotes.quote: Every deed and every relationship is surrounded by an atmosphere of silence. Friendship needs no words, it is solitude delivered from the anguish of loneliness.
quotes.author: Dag Hjalmar Agne Carl Hammarskjöld

quotes.quote: Happiness is a sort of atmosphere you can live in sometimes when you're lucky.
quotes.author: Adela Rogers St. Johns

quotes.quote: There is an atmosphere of well-sounding oratory that likes to attach itself to dress clothes. Away with it!
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: For me, a landscape does not exist in its own right, since its appearance changes at every moment; but the surrounding atmosphere brings it to life - the light and the air which vary continually. For me, it is only the surrounding atmosphere which gives subjects their true value.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: The atmosphere seems to change once the sun goes down and the race fans get to watch a good show.
quotes.author: Dale Earnhardt

quotes.quote: Happiness is a light, an atmosphere, an illumination. It sets a personality. I always feel that it is a creation that is difficult for some and easy for others, but essentially an achievement, never an accident.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bibesco

quotes.quote: It is no more dusky in ordinary nights than our mind's habitual atmosphere, and the moonlight is as bright as our most illuminatedmoments are.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: It is so often true that whether a person carries with him an atmosphere of gloom and depression or one of confidence and courage depends on his individual outlook.
quotes.author: James Keller

quotes.quote: A violent act pierces the atmosphere, leaving a hole through which the cold, damp draft of its memory blows forever.
quotes.author: Jane Stanton Hitchcock

quotes.quote: College was especially sweet because of the positive, hopeful atmosphere of a college campus.
quotes.author: Jerry Kramer

quotes.quote: Men of stainless character and self-purification will easily inspire confidence and automatically purify the atmosphere around them.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Non-co-operation in an angry atmosphere is an impossibility.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: If a negative atmosphere pervades where you live or work, go elsewhere. Seek out friends, business associates, and mentors with positive attitudes who share your goals and best interests.
quotes.author: Richard M. DeVos

quotes.quote: Neither comprehension nor learning can take place in an atmosphere of anxiety.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: Feelings of worth can flourish only in an atmosphere where individual differences are appreciated, mistakes are tolerated, communication is open, and rules are flexible - the kind of atmosphere that is found in a nurturing family.
quotes.author: Virginia Satir

quotes.quote: Agitation prevents rebellion, keeps the peace, and secures progress. Every step she gains is gained forever. Muskets are the weapons of animals. Agitation is the atmosphere of the brains.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.quote: An atmosphere of beliefs and conceptions has been formed by the labours and struggles of our forefathers, which enables us to breathe amid the various and complex circumstances of our life.
quotes.author: William Kingdon Clifford

quotes.quote: The atomic bomb is too dangerous to be loose in a lawless world
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Mankind invented the atomic bomb, but no mouse would ever construct a mouse trap.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The atomic bomb made the prospect of future war unendurable. It has led us up those last few steps to the mountain pass; and beyond there is a different country.
quotes.author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: In this first testing ground of the atomic bomb I have seen the most terrible and frightening desolation in four years of war. It makes a blitzed Pacific island seem like an Eden. The damage is far greater than photographs can show.
quotes.author: Wilfred Burchett

quotes.quote: Anyway, I'm sort of glad they’ve got the atomic bomb invented. If there’s ever another war. I’m going to sit right the hell on top of it. I’ll volunteer for it, I swear to God I will.
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: The atomic bomb certainly is the most powerful of all weapons, but it is conclusively powerful and effective only in the hands of the nation which controls the sky.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: I do not believe that civilization will be wiped out in a war fought with the atomic bomb. Perhaps two-thirds of the people of the earth will be killed.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: This myth that America has this atomic bomb that makes us right, it makes us good, it makes us set the agenda for the world. Everywhere, we can go global, we determine.
quotes.author: Oliver Stone

quotes.quote: The only use for an atomic bomb is to keep somebody else from using one.
quotes.author: George Wald

quotes.quote: The atomic bomb was created with the destruction of men in mind
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: The atom bomb was no great decision. It was merely another powerful weapon in the arsenal of righteousness.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: The atomic bomb embodies the results of a combination genius and patience as remarkable as any in the history of mankind.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russel

quotes.quote: Against the dark background of the atomic bomb, the United States does not wish merely to present strength, but also the desire and the hope for peace.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: There was no military reason to drop atomic bombs on Japan. They were used as terrorist weapons - killing innocent people to influence other people.
quotes.author: Harry Browne

quotes.quote: We walk the brink of racial suicide because we were smart enough to make atomic bombs and stupid enough to use them.
quotes.author: David Zindell

quotes.quote: So far as I can see the atomic bomb has deadened the finest feeling that has sustained mankind for ages.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Mike's (Tyson) punch is like an atomic bomb in that it is relative to nature. Both have no value unless you have a means of conveying it to the target. He is boxing-smart
quotes.author: Cus Damato

quotes.quote: Weapons of mass destruction are the greatest threat to life on earth. Biological weapons are often called the poor man's atomic bomb. Saddam Hussein is the ruler who has for decades been making the most determined and diabolical illegal effort to acquire them.
quotes.author: William Shawcross

quotes.quote: The atomic bombs will surely shorten the war, and let us hope that they will effectively end war as a possibility in human affairs.
quotes.author: Ernest Lawrence

quotes.quote: According to Buddhist psychology, most of our troubles stem from attachment to things that we mistakenly see as permanent.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Attachment to views is the greatest impediment to the spiritual path.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Attachment leads to jealousy. The shadow of greed that is. Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose.
quotes.author: Yoda

quotes.quote: A feeling of aversion or attachment toward something is your clue that there's work to be done.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Attachment is the state of ignorance or forgetfulness, and thus clinging to a memory of enjoyment.
quotes.author: Goswami Kriyananda

quotes.quote: Let go of your attachment to being right, and suddenly your mind is more open. You're able to benefit from the unique viewpoints of others, without being crippled by your own judgment.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: What we have to learn, in both meditation and in life, is to be free of attachment to the good experiences, and free of aversion to the negative ones.
quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.quote: To work without attachment is to work without the expectation of reward or fear of any punishment in this world or the next. Work so done is a means to the end, and God is the end.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: Attachment is the strongest block to realization.
quotes.author: Neem Karoli Baba

quotes.quote: How do you let go of attachment to things? Don’t even try. It’s impossible. Attachment to things drops away by itself when you no longer seek to find yourself in them.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Attachment is the great fabricator of illusions; reality can be attained only by someone who is detached.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Cut the cords of attachment. Expand the circle of love.
quotes.author: Shri Radhe Maa

quotes.quote: Non-attachment is the process of creating without being attached to the results.
quotes.author: Beth Banning

quotes.quote: Non-attachment is not the elimination of desire. It is the spaciousness to allow any quality of mind, any thought or feeling, to arise without closing around it, without eliminating the pure witness of being. It is an active receptivity to life.
quotes.author: Stephen Levine

quotes.quote: Let not your love become attachment, nor your hate become destruction.
quotes.author: Umar ibn al-Khattab

quotes.quote: Attachment is the food for the mind to continue. Non-attached witnessing is the way to stop it without any effort to stop it. And when you start enjoying those blissful moments, your capacity to retain them for longer periods arises.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Remember: no attachment should grow, no clinging should grow. They are all against your independence, your freedom, your individuality.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Attachment is your biggest strength and your biggest weakness. Though it gives you the power to love someone more than yourself, it becomes difficult to live when you lose something you are attached to. Even when we have lost, we should go beyond that and get truly attached to someone. Loving someone truly is the most beautiful feeling.
quotes.author: Shahid Kapoor

quotes.quote: To manage your mind, know that there is nothing, and then relinquish all attachment to nothingness.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The more attached we are to a vision of the future, the less present we are to what is actually trying to emerge here and now.
quotes.author: Peter Merry

quotes.quote: It is attachment to desire, not desire itself, that is the underlying cause of practically all of our pain and suffering.
quotes.author: Rod Stryker

quotes.quote: If you expect miracles in your life, then release any attachment to the outcome.
quotes.author: Joe Vitale

quotes.quote: Getting attached to someone is more easy than being in love with someone. Attachment fades away with time and distance but love can be smelled till after death.
quotes.author: Aishwarika

quotes.quote: Those who cannot renounce attachment to the results of their work are far from the path.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The less attached you are, the more peaceful you are.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is nothing scary about life if you are not attached to results.
quotes.author: Nale Doland Walsh

quotes.quote: Attachment is the shadow of the ego. Attachments are immediately created wherever you see 'I am'.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: It's not the appearance that binds you, it's the attachment to the appearance that binds you.
quotes.author: Tilopa

quotes.quote: Freedom from all attachment is the realization of God as Truth.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: That non-attachment gives us the freedom to be exactly who we are.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.quote: What is of supreme importance in war is to attack the enemy’s strategy.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Always attack, Never defend.
quotes.author: Paul Begala

quotes.quote: All attack is a call for help.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Any attack on any lie is justified.
quotes.author: Sandra Good

quotes.quote: An attack on one is an attack on all.
quotes.author: George Robertson

quotes.quote: Attack life, it's going to kill you anyway.
quotes.author: Steven Coallier

quotes.quote: Under attack, sentiments harden into dogma.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Attack is only one half of the art of boxing.
quotes.author: Georges Carpentier

quotes.quote: We may attack systems. We must not attack men.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Attack wins you games, defense wins you titles.
quotes.author: Alex Ferguson

quotes.quote: Attack another's rights and you destroy your own.
quotes.author: John Jay Chapman

quotes.quote: Attack like the Fire and be still as the Mountain.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Attack your instruments. Don't let them attack you.
quotes.author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quotes.quote: Somebody who attacks everybody has something missing.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Attack each day with an enthusiasm unknown to mankind.
quotes.author: Jim Harbaugh

quotes.quote: An attack on Public Education is an attack on Democracy.
quotes.author: Diane Ravitch

quotes.quote: Never attack a problem without also presenting a solution.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: An attack of hope is the same for us as an attack of fever.
quotes.author: Marceline Desbordes Valmore

quotes.quote: How do we attack important problems? Pose the right question.
quotes.author: Donald Sadoway

quotes.quote: Attack is the proof that your enemy anticipates your success.
quotes.author: Mike Murdock

quotes.quote: A mild attack of apoplexy may be called death's retaining fee.
quotes.author: Gilles Menage

quotes.quote: An attack on values is inevitably seen as an act of subversion.
quotes.author: Garrett Hardin

quotes.quote: You have to attack once the truth is too weak to defend itself.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: The more you attack, the more your opponent will make mistakes.
quotes.author: Marcelo Garcia

quotes.quote: The price of a successful attack is a constructive alternative.
quotes.author: Saul Alinsky

quotes.quote: Those who cannot attack the thought, instead attack the thinker.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: Whoever attacks a matter without knowledge cuts off his own nose.
quotes.author: Ja'far Al-Sadiq

quotes.quote: The attack on untouchability is an attack on this high-and low-ness.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Distorting attacks when people already don't trust you is not smart.
quotes.author: Van Jones

quotes.quote: Attack him where he is unprepared, appear where you are not expected.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Unjust attacks on public men do them more good than unmerited praise.
quotes.author: Rutherford B. Hayes

quotes.quote: Attack thoughts towards others are attack thoughts towards ourselves.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Attack is the secret of defense; defense is the planning of an attack.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: An attack on the roots of passion means an attack on the roots of life.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Those who attack always do so with greater fervor than those who defend.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: In any form of attack it is essential to assail your opponent from behind.
quotes.author: Oswald Boelcke

quotes.quote: Learn to attack things frontally but according to the most scientific methods.
quotes.author: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.quote: Attack the evil that is within yourself, rather than attacking the evil that is in others.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It's easy to attack and destroy an act of creation. It's a lot more difficult to perform one.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: The attacks on old words and the coining of new are the visible tip of the iceberg of change.
quotes.author: Michelene Wandor

quotes.quote: If you attack the establishment long enough and hard enough, they will make you a member of it.
quotes.author: Art Buchwald

quotes.quote: He who attacks the fundamentals of the American broadcasting industry attacks democracy itself.
quotes.author: William S. Paley

quotes.quote: The attack on the truth by war begins long before war starts and continues long after a war ends.
quotes.author: Julian Assange

quotes.quote: When you attack the roots of sin, fix your thought more on the God you desire than on the sin you abhor.
quotes.author: Walter Hilton

quotes.quote: The attack on "selfishness" is an attack on man's self-esteem; to surrender one, is to surrender the other.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The best way to counter-attack a hater is to make it blatantly obvious that their attack has had no impact on you.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: We attack not only to hurt someone, to defeat him, but perhaps also simply to become conscious of our own strength.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: If you attack Stupidity you attack an entrenched interest with friends in government and every walk of public life.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: An attack upon our ability to tell stories is not just censorship - it is a crime against our nature as human beings.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: When one would make a surprise attack on the enemy, he should avoid the major roads and seek out the lesser ones. Then attack.
quotes.author: Takeda Nobushige

quotes.quote: Faithful attendance at Church meetings brings blessings you can receive in no other way.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: Church attendance is as vital to a disciple as a transfusion of rich, healthy blood to a sick man.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: Church attendance may be dipping, but God can survive the Internet age. After all, He knows a thing or two about resurrection.
quotes.author: Rachel Held Evans

quotes.quote: Regular temple attendance is one of the simplest ways you can bless those who are waiting in the spirit world. If you live near a temple, partake of the opportunity to go often and regularly.
quotes.author: David B. Haight

quotes.quote: No man is regular in his attendance at the House of Commons until he is married.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The attendance of that brother was now become like the attendance of a demon on some devoted being that had sold himself to destruction.
quotes.author: James Hogg

quotes.quote: Presence is more than just being there.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: I used to say of him that his presence on the field made the difference of forty thousand men.
quotes.author: Duke of Wellington

quotes.quote: The strongest presence is so often an absence.
quotes.author: Steve Rasnic Tem

quotes.quote: Your presence is a moral poison that would contaminate the most virtuous
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: Your presence in this house is almost as painful and enormous as your absence.
quotes.author: Donald Hall

quotes.quote: The presence of many does not and cannot replace the absence of one. That is love.
quotes.author: Rita Zahara

quotes.quote: Anything whose presence or absence makes no discernible difference is no essential part of the whole.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Birthdays are a reward for having shown up 365 days in a row. It's like getting a badge for attendance.
quotes.author: Gina Barreca

quotes.quote: When your absence is felt, your presence is the essence and it makes a difference.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: It's so important to understand your good attendance ups your chances of graduating.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: While attendance at traditional churches has been declining for decades... the evangelical movement is growing, and it is changing the way America worships.
quotes.author: Tom Brokaw

quotes.quote: Your presence is a miracle.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Presence always wins out over principles.
quotes.author: Bill Johnson

quotes.quote: The presence of God is the finest of rewards.
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: If your presence doesn't work, neither will your word.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh Yogi

quotes.quote: Practice presence -- embrace the place where life happens.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Presence is far more intricate and rewarding an art than productivity.
quotes.author: Maria Popova

quotes.quote: Your presence is the most precious gift you can give to another human being.
quotes.author: Marshall B. Rosenberg

quotes.quote: The presence of another caring person doubles the amount of pain a person can endure
quotes.author: Philip Yancey

quotes.quote: It is through your presence that creates your reality. What am I creating? I am a co-creator.
quotes.author: Alberto Villoldo

quotes.quote: The physical presence of other Christians is a source of incomparable joy and strength to the believer.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: His entire presence was like gravity, impossible to forget, possible to believe in, a theory merged into a law.
quotes.author: Shannon A. Thompson

quotes.quote: In our own presence, we all pretend to be simpler than we are: thus we take a break from our fellow human beings.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Be a beneficial presence on the planet. Give your Gifts. Boldly go where no woman or no man has ever gone before.
quotes.author: Michael Beckwith

quotes.quote: Your presence here is is only a matter of conducting an experiment in limits, reminding yourself of what you aren't.
quotes.author: Jay McInerney

quotes.quote: Don't equate the presence of God with a good mood or a pleasant temperament. God is near whether you are happy or not.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: The presence of others who see what we see and hear what we hear assures us of the reality of the world and ourselves.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: The other person's presence ultimately is the same as your presence, because it is in presence that there is true meeting.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: In their presence, there's no need for continuous conversation, but you find you're quite content in just having them nearby.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: It is strange how the presence of additional people can make you feel more alone.
quotes.author: James Alan Gardner

quotes.quote: The presence of a king engenders love Amongst his subjects, and his royal friends.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Pay attention to your enemies, for they are the first to discover your mistakes.
quotes.author: Antisthenes

quotes.quote: I really pay attention to the bass in the music I listen to, and that's what I tend to write toward.
quotes.author: Dustin Diamond

quotes.quote: Whatever you focus your attention on will become important to you even if it's unimportant.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: The successful person places more attention on doing the right thing rather than doing things right.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: You have to pay attention to details to have success in the playoffs. You can't take anyone lightly.
quotes.author: Nicklas Lidstrom

quotes.quote: Somewhere within you is a huge supply of happiness, always there, patiently waiting for you to reach out and grab it. It's yours for the asking. And you ask by giving it your attention.
quotes.author: Elle Sommer

quotes.quote: Attention is a precious commodity.
quotes.author: Brian Solis

quotes.quote: The constant attention is what is so difficult.
quotes.author: Natalie Wood

quotes.quote: The more attention you pay an enemy, the stronger you make him. Be attentive, but don't be paranoiac.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The best way to get anybody's attention is dinner. I have good kitchen skills and good grocery shopping skills.
quotes.author: Al Roker

quotes.quote: Attention is a limited resource, so pay attention to where you pay attention.
quotes.author: Howard Rheingold

quotes.quote: The quality of one's life depends on the quality of attention. Whatever you pay attention to will grow more important in your life.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Attention is like a narrow mouthed vessel; pour into it what you have to say cautiously, and, as it were, drop by drop.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: The love and attention you always thought you wanted from someone else, is the love and attention you first need to give to yourself.
quotes.author: Bryant McGillns

quotes.quote: Attention is psychic energy, and like physical energy, unless we allocate some part of it to the task at hand, no work gets done.
quotes.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

quotes.quote: The greatest gift you can give another is the purity of your attention.
quotes.author: Richard Moss

quotes.quote: The capacity to give one's attention to a sufferer is a very rare and difficult thing; it is almost a miracle; it is a miracle. Nearly all those who think they have the capacity do not possess it.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Pay attention to your body. Is this the only place where they should live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The ability to focus attention on important things is a defining characteristic of intelligence.
quotes.author: Robert J. Shiller

quotes.quote: Pay less attention to what you HEAR about someone, and more to what you LEARN about them...as you make the EFFORT.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: The more attention you give to your loved ones, the less affection you recieve from them.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Success in life is founded upon attention to the small things rather than to the large things; to the every day things nearest to us rather than to the things that are remote and uncommon.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: All that attention to the perfect lighting, the perfect this, the perfect that, I find terribly annoying.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: Attention to detail is of utmost importance when you want to look good.
quotes.author: Carolina Herrera

quotes.quote: When our attention is on the present, our life is constantly renewed.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Keep your attention focused entirely on what is truly your own concern, and be clear that what belongs to others is their business and none of yours.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: As you attention is divided the opportunity for error increases exponentially.
quotes.author: R.A.Delmonico

quotes.quote: Attention is vitality. It connects you with others. It makes you eager. Stay eager.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Once one pays some attention to something, then you begin to see evidence of it everywhere.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Concentrated attention is the collection of units of power on a chosen point of intention.
quotes.author: James Arthur Ray

quotes.quote: Our attention should be concentrated on God, instead of on what we wear.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: I just pay attention to what's in my head. That's my number-one rule.
quotes.author: Andrew Bird

quotes.quote: Attention is the intention to live without reservation in the here-and-now.
quotes.author: Timothy Miller

quotes.quote: I hold my course with focused attention and relentless commitment, as I weather the storms of life.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Give your fullest attention to whatever the moment presents.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Pay attention to the beauty surrounding you.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: It's the inward attention that takes you into the depth of the mind.
quotes.author: Roshan Sharma

quotes.quote: Even when the attention focused on me is positive, I am uncomfortable being looked at by a lot of people - it's just not my natural state of being.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: Attention pays attention to a lot of things, but when attention pays attention to attention, then there is a stillness, and that stillness introduces you to your self.
quotes.author: Mooji

quotes.quote: Attention without feeling-is only a report.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: The most basic and powerful way to connect to another person is to listen. Just listen. Perhaps the most important thing we ever give each other is our attention.... A loving silence often has far more power to heal and to connect than the most well-intentioned words.
quotes.author: Rachel Naomi Remen

quotes.quote: The more clearly we can focus our attention on the wonders and realities of the universe about us the less taste we shall have for the destruction of our race. Wonder and humility are wholesome emotions, and they do not exist side by side with a lust for destruction.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: A little attention, a pat on the head, and a kind word every now and then is all your dog asks.
quotes.author: Louis Sabin

quotes.quote: Attention is the ability we have to discriminate and to focus only on that which we want to perceive.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: There are good ways and bad ways to get my attention. Whacking on my ego with a crowbar will get my attention, sure, but it's not going to leave me well disposed to the messenger.
quotes.author: Charles Stross

quotes.quote: Attention to health is life's greatest hindrance.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: It had long since come to my attention that people of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them. They went out and happened to things.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Be aware of your breathing. Notice how this takes attention away from your thinking and creates space.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Paying attention helps us live in, and appreciate, the present moment in all its richness and depth. It helps us to see-truly see-what is actually going on. Simply put, attention pays off.
quotes.author: Lama Surya Das

quotes.quote: You are no longer innocent, you are condemned to awareness.
quotes.author: Michael Eric Dyson

quotes.quote: The simple act of paying attention can take you a long way.
quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

quotes.quote: Attention or awareness is the secret of life and the heart of practice...every moment in life is absolute itself. That's all there is. There is nothing other than this present moment; there is no past, there is no future; there is nothing but this. So when we don't pay attention to each little this, we miss the whole thing.
quotes.author: Charlotte Joko Beck

quotes.quote: Time swiftly passes by, and with it, our only chance / Each of us must aspire to awaken. / Be aware. / Do not squander our life.
quotes.author: Beck

quotes.quote: Just by listening with your eyes you can fold back on yourself and merge into that primal stream of awareness like a river is swallowed by the immensity of the ocean. Only then will you know the point to live from.
quotes.author: Ji Aoi Isshi

quotes.quote: Be alert for any sign of beauty or grace, offer up every joy, be awake at all moments.
quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.quote: It's your life that you are living. Don't pick and choose when you'll be there. All of it is yours. No one else suffers more if you waste it than you. Be patient with yourself and make every effort to be fully attentive so that you don't waste any of it.
quotes.author: Angel Kyodo Williams

quotes.quote: Attention is living; inattention is dying. The attentive never stop. The inattentive are dead already.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Nature has given us two ears, two eyes, and but one tongue, to the end that we should hear and see more than we speak.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The ultimate value of life depends upon awareness and the power of contemplation rather than upon mere survival.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Watchfulness...is the vital need, for he who does not watch is soon overwhelmed. The sternman needs only sleep a moment and the vessel is lost.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The secret of a good memory is attention, and attention to a subject depends upon our interest in it. We rarely forget that which has made a deep impression on our minds.
quotes.author: Tyron Edwards

quotes.quote: The one serviceable, safe, certain, remunerative, attainable quality in every study, and every pursuit is the quality of attention.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: A traveler without observation is a bird without wings.
quotes.author: Moslih Sa'adi

quotes.quote: Attention is a tacit and continual compliment.
quotes.author: Madame Anne Sophie Swetchine

quotes.quote: The true art of memory is the art of attention.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The man who is aware of himself is henceforth independent.
quotes.author: Virginia Wolf

quotes.quote: The moment one gives close attention to anything, even a blade of grass, it becomes a mysterious, awesome, indescribably magnificent world in itself.
quotes.author: Miller

quotes.quote: The highest ecstasy is the attention at its fullest.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Attention is the rarest and purest form of generosity.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Whatever you put your attention on will grow stronger in your life.
quotes.author: Chopra

quotes.quote: The world like an accomplished hostess pays most attention to those whom it will soonest forget.
quotes.author: John Churton Collins

quotes.quote: All he was doing was calling attention to himself, rather like those movie stars who go around wearing dark glasses on cloudy days.
quotes.author: Loren D. Estleman

quotes.quote: He has a short attention span. You sort of have to edit your friendship into sound bites.
quotes.author: Candice Bergen

quotes.quote: The power of applying attention, steady and undissipated, to a single object, is the sure mark of a superior genius.
quotes.author: Chesterfield

quotes.quote: If I have made any improvement in the sciences, it is owing more to patient attention than to anything besides.
quotes.author: Sir I. Newton

quotes.quote: If there be anything that can be called genius, it consists chiefly in ability to give that attention to a subject which keeps it steadily in the mind, till we have surveyed it accurately on all sides.
quotes.author: Reid

quotes.quote: As a bubble drifts up into the sky, you watch it rise, and this brings your attention to the sky. While you are looking at the bubble, it pops, and you keep your attention right where the bubble had been. Your awareness now lies in empty space.
quotes.author: B. Alan Wallace

quotes.quote: Skillful speech not only means that we pay attention to the words we speak and to their tone but also requires that our words reflect compassion and concern for others and that they help and heal, rather than wound and destroy.
quotes.author: Bhante Henepola Gunaratana

quotes.quote: When you pay attention to detail, the big picture will take care of itself.
quotes.author: George St-Pierre

quotes.quote: It goes against the grain of modern education to teach students to program. What fun is there to making plans, acquiring discipline, organizing thoughts, devoting attention to detail, and learning to be self critical.
quotes.author: Alan Perlis

quotes.quote: Laymen learn to read photographs the way they do headlines, skipping over them quickly to get the gist of what is being said. Photographers, on the other hand, study them with the care and attention to detail one might give to a difficult scientific paper or a complicated poem.
quotes.author: Howard S. Becker

quotes.quote: Personal revelation, consecration of performance, attention to detail, and dependency on God-with these qualities you cannot fail.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: It is only through a devoted attention to the details of objects and faces in the modern urban scene, he argues, that the commodity fetish of capitalism can be effectively dispelled.
quotes.author: Mark Kingwell

quotes.quote: As a coach, your high standards of performance, attention to detail and - above all - how hard you work set the stage for how your players perform.
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.quote: There is the flash in the pan, the sudden success. But continued success is dependent upon tremendous attention to detail.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: In moviemaking, you learn to pay attention to detail, because so much is in the detail. And when you're shooting, you try to be very alert to what's going on, even if you're tired.
quotes.author: Frederick Wiseman

quotes.quote: Attention to detail can't be ( and never is ) added later. It's an entire development philosophy, methodology, and culture.
quotes.author: Marco Arment

quotes.quote: Sometimes it gets a little too bubblegum for me, but what I do love about KPop videos is their attention to detail, and their choreography and dancing are always spot-on.
quotes.author: Bebe Rexha

quotes.quote: The success of a production depends on the attention paid to detail.
quotes.author: David O. Selznick

quotes.quote: Attention to detail is crucial in my roles as a real estate developer and principal of a lifestyle brand. Fine jewelry is especially intricate and requires a very well trained eye.
quotes.author: Ivanka Trump

quotes.quote: In the successful organization, no detail is too small to escape close attention.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: It's the little details that are vital. Little things make big things happen.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Another thing all writers have in common is we're all observers. We pay attention to detail.
quotes.author: Judy Blume

quotes.quote: Simple ingredients can be used to make elegant dishes with just a little extra attention to detail.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.quote: Things can happen when you least expect them so you always gotta be prepared. And pay attention to the details. The devil is in the details.
quotes.author: Lesley Kagen

quotes.quote: There is space for a different kind of investigative reporting that's about immersion and obsessive attention to detail and deep listening.
quotes.author: Sarah Stillman

quotes.quote: Art is detail. I do not see the attention to detail as an act of masochism, but as the capacity to look, see, listen, and hear.
quotes.author: DaÅ¡a DrndiÄ‡

quotes.quote: Discipline is based on pride, on meticulous attention to details, and on mutual respect and confidence. Discipline must be a habit so ingrained that it is stronger than the excitement of the goal or the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Gary Ryan Blair

quotes.quote: Attention to detail is of utmost importance when you want to look good.
quotes.author: Carolina Herrera

quotes.quote: It's the little things that make the big things possible. Only close attention to the fine details of any operation makes the operation first class.
quotes.author: J. Willard Marriott

quotes.quote: Personal power is really the issue. It is only through tremendous attention to detail that you will be able to gain personal power and searing self-honesty.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Money is the most corrosive aspect of life today because it means that all attention to detail is forgotten.
quotes.author: Roberto Cavalli

quotes.quote: Strategy equals execution. All the great ideas and visions in the world are worthless if they can't be implemented rapidly and efficiently. Good leaders delegate and empower others liberally, but they pay attention to details, every day.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: I'm not an easy customer. My attention to detail could probably drive you mad. My eye still always goes toward the single flaw.
quotes.author: L'Wren Scott

quotes.quote: Thinking isn't something you think about. It comes naturally. Thinking involves many things. It involves being an observer. It involves analyzing things, taking in what's around you in the world and finding how to make it inspire your work or turn it into a lesson to teach your children; it's paying attention to details. That's what thinking is: processing.
quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

quotes.quote: A handful of men have become very rich by paying attention to details that most others ignored.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Fastidious attention to detail makes the difference between an OK service and first class service.
quotes.author: Ben Elliot

quotes.quote: Productivity and efficiency can be achieved only step by step with sustained hard work, relentless attention to details and insistence on the highest standards of quality and performance.
quotes.author: J. R. D. Tata

quotes.quote: The difference between something good and something great is attention to detail.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: There's a joy and a pain about directing where the dreams you have are becoming concrete but the attention to detail, the need for time is such that it's overwhelming at times, and the stream of responsibility.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.quote: It it's true that fastidiousness and attention to detail is very much in my genes - if you knew my parents, you'd see that this is something I've inherited, only doubly so.
quotes.author: George Benjamin

quotes.quote: Attention to detail is the secret of success in every sphere of life, and little kindnesses, little acts of consideration, little appreciations, little confidences, they are all that are needed to keep the friendship sweet.
quotes.author: Hugh Black

quotes.quote: It's amazing how much time and money can be saved in the world of dating by close attention to detail. A white sock here, a pair of red braces there, a gray slip-on shoe, a swastika, are as often as not all one needs to tell you there's no point in writing down phone numbers and forking out for expensive lunches because it's never going to be a runner.
quotes.author: Helen Fielding

quotes.quote: There are lots of stories in pop music, lots of lush orchestrations, lots of attention to detail. You just have to know where to find them. The best stuff is never overt.
quotes.author: Stephanie D'Abruzzo

quotes.quote: A man's accomplishments in life are the cumulative effect of his attention to detail.
quotes.author: John Foster Dulles

quotes.quote: Cooking is like music: you can tell when someone puts love into it. I come from a place where there was so much attention to detail. The population is smaller in the South, so more attention is given to serving smaller numbers of people.
quotes.author: Taylor Hicks

quotes.quote: If one person in a group of ten is missing the tip of his little finger, I will notice it almost immediately. This extreme attention to visual detail is not a virtue, just a fact of my person. It happens seemingly involuntarily and strikes me as neither good nor bad.
quotes.author: Rosemary Mahoney

quotes.quote: It's attention to detail that makes the difference between average and stunning.
quotes.author: Francis Atterbury

quotes.quote: In France, I found there is a lot of attention to the little details and to the quality of life.
quotes.author: Yael Naim

quotes.quote: Pay close attention to detail in whatever it is you are doing. Be specific and expect quality from your performance.
quotes.author: Robert Cheeke

quotes.quote: The focus and the concentration and the attention to detail that flying takes is a kind of meditation. I find it restful and engaging, and other things slip away.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.quote: Success in any endeavor requires single-minded attention to detail and total concentration.
quotes.author: Willie Sutton

quotes.quote: Attention to detail and a perfectionist instinct, far from stimulating action, are character qualities that lead to renunciation. Better to dream than to be.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: Attention to detail is integral to good character or breeding.
quotes.author: Yoruban Proverb

quotes.quote: To make a still life photograph pay attention to detail, compare the objects for size, and provide good lighting.
quotes.author: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.quote: As every good hostess knows, attention to detail is essential for successful entertaining.
quotes.author: Lilly S. Routtenberg

quotes.quote: He had never encountered such exacting attention to details— or such stubbornness.
quotes.author: Booket T. Washington

quotes.quote: While constitutional provisions for the legislative branch are described in meticulous detail, the American Constitution is rather vague and ambiguous on the subject of presidential powers.
quotes.author: Joslyn Pine

quotes.quote: I was convinced there was a way to help people like him improve their attention to detail, to be better at what they do, make more money, advance their careers, and get more fulfillment from a job well done.
quotes.author: Chris Denny

quotes.quote: 96% of executives and 97% of people managers say being more detail-oriented will make you more successful in your career.
quotes.author: Chris Denny

quotes.quote: The errors and omissions made because of lack of attention to detail can have any number of negative impacts on company's bottom and/or top lines.
quotes.author: Chris Denny

quotes.quote: This is the surprising power of our small actions. our subtle shifts in thinking, and our dogged attention to the everyday details in life. They can change everything— our careers, relationships, well-being, and ultimately how we impact the world around us.
quotes.author: Linda Kaplan

quotes.quote: However, in the process of ignoring the utterly useless and insignificant, we have given short shrift to something that is extraordinarily essential— the small gestures, words, and daily kindness that speak volumes about our attention to detail, and our commitment and concern to effect change and make a difference.
quotes.author: Linda Kaplan

quotes.quote: Keep in mind that our ability to focus is limited. It's a resource we consume throughout the day, starting from the moment we wake up and lasting until the moment we go to bed.
quotes.author: Damon Zahariades

quotes.quote: Apple didn't come by its reputation for aesthetic perfection by accident. The company consciously sweats every detail from examining each pixel on a screen with a photographer's loupe to employing a team of packaging designers who spend months perfecting the box-opening experience.
quotes.author: Amy E. Herman

quotes.quote: A keen sense of attention to detail is important to medicine, but it's just as important in many other fields, including math.
quotes.author: Marcus Sloan

quotes.quote: Conversely, the detail-oriented personality's lack of perspective may leave him unable to see how all of the details fit together into the whole and thus miss the meaning.
quotes.author: Linda Fabre

quotes.quote: The detail-oriented personalities contribute thoroughness to the observation process, whereas the big picture people contribute perspective.
quotes.author: Linda Fabre

quotes.quote: Perfectionists are detail-oriented.
quotes.author: Monica Ramirez Basco

quotes.quote: Be detail-oriented. Look at smaller details apart from the whole task. Take on one piece at a time. You will begin to make progress and feel a sense of accomplishment.
quotes.author: Monica Ramiez Basco

quotes.quote: A detail oriented inwardly focused perfectionist can be a good partner if you can find a way to work together.
quotes.author: Monica Ramirez Basco

quotes.quote: When making experiences, attention to detail matters.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Details matter. It’s worth waiting to get it right.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Attention to detail is not about perfection. It’s about excellence, about constant improvement.
quotes.author: Chris Jenny

quotes.quote: Details make perfection, and perfection is not a detail.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Details create the big picture.
quotes.author: Sanford I. Weill

quotes.quote: I am a control freak. I am very hands-on and pay attention to details.
quotes.author: Victoria Beckham

quotes.quote: As a coach, your high standards of performance, attention to detail, and - above all - how hard you work set the stage for how your players perform.
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.quote: So if you want a culture where people work hard, & pay attention to detail, focus on the customer, are frugal: you have to do it yourself.
quotes.author: Sam Altman

quotes.quote: There's just something about women and shoes, it's the luxury, it's the femininity and it's the attention to detail. You can put a lot of work into your dress but if you have the right shoe and bag then you feel good.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: Another thing all writers have in common is we're all observers. We pay attention to detail.
quotes.author: Judy Blume

quotes.quote: It is our attitude at the beginning of a difficult task which, more thananything else, will affect It's successful outcome.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Our attitudes control our lives. Attitudes are a secret power workingtwenty-four hours a day, for good or bad. It is of paramount importance that we know how to harness and control this great force.
quotes.author: Tom Blandi

quotes.quote: I am convinced that attitude is the key to success or failure in almost any of life's endeavors. Your attitude-your perspective, your outlook, how you feel about yourself, how you feel about other people-determines you priorities, your actions, your values. Your attitude determines how you interact with other people and how you interact with yourself.
quotes.author: Carolyn Warner

quotes.quote: Your living is determined not so much by what life brings to you as by the attitude you bring to life; not so much by what happens to you as by the way your mind looks at what happens.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The greatest day in your life and mine is when we take total responsibility for our attitudes. That's the day we truly grow up.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: How we think shows through in how we act. Attitudes are mirrors of the mind. They reflect thinking.
quotes.author: David J. Schwartz

quotes.quote: It is your attitude, not your aptitude, that determines your altitude.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A bad attitude can literally block love, blessings, and destiny from finding you. Don't be the reason you don't succeed.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.quote: A 'positive attitude' is definitely one of the keys to success. My definition of a positive attitude is a simple one: Looking for the good in all circumstances.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A bad attitude is like a flat tire. If you don't change it, you'll never go anywhere.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Attitude is more important than the past, than education, than money,than circumstances, than what people do or say. It is more important than appearance, giftedness, or skill.
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.quote: Our attitude towards what has happened to us in life is the important thing to recognize. Once hopeless, my life is now hope-full, but it did not happen overnight. The last of human freedoms, to choose one's attitude in any given set of circumstances, is to choose one's own way.
quotes.author: Victor Frankl

quotes.quote: You are the conductor of your own attitude! Nobody else can compose your thoughts for you.
quotes.author: Lee J. Colan

quotes.quote: The most significant change in a person's life is a change of attitude. Right attitudes produce right actions.
quotes.author: William J. Johnson

quotes.quote: Your attitude is either the lock on, or the key to the door of success.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Our attitude in the face of life's challenges determines our suffering or our freedom.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.quote: Positive attitude enables you to go with passion and see possibility in every challenging circumstance. It was by that, that great achievers picked up metal scraps on the floor and saw machines built from it.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Our attitudes control our lives. Attitudes are a secret power working twenty-four hours a day, for good or bad. It is of paramount importance that we know how to harness and control this great force.
quotes.author: Tom Blandi

quotes.quote: A positive attitude turns 'I can't & I won't,' into 'I have & I WILL!'
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Could we change our attitude, we should not only see life differently, but life itself would come to be different. Life would undergo a change of appearance because we ourselves had undergone a change of attitude.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.quote: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: A positive attitude accelerates your development as a creative person. Believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Nita Leland

quotes.quote: Your attitude can take you forward or your attitude can take you down. The choice is always yours!
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The winner's edge is not in a gifted birth, a high IQ, or in talent. The winner's edge is all in the attitude, not aptitude. Attitude is the criterion for success.
quotes.author: Dennis Waitley

quotes.quote: Attitudes are nothing more than habits of thoughts, and habits can be acquired. An action repeated becomes an attitude realized.
quotes.author: Paul Myer

quotes.quote: Whenever you're in conflict with someone, there is one factor that can make the difference between damaging your relationship and deepening it. That factor is attitude.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: A strong positive mental attitude will create more miracles than any wonder drug.
quotes.author: Patricia Neal

quotes.quote: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
quotes.author: John N. Mitchell

quotes.quote: There is little difference in people, but that little difference makes a big difference. The little difference is attitude. The big difference is whether it is positive or negative.
quotes.author: W Clement Stone

quotes.quote: A bad attitude is merely a reflection of how you feel about yourself.
quotes.author: David Roppo

quotes.quote: People's rise or fall, success or failure, happiness or unhappiness depends upon their attitude... a person's attitude will create the situation he or she imagines.
quotes.author: James Lane Allen

quotes.quote: Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can't be done.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Attitude is a choice. What you think you can do, whether positive or negative, confident or scared, will most likely happen.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.quote: If your attitude toward the world is good, you will obtain good results. If your attitude is excellent, excellent will your results.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: The most important thing you'll ever wear is your attitude.
quotes.author: Jeff Moore

quotes.quote: We choose what attitudes we have right now. And it's a continuing choice.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: You can't always change your situation, but you can always change your attitude.
quotes.author: Larry Hargraves

quotes.quote: A healthy attitude is contagious but don't wait to catch it from others. Be a carrier.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
quotes.author: Scott Hamilton

quotes.quote: Attitude will always define who we are in life.
quotes.author: Mark A. Brennan

quotes.quote: Your attitude is everything, and it determines how you experience every aspect of your life.
quotes.author: Gerald G. Jampolsky

quotes.quote: Control your attitude or it will control you.
quotes.author: Karen Mikhai

quotes.quote: I believe your attitude is the most important choice you can make.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Attitudes are nothing more than habits of thought.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Our attitude towards others determines their attitude towards us.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Great effort springs naturally from great attitude.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: The meaning of things lies not in the things themselves, but in our attitude towards them.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
