quotes.quote: Of all the attitudes we can acquire, surely the attitude of gratitude is the most important and by far the most life changing.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: If you can't change your fate, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: Work is either fun or drudgery. It depends on your attitude. I like fun.
quotes.author: Colleen Barrett

quotes.quote: We cannot choose the things that will happen to us. But we can choose the attitude we will take toward anything that happens. Success or failure depends on your attitude.
quotes.author: Alfred Armand Montapert

quotes.quote: Take charge of your attitude. Don't let someone else choose it for you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Attitudes are more important than facts.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: There are no menial jobs, only menial attitudes.
quotes.author: William John Bennett

quotes.quote: Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Attitude is your acceptance of the natural laws, or your rejection of the natural laws.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The greatest revolution of our generation is the discovery that human beings, by changing the inner attitudes of their minds, can change the outer aspects of their lives.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Any fact facing us is not as important as our attitude toward it, for that determines our success or failure.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: A happy person is not a person in a certain set of circumstances, but rather a person with a certain set of attitudes.
quotes.author: Hugh Downs

quotes.quote: The ideal attitude is to be physically loose and mentally tight.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: The remarkable thing is, we have a choice everyday regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.
quotes.author: Hans Selye

quotes.quote: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Success or failure depends more upon attitude than upon capacity.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Attitude is greatly shaped by influence and association.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Attitude is everything, so pick a good one.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Attitude drives actions. Actions drive results. Results drive lifestyles.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Attitude is a choice. Think positive thoughts daily. Believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.quote: Attitude is the reflection of a person, and our world mirrors our attitude.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: The attitude is very important. Because, your behavior radiates how you feel.
quotes.author: Lou Ferrigno

quotes.quote: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
quotes.author: Wade Boggs

quotes.quote: Our lives are not determined by what happens to us but how we react to what happens, not by what life brings us but the attitude we bring to life.
quotes.author: Wade Boggs

quotes.quote: Keep a good attitude and do the right thing even when it's hard. When you do that you are passing the test. And God promises you your marked moments are on their way.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Improve your performance by improving your attitude.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: Our attitude can give us an uncommonly positive perspective.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: A positive attitude means all the difference in the world.
quotes.author: Jenny Holzer

quotes.quote: A positive attitude from you tends to produce a positive attitude toward you.
quotes.author: Deborah Day

quotes.quote: A powerful attraction exists, therefore, to the promotion of a study and of duties of all others engrossing the time most completely, and which is less benefited than most others by any acquaintance with science.
quotes.author: Charles Babbage

quotes.quote: Attraction is what happens between you. It's not universal. And it's not conventional. And thank God for that.
quotes.author: Rainbow Rowell

quotes.quote: Treat yourself with love and respect, and you will attract people who show you love and respect.
quotes.author: Sitara Devi

quotes.quote: Part of my attraction to ancient art is that there is an element of risk, of speculation.
quotes.author: Michael Steinhardt

quotes.quote: There is an attraction for you which does not exist for me, since I do not feel any pleasure. You see, we are making a bargain. You give me a dream, I give you joy. But all this is not love.
quotes.author: Henri Barbusse

quotes.quote: The law of attraction says that like attracts like, and when you think and feel what you want to attract on the inside, the law will use people, circumstances and events to magnetize what you want.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: It's the kind of kiss that ends with clothes on the floor and somebody getting dicked out up against the wall.
quotes.author: Vanessa North

quotes.quote: Attraction is beyond our will or ideas sometimes.
quotes.author: Juliette Binoche

quotes.quote: We are all attractive in our own ways; it just takes the right person to hold the mirror and convince us of what others already see.
quotes.author: Kaliana Dietrich

quotes.quote: Great personality will always make you more attractive than someone who only has a great face.
quotes.author: Matt May

quotes.quote: I begin to feel this tension when things that doesn't worth attention are the things that attracts attention.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Desire is easy to fight. Especially when the only weapon desire possesses is attraction. It's not so easy when you're trying to win a war against the heart.
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.quote: But the second she opened her eyes and looked at me, I knew. She was either going to be the death of me or she was going to be the one who finally brought me back to life.
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.quote: Classic romantic love is an emotional attraction between two individuals in which they may share a heightened awareness of mutual adoration. Erotic love, traditionally, has been described as shared sexual attraction.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: The secret of attraction is to love yourself. Attractive people judge neither themselves nor others. They are open to gestures of love. They think about love, and express their love in every action. They know that love is not a mere sentiment, but the ultimate truth at the heart of the universe.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: People will sometimes find themselves attracted to others, that's just who they are. It's what they do with that attraction that defines them.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: There's always a common attraction to universal needs of love and a feeling of worthiness.
quotes.author: Moran Atias

quotes.quote: The attraction of snowboarding is the freedom it gives you. With a snowboard on your feet the sky is the limit. You can do anything and go anywhere. This is not just for pro riders. It is for everyone.
quotes.author: Jeremy Jones

quotes.quote: The law of attraction is this: You don't attract what you want. You attract what you are.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: His attention felt more like an irrepressible gravitational pull than mere interest.
quotes.author: Blakely Bennett

quotes.quote: One attraction in coming to the woods to live was that I should have leisure and opportunity to see the spring come in.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Sexual attraction pairs people, but does not match them.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Attraction happens when you feel important, valued, appreciated and wanted.
quotes.author: Amy Dickinson

quotes.quote: Where you find the attraction for lust and wealth considerably diminished, to whatever creed he may belong, know that his inner spirit is awakening.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: If nothing is more important to you than that you feel good, you can form a fantasy about someone who is in your life and they will begin to modify to meet your fantasy, because Law of Attraction is a very powerful thing.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: It is the combination of thought and love which forms the irresistible force of the law of attraction.
quotes.author: Charles F. Haanel

quotes.quote: We attract hearts by the qualities we display; we retain them by the qualities we possess.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: The problem with human attraction is not knowing if it will be returned.
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: The attraction of a life devoted to sensation, pleasure and self would probably wear thin one day, but there was still plenty of time for that yet.
quotes.author: David Nicholls

quotes.quote: Attraction doesn't stop when a child is born. It's the opposite. Being a mum and dad makes you even sexier.
quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

quotes.quote: The attraction of a life devoted to sensation, pleasure and self would probably wear thin one day, but there was still plenty of time for that yet
quotes.author: David Nicholls

quotes.quote: Attraction is an evil. It takes you to the wonderland that doesn't exist. The exit becomes tough, then.
quotes.author: Bhavik Sarkhedi

quotes.quote: On the attraction between man and woman society is based; but its refined is greater than its gross force, and its weight is like the gravitation of the globe.
quotes.author: Cyrus Augustus Bartol

quotes.quote: Mysteries of attraction could not always be explained through logic. Sometimes the fractures in two separate souls became the very hinges that held them together.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: Remember, attraction is only one part of a relationship. Loyalty, commitment, responsibility and maturity make up the rest.
quotes.author: Ruth Westheimer

quotes.quote: The attraction, and my particular participation is in being able to communicate with my fans, answer their questions, get a feel for how they respond to vader.
quotes.author: David Prowse

quotes.quote: My attraction had been immediate and profound. And it had nothing to do with the way he looked. My attraction was to what resided between his lines.
quotes.author: Augusten Burroughs

quotes.quote: Attraction is so much more than a pretty face. It's about passion, attitude, kindness, & faith.
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: The Law of attraction is operating in your life whether you understand it or not.
quotes.author: Jenny Hashkins

quotes.quote: There's no doubt that listening to and taking in positive law of attraction related affirmations on the regular in an extremely and reliable way.
quotes.author: Jenny Hashkins

quotes.quote: Using the law of attraction to conquer resistance is the corollary to like draws in like.
quotes.author: Jenny Hashkins

quotes.quote: Event though the law of attraction has been used successfully for centuries, there are still some people who don't actually believe.
quotes.author: Jenny Hashkins

quotes.quote: The law of attraction is really all about the ability to understand how positive thinking creates positive results.
quotes.author: Jenny Hashkins

quotes.quote: True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Love knows not distance; it hath no continent; it's eyes are for the stars.
quotes.author: Gilbert Parker

quotes.quote: Love is but the discovery of ourselves in other, and the delight in the recognition.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Love should be practiced daily in order to grow in it, become more like it and share it.
quotes.author: Torion Kent

quotes.quote: Love is all things good. It is positive. When shared with others, it spreads. It is charitable and makes a positive difference.
quotes.author: Torion Kent

quotes.quote: Let the love you share serve as your signature in making a positive difference in someone's life. Let your signature be a positive representation of your growth in love.
quotes.author: Torion Kent

quotes.quote: True love is what humanity needs to keep hope alive and to make life worth living.
quotes.author: Torion Kent

quotes.quote: With love you can never say never. Never is not a reality of one's ability to love. Love is always possible.
quotes.author: Torion Kent

quotes.quote: Being surrounded by love at home should be the base for your life.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Remember that the best relationships that in which mutual love is bigger that mutual necessity.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: We are most alive when we're in love.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
quotes.author: Rupert Everett

quotes.quote: Love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Whatever feelings you have within you are attracting your tomorrow.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: We attract to ourselves what we hold inside. Every circumstance, every person, and every situation that we attract and experience is based on what is inside us.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: You cannot attract what you need if you feel you need it urgently or desperately, because that emotion contains fear.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: If you want to attract appreciation for what you do, then move through your life appreciating and complimenting others.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: No matter what the excuse, unless you begin to feel happy despite it, you cannot attract happiness.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: Love is the wisdom of the fool, and the folly of the wise.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Love brings light to darkness darkness; it reaches through, sees through and follows through.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Love is patient however; it does not sit on the fence.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Love is never fragmented; it's an inseparable whole which does not delight in bits and pieces.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: To love and be loved demands your best.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: The best love affairs are those we never had.
quotes.author: Norman Lindsay

quotes.quote: Love for me is like a pretzel. Twisted and salty.
quotes.author: Emmy Gay

quotes.quote: Love is the delusion that one woman differs from another.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: A man falls in love through his eyes, a woman through her ears.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wyatt

quotes.quote: The fickleness of the women I love is only equaled by the infernal constancy of the women who love me.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Love us the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Nothing takes the taste out peanut butter quite life unrequited love.
quotes.author: Charlie Brown

quotes.quote: They say love's like the measles--all the worse when it comes late in life.
quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

quotes.quote: How alike are the groans of love to those of the dying.
quotes.author: Malcolm Lowry

quotes.quote: When love is not madness, it is not love.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.quote: A girl must marry for love, and keep on marrying until she finds it.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: Don't audit life. Show up and make the most of it now.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: You can do a life audit at any age or stage of life. Don't waste time on things that aren't necessary or good for you. Life is short. Do the bits you have to do and use the rest of your life to have a wonderful time.
quotes.author: Caroline Righton

quotes.quote: If you can't show through an audit trail how you arrived at the numbers on your balance sheet, that is a significant internal control failure.
quotes.author: Robert Cobb

quotes.quote: I always do a mental audit at the end of the week to make sure I'm balancing time between my career and my personal life.
quotes.author: Jill Wagner

quotes.quote: Remember that even if you haven't been audited in the past, it doesn't mean you won't be in the future. And it only takes one audit to ruin your day.
quotes.author: Kathy Burlison

quotes.quote: Whoso seeks an audit here propitious, pays his tribute, game or fish, wild fowl or venison, and his errand speeds.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Given the risks of an expensive audit, paying strict attention to the rules is the only smart decision you can make.
quotes.author: Kathy Burlison

quotes.quote: Audit findings are easy to come up with, successful change from a finding is true internal audit value.
quotes.author: Michael Piazza

quotes.quote: For every operation audited, know the mission ... the purpose... the reason for being.
quotes.author: Larry Sawyer

quotes.quote: A fundamental key to audit success is the reputation for objectivity. That implies independence from activities reviewed. Complete independence is an unattainable goal while practical independence is not only possible but absolutely essential.
quotes.author: Larry Sawyer

quotes.quote: Everything in this audit is accounting issues.
quotes.author: Don MacGhan

quotes.quote: You have to have a reason to conduct an audit in the first place. You can't just request to look through books.
quotes.author: Shannon Hurst

quotes.quote: They're grading for audit potential, and the more your return deviates from the norm, the higher your score.
quotes.author: Fred Daily

quotes.quote: There has to be a regular performance audit to do a comprehensive analysis to determine how the funds are performing. We can't come to the bargaining table with information that's six years old.
quotes.author: Jesse Case

quotes.quote: The purpose of this audit was to test the public-records compliance for the public, not the media. We specifically didn't want people who were savvy with the law.
quotes.author: Barbara Petersen

quotes.quote: To me an audition is 30 crazed people in a room waiting to be axed.
quotes.author: Kathie Lee Gifford

quotes.quote: Think of every audition as a chance to perform and you will have fun doing it.
quotes.author: Erica Schroeder

quotes.quote: The first step to a better audition is to give up character and use yourself.
quotes.author: Michael Shurtleff

quotes.quote: A lot of auditions are not fun; they're just a necessary evil, and, if you're lucky, you have a few moments that are fun.
quotes.author: Kristen Connolly

quotes.quote: Auditions are not a natural environment, and you feel judged, even though everyone is just excited to find the right person.
quotes.author: Tatiana Maslany

quotes.quote: Auditions are hard. You should see what most of the women look like when I audition for things - they look like they should be on the catwalk.
quotes.author: Mayim Bialik

quotes.quote: I treat auditions like I treated my first dates. It's an opportunity to get to know a stranger and to learn from each other.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.quote: When you blow an audition that you have a lot of importance on, it haunts you for years.
quotes.author: Adam Scott

quotes.quote: You never have an indifferent feeling after an audition. It's either gone really well or really terribly.
quotes.author: Cassie Steele

quotes.quote: The audition process is always grueling. You always hope to just get offered things, and sometimes it happens and sometimes it doesn't.
quotes.author: Jake Abel

quotes.quote: All you have to remember is 'audition' is synonymous with 'opportunity.' I mean, if you absolutely hate auditioning, do you also hate opportunities? That wouldn't make much sense.
quotes.author: Hilary Swank

quotes.quote: Auditions are very strange - you're there to win, to seek approval. They never get easier, but I did realise that you're there voluntarily, after all.
quotes.author: Darren Boyd

quotes.quote: Any time you audition and get it, you earned it.
quotes.author: Michael Ealy

quotes.quote: When you go on an audition it's very frightening.
quotes.author: Victoria Jackson

quotes.quote: The more auditions you go on, the more you will learn not to take it personally.
quotes.author: Paula Abdul

quotes.quote: With all the auditions you do, there is a lot of rejection you have to take as well. You get used to that.
quotes.author: Olivia DeJonge

quotes.quote: When you go out on auditions for big movies, and you're not a big star, you get used to getting close but not getting the part.
quotes.author: Craig Sheffer

quotes.quote: Every audition that I walk out of where I think I nailed it, I never get that job, ever.
quotes.author: Sophie Turner

quotes.quote: Auditions are like a gamble. Most likely you won't get the part, but if you don't go, you'll never know if you could've got it.
quotes.author: Robert De Niro

quotes.quote: When you go to meetings or auditions and you fail to prepare, prepare to fail. It is simple but true.
quotes.author: Paula Abdul

quotes.quote: Every audition I get, I agonise over and I put everything I can into it.
quotes.author: Rafe Spall

quotes.quote: You know, an audition usually is you come in and read the scene and if you're lucky, you get to read it twice.
quotes.author: Ewan McGregor

quotes.quote: When you go to an audition, don't hang on to it because no matter how well you feel it went or how badly, you just never know what the outcome is going to be.
quotes.author: Daniela Ruah

quotes.quote: Every year, August lashes out in volcanic fury, rising with the din of morning traffic, its great metallic wings smashing against the ground, heating the air with ever-increasing intensity.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: August, the summer's last messenger of misery, is a hollow actor.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: August rain: the best of the summer gone, and the new fall not yet born. The odd uneven time.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: The month of August had turned into a griddle where the days just lay there and sizzled.
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

quotes.quote: August was nearly over - the month of apples and falling stars, the last care-free month for the school children. The days were not hot, but sunny and limpidly clear - the first sign of advancing autumn.
quotes.author: Victor Nekrasov

quotes.quote: August is that last flicker of fun and heat before everything fades and dies. The final moments of fun before the freeze. In the winter, everything changes.
quotes.author: Rasmenia Massoud

quotes.quote: August is a gentle reminder for not doing a single thing from your new year resolution for seven months and not doing it for next five.
quotes.author: Crestless Wave

quotes.quote: The first week of August hangs at the very top of summer, the top of the live-long year, lke the highest seat of a Ferris wheel when it pauses in its turning. The weeks that come before are only a climb from balmy spring, and those that follow a drop to the chill of autumn, but the first week of August is motionless, and hot. It is curiously silent, too, with blank white dawns and glaring noons, and sunsets smeared with too much color. Often at night there is lightning, but it quivers all alone.
quotes.author: Natalie Babbitt

quotes.quote: In August, an inescapable blanket of heat settled over Paducah, the last gasping breath of summer roaring its weight out over the populace.
quotes.author: Kelsey Brickl

quotes.quote: Less than a month ago all of August still stretched before us - long and golden and reassuring, like an endless period of delicious sleep
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: August is ripening grain in the fields blowing hot and sunny, the scent of tree-ripened peaches, of hot buttered sweet corn on the cob. Vivid dahlias fling huge tousled blossoms through gardens and joe-pye-weed dusts the meadow purple.
quotes.author: Jean Hersey

quotes.quote: August creates as she slumbers, replete and satisfied.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.quote: August is the month of the high-sailing hawks. The hen hawk is the most noticeable. He likes the haze and calm of these long, warm days. He is a bird of leisure and seems always at his ease. How beautiful and majestic are his movements!
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: That August time it was delight / To watch the red moons wane to white.
quotes.author: Algernon Charles Swinburne

quotes.quote: Everything good, everything magical happens between the months of June and August.
quotes.author: Jenny Han

quotes.quote: Breathe the sweetness that hovers in August.
quotes.author: Denise Levertov

quotes.quote: An aunt is a safe haven for a child. Someone who will keep your secrets and is always on your side.
quotes.author: Sara Sheridan

quotes.quote: My aunt once said that the world would never find peace until men fell at their women's feet and asked for forgiveness.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Only an aunt can give hugs like a mother, keep secrets like a sister and share love like a friend.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: An aunt is someone special to remember with warmth, think of with pride, and cherish with love.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Aunts are to be a pattern and example to all aunts; to be a delight to boys (and girls) and a comfort to their parents; and to show that at least one daughter in every generation ought to remain unmarried, and raise the profession of auntship to a fine art.
quotes.author: Dave Isay

quotes.quote: It is not money my aunt thinks about. She knows better than to value worldly wealth above its price.
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.quote: Aunt: A cherished friend and personal cheerleader who will always see you through rose colored glasses.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Well, I do have some maiden aunts that are not quite like the aunts in the book, but I definitely do have a couple of them, and a couple of old aunties.
quotes.author: Donna Tartt

quotes.quote: Maybe! Maybe! Maybe if your aunt had a beard, she'd be your uncle.
quotes.author: Alvah Bessie

quotes.quote: I want to be the coolest aunt in the entire world.
quotes.author: Bailee Madison

quotes.quote: I'm now the elder in the position of doling out wisdom and trying to mend fences.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: My aunt played the piano and I used to sit and listen to it.
quotes.author: Dick Dale

quotes.quote: I am single and childless, but I have lots of friends and I am an aunt to three lovely children.
quotes.author: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.quote: My aunts still try to fatten me up.
quotes.author: Randy Wayne White

quotes.quote: My father's sister never married in order to raise me.
quotes.author: Marcel Carne

quotes.quote: His father's sister had bats in the belfry and was put away.
quotes.author: Eden Phillpotts

quotes.quote: The woman who can create her own job is the woman who will win fame and fortune.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: What makes a woman beautiful is her loyalty to and her friendships with other women, and her honesty with men.
quotes.author: Vanessa Marcil

quotes.quote: When a woman is talking to you, listen to what she says with her eyes.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: A woman is like a tea bag - you can't tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The quickest way to know a woman is to go shopping with her.
quotes.author: Marcelene Cox

quotes.quote: A woman is never sexier than when she is comfortable in her clothes.
quotes.author: Vera Wang

quotes.quote: A woman uses her intelligence to find reasons to support her intuition.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The real ornament of woman is her character, her purity.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The beauty of a woman must be seen from in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: A woman should be like a single flower, not a whole bouquet.
quotes.author: Anna Held

quotes.quote: A woman whose smile is open and whose expression is glad has a kind of beauty no matter what she wears.
quotes.author: Anne Roiphe

quotes.quote: Cherish the friend who tells you a harsh truth, wanting ten times more to tell you a loving lie.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Every man should have aunts. They illustrate the triumph of guess work over logic.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: I'd rather be the cool aunt than the authoritative aunt.
quotes.author: Solange Knowles

quotes.quote: I was really lucky that I had an aunt who was very inspiring to me. She was different than anybody in my family on either side.
quotes.author: Geena Davis

quotes.quote: Aunts are the ones who stand beside Moms when nieces and nephews enter the world.
quotes.author: Karen Moore

quotes.quote: My mom, my aunt, and my grandma banded together and gave me a village of support when I was growing up.
quotes.author: Michael Tubbs

quotes.quote: The best aunts aren't substitute parents, they're co-conspirators.
quotes.author: Daryl Gregory

quotes.quote: Aunts are always offering cake, certainly you couldn't have had enough.
quotes.author: Barry Spacks

quotes.quote: Aunts are discreet, a little shy by instinct. They forbear to pry.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.quote: To the loyal and to the blood-lovers, in the good families and in the fiery dynasties, life is family and family is life. It is the same people who give advice and their vices to live well who turn out to be the ones who give resource and reason to live long.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: From that point on, I would refer to him as 'your uncle' and he would mostly refer to me as "your aunt" and it would take a longtime for our children to even understand that we were siblings first.
quotes.author: Jenny Zhang

quotes.quote: Aunts offer kids an opportunity to try out ideas that don't chime with their parents and they also demonstrate that people can get on, love each other and live together without necessarily being carbon copies.
quotes.author: Sara Sheridan

quotes.quote: They bring along their loving Aunt / But when they can't find a table for their fat Aunt Mable / They stamp their feet and cry.
quotes.author: Steven Morrissey

quotes.quote: Old aunts and old uncles, Lord I see stars / And then we'd run to the kitchen, you know kids and their games / Play fetch with old Buster, call each other names.
quotes.author: Hayes Carll

quotes.quote: Family Connections. Finally, we found it intriguing that virtually all aunts--whether they were aunts by blood, marriage, or held honorary aunt status-- were identified through family connections.
quotes.author: Kory Floyd

quotes.quote: The aunt is the mother's sister, or the father's brother's wife, rather than simply an aunt.
quotes.author: Kory Floyd

quotes.quote: The pervasiveness of the manner of describing their aunts suggests the importance of situating the aunt within the extended family.
quotes.author: Kory Floyd

quotes.quote: The aunt as a confidante and savvy peer and, in a contrasting way, as someone to be avoided.
quotes.author: Kory Floyd

quotes.quote: Sometimes an aunt helped a niece of nephew take a different perspective by offering sage counsel or a sympathetic ear.
quotes.author: Kory Floyd

quotes.quote: The aunt relationship is often engaged more intermittently, serendipitous, and in response to immediate exigencies than the mother relationship.
quotes.author: Kory Floyd

quotes.quote: The aunt nonetheless is an undeniable emotional presence in kinship and family relationships and histories.
quotes.author: Kory Floyd

quotes.quote: The relationship between aunt and niece was often based upon recognition of similarity between the two--but also emphasized the difference between mother and daughter.
quotes.author: Sue A. Kuba

quotes.quote: Sometimes just being an aunt is pretty fun too. You can play with them for a week or a weekend and give them back to Mom and Dad.
quotes.author: Sue A. Kuba

quotes.quote: Aunts were often involved in attempting to help a niece as she struggled with life choices and decisions.
quotes.author: Sue A. Kuba

quotes.quote: This free-spiritedness and unconventionality is the characteristic of a certain type of aunt we can call the cool aunt.
quotes.author: Axel Nissen

quotes.quote: Aunties have always been crucial in their roles as our 'other mothers' --those other women ho helped raised us.
quotes.author: Tamara Traeder

quotes.quote: Auntie is more a role than a moniker. An auntie is someone who is older, interested, a good listener, and a helpful adviser.
quotes.author: Tamara Traeder

quotes.quote: Aunties may also be someone who seems glamorous, or simply lives a different life than our mother does and provides another example of who we can be as a women.
quotes.author: Tamara Traeder

quotes.quote: Aunts often speak of how honored they are to have someone influence on a growing rirl, how seriously they take the relationship, and the importance of having a young woman in their lives.
quotes.author: Tamara Traeder

quotes.quote: Aunties need nieces, and nieces need aunties. It is never too late find an aunt, or to be one!
quotes.author: Tamara Traeder

quotes.quote: Many times aunties and nieces find amazing similarities in their tastes, attitudes, or even their appearances.
quotes.author: Tamara Traeder

quotes.quote: An auntie is often an 'other mother,' providing another role model of how to live our lives as women. Our mothers, of course, are valuable role models, but sometimes an aunt can provide an alternative style of living.
quotes.author: Tamara Traeder

quotes.quote: Aunts and uncles also shape the lives of nieces and nephews more directly
quotes.author: Lynn H. Turner

quotes.quote: Aunts tried to broaden horizons by exposing nieces and nephews to new experiences and introducing nieces to notions of femininity.
quotes.author: Lynn H. Turner

quotes.quote: The narrowing of the developmental schism between aunts/uncles and niece/nephews may facilitate the development of more intimate bonds.
quotes.author: Lynn H. Turner

quotes.quote: Maiden aunts were teachers and nurses, confidants and disciplinarians.
quotes.author: Nancy Bercaw

quotes.quote: Becoming an auntie, and having the opportunity to be in an active roles a one, has been an absolutely marvelous opprtunity.
quotes.author: Tamara Traeder

quotes.quote: It's Australian to do such things because, however uncivilised they may seem, it's human to do them.
quotes.author: Hugh Mackay

quotes.quote: There is something about the Australian psyche that seems to like films that are slightly offbeat.
quotes.author: Nick Park

quotes.quote: We are moving toward recognition of the first Australians in the Australian constitution.
quotes.author: Kevin Rudd

quotes.quote: Australians are a passionate lot. We are also a very practical lot.
quotes.author: Kevin Rudd

quotes.quote: By 1990, no Australian child will be living in poverty.
quotes.author: Bob Hawke

quotes.quote: Australians will never acquire a national identity until individual Australians acquire identities of their own.
quotes.author: Patrick White

quotes.quote: Australians and the British are very similar: If you try and stand out in any way, and you try to reach for success, someone is gonna be there to cut you down.
quotes.author: Joel Edgerton

quotes.quote: Australia is just so full of surprises.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: We today take this first step by acknowledging the past and laying claim to a future that embraces all Australians.
quotes.author: Kevin Rudd

quotes.quote: Australia lives with a strange contradiction - our national image of ourselves is one of the Outback, and yet nearly all us live in big cities. Move outside the coastal fringe, and Australia can feel like a foreign country.
quotes.author: Kate Grenville

quotes.quote: Australians always want everyone to be average, as if the best thing you can do is fit in.
quotes.author: Poppy King

quotes.quote: In particular, Australia, because of its ancient geography, soil profile and distinctive weather patterns, is more adversely affected by climate variability than some other continents.
quotes.author: Peter Garrett

quotes.quote: Australians are very provincial in many ways. If they feel that you've used them as a stepping stone to bigger things, they resent it.
quotes.author: Graham Russell

quotes.quote: Lighting a cigarette with a sense of achievement for company made the journey worth it.
quotes.author: S.A. Tawks

quotes.quote: It is Australian innocence to love The naturally excessive and be proud Of a thoroughbred gelding who ran fast.
quotes.author: Peter Porter

quotes.quote: The Australian language is easier to learn than boat talk. It has a vocabulary of about six words.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: It's rare that there's a role that requires an Australian accent.
quotes.author: Heath Ledger

quotes.quote: The Australian people want to help build this country into a great nation. This budget has not realized the capacity of the Australian people. It has underestimated them. It has let us down.
quotes.author: Lionel Murphy

quotes.quote: The Australian public are very fair and they are always prepared to give a leader of a major political party a fair go.
quotes.author: Tony Abbott

quotes.quote: The Australian accent is sort of like going down a step in smartness, you could say, because you guys pronounce things as they're spelled. We add and abbreviate stuff.
quotes.author: Callan Mcauliffe

quotes.quote: The Australian economy is resilient, but business and consumer confidence is fragile.
quotes.author: Julie Bishop

quotes.quote: There is nothing more Australian than spending time in somebody else's country
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We believe in the Australian promise; that if you work hard, you won't be left behind.
quotes.author: Wayne Swan

quotes.quote: Australian seafarers make an important contribution to national security in a country with thousands of kilometres of uninhabited coastline.
quotes.author: Anthony Albanese

quotes.quote: Australia is a nation of compassion. Courage and compassion. And the third of these great values: resilience.
quotes.author: Kevin Rudd

quotes.quote: The Australian people expect the Government to govern, they don't expect it to make excuses.
quotes.author: Tony Abbott

quotes.quote: Being an Australian that's been No. 1 in the world back home playing in Australia, that's a pretty cool moment to have.
quotes.author: Jason Day

quotes.quote: The Australian fans are really friendly and personable; the sense of humour is a lot less dry than the English.
quotes.author: Tom Hopper

quotes.quote: Australia's treatment of her Aboriginal people will be the thing on which the world will judge Australia and Australians - Not just now, but in the greater perspective of history.
quotes.author: Gough Whitlam

quotes.quote: The only time an Australian ever walks is when his car runs out of petrol.
quotes.author: Barry Richards

quotes.quote: But Australian intelligence doesn't trust anyone who speaks Russian or German.
quotes.author: Peter Duncan

quotes.quote: Australians are the nicest people, but you can only understand about half of what they say.
quotes.author: Mike Reiss

quotes.quote: Matching stuffed monkeys is always a sign of a good night. It's an old Australian saying.
quotes.author: Andrew Miller

quotes.quote: Australia is alive with the long history of the Indigenous people, our culture and our presence. Nowhere else in the world can you see and experience the oldest loving cultures of humankind.
quotes.author: Marcia Langton

quotes.quote: Aboriginal people around Australia follow various traditions and carry out important rites and rituals that mark the sacred in everyday life. This way, they transform states of being, people, animals, and places from mundane to sacred.
quotes.author: Marcia Langton

quotes.quote: Australian composer Peter Sculthorpe once noted, in the nineteenth century, more than six hundred thousand pianos were bought to Australia from across the sea, over the beaches, into ports and into cities, towns and farms, to actively enculturate the developing Australian public culture.
quotes.author: Baden Offord

quotes.quote: Australia's history since 1788 has been a story of black and white, acting upon and interacting with each other, in the great human drama we call colonialism.
quotes.author: Richard Broome

quotes.quote: For most of our past Aboriginal Australians rarely appeared in Australian History writing, so that we were presented with half a history-half an Australian Experience.
quotes.author: Richard Broome

quotes.quote: The aranda people of Central Australia believe that sometime in the distant past, sleeping superhuman beings, who were at the one time human and animal, spontaneously broke through the surface of a lifeless and cold earth.
quotes.author: Richard Broome

quotes.quote: Working-class Australians are known as 'little Aussie battlers'.
quotes.author: John Blackman

quotes.quote: On 14 February 1966, Australian currency changed from pounds, shillings and pence to dollars and cents.
quotes.author: Manning Clark

quotes.quote: Civilization did not begin in Australia until the last quarter of the eighteenth century.
quotes.author: Manning Clark

quotes.quote: Big sticks is a term used for goal-posts in Aussie Rules football. If a player boots the ball through them he has kicked a goal. 'He's put it through the big sticks!'.
quotes.author: John Blackman

quotes.quote: Slops, another term for beer. A night 'on the slops' is a common pastime in Australia.
quotes.author: John Blackman

quotes.quote: Dead is that region of Australia situated in the middle of the arid Northern Territory.
quotes.author: John Blackman

quotes.quote: Australia is a paradoxical land. It is a modern, industrialized, and technologically advanced nation on a continent that is largely unpopulated.
quotes.author: Francis Gordon Clarke

quotes.quote: Australia's climate is not strictly predictable on seasonal lines but is subject to the vagaries of the El Nino phenomenon, with its characteristics cycles of drought and heavy rainfall.
quotes.author: Francis Gordon Clarke

quotes.quote: Australian male is increasingly unrepresentative; but the bush myth has yet to be replaced with an urban counterpart or beach-based legend with which Australians can identify.
quotes.author: Francis Gordon Clarke

quotes.quote: Australia prides itself on its friendly, laid-back ethos.
quotes.author: Francis Gordon Clarke

quotes.quote: By the time European observers arrived on the scene, Australian Aborigines had developed a fairly rigid pattern of clan and tribal territories.
quotes.author: Francis Gordon Clarke

quotes.quote: Few would argue that 'G'day' is the most world-renowned Aussie greeting, and there would be few Australians who have not used it at one time or another.
quotes.author: Paul Bugeja

quotes.quote: Australians are renowned both at home and abroad for their easy-going, friendly nature, although at time we tend to suffer the oft-discussed 'Tall Poppy Syndrome', which means compliments may come less often than not.
quotes.author: Paul Bugeja

quotes.quote: Far more often than complimenting each other, Aussies love to throw in their 'two bob's worth' of criticism when they feel it's due, giving as good as they get in terms of one upmanship in any duel of words.
quotes.author: Paul Bugeja

quotes.quote: Happy little vegemites means happy Australians, usually children.
quotes.author: H.G. Nelson

quotes.quote: The term 'mate' is an Aussie slang term for a friend.
quotes.author: Ian McKenzie

quotes.quote: Authenticity requires a certain measure of vulnerability, transparency, and integrity.
quotes.author: Janet Louise Stephenson

quotes.quote: We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: You can't try to be authentic. You either are or you aren't.
quotes.author: Oscar Isaac

quotes.quote: The struggle to excavate your true, authentic self from beneath the mountain of conditioning and ridiculous expectation is the epic struggle of your lifetime.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Hard times arouse an instinctive desire for authenticity.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Don't explain your philosophy. Embody it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.
quotes.author: Ben Okri

quotes.quote: When you are authentic, you create a certain energy, people want to be around you because you are unique.
quotes.author: Andie MacDowell

quotes.quote: This above all; to thine own self be true.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Be sure that you put your feet at the right place, then stand firm.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Authenticity is more than speaking; Authenticity is also about doing. Every decision we make says something about who we are.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: The authentic self is soul made visible.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: Be yourself. The world worships an original.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.quote: That inner voice has both gentleness and clarity. So to get to authenticity, you really keep going down to the bone, to the honesty, and the inevitability of something.
quotes.author: Meredith Monk

quotes.quote: The most important thing is what you already do. It's being authentic. It's being curious, trying to discover gifts.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote:
Authenticity is a collection of choices that we have to make every day.
It's about the choice to show up and be real. The choice to be honest.
The choice to let our true selves be seen.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Authenticity is at the heart of success.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Authenticity is about being true to who you are.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Don't compromise yourself. You are all you've got.
quotes.author: Janis Joplin

quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: We are all different. Don't judge, understand instead.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Authentic power is the real deal. You can't inherit it, buy it, or win it. You also can't lose it. You don't need to build your body, reputation, wealth, or charisma to get it.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Authenticity is the alignment of head, mouth, heart, and feet â€“ thinking, saying, feeling, and doing the same thing â€“ consistently. This builds trust, and followers love leaders they can trust.
quotes.author: Lance Secretan

quotes.quote: Everything we see is but a mirror of what we are.
quotes.author: Gerald G Jampolsky

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: Just be your authentic self because there's nothing sexier or more beautiful than that.
quotes.author: Carol Leifer

quotes.quote: To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight; and never stop fighting.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: Being your authentic self is the ultimate secret to happiness in life!
quotes.author: Sheri Fink

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of being unique. It's like being afraid of your best self.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Authority and power are two different things: power is the force by means of which you can oblige others to obey you. Authority is the right to direct and command, to be listened to or obeyed by others. Authority requests power. Power without authority is tyranny.
quotes.author: Jacques Maritain

quotes.quote: Authority is not a quality one person 'has', in the sense that he has property or physical qualities. Authority refers to an interpersonal relation in which one person looks upon another as somebody superior to him.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Authority poisons everybody who takes authority on himself.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: The Word of God gives power, authority and abundant life to a man.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Being an authority on paper does not immediately grant you authority over a group until it is earned by you and given by them.
quotes.author: A.J. Darkholme

quotes.quote: If you would know who controls you see who you may not criticise.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: Authorityâ€”when abused through micromanagement, intimidation, or verbal or nonverbal threatsâ€”makes people shut down & productivity ceases.
quotes.author: John Stoker

quotes.quote: Authority doesn't work without prestige, or prestige without distance.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: No authority is higher than reality.
quotes.author: Peter Nivio Zarlenga

quotes.quote: Authority is mainly a moral power; therefore, it must first call upon the conscience, that is, upon the duty that each person has to contribute willingly to the common good.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: To punish me for my contempt for authority, fate made me an authority myself.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It is in our authority and power to stop torment and sickness and deliver people from vanity.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Authentic spiritual authority is what puts you in touch with reality.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: It is not wisdom but Authority that makes a law.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: Authority confined in you does not make you a leader. It is the authority created by you that makes you influence people with your purpose.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Authority is ability to rule. Dominion is rulership.
quotes.author: Sherry K. White

quotes.quote: Authority could derive from passion, not pieces of paper.
quotes.author: Daniel Mendelsohn

quotes.quote: Real spiritual authority has to do with the truth of the actual words being spoken, and the spirit of the person behind the words. Really, authority is about truth: honest-living truth.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: Authority is never without hate.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Authority has to exist before it can be limited, and it is authority that is in scarce supply in those modernizing countries where government is at the mercy of alienated intellectuals, rambunctious colonels, and rioting students.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Marcos

quotes.quote: Authority is by nothing so much strengthened and confirmed as by custom; for no man easily distrusts the things which he and all men have been always bred up to.
quotes.author: William Temple

quotes.quote: Authority is something from which we are constantly subtracting, of which there remains always a residue, and which we attempt to make smaller and smaller.
quotes.author: Federica Montseny

quotes.quote: The authority of any governing institution must stop at its citizen's skin.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Power is like being a lady... if you have to tell people you are, you aren't.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Moral authority is never retained by any attempt to hold on to it. It comes without seeking and is retained without effort.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Authority forgets a dying king.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with the best people you can find, delegate authority, and don't interfere as long as the policy you've decided upon is being carried out.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The authority of those who teach is often an obstacle to those who want to learn.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Authority is a solvent of humanity: look at any husband, any father of a family, and note the absorption of the person by the persona, the individual by the role. Then multiply the family, and the authority, by some hundreds and see the effect upon a sea-captain, to say nothing of an absolute monarch. Surely man in general is born to be oppressed or solitary, if he is to be fully human; unless it so happens that he is immune to the poison.
quotes.author: Patrick O'Brian

quotes.quote: Authority must be respected and chosen wisely.
quotes.author: Lech Walesa

quotes.quote: You can't stop a teacher when they want to do something. They just do it.
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: Authority is not a power, it is a responsibility.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Authority to dream is not given, it is taken. Take it. Do not let the judgment of others be the final word. Without a doubt, if there is a one-word, one-step cure for bad peg moments, that word is perseverance. Let that be your final word.
quotes.author: J. Loren Norris

quotes.quote: The only ship you can truly steer in this ocean is the one you're sailing. Quit trying to alter the winds; harness them.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Authority, without any condition and reservation, belongs to the nation.
quotes.author: Mustafa Kemal Ataturk

quotes.quote: Authority without wisdom is like a heavy axe without an edge, fitter to bruise than polish.
quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.quote: Authority in its very nature prevents the full awareness of oneself and therefore ultimately destroys freedom; in freedom alone can there be creativeness.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: No man has any natural authority over his fellow men.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: The man whose authority is recent is always stern.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: Whenever there is authority, there is a natural inclination to disobedience.
quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.quote: Wherever there is a man who exercises authority, there is a man who resists authority.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Authority is established by God for the wellbeing of His people.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: When you make your peace with authority, you become authority.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: We have one authority and one law and everyone has the responsibility to follow that law and that authority.
quotes.author: Mahmoud Abbas

quotes.quote: Authority has every reason to fear the skeptic, for authority can rarely survive in the face of doubt.
quotes.author: Vita Sackville-West

quotes.quote: Nothing strengthens authority so much as silence.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: The wisest have the most authority.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Authority, when first detecting chaos at its heels, will entertain the vilest schemes to save its orderly facade.
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.quote: The ultimate authority must always rest with the individual's own reason and critical analysis.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Moral authority comes from following universal and timeless principles like honesty, integrity, treating people with respect.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Blind belief in authority is the greatest enemy of truth.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Blind belief in authority is the greatest enemy of truth.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The foundation of morality should not be made dependent on myth nor tied to any authority lest doubt about the myth or about the legitimacy of the authority imperil the foundation of sound judgment and action.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: My relationship to power and authority is that I'm all for it. People need somebody to watch over them. Ninety-five percent of the people in the world need to be told what to do and how to behave.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: It is the first responsibility of every citizen to question authority.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The exercise of authority over the same area by two States is a contradiction.
quotes.author: Benjamin Tucker

quotes.quote: You can delegate authority, but you cannot delegate responsibility.
quotes.author: Byron Dorgan

quotes.quote: He who rules by moral force is like the pole star, which remains in place while all the lesser stars do homage to it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: There is far too much law for those who can afford it and far too little for those who cannot.
quotes.author: Derek Bok

quotes.quote: A leading authority is anyone who has guessed right more than once.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: In questions of science, the authority of a thousand is not worth the humble reasoning of a single individual.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: The defiance of established authority, religious and secular, social and political, as a world-wide phenomenon may well one day be accounted the outstanding event of the last decade.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Men in authority will always think that criticism of their policies is dangerous. They will always equate their policies with patriotism, and find criticism subversive.
quotes.author: Henry Steele Commager

quotes.quote: Liberty is the possibility of doubting, the possibility of making a mistake, the possibility of searching and experimenting, the possibility of saying No to any authority - literary, artistic, philosophic, religious, social and even political.
quotes.author: Ignazio Silone

quotes.quote: Because power corrupts, society's demands for moral authority and character increase as the importance of the position increases.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Nothing is more gratifying to the mind of man than power or dominion.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: The key to successful leadership today is influence, not authority.
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: Anyone who conducts an argument by appealing to authority is not using his intelligence; he is just using his memory.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: By liberty I mean the assurance that every man shall be protected in doing what he believes to be his duty against the influences of authority and majorities, custom and opinion.
quotes.author: Lord Acton

quotes.quote: Moral authority is never retained by any attempt to hold on to it. It comes without seeking and is retained without effort.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Those who enjoy responsibility usually get it; those who merely like exercising authority usually lose it.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Always acknowledge a fault. This will throw those in authority off their guard and give you an opportunity to commit more.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: To lodge all power in one party and keep it there is to insure bad government and the sure and gradual deterioration of the public morals.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Freedom of conscience entails more dangers than authority and despotism.
quotes.author: Michel Foucault

quotes.quote: One could write a history of science in reverse by assembling the solemn pronouncements of highest authority about what could not be done and could never happen.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Freedom is the recognition that no single person, no single authority or government has a monopoly on the truth, but that every individual life is infinitely precious, that every one of us put in this world has been put there for a reason and has something to offer.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The disappearance of a sense of responsibility is the most far-reaching consequence of submission to authority.
quotes.author: Stanley Milgram

quotes.quote: In order for a war to be just, three things are necessary. First, the authority of the sovereign... Secondly, a just cause... Thirdly... a rightful intention.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Leave no authority existing not responsible to the people.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Football is like life it requires perseverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Man, proud man, Drest in a little brief authority, Most ignorant of what he's most assured.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: When male authors write love stories, the heroine tends to end up dead.
quotes.author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quotes.quote: The great authors were great readers, and one way to understand them is to read the books they read.
quotes.author: Mortimer Adler

quotes.quote: There are two classes of authors: the one write the history of their times, the other their biography.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Before publishers' blurbs were invented, authors had to make their reputations by writing.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Authors and uncaptured criminals are the only people free from routine.
quotes.author: Vachel Lindsay

quotes.quote: The reciprocal civility of authors is one of the most risible scenes in the farce of life.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The great authors share their souls with us â€” literally.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: All great authors are seers.
quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

quotes.quote: Grave authors say, and witty poets sing, That honest wedlock is a glorious thing.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of authors - subjective and objective. Introverts are more inward looking.
quotes.author: Ruskin Bond

quotes.quote: Authors are ordinary people who usually start to live apart, in the imagination, because they dont fit in with normal, healthy people.
quotes.author: Henry Williamson

quotes.quote: Authors are sometimes like tomcats: They distrust all the other toms but they are kind to kittens.
quotes.author: Malcolm Cowley

quotes.quote: Different authors write different ways, have different relationships with their audiences, and those are all legitimate.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: As long as thriller authors teach us about our world, they'll be relevant.
quotes.author: David Morrell

quotes.quote: Authors must not, like Chinese soldiers, expect to win victories by turning somersets in the air.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Authors do not choose a story to write, the story chooses us.
quotes.author: Richard Denney

quotes.quote: Authors are like cattle going to a fair: those of the same field can never move on without butting one another.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: Authors, like coins, grow dear as they grow old: It is the rust we value, not the gold.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Few sensible authors are happy discussing the creative process--it is, after all, black magic.
quotes.author: Edward Albee

quotes.quote: The trouble is when people read about authors, they don't feel compelled to read the authors' work.
quotes.author: Donna Tartt

quotes.quote: Authors like cats because they are such quiet, lovable, wise creatures, and cats like authors for the same reasons.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: Authors in general don't have a lot of money, and lawsuits are expensive.
quotes.author: James D. Macdonald

quotes.quote: Let us now peruse our ancient authors, for out of the old fields must come the new corn.
quotes.author: Edward Coke

quotes.quote: The sacred-souls of authors are displayed in the beauty of their books.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Many contemporary authors drink more than they write.
quotes.author: Maxim Gorky

quotes.quote: Most authors have one idea per book. Shakespeare had two per sentence.
quotes.author: Lauren Hutton

quotes.quote: Young authors give their brains much exercise and little food.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Authors from whom others steal should not complain, but rejoice. Where there is no game there are no poachers.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: All authors to their own defects are blind.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: View other authors as your allies rather than your competition.
quotes.author: Shannon Love

quotes.quote: After all, it is a common weakness of young authors to put too much into their papers.
quotes.author: Ronald Fisher

quotes.quote: Good authors, too, who once knew better words now only use four-letter words writing prose... anything goes.
quotes.author: Cole Porter

quotes.quote: The authors of book reviews would consider themselves dishonored were they to mention, as they should, the subject of the book.
quotes.author: Louis Aragon

quotes.quote: Those authors who would find many readers, must endeavour to please while they instruct.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Authors do not supply imaginations, they expect their readers to have their own, and to use it.
quotes.author: Nella Larsen

quotes.quote: Those authors who appear sometimes to forget they are writers, and remember they are men, will be our favorites.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The wittiest authors evoke a barely perceptible smile.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Authors always take rejection badly. They equate it with infanticide.
quotes.author: P. D. James

quotes.quote: It is impossible for authors to discover beauties in one another's works; they have eyes only for spots and blemishes.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: The latest authors, like the most ancient, strove to subordinate the phenomena of nature to the laws of mathematics.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: Stealing from one author is plagiarism; from many authors, research.
quotes.author: Walter Moers

quotes.quote: Great editors do not discover nor produce great authors; great authors create and produce great publishers.
quotes.author: John Farrar

quotes.quote: We ourselve are the authors of almost all our woes and griefs, of which we so unreasonably complain.
quotes.author: Giacomo Casanova

quotes.quote: Best selling authors are always worth listening to, even if you choose to ignore their advice.
quotes.author: Michael Dirda

quotes.quote: Few authors are so interesting as their work - they generally reserve their wit or trenchant sarcasm for their books.
quotes.author: Ethel Brilliana Tweedie

quotes.quote: The faults of great authors are generally excellences carried to an excess.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: We are the authors of our own fate-we write it each day with every one of our actions.
quotes.author: Félix José Palma

quotes.quote: Authors hide their big thefts by putting small ones between quotation marks.
quotes.author: Paul Eldridge

quotes.quote: Authors and lovers always suffer some infatuation, from which only absence can set them free.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Authors are magpies, echoing each other's words and seizing avidly on anything that glitters.
quotes.author: Bergen Evans

quotes.quote: Autism is not the end of the world, just the beginning of a new one.
quotes.author: Sally Meyer

quotes.quote: I LOOK AT AUTISM LIKE A BUS ACCIDENT, AND YOU DON'T BECOME CURED FROM A BUS ACCIDENT, BUT YOU CAN RECOVER.
quotes.author: Jenny McCarthy

quotes.quote: AUTISM IS AN EXTREMELY VARIABLE DISORDER.
quotes.author: Temple Grandin

quotes.quote: Autism doesn't have to define a person. Artists with autism are like anyone else: They define themselves through hard work and individuality.
quotes.author: Adrienne Bailon

quotes.quote: One of the hardest things for a person with autism to do is believe in themselves. But autistics have every right to be as proud as anyone.
quotes.author: Stuart Duncan

quotes.quote: If you can't see the gift in having a child with autism, you're focusing too much on the autism and not enough on the child.
quotes.author: Stuart Duncan

quotes.quote: Autism ? offers a chance for us to glimpse an awe-filled vision of the world that might otherwise pass us by.
quotes.author: Dr. Colin Zimbleman

quotes.quote: Autism is not a choice. Acceptance is. Imagine if the opposite was true.
quotes.author: Stuart Duncan

quotes.quote: Autism is not a disability, it's a different ability.
quotes.author: Stuart Duncan

quotes.quote: I do not suffer from Autism, but I do suffer from the way you treat me.
quotes.author: Tyler Durdin

quotes.quote: One thing I'm learning about Autism, is that there is no right or wrong way of living with it.
quotes.author: Danielle Burnett

quotes.quote: I hear things more loudly,I see things more clearly,I smell things more strongly,I feel things you don't,I taste things differently, I have autism.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Autism, like a rainbow, has a bright side and a dark side and even though it can mean rough weather, it can be beautiful.
quotes.author: Stuart Duncan

quotes.quote: It's amazing how autism affects the whole family.
quotes.author: Kevin Krueger

quotes.quote: I don't need autism awareness,Autism acceptance will do just fine.
quotes.author: Jiheishou Daigakusha

quotes.quote: I have autism. It is not a disorder or a disease. IGNORANCE is a disorder AND a disease. IT needs to be eradicated.
quotes.author: Robert Moran

quotes.quote: People with autism don't need wheelchairs, artifical legs, or a guide dog. Their prosthesis is people.
quotes.author: Ruth Christ Sullivan

quotes.quote: If by some magic, autism had been eradicated from the face of the earth, then men would still be socializing in front of a wood fire at the entrance to a cave.
quotes.author: Temple Grandin

quotes.quote: It seems that for success in science or art, a dash of autism is essential.
quotes.author: Hans Asperger

quotes.quote: Nobel prize-calibre geniuses often have certain core autistic features at their heart.
quotes.author: Allan Snyder

quotes.quote: Think of it: disability is usually defined in terms of what is missing...But autism...is as much about what is abundant as what is missing, an over-expression of the very traits that make our species unique.
quotes.author: Paul Collins

quotes.quote: Autists are the ultimate square pegs, and the problem with pounding a square peg into a round hole is not that the hammering is hard work. It's that you're destroying the peg.
quotes.author: Paul Collins

quotes.quote: If I could snap my fingers and be nonautistic, I would not. Autism is part of what I am.
quotes.author: Temple Grandin

quotes.quote: Autism, is part of my child, it's not everything he is. My child is so much more than a diagnosis.
quotes.author: S.L Coehlo

quotes.quote: Autism can't define me. I define autism.
quotes.author: Kerry Magro

quotes.quote: Autism is not a disease, rather a disability that every day I strive to become an A-bility.
quotes.author: Kerry Magro

quotes.quote: If you've met one person with autism, you've met one person with autism.
quotes.author: Stephen Shore

quotes.quote: Sometimes all a parent needs is to know the impossible is actually possible. Hope goes a long way when it comes to Autism.
quotes.author: Liz Becker

quotes.quote: It is never too late to expand the mind of a person on the autism spectrum.
quotes.author: Dr. Temple Grandin

quotes.quote: Don't think that there's a different , better child 'hiding' behind the autism. This is your child. Love the child in front of you.
quotes.author: Claire Scovell Lazebnik

quotes.quote: A mother's love for her child is like nothing else in the world. It knows no law, no pity, it dares all things and crushes down remorselessly all that stands in its path.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I do not at all understand the mystery of grace only that it meets us where we are but does not leave us where it found us.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: I do not suffer from Autism, but I do suffer from the way you treat me.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.quote: I am different, not less
quotes.author: Dr. Temple Grandin

quotes.quote: Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Start with what is right rather than what is acceptable.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: We should consider every day lost on which we have not danced at least once.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Not everything that steps out of line, and thus "abnormal", must necessarily be "inferior".
quotes.author: Hans Asperger

quotes.quote: Children must be taught how to think, not what to think.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It was ability that mattered, not disability, which is a word I'm not crazy about using.
quotes.author: Marlee Matlin

quotes.quote: Disability is a matter of perception. If you can do just one thing well, you're needed by someone.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: A person with autism lives in his own world, while a person with Asperger's lives in our world, in a way of his own choosing.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: If they can't learn the way we teach, we teach the way they learn.
quotes.author: Ole Ivar Lovaas

quotes.quote: Children with special needs inspire a very, very special love.
quotes.author: Sarah Palin

quotes.quote: If you can't see the gift in having a child with autism, you're focusing too much on the autism and not enough on the child.
quotes.author: Stuart Duncan

quotes.quote: It is never too late to expand the mind of a person on the autism spectrum.
quotes.author: Temple Grandin

quotes.quote: Autism is a neurological disorder. It's not caused by bad parenting. It's caused by, you know, abnormal development in the brain. The emotional circuits in the brain are abnormal. And there also are differences in the white matter, which is the brain's computer cables that hook up the different brain departments.
quotes.author: Temple Grandin

quotes.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
quotes.author: Xunzi

quotes.quote: Don't waste time collecting other people's autographs; rather devote it to making your own autograph worth collecting.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The thrill of autograph collecting is getting close to a world you're not part of.
quotes.author: Matthew Bourne

quotes.quote: Every job is a self-portrait of the person who does it. Autograph your work with excellence.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The difference between a signature and an autograph is that the second one has higher face value on a plain paper than the first one even on a cheque.
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.quote: Autograph your life with a signature of excellence.
quotes.author: Mark F. LaMoure

quotes.quote: Success is when your signature becomes an autograph.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Fame is being asked to sign your autograph on the back of a cigarette packet.
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.quote: You don't have to do the picture, you have to do the autograph, but it's important to take that moment to make a human connection.
quotes.author: Cindy Crawford

quotes.quote: The people who ask me for my autograph are the people who've put me here today, and you can't afford to forget that.
quotes.author: Katie Price

quotes.quote: The penalty of greatness is to write autographs.
quotes.author: Sophie Irene Loeb

quotes.quote: Why is my autograph so little in demand, except on checks?
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: I have never in my whole life asked for an autograph. It seems a little ... unnecessary.
quotes.author: Jack White

quotes.quote: If anyone asks for your autograph they're showing you respect and give it back to them.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: Doing autograph sessions all day is not what I signed up for. But that's just all part of not being famous.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Autographs and pictures do get a little old, but I don't mind if the people want it.
quotes.author: Dominique Moceanu

quotes.quote: As technology advances, it reverses the characteristics of every situation again and again. The age of automation is going to be the age of 'do it yourself.'
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: This may be the age of automation, but love is still being made by hand.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Automation applied to an inefficient operation will magnify the inefficiency.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Automation and technology don't cure behavioral ruts: they just create new instances of them.
quotes.author: Kenneth Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Automation does not need to be our enemy. I think machines can make life easier for men, if men do not let the machines dominate them.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Mechanization best serves mediocrity.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Besides black art, there is only automation and mechanization.
quotes.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

quotes.quote: Our age of mechanization leads along a road ending with man himself as a machine. Only the spirit of singing can save us from this fate.
quotes.author: Zoltan Kodaly

quotes.quote: In many instances, automation in itself facilitates more diversification opportunities, in freeing up production capacity and enabling shorter run, more targeted copies, and it can also be essential in the interface with additional and new processes such as web drying, inkjetting etc.
quotes.author: Eric Bell

quotes.quote: Automation and technology would be a great boon if it were creative if there were more leisure more opportunity to engage in raising a family providing guidance to the young all the stuff we say we need. America will work if we’re all in it together. It’ll work when there’s a shared sense of destiny. It can be done!
quotes.author: Jerry Brown
