quotes.quote: Marketing automation is the technology that propels your business into a new era of relationship based marketing with quantifiable results. When powerful technology meets effective implementation and internal process management, your company will soon find itself on a journey that leads to new heights of business success.
quotes.author: Jon Miller

quotes.quote: The overwhelming pressure of mechanization evident in the newspaper and the magazine, has led to the creation of vast monopolies of communication. Their entrenched positions involve a continuous, systematic, ruthless destruction of elements of permanence essential to cultural activity.
quotes.author: Harold Innis

quotes.quote: Computerization brings about an essential change in the way the worker can know the world and, with it, a crisis of confidence inthe possibility of certain knowledge.
quotes.author: Shoshana Zuboff

quotes.quote: The more we reduce ourselves to machines in the lower things, the more force we shall set free to use in the higher.
quotes.author: Anna Brackett

quotes.quote: And a revolution of automation finds machines replacing men in the mines and mills of America, without replacing their incomes or their training or their needs to pay the family doctor, grocer and landlord.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: An organised system of machines, to which motion is communicated by the transmitting mechanism from a central automation, is the most developed form of production by machinery.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: All in all, I don't think robots and greater automation can bring about a utopian world as I imagined it would as a kid 50 years ago.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: For man, autumn is a time of harvest, of gathering together. For nature, it is a time of sowing, of scattering abroad.
quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

quotes.quote: It was one of those perfect English autumnal days which occur more frequently in memory than in life.
quotes.author: P.D. James

quotes.quote: Winter is an etching, spring a watercolor, summer an oil painting and autumn a mosaic of them all.
quotes.author: Stanley Horowitz

quotes.quote: Bittersweet October. The mellow, messy, leaf-kicking, perfect pause between the opposing miseries of summer and winter.
quotes.author: Carol Bishop Hipps

quotes.quote: No spring nor summer's beauty hath such grace As I have seen in one Autumnal face....
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: Autumn carries more gold in its pocket than all the other seasons.
quotes.author: Jim Bishop

quotes.quote: Autumn is a second spring when every leaf's a flower.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Autumn arrives in the early morning, but spring at the close of a winter day.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: Action must be taken at the first signs of disruption or decay, otherwise disaster will follow as ice-bound water follows brief autumn frosts.
quotes.author: I Ching

quotes.quote: Every leaf speaks bliss to me, fluttering from the autumn tree.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: Autumn, the year's last, loveliest smile.
quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.quote: No spring nor summer beauty hath such grace, As I have seen in one autumnal face.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: The Autumn is old; The sere leaves are flying; He hath gather'd up gold, And now he is dying; Old age, begin sighing!
quotes.author: Thomas Hood

quotes.quote: The teeming Autumn big with rich increase, bearing the wanton burden of the prime like widowed wombs after their lords decease.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: No man can taste the fruits of autumn while he is delighting his scent with the flowers of spring.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Delicious autumn! My very soul is wedded to it, and if I were a bird I would fly about the earth seeking the successive autumns.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: There is a harmony in autumn, and a luster in its sky, which through the summer is not heard or seen, as if it could not be, as if it had not been!
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Now Autumn's fire burns slowly along the woods and day by day the dead leaves fall and melt.
quotes.author: William Allingham

quotes.quote: Autumn wins you best by this, its mute Appeal to sympathy for its decay.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Wild is the music of autumnal winds the faded woods.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The wind blows out, the bubble dies; The spring entomb'd in autumn lies; The dew dries up; the star is shot; The flight is past, and man forgot.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Nothing is more fleeting than external form, which withers and alters like the flowers of the field at the appearance of autumn.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: Autumn is a season followed immediately by looking forward to spring.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: The leaves fall, the wind blows, and the farm country slowly changes from the summer cottons into its winter wools.
quotes.author: Henry Beston

quotes.quote: October is a symphony of permanence and change.
quotes.author: Bonaro W. Overstreet

quotes.quote: If winter is slumber and spring is birth, and summer is life, then autumn rounds out to be reflection. It's a time of year when the leaves are down and the harvest is in and the perennials are gone. Mother Earth just closed up the drapes on another year and it's time to reflect on what's come before.
quotes.author: Mitchell Burgess

quotes.quote: When the bold branches Bid farewell to rainbow leaves - Welcome wool sweaters.
quotes.author: B. Cybrill

quotes.quote: In the garden, Autumn is, indeed the crowning glory of the year, bringing us the fruition of months of thought and care and toil. And at no season, safe perhaps in Daffodil time, do we get such superb colour effects as from August to November.
quotes.author: Rose G. Kingsley

quotes.quote: Earth's crammed with heaven, And every common bush afire with God; And only he who sees takes off his shoes; The rest sit round it and pluck blackberries.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: Thus sung the shepherds till th' approach of night, The skies yet blushing with departing light, When falling dews with spangles deck'd the glade, And the low sun had lengthened every shade.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Autumn is the hardest season. The leaves are all falling, and they're falling like they're falling in love with the ground.
quotes.author: Andrea Gibson

quotes.quote: Love the trees until their leaves fall off, then encourage them to try again next year.
quotes.author: Chad Sugg

quotes.quote: Nature gives to every time and season some beauties of its own.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The heart of autumn must have broken here, and poured its treasure upon the leaves.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bates

quotes.quote: Autumn leaves don't fall, they fly. They take their time and wander on this their only chance to soar.
quotes.author: Delia Owens

quotes.quote: It was a beautiful, bright autumn day, with air like cider and a sky so blue you could drown in it.
quotes.author: Diana Gabaldon

quotes.quote: I hope I can be the autumn leaf, who looked at the sky and lived. And when it was time to leave, gracefully it knew life was a gift.
quotes.author: Dodinsky

quotes.quote: A wind has blown the rain away and blown the sky away and all the leaves away, and the trees stand. I think, I too, have known autumn too long.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: Everyone must take time to sit and watch the leaves turn.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Lawrence

quotes.quote: Besides the autumn poets sing, a few prosaic days, a little this side of the snow, and that side of the haze.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Life starts all over again when it gets crisp in the fall.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Is not this a true autumn day? Just the still melancholy that I love that makes life and nature harmonize.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The goldenrod is yellow, the corn is turning brown. The trees in apple orchards with fruit are bending down.
quotes.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quotes.quote: I would rather sit on a pumpkin, and have it all to myself, than be crowded on a velvet cushion.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Listen! The wind is rising and the air is wild with leaves, we have had our summer evenings, now for October eves.
quotes.author: Humbert Wolfe

quotes.quote: Autumn seemed to arrive suddenly that year. The morning of the first September was crisp and golden as an apple.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: There is something incredibly nostalgic and significant about the annual cascade of Autumn leaves.
quotes.author: Joe. L. Wheeler

quotes.quote: How beautifully the leaves grow old! How full of light and color are their last days!
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: I'm so glad I live in a world where there are Octobers.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: I loved Autumn, the one season of the year that God seemed to have put there just for the beauty of it.
quotes.author: Lee Maynard

quotes.quote: The fallen leaves in the forest seemed to make even the ground glow and burn with light.
quotes.author: Malcolm Lowry

quotes.quote: I cannot endure to waste anything so precious as autumnal sunshine by staying in the house.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: And the sun took a step back, the leaves lulled themselves to sleep and autumn was awakened.
quotes.author: Nilanjana Sarkar

quotes.quote: Don't you love New York in the fall? It makes me want to buy school supplies. I would send you a bouquet of newly sharpened pencils if I knew your name and address.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: October, the extravagant sister, has ordered an immense amount of the most gorgeous forest tapestry for her grand reception.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: My sorrow, when she’s here with me, thinks these dark days of autumn rain are beautiful as days can be. She loves the bare, the withered tree, She walks the sodden pasture lane.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Autumn is the mellower season, and what we lose in flowers we more than gain in fruits.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: A fallen leaf is nothing more than a summer’s wave goodbye.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Autumn is the season to find contentment at home by paying attention to what we already have.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: And all the lives we ever lived and all the lives to be are full of trees and changing leaves.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: To most people, the sky is the limit. To those who love aviation, the sky is home.
quotes.author: Jerry Crawford

quotes.quote: The highest art form of all is a human being in control of himself and his airplane in flight, urging the spirit of a machine to match his own.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Lovers of air travel find it exhilarating to hang poised between the illusion of immortality and the fact of death.
quotes.author: Alexander Chase

quotes.quote: Sometimes, flying feels too godlike to be attained by man. Sometimes, the world from above seems too beautiful, too wonderful, too distant for human eyes to see.
quotes.author: Charles A. Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Aviation is proof that given the will, we have the capacity to achieve the impossible.
quotes.author: Eddie Rickenbacker

quotes.quote: Aviation has struck a delicately balanced world, a world where stability was already giving way to the pressure of new dynamic forces, a world dominated by a mechanical, materialist, Western European civilization.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Fly and you will catch the swallow.
quotes.author: James Howell

quotes.quote: Mistakes are inevitable in aviation, especially when one is still learning new things. The trick is to not make the mistake that will kill you.
quotes.author: Stephen Coonts

quotes.quote: Aviation is a dynamic profession. The rate of obsolescence of equipment is high and new aircraft have to be placed in inventory periodically in order to stay abreast of the requirements of modern war.
quotes.author: Keith B. McCutcheon

quotes.quote: Pilots take no special joy in walking. Pilots like flying.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: Aviation records don't fall until someone is willing to mortgage the present for the future.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: The desire to fly is an idea handed down to us by our ancestors who looked enviously on the birds soaring freely through space on the infinite highway of the air.
quotes.author: Wilbur Wrigh

quotes.quote: Any pilot can describe the mechanics of flying. What it can do for the spirit of man is beyond description.
quotes.author: Barry Goldwater

quotes.quote: Flying was a very tangible freedom. In those days, it was beauty, adventure, discovery the epitome of breaking into new worlds.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Aviation is the branch of engineering that is least forgiving of mistakes.
quotes.author: Freeman Dyson

quotes.quote: In combat flying, fancy precision aerobatic work is really not of much use. Instead, it is the rough maneuver which succeeds.
quotes.author: Erich Hartmann

quotes.quote: Flying is more than a sport and more than a job; flying is pure passion and desire, which fill a lifetime.
quotes.author: Adolf Galland

quotes.quote: Aviation constituted a new and possibly decisive element in preventing or fighting a war, and I was in a unique position to observe European aviation especially in its military aspects.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Flying prevails whenever a man and his airplane are put to a test of maximum performance.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Aviation is going to control the world economically and militarily whether we like it or not. Airpower is not merely military aviation, it is also civilian aviation and airpower is peace power.
quotes.author: Roscoe Turne

quotes.quote: Aviation is fine as a sport. But as an instrument of war, it is worthless.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Foch

quotes.quote: Aviation will give new nourishment to the religious sprit of mankind. It will add airspace to those other great heighteners of the cosmic mood: the wood, the sea, the desert.
quotes.author: Christian Morgenstern

quotes.quote: Aeronautics was neither an industry nor a science. It was a miracle.
quotes.author: Igor Sikorsky

quotes.quote: The exhilaration of flying is too keen, the pleasure too great, for it to be neglected as a sport.
quotes.author: Orville Wright

quotes.quote: Flying is a lot like playing a musical instrument; you're doing so many things and thinking of so many other things, all at the same time. It becomes a spiritual experience.
quotes.author: Dusty Mctavish

quotes.quote: The fundamental magic of flying, a miracle that has nothing to do with any of its practical purposes of speed, accessibility, and convenience and will not change as they change.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: In reference to flying through thunderstorms; A pilot may earn his full pay for that year in less than two minutes. At the time of incident he would gladly return the entire amount for the privilege of being elsewhere.
quotes.author: Ernest K. Gann

quotes.quote: I fly because it releases my mind from the tyranny of petty things.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Never quit. Never give up. Fly it to the end.
quotes.author: Chuck Aaron

quotes.quote: The only characteristic all airliners share is that upon proper urging they are normally capable of leaving the earth's surface.
quotes.author: Ernest K. Gann

quotes.quote: Flight is the only truly new sensation than men have achieved in modern history.
quotes.author: James Dickey

quotes.quote: In aviation they have auto pilot and color radar and a lot of other instrumentation that is a backup for pilots. It's really brought the incidents of plane crashes way down. Same thing ought to happen in the medical industry, I think.
quotes.author: Dennis Quaid

quotes.quote: Can there exist an aircraft in space without a pair of steel wings.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Can the magnanimous aircraft hovering at unprecedented heights in the air; ever dream of maneuvering through the crowded city streets?
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: When i fly in the aircraft at unsurpassable heights from ground / The flight steward serves tall beer mugs of juice / I feel like floating in blue air of the bare sky / With my body strapped firmly to chords of parachute.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: In the wings of the overwhelmingly zipping aircraft; / I ecstatically felt as if I was being spell bindingly devoured; / By a majestically volatile fervor to gallop resurgently; / Throughout the tenure of my diminutively impoverished life.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: How could you ever call a miserly auto rickshaw an aircraft; / Just because it increased its speed to a threadbare maximum; every once in a while?
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: To get out of the flying aircraft; / I used a buoyant parachute to blissfully cascade down on the verdant and perpetually green lawns.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: I wanted to be like the aircraft with twin pairs of ivory wings, / That hovered high in the sky for times immemorial; bereft of life yielding fuel.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: "In order to repair the discarded aircraft; / What was required was to refuel it with gasoline / Strengthen its tapered wings."
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote:
"The aircraft appeared astoundingly exhilarating when sighted on the Black tarmac; / With twin pairs of majestic wings projecting from its sides,
Lets make it even better by inhabiting the same; / Soaring high in the sky; / Abreast the satiny clouds."
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Aviation - and space travel, in particular - have always been especially captivating.
quotes.author: Felix Baumgartner

quotes.quote: Aviation is proof that given, the will, we have the capacity to achieve the impossible.
quotes.author: Eddie Rickenbacker

quotes.quote: Aviation is for the common man. My goal is to enable everyone to fly. It shouldn't be only for the rich.
quotes.author: Tony Fernandes

quotes.quote: Aviation is poetry ... It's the finest kind of moving around, you know, just as poetry is the finest way of using words.
quotes.author: Jessie Redmon Fauset

quotes.quote: Sports, entertainment and aviation are three of the most exciting professions in the world; you are dealing with the same magnitude.
quotes.author: John Travolta

quotes.quote: Aviation seems almost a gift from heaven to those Western nations who were already the leaders of their era, strengthening their leadership, their confidence, their dominance over other peoples.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: What the history of aviation has brought in the 20th century should inspire us to be inventors and explorers ourselves in the new century.
quotes.author: Bertrand Piccard

quotes.quote: A day can really slip by when you're deliberately avoiding what you're supposed to do.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Pain in this life is not avoidable, but the pain we create avoiding pain is avoidable.
quotes.author: R.D. Laing

quotes.quote: There is no avoidance in delay.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: It’s not avoidance if you actively plan to pursue it. Someday.
quotes.author: T.J. Klune

quotes.quote: Comfort is a stance of avoidance rather than the pursuit of excellence.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: If you avoid your truthful emotions and pain you will implode and contract into a diminished and feeble state.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: You cannot avoid what you fear because what you fear is inside of you.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Avoidance is paying forward that which I would be much wiser to pay off.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: People spend entire lifetimes trying to avoid the things that have already happened.
quotes.author: Silvia Hartmann

quotes.quote: Most of us will do anything to avoid facing ourselves
quotes.author: Lolly Daskal

quotes.quote: Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than exposure.
quotes.author: Hellen Keller

quotes.quote: When our purpose becomes avoidance, our life becomes a void.
quotes.author: Bill Crawford

quotes.quote: Avoidance of experiences is a fixation and it binds you to the world, it binds you to the personal self.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Avoiding problems you need to face is avoiding the life you need to live.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: You cannot find peace by avoiding life.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: There is no pain equal to that which two lovers can inflict on one another. This should be made clear to all who contemplate such a union. The avoidance of this pain is the beginning of wisdom, for it is strong enough to contaminate the rest of our lives.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Avoid those who seek friends in order to maintain a certain social status or to open doors they would not otherwise be able to approach.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Avoidance is a wonderful therapy
quotes.author: Maggie Stiefvater

quotes.quote: All work is the avoidance of harder work.
quotes.author: James Richardson

quotes.quote: Avoid being brainwashed or controlled by the opinions or attitudes of others.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: AvoidingÂ things that drain you is more important than gaining energy.

quotes.quote: The man who avoids debt doesn't have to worry aboutÂ avoidingÂ his creditors.

quotes.quote: AvoidingÂ problems you need to face isÂ avoidingÂ the life you need to live.

quotes.quote: Some refuse the loan of life to avoid the debt of death.

quotes.quote: Avoiding a bathtub because your parents tried to kill you in one isn't the same as avoiding your entire life by becoming a wolf.

quotes.quote: Many people are alive but don't touch the miracle of being alive.
quotes.author: ThÃ­ch Nháº¥t Háº¡nh

quotes.quote: To be awake is everything.

quotes.quote: We are awakened to the profound realization that the true path to liberation is to let go of everything.

quotes.quote: Be fully awake if you want to dream.

quotes.quote: Dream big while you sleep, and even bigger when you're awake.

quotes.quote: Awake. Be the witness of your thoughts. You are what observes, not what you observe.

quotes.quote: Mindfulness means being awake. It means knowing what you are doing.

quotes.quote: Do not just exist, be fully awake.

quotes.author: ThÃ­ch Nháº¥t Háº¡nh

quotes.quote: Prove to the world that you are alive, let your words breathe life into the nostrils of the universe.

quotes.quote: When you realize nothing is lacking, the whole world belongs to you.

quotes.quote: Today is life-the only life you are sure of. Make the most of today. Get interested in something. Shake yourself awake. Develop a hobby. Let the winds of enthusiasm sweep through you. Live today with gusto.

And in observing himself a man notices that self-observation itself brings about certain changes in his inner processes. He begins to understand that self-observation is an instrument of self-change, a means of awakening.

quotes.quote: An awake heart is like a sky that pours light.

quotes.quote: To be awake is the refreshness of being.

quotes.quote: It takes a person who is wide awake to make his dream come true.

quotes.quote: Each morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.

quotes.quote: Live the actual moment. Only this actual moment is life.

quotes.quote: To awake from death is to die in peace.

quotes.quote: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.â€Â

quotes.quote: Lose an hour in the morning, and you will be all day hunting for it.â€
quotes.author: Richard Whately

quotes.quote: If you really want to dream, be fully awake.

quotes.quote: Remember that there is only one important time and it is Now. The present moment is the only time over which we have dominion.

quotes.quote: The awakening of consciousness is the next evolutionary step for mankind.

quotes.quote: Awakening into love is a lifelong path.

quotes.quote: A single event can awaken within us a stranger totally unknown to us. To live is to be slowly born.

quotes.quote: Only by awakening can you know the true meaning of that word.

quotes.quote: When we awaken to our truth, we realize we are free.

quotes.quote: This days one must be careful to avoid awakening the pain of another.

quotes.quote:
Awakening begins when a man realizes that he is going nowhere
and does not know where to go.

quotes.quote: As awakening occurs, a powerful transformation takes place within you, and a new consciousness is born on earth.

quotes.quote: Every reform means awakening. Once truly awakened, the nation will not be satisfied with reform only in one department of life.

quotes.quote: Awakening is usually precipitated by the honest, sincere, inquiry into who you really are.

quotes.quote: Imitation is the first instinct of the awakening mind.

quotes.quote: Awakening begins when a man realizes that he is going nowhere and does not know where to go.

quotes.quote: Awakening is dynamic, Constantly evolving in accordance with life's realities.

quotes.quote: The perfect expression of receiving a lifetime award is to be working when they're handing it out.

quotes.quote: Award trophies, as opposed to letting the players define and claim their own. Ultimately, pay them to play so that their activity not only resembles work but is work.

quotes.quote: A plack on the wall won't change the world; it only shows your devotion.

quotes.quote: Awards and ceremonies are all an applause of discipline.

quotes.quote: The reward for work well done is the opportunity to do more.

quotes.quote: Awards become corroded, friends gather no dust.

quotes.quote: Awards are merely the badges of mediocrity.

quotes.quote: The award of a pure gold medal for poetry would flatter the recipient unduly: no poem ever attains such carat purity.

quotes.quote: The award is destined for scientists who do not fear to touch on some of the darkest aspects of being without betraying what they have achieved. On the contrary, they head in this direction.

quotes.quote: Awards are always a pleasant surprise. They are the candy floss parts of our job a lovely added extra to attract people's attention. The bottom line is that you want to sell tickets.

quotes.quote: Awards are like applause, and every actor likes to hear applause.

quotes.quote: Awards are meaningless for actors, unless they all play the same part.

quotes.quote: Raise you awareness and share your uniqueness to the world.

quotes.quote: Thought can organize the world so well that you are no longer able to see it.

quotes.quote: The awareness of our own strength makes us modest.

quotes.quote: You must live a life of self-consciousness always.

quotes.quote: Awareness returning home is awareness being enfolded by what it knows.

quotes.quote: Awareness is like the sun. When it shines on things, they are transformed.

quotes.quote: Contemplation is the highest expression of man's intellectual and spiritual life. It is that life itself, fully awake, fully active, fully aware that it is alive. It is a spiritual wonder. It is spontaneous awe at the sacredness of life, of being. It is gratitude for life, for awareness and for being

quotes.quote: Only a spiritual being has awareness.

quotes.quote: To become different from what we are, we must have some awareness of what we are.

quotes.quote: Awareness without emotion is a flame without fuel.

quotes.quote: If your awareness was strong enough, you could change the fate of a whole world without ever leaving your room.

quotes.quote: Don't let a day go by without asking who you are each time you let a new ingredient to enter your awareness.

quotes.quote: Awareness takes over from thinking. Instead of being in charge of your life, thinking becomes the servant of awareness.

quotes.quote: Awareness - Why do you have to shout / Awareness - You know, there is no doubt / Awareness - No one you have to blame / Awareness - Because we're all the same

quotes.quote: Just ignore now, their special need and / Allow your weakness / Look at my face and be the witness of my / Strange world
quotes.author: Anima Reforge

quotes.quote: Raise to new awareness / Individual way of life / A dated philosophy / Youth runs amok
quotes.author: Frank Gosdzik

quotes.quote: Raised to future awareness / Manipulation has failed / Rulers leaders / Anarchy will prevail now
quotes.author: Frank Gosdzik

quotes.quote: Awareness, the fruit of life / Awareness and happiness
quotes.author: Jan Johnston

quotes.quote: The bedrock of existence / A philosophical schism / Aware of its own awareness / Panpsychism
quotes.author: Panpsychism

quotes.quote: Goal of evolution, which grants the benefits of added awareness with / Unlimited boundness of happiness, also known as bliss
quotes.author: David K Lynch

quotes.quote: Awareness, becoming one with the longing for complete surrender to the / Higher self, which has potentially been waiting these long eons of time
quotes.author: David K Lynch

quotes.quote: Then I'll be smiling. / They litter me with small awareness! / Then they ask if I'm good enough / They litter me with small awareness / Just to wake me up / Why do the fools wake me up?
quotes.author: Matt Nathanson

quotes.quote: Mellowed by tones that calm the air / Shelters my nerves from awareness's lair / So comfortable with this ill-informed bliss / Close off reality with ignorance's kiss
quotes.author: Spike the Media

quotes.quote: And there's wisdom in awareness man existence just a trip / As I'm thinking in the clouds and I'm blazing a spliff / Tomorrow ain't promised, how many days did you live

quotes.quote: I bring awareness to my body as I'm breathing in / I give my thanks cause one day I might be leaving it
quotes.author: Hasan AlHasan

quotes.quote: The grace that comes from simply being / Is an ineffable energy / Yet awareness dances 'round itself / Distracted from finding true peace and purpose
quotes.author: Jakeypoo

quotes.quote: When I invite your awareness inside / I want to witness your love / And let it cleanse this sin / I want to keep this youth and remain free
quotes.author: Jakeypoo

quotes.quote: As you gain awareness and search for what is beyond /The light within brightens your path to contentment / I swear this fire won't burn / Skies screech bereave this universe
quotes.author: Muhammed Abdullah Al Mumin

quotes.quote: Know that you will find your own truth, your own path in your own way / Be free of material / True awareness comes from within
quotes.author: Muhammed Abdullah Al Mumin

quotes.quote: On a rocket to / The Fourth Dimension / Total self awareness / The intention
quotes.author: Galt MacDermot

quotes.quote: Overflowing senses / Heightened awareness / I hear my blood flow / I feel its caress / Whispering cosmos / Talking right to me / Unlimited, endless / God breathing through me
quotes.author: Martin Gore

quotes.quote: Each of us / A cell of awareness / Imperfect and incomplete / Genetic blends / With uncertain ends / On a fortune hunt / That's far too fleet
quotes.author: Geddy Lee

quotes.quote: And I stood above the burdens that puzzle you and me. / I became awareness that was shared with all around, / With the trees, the sky, the flowers, and the wind, the sun, the ground.

quotes.quote: The fear lies in my lack of awareness of the other side / Today I know that we are the same / Are the same, you and I / Different kind of skin, different set of eyes
quotes.author: Jermaine L Cole

quotes.quote: A joy, a depression, a meanness / Some momentary awareness comes / As an unexpected visitor
quotes.author: Coldplay

quotes.quote: In the dark of awareness / The arena of the blind / The hell you see is nearer than you think
quotes.author: Arien Van Weeseenbeek

quotes.quote: What once was / I wish no longer be / Fear of separation is no more / One cosmic breath-the whole eternity / Unbroken flow of awareness conquers entropy
quotes.author: Adam Darski

quotes.quote: One day with a smile a wound will heal / And with awareness feel / The Universe to shine / One day when immensity is near / This man will conquer fear
quotes.author: Donovan Leitch

quotes.quote: Awareness isn't something mysterious that you must practice; it isn't something that can be learned only from the speaker, or from some bearded gentlemen or other.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: To be conscious of our reactions, of our hidden motives and conditioned responses, this also is part of awareness.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: So, through awareness I begin to see myself as I actually am, the totality of myself.

quotes.quote: Being watchful from moment to moment of all its thoughts, its feelings, its reactions, unconscious as well as conscious, the mind is constantly discovering the significance of its own activities, which is self-knowledge.

quotes.quote: Awareness is of the total process of the mind, not just of one particular segment of that process.

quotes.quote: So be aware. Be more aware and aware of more. Be that very awareness of moreness and in that way become more.

quotes.quote: Let the awareness of moreness be your mantra.

quotes.quote: To experience life fully means to be fully and directly aware of all that we are experiencing in an immediate, sensuous and bodily way.

quotes.quote: True self awareness means just that - being aware of our current sense of self and of all other aspects of ourselves from a position and perspective outside them all.

quotes.quote: Awareness means 'having or showing realization, perception, or knowledge.'

quotes.quote: Once you become aware, you start to see that there is a relationship between the thoughts you have and the emotions you experience.
quotes.author: Barbara Abbate

quotes.quote: Becoming aware of your internal dialogues, feelings, emotions, thoughts, and images is a part of the process of self-discovery along the road to awareness.
quotes.author: Barbara Abbate

quotes.quote: Consciousness is the awareness of the power that you have over your thoughts.
quotes.author: Barbara Abbate

quotes.quote: In the direct path, awareness refers to an open, global clarity.
quotes.author: Greg Goode

quotes.quote: Awareness isn't mental or physical. It's that to which the body and the mind appear.
quotes.author: Greg Goode

quotes.quote: By such awareness of the world man can be aware of different implements.
quotes.author: V. Vycinas

quotes.quote: Such awareness is awareness of what is near and what is far, of what goes in what direction or goes in what place with respect to others and to all.
quotes.author: V. Vycinas

quotes.quote: Awareness is a name for the energy that enables us to see things as they really are.
quotes.author: Natalie Fee

quotes.quote: We notice something--something to do with our well-being and our sense of who we are--that we didn't notice before. This is awareness.
quotes.author: Natalie Fee

quotes.quote: You notice a connection between your actions and how you fell. This is awareness energy at work.
quotes.author: Natalie Fee

quotes.quote: The same goes for your awareness. The freer you are from what brings you down, the more awareness you have have of what truly lifts you up: your real needs.
quotes.author: Natalie Fee

quotes.quote: Happiness and inevitably away from the thing that serves you most: your awareness of the present moment.
quotes.author: Natalie Fee

quotes.quote: The awareness of a thing / Is not itself a thing, / It is a thing-free / Awareness.
quotes.author: Peter Wilberg

quotes.quote: The awareness of an impulse to act or speak / Is not itself an impulse to act or to speak. / Being free of impulses to act or speak, / It allows you to act and speak freely.
quotes.author: Peter Wilberg

quotes.quote: Remember then, / At all times and in all situations, that / Awareness alone is Freedom.
quotes.author: Peter Wilberg

quotes.quote: Consciousness in a world which with or consciousness is only a mechanism: damn uncomfortable situation.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: The world of waking consciousness represents for the creative imagination, a low level of reality.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Creation wasn't necessarily made for the sake of human consciousness, but consciousness is the human response to creation.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Consciousness is a magician who controls the demon of will.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: To increase consciousness is to increase mobility by metaphor.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Consciousness has a specific location where experiences are presented to a central point of awareness.
quotes.author: Daniel Dennett

quotes.quote: If I'm mistaken about seeing something, it's still true that I'm having an illusory experience; but how can I be mistaken about being conscious? Having an illusion implies being conscious.
quotes.author: Daniel Dennett

quotes.quote: Consciousness intervenes in our action only to frustrate their execution; consciousness is a perpetual interrogation of life, it is perhaps the ruin of life.
quotes.author: E.M. Cioran

quotes.quote: Consciousness: summa of our discomforts from birth to the present. Such discomforts have vanished; consciousness remains— but it has lost its origins, it doesn't even know what they were.
quotes.author: E.M. Cioran

quotes.quote: The ego, the subject of consciousness, comes into existence as a complex quantity which is constituted partly by the inherited disposition and partly by unconsciously acquired impressions and their attendant phenomena.
quotes.author: C.G. Jung

quotes.quote: Since it is the point of reference for the field of consciousness, the ego is the subject of all successful attempts at adaptation so far as these are achieved by the will.
quotes.author: C.G. Jung

quotes.quote: In the unconscious, one cannot judge because of the great darkness there, but in the conscious there is light, and so there are differences; there is a criterion in consciousness which gives one a measure by which to judge.
quotes.author: C.G. Jung

quotes.quote: The realization...made the nape of my neck feel like I'd just applied an ice pack.
quotes.author: Sue Grafton.

quotes.quote: Consciousness is the phenomenon whereby the universe's very existence is made known.
quotes.author: Roger Penrose

quotes.quote: Let us not look back in anger, nor forward in fear, but around in awareness.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Awareness allows us to get outside of our mind and observe it in action.
quotes.author: Dan Brule

quotes.quote: Wisdom tends to grow in proportion to one’s awareness of one’s ignorance.
quotes.author: Anthony De Mello

quotes.quote: Awareness is all about restoring your freedom to choose what you want instead of what your past imposes on you.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Awareness precedes change.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Once you awaken you become fully aware of your true potential.
quotes.author: ATGW

quotes.quote: Your awareness expands through action in the direction of your fears.
quotes.author: ATGW

quotes.quote: To be conscious means not simply to be, but to be reported, known, to have awareness of one's being added to that being.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: The fear of death comes from limited awareness.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: An awareness of our past is essential to the establishment of our personality and our identity as Africans.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie

quotes.quote: From the day an idea is conceptualized to the day the technology is built, carried out, and regulated, it's important to have that human awareness.
quotes.author: Fei-Fei Li

quotes.quote: Be present in all things and thankful for all things.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: You will never follow your own inner voice until you clear up the doubts in your mind.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Your own self-realization is the greatest service you can render the world.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: People who repeatedly attack your confidence and self-esteem are quite aware of your potential, even if you are not.
quotes.author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.quote: In still moments by the sea life seems large-drawn and simple. It is there we can see into ourselves.
quotes.author: Rolf Edberg

quotes.quote: Being fully conscious of one's whole process of thinking, and being able to go beyond tnat process, is awareness.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: To say that the mind can or cannot be free from its conditioning is still part of its conditioning, but to observe that conditioning without saying either is a furthering of awareness—awareness of the whole process of thinking.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: We stand in awe before that which cannot be seen. We respect with every fiber of our being that which cannot be explained.
quotes.author: Tite Kubo

quotes.quote: Create experiences that leave you in awe, for these will be the highlights of your life.
quotes.author: Ryan Blair

quotes.quote: The first act of awe, when man was struck with the beauty or wonder of Nature, was the first spiritual experience.
quotes.author: Henryk Skolimowski

quotes.quote: At the moment you are most in awe of all there is about life that you don't understand, you are closer to understanding it all than at any other time.
quotes.author: Jane Wagner

quotes.quote: Awe is the emotion of self-transcendence.
quotes.author: Jonathan Haidt

quotes.quote: When we're infused with either enthusiasm or awe or fondness, it changes what we see. It changes what we remember.
quotes.author: Robert Legato

quotes.quote: During the time men live without a common power to keep them all in awe, they are in that conditions called war; and such a war, as if of every man, against every man.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: The world is vast, beautiful, and fascinating, even awe-inspiring - but impersonal. It demands nothing of me, and allows me to demand nothing of it.
quotes.author: Herbert Simon

quotes.quote: Do not be awe struck by other people and try to copy them. Nobody can be you as efficiently as you can.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Because when beauty awes you, you must halt and try to catch your breath and your staggered heart.
quotes.author: Kate Elliott

quotes.quote: No sight is more provocative of awe than is the night sky.
quotes.author: Llewelyn Powys

quotes.quote: Familiarity with any great thing removes our awe of it.
quotes.author: L. Frank Baum

quotes.quote: There's no way we can possibly understand anything. But we can see things, we can perceive things, and we can wonder. We can just be in a world of awe and wonder. That's the best we can do.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: He who can no longer pause to wonder and stand rapt in awe is as good as dead; his eyes are closed.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Awe consumes any brand that ignites it.
quotes.author: Cynthia Ozick

quotes.quote: Social awkwardness is not a sin, in defense of liberty.
quotes.author: Matt Kibbe

quotes.quote: Between memory and reality there are awkward discrepancies.
quotes.author: Eileen Chang

quotes.quote: Art is awkward until technique has become an unconscious habit.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: If youre in an awkward position, feel comfortable enough to walk away.
quotes.author: Beau Mirchoff

quotes.quote: There is nothing so awkward as courting a woman whilst she is making sausages.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: Middle age is the awkward period when Father Time starts catching up with Mother Nature.
quotes.author: Harold Coffin

quotes.quote: Sometimes you feel awkward being what you're best at, you feel like you have to be something new.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: Our lives are awkward and fragile and we have only one thing to keep us sane: pity, and the man without pity is mad.
quotes.author: Edward Bond

quotes.quote: That awkward moment when you realize someone was actually home the whole time you were singing on the tops of your lungs.
quotes.author: Kasey Collin P. Dumdum

quotes.quote: A certain awkwardness marks the use of borrowed thoughts; but as soon as we have learned what to do with them, they become our own.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Awkwardness is a more real disadvantage than it is generally thought to be; it often occasions ridicule, it always lessens dignity.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Impoliteness is frequently the sign of an awkward modesty that loses its head when surprised and hopes to conceal this with rudeness.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: One of the most awkward things that can happen in a pub is when your pint-to-toilet cycle gets synchronised with a complete stranger.
quotes.author: Peter Kay

quotes.quote: Dating is great unless you don't like horrible awkwardness, lying, and a deep foreboding sense of disappointment that never goes away.
quotes.author: Dov Davidoff

quotes.quote: Dating is kind of hard. Like dinner or something like that. Like a forced awkward situation is very strange. Especially for me, for some reason.
quotes.author: Zac Efron

quotes.quote: The awkwardness of getting reward in a well-off society is that the creation of appetite often requires undoing the work of satisfying appetite.
quotes.author: George Ainslie

quotes.quote: Sometimes there is such beauty in awkwardness. There's love and emotion trying to express itself, but at the time, it just ends up being awkward.
quotes.author: Ruta Sepetys

quotes.quote: Awkward silences rule the world. People are so terrified of awkward silences that they will literally go to war rather than face an awkward silence.
quotes.author: Stefan Molyneux

quotes.quote: Dads are awkward because they're older guys who aren't cool anymore and are figuring out who they are, and they often make bad choices in fashion and music.
quotes.author: Tim Heidecker

quotes.quote: It's always awkward when someone doesn't realize you're joking and devotes thought time to what you've said. Double that when the person is wearing tinfoil.
quotes.author: Maureen Johnson

quotes.quote: Awkward.That's exactly how it was when we walked over to our sister and stood on each side of her, looking at her and feeling things and not knowing what to do.
quotes.author: Markus Zusak

quotes.quote: We had fun just messing around and being awkward like they would be awkward. There's always that stage in a friendship when you wonder whether it could be more.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.quote: Reunions are always fraught with awkward tensions - the necessity to account for oneself; the attempt to find, through memories, an ember of the old emotions.
quotes.author: Anita Shreve

quotes.quote: The truth doesn't set you free, you know. It makes you feel awkward and embarrassed and defenseless and red in the face and horrified and petrified and vulnerable.
quotes.author: Melina Marchetta

quotes.quote: It's interesting to have the awkward moments play out, and the real human interactions. The more you cut that down, you lose the joke, which is that this is painful and hard.
quotes.author: Nicholas Stoller

quotes.quote: Sometimes you need to be awkward to beat awkwardness.
quotes.author: Charlie Flynn

quotes.quote: The existence of other people is essentially awkward.
quotes.author: Lionel Shriver

quotes.quote: There is nothing quite as painful as a truly awkward silence.
quotes.author: Obert Skye

quotes.quote: Life can be awkward at times. It is part of the growing process.
quotes.author: Jim Fargiano

quotes.quote: Sometimes, you can not click with somebody, and it can feel awkward.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.quote: Awkwardness and feeling alienated are always going to be a part of comedy.
quotes.author: Mike Birbiglia

quotes.quote: Music has generally involved a lot of awkward contraptions, a certain amount of heavy lifting.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: Awkward, odd, and difficult situations will always present themselves. You just have to stay cool and work through them.
quotes.author: Erik Apple

quotes.quote: If you look back on the breakups that you've had, whether it's a long relationship or a one-night stand, it's always awkward.
quotes.author: Patrick Wilson

quotes.quote: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Being injured is quite an awkward situation to be in mentally. Physically, it's quite good to have a bit of a rest, but mentally it's hell.
quotes.author: Magnus Backstedt

quotes.quote: Dating is just awkward moments and one person wants more than the other. It's just that constant strangeness. I think it's a very real thing.
quotes.author: Jason Schwartzman

quotes.quote: Everyone feels awkward, everyone feels uncomfortable, everyone gets older, everyone gets lonely, everyone gets sick, everyone eventually dies.
quotes.author: Moby
